Comment: Began well from the widest draw, travelled wide in prominent position early, took up running coming out of back straight, maintained 1L advantage turning in, just held off second by the narrowest of margins.
Began with others, settled in 6th within 3Ls of pace, commenced move turning in, fought on nicely under pressure to just fail to get up on line.
Began awkwardly, settled behind midfield on rails, saved ground turning in to be within 3Ls of lead on straightening, ran on steadily under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Always prominent, settled 2-wide in 5th about 2.5Ls off the speed, similar turning in, fought on steadily without threatening, steadied 50 M out.
Began with others, soon taken well back, trailed the field into straight, switched out to the centre of the track for a run, ran on steadily.
Began moderately, niggled along to pick up one back position on rails, became 4th about 2Ls off the pace rounding home bend, switched out for a run upon straightening, fought on steadily.
Began from a poor draw, soon taken well back, baulked early in straight, finished off race nicely.
Began moderately, settled in forward of midfield within 5Ls of pace, inconvenienced on straightening, ran home one-paced.
Began well, held slender lead on rails early, ceded advantage to eventual winner coming out of back straight, kept on under pressure before yielding ground inside final 250 M.
Began with others, hard ridden to muster speed early, restrained to joint 2nd 2-wide without cover around home bend, soon weakened in straight.
Settled in midfield, raced wide throughout, found nil in straight.
Never better than midfield.
Began with others from a poor draw, raced ungenerously while taken backward to rear of midfield, hung wide making home turn, soon weakened.
Made his run third from the rear after being checked passing the 1700m. peeled out nicely turning for home and ran on strongly.
Travelled in midfield 2 deep with cover. Hit the lead near the furlong but was overhauled near the 50m.
Began awkwardly settling with the backmakers along the fence. Closed off well.
Crowded in the early stages settling back in the field 2-3 wide with cover. Peeled out widest after the 300m and hit the line with purpose.
Camped midfield the fence. Stayed to the inside in the home straight and whacked away at the same speed.
Dictated the running settling 1 off without cover. Commenced to tire after the final furlong.
Travelled behind midfield 2 deep with cover. Struck some tightening close to home but was only one paced prior to the incident.
Copped a check near the 1700m, but was always going to settle worse than midfield the fence. Made steady progress in the straight despite wanting to hang in.
Had every possible chance settling 1 out 1 back, had to be steadied when crowded near the 300m but was already a beaten horse, no excuses.
Tracked the leader along the paint. Had every possible chance but was a spent force after the 400m.
Settled behind midfield 3 wide with cover. Was never in the hunt and weakened over the concluding stages despite being shuffled back prior to the home turn.
Raced keenly as joint leader along the paint. Faded in the home straight.
Slow to begin settling midfield 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the final stretch.
Throughout the race travelled 3 deep without cover behind the speed. Never likely. Vet reported heart irregularity.
3-wide towards rear to home straight. Dashed strongly to hit front final furlong. Powered clear to score victory.
Prominent spot to home straight. Held up top of home straight. Finished off well when cleared but no hope with winner.
Ridden early and parked outside leader home turn. Pressed 350M. Hung on but couldn't resist the front pair final stages.
Sat behind leaders to home straight. Kept on satisfactorily to make frame without threatening the front trio.
Behind midfield on fence to home turn. Baulked for run early home straight. Ran on steadily when clear.
Hard ridden early and found the fence towards rear. Covered decent ground home.
3-wide at midfield early. One spot closer home turn. One-paced to conclude.
Pressed early to hold the fence in the leading position. Couldn't turn up a notch when asked passing 300M.
Behind midfield always. Never nearer.
Wide behind midfield to home straight. No real improvement thereafter.
2-wide at midfield to home straight. Failed to pick up thereafter.
At rear to home straight. Never in the hunt.
Ahead of midfield early. Left wide and without cover after 800M. Improved to outside of leaders home turn. Peaked soon after straightening.
At rear always. Never a factor.
Sharp to stride from Gate 1, raced in close 2nd on paint, switched 2 deep without cover at 800m, quickened to lead at 400m, strong run to line.
Smart break, dropped in mid rank, 2 deep without cover 6L off lead, progress from 600m, peeled 4 wide into straight, quickened at 400m, good effort to the wire.
Tracked speed 1 off the rail with cover, 3 deep in 3rd position when hard ridden into home stretch, maintained effort to the winning post.
Fair early pace, settled 5th on rail, taken 4 deep and checked slightly at 400m, lost some momentum, recovered to close off strongly.
Lacked pace from gate, niggled along in mid rank, on bridle in 7th turning for home, unable to quicken at top of stretch, stayed on well.
Missed the kick, speed to recover and sit 3rd on fence at 800m, out-paced but responded to pressure down the stretch, lost 5th at the wire.
Fastest at break, led until headed at 400m, plugged on through the closing stages.
Nudged along from start, raced behind midfield, 5 wide into straight, modest effort through final exchanges.
Raced on the rail behind mid rank, switched out entering home stretch, one-paced.
Dropped to the tail from wide draw, 12Ls off lead and nudged along at 800m, some progress thereafter, ran on past beaten horses.
Held up near rear from widest gate, camped 2 deep without cover, tracked widest off home turn, kept on one pace.
Slow at the break, taken to rail, raced in last trio with cover, hard ridden at 400m, faded out.
Bustled along towards rear, tame effort in straight, never a factor.
Hard driven from gate, raced 3 or 4 deep without cover in midfield, 6 wide off final turn, tiring when sandwiched between rivals at 250m, dropped away.
Fair break, taken back to rear one-off, widest of all into straight, came with rush to lead on line.
Broke well, settled fifth rail, held up briefly approaching turn and mid-straight, three wide bid to lead 50m out, nailed on line.
Fair break, not rushed, mid-rear two off, wide bid, ran on well, swamped late.
Ridden from gate to lead and cross, dictated, ridden early straight, led gamely until caught 50m out.
Fair break, not rushed, settled mid-rear rail, improved rail turn, bid between horses, kept on without kick.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear two off, wide bid, kept on.
Fair break, slight bump, mid-rear one off, mid-track bid, kept on.
Jumped well, settled second rail, then third, kept trying to get up leader's inside straight but not quite pace, no extra late.
Fair break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, no extra from 200m out.
Broke well, up to fourth one off, four wide bid, slight bump, weakened.
Broke well, ridden up three wide to second one off, challenged leader early straight, no extra from 300m out.
Fair break, not rushed, fourth last rail, inside bid, kept on one pace until weakened late.
Taken back, second last rail, out for wide bid, slightly short of room but never dangerous.
Wide without cover throughout, badly bumped, never a factor.
Settled in box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly to in by a very narrow margin.
Eased to sit in midfield, lack cover, 6Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 400M, just beaten by a short head in 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, 4.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, held up 400M, dashed well when clear and grab 3rd.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow tempo.
Eased to rear, 10Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M.
Very slow away, 7.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Settled in front, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, ran on well until 200M, slightly checked then flattened.
Eased back, checked early, 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Hard ridden forward, just off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, but soon emptied 300M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader on the rails, checked 700M, not suited by the slow pace, ran on ok in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
In front of midfield along the fence, 2.5Ls off the slow tempo, weakened 200M.
Took rail and led easily by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, however soon weakened 300M.
Eased at start, 10Ls off the leader on the fence, checked 700M, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Taken back to rear, last one off until pulled wide entering straight, strong run to cut down entire field and lead on line.
Fair break, slight interference passing post first time, midfield one off, strong mid-track bid, outpaced close home.
Broke well, up to lead, headed half- length but retained rail in second, challenge two off, not kick of first two.
Fair break, midfield one off, out for mid-track bid but unable to trouble leaders.
Slowly away, up to mid-rear rail, improved along rail, inside bid, slightly short of room, kept on one pace.
Fair break, ridden to join leaders but caught three wide for most of trip, ridden early straight, no extra from 250m out.
Broke well, settled fifth rail, blocked 350m out, clear 200m out, kept on late.
Fair break, early interference then fourth one off, four wide bid at turn, kept on.
Moderate break, checked passing post first time then third one off, challenged leader three off, weakened.
Fair break, fourth last one off, taking time to settle, checked off heels turn, wide bid, modest progress.
Not rushed from wide gate but still caught three wide no cover first turn and throughout, no more to give in straight.
Fair break, midfield three off, three wide no cover from 900m out, slight interference mid-straight, no extra.
Got head down and missed break losing considerable ground, second last rail, no run available before turn, one pace.
Ridden from gate, checked early, midfield rail, blocked turn and mid-straight, weakened late.
In midfield early, moved forward to track leader from 1000M, responded strongly to lead inside 300M, kicked clear, kept on well to maintain advantage final 200M.
Always prominent, switched out to clear 300M, stayed on well to go 2nd 25M from home but not getting to the winner.
Never far off the pace, came to have every chance turning into straight, couldn't get to the winner, faded final stages and lost 2nd near line.
Held up behind midfield, stayed on final 300M but making no impression on the winner.
Dropped back to last, switched wide nearing 600M, made some progress in straight without troubling the leaders.
Began well, restrained to a handy position behind leaders, one paced inside 300M, no impression.
Towards the rear along the inside, ran on only fairly, never a threat.
Restrained on jumping from wide barrier, crossed to a 3-wide spot towards the rear, came under pressure 500M, never going the pace to challenge.
Went forward, emerged as leader nearing 800M, led to 350M, weakened.
Towards the rear, not quickened uner pressure over final 400M, neer a factor.
Settled behind midfield, one-paced throughout, lost touch near 200M.
Positioned in midfield 3-wide, pushed wider over the turn, soon weakened passing 400M, eased when no chance final 150M.
Given waiting ride and settled behind the mid-division, kicked strongly when asked for effort 350 M, ran on soundly, just in time.
Broke well, settled one-off just off the speed, responded well when asked 350 M out, led 200 M out, kept on strongly, caught on line.
Urged along to share the lead on rails, headed 200 M out, kept on well for place.
Travelled 3-wide with cover midfield, responded when asked 350 M,ran on steadily.
Lacked early speed and travelled on from the rear, made up gradual ground down the outside in straight.
Restrained one-off midfield, pulled early, only one-pace straight.
Easily up to share the lead 2-deep, only gave limited response when asked 300m out, flattened.
Taken back from the high draw, only limited progress down the outside straight.
Given waiting ride and settled behind the mid-division, only one-paced when asked for effort in straight.
Prominently placed just off lead, pulled halfway, held ground at the top of straight, no extra final 200 M.
Prominently placed in box-seat, held ground until weakened near 200 M pole.
Slow away, urged along to find midfield rail, struggled turn, soon weakened.
Lacked early speed and travelled rear, outpaced at the top of straight, faded.
Caught wide with no cover just off the pace, struggled turn, weakened, tailed off.
Showed usual pace to roll forward, took up running and rolled along at own leisure 2Ls clear, held a margin turning and fought on well final 300m to defy rivals.
Pressed forward to take a prominent spot first outside leader, enjoyed a fair trip with even speed on, 2Ls down and improving turning, loomed up but couldn't make ground final 100m.
Faded back from a wide alley, raced near last on rails nearly 10ls back, kept to fence and saved ground turning, closed hard along inside final 300m making many lengths and just missed 2nd.
Angled into ideal spot 1 out 1 back, had all favours in run, improved at 350m, kept coming final furlong grinding away to make frame.
Drifted back to settle with last few, raced 3 wide 8Ls or so back, had cover in mid section, came to outside and warmed up strongly final 300m making good ground to be nearest on line.
Shade tardy to begin, wasn't in usual role on pace, sat 3Ls back on rails, even run to turn, made steady progress but peaked on run final 100m. (See Racing Incidents.)
Showed usual speed early but unable to hold lead, was difficult to settle racing behind leader, close enough on turn, kept on well enough but lacked dash to factor final 200m.
Fractious before start, landed a spot in midfield, reasonable run to bend, kept to task in straight but had too much to do, made minor ground late.
Out in line, posted 3 wide without cover from outside alley, worked too hard wide in midfield, kept on well enough but hard run took toll final 250m.
No early speed, raced behind midfield on rails, 7Ls away in mid section, saved ground on bend, one paced in straight and failed to threaten.
Allowed to settle in 2nd half of field, raced in two wide line 8-9Ls away, had job to do turning, just produced an even close making minor progress.
No early toe, raced 2 and 3 wide at rear 10Ls off lead, always well back, never threatened.
Restrained to find cover, raced 3 wide behind midfield, enjoyed a good trail into race, came 4 wide turning and let down strongly at 250m, dashed too well and drew away for another commanding win.

Ended up well back from a tricky alley, 8Ls or so away on rails, aided by tempo but set a task turning, weaved a passage between horses making good ground late before inconvenienced, still able to take 2nd late.
Out in line, ended up 6Ls away in midfield, crept closer approaching bend, worked into clear with a good run, kept on well but lost 2nd placing final 50m.
Away ok, raced 3Ls or so away on rails, had a quiet run to bend, in mix most of straight before drifting late and bumping, lost place final 50m.
Began nicely, angled into 1 out 1 back spot, even run with decent speed on, no excuse to bend, loomed up at 300m but no dash thereafter and stayed on before dropping off late.
No speed, raced 3 and 4 wide at rear, nearly 9Ls away in run, got on eventual winner's back rounding bend, peaked on run but kept on ok for first up effort.
Pressed forward to eventually take up running, set decent tempo in front, 1L clear turning, there to 200m before fading out.
No early speed, settled at rear 8-9Ls back, raced 2 and 3 wide on bend, had job to do but just passed the weakening brigade late.
Went forward to take a spot first outside leader, did some work with decent speed on, 1L down turning, didn't have much left at 300m and weakened out.
Planted 3 wide without cover in midfield, did some work with speed on, 5Ls back to bend, kept coming to his credit but emptied at 200m.
Standard break, raced 7Ls away behind midfield in mid section, difficult to settle despite even trip to bend, ordinary closing effort in stretch.
Pressed forward and retained early lead, took a trail heading down back, did a bit on decent speed, in traffic turning but was disapointing when clear and dropped out tamely.
Slow into stride from wide gate, settled with last few on rails, best part of 10Ls back to bend, made no serious progress.
Settled in midfield 4-5Ls back in run, no excuses to bend, dropped out easily to beaten a fair way.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Lacked early pace, remained in last few on rails, took closer order passing the Rock, saved ground on inside turning in, baulked for a run before quickening inside final 250 M to snatch victory near the line.
Began fairly, midfield when steadied and lost position on 1000 M bend, remained in last few to straight, widest turning in, ran on well to be nearest at finish.
Began with others, always thereabouts on rails, hit the front under pressure inside final 200 M only to be caught close to home.
Settled in midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, baulked for a run passing 200 M, kept on well to finish.
Jumped one of the best from a wide gate but unable to cross to rails early, eventually took up running on rails 700 M out, led until headed inside 200 M, swamped for a placing late.
Began with others, close up early, gradually drifted backward to be just better than midfield, fought on steadily in straight without quickening.
Began with others, settled in rear of midfield, finished off race well inside final 200 M.
Began moderately from a wide draw, soon dropped to rear, raced wide towards the rear far side, became last on the bend, made late impression past beaten horses. (Mild amount of mucus.)
Began moderately, hampered twice early dropping to tail-end, commenced move rounding home bend, made modest progress down inside of straight.
Ridden along after beginning from the widest gate, settled mainly 3-wide without cover in 2L 4th far side, similar turning in, soon weakened under pressure.
Showed early speed to dispute lead, restrained for cover passing 800 M travelling in one-out-one-back position, weakened after straightening.
Began with others, gradually settled wide in midfield, folded up quickly after straightening. (Blood in trachea.)
Taken back from an outside gate and made its run from the rear, 2 deep with cover. Came widest in the final stretch & grabbed victory close to the line.
Pushed straight to the lead and dictated terms along the rails. Had a decent break on the field at the 200m but was overhauled late. (Blood in trachea.)
Parked midfield the paint. Ran into some traffic early in the straight, got home nicely once in the clear near the furlong.
Struck interference at the start and settled at the tail of the field along the paint. Closed off soundly to make the frame.
Carried out into a 3 wide line rounding the first turn and travelled 3 deep thereafter with some cover. Maintained a sound gallop all the way down the running.
Camped midfield, 1off with cover. Kept up a reasonable gallop in the run to the wire.
Stalked the leader on the rails. Had every chance but failed to capitalize when asked for an effort in the final stretch.
Settled back towards the rear, 3 wide with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Tracked the leader along the fence early before racing keenly and taking up a position 1 out 1 back near the 700m. Faded over the concluding stages.
Settled midfield 3 deep with cover. Peeled out early in the final stretch but only plodded to the line.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled with the backmakers, 2 deep with cover. Badly held up early in the straight and was severely checked off heels. Never recovered.
Eventually worked across to sit outside the leader after the 700m, hung out after the 600m and failed to offer any extra effort at the business end of the race. (Blood in trachea.)
Began well. Took lead on fence 1300M. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Ran away home straight to score victory.
Began awkwardly but soon resumed a forward spot. Elected to sit one-off behind leader 1300M. Pressed turning into home but couldn't pose any real threat to leader. Kept giving to hold 2nd.
Ridden along after start but was trapped 3-wide towards rear. Settled on fence at rear 1300M. Improved inside home turn and was 4Ls down on straightening. Progressed steadily for 3rd.
Behind midfield on fence. Driven and shifted wider home turn. 4Ls away into final stretch. Kept on to make frame.

Checked and was crowded for room at start. Caught 3-wide towards rear to home turn. Raced tight early home straight. Made up some ground until shifted in to avoid heels and bumped another runner 200M. Ran on thereafter.
2-wide towards rear to home straight. Plugged on to the line.
Away in line and sat 2-wide at midfield. Swung wide and was 5Ls back leaving home turn. One-paced to conclude.
Fair start. Rolled to a 2-wide spot ahead of midfield 1400M. Pressured 500M but couldn't turn up a notch.
2-wide towards rear to home straight. Never picked up.
Never far of the pace on fence. Shaken up 500M but failed to respond. Faded final 250M.
3-wide at midfield early. Struggled from home turn. Well beaten soon after straightening.
Travelled 3-wide without cover ahead of midfield early. Dropped out from home turn and finished tailed out.
Sharp break from gate 2, led on paint, quickened at 350m, raced clear under firm drive, strong run to wire, always in command.
Broke with others, sat 5th on rail, urged on at 400m, switched 3 deep off turn, game run down centre track to grab 2nd close home.
Awkward from gate, speed to sit close 2nd, 2 deep without cover, caught for toe turning in, kept on until tiring late.
Good break, restrained to race 4th, tracked 2 deep with cover, peeled three wide into stretch, closed off soundly.
Smartly away, slipstreamed leader in 3rd on rail, driven into home turn, one paced in chase to wire.
Broke nicely, dropped in 10th 2 deep with cover, 8L down & driven at 450m, very wide into straight, stayed on.
Bumped at start, camped midfield on rail, 5L 7th turning in, modest progress in stretch.
Driven forward to sit mid rank at first turn, raced 2 deep with cover, hard pressure from 400m, one-paced to line.
Raced 2 deep in last pair from Gate 12, widest into straight, beaten when opponent's whip struck its nose at 150m, hands and heels to finish.
Travelled 2 deep behind mid rank, wide off home turn, unable to quicken.
Taken back to race on rail in last pair, minor progress past one-paced rivals from 300m, weakened final 100m.
Parked worse than midfield, hard ridden at 300m, little response, faded out.
Awkward jump, but drove through along rail to settle third trailing leader, challenged and led early straight, soon clear.
Broke well, fourth one-off, mid-track bid, ran on well but not match winner's kick.
Slowly away, settled rear rail, bid between horses, ran on well.
Fair break, settled midfield rail, out for bid two off, ran on but outkicked.
Moderate break, not much early pace, fourth last one off pulling slightly, taken off heels, kept on well between horses but unable to threaten.
Blew start, losing two lengths, third last rail, kept on well inside but never able to challenge.
Fair break, midfield one-off urged, slight interference 900m out, kept on in straight without being able to threaten.
Broke fast, led and crossed, led to 300m out, weakened.
Broke fast, up wide to join leaders, then second one-off, tried to challenge entering straight, weakened.
Broke well, up wide but not pace to join leaders, mid-rear one-off, awkward turn, no progress from 200m out.
Moderate start, last three off, aimed between horses, no progress.
Fair break, aimed for lead but not pace to get there, caught three wide midfield, ridden and weakened, blood in trachea.
Pushed to take the rail and shared the lead at fast sectionals, dominated throughout without real challenges.
Eased to obtain the box seat, 1.5Ls off the fast tempo, closed off well to the line for 2nd.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, made some ground 200M.
Settled in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, benefited by the fast tempo and the rail-run, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 6Ls off the leaders on the fence, suited by the fast tempo, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 3Ls off fast tempo, checked 600M, trapped 3-4 wide, ran on ok despite all negative racing situations.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders, favoured by the fast pace, ran on ok.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, however no progress.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, weakened 200M.
Pushed to share the lead at fast sectionals 3-4 wide, hung out badly, faded 250M.
Moderate break, midfield one off then rail, made smooth ground along rail, then mid-track bid, led 100m out, soon clear.
Broke well, up wide to join leaders, settled third and fourth one-off, ridden turn, mid-track bid, not match winner.
Fair break, not rushed, third last rail, improved inside entering straight, inside bid, kept on well without being able to challenge.
Hopped start, third last one-off, bid between runners straight, finished well.
Fair break, fourth rail, improved turn, inside bid, kept on but outpaced late.
Taken back from wide to rear one-off, last into straight, wide bid, finished well.
Missed break and seemed unwilling, second last one-off, made ground between horses late but never able to challenge.
Fair start but caught four wide first turn, improved far side to second one-off, kept on one pace until no extra late.
Quickly away, joined leaders then midfield one-off, ridden entering straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, led first turn and into straight, kicked early straight and still in front 50m out, swamped by closers.
Fair break, fourth last one-off then cornered badly first turn and caught wide no cover, went forward far side, no extra straight.
Good break, fifth one-off, back to mid-rear one-off, ridden before straight, weakened.
Reserved near the rear 7Ls behind leader, 3-wide turning for home, unleashed a powerful turn of foot to run down leaders inside 100M and won going away. Impressive.
Held up behind midfield, saved ground on the inside throughout, headway inside 400M, finished off well to go 2nd 50M from home but had no chance with the winner.
Dropped back from draw 12, settled in last 8-9Ls off the pace, held up for clear running until 200M, switched wide and ran on strongly, got up to claim 3rd late.
Not hurried in the early and middle part of the race, travelled nicely in midfield, blocked early straight, did best work final 200M.
Went forward, caught wide until crossing to the lead near 1000M, set steady pace to straight, rallied on when pressed by pursuers inside 300M, faded late.
Towards the rear along the inside, shuffled back to last making the turn for home, driven to chase leaders from 400M, made steady progress from off the pace.
Vied for early lead, sat one out one back entering back straight, pushed out inside 300M but couldn't get past leader, weakened final 100M.
Towards the rear in the first half, moved closer to pace from 800M, 3-wide turning for home, kept on same pace in the finish.
Settled more prominent than usual, tracked leaders and well poised to strike turning in, not quickened under pressure.
Never better than midfield, one-paced final 300M, no impression.
Vied for early lead, tracked leader from 1000M, came under pressure passing 500M, weakened and dropped out of contention mid-straight. (Muco.)
In the group chasing the pace, travelled wide without cover from 1000M, outpaced inside 400M, lost touch 200M.

Broke well from a high draw settling 3-wide in a prominent spot, remained similar turning in, soon hit the front after straightening, just held off late challenges.
Began awkwardly losing ground, soon recovered to midfield on rails, shifted out for a run turning in, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began with others, gradually settled in 6th in forward of midfield, similar turning in, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began moderately, settled behind midfield, shifted out for a run turning in, ran on to do best work late.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, shifted wider turning in, made steady headway under pressure down the centre of the straight, found no extra close to home.
Began with others, settled in 2L 4th on rails, baulked for a run until 300 M, ran home one-paced thereafter.
Began moderately settling in 3L 5th, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Niggled along in last few, saved ground on rails turning in, kept on same pace without quickening under pressure.
Began with others settling in forward of midfield, fought on steadily behind runners early in straight, faded under pressure in closing stages.
Always towards the rear, made no show over the apparently insufficient trip.
Always in last few, baulked for a run upon straightening, raced ungenerously to the line.
Soon taken well back, never a danger.
Began with others, ridden along to gain 2nd spot just outside leader, hit the front briefly upon straightening, faded gradually. (Questioned for disappointed performance.)
Began moderately, soon ridden to take up running on home bend, led narrowly until headed into straight, dropped out tamely.
Assumed the lead midrace whilst travelling towards the centre of the course. Quickly took control of the race and kept up a good effort to claim the prize.
Camped midfield with cover, closer to the middle of the track. Ran on nicely.
Parked in third position about 3 from the stand side. Maintained a sound gallop right to the wire.
Led early the grandstand rail. Was pressured passing the 400m, stuck to task gamely.
Raced outside the leader for most of the trip, near stand side. Hung in for the major part of the race, faded over the concluding stages.
Settled back in the race toward the outside rail. Kept on one paced over the final stages.
Began awkwardly travelling behind the speed 3-4 off the grandstand side. Failed to quicken and gave ground inside the last 100m.
Tightened at the start, settling behind midfield, the outside rail. Gave way over the final 100m. (Bled.)
Crowded at the start, settling behind midfield nearer to the middle of the course had some cover. Found nothing over the final furlong.
Settled with the backmakers about 4-5 off the grandstand side with cover. Made no impression at the business end of the event.
Travelled near the centre of the track, midfield, without cover. Never a factor.
Settled behind the speed towards the middle of the track, no cover.. Failed to make any impression over the final 300m, giving ground after the 150m. (Bled.)
Slow to begin settling at the rear of the field along the outside rail. Was always battling to stay in touch and weakened over the final furlong.
Raced along the centre of the course, midfield no cover. Failed to travel at any stage and struggled in the run to the line. (To trial.)
Back with last few. Dashed strongly to cover substantial ground inside 400M. Took charge closing stages.
3-wide behind midfield to home turn. Baulked for run top of home straight. Finished off well when clear but couldn't repel the winner final 200M.
3-wide towards rear. Came widest on straightening. Kept finding the line satisfactorily to snatch a minor placing.
3-wide ahead of midfield early. Strode forward from 1000M and sat one-off behind leader home turn. One-paced to conclude.
2-wide ahead of midfield early and middle stages. Peeled out and was well-positioned to strike turning into home. Plugged on without threat.
Pressed early. Cut to the fence and led 1100M. Held a 1L advantage into final stretch. Overhauled by principals final furlong.
Began awkwardly. Ended up 3-wide behind midfield to home turn. Swung wide leaving the bend. Couldn't turn up a notch thereafter.
At rear on fence to home straight. Beat tired runners home.
3-wide at midfield to home turn. Shifted wider turning in. Peaked 400M.
Ridden early to maintain a position ahead of midfield on fence. Same spot rounding home turn. Found nothing when asked 300M.
Niggled early and raced behind midfield on fence to home straight. No improvement thereafter.
Slow to begin. Shaken up and travelled wide and without cover behind pace group to home straight. Weakened soon after straightening.
2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Faded final 400M.
Driven up early and sat behind pace on fence. Pressured 500M but couldn't pick up. Well beaten after 350M. (Irregular Heart Rhythm.)
Raced 3 deep with cover in mid rank, bumped when taken 6 wide into straight, 3Ls down at 400m, strong stretch run to lead at 150m.
Camped just behind midfield on rail, ridden from final turn, challenged wide, progress to 2nd at 50m, closed gamely to wire.
Sharp break, dropped mid rank 2 deep with cover, progress on turn, bumped winner top of stretch, duelled with winner until outpointed last 200m.
Driven from gate, settled in lead, responded to hard pressure down stretch, headed 150m out, no extra.
Covered up 2 deep towards rear, wide off final turn, 6L 8th at 400m, steady headway to line.
Fast break, disputed early lead, tracked pace on rail, 2L down turning in, one-paced thereafter.
Raced 2 deep without cover in 2nd, hard-ridden 350m out, unable to quicken, faded close home.
Tardy start from wide gate, trapped 2 deep behind midfield, wide off home turn, modest progress to 200m, never a danger.
Early pace to dispute lead, soon taken back to 5th, 4th and every chance turning in, weakened from 400m.
Positioned 3 deep from wide draw close to pace without cover, close enough but under whip 430m out, soon faded.
Smart break, driven early stages, settled midfield on rail, pushed along 600m, found nothing off home turn.
Slow break, soon 2L adrift at tail, raced in rear, widest into home straight, minor late progress past beaten horses.
Tardy start, rousted early to race in last trio, settled rail, niggled to maintain place, never a factor.
Slowly away from wide gate, sat 2 deep 1 off rear, pushed along 600m remaining, unable to muster.
Fair break, steadied to midfield rail, mid-track bid, strong finish to lead 50m out, soon in charge.
Broke well, fourth rail, pocketed briefly mid-straight, led 200m out until outpaced close home.
Slow start, not much early pace, mid-rear one off urged, mid-track bid, late progress.
Broke well, fifth one off, led briefly approaching 200m out, kept on one pace when headed.
Broke well, fifth last three off no cover throughout, kept on quite well mid-track but never pace to challenge.
Poor start, hopped and lost three lengths, last rail, made ground late but never able to challenge.
Fair break, then up quickly to join leaders, second one off, led briefly 300m out, no extra when headed.
Fair break, up quickly to lead and cross, headed early straight, one pace thereafter.
Fair break, not much early speed, midfield one off urged, short of room early straight, switched inside, kept on, no kick.
Away well, then caught midfield four wide, never near rail, battled on mid-track but never a factor.
Fair break, ridden for lead but had to settle for midfield two off, blocked briefly mid-straight, never able to get involved.
Moderate break, second last one-off, last into straight, wide bid, little response.
Broke fast, up to third two off, lost ground steadily from turn.
Sluggish start, mid-rear two off, aimed between horses straight, no progress.
Pushed to take rail and share the lead at fast sectionals, hung on strongly to win.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made ground steadily 300M for 2nd.
Behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader, suited by the fast tempo, trapped 3 wide, progressed steadily 250M for 3rd.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, ran on ok.
At back, 8.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, made steady ground 200M.
In front of midfield, 4Ls off the fast tempo, trapped 3 wide throughout without cover, flattened 200M.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead at fast pace 2 wide, soon weakened 300M.
At back, 8.5Ls off the leader along the rails, benefited by the fast pace, no progress.
At rear, more than 10Ls off the leader, favoured by the fast pace, but trapped 3 wide, made some minor ground 200M.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader, suited by the fast tempo, but trapped 3 wide throughout, no progress.
Slow away, always at rear, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden forward, 3Ls off the fast tempo on the fence, flattened 250M, checked 150M.
Hard ridden forward, 3Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, emptied 300M.
Midfield along the fence, 5.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast tempo, checked 300M, weakened.
Away well, led rail, strongly challenged all through straight, fought on to take charge from 100m out.
Fair break, not much early speed, second last rail, ridden turn, burrowed through along rail to finish best of all.
Moderate break, rear one off early, improved between horses approaching turn, kept on well but never able to threaten.
Not well away, improved quickly to third one off, challenged turn, fought winner gamely all through straight until weakened late.
Fair break, midfield one off, checked then third last one off, wide bid, ran on well but unable to threaten.
Away well, fifth rail, up to third early straight, kept on one pace from 200m out.
Broke well, up to second two off, then back to midfield one off, wide for clear run, kept on one pace.
Broke well, fourth one off then checked and re-settled, mid-rear entering straight, mid-track bid, bumped and unbalanced, no impression.
Taken back from wide draw, last rail, some improvement turn, short of room, only modest progress.
Fair break, midfield but wide into first turn and thereafter, found little when asked, irregular heart rhythm.
Fair break, not much early speed, slight check entering turn, improved rail, inside bid, weakened.
Up quickly from wide draw to share lead two off no cover, ridden approaching straight, lost ground quickly.
Shared lead along the Stands' rail, drew clear inside 200M, kept on well to the line and was never seriously challenged.
Tracked leaders, stayed on well final 200M but couldn't get near to the winner.
I\n mid-division, held up for clear run 500-300M, closed off well final 200M to go 3rd near line.
Along the stand's rail 2-3Ls off leaders, ran on steadily final 300M and just missed out on a placing.
Up with the pace, found less than expected under pressure, weakened inside 100M.
Slow to begin, pushed along to stay in touch with the field, no threat to leaders final 300M.
Shared lead to 200M, weakened rapidly inside 150M. (Bled 2nd time / Heart Irregularity.)
Slow to begin, towards the rear, kept on same pace over the final 300M.
Sat just behind leaders, not quickened when the race got serious passing 400M, weakened 200M out.
Raced alongside the leaders but found very little off the bridle nearing 400M, dropped away passing 250M.
Towards the rear, made no progress inside 400M, never a factor.
Appeared to be travelling well in early and middle stages but not quickened under pressure inside 400M, soon out of contention.
Blundered badly on jumping, pushed along to keep up middle stages, not pace to challenge, eased when no chance final 100M.
Pushed along early to maintain a position close to leaders, under pressure throughout, weakened into last inside 200M.
Broke well, fifth one off, had to wait for gap mid-straight, surged through to lead last 50m.
Taken back from wide draw, last early then third last rail, no run available so witched wide, ran on strongly, just failed.
Broke well, taken back but still three wide mid-rear, improved wide turn, ran on strongly, just outpaced late.
Fair break, sixth rail, inside bid, just missed out in bunched finish.
Broke well, third rail, inside bid, led narrowly 200m out, kept on, outpaced late.
Fair break, not asked for early pace, fourth last one off, checked turn, wide bid, ran on well but never able to challenge.
Broke fast from wide gate, led and eventually crossed, led until 200m out, headed and weakened slightly late, rider lost whip.
Fair break, midfield one off, looking for room mid-straight, kept on when free.
Good break, up to second one off, challenged for lead 300m out, no extra once beaten off.
Broke well, not rushed early, sixth last rail, inside bid, some progress until run flattened late.
Ridden from wide gate, not pace to lead and caught fourth three wide no cover, gradually weakened from 300m out.
Fair break, not much early speed, bumped, third last one-off, ridden turn, wide bid, not pace to threaten.
Untidy start, two lengths last rail, brought wide straight, kept on but no impression.
Moderate start, midfield one off, little response when asked early straight.
Settled in midfield, made rapid headway on straightening to join leaders at 200M, gained narrow advantage 100M out, rallied on strongly to just prevail.
Travelled strongly behind midfield, held up early straight before switching into clear passing 300M, closed off well and was just denied.
Led steadily, rallied on when strongly pressed by rivals inside 300M, kept on well to the line, narrowly beaten.
Raced towards the rear under heavy restraint, commenced his run along the inside final 400M, had little room mid-straight, ran on well final stages.
Reserved in last, 5Ls off the pace turning into straight, switched to outside, made good headway final 250M despite hanging in, nearest finish.
Tracked leader along the fence, had to switch ground when no clear run inside 200M, stayed on well final stages.
Raced outside the lead, soon took over on straightening, headed 200M, weakened late stages.
Behind midfield, raced without cover from 700M, made good progress early straight, run ended passing 200M.
Held up midfield along the fence, no clear run early straight, inconvenienced near 200M, stayed on towards the finish.
Restrained in a position near the rear, 3-wide turning for home, stayed on but lacked pace to seriously challenge.
Held up in midfield, dropped further back making the home turn, near last into straight, found little under pressure.
Prominent behind leading pair, didn't respond when asked inside 400M, dropped out rapidly nearing 200M.
Raced 3-wide without cover behind leading pair, weakened passing 400M, soon behind.

Began well, soon took slender lead outside the second, just held on to the line.
Settled mainly one-back in 3rd on rails, soon came to challenge after straightening, fought on to be nearest at finish.
Niggled along to dispute lead on rails, remained similar into straight, held some chance inside final 200 M but unable to sustain effort close to home.
Broke well, settled in rear of midfield, took closer order at Rock, shifted wide into straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began with others, soon settled in last few, similar turning in, ran on steadily without threatening.
Soon taken back from a wide gate, travelled towards the rear and wide into straight, made moderate progress without threatening.
Began from the widest gate, soon taken well back, produced good late impression in the run home.
Broke with others, gradually dropped to rear of midfield, saved ground on inside turning in, kept on same pace but swamped closing stages.
Began well from a poor draw, settled 3-wide without cover in joint 3rd, gave ground around home bend, ran home one-paced.
Began with others, soon taken well back, saved ground on inside turning in, kept on one pace without threatening.
Began moderately, soon picked up to joint 3rd position, dropped out of contention inside final 400 M.
Not far off in first 200 M, shuffling backward gradually before dropped out from approaching the Rock, hung out throughout.
Camped 3 back, 1 off with cover. Quickened nicely and had the race in its keeping 100m from the line.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled near the rear, 1 off with cover. Closed off strongly after experiencing difficulty obtaining clear running early in the home straight.
Travelled behind midfield, posted 3 wide without cover. Rolled forward after the 600m and ranged up at the furlong but peaked on its run inside the 100m.
Made its run third from the rear, 2 deep with cover. Came widest on the home turn and finished off well to make the frame.
Settled in 2 or 3rd position, 1 off no cover. Hit the lead near the 200m but was overhauled after the 100m.
Parked 3 back the fence. Had to be checked to avoid heels near the 200m & shifted out abruptly. Never really recovered.
Travelled behind midfield on the rails. Only made a mild impression in the straight.
Stalked the leader along the fence. Had every chance but faded over the concluding stages.
Slow to begin settling with the backmakers along the rail. Only finished off one paced.
Travelled midfield, 2 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Settled 4 back the fence. Kept to the inside in the final stretch but made no impression.
Sent forward and led along the paint. Was a beaten horse at the 300m and compounded thereafter. (Bled.)
Away in line. Settled 2-wide behind midfield first turn. Progressed 3-wide and was 7Ls down passing 400M. Rallied on to score victory with some comfort.
Soon found the fence at midfield after start. Finished off well home straight to snatch 2nd at post but no match with winner's kick.
Quickly into stride. Sat one-out-one-back 1300M. Driven 3-wide from home turn. Hit front 150M but failed to repel winner closing stages. Joined for a place at line.
Handy position to home turn. Peeled out to make run passing 500M. Every chance but lacked finishing touch of the front trio.
Towards rear to home straight. 8Ls away 350M. Covered good ground thereafter and nearly made frame.
Rolled forward after start and eventually parked outside leader 1300M. Shifted to the fence and raced behind pace home turn. Plugged on home straight without seriously threatening the principals.
Restrained at break from widest gate, dropped in last, 12L off lead when wide off home turn, nipped back inside, switched out at 200m, strong run to line.
Elected to race behind midfield on fence. Same position turning into home. Held ground thereafter.
Began well. Slotted 2-wide ahead of midfield to home turn. Couldn't turn up a notch final stretch.
Led on fence from 1300M. Held a 2Ls advantage turning into home. Weakened final furlong.
Back with last few always. Never improved.
2-wide behind midfield to home straight. No show thereafter.
Settled 2 deep behind midfield, 6L off pace when niggled at 500m, progress wide, hung in throughout strong stretch run to lead 100m.
Camped at tail from outside gate, progress from 500m, widest on home turn, shadowed winner's stretch run, went 2nd at 100m, always held.
Speed from wide draw, raced 2 deep without cover in 2nd, led 200m, headed 100m, kept on to line.
Parked midfield on rail, 3L back and every chance off final turn, stayed on to take 4th 50m out.
Driven from gate 1, tracked leader on rail, close 3rd at 400m, out-paced and lost place at 200m.
Travelled 4 from rear on rail, advanced from 350m, crowded at 200m, lost momentum, ran on final 100m to grab 6th at wide.
Set pace from wide draw, hard ridden off home turn, lost lead at 200m, weakened and mugged on line for 6th.
Smart from gate, trapped close to pace 3 deep without cover, driven at 500m, wandered in under pressure, squeezed rival at 200m, plugged on to wire.
Raced 2 deep with cover 3 from rear, under firm drive entering stretch, path checked slightly at 200m, little extra thereafter.
Good toe from gate, 2 deep in mid rank, out-paced in home straight, checked off heels at 180m, closed out to line.
Smart break, 2 deep with cover behind front pair, running on soundly when squeezed up and bumped at 200m, faded out.
Slow to stride, always in last pair, found nothing when asked, well beaten.
Quick jump, led, declined battle for lead when joined, fourth rail, inside bid, battled well to get on top last 50m.
Fair break, up one off to lead rail, fought on well straight till headed last 50 m.
Broke fast, ridden to join lead two off, settled second one off, challenged early straight but unable to get past, fought on well for third.
Not well away, up to midfield three off, bumped 900m out, then found rail, mid-track bid, ran on well late, lost hind plate.
Missed break slightly, up fast and wide to fourth two off, wide into straight, kept on gamely for fifth.
Broke well, back to fourth last one off, wide bid, just lacked kick last 50m.
Broke well, taken back but caught three wide midfield, wide bid, ran on well till flattened out last 50m.
Fair break, not much pace early, third last rail, bid between horses, just checked last 50m, could not be ridden out to line.
Fair break, up to fourth rail, then settled midfield rail, bid two off straight, not much room but held late.
Taken back to rear rail, held up for inside bid, not much room but kept on late.
Fair break, not much pace early, fifth last two off, widest of all straight, kept on but unable to threaten.
Broke well, taken back from wide to third last two off, mid track bid, no progress.
Settled in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, kicked away 200M to score easily.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, made steady ground 300M for 2nd.
At back, 6Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Eased to rear, 8.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, blocked 300M, progressed steadily when clear.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, held up 4-2, made ground when clear.
Pushed forward, took rail in front of midfield, 3Ls off the fast pace, no progress in straight.
Hard ridden forward to cross, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the fast sectionals, emptied 300M.
Pushed forward to obtain the box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, checked 300M then weakened.
Slow away, trapped 3 wide, hard ridden forward to share the lead at fast sectionals in 2 wide, soon emptied 250M.
Behind midfield on the fence, checked and carried back throughout, never a factor.
Pushed to take rail and shared the lead at fast sectionals, weakened 300M.
Pushed forward, took rail, checked badly at all bends whist racing tight inside runner, never travelled well, dropped off 800M.
Broke well, taken back, mid-rear two off throughout, wide bid, kept on very well to lead 75m out.
Broke well, shared lead rail, then third rail, sharp move to lead 250m out and go clear, cut down last 75m.
Taken back from wide gate, settled third last one off, hampered and forced wider, improved three off turn, wide bid, kept on well.
Fair break, aimed for front but caught three wide no cover just off lead throughout, moved up third turn, kept on gamely.
Fair break, settled back mid-rear rail, second last into straight, inside bid, some progress but never able to threaten.
Broke well, settled midfield rail, progress inside turn, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fourth one off, back to midfield turn, short of room and checked mid-straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield one off, shuffled back to fourth last turn, inside bid but never pace to challenge.
Broke well, led and crossed, tried to kick 250m out, headed, weakened.
Taken back from wide to last one off, tried to improve wide turn and straight, one pace.
Taken back from wide, settled second last rail, last into straight, mid-track bid, no progress, bled from both nostrils.
Broke well, ridden early looking for lead, had to settle for second one off, weakened steadily from just before turn.
Switched off, detached in last 8-9Ls off the pace, driven along over the bend but had plenty to do inside 300M, emerged from off the pace 100M and came with a strong run to get up last stride.
Urged early, sat one out one back, kept responding in straight, ran past long time leader near 50M and held on to the lead until last stride.
Never far off from the pace, well placed to strike turning in, ran on well and looked one of the possible winners inside 100M, narrowly beaten.
Missed the break, recovered to race towards the rear 6Ls off the pace, stayed on strongly final 200M.
Travelled strongly in a 3-wide position in midfield, driven to challenge inside 400M, closed off well.
Sped to the front and led uncontested under a steady tempo, kept on well but stride began to shorten over the final stages and lost lead near 50M.
Prominent behind leader, kept on well in straight, no clear run final 150M, would not have won but could have finished closer.
Along the fence never far off from leaders, into clear soon after straightening, stayed on one paced.
Held up near last, stayed on making steady progress final 250M but not a serious threat to leaders.
Held up in midfield, kept on same pace to the line and no impression on leaders.
3-wide without cover in the group chasing the pace, not pace to trouble leaders final 300M, crowded for room 100M, weakened.
Settled in mid-division, not quickened turning into straight, eased when no chance final stages.

Began with others, settled in forward of midfield, baulked for a run early in straight, charged home inside final 200 to snatch victories final strides.
Settled just worse than midfield, commenced move entering straight, briefly baulked over 300 M out, rattled home down the centre of the track to be nearest at finish.
Began moderately, always thereabouts, hit front under pressure inside final 200 M only to be swamped close to home.
Began moderately, soon rushed up on rails to join leaders, took slender lead rounding home bend, headed under pressure passing 200 M.
Began from a wide gate, ridden along amongst leaders early, soon settled in 5th about 2Ls off the pace, baulked for a run early in straight, made no impression once into the clear inside final 200 M.
Began with others from a wide gate, gradually taken backward to be wide in midfield, one-paced under pressure.
Always in last few, found nothing under pressure in straight. (LAME.)
Began fairly, soon ridden forward to join leaders out wide, soon weakened in straight.
Began from the widest gate, soon taken back to last few, ran home one-paced.
Slow to begin, trailed the field most of way.
Disputed lead, dropped out tamely shortly after straightening. (Blood in trachea.)
Mainly in midfield to straight, gradually weakened.
Enjoyed an uncontested lead along the fence with easy sections. Made every post a winner.
Made its run from the rear of the field, settling along the paint. Struck some traffic problems in the home straight, motored home once in the clear near the furlong.
Camped midfield, 2 wide with cover. Peeled out in the final stretch and hit the line well.
Missed the start but recovered and took up a nice position, settling in third spot. Had every chance but was under the pump after the 200m.
Travelled behind midfield the fence. Closed off soundly.
Settled in 2nd last position with cover. Came wide on the home turn but was unable accelerate and stayed on one paced in the run to the line.
Parked along the fence in 4th position. Railed up in the home straight and kept battling away whilst inclined to lay out.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race outside the leader. Had no excuses and was struggling at the furlong.
Moderate start. Settled near the fence ahead of midfield 800M. Kept giving home straight and prevailed closing stages.
Sat 2-wide behind leaders to home straight. Fought on gamely but failed to fend off winner near the post. Held 2nd by a narrow margin.
Trapped wide after start. Slotted 3-wide at midfield 900M. Improved to race behind leaders home turn. Rallied on home straight but couldn't contain front pair final stages.
Travelled wide and without cover towards rear to home straight. Made up substantial ground and was nearest at finish.
3 to 4-wide behind midfield to home straight. Finished the race off fairly well.
Away in line, ended up with last few turning in. Made up good ground thereafter.
2 to 3-wide behind midfield to home straight. Kept on steadily.

Slow to begin and was then crowded for room. Raced behind midfield 900M. One spot back turning into home. Picked up satisfactorily along rail top of home straight until no extra to offer final furlong.
Quickly into stride and parked outside leader. Hung on until overhauled final furlong.
At rear to home straight. Beat tired runners home.
Shared lead on fence until peaked 250M.
Ahead of midfield early stages. Struggled home turn. Well beaten soon after straightening.
Early pace from wide gate, settled 2 deep 3L off lead, 3rd when driven at 400m, workmanlike progress to lead 200m.
Sharp from gate, 2 deep without cover close to fore, moved 2nd at 900m, hard-ridden to lead 300m, headed 200m, kept on.
Camped mid rank 2 deep with cover, pushed along 600m, progress 4 wide off turn, 3rd at 300m, chased front pair home.
Taken back from wide, parked 2 deep behind midfield, 5L down when 6 wide into stretch, stayed on, took 4th late.
Checked at start, raced in last, 10L off lead at 800m, driven off home turn, still last at 200m, stayed on past beaten rivals.
Awkward start, raced towards rear on rail, taken 5 wide off home turn, switched inside at 200m, steady progress to wire.
Sharp from wide gate, led 1400m, under pressure 400m, headed 350m, faded out to the line.
Slow break, camped 2 deep last trio, under pressure and widest into stretch, one-paced to wire.
Settled rail, 5th when ridden to maintain position at 600m, pulled off paint into stretch, weakened thereafter.
Jumped well from widest gate, trapped wide without cover mid rank, hard-ridden 500m, to 5th at 300m, faded from 200m.
Speed to lead initially, settled to track leader on rail, 3rd and niggled at 500m, outpaced at 400m, faded out.
Raced behind midfield on rail, niggled at 600m, hard-ridden 400m, unable to quicken, never a factor.
Fair break, ridden from wide gate to second one off, led 400m out, soon in charge.
Broke well, third rail early, bumped then midfield rail, blocked for run mid-straight, switched wider 200m out, ran on strongly but winner had gone.
Broke well, fifth one off, urged turn, kept on steadily but without pace to challenge.
Broke fast, led early, settled fourth rail, kept on in straight without pace to challenge.
Broke well, ridden early but unable to reach lead, mid-rear three wide, wide bid, kept on without pace to threaten.
Broke well, up fast from wide to lead and cross, tried to kick early straight, quickly headed, no extra.
Broke well, not much early pace, second last one off, wide bid, late progress but unable to threaten.
Moderate start, crowded, fifth last rail, had to switch mid-straight, inside bid, kept on but unable to threaten.
Fair break, not much early pace, wide bid, hung in, kept on one pace when straightened.
Fair break, taken back to third last rail, mid-track bid, not too much room, modest progress.
Missed break, rear early, urged, inside bid, one pace.
Fair break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, no extra from 200m out.
Fair break, forward move early from wide gate, fourth two off no cover, three wide bid into straight, weakened.
Fair break but caught midfield three wide no cover, weakened straight.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader along the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 400M to score another goal on its favorite surface.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, suited by the fast tempo, however under huge pressure from 1000M, raced flat until 250M, made good ground for 2nd.
At back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, made early move from 600M around the field in 4 wide progressed steadily for 3rd.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 0.5L at fast sectionals, under pressure throughout, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled, ran on.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide throughout in the lead, harmed by the fast sectionals, ran on well to the line despite all negative racing situations.
Hard ridden early but not muster, took rail at rear, 7.5Ls off the leader, helped by the fast tempo, held up 400M, progressed steadily when clear.
Behind midfield, 6Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made some late ground 200M.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, however no progress.
Eased to sit just behind the leading group 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, weakened 350M.
Hard ridden to join the lead 2 wide, harmed by the fast sectionals, out of fuel 300M.
Slow away, pushed forward, 2Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, not suited by the fast pace, emptied 400M.
Box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, weakened quickly 400M.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, dropped off and tailed out 500M.

Placing: PU
Comment: Saddle shifted back shortly after the start, eased out of race.
Fair break, fifth one off, wide challenge entering straight, took control last 50 m.
Broke fast, settled half-length second one off, led mid-straight, battled well, winner too strong.
Fair break, up fast to lead and cross, headed 250m out, kept on for third.
Fair break, not rushed, settled mid-rear one off, kept on but no match for front two.
Good break, fourth one off, bid three off early straight, outpaced but kept on.
Fair break, not rushed, back to last two off, mid-track bid, late progress but not pace to challenge.
Fair break, not much early pace, midfield rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not much early pace, second last rail, urged, no impression under pressure.
Broke fast, led briefly then third rail, inside bid, every chance, gradually weakened.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, ridden turn, little response.
Fair break but caught mid-rear three off no cover, ridden before straight, no response.
Fair break, ridden early to hold position but caught three wide no cover towards rear, widest of all into straight, found nil.
Tracked leaders, niggled along halfway, made smooth headway to edge past leader nearing 100M, kept on well towards the finish to fend off challenges both sides.
Pressed leaders, took over passing 300M, kept on well under pressure, headed nearing 100M.
Travelled well behind mid-division, progressed steadily from 300M to chase leaders, nearest finish.
Held up towards the rear, pulled out to challenge nearing 400M, made steady progress from off the pace, nearest finish.
Always in touch, driven to challenge inside 300M, had every chance along the Stands' rail from 200M, kept on same pace final stages.
Began awkwardly, settled behind midfield, held up for clear running until 300M, closed off well.
Out in line, held up midfield in touch, found less than expected when the race got serious, one paced final 150M.
Settled in last about 4-5Ls off the pace, took time to muster passing 400M, stayed on well final 200M.
Emerged as leader from 800M, set good pace up front, kept on one paced when pressed inside 300M, dropped away final stages.
In midfield, struggled to keep halfway, out of contention nearing 200M.
Even break, up with the pace along Stands' rail, kept on same pace under pressure, dropped out 150M. (Blood in trachea.)
Always prominent, found little off the bridle inside 400M, weakened rapidly over final 200M.
Well away, looked for lead but caught three wide front rank no cover, surged mid-straight to lead, soon in command.
Fair break but checked, midfield two off, trailed winner into straight, kept on, second best.
Moderate start, crowded, rear group three off no cover, bid between horses, kept on very well for third.
Missed break losing length, up to midfield rail, challenged for lead mid-straight, kept on but no extra late.
Fair break, ridden early but only fourth last rail, kept on well between horses.
Broke well, ridden to lead rail, headed 300m out, no extra.
Fair break, not much early pace, third last rail, inside bid, short of room, could not be ridden out late.
Broke well, midfield rail, hampered, inside bid, steadied of heels, could not be ridden out late.
Broke well, led briefly three off, then back to fourth one off, bid between horses, one pace.
Fair break, up fast wide to share lead one off, three off turn, weakened late.
Fair break, no early pace, three lengths last hard-ridden, aimed inside, no real progress.
Broke well, up wide to third one off, cornered badly and wide home turn, weakened rapidly.
Rolled forward to sit first outside leaders girth, enjoyed run of the race 1L away, set out after leader from 400m, kept to task well to lead inside 200m and defy rivals late.
Unable to slot in from a wide alley, posted 3 wide with out cover 4Ls back in midfield, worked and carried wider to 400m, kept fighting gamely and did well to snare a place.
Began well, assumed spot on leaders back, enjoyed a fair trip 2Ls back to bend, kept chasing leader and stuck to task well for a place.
Faded back to race behind midfield, 7-8Ls back 3 wide with cover, plenty to do when still last turning, motored down middle final 400m to make frame. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back to rear, ended up 9Ls away racing two wide, swept wider approaching home bend, looked a big chance at 200m but peaked on run final 100m.
Settled in rear division 8Ls or so away in running line, fair run to bend, made modest progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Positioned just off midfield 6Ls or so away on rails, even run to bend, made steady ground between horses in straight to be not far away in finish.
Pressed on and took up running, set a decent gallop in front, kicked clear at 400m, defied them to 200m but overhauled and passed final furlong.
Slow into stride, took a midfield spot, 4Ls or so off front, no excuses in run, niggled turn and didn't find much just battling at same speed in straight.
Showed usual speed, ended up just off pace 3-4Ls back in running line, improved 3 wide rounding bend, looked a place chance at 300m but run tapered final furlong.
No early speed, settled 8-9Ls back near rear on rails, always well back and gave a big start turning, lacked usual sprint and struggled in run home.
Settled in 3 wide line with cover, 6Ls back just off midfield, fair run despite covering ground, made a brief bid at 400m but emptied at 300m.
Settled just behind midfield 6Ls or so off lead, in 2 wide line between runners but was difficult to settle on circle, produced nothing in straight.
Away well, took up ideal spot 1 out 1 back, had ok run to bend, gave ground badly final 400m.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Never far off, hit front under pressure 150 M out.
Attempted to make all, headed about 150 M out.
Drawn wide, settled in 4th not far off, unable to quicken under pressure.
Slow out, travelled in midfield, kept on same pace.
Drawn wide, taken back, trailed field to straight, ran on.
Wide throughout, midfield early, commenced run home bend, wide turn, kept on same pace.
Worked his way to 2nd outside lead first bend, weakened passing 100 M.
Always in last few until late.
Bumped at start, settled in 9th in rear of midfield, one-paced.
Hampered at start, raced keenly at times, travelled in forward of midfield, faded under pressure inside 200 M.
Worked out wide down far side to join leaders briefly 600 M out, lost ground when wide turn, folded up.
Never in the hunt.
Made its run from third last position, settling along the rail. Fought well early in the straight to secure clear running and responded strongly to clinch victory over the final stages.
Camped 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Hit the lead at the 100m but was overhauled close to the line.
Settled worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Disappointed fro running near the 150m, shifted out and got to the line well.
Settled 1 out 1 back. Enjoyed a nice run in the race and held on to finish in the frame.

Crowded at the start and settled at the tail of the field along the fence. Commenced to shift away from the rail and worked into the race after the 600m. Made nice ground out wide in the home stretch.
Worked forward to eventually sit outside the leader after the 700m. Faded over the final 100m.
Raced behind midfield, 3 deep with cover. Kept whacking away at the same aped in the straight.
Was left racing 3 wide without cover after the 700m, whilst in a midfield position. Plugged away one paced in the run to the line.
Ridden along early and box seated. Had every chance but was a beaten horse at the furlong.
Settled in a rearward position 1 off with cover. Peeled out approaching & rounding the home turn. Made no impression in the final stretch.
Raced as equal leader along the fence after the 700m. Was gassed passing the 150m.
Raced along the paint 4 back. Struggled in the run home. (Vet reported lame the right fore leg the next day.)
2-wide at midfield early. Shifted 3-wide home turn and was 3Ls down turning into home. Battled determinedly to the line to repel rivals and just got up at post.
Ridden early and raced 2-wide behind midfield to home turn. Swung out and was 4Ls away on straightening. Finished off strongly and was denied in a bobbing of heads.
Switched to race towards rear after start. Same position into final stretch. Picked up well but was fended off by top pair.
Quickly into stride. Elected to race 2-wide ahead of midfield first turn. Angled out rounding home turn. Kept on satisfactorily but lacked finishing touch of the front trio.
Urged early and raced at midfield along the fence. Shifted 2-wide home turn and was 3Ls back leaving the bend. Ran on fairly well without seriously threatening the principals.
Began well. Sat on fence ahead of midfield from first turn. Soon got clear run home straight and had every chance 200M. One-paced to conclude.
Shaken up early and led on fence passing first turn. Took seat behind leader approaching the Rock. Ideal position to strike home straight but couldn't turn up a notch.
Driven from wide gate. Eventually cut to the fence and led passing the Rock. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Hung on until no extra final 150M.
Towards rear on fence. One-spot closer top of home straight. Ridden along the rail but hung in badly. Not fully tested.
Pressed early to obtain a forward spot but was trapped wide. Parked one-off behind leader from 700M. Found nothing when asked home straight.
Always at rear. No impression.
Behind midfield early but came under pressure middle stages despite effort of rider. Well beaten before home straight. (Substantial amount of blood in horse's trachea and lame right front).
Bumped at break, dropped last trio 2 deep without cover, advanced 3 wide from 600m, handy turning in, wide run to lead close home.
Trapped 3 deep without cover midfield, niggled to close from 600m, hard-ridden 300m, led 200m, headed 50m.
Ridden from gate, settled mid rank 2 deep with cover, switched out 250m, chased winner, clinched 3rd late.
Restrained from wide gate, keen early, camped 1 off rear on rail, slipstreamed winner from 600m, strong wide run to wire.
Set tempo to 1000m, raced 2nd on paint, regained lead 300m, headed 200m, kept on.
Parked rail behind pace, driven off final turn, closed out without threatening.
Prominent early, disputed 3rd 2 deep without cover, maintained position in stretch, weakened last 100m.
Crowded at start, raced behind midfield 2 deep with cover, one-paced off turn, stayed on moderately.
Driven from wide gate, to fore 3 deep 1st turn, quickened to lead 1000m, 2L clear at 600m, headed 300m, faded out.
Raced mid rank on rail, lacked pace off turn, plugged on to line.
Settled last from wide draw, nudged along at 700m, one paced to wire.
Good break from widest gate, immediately taken behind field to rail worse than midfield, ridden off turn, unable to close out.
Broke fast, joined leaders three wide then led and crossed, strongly pressed all down, fought of rivals gamely.
Broke fast, led then second rail, strong challenge throughout straight, held.
Slow start, midfield two off, three wide into straight, strong challenge until flattened slightly late.
Sluggish start, rear rail, looked for inside run but had to pull wide, finished strongly late.
Broke well, midfield rail, inside bid, kept on well but no kick.
Moderate break, midfield one off, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Broke well from wide, but caught midfield three off, had to wait for run 200m out, then bumped, kept on quite well.
Slow start, fourth last rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Slow start, second last one off, urged, switched wide straight, modest progress.
Broke well, fourth one off, three wide bid entering straight, gradually weakened.
Broke well, up three wide to join leaders, then third one off no cover, gradually weakened straight.
Taken back from wide to fourth last one off, wide bid, no progress.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders along the rails, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M to score by narrow margin.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M for 2nd.
Took rail easily and shared lead at advantageous slow sectionals, drifted away 600M, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 250M.
Trapped 3 wide behind leaders early, shared lead in 2 wide from 1000M, benefited by the slow sectionals, drifted away 600M, flattened 100M.
Box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in final stages.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 8.5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M.
Settled in prominent spot, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, closed off well 300M, however checked badly 150M.
Eased to rear, 6.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Took rail in midfield, 5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Broke well, found rail midfield, improved turn, four wide bid, led 200m out, soon clear.
Fair break from wide, taken back to last, wide bid, finished fast.
Broke well, not much early pace, fourth last one off, ran on between horses.
Fair start then met interference and steadied off heels, second last one off, ran on, unable to threaten.
Broke fast, led rail, headed 250m out, weakened.
Bumped start, shifted out, up to fifth one off, outpaced briefly entering straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, bumped and unbalanced after 200m, improved wide to second one off, weakened from mid-straight.
Fair break, back to third last rail, one paced when asked for effort straight.
Broke fast, led briefly then third rail, inside bid, no extra from 200m out.
Broke well from wide, midfield from one off, no response when asked in straight.
Sluggish start, fifth last rail, inside bid, no progress.
Tight for room start, up to join lead one off, shifted out 600m out, weakened quickly afterwards.
Out in line, 3 wide early before angling in, given nice trip in middle stages, improved approaching bend, joined in strongly down middle and did too well for fast closing rivals.
Began well, took trail behind pace 3ls back, used nothing in run, weaved clear rounding bend and came hard to miss by a neck.
Went forward from a wide alley to sit outside leader, enjoyed an easy time in mid section, applied pressure to leader turning, kept finding but outlasted final 100m.
Slotted into prime position 1 out 1 back, had ideal run in mid section, came into in 3 wide rounding bend, stayed on at same speed to make frame.
Drifted back to sit behind midfield, 5-6ls back in running line, reasonable run to bend, worked home well down middle to be not far away in finish.
Steadied early and ended up towards rear, 8ls from top end in mid section, improved and came on between horses in straight making good ground to be nearest at finish.
Rolled forward to take up running, set terms to liking for most of race, tackled rounding bend, weakened inside 150 (tendon injury day after racing).
No early toe and ended up last on rails, always well back in middle stages 9ls from top end, came wider and closed well given decent final section.
Missed start by a few lengths, took up spot at rear best part of 10ls off lead, still well back to bend, made ok ground in what turned out to be a dash home.
Didn't have early speed, raced behind midfield on rails,7ls away on rails, saved ground on bend, kept on only fairly in straight but did run out of room late.
Faded back to midfield 4-5ls behind leaders, had a quit time in mid section, found little in run home (lame next day).
Began well, took up position on leaders back, no excuses in run, weakened tamely from bend.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
