Niggled at early, settled in rear of midfield, widest turning for home, made up good ground down the centre of the track to get up final strides.
From a wide draw, soon picked up a prominent spot behind leader, shuffled back to one-out-one-back position in 4th 1000 M out, hit front over 200 M out only to be headed close to home.
Settled one-back in 3rd on rails, baulked early in straight and hung out a difficult ride, kept on without quickening.
Settled in last few on rails, baulked for a run early in straight, produced good late impression.
Settled in last few, made short-lived effort early in straight, unable to sustain run inside final 200 M.
Began with others, settled on rails in forward of midfield, saved ground on home turn, kept on steadily.
Soon dropped to last few, ran on past well beaten horses in the run home.
Moderate start, settled just better than midfield, faded gradually under pressure.
Sluggish at start, settled in midfield, ran home one-paced.
Took up running on stables bend, led to 300 M, headed under pressure. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Soon taken back from a wide draw, never seen with a chance.
Broke well, gradually improved from 6th down far side to dispute lead, folded up quickly in straight.
Drawn poorly, behind midfield early, gradually improved out wide far side to forward of midfield, faded gradually in straight.
Raced wide throughout, towards rear early, effort far side to be 5th or 6th, dropped out upon straightening.
Camped better than midfield the paint. Raced a bit keenly through the mid section but balanced up nicely early in the straight, took control 150m out and drew away.
Began on terms, settling in 2nd position along the rails with cover. Shifted out after the 800m, and raced 1 off at the leaders girth. Kept on gamely down the running.
Settled in 3rd position 1 off with cover. Was carried out into a 3 wide line near the 700m, but managed to shift back in after the 600m and raced 2deep with cover. Stayed on well.
Parked ahead of midfield, 1 off with cover. Closed off soundly to make the frame near the line.
Worked its way to the lead and opened up a slight break after the 800m. was overhauled near the final furlong and faded over the final stages.
Made solid contact after being bumped at the start travelling with the backmakers 2-3 wide with cover. Ran on well before tiring on its effort well before the line.
Made its run from the tail of the field 2 wide with cover. Came widest in the straight and worked home satisfactorily.
Hade every chance settling 3 back the fence. Came up flat over the final furlong.
Settled worse than midfield 1 off with cover. Never made any impression in the home straight.
Settled back in the field from a wide barrier travelling 2 deep with cover. Finished off its run 100m from the post.
Settled behind midfield the fence. Struggled in the run home.
Slow to begin settling at the rear along the paint. Failed to close off.
Bumped heavily at the start then slotted in to race 1 off, midfield. Gave ground in the final stretch.
Began well but for the majority of the race travelled 3 wide without cover, midfield. Never looked likely.
Back with last few early despite effort of rider. Set a near impossible task at 300M. Sprouted wings final 200M to get up in emphatic fashion.
Always in leading section. Ridden 300M. Battled determinedly to repel all rivals but the winner final stride.
Behind midfield early. Improved gradually from midpoint. Pressed and responded well 400M to snatch a minor placing at line.
Behind leading section. Driven 450M. Kept giving to land 3rd.
Never far off the pace on stand's rail. Shaken up passing 400M. Progressed steadily to the line and nearly made frame.
Travelled well in a forward spot but couldn't find extra gear to hold off the principals when the race got serious inside 300M.
Tracked leaders to 300M and remained one-paced thereafter. Checked at 50M.
Behind midfield and made up some late ground.
Never better than midfield.
Towards rear and never really improved.
At rear and beat tired runners home.
Towards rear throughout. Never in the hunt.
Behind pace early. Struggled from midpoint. Beaten well before post.
Behind midfield. Found nothing when asked midpoint. No impression.
Speed from gate, soon led, quickened 1L clear at 250m, maintained gallop for straightforward win.
Dipped at break, ridden to take position 2 deep just behind pace, clear 3rd at 600m, progress on outer to 2nd at 220m, always held.
Broke with others, tracked leader on rail, 1/2L down in 2nd turning in, 3rd at 220m, kept on.
Dropped towards rear on rail from wide draw, 8L down and ridden 600m, 2 deep on turn, strong run to wire.
Raced midfield on paint, 5th off home turn, progress to 4th at 300m, no extra in closing stages.
Slow to muster, tracked wide midfield, awkward around turn, under whip at 450m, moderate progress in home run.
Camped mid rank on rail, 4th and under pressure turning in, weakened out of contention.
Good break, lacked pace to lie up, raced 2nd last, hard-ridden around turn, plugged on past beaten horses.
Driven from gate, always struggling to go pace behind midfield, never a factor.
Urged to early lead from wide gate, soon headed, 2 deep without cover in 2nd, faded out from 900m.
Tardy from widest draw, raced last on fence, switched centre-track 300m, found virtually nil.
Raced behind midfield on rail, pulled off heels at 600m, lost ground, driven on turn, weakened in stretch.
Fair break, midfield one off, had to wait for gap straight, came through to lead 100m out, ran on well.
Fair break, not much early pace, third last one off, wide bid, ran on strongly.
Fair break, aimed for lead but not pace to get there, second one off, led 300m out until headed inside last 100m.
Broke well, crossed to fifth one off, then wider no cover turn, ran on without being able to challenge.
Broke well, sixth rail, slightly short of room for bid between horses, kept on without being able to threaten.
Fair break but caught mid-rear three off, hung out, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Broke well, settled fourth rail, came wider for mid-track bid, up to second 250m out, no extra late.
Taken across from wide, steadied off heels and lost ground, fourth last three off, wide bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back from wide, last rail, inside bid, slightly short of room, kept on one pace.
Broke well, up wide to lead and cross, headed early straight, no extra, not driven out late.
Sluggish start, ridden early to mid-rear rail, no kick when asked.
Moderate break, not much early pace, second last one off urged, clipped heels near 500m mark and blundered, wide into straight, minimal progress.
Broke fast, led early then third rail, inside bid, short of room and switched slightly, no progress.
Slowly away, urged, mid-rear one off, no progress, weakened.
Slow away, hard ridden to hold the rail behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the slow pace and scored.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, 3Ls off the slow tempo, closed off strongly 400M for 2nd.
Took rail steadily and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on strongly until 150M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Eased to rear, 6Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 200M.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on fairly in final stages.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, blocked 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Eased at start to take rail behind the field, 6Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed fairly in straight.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, checked 800M, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Shared lead easily 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, soon out of fuel 400M.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, emptied 350M.
Eased to sit midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, soon weakened 300M.
Not suited by the slow tempo, never better than midfield.
Prominent, benefited by the slow tempo, however dropped off quickly 400M.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, never competitive and tailed out.
Broke fast, soon crossed to second one off stand rail, led 400m out, drew away easily.
Broke fast, not rushed early, third three off rail chasing eventual winner, tried to challenge 200m out, outpaced.
Missed break one length, crossed to stand rail, pulled out to mid track when blocked, finished strongly.
Not fast away, mid-rear mid-track, ridden 300m out, never pace to threaten winner.
Broke fast, shifted left, led to halfway, headed by winner 400m out, outpaced.
Fair break but short of early speed, mid-rear on outside of field, urged, kept on widest of all.
Fair break but squeezed back early, sixth three off stand rail, ridden halfway, kept on one pace.
Broke well but not pace to go with leaders, midfield mid-track, ridden halfway, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not rushed early, mid-rear wide, driven from halfway, kept on but no impression.
Fair break, tracked stands rail leaders one off, hard ridden from halfway, no extra.
Not fast away, mid-track, midfield, shaken up halfway, no progress.
Missed break, rear early mid-track, shaken up halfway, no improvement.
Fair break, not much early pace, rear group second widest, no progress.
Broke fast, shared lead stands rail, under pressure halfway, weakened quickly.
Switched off to near last 7Ls off the pace, travelled well throughout, switched widest to challenge inside 300M, ran on strongly and edged past long time leader about 30M from home.
Soon led, set even pace, kicked clear 200M, kept on well but not pace of winner final stages, headed 30M from home.
Held up in mid-division 2-wide, raced a shade keen middle stages, no clear run 350M-200M, ran on well to go 3rd near line.
Along the fence about 3Ls behind leader, made headway inside 350M, kept on steadily final 200M, lost 3rd near line.
Quickly into stride, reigned back to sit behind midfield, bid wide home turn, stayed on and looked one of the possible winners mid-straight, run ended near 100M.
Driven early, chased leaders in a 3-side position without cover, had every chance turning in but couldn't get to leaders, no threat from100M.
Taken across behind runners, settled in last 8Ls off the pace, driven passing 600M, made steady headway early straight, turned one pace final 150M.
Never far off from leaders, 3-wide for most of the trip, kept on one paced turning in and no impression on leaders.
Chased leaders, came under pressure half way round final turn, outpaced on straightening, beaten near 200M.
Began well from the inside draw, tracked leader, appeared to be travelling well but found little off the bridle, fell behind 200M.
Caught wide 1st turn, strode forward to press leader 1200M, weakened nearing 250M and dropped away quickly.
Towards the rear, didn't respond to pressure inside 350M, never threatened.
Slow to begin, soon taken to the fence and settled 5Ls back in midfield, didn't pick up in straight, no extra 200M. (Blood in trachea.)

Placing: PU
Comment: Fractious in stalls, almost dislodged rider as the start was effected, took no part in the race. (To Barrier Trial.)
Broke fast, third one off, joined leaders early straight, got upper hand last 100m, kept on well to hold late threat.
Fair break, not much early pace, midfield three wide, shuffled back to rear group turning in after steadied off heels, finished powerfully late.
Broke fast, led until inside last 100m, kept on but no extra once headed.
Fair break, not much early pace, third last rail, pocketed and long wait for gap straight, finished fast once clear.
Broke fast but not ace to lead, settled third rail, inside bid, kept on without being able to threaten.
Moderate start, midfield rail, bid one off, kept on steadily without kick,
Fast break but not pace to join leaders from out wide, steadied back to thrd last three off 600m out, widest bid, kept on one pace.
Well away but not pace to lead, fifth three wide no cover, bumped 300m out, kept on until no extra late.
Moderate break, crowded early, back to ninth one off, taken off heels, no progress thereafter.
Fair break, not much early pace, back to second last rail, wide bid, little progress, rider lost whip.
Moderate break, ridden to join leaders, green round turn, three wide no cover, weakened straigt.
Taken back from outside gate, last, inside bid, no progress.
Began nicely, took a trail on rails following tearaway leader, 6Ls back on bend, gradually improved turning, kept coming to hit lead at 200m, drew away to score comfortably.
Took a nice trial in front of midfield on rails, followed eventual winner and appreciated strong tempo, began to improve rounding bend, cam on well for 2nd.
Worked across into running line, raced 7Ls or so off leader, had cover on circle, kept battling on in straight but no dash to match winner.
Restrained to settle in midfield 8-9Ls off leader, had ideal run on rails and speed on, made gradual progress in straight to make frame.
Settled in midfield, 10Ls or so away in running line, no excuses to bend, made steady ground in straight without threatening.
Crowded early, settled back at rear on rails, more than 12Ls off top end, aided by speed, gave a big start turning and worked home evenly to be nearest on line.
No early speed, raced more than 10Ls away on rails, aided by strong tempo, made some minor progress in straight but peaked at 150m.
Bounced out and took early lead, took trail when pressured, forced to follow a strong tempo to bend, didn't come on when asked and tired late after working.
Planted 3 wide without cover in midfield, 10Ls away working with strong sections in middle stages, made a brief bid but flattened after a hard run.
Showed speed to go forward and take up running, overaced and set strong sections in front, still 5Ls clear turning, worked too hard and stopped at 200m.
Dropped into a midfield spot 8-9Ls off break away leader, fair trip in running line but did race a little ungenerously, didn't find much when asked and battled in straight.
Crowded early, faded back to race at rear, 3 wide with cover, helped by speed, well back turning and made no serious progress.
Drifted back to race at rear, at least 12Ls off pace, aided by tempo, well back turning and didn't come as expected in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
No early pace, raced behind midfield on rails, 11Ls or so off strong tempo in front, struggling turning and made no impression.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Ridden to lead early, gradually taken back to share the pace coming out of back straight, renewed effort on straightening to soon draw clear, ridden out to win unchallenged.
Drawn wide, soon taken back, waited with, finished off race well to snatch 2nd final strides.
Niggled at early, soon travelled in forward of midfield on rails, met minor interference rounding home bend, gained closer turning in, fought on steadily but swamped for 2nd inside 50 M.
Began with others, settled not too far off, gained closer to just off the pace 800 M out, baulked on rails until 300 M out, one-paced.
Settled in rear, wide turn, made modest headway past well-beaten runners closing stages.
Raced wide in midfield, kept on same pace until finding no extra closing stages. (Bled.)
Began with others from a wide draw, settled well behind, ran past well-beaten horses.
Not far off in 6th, shifted out for a run turning in, failed to quicken to challenge. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Not far off, weakened out of contention inside final 200 M.
Began moderately, headway around home bend, lost position into straight, no further impression.
Began well from a poor draw, settled not far off the speed, with leaders briefly around the bend, dropped out after straightening.
Broke well from a wide draw, soon taken back to race wide without cover in midfield, moved forward to join leaders 4-wide around the bend, soon dropped out after straightening.
Settled in rear of midfield, made no impression in straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Soon took up running, held narrow lead until headed into straight, folded up quickly.
Went straight to the front and made every post a winner on the rails. Shook off late challengers to win on debut.
Had every chance settling 3 back the fence. Couldn't pull back the leader in time and failed by a narrow margin.
Settled behind midfield, 3 wide with cover. Swung wide from the 500m and showed a nice turn of foot in the home straight.
Camped behind the speed, 3 wide with cover. Stayed on soundly to finish in the frame.
Worked forward to eventually cross and park outside the leader after the 800m. Labored over the concluding stages.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race, 1 out 1 back. Had no excuses.
Settled at the back of the field from a wide gate, 2 deep with cover. Closed off fairly.
Travelled behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Kept whacking away in the final stretch.
Jumped awkwardly resulting in rider becoming unbalanced. Was hard ridden early but was posted 3 wide without cover on the circle, travelling off the speed. Never likely.
Travelled 3 deep with cover at the rear. Plugged away in the run to the line.
Began awkwardly, settling 4 back the paint. Kept to the inside in the straight but failed to make any impression.
Raced midfield, 2 wide with cover. Proved a little difficult to settle midrace, and was found wanting in the straight.
Box seated. Stalked the leader until early in the straight, peeled out but faded near the furlong.
Rolled along the fence to occupy a spot slightly ahead of midfield to home turn. Shifted 2-wide and was 2Ls down home straight. Hit front 200M and ran away.
Driven early and sat behind pace on fence 1200M. Rallied on with winner 400M but was knocked out 200M. Kept giving to hold 2nd narrowly.
Away in line but was trapped wide. Switched to rear thereafter and improved along the fence rounding home turn. 4Ls back 400M. Made up steady ground and nearly got 2nd but was beaten far by winner.
Slow to begin. Raced one-off behind midfield to home straight. Finished off fairly well to make frame.
2-wide at midfield to home turn. Shifted 4-wide and was 5Ls away turning in. Ran on steadily and nearly made frame.
Shaken up early. Slotted 2-wide ahead of midfield 1100M. Swung 4-wide turning into home. Couldn't turn up a notch when asked.
Eased to rear from highest draw. Came wide on straightening. Covered some ground without threat.
3-wide at midfield. Never nearer.
Led on fence until overhauled 250M.
3-wide behind midfield. Beat tired runners home.
Travelled 3-wide without cover ahead of midfield to home straight. Faded 300M.
Hard ridden early and raced 2-wide behind pace. Struggled 450M and was beaten well before post.
Behind midfield early. Dropped towards rear home turn. No show home straight.
Never in the hunt. Finished tailed out. (Lame left hind).
Speed to track leader on rail, progress between horses from 400m, quickened clear above 200m, won readily.
Camped midfield on rail, checked off heels at 700m, lost momentum, followed winner's stretch run, 2nd at 100m, closed late.
Raced rear pair on rail, last at 700m, ridden for paint run off turn, short of room 200m, solid effort to line.
Fair break, rousted early, trapped 3 wide without cover close to pace, progress to brief 2nd at 200m, one-paced thereafter.
Parked towards rear, niggled 600m, 6L last 400m, stayed on nicely through horses final 250m.
Trapped 3 deep in mid rank with cover, hard-ridden 400m, one-paced down stretch.
Taken to rear from wide gate, progress around runners from 800m, widest off home turn, game but one-paced to line.
Sat 2 deep with cover worse than midfield, crowded at 350m, switched widest 300m, moderate late progress.
Driven to lead, under pressure 300m, headed 250m, weakened thereafter.
Sharp from gate, rousted early to sit 4th 2 deep with cover, found little off home turn, faded out.
Parked midfield 2 deep with cover, outpaced turning in, no extra.
Hard-ridden from gate, raced 2nd outside leader without cover, dropped away from 300m.
Niggled at behind midfield on paint, unable to quicken turning in, never a factor.
Fair break, not rushed, wide early but found slot in fourth one off, challenged three off straight, ground away to lead last 50m.
Broke well, settled fourth rail, urged turn, mid-track bid, kept on steadily under pressure.
Taken back from wide draw, second last one off, improved between horses approaching turn, wide bid, kept on well under pressure.
Fair break, ridden early to second one off, led 300m out, kept on gamely until no extra last 50m.
Fair break, steadied early but caught three wide, allowed to stride on to lead, headed early straight, battled till no extra late.
Fair break, not rushed but caught mid-rear two off no cover, mid-track bid, kept on quite well.
Broke fast, led and crossed, then back to third rail entering straight, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Moderate break, urged early to mid-rear one off, wide bid, kept on steadily.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, no room to improve entering turn, mid track bid, kept on with being able to threaten.
Fair break, not asked for speed early, steadied third last rail, inside bid, only modest improvement under pressure.
Broke well, up to fifth rail, shuffled back to seventh rail, inside bid, no progress from 200m out.
Fair break, urged but no early pace, last rail, held up for bid between horses, no significant progress.
Fair break, hampered and not much early speed, fourth last two off, ridden for wide bid entering turn, no progress.
Broke well, ridden up to fifth one off, back to midfield approaching turn, continued to lose ground steadily when asked for effort.
Pushed forward, box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, closed off strongly to win by a short head.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, made ground steadily 300M, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2Ls off the fast pace on the rails, held up 4-2, made steady ground when clear for 3rd.
Hard ridden early to keep up with the field, 7.5Ls off the leaders 3-4 wide, suited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, made good ground 350M, however run ended 100M.
Shared the lead at fast early sectionals 2 wide, flattened 300M.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide and harmed by the fast pace, ran on until 200M, out of fuel.
At back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, just ran on ok.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, however lack room most straight, made steady ground.
Hard ridden forward, just off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the fast tempo, ran on until 200M weakened.
Hard ridden early but not muster, trapped 3-4 wide in midfield, flattened in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, raced flat, weakened 200M.
Hard ridden to hold the rail and shared the lead at fast sectionals, soon weakened 300M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the fast pace on the fence, soon emptied 400M.
Broke well, mid-rear one off, six wide into straight, responded well to lead 50m out.
Broke well, settled midfield one off, shaken up for bid between horses from 250m out, kept on well but outkicked.
Well away, mid-rear rail, found gaps and driven 300m out, finished well but unable to trouble first two.
Well away, prominent, fourth three wide no cover until 800m out, wide bid, unable to quicken.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, widest of all into straight, finished well.
Fast break, third rail, short of room for inside bid, one pace under drive after minor check inside the last 100m.
Moderate start, bumped, settled mid-rear rail, every chance for mid-track bid straight, unable to threaten.
Broke well, fifth rail, aimed between horses, found nil under drive.
Quickly away, second one off, still second into straight, no extra last 100m.
Sluggish start from wide draw, ridden early, third last one off, urged turn, wide bid, very modest progress.
Fair break, midfield rail, bumped approaching turn, blocked straight and gaps did not come, never able to challenge.
Clean break, led after 300m, unchallenged until straight, driven, one pace from 200m out.
Hopped in air start, last rail, no progress when asked.
In midfield, strode forward to join leaders after being pushed wide near 1200M, kept responding on straightening, went clear with runner-up inside150M, rallied to take lead inside 100M.

Travelled 3-wide in midfield, not helped by the sedate pace and raced a shade keen down the back straight, quickened to join leaders mid straight, established narrow lead passing 150M but could not hold the winner inside 100M.
Held up towards the rear in a slowly run race, ran on final 300M to claim 3rd near line but posed little threat to the first two.
Restrained to sit one out one back, driven nearing 400M, kept on steadily to the line but not pace of first two final 150M. (Jockey reported his saddle shifted.)
Soon crossed to the fence tracking leader, found clear running on the inside and loomed a threat mid straight, turned one-pace final stages and no impression on first two.
Settled in last about 5Ls off the pace in a slowly run race, switched widest nearing 400M to commence his run, closed off strongly.

Positioned in midfield one off the fence, well covered but over -raced when the pace of the race slowed from 1200M, found less than expected when asked inside 400M, never looked like getting to the leaders.
Average start, crossed to the lead 1200M then set a slow tempo, headed near 200M, weakened final stages.
Towards the rear, not helped by the slow pace and raced keenly in the first half of the race, not quickened under pressure, one paced final 300M.
Held up behind midfield, driven near 400M but no progress, lost touch mid straight.
Poor break, hopped, recovered quickly to fifth two off without cover much of the way, driven from 500m out, fought hard to get up close home.
Well away, fourth one off, responded strongly when asked to challenge between horses three off, just failed.
Quickly away, taken back to midfield rail, short of room straight until 100m out, finished strongly.
Fair break, ridden hard to dispute lead, sat one off in second, inside bid, all out from 400m out, fought on well.
Awkward jump, recovered quickly, mid-rear one off, blocked early straight, free 250m out, ran on well.
Broke well, taken back to second last rail, short of room straight, came free 200m out, finished well but unable to threaten.
Poor break, third last two off, shaken up 300m out, ran on well mid-track under drive.
Sluggish start, mid-rear rail, inside bid but caught behind wall of horses, free late and finished well.
Away well, midfield three wide but with cover, shaken up from 350m out, kept on one pace.
Fast break, led after 400m, unchallenged until straight, shaken up 300m out, one pace once headed.
Clean break, lacked early speed, rear two off with cover, widest of all into straight, driven but minimal progress.
Fast break, third rail, responded to pressure until no extra last 100m.
Broke well, midfield one off, pulling early, found little straight.
Slowly away, third last four wide no cover most of trip, no threat straight.
Fair getaway, ended up in midfield 5Ls off leader, began to improve wider turning, had to knuckle to task chasing down leader and dug deep final furlong to score.
Plenty of early speed, kicked through to hold lead, rolled along at sectionals to suit, crept away with a 3L lead turning in, kept kicking and just denied final strides.
Taken back from an outside draw, 9-10Ls or so away in running line, aided by tempo, came widest into straight and made good progress for place.
Positioned behind midfield, 8Ls or so away in running line, a bit keen as usual, tracked eventual winner turning, made some decent progress in straight to make frame.
Began with purpose, unable to take usual role in front, raced 1-2Ls back outside leader, fair run to bend, stayed on at one speed in straight.
Out in line, drifted back to race 3 wide behind midfield 5-6Ls off speed, had no cover on circle, kept on evenly in straight despite hard run.
No early pace, dropped back to race with last few, 9Ls or so back on rails, produced usual close but struck traffic at 200m, wouldn't have been too much closer.
Moderately away, raced just off midfield 7Ls or so away on rails, quiet time to bend, made some minor progress without threatening in straight.
Began well, slotted into box seat 2Ls off lead, improved 3 wide rounding bending, challenged at top of straight but soon under pressure and faded.
Jumped with rest, enjoyed ideal run 6Ls back on rails, angled off rails on bend, came to outside but failed to run on as usual in straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Away nicely, ended up with ideal trail 3Ls away on leaders back, close enough on bend, gradually weakened out in straight without much fight.
Tardy into stride, mustered to be best part of 12Ls back at rear, gave a big start turning, didn't make much ground.
Crowded early, settled at tails 12Ls off lead, a bit difficult to settle, still at tail turning, no real progress.
Away well, crossed to sit just off pace, 3Ls or so back in running line, fair run to bend, didn't find when pressured and weakened tamely.
Eased back from a wide alley to race 3ide with cover 6-7Ls back, improved with trail on bend, let down strongly final 300m and went away late for a tidy win.
Began in line, took up a midfield position 7-8Ls back, had nice trip in middle stages, switched out and kept chasing in straight but found winner a bit too strong.
Caught 3 wide without cover from a tricky alley, gradually crept closer on circle to be 1l down turning, kept on bravely in straight but lacked extra fight to go with first two.
Went forward to take ideal spot 1 out 1 back, went to rails soon after, all favours in run, produced even effort to keep coming along inside in straight to make frame.
Slow into stride, shared rear nearly 10ls back in running line, set plenty to do turning, closed best of rest making some good ground to be nearest on line.
Positive from outset, first outside leader, took 1 out 1 back trail on circle, came wide turning but lacked dash and just kept on same pace.
Fair to begin, positioned in midfield 5Ls back on rails, easy time to bend, didn't find much when clear and plodded late. (Jockey reported didn't stretch out.)
No early pace, raced 7-8Ls away on rails, not made use of in middle stages, plenty to do turning, battled away at same pace in straight.
Caught 3 wide without cover from wide alley and forced to press on early, did work to be outside leader on bend, ridden along turning and dropped off after a hard run.
Drifted back from an awkward alley, raced 3 wide behind midfield, best part of 8-9Ls off top end, still plenty to do turning, no real finish and only beat tired ones.
Slotted into a rearward trailing position, ended up 10Ls off leaders on rails, always well back, never likely.
Went forward as usual and took up 1 out 1 back slot once they settled down, all favours in run, found little at business end and was disappointing weakening out.
Settled behind pace 3 wide with cover, 3-4Ls back in run, ridden along turning in, didn't go on with it final 300m and dropped out.
Showed early speed and held lead, set average speed in front, worried by outside horse on bend, gave in without much fight.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Settled wide behind midfield early, improved gradually to midfield by home bend, obtained clear passage over 300 M out, ran on to grab victory near the line.
Began with others, ridden to lead attempting to make all, caught close home.
Began well, settled in 4th or 5th within 3Ls of speed, fought on steadily without threatening.
Soon dropped to last few, baulked before finishing off race well inside final 200 M.
Raced wide with cover in midfield, made moderate headway in straight without threatening.
Raced wide just worse than midfield, ran on steadily down centre of straight to be nearest at finish.
Broke well with others, settled in one-out-one-back position, came forward to dispute lead entering straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M.
Not far off, came forward to challenge entering straight, kept on when swamped inside final 200 M. (Tactic questioned.)
Began moderately, soon picked up to a prominent spot, kept on until swamped inside final 100 M.
Never sighted until late progress inside final 200 M.
Slow away, never better than midfield.
Given reminders early, travelled just better than midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, kept on before fading inside final 100 M. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Soon taken well back from the widest gate, trailed the field before effort on outside around the bend, made no further impression in straight.
Never on terms.
Began awkwardly then was shuffled back after the 900m, settling behind midfield, close to 1 off with cover. Let down nicely in the straight to take control over the concluding stages.
Stalked the leaders, 2 wide with cover. Took the lead after the 100m but was overhauled late.
Copped a check near the 900m, settling 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Ranged up and looked likely after hitting the front near the 150m, but finished its run passing the 100m.
Slow to begin settling with the backmakers along the paint. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and closed off well to make the frame.
Made the running early along the rails, then travelled as joint leader after the 800m. Maintained a sound gallop right to the wire.
Crossed from the outside alley to race 1 off and dueled for the lead passing the 800m. Kept up a sound gallop down the running.

Settled behind midfield 2-3 wide with cover. Got some crowding near the 700m and didn't enjoy the best of runs in transit. Made nice ground once into clear & comfortable racing room in the home straight.
Copped a check near the 850m, never recovered coursing 3-4 wide & without cover behind the speed thereafter. Battled away over the final stages.
Settled at the rear, 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Had to be severely checked on the first turn and was a spent force fro the remainder of the event, travelling 4 wide and at times without cover on the circle.
Never got into the race after being severely checked near the 800m. raced 3 wide with cover on the circle but was never in the hunt.
Settled midfield after being tightened for room near the 800m, racing 3 wide with some cover on the circle. Made no impression.
Settled at the tail of the field, 2 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Tracked the leader along the paint. Had every chance but faded after the 300m.
Occupied the fence in a forward spot. Ridden 250M and hung on well to score victory.
Began with others and raced 2-wide behind midfield. Made up good ground to the line but was kept being pushed wider by the 2nd placegetter. (Declared 2nd by the Stewards.)
Soon in leading section. Kept hanging out from 800M. Closed off satisfactorily despite drifting out to hold 2nd at finish. (Declared 3rd by the Stewards.)
Towards rear on fence to home straight. Improved steadily to make frame.
Taken towards rear from high draw. Finished off the race fairly well.
Raced 2-wide at midfield. Got closer rounding home turn. Plugged on home.
Away in line and was eased to rear from wide barrier. Made up decent ground late.
Hard ridden early but was trapped wide and without cover behind pace. Failed to sustain home straight.
Last out. Driven along the fence and settled ahead of midfield from 1000M. Couldn't turn up a notch home straight.
Raced 3-wide at midfield to home straight. Never picked up.
Raced 4-wide behind midfield to home straight. Beaten well before post.
Camped behind midfield on rail, steadied off heels 1400m and moved 2 deep with cover, 6Ls back and 5 wide off turn, relentless run to snatch lead late.
Good pace at break, slotted on fence towards fore, progress 2 deep around final turn, wound up to lead at 250m, headed 50m out.
Sharp break, tracked in midfield, checked off heels 1400m, near rear and pushed along 1100m, rail run checked at 300m, switched out, to 3rd 100m, strong run to wire.
Detached last from wide draw, 12Ls off lead when starting move at 600m, cocked head left throughout stretch run, hit traffic 250m, closed out well.
Settled mid rank on rail, 6Ls back when forward move from 600m, every chance when brief 3rd at 300m, faded late.
Slow start, raced 2nd last on paint, ridden briefly 800m, switched out, last when forced widest off home turn, bumped twice in stretch, closed out soundly.
Slow break and crowded start, 3 deep and checked 1400m, last at 400m, wide into straight, twice rolled into rival in one-paced run to line.
Slotted midfield 2 deep with cover from wide alley, 6th and ridden into stretch, one-paced.
Slow break, took a hold trapped 3 deep without cover midfield, wide into stretch, wandered under pressure, found little.
Rolled forward from wide gate to press lead early, settled 2nd on rail, niggled at 450m and soon lost place, plugged on one pace.
Quick to stride, enjoyed easy lead, 3Ls clear at 600m, ridden 400m, tiring when headed 250m, weakened out.
Crowded start, 2 deep with cover towards rear, checked sharply off heels and bumped rival 1400m, never a factor.
Awkward break, trapped 3 deep without cover close to pace, dropped back from 800m, struggled in run home.
Awkward from gate, recovered to race 2 deep in 4th, 3 wide and hard ridden off home turn, faded right out.
Broke well, third one off, came off cover top of straight shaken up from 300m out, led from 250m, easily.
Fair break, four wide no cover early, then back to last rail until straight, widest of all, strong run to reach second 150m out, winner too good.
Broke fast, sixth one off, headway three wide approaching turn, mid-track bid, ran on well.
Broke well, sixth rail, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Hesitant start, hung, three wide no cover early, settled second last one off, out for wide bid, ran on steadily.
Slowly away, checked, mid-rear rail, shaken up from 500m out, kept on one pace between horses.
Fair break, disputed early lead, then second one off , shaken up early straight, one pace.
Fair break, ridden hard to lead and eventually cross, steadied until asked to kick early straight, no extra last 200m.
Broke fast, ridden to join leaders but caught three wide no cover, wide bid, limited progress, weakened.
Moderate break, not much early pace, mid-rear one off, slightly short of room but found little straight.
Fair break, taken back, fourth last rail, shaken up from 600m out, kept on until weakened quickly 200m out.
Fair jump, ridden for speed, fourth rail, inside bid, beaten 300m out.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 400M to score.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Settled in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, held up 4-2, progressed steadily when clear for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the fast sectionals, ran on well until 200M flattened.
Slow away, failed to muster, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, helped by the fast tempo, made ground 300M.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the fast pace on the fence, ran on ok.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader along the rails, suited by the fast pace, made steady ground 300M.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, ran on fairly in straight.
Slow away, behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, no progress.
Never competitive at rear.
Hard ridden to cross in front and led by 1L at fast sectionals, emptied 400M.
Pushed forward, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast pace, checked 400M, weakened.
Hard ridden forward, sat just off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast tempo, dropped off quickly 400M.
Broke well, third rail, bid between runners, quickened to lead 100m out, soon in charge.
Fair jump, ridden for speed, led rail, uncontested until straight, kept on well, no match for winner's kick.
Jumped slowly, third last one off, headway three wide no cover, wide bid, finished well.
Slowly away, mid-rear one off, wide bid, finished well under pressure.
Broke well, in touch fourth one off, effort 300m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, inside bid, ran on well late.
Clean break, fifth rail, bid between horses 250m out, one pace.
Jumped well, shuffled back to midfield one off, bid four wide straight, one pace, no threat.
Fast break, second one off, shaken up 300m out, kept on one pace.
Missed beat start, last rail, widest of all into straight, kept on well.
Moderate break, third last rail, out for mid-track bid between horses, no impression.
Broke well, second last one off, second widest into straight, minimal progress.
Broke slowly, mid-rear one off, checked off heels 1000m out, mid-track bid, no progress.
Quickest of all from the gate, backed off from early pace, caught three wide no cover in sixth, shaken up 400m out, soon beaten.
Settled in midfield 3-wide, travelled strongly, picked up effortlessly and cruised past leader near 200M, drew clear beating a high class field with total authority.
Caught wide no cover early then strode forward to race outside leader, took over nearing 400M but couldn't match winner's acceleration mid straight, kept on well enough to hold 2nd.
Dropped back to the rear 6-7Ls off the steady pace, saved ground on the inside, last into straight and pulled widest to challenge, stayed on strongly from the rear.
Held up in last 7Ls behind leader, turned 3-wide from 600M and crept closer to pace, ran on well final 400M.
Broke well, soon crossed to the fence, had cover behind leader from 1200M, kept on steadily final 400M but not pace to challenge first two, lost 2 places near finish.
Travelled well in a rearward spot, found clear passage inside 300M, stayed on without reaching leaders but nevertheless a good effort considering the depth of the opponents.
Tracked leaders 3-wide under restraint, left with no cover from 1200M, driven along passing 500M, kept on one paced.
Up with early pace, became difficult to settle after being crossed 1400M, 3Ls back in midfield turning for home, held up behind horses to 250M but didn't find much when clear.
Not far off from the pace, well covered, travelled smoothly but found disappointingly little off the bridle, faded inside 100M.
Towards the rear and was 4-wide without cover for most of the trip, didn't show his usual turn of foot when put to pressure passing 400M. Ran well below par.
Settled in midfield, kept on same pace final 400M, no impression on leaders. (Blood in trachea.)
Reserved in a rearward position, not quickened passing 400M, never a factor.
Driven forward, led steadily, faded nearing 300M, soundly beaten.
Slow to muster, raced behind midfield along the inside, not quickened passing 400M, soon left behind.
Broke well, not rushed, fifth rail smoothly, came off rail for bid between horses, held up in traffic, burst through to lead last 50m.
Broke well, found slot midfield one off, short of room and bumped early straight, ran on strongly, just outkicked.
Broke well, third one off until went on approaching turn, kicked away early straight, headed last 100m.
Fair break, not rushed, held up second last one off, out for wide bid, ran on well until no kick last 50m.
Broke well, taken back from wide to mid-rear two off, urged before straight, kept on, not pace to threaten.
Fair break, taken back to rear rail, out for wide bid entering straight, kept on without pace to threaten.
Broke well, led early, then third rail, challenged one off early straight, not get past leader, weakened.
Fair break, back to rear rail, made ground quickly straight until blocked 200m out, finished fast once free.
Knuckled start, not rushed, mid-rear one off, bid between horses, not much room but never pace to threaten.
Fair break but caught three wide mid-rear, short of room and blocked when looking for mid-track gaps, unable to improve.
Broke fast, led early then fourth one off, pulling, joined lead 300m out, no extra once headed.
Good break but caught three wide no cover, up to share lead mid-straight, no extra late.
Hesitant start, checked and crowded, quickly recovered to mid-rear rail, inside bid, weakened.
Broke well, ridden up to second one off, third into straight, weakened quickly.
Out in line, drifted back to race in midfield 4Ls back on rails, had a quite time to bend, gained a split at 250m and darted through, held off fast finishing rivals late.
Lacked early pace as usual, raced 5Ls or so away behind midfield, saved ground on rails, made progress between horses in straight and produced a strong finish but unable to peg back margin late.
Drifted back from a tricky draw to race at rear 8ls away, checked at 850m, kept to rails and saved ground turning, made many lengths in straight to take 3rd.
No early pace, settled 6Ls or so back on rails, hung badly at 850m, came to outside in straight and made good ground in straight to nearly snatch place. Good debut.
Displayed plenty of early speed, used a bit in bid for lead, raced outside leader applying pressure throughout, run ended at 200m when workload took toll.
Pushed on in search of a close up spot, raced 3 wide with cover on speed and did work in mid section, 1-2Ls down turning, stuck on well given run to 200m, just dropped off thereafter.
Showed enough speed to hold a spot on leaders back, fair trip with even speed on, didn't quicken but kept on evenly holding ground in the straight.
Had plenty of early pace to drive through and lead, set an even speed with attention from outside horses, held a 1L margin turning, headed at 250m and couldn't find extra thereafter.
Standard break, raced just off midfield 5-6Ls back in running line, not asked to bend, made a brief dash but failed to close off final furlong.
Took up ideal spot 1 out 1 back just off pace, difficult to settle in mid section, made a brief effort 3 wide turning in, lacked turn of foot final 300m. (See Racing Incidents.)
Amongst first away, taken back from a wide alley, raced 3 wide at rear 8Ls or so away, forced wider at first turn, made some ground wide on bend, no extra final 300m.
Out with rest, posted 3 wide in midfield, had cover in middle stages, struggling turning and faded out of it tamely.
Taken back from a wide gate, received a bad check at 850m when racing 3 wide at rear, still well back to bend, made no real impression.

Settled in midfield, fought on nicely to gain upper hand final strides.
Settled in last few, raced wide into straight, finished off race well.
Settled mainly in 5th just better than midfield, commenced move home bend, held some chance 200 M out, unable to sustain effort closing stages.
Began fairly, gradually came across to settle in one-out-one-back position, fought on doggedly until swamped close to home.
Began with others, settled towards the rear, finished off race nicely.
Raced wide in midfield, ran home steadily without threatening.
Well back, ran on well, did best work late.
Shared pace early, settled one back in 3rd on rails, kept on but swamped inside final 50 M.
Soon took up running, led until weakened under pressure inside final 200 M.
Settled in midfield on rails, baulked for a run until 200 M, made no further impression closing stages.
Raced wide and prominent without cover, dropped out into straight.
Never a danger.
Settled in a handy position along the paint. Challenged for the lead near the furlong and drew clear soon after to claim the prize.
Had to be steadied when tightened for room near the 600m, travelling 3 back, 1 off with cover. Ran on nicely.
Took up leading duties after the 800m along the fence. Maintained a sound gallop down the running.
Made its run from a rearward position, settling along the rails. Closed off nicely to make the frame.
Tracked the leaders after the 700m, settling 2 wide with cover. Plugged away over the last 200m.
Did some work early to eventually cross near the 700m and race outside the leader. Began to tire over the last furlong.
Began awkwardly settling on the speed, 3 wide without cover on the circle. Faded early in the final stretch.
Ridden along early settling ahead of midfield 3 wide with cover. Whacked away at the same speed in the straight.
Slow to begin travelling towards the rear, 3 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Settled with the backmakers, 2 wide with cover. Never a factor.
Checked at the start then became detached and was reluctant to stretch out thereafter. Struggled in the home straight. (To trial.)
Couldn't match the early speed from its outside gate and travelled behind the leaders, but was posted 4 deep without cover. Never likely.
Niggled early and parked one-off behind pace from first turn. Fought on well with leader home straight and took charge closing stages.
Led on fence from first turn. Overhauled by winner inside final furlong. Beat the rest by a fair margin.
'One-out-one-back' to home straight. Kept on steadily for 3rd but no hope with front pair.
Taken to rear from high draw. Made run outside 450M. Covered good ground to make frame near the post.
2-wide behind midfield to home straight. Plugged on to the line.
At rear to final stretch. Beat tired runners home.
Travelled wide and without cover at midfield. Faded 300M.
Behind midfield on fence to home straight. No improvement thereafter.
Box-seated until dropped out 400M. (Bled).
Pace to sit on rail behind leader in 3rd, switched 3 wide off turn, unbalanced as struck lead 300m, all out final 200m, held on.
Sharp break from wide alley, crossed to lead on rail, briefly headed 800m, led into stretch, headed at 300m, rallied, just failed.
Camped better than midfield on rail, ridden into final turn, steadied 400m, crowded stretch, chased gamely to wire.
Dropped in from wide gate, 2 deep with cover mid rank, 3 wide and 4Ls down into stretch, closed out strongly.
Quick break, unable to slot in, dropped to 3rd last 2 deep with cover, travelling but short of room on turn, 6L down 400m, rattled home centre track.
Taken behind field from widest draw, settled 2nd last on rail, honest progress on inner down final straight.
Slow break, soon advanced to behind midfield on rail, 4Ls back at 400m, switched out and ridden 300m, kept on soundly.
Trapped 3 deep without cover mid rank, lost ground 3 wide on turn, stayed on one pace.
Broke well, keen hold and restrained, settled 2 deep without cover fore of midfield, laboured in stretch.
Smart start, taken to last from wide alley, detached and ridden from 800m, 3Ls adrift of field at 400m, modest late progress.
Rolled forward to press leader on outside, led briefly 800m, 1L 2nd turning for home, faded out.
Crowded start, forced to race 3 deep worse than midfield, weakened into straight, found nothing.
Broke well, up wide without rush to second one off, led narrowly 300m out, kept on very gamely, just held on.
Missed break slightly, urged to midfield one off, fifth into straight, mid-track bid, strong challenge, just held.
Broke well, settled midfield rail, bid one off, looked dangerous 150m out, not quicken late.
Fair break, not rushed, found rail mid-rear, bid between horses but cramped for room, kept on well once clear late.
Fair break, up to third rail, inside bid and clear run through, almost joined leaders 150m out, no late kick.
Taken back from wide draw, third last one off, wide bid, some progress, not pace to threaten.
Crowded start, ridden hard to lead and cross but never uncontested, headed early straight, bumped and weakened late.
Steadied start, taken back to second last rail, mid-track bid, no kick when asked.
Steadied start, held up rear, urged turn, widest bid, little progress.
Fair break, fifth one off, mid-track bid, weakened.
Fair break, ridden for lead but caught midfield three wide whole trip, ridden before straight, weakened.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 2Ls off the fast pace 2-3 wide, closed off strongly to score.
Shared lead along the fence at fast sectionals, overhauled 300M, stayed on well for 2nd.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the fast tempo 2 wide, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders, benefited by the fast tempo and the rail run, made steady ground 300M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, helped by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, made steady ground in straight, lack room 100M.
Eased at start to take rail behind the field, 6.5Ls off the leaders, benefited by the fast pace, made ground 150M.
Hard ridden early but never muster, more than 8Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, made late ground 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, stayed 4 wide throughout and lost significant amount of ground, no progress.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders, suited by the fast tempo but trapped 3 wide, flattened 200M.
Hard ridden forward, just off the leaders, harmed by the fast pace, trapped 4 wide throughout and lost significant amount of ground, emptied in straight.
Shared lead easily 2 wide at fast sectionals, raced keenly and hung out badly around the bend, weakened in straight.
Fair break, ridden early to fourth rail, inside bid, gap came, kept on strongly to lead last 50m.
Broke well, ridden early but not pace to lead, sixth one off, mid-track bid, finished strongly, just too late.
Broke fast, led and crossed, clear entering straight, worn down last 50m, no extra late.
Fair break, mid-rear two off, crowded 600m out, bid between horses, gaps came late, finished fast.
Broke well, second rail, tried to challenge early straight, kept on one pace.
Missed beat start, ridden to mid-rear rail, inside bid, kept on well without pace to threaten.
Broke fast, ridden for lead but not pace to get there, third one off, kept on one pace.
Fast break, midfield rail, tried to improve one off entering straight, one pace.
Fair break, not rushed early, mid-rear three off, wide bid, modest progress.
Moderate break, second last one off, aimed wide, no kick.
Moderate break, caught wide early mid-rear, up to sixth three off, wide bid, one pace.
Missed break slightly, ridden but no early pace, soon four lengths last, shaken up but never able to improve, lost plate.
In mid-division, switched away from the fence 600M, picked up gradually and into top gear passing 200M, finished off strongly to get up near line.
Reserved in a rail position near the rear, made smooth headway from 400M, hit lead near 100M, caught late.
Switched off to the rear, driven 350M, had to peel out for a clear run in straight, finished off well to go 3rd near the finish.
Held up towards the rail of the field 6-7Ls off the pace, 3-wide for most of the way, pulled widest to challenge inside 400M, stayed on well.
Dropped in behind midfield, shuffled back to near last halfway, stayed on under pressure final 350M.

Led to near 1200 then sat back behind leaders, very keen under restraint in middle stages, found less than expected when off the bridle inside 400M, ran on one-paced. (Jockey voiced concern about his horse's action.)
Went forward, vied for lead on the outside passing 1200M, kicked away entering home straight, headed 150M, no extra final stages.
Chased leaders along the fence, appeared to travel well, briefly threatened early straight, one-paced final 200M.
Not far off from the pace in the first half, tight for room 600M and lost position, didn't respond to urging after and was beaten near 300M. Disappointing.
Settled 2-wide in mid-division, pushed along nearing 400M but not quickened, never a factor.
Made some use early to cross to the lead, shared lead on the inside from 1200M, outpaced turning for home, dropped out quickly.
Raced 3-wide behind midfield early stages, left with no cover from 1200M, strode forward to near pace passing 800M, folded quickly on straightening, soon behind.

Tracked leader on rails, soon came to take charge turning in, drew clear under pressure shortly after straightening.
Began in midfield, became 5th but not much closer to the pace approaching home bend, effort 3-wide around the bend, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began with others, settled one-back in 3rd just off the rails, shifted out for a run turning in, fought on under pressure without quickening.
Soon taken back, waited with, saved ground on rails rounding home bend, made moderate headway from midfield into straight.
Settled in midfield on rails, shifted out for a run entering straight, kept on well at the same pace without threatening.
Began with others, raced wide with cover in midfield, ran home one-paced.
Began with others, gradually settled towards the rear, ran home steadily without quickening.
Always in last few, one-paced under pressure.
Began with others, settled just off the pace in 4th on rails but without cover far side, remained similar but gained cover around the bend, weakened under pressure.
Began from a wide gate, soon settled at the back, remained a back-marker thereafter. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Began with others from the widest gate, raced wide in midfield far side, towards rear into straight, hung in and made no impression. (Mucus.) (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Began moderately, soon ridden to gain narrow lead racing outside 2nd to straight, soon dropped out.
Went forward and led after the 900m, along the rail from the outside gate. Dictated terms thereafter and repelled late challenge to make every post a winner.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race in second position 1 off no cover. Loomed near the furlong but couldn't find any extra, kept on gamely.
Parked behind midfield the fence. Worked home soundly.
Settled midfield, 2 deep with cover. Kept on well in the final stretch to stay in the frame.
Made its run from third last position, settling 3 deep with cover. Closed off fairly.
Camped midfield, 2 wide with cover. Battled away one paced in the run to the line.
Tracked the speed settling along the paint. Faded passing the furlong after having every possible chance.
Settled 1 out 1 back after the 900m. Ranged up at the 200m and looked some chance before ending its run 100m out.
Settled back in the field, 2 wide with cover. Passed a few tiring runners late.
Travelled in last position along the fence. Whacked away at the same speed in the home stretch.
Posted 3 wide without cover on the circle behind midfield. Struggled in the straight.
Midfield to home straight. Rallied on and dominated closing stages.
In rear section. Swung out on home straight. Finished off strongly to snatch 2nd but no real threat to winner.
At rear. Took inside run home turn. Dashed well through runners home straight. Steadied 100M. Kept on when clear for 3rd.
Travelled wide and without cover behind pace to home straight. Every chance but no extra to threaten the front trio final 150M.
Towards rear to home straight. Got traffic thereafter. Ran on fairly well when clear.
Led on fence until peaked final furlong.
Box-seated to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch when asked.
Never better than midfield early and middle stages. Found nothing when asked home straight.
Behind midfield early. Some improvement home turn. Couldn't sustain home straight.
Behind pace until faded 300M.
Taken forward from widest gate, raced close 2nd 2 deep without cover, led just after 400m, gamely repelled challenge.
Rolled forward from wide gate, slotted 2 deep with cover 4th 2Ls off lead, strong traveller into stretch, closed on bridle to leader's flanks 350m, hard-ridden 200m, unable to pass.
Good break, settled 5th on paint, tight for room on turn, closed out readily on inner under strong drive.
Raced midfield 2 deep with cover 4Ls off pace, shaken up 400m, all out to briefly take 3rd at 200m, run tapered in final 100m.
Bumped at start, trapped 3 deep no cover in midfield from wide alley, 4 wide into stretch, ridden 400m, kept on soundly without threatening.
Crowded start, dropped 1 from rear on rail, switched 3 deep for progress from 800m, 5L back when 5 wide off turn, solid run to wire.
Lacked pace at break, 3 deep with cover worse than mid rank, edged wider for clear run at 400m, steady progress to line.
Raced in mid pack 2 deep with cover, threw head up when close to heels at 600m, one paced in home straight.
Slow break and crowded, taken forward on paint to sit midfield, switched off rail at 350m, plugged on at same speed.
Early speed to lead, soon taken to rail, a touch keen in front, headed just after 400m, no response, faded thereafter.
Bumped at start, raced eagerly near rear 2 deep with cover, checked off heels 1000m and 900m, on heels again 500m, wide off turn, crowded 400m, one paced.
Rousted from gate to race 3rd on paint, hard ridden off turn, fading 7th when squeezed up at 200m, no extra.
Slow from gate and bumped, raced in last trio on rail, off heels 600m, last entering home straight, struggled in run home.
Last to break, raced detached at rear, progress on outer from 600m, widest off home turn, found nothing in stretch.
Jumped well, ridden to lead rail, kicked early straight, soon clear, easily.
Knuckled start but soon recovered to midfield one off, bid between horses, ran on but never able to threaten winner.
Broke well, not much early pace, midfield rail, held up briefly in traffic, out for mid-track bid, kept on without threatening.
Jumped well, up fast to share lead, then second one off, challenged winner early straight but soon outpaced, no more to give late.
Fair break, not rushed early, settled mid-rear one off, wide bid, kept on quite well.
Moderate break, no early speed, last early, then up on inside to mid=rear rail, bid between runners, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not much early pace, mid-rear three wide no cover, slightly short of room early straight, wide bid, limited progress.
Broke well, up from wide gate to fourth three off, ridden early straight, no impression.
Fair break, ridden early but lacked speed, mid-rear three off, urged, very modest progress.
Fair break, caught five wide no cover, no route to rail, wide throughout, kept on one pace.
Fair break, ridden to join leaders three wide, unde pressure early straight, weakened.
Fair break, fifth rail, inside bid following winner, outpaced, weakened.
Taken back to rear, out for wide bid straight, no progress.
Slow start, crowded, urged but lacked pace, last rail, no progress, tailed off.
Hard ridden to hold box seat, led 350M, well cleared 200M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made steady ground 300M for 2nd.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, lack room 400M, ran on well for 3rd.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made some ground 250M.
Took rail easily and led by 1L at good sectionals, soon weakened 300M.
Very slow away, 7Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, ran on ok.
At rear, 7.5Ls behind the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide, ran on ok.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, ran on well until 200M flattened.
At back, 6.5Ls off the good pace along the fence, no turn of foot in final stages.
Hard ridden forward, 1L off the good pace 2 wide, emptied 300M.
Prominent, 2Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide no cover, out of fuel after straightening.
Midfield, 5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, emptied in straight.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, weakened 300M.
Broke well, third three wide, bid three off rail, led 150m out, soon clear, stride shortened, just held on under pressure.
Broke smartly, bumped, fourth, then sixth one off, bid between horses following winner through, finished strongly, just failed.
Fair break, not much early speed, three wide no cover, mid-track bid, kept on well.
Moderate break, fourth last rail, inside bid, not much room, kept on well.
Broke awkwardly, recovered to lead early, then second one off, under pressure throughout straight, kept on until no extra late.
Fair break, taken back from wide to mid-rear one off, bid between horses, kept on quite well without being able to threaten.
Taken back from wide to third last rail, inside bid, not much room, kept on one pace.
Taken back to rear, last into straight, wide bid, modest progress, lame next day.
Missed break, bumped, improved quickly to fourth rail, shaken up before straight, no more to give from 200m out.
Broke well, not rushed, mid-rear three wide, wide bid, kept on one pace.
Broke slowly, ridden along rail to lead, still in front mid-straight, weakened quickly when headed.
Broke well but no early pace, midfield one off not settling, urged before turn, found nil.
Travelled in midfield 3-wide, quickened up nicely passing 400M, sprinted clear nearing 150M and kept on well to the line.
Held up in midfield, well covered, driven 400M but lacked winner's acceleration, did best work final 200M, nearest line.
Crossed to a rail position and settled behind midfield, made steady progress final 300M, stuck on well without ever looking like getting level with the winner.
Driven forward, soon out in front setting a good pace, responded well when pressed early straight, headed inside 200M, faded into 4th 50M from home.
Towards the rear 4Ls off the good pace, shifted into clear 350M, stayed on but not getting to leaders. (Lame next day.)
Always close to the pace, ran on one-paced under pressure 400M, faded out of contention inside 100M.
Dropped back to last and was always along the fence, made limited progress from off the pace, no impression on leaders.
Up with early pace, steadied near 850M and shuffled back to a midfield position, kept on same pace in straight, weakened nearing 100M.
Settled 2-wide in the group chasing leader, got into a challenging position entering home straight but not quickened when asked, weakened nearing 100M. (Lame next day.)
Held up in last pair, switched widest entering home straight, made only little progress.
Settled 3-wide behind midfield, found little off the bridle 400M, outpaced mid-straight.
Always prominent, 3-wide outside leader making the turn, dropped away 300M, soon lost touch with the field.
Broke fast, disputed lead, settled second one off, challenged two off, led 200m out, just held on.
Slow break, one off mid-rear, widest of all into straight, gained strongly last 200m, just failed.
Broke sideways, bumped hard, recovered to fifth rail, inside bid, finished well under driving.
Broke well, settled fourth one off, every chance straight, kept on without kick.
Fair break, bumped and checked, briefly lost action, recovered to midfield one off, mid-track bid, kept on quite well under strong handling.

Quickly away, hard ridden for early speed, not pace to lead, settled third rail five lengths behind leader, always looking for room when field bunched straight, not quite pace to take gaps, kept on steadily.
Sluggish start, mid-rear rail, looking for run early straight, blocked until switched wide last 100m, powerful late finish.
Fair break, ridden hard for early speed, sixth one off, bid six wide into straight, modest progress.
Broke well, midfield rail, bid five wide into straight, kept on without being to threaten.
Missed break, last rail, inside bid, driven but only modest progress.
Fast away, disputed early lead, then led rail, breather until straight, tried to kick but one pace, faded late, substantial blood in trachea.
Broke in air, mid-rear one off, came wide straight, soon beaten.
Pressed forward to race outside leader, had a fair trip with even speed on, eyeballed leader on bend, took over turning and fought bravely in straight to score narrowly in finish.
No early pace, raced behind midfield 3 and 4 wide, 6Ls away in mid section, switched widest in straight and made many lengths down middle to just miss out.
Positioned in midfield racing 2 and 3 wide, 4Ls off lead, improved position approaching bend, made bid at 300m and kept on well for 3rd. Decent debut.
Tardy into stride, drifted back to race 3 wide at tail, 7Ls or so from top end , made run 4-5 wide turning and made significant progress to make frame.
Pressed on and slotted in to midfield role, 4Ls back in two wide line. Even run to bend, kept on steadily without quickening to finish not far away.
Drifted back from widest gate, best part of 7Ls back at tail, still plenty to do turning, made some decent ground in straight to be nearest at finish.
Took up ideal position 1 out 1 back, had nice trip with even speed on, looked a place chance turning but peaked at 200m and just battled late.
Drifted back from a tricky alley, raced 6Ls away on rails near to last, always well back, held up turning but made good progress between horses when clear to be nearest on line.
Standard break, settled behind midfield, 6Ls away in two wide line, used nothing to bend, ran on modestly without threatening in straight.
Awkwardly away, assumed a midfield role, 5Ls back in two wide line, fair run to bend, didn't respond when asked and was one paced in stretch.
Out fairly, raced in midfield on rails 4Ls off lead, every hope in run, only battled at business end.
Began ok, assumed nice position on the leaders' back, no excuse with steady workload to bend, soon under pressure and weakened tamely in the straight.
Pressed on to lead, set an even speed in front, worried by outside horse on circle, headed turning and faded out final 300m.
Out with them, posted 4 wide from an outside gate, unable to slot in and worked very hard in mid section, dropped out in straight after hard run.
