Began with others, ridden to gradually pick up one-back position on rails, soon came to challenge upon straightening and assert authority over 200 M out.
Jumped moderately, settled just better than midfield, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began with others, settled mainly 3-wide in 1L 3rd to straight, fought on steadily without quickening.
Ridden along to lead out wide after beginning from a poor gate, led to 200 M, faded under pressure.
Began moderately, settled in last few, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Slowly away, soon picked up to better than midfield position, shuffled to rear of midfield on rails at Rock, saved ground turning for home, kept on before fading inside final 200 M.
Began with others, never far off until 200 M, no extra closing stages.
Settled towards the rear, similar into straight, one-paced.
Began moderately, remained well back, steadied for a stride coming out of back straight, saved ground on inside turning for home, plodded on.
Soon tailed-off, never in contention.
Began well from the widest draw, gradually taken back to be wide without cover in midfield, widest runner turning in, made no impression in the run home.
Failed to muster early under urge, reached 2L 5th briefly 800 M out before shuffling back to rear of midfield around the bend, made on impression in the run home.
Parked 3 back the fence with cover. Shifted away from the rail rounding the home turn, then switched in near the 250 to find clear running. Stayed on gamely.
Taken back from the outside alley and settled 2 deep with cover in last position. Angled out wide early in the straight and hit the line with plenty of purpose.
Settled behind midfield, 3 wide with cover. Was under pressure after the 500m, responded gamely and finished off soundly.
Rated in a handy position, 2 deep with cover. Peeled out turning for home but was overhauled inside the last 50m.
Travelled third from the rear along the fence. Railed up in the final stretch and got all the favours after the 300m but ended its run well short of the line.
Slow to begin settling 3 wide with cover, midfield. Ridden along after the 500m, and worked home steadily without threatening.
Led along the paint. Faded over the last 100m.
Raced prominently, 1 off with out cover. Was crossed after the 700m, had a nice trail thereafter but failed to capitalize.
Good position early, settling midfield, 2 deep with cover. Was under pressure after the 700m, and never looked likely, weakening over the last 100m.
Posted 3 wide without cover after the 1200m. Worked forward to eventually cross and race outside the lead passing the 700m. Was a spent force near the furlong.
Settled at the back of the field, along the fence with cover. Kept to the inside in the straight but failed to close off.
Tracked the leader along the paint. Struggled in the run home. (Bled.)
Parked 3 back the fence. Got a nice rail run in the straight and motored home nicely.
Went forward and eventually crossed and lead along the fence after the 700m. Drew a margin early in the straight and stayed on soundly.
Made his run from second last position after settling along the fence. Got a nice run along the inside in the straight and closed off well.
Camped back in the field from a wide barrier settling 4th from the rear, 3 wide with cover. Swung the home turn wide and hit the line with plenty of purpose.
Posted 3 deep without cover for most of the trip behind the speed. Stuck to task gamely despite the wide run.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race 1 out 1 back. Stayed on at the same speed in the run to the line.
Coursed wide early to eventually sit outside the leader after the 700m. Battled away over the final furlong.
Settled at the tail of the field, 2 wide with cover. Made some ground without threatening through the field in the final stretch.
Went back from a wide gate and travelled towards the rear 1-2 wide from the paint. Worked home one paced out wide.
Not the best to begin but hade every possible chance after tracking the leader along the fence. Faded over the final stages.
Slow to begin, settling behind midfield the fence. Over the final 100m was not able to obtain clear running and was unable to be fully tested.
Struck some tightening on the first turn and settled midfield, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the straight.
Dropped last from widest gate, detached and niggled 600m, 6L down 400m, widest into stretch, strong run to win final stride.
Good break, enjoyed easy lead, quickened away rounding home turn, 2 L clear 200m, faltered final 50m, headed on line.
Settled 2 deep towards rear, hard-ridden 400m, quickened between horses 250m, surging run to wire, just failed.
Camped 2 deep with cover behind midfield, niggled 500m, wide into stretch, tapped for toe 300m, closed out readily last 150m.
Fair break, held up final trio, raced tight to rail, nudged along 700m, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Vied for early lead, shuffled to mid rank 2 deep with cover, advanced 4 wide round home turn, 2nd at 300m, emptied out from 150m.
Ridden to dispute lead from wide alley, tugged back 1050m, raced close up 2 deep without cover, driven 400m, found little in stretch, faded out.
Tracked leader on paint, under pressure 400m, one-paced run to line.
Slow break, taken to rail midfield, driven strongly 600m, 4L 6th at 400m, soon folded out of contention.
Urged on from wide alley, trapped 3 deep without cover, advanced to 2nd at 800m, soon under pressure, weakened right out in stretch.
Fair break, midfield three wide early, the fourth one off, urged before straight, bid between horses, kept on well under strong diving to lead last 50m.
Broke well, fourth then fifth rail, inside bid, kept on well without late kick.
Broke fast, led and crossed but always pestered in lead, dueled until went on entering straight, kept on until headed 50m out.
Taken back from wide draw, last rail, inside bid, not perfectly clear run, kept on steadily.
Fair break, midfield one off, slightly wide turn, mid-track bid, kept on steadily.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear two off, checked off heels, mid-track bid, kept on under drive.
Broke well, but three wide no cover early, up for long duel with leader from halfway, tried to hang turn, steadied late and weakened.
Taken back to third last one off, wide bid, modest progress.
Broke well, shared early lead then third rail, shaken up entering straight, mid-track bid, weakened.
Slowly away, mid-rear rail, inside bid, no progress.
Attempt to take back failed when refused to settle, caught mid-rear wide no cover, weakened straight.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M to score.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 400M for 2nd.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leaders on the rails, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight, just got 3rd.
Settled in midfield along the fence, 5Ls off the leaders, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 250M, run ended 100M.
At rear, 6.5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, made its move 600M around the field 4-5 wide, little dash 200M.
Slow away, pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, ran on well until 200M weakened.
Hard ridden forward, shared lead 2-3 wide and clocked slow sectionals, flattened 200M.
Eased to rear and took rail, 7.5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, just ran on ok.
Hard ridden to hold the fence and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, emptied 300M.
In front of midfield, trapped 3-4 wide throughout and lost significant amount of ground, weakened 200M.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the slow tempo, dropped off quickly 500M.
Fair break, up to second one off, led 200m out, kept on strongly.
Moderate break, settled mid-rear rail, out for mid-track bid, finished strongly, just too late.
Broke well, led uncontested, headed 200m out, kept on.
Broke well, midfield one off, out for wide bid, kept on steadily.
Taken back from wide to mid-rear one off, urged for wide bid, late progress.
Taken back from wide draw, last rail, widest of all straight, late progress under pressure.
Fair break, not rushed early, fifth one off, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Fair break, up to join leaders but caught three wide no cover throughout, kept on mid-track until no extra late.
Broke well, not rushed early, settled midfield rail, urged entering straight, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Broke well, third rail, inside bid, every chance, no extra from mid-straight.
Slow start, second last rail, bumped entering straight and unbalanced, inside bid, steadied when ran out of racing room, no progress.
Very awkward start, third last rail and into straight, mid-track bid, no progress.
In mid-division, emerged with a strong challenge 200M out, in top gear final 100M to get the better of the persistent 2nd and 3rd near line.
Travelled well behind midfield, ran on strongly 350M, dueled with winner from 200M, narrowly beaten.
Chased the pace, responded well as they straightened up and wore down the long-time leader near 50M, headed by first two near line.
Positively ridden, vied for lead on the outside, led mid-straight, one paced final 100M and was caught by first 3 inside 50M.
Towards the tail of the field, was stuck behind horses until 200M but stayed on well once in the clear.
Awkwardly away and lost ground, was forced to settle in the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, made some progress final 350M but was left with too much to do.
Vied for the lead on the inside, lost lead 150M, weakened final stages.
Well placed along the inside just behind leaders, had every chance turning in but lacked finishing pace.
From draw 12 crossed to a 2-wide position in midfield, could not quicken with the leaders inside 350M, kept on same pace final stages.
Always behind a midfield position on the inside, taken out to centre of track passing 400M, steadied mid-straight but was never going the pace to challenge.
Slow to begin, held up 3-wide behind midfield, failed to find a turn of foot when put to pressure nearing 400M.
Dropped back to the rear, inclined to hang out from 600M and never threatened at the back.

Began well, raced outside leader before taken back to 2L 3rd approaching home bend, quickened well to hit the front inside final 200 M.
Began fairly, ridden to take up running 200 M after start, held about 1L advantage most of way, came under pressure to hold place upon straightening only to be caught over 100 M out.
Began moderately, settled in midfield on rails, obtained a clear passage over 200 M out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Always prominent, 2Ls back on rails rounding home bend, soon came to challenge upon straightening, kept on steadily without quickening.
Slow out, travelled towards the rear, saved ground on rails turning in, held up for a run until late, finished off race well.
Began with others, settled wide behind midfield, effort around field home bend, fought on steadily under pressure down centre of straight to be nearest at finish.
Jumped moderately, raced wide behind midfield, similar entering straight, never nearer. (Tactic questioned.)
Soon taken back from the widest gate, remained well behind to straight, switched out for a run 200 M out, made some late impression.
Niggled along to gain prominent position early, steadied to midfield approaching home bend, slightly worse and wider turning in, did not find much room in straight and not properly tested.
Always well behind, saved ground turning in, held up for a run until the 200 M, made no impression closing stages.
Began fairly, niggled along to settle better than midfield on rails in 3L 6th, similar turning in, ran home one-paced.
Began moderately, soon ridden to a prominent 2-back position but without cover, took closer order around the bend, faded out of contention in straight.
Broke well, soon restrained for cover in a prominent position, over 3Ls back in 5th or 6th around the bend, gradually weakened out of contention after straightening.

Placing: FE
Comment: Travelled just worse than midfield, tightened on straightening and fell.
Showed superior gate speed and led along the fence. Made every post a winner and recorded a solid win.
Badly checked at the start settling a long last. Soon made ground along the inside travelling worse than midfield the fence. Motored to the finishing line.
Settled with the backmakers, 2 deep with cover. Swung widest on the home turn and closed off nicely.
Slow to begin settling midfield the fence. Showed plenty of effort early in the straight before peaking on its run well before the line.
Stalked the leader along the paint. Peeled out rounding the home turn but failed to click into a higher gear and weakened inside the 200m.
Settled midfield, 2 wide with cover. Battled away in the straight. (Bled).
Speared forward and travelled outside the leader. Was a spent force after the furlong.
Settled in last position along the paint. Battled away passing tiring runners in the run home.
Settled behind the speed 1 off with cover. Had every chance but was a beaten horse early in the straight.
Became unbalanced at the start, then couldn't match the early speed and was taken back to a rearward position, 2 deep with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Settled back in the field, 3 wide with cover on the circle. Never looked likely and struggled in the final stretch.
Travelled midfield, 2 wide with cover. Coursed 3 wide without cover after the 700m and in the straight tailed out. (To Trial.)
Enjoyed the run of the race in third position, close to the running rail. Peeled out 3 wide rounding the home turn and lengthened nicely in the run home.

Raced 3 wide without cover early but managed to slot in to travel 1 off with cover on the circle. Got a nice trail through early in the straight, shifted out after the 300m and got to the line soundly.
Camped in 5th position along the fence. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and hit the line well.
Had the run of the race tracking the leader. Hit the front near the 300m but was overhauled near the furlong, stayed on to finish in the frame.
Settled in last position along the fence. Came 7 wide midway down the straight, but finished off dourly.
Dictated terms, leading along the paint. Had no excuses and was well beaten at the 200m.
Settled second from the rear, 2 deep with cover. Rounded the home turn widest but failed to let down, weakening over the concluding stages.
Covered up 1L behind pace setter, switched out 400m, challenged leader, bumped twice soon after, led 200m, quickened clear.
Bumped start, lost ground, raced midfield, ridden 800m, ran green, consistent progress under firm drive to go 2nd at 50m.
Speed to lead from gate, ridden 350m, shifted into rival and unbalanced, contact again 250m, headed 200m, weakened close home.
Fair break, crowded 900m, lost position, 5L 10th at 800m, driven 400m, strong run through closing 100m.
Broke well, raced stands' side close up 4th, shaken up to dispute lead 300m, one-paced in final 200m.
Raced 7th far-side without cover, bustled 450m, unbalanced 300m, battled on same pace.
Sharp break, sat close 2nd, under firm drive 250m, found little for pressure, faded final 150m.
Jumped left and bumped at break, outpaced near rear on outer no cover, 6L back and niggled 800m, urged to close 500m, sound progress to wire.
Shifted left start and collided rival, covered up midfield 3L back, taken to rail 400m, weakened out.
Bumped start, lost ground, raced towards rear, driven 600m, modest progress far side, no extra in final 200m.
Fair break, soon niggled behind midfield, under pressure 400m, never a factor.
Outpaced and pushed along from gate, found nothing under firm drive, always in last trio.
Lacked speed from outset, soon in rear, detached last at 400m, drifted left under pressure, well beaten.
Bumped at break, pace to race prominent 3rd, ridden 500m, emptied rapidly.
Fair break, midfield rail, inside bid, led narrowly 100m out, sustained battle with second, had head down on line.
Fair break, fourth rail, out for three wide bid, led 300m out, joined by winner, just failed, substantial blood in trachea.
Broke well, sixth one off, mid-track bid, kept on steadily without kick.
Broke well, led and crossed, headed 350m out, kept on quite gamely.
Taken back from wide, bumped, tenth one off, bid between horses straight, up to fifth 200m out, no further progress.
Broke well, up to second rail, inside bid, slightly short of room, kept on one pace.
Moderate break, not much early speed, settled midfield rail, shuffled back approaching straight, checked off heels, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, bumped, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Broke well, second one off, challenged leader early straight, not get past, already weakening when badly checked.
Fair break, not rushed, fourth last one off, out for wide bid entering straight, some progress until weakened late.
Fair break, not rushed from wide gate, third last rail, bid between horses, checked, no extra late.
Missed break two lengths, last early and until entering straight, inside bid, modest progress.
Taken back from wide draw, second last one off, wide bid, no progress.
Hampered start, mid-rear one off, aimed for mid-track bid, found nil.
Hard ridden to hold the rail and shared the lead at fast sectionals, hung on strongly to win.
Eased back, 9Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Pressed forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, not suited by the fast pace, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, suited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M.
Midfield, settled nicely along the fence, 4.5Ls off the leaders, benefited by the fast pace, however just held ground in straight.
Box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, ran on until 150M flattened.
Pushed to shared the lead 2 wide at fast sectionals, ran on until 150M weakened.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, more than 10Ls off the leaders, favoured by the fast tempo, made steady ground 300M, held up 100M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders on the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, no progress.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, trapped 3 wide throughout, never a factor.
Suited by the fast pace, never better than midfield.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, never stopped riding along to keep up, harmed by the fast pace, emptied 400M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4.5Ls off the fast pace 2-3 wide, weakened in straight.
Trapped 3-4 wide throughout in midfield and lost significant amount of ground, dropped off 400M.
Broke well, third one off stands rail, then second, asked 400m out, led 200m out, in charge last 100m.
Jumped fast, led stands rail, joined 400m out, battled well until winner took charge last 100m.
Broke well, fifth then fourth mid-track going well, ridden halfway, kept on but unable to trouble leading pair.
Broke well, tracked leaders stands rail, held up briefly when looking for inside run, kept on well.
Fair break, midfield stands rail, angled out for run but never able to threaten leaders.
Fair break, up very fast to fourth, four off stands rail, third 300m out keeping on until weakened late.
Fair break, not much early speed, mid-rear four off stands rail, mid-track bid, finished quite well without being able to threaten.
Fair break, not much early pace, rear of stands rail group, urged before halfway, bid four off, little impression.
Fair break, not rushed early, followed mid-track leaders easing towards stands rail, midfield halfway, urged, one pace.
Fair break, not rushed early, mid-track mid-rear, ridden from halfway, produced little.
Fair break, raced mid-track, ridden from halfway, one pace.
Fair break, raced widest of all, ridden, no progress.
Fair break, held up last for run, wide bid, driven, never a threat.
Fair break, soon up to share lead four off stands rail, ridden and lost ground from halfway.
Travelled well in a midfield position 4Ls back, well placed to strike turning in, responded well under vigorous handling, edged past 2nd and 3rd near 50M.
Took early lead, tracked leader making the turn, ran on under hands and heels riding, not pace of winner final 100M. (Jockey lost use of whip in the straight.)
Driven forward from widest draw, crossed to lead before home turn and set a steady pace, responded well to urging in straight and was only headed 50M from home.
Not far off leaders, 3Ls back in 6th, hampered near 900M, kept on steadily under urging final 300M.
Chased leader, driven along nearing 400M, kept on well early straight and loomed a threat 250M, outpaced final 100M.
Dropped in behind midfield, well off the pace in the 1st half but moved closer over the turn, stayed on fairly making little impression on leaders.
Checked at the start, restrained to near last about 8Ls behind leader, had plenty to do passing 400M, made limited progress only.
Slightly outpaced in the first half, driven along to hold his position at the rear, had almost 10Ls to make up turning in, made limited progress.
Dropped back after the start, hampered near 900M and over 10Ls off the pace making the turn, made limited progress final 350M, never threatened.
In touch, hung out making the turn and shifted out to 3-wide, found disappointingly little in straight, weakened 300M.
Slow to begin, settled towards the rear 8Ls off the pace, found nothing under pressure, soon behind.

Placing: DNF
Comment: Up with early pace, faltered passing 1000M and pulled up abruptly.
Broke well, up from wide to second, then led and crossed, dictated pace, battled on strongly when challenged, in charge last 100m.
Taken back from wide draw, third last one off, mid-track bid, strong run to get up late for second.
Broke well, fourth one off, mid-track bid, kept on but unable to threaten winner.
Broke well, fourth one off, mid-track bid, up to second 200m out, no extra late.
Broke fast, led early then settled third rail, stuck to rail for inside bid, slightly short of room, kept on without being able to threaten.
Broke well, third one off, urged along to second 100m out, tried to challenge early straight, beaten off, weakened.
Fair break, midfield one off, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Broke sluggishly, ridden to mid-rear rail, inside bid, driven, one pace.
Moderate start, not much early pace, third last rail, slight check off heels entering turn, out for bid between horses, found little.
Moderate break, back to last one off, wide bid, little progress.
Sluggish start, midfield three wide, mid-track bid, weakened from 200m out.
Taken back from wide gate, second last rail, inside bid, no impression.
Moderate break, mid-rear caught three and four wide, wide bid, weakened.
Taken back as usual from a wide alley, raced at rear 8Ls back 2 and 3 wide, began to improve approaching bend, reeled off a strong finish down middle to secure victory final 100m.
Drifted back from a wide gate, raced at rear 8-9LS back on rails, always well back and had job to do turning, switched wider and closed hard down middle to take 2nd.
Raced 3 wide in midfield 4-5Ls back, had cover in middle stages, in mix from 400m, kept on well but lacked dash of first two final 200m.
Angled down to fence, raced 7-8Ls away on rails, well back turning and checked by fallen horse, got going and made good ground final 250m to make frame.
Showed some early speed, went forward to take closer order but trapped 3 wide without cover, did work in mid section, loomed up and to hit lead at 200m but tired late after hard run.
Tardy into stride, mustered to race in midfield 5-6Ls back in running line, no excuses to bend, made some steady ground to be nearest on line.
Average jump, settled behind midfield, 6-7Ls back in running line, not asked in mid section, switched out and finished evenly to make some progress without looking a winning chance.
Even break, assumed a midfield role 4Ls off lead, decent trip to bend, checked by fallen horse turning in, stayed on well given circumstances.
Drifted back from a tricky alley, raced 3 wide with cover behind midfield, 6-7Ls back to bend, made run widest in straight and made some gradual progress without threatening.
Even getaway, gradually faded back, 5-6Ls back on rails, saved ground on bend, checked by fallen horse when improving turning in, not much progress thereafter.
Began smartly and went forward to race first without cover outside leader, fair run to bend, horse behind clipped heels at 400m, hung and weakened in straight.
Showed enough early speed to take a sit behind pace 4Ls back on rails, had an easy time throughout, kept to inside and mildly inconvenienced by fall, didn't see out trip final 300m.
Plenty of natural speed early, held lead comfortably, rolled along at even section to bend, soon under pressure and dropped out.

Placing: FE
Comment: Raced behind the leader, clipped heels and fell turning at 400m.

Began with others niggling along but soon dropped to last few, remained in rear into straight, obtained a run inside 300 M, fought on under pressure to just get up on line.
Well back, ridden from home bend, saved a lot of ground on rails turning in, sustained progress down inside of straight to be nearest at finish.
Ridden along for pace early, gradually settled in 4th some 2Ls off the speed, ran on to hit front momentarily over 100 M out only to be caught in the shadows of the post.
Began awkwardly, soon dropped behind midfield, took closer order on rails around home bend, baulked before shifting in for a run inside 200 M, fought on steadily without threatening.
Jumped in air losing ground, trailed the field to straight, baulked for a run early on, finished off race nicely.
Close up early, gradually dropped to midfield, went wide turning in, fought on steadily under pressure.
Settled in worse than midfield, produced good late progress closing stages.
Began well, settled just off the pace in 2nd off the rails, kept on until swamped quickly inside final 100 M.
Settled just better than midfield, moved closer up 3-wide around the bend, swung much wider turning in, ran home one-paced.
Began moderately, soon driven to lead, held running to just inside 200 M, folded up quickly.
Began with others from a wide gate, settled wide without cover in better than midfield far side, gave ground from the 600 M.
Well there on rails, folded up quickly inside final 150 M. (Bled.)
Rated 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Shifted out about 6 wide on straightening and finished off strongly.
Sent forward and travelled outside the leader. Kicked clear and was well in front at the furlong but was mowed down over the final 50m.
Parked behind midfield the fence. Commenced to shift off the rail after the 500m, swung wide on the home turn and closed off well.
Had every chance after box seating. Very one paced in the straight and managed to hold on in the final stages to finish in the frame.
Camped 3 back the fence. Looked for runs away from the rail after the 500m, came 5 deep on the home turn and worked home soundly.
Posted 3 wide without cover whilst travelling on the speed. Kept on fairly but was never likely.
Took up leading duties and strolled along evenly on the fence. Was a beaten horse early in the final stretch.
Raced with the backmakers along the fence. Only plodded to the finishing line.
Travelled 1 out 1 back but raced very keenly in the early and middle stages and was gassed in the straight.
Settled worse than midfield 1 off with cover. Made no impression in the home straight.
Crowded at the start settling towards the rear, 2 deep with cover. Peeled out approaching the home turn but failed to close off.
Settled in last position along the paint. Struggled in the final stretch.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race box seating. Peeled off the fence on straightening and got to the line strongly.
Sent forward and eventually crossed & raced outside the leader after the 800m. Swung wide on the home turn & fought hard in the straight but laid in over the concluding stages & just failed.
Went back from an outside alley settling behind midfield, 3 wide with cover. Swooped late after navigating clear running in the home straight.
Led along the paint. Skipped a couple of lengths clear early in the straight and was only caught over the final stages.
Camped midfield, 2 deep with cover. Finished off soundly.
Parked 1 out 1 back. Wanted to hang in the straight & shifted ground near the furlong when closing off fairly.
Posted 3 wide without cover, in a midfield position. Kept up a sound gallop despite the wide run.
Jumped well and settled just behind midfield the fence. Didn't show any turn off foot in the straight and went to the line one paced.
Taken back from a wide barrier and settled back in the field on the rails. Stayed to the inside in the straight and finished off evenly.
Not the best away then was shuffled back to settle with the backmakers, 2 wide with cover. Made up some ground in the straight but never really got into the race.
Had a nice run in the race travelling 3 back the paint. Only plodded to the line.
Raced in last position 3 wide with cover. Moved onto the rail after the 500m, continued to stay at the rear despite being hustled along and struggled in the final stretch.
Dropped in at break, covered up 1 off in 2nd last, ridden 400m, widest into stretch, relentless deep closer centre track, led final strides.
Good break, settled 2 deep 4L 5th with cover, progress 3 wide on home turn, upside leader 300m, led 150m, headed close home.
Trapped 3 deep no cover until 800m, slotted 1 off 6L back, progress 4 deep on turn, mid track stretch run, to 2nd 100m, closed out soundly.
Tardy start, raced 3 deep towards rear, steadied off heels 800m, driven wide final turn, held head on side in home run, checked at 100m, kept on.
Disputed lead at break, settled 2L 4th 2 deep with cover, rapid advance 3 wide from 500m, led 400m, headed 200m, one-paced thereafter.
Niggled throughout to hold midfield rail berth, 3L down hard-ridden into stretch, switched out 300m, battled on same pace.
Crowded start, slotted on paint behind mid rank, moderate progress rounding home turn, maintained run without threatening.
Locked on paint last trio, 6L back turning in, switched 5 wide in stretch, closed out soundly.
Pace from gate, tracked leader on rail, moved 2 deep on home turn, 1L 3rd 300m, weakened in run to line.
Driven at break from inside draw, soon detached last, 9L off lead at 400m, plugged on in straight.
Unable to slot in from widest draw, 2 deep no cover in 2nd, failed to quicken at 450m, faded rapidly.
Awkward break, led at first turn, keen in front, headed 400m, emptied out in stretch and eased when well beaten final 100m.
Fair break, not rushed, fourth last one off, improved to midfield approaching turn, wide bid, fast finish, led last 50m.
Fair break, midfield one off, shaken up turning into straight, driven to join leader 100m out, immediately outpaced by winner.
Broke well, fourth one off, three wide bid to lead 200m out, kept on but outpaced late.
Fair break, up to third three off, then one off, led early straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, led early, headed after 200m, settled second rail, bid one off, kept on one pace.
Taken back from wide gate, second last one off, improved three wide approaching turn, widest bid, kept on one pace.
Slightly sluggish start, mid-rear rail over-racing, inside bid, hampered, kept on one pace.
Broke well, fourth rail, checked off heels when pace slowed, midfield rail into straight, one pace.
Taken back to last rail, shaken up for bid between horses entering straight, modest progress.
Fair break, worked to lead and cross, led into straight, headed 200m out, weakened.
Fair break, mid-rear taking time to settle, clipped heels, bid between horses, no progress.
Fair break, ridden early to hold place, third last rail, inside bid, no progress.
Pressed forward to hold the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly to score.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader along the fence, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace, got 2nd.
Parked outside the leader, enjoyed by the slow sectionals, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on until 150M flattened.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, demonstrated good finishing efforts 200M.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, just ran on fairly.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, checked 300M, no turn of foot.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on ok.
Eased at start to take rail and rear, 6.5Ls off the leader, checked 600M, not suited by the slow pace, dashed fairly.
Broke well, fifth rail, inside bid, gap came, worked through to get up last 50m.
Fair break, midfield rail, bid between horses, joined lead 100m out, just outstayed.
Slight stumble on breaking, quickly up to third one off, bumped, kept on steadily to lead briefly 100m out, outpaced late.
Broke well, led early, headed first turn, then second rail, led again early straight, outstayed.
Broke smartly, steadied to settle midfield rail, out for bid between horses, no way through and switched in, one pace.
Taken back but still four wide first turn and thereafter, improved approaching straight, wide bid, kept on one pace.
Broke fast, ridden to lead and cross, headed early straight, gradually weakened.
Fair break, but caught three wide no cover throughout, up to second entering straight, weakened.
Taken back from wide draw, last two off, improved turn, wide bid, modest progress.
Fair break, crowded early, fourth last one off, out for wide bid, no progress.
Taken back to second last rail, asked to improve between horses early straight, no progress.
Fair break, steadied to third last one off, then last rail, ridden before turn, no improvement.
Slow to begin, settled behind midfield and travelled smoothly along the inside, made good headway from 300M before moving to the lead near 150M, drew well clear. Impressive debut.
Up with early pace then sat back in midfield middle stages, pressed on 500M, kept on nicely to go 2nd 100M out but no chance with the winner.
Always prominent, led from 1300M to 1000M then tracked leader to straight, stayed on well enough, faded late but managed to hang on for 3rd.
Went forward from wide barrier, settled in 3rd entering back straight, kept on steadily without troubling the winner.
Positioned 2-wide behind midfield, had an uninterrupted run in straight but never going the pace to seriously challenge.
Dropped back to the rear as expected, over 10Ls off the pace in middle stages, 3-wide turning for home, stayed on fairly down the outside.
Towards the rear along the fence, 6Ls to make up on leader passing 400M, found less than expected under pressure, never a serious threat.
In mid-pack, pushed to a 3-wide spot without cover from 1000M, did not pick up to any great degree under pressure passing 400M.
Caught 3-wide to 1200M then strode forward to establish s 3Ls lead down the back straight, collared by pursuers inside 200M, no extra.
In midfield, raced a shade keen passing 1000M, didn't respond under pressure 400M out, dropped away 200M.
Raced 3-wide towards the rear, ridden nearing 300M but never got competitive.
Settled near last, didn't pick on straightening, never a factor.

Settled well behind and waited with, ran on inside final 300 M to gain upper hand final strides.
Began with others, settled in rear of midfield, ran on steadily down straight to hit front over 150 M out only to be caught close home.
Began well, raced in 3rd becoming 5th approaching home bend and about 3Ls off the pace most of way to straight, fought on steadily but not able to peg back first 2.
Began with others, gradually settled in forward of midfield, took closer order coming out of far side, gained slender advantage upon straightening, swamped inside final 100 M.
Soon settled in last few, saved ground on rails turning in, snuck up down inside of straight to be nearest at finish.
Began awkwardly, settled on rails just better than midfield in 5th and 4Ls back to halfway, took close order around the bend, badly baulked for a run on heels of leaders in straight.
Settled worse than midfield, commenced move entering straight, fought on steadily, never nearer.
Always towards the rear, failed to quicken under pressure in straight.
Began fairly, chased leader to straight, looked to hold some chance upon straightening but unable to sustain effort over 100 M out.
In last few early improving to midfield before home bend, similar turning in, faded out of contention over 200 M out.
Began with others, soon strode forward to take up running, headed into straight and soon overhauled.
Camped midfield 3 wide with cover. Closed off strongly to grab victory late.
Parked 1 out 1 back. Peeled out early in the straight and ran on well.
Went forward and led along the fence. Maintained a good gallop down the running only tiring in the final stages.
Settled at the rear, 2-3 wide with cover. Cornered the home turn widest and finished strongly down the outside.
Settled towards the back of the field, 3 wide with cover. Was carried 4 wide without cover after the 900m. Kept on gamely despite the wide run.
Settled at the tail of the field along the paint. Peeled out 5 deep early in the straight and closed off evenly.
Travelled midfield, 2 wide with cover. Had some minor traffic problems early after turning for home, finished off one paced.
Posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip while tracking the speed. Never likely.
Settled 4 back the paint. Kept to the inside in the final stretch but only plodded to the line.
Settled 2-3 wide with cover, behind midfield. Shifted out near the 900m to track the leader but failed to close off.
Raced 3 back the fence. Failed to make any impression in the run home.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Travelled outside the leader. Was a beaten horse 150m from home. (Pulled up lame.)
Stalked the leader on the rails. Was under pressure from the 600m and failed to respond weakening noticeably in the straight.
Rated 3 back the fence, had cover. Closed off strongly to snatch victory close to home.
Took up front running duties along the rail. Kicked clear and was a couple of lengths in front near the furlong but was caught close to home.
Enjoyed the run of the race 1 out 1 back, fought gamely right to the wire.
Camped midfield, 2 wide with cover. Ran on well to finish in the frame.
Parked behind midfield the fence. Closed off nicely through the field in the straight.
Got a bump at the start then was taken back and settled with the backmakers, 1 off with cover. Shifted out into clear running after the 400m and finished off well down the outside.
Had every chance after box seating. Faded over the final 50m.
Ridden along early settling 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Only plodded to the finishing line.
Jumped best then settled in 2nd position outside the leader. Was well beaten approaching the final furlong.
Settled in last position along the paint. Kept to the inside in the final stretch but only plodded away in the home straight.
Posted 3 wide without cover in a midfield position. Never likely.
Jumped awkwardly settling worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Slow to begin travelling midfield the paint. Was a spent force after the 200m.
Good break, tracked 2 deep with cover 4th, 3 wide for daylight 500m, shaken up to lead 400m, kept pulling out to repel persistent stretch challenge.
Bumped start, trapped 3 deep no cover mid rank, advanced 4 wide round turn, to 2nd 350m, sound effort, always held.
Taken back from wide gate, 3 deep no cover worse than midfield, progress on turn 5 wide, 2L back 400m, closed steadily to line.
Over-raced in mid-rank 800m, settled 2 deep with cover, followed winner into stretch, boxed-in 400m, checked 200m, kept on late.
Driven to lead at break, headed under pressure 400m, battled on same pace to wire.
Bumped start, raced midfield 2 deep with cover, taken off heels 800m moved 3 deep 4L off lead, stayed on dourly without threatening.
Early speed to sit close 2nd 2 deep no cover, pressed lead final turn, unable to quicken 400m, tapered out last 200m.
Slow start, rearward 6L back on rail, off heels 700m, taken 2 deep, ridden 400m, fair headway centre track.
Good break, raced 2L back on paint, steadied 800m, travelling on final turn, tight for room, hampered and lost impetus 200m.
Reared start lost ground, recovered to midfield on paint, off heels 750m, 3 deep on turn, steady stretch progress, hampered 200m, no chance after.
Urged from gate, slipstreamed leader on rail, over-raced 800m, trapped on rail in home stretch, no clear out, not fully tested.
Dropped to rear from wide gate, raced last pair 2 deep, produced nothing in straight.
Taken behind runners from widest draw, always in last pair on rail, weakened home straight, never a factor.
Broke fast, settled fifth one off, led 300m out, soon in charge.
Fair break, midfield three wide, mid-track bid, ran on well.
Broke well, urged early to third rail, ridden before straight, kept on gamely without being able to threaten.
Taken back from wide draw to third last two off, wide run, finished well.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, blocked for run early straight, kept on.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, bid between horses, kept on well late.
Fair break, hard to settle early, midfield three wide no cover, kept on, no kick.
Broke well, up to second one off, up to second early straight, hung in under pressure, weakened.
Sluggish start, third last rail one off, mid-track bid, one pace.
Fair break, ridden early to midfield one off, mid-track bid, no progress from 300m out.
Missed break, lost length, ridden up along rail to midfield at turn, bid between horses, no extra from mid-straight.
Jumped fast, ridden early to lead and cross, headed 250m out, ridden, weakened.
Moderate start, crowded early and taken back, second last rail, mid-track bid, found little.
Fair break, ridden early, sixth three wide no cover, weakened straight.
Pushed forward and shared lead at good sectionals, dominated from 600M, not fully tested.
Eased back, 9Ls off the good pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Midfield, 7.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, made steady ground 400M for 3rd.
Pushed forward to take the rail and shared the lead at good sectionals, overhauled 600M, ran on well to the line.
Midfield, 7.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Midfield, 6Ls off the good pace on the rails, made some ground 150M.
Settled in front, 4Ls off the good pace along the fence, just held ground in straight.
At rear, 10Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made some ground 250M.
Eased at start to get cover at rear, more than 11Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Hard ridden forward, 4Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 9Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, made steady ground 600M, run ended 250M.
Eased back, more than 11Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, just ran on ok.
Midfield, 6Ls off the good pace 2 wide, flattened in straight.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, no progress.
Broke well, caught midfield three wide, mid-track bid, led 300m out, kept on very gamely.
Taken back from wide draw, mid-rear two off, wide bid, made rapid ground to challenge strongly from 100m out, just held.
Taken back, held up last, wide bid straight, finished strongly, jut failed.
Fair break, fifth one off, slightly eager until settled, in side bid, reached second mid-straight, kept on no kick.
Moderate break, urged to mid-rear one off, bid one off rail, not much room, bumped, unbalanced, kept on.
Moderate break, bumped early, unbalanced, second last one off, bid between horses, kept on.
Fair break, midfield rail, checked entering straight, inside bid, kept on.
Badly checked start, last early, bid between runners, modest progress.
Fair break, midfield one off, tried to improve three wide approaching straight, mid-track bid, weakened late.
Broke well but caught three wide no cover, up to join lead but unable to cross, shared lead one off, no extra from early straight.
Broke well, led rail but pestered, headed early straight, weakened.
Broke fast, led early but unable to cross, third one off, weakened straight.
Broke well, fourth one off , weakened from early straight.
Broke well, up early to second, crowded and shuffled back, weakened quickly straight.
Posted 3-wide in mid-division, travelled smoothly to straight, accelerated to a clear lead inside 250M, kept on well final stages to hold off the fast finishing 2nd.

Switched off to last, had over 6Ls to make up turning home but had no clear run before pulling wide to challenge near 350M, finished strongly (clocked fastest final 400M of the day) and was just denied.
Slow to begin, settled near last 7Ls off the pace, held up early straight, ran on well between horses inside 300M but no impression on first two.
Behind midfield 5Ls back, proved difficult to settle when the pace slackened in middle stages, checked twice passing 800M, took a while to get going in straight, stayed on final 200M.
Ahead of mid-division but travelled wide without cover for most of the way, responded well to pressure in straight, went 2nd 200M out, weakened inside 100M and faded to 5th.
Reserved in a rearward position 6Ls back, raced keenly when the pace slackened over the turn, kept on final 400M but could not get to the leaders. (Blood in trachea.)
Slotted into a 3-wide position behind midfield, pushed wider nearing 700M and lost cover, kept on passing 400M but not going the pace to seriously challenge, faded final stages.
Always in touch 2-3Ls off the lead, had his chance but not able to quicken with the main rivals inside 400M, no impression.
Quickly into stride, up with the pace until 1100M, in 3rd place making the home turn, led briefly near 300M, weakened rapidly over final 200M.
Dropped back to the rear, 7Ls off the pace in middle stages, turned wide halfway home turn, not quickened passing 400M, never able to challenge.
Settled in midfield along the fence, one-paced final 400M, never a threat.
Awkwardly away, up with early pace then strode forward to take lead passing 1000M, slowed things down over the turn, headed inside 300M, weakened.
Never far off the steady pace, not quickened under pressure, left behind by the field mid-straight.
Driven forward, shared lead until 1000M, in 2nd place turning in, found nothing and dropped out rapidly. (Unacceptable performance.)
Broke well, not rushed, settled sixth rail, challenged two off, led 180m out, won comfortably.
Awkward break, worked up quickly wide to third two off, led early straight until 180m out, unable to resist winner.
Sluggish start, two lengths last early, improved inside approaching turn, unable to find clear run until passing 300m mark, finished best of all.
Well away, ridden on inside to hold place among leaders, steadied off heels after being crossed 800m out, short of room for one off bid, kept on.
Slightly sluggish start, mid-rear rail, steadied and shifted inside early straight, short of room, kept on along rail.
Broke fast, up wide to lead and cross, pestered in lead, headed 200m out, weakened late.
Fair reak, not rushed early, fourth last one off, wide bid, kept on one pace.
Fast away, led briefly then third one off, held position into straight, weakened late.
Taken back, seond last one off, wide bid, one pace.
Fair break, midfield one off, checked when crowded 800m out, kept on one pace.
Broke well, taken back, mid-rear wide no cover from 800m, mid-track bid, weakened from 300m out.
Broke well, fifth two off, bumped early and unbalanced, mid-track bid, weakened from 300m out, lost right hind plate.
Taken back from wide draw, last one off, wide bid, no progress.
Fair break, urged early but nt go pace, midfield two off, wide bid, no progress.
Pressed forward as usual to take up the running, controlled tempo racing 1L clear on circle, found plenty extra to defy rivals in straight and score a solid victory.
Attempted to angle into running line, posted 3 and 4 wide without cover behind midfield, 6Ls down working wide turning in, kept finding and closed hard to take 2nd despite running about final 200m.
Away evenly, assumed prime position on leaders back, used little in mid section, took inside runs and kept on steadily without matching strength of first two over final furlong.
Got away with rest, held a spot in midfield 4Ls or so away on rails, quiet time in mid section, saved ground turning, stayed on gradually to make frame.
Assumed a midfield role 4Ls back in two wide line, cozy run in middle stages, into clear passing 300m, kept on ok to be closest at finish.
Restrained from tricky gate, shared rear 8Ls away in running line, still well back turning, made useful progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Positioned behind midfield racing 2 and 3 wide, always 6-7Ls off lead, came to middle final 400m and made steady ground without looking likely.
Restrained from an outside alley, raced at rear 8Ls or so away on rails, near last turning, made many lengths before running out of room final 100m.
Trapped 3 wide without cover from a tricky alley, kept working 3-4Ls off lead on circle, stayed on but run ended at 200m. Even effort given trip.
No early pace, raced in rear division 7Ls back on rails, not asked in mid section, closed steadily along inside.
Crowded early, sat just off speed before improving to race outside leader when pace slackened, right there turning, peaked and faded from 200m.
Crowded early, ended up racing 3 wide in midfield with cover, 4-5Ls off lead in the middle stages, niggled turning but lacked the required dash, no extra late.
Standard getaway, drifted back to race behind midfield, 6-7Ls back in two wide line to turn, didn't find much when asked and made no real progress.
Even getaway and went forward to race outside leader, had cover by midpoint, no excuses thereafter, dropped off tamely final 300m.

Made all setting a sedate pace, drew clear under pressure inside final 150 M.
Always well there, failed to quicken under pressure inside final 400 M.
Raced wide just worse than midfield, went widest into straight, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Settled in 4th or 5th and never far off, ran home one-paced.
Midfield throughout, saved ground turning in, looked to have place chance early in straight, unable to sustain effort.
Never better than midfield on rails, just worse than midfield around home bend and turning in, made modest headway in straight.
Raced just better than midfield on rails mainly in 4th or 5th, saved a lot of ground turning in, found nothing in straight.
Always well behind, ran very wide into straight, never nearer.
Raced wide in prominent positions early, settled in midfield with cover down home straight the first time, similar turning for final stretch, one-paced.
Never seen with a chance.
Soon dropped to last few racing keenly most of way.
Travelled one-out-one-back to 500 M, folded up quickly.
Stalked the leader on the fence. Railed up in the home straight and took control 100m out.
Strolled along in front along the paint. Stayed on soundly.
Settled in 2nd poison outside the leader. Kept up a fair gallop in the straight only tiring late.
Travelled worse than midfield on the rails. Maintained a reasonable effort to finish in the frame.
Camped midfield the fence. Kept on one paced in the run to the post.
Settled back in the field, 2 wide with cover. Took up a 3 wide spot with cover after the 700m, peeled out widest on straightening, plugged to the line.
Settled with the backmakers, 2 deep with cover. Passed tiring runners in the home straight.
Fractious as the start was affected, missing the jump and loosing considerable ground settling in last position. Battled away in the final stretch.
Slow to begin settling at the rear, along the fence with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Raced keenly in the early stages in 4th position, 1 off with cover. Was dour in the straight, tiring over the latter stages.
Travelled midfield, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Looked for a handy position early but was posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip, settling midfield. Gave ground in the straight and was never likely.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race along the fence, a couple of lengths from the leaders. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and hit the front near 100m.
Vied for the lead along the fence. Drew a slight margin on straightening and maintained a sound gallop right to the finish.
Was taken back from the outside gate, drifting back to settle at the tail of the field, 2 wide with cover. Stayed towards the inside rail in the run home and finished off strongly.
Camped with the backmakers along the paint. Swung widest on the home turn and closed off well.
Slow to begin settling close to midfield the fence. Worked home well despite negotiating some traffic near the 100m. (Lame in left fore.)
Had every chance after tracking the speed, 2 deep with cover. Kept at the same pace in the straight. (Bled.)
Dueled outside the early leader for most of the trip. Was gassed over the final stages.
Parked midfield, 2 wide with cover. Hampered near the 150m, but was a spent force prior.
Challenged for the lead but was posted 3 wide without cover for most of the journey. Never likely.
Ridden along early but became detached from the field settling a long last. Failed to pass another runner.
Speed to dispute early lead, settled 1L off pace, raced tight to rail, close to heels 600m, driven off turn, led 150m, drew clear last 50m.
Disputed lead initially, tracked 2 off with cover in 4th, 2L back 4 wide off turn, closed centre track, grabbed 2nd at wire.
Hampered start, ridden forward, steadied 700m, advanced to 2nd 2 deep no cover 600m, led but hung in 200m, headed 150m, lost 2nd on line.
Fast break, outright lead 800m, squeezed for room and headed 200m, no extra in run to line.
Dropped behind from widest draw, raced last trio on rail, progress when short of room on turn, bumped rival, 6L off 200m, solid closer.
Crowded start, niggled midfield on rail, 4L 5th 200m, kept on same pace.
Fair break, raced last trio 2 deep with cover, wide off turn, progress centre track, hampered slightly 150m, hung in run to line.
Bumped start, pushed along behind midfield, taken off heels 700m, 2 deep shifted in on home turn, bumped and checked, stayed on one pace.
Shifted right at start, raced 3 deep with cover from wide alley, 4L 6th 400m, outpaced in stretch, beaten when crowded late.
Forced to chase pace 5 and 4 deep from wide gate, 5th at 400m, widest into stretch, faded out.
Slow start, raced at rear, always outpaced, modest progress in stretch to pass beaten rival.
Early pace behind front rank 3 deep, over-keen and steadied 800m, dropped worse than midfield, weakened home stretch.
Broke well, slight bump early, settled fourth rail, bid three off straight, kept on well to catch weakening leader late.
Broke well, caught wide so up to second one off, joined leader 300m out, went on 200m out, faltered and caught last 25m.
Broke well, not pace to stay with leaders, midfield rail, inside bid, kept on well.
Steadied start, taken back to rear rail, improved between horses approaching turn, blocked for run in bid one off, kept on but could not be asked for effort late.
Fair break, not rushed, second last rail, one off bid but short of room, blocked briefly, kept on.
Broke well, led then joined entering turn, headed early straight, weakened.
Broke well, ridden for early lead but not pace to clear rivals, three wide n cover throughout, ridden before straight, kept on one pace mid-track.
Broke well, not pace to go with leaders, midfield one off, bid between horses, short of room and bumped, kept on one pace when clear.
Fast break, not much early pace, third last one off, shuffled back to last entering straight, bid between horses, modest progress.
Fair break, ridden for early speed but unable to clear rivals and wide no cover throughout, still wide into straight, no extra late.
Broke well, urged early but not much pace, mid-rear two off, wide bid, no progress.
Broke well, ridden to join leaders, third one off, fifth into straight, steadied off heels when weakening, found nil thereafter.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader along the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 250M to score by a nose.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, made steady ground 400M, just beat by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls at fast sectionals, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled and flattened.
Settled in box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, ran on well to the line.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace and the rail-run, made steady ground in straight.
Eased to rear, 7.Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, just ran on ok.
Bumped start, took rail at rear, 7.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Prominent, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast pace, made early move 800M, weakened 250M.
Prominent on the fence, not suited by the fast tempo, out of fuel 300M.
Pushed to take midfield spot, 4Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, emptied 400M.
Trapped 3 wide throughout at back, never a factor, tailed out.
Broke fast, led throughout, two lengths clear entering straight, still length clear 100m out, just held on.
Broke well, settled fifth rail, chased winner hard in one off bid, just failed, rider dropped rein.
Broke fast, second one off, then third rail, kept on strongly, just failed, lost left front plate.
Broke well, ridden to go with leaders, fourth one off, bid between horses, kept on steadily without kick to challenge.
Broke fast, up fast to join leaders, chased winner in second, no extra late.
Slowly away, then steadied off heels, third last, bid between horses, blocked for run then checked late, kept on.
Broke well, not asked for early pace, midfield rail, inside bid, kept on and finishing well until ran out of racing room very late.
Broke fast from wide, taken back to midfield two off, aimed for mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Broke well, not rushed early, midfield one off, four wide bid, one pace.
Taken back to rear group one off, bid between runners straight, minimal progress.
Moderate break, taken back to rear group rail, aimed for mid-track bid, no progress.
Fair break, taken back to second last rail, aimed for inside bid, no progress.
Settled in midfield 5-6Ls off the pace, had a smooth run along the inside, made good headway passing 350M, hit lead near 50M
Never far off the pace in 5th, saved ground along the inside, had every chance turning into straight, just held but finished clear of the rest.
Tracked leader, pushed along 500M out, not pace of first two over final 200M but kept on steadily to claim 3rd near line.
Soon led, set good pace upfront, kept on well early straight, weakened final stages, headed near 50M and faded into 4th.
Dropped back to last over 8Ls off the pace, made good progress final 350M
Towards the rear, ran on final 300M without getting to the leaders.
Switched off to a rearward position, made limited progress passing 300M, never threatened leaders.
Chased the pace in a 2-wide position, came under pressure home turn, weakened away inside 250M.
Never better than midfield, pulled widest to challenge in straight, kept on same pace only, no impression.
In 4th place within striking distance, had a smooth trip but found disappointingly little off the bridle 350M, weakened rapidly late stages.
Began awkwardly, held up behind midfield, didn't travel and was under pressure 600M out, never threatened.
7Ls back in a rearward position, raced 3-wide without cover throughout, outpaced passing 400M, soon behind.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Disputed lead, hit the front upon straightening, just held on to the line.
Always thereabouts, ran on inside final 200 M, did best work late.
Began moderately, gradually picked up to midfield racing keenly at times, shifted out for a run turning in, ran on well to be nearest at finish.
Well there, took up running after first 300 M, led until joined by eventual winner into straight, kept on well to narrowly miss a placing.
Slowly away, remained well behind on rails, shifted off rails for a run turning in but shifted back in inside final 300 M, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Close up in 3rd on rails early, shuffled backward to just better than midfield coming out of back straight, steadied turning for home, baulked early in straight, finished off race nicely.
Settled in last few after beginning from a wide draw, kept on same pace without quickening while hanging in in straight.
Settled in midfield, kept on same pace in straight.
Broke well in front early, ceded advantage to settle one back on rails coming out of back straight, kept on from similar position turning in, dropped out of contention inside final 300 M.
Always in last few, ran home at the one pace.
Began moderately, settled wide in forward of midfield, ran home one-paced.
Began with others, soon taken well back, trailed the field into straight, made no impression.
Drawn wide, race wide in midfield, took closer order coming onto home bend, kept on before weakening passing 300 M.
Parked 3 back the fence. Commenced to shift out after the 600m, and finished off well and had the race in its keeping 30m out.
Camped midfield, 1 off with cover. Briefly held up early in the straight, switched out and ran on nicely.
Proved difficult to settle in the early and middle stages, travelling 2 deep with cover, worse than midfield. Closed off with a lot of purpose towards the outside.
Went back from the outside alley travelling 2nd from the rear along the paint. Closed off strongly through the field.
Led early then handed up near the 1000m, settling 1 off. Shot clear early in the straight and looked the winner but was swamped after the 50m.
Travelled with the backmakers 3 wide with cover. Ran on late.
Tracked the leader after the 1000m along the fence. Faded over the concluding stages.
Settled behind the leaders, 2 wide with cover. Was running on empty inside the final 50m.
Taken back from a wide gate settling in last position travelling just off the fence. Peeled out 4 wide after the 600m, still had cover, straightened about 8 deep, closed off soundly.
Raced behind midfield, 3 wide with cover. Cornered wide and only plodded to the line.
Settled back in the field on the rails with cover, crept forward and travelled close to midfield after the 1000m. Kept to the inside in the straight but failed to close off.
Had every possible chance settling 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Was a beaten horse early in the home straight.
Posted 3 wide without cover on the circle, midfield. Never a factor.
Sent forward and eventually crossed and led along the paint near the 1000m. Faded quickly over the final 250m. Reported the following day to be lame in the left front.
Raced on the speed in third position towards the stands rails. Assumed the lead near the furlong and drew clear to win comfortably.
Settled with the rear division along the grandstand side. Responded late working home well.
Couldn't match the early speed settling back near the middle of the track. Picked up nicely and rallied, hitting the line soundly.
Travelled in a handy position, towards the far side. Kept on satisfactorily to make the frame.
Parked behind the speed had cover about 4 off the stand side. Looked set for a good finish at the furlong after racing into 2nd position but ended its run well short of the line.
Worked forward to eventually take up leading duties near the 600m about 5 away from the outside fence. Faded over the concluding stages.
Travelled handy in the run towards the middle of the track. Plugged away over the final 100m.
Settled near the rear 2 off the outer fence. Struggled over the final stages.
Raced along the centre of the course in a rearward spot. Weakened and gave ground particularly over the final stages.
Raced hard up the outer rail. Copped a squeeze near the 600m, gave ground thereafter.
Was full of running early and led until about the 600m. was swamped from that point and gave in quickly after the 300m.
Fair break, sat midfield 3 off with cover, close to heels 900m, 3L back when quickened 400m, hard-ridden centre-track to lead 50m.
Speed early, stalked leader 2 deep no cover, 2L 2nd 400m, driven 300m, led 100m, all out when headed 50m.
Driven to sit close 3rd, checked off heels 900m, 2 deep with cover in 5th, hemmed in stretch, clear running 200m, strong closer.
Mustered to lead from gate, driven 2L clear 400m, headed 100m, tapered in run to wire.
Settled behind midfield 2 deep with cover, 5L down at 400m, ridden to close, stayed on resolutely.
Dropped to tail from wide gate, settled 2 deep with cover last, 5 L down turning in, made sound late headway.
Slow start, settled 4 from rear on rail, progress on turn to sit 7th at 400m, maintained gallop to wire without threatening.
Tracked 2 deep no cover 4th, hard-ridden 400m, unable to quicken, faded out final 250m.
Tardy start, towards rear 3 deep with cover, wide on turn in, one paced in run home.
Bustled from gate, raced on paint close to pace, driven in 3rd at 400m, weakened out 300m, beaten when eased final 100m.
Ridden from wide gate, unable to slot in, bumped 850m, trapped 4 deep no cover mid rank, found nothing in run for home.
Missed break, niggled in last pair on rail, switched out in straight, minor progress past beaten horses.
Unable to slot from widest stall, trapped 5 deep no cover, bumped and unbalanced 850m, struggled in run to wire.
Mustered from wide gate, 4 wide no cover midfield, bumped 850m, lost position, 4 deep with cover, driven on turn, last at 400m, soon detached.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear one off, four wide into straight, found gap, finished strongly to lead 100m out.
Taken back from wide draw, second last one off, wide bid, finished strongly, not match winner's kick.
Slowly away, last early and into straight, wide bid, finished strongly.
Fair break, midfield one off, effort and led briefly 200m out, kept on but outpaced late.
Broke fast, led rail but harried, headed 200m out, weakened.
Awkward start, third last rail, bid between horses and shifted position straight, kept on.
Fair break, mid-rear three wide, mid-track bid, modest progress.
Broke fast from wide, up to second one off, driven early straight, weakened.
Good break, fourth rail, crowded and unbalanced approaching turn, kept on one pace.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, bid between horses, no clear run until 300m out, steadied off heels 100m out, unable to threaten.
Broke well but caught three wide no cover throughout, bumped several times, nothing to give straight.
Broke well, up to fourth but over-racing and checked off heels, ninth into straight, no further progress.
Fair break, not rushed, held up fourth last for late finish, found little when asked.
Fair break, midfield one off, shifted away from heels, bumped and unbalanced, no progress thereafter.
Very slow away, 8.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M to score by a nose.
Settled in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, blocked 400M, dashed well when clear, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Eased back, 10Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, held up 4-2, dashed strongly when clear and grabbed 3rd.
Hard ridden to keep up with the field, more than 10Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled and flattened.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, lack room 400M, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, ran on well until 100M flattened.
Eased back, 8.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Eased to rear, more than 11Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Pushed forward, sat outside the leader, benefited by the slow sectionals, out of fuel 300M, checked 200M.
Box seat, suited by the slow tempo, emptied 200M.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader on the rails, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 10Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed fairly.
Midfield, 7Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 200M.
Broke well, settled midfield one off travelling comfortably, eased out for clear run, soon led, easily.
Fair break, settled midfield rail, out for bid between horses, kept on strongly without being able to threaten winner.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, out for mid-track bid following winner, ran on well but outpaced.
Fair break, third one off, challenged for lead mid-straight, kept on steadily when headed.
Fair break, settled second last one off, wide bid, kept on without being able to threaten.
Fair break, settled mid-rear one off, out for mid-track bid, kept on.
Fair break, settled rear rail, bid between horses, some late progress.
Fair break, settled third rail, ridden early straight, weakened.
Broke well, led but harried early, headed 200m out, weakened.
Broke well, up to second pestering leader, pair well clear early, then settled second rail, nothing to give in straight.
Showed good early speed, raced keenly in early stages but travelled better once obtained cover behind leader, into clear 350M, picked up well and in command from 200M, kept on to the line.
Crossed to a 3-wide position in midfield, stayed on well final 300M, nearest finish.
Settled 2-wide behind mid-division, pulled widest to challenge turning in, ran on steadily to go 3rd near line.
Always close up in the group chasing the pace, made his challenge alongside the eventual winner passing 300M, turned one pace final 150M and lost 2 placings late.
Settled along the fence behind mid-division, 5Ls off the pace passing 400M, stayed on without troubling the leaders.
Crossed to the lead passing 1100M, led steadily to straight, headed near 200M, weakened.
Held up near last along the inside, 8Ls off the pace in middle stages, had to make his move outwide in straight, made some progress but never a threat to the leaders.
Raced a shade keen early, ended up one out one back and more forward than usual, faded from 300M out. (Jockey and Trainer questioned.)
Never far away, had a smooth run along the fence but didn't pick up under pressure final 400M, one paced.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, well covered, kept on same pace final 400M, no impression.
Travelled 3-wide and never better than midfield, not going the pace to challenge inside 400M, flattened out towards the finish. (Blood in trachea.)
Switched off to last and well off the pace in early and middle stages, didn't respond to pressure, ran past well beaten runners only.
Caught 3-wide without cover, strode forward to join leaders 600M, soon weakened in straight, dropped out rapidly.
Towards the rear, had to be pushed along early to maintain his position, didn't travel and was eased soon on straightening. (Irregular Heart Rhythm.)
Broke well, settled seventh rail, bid four, finished strongly to get up on the line.
Fast away, soon led, shaken up 350m out, sprinted clear and fought stubbornly to line, just caught.
Jumped well, taken back to second last one off, switched to mid-track bid 200m out, gained steadily to snatch third.
Good break, fourth three wide no cover, hampered, checked and unbalanced 900m, wide bid, ran on well.
Broke well, bumped, last rail, widest bid, finished strongly.
Sluggish start, re-balanced and soon up to mid-rear one off, blocked early straight, came free inside last 150m, finished well.
Broke well, steadied to mid-rear rail, short of room straight, switched inside 200m out, ran on late without being able to threaten.
Broke well, mid-rear rail, inside bid, fought on well.
Fair break, aimed for lead but caught four wide no cover entire trip, shaken up from 400m out, fought bravely until weakened last 50m.
Fast away, disputed early lead but was caught four wide no cover in fifth, even wider at 600m marker, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear one off, blocked by wall of horses straight, checked 200m out and lost momentum, recovered and ran on last 100m.
Broke well, pulled hard early, second one off after 400m, shaken up from 600m out, tired last 200m.
Fair jump, pulled hard most of the way mid-rear three off, wide bid, one pace.
Broke left, recovered quickly, soon third rail, asked for effort straight, found nil and beaten 200m out.
Away with them, showed some authority to lead, controlled terms to suit, found passing 300m and went on to defy rivals and score.
Began in line, settled in midfield racing 3 wide with cover, 3-4Ls back on bend, improved from 400m and kept working into it nicely, maintained effort and just outlasted inside 100m.
No early speed. Raced behind midfield on rails, 5Ls off top end, angled wider turning, in traffic early in straight but closed nicely when clear for 3rd.
Faded back from a tricky gate, settled 3 wide behind midfield 5ls back, improved approaching final bend, made good ground despite hanging, drifted out badly late.
Began nicely, assumed prominent spot on leaders back, had ideal run throughout, run emerged turning and looked a place chance, peaked and boxed on steadily behind placegetters.
Ended up at rear from outside alley, 6-7Ls away 3 wide with cover on circle, still well back turning, made good ground in straight to be nearest on line.
Caught 3 wide without cover and pressed on to be racing up outside leaders, did work in mid section, kept on to 200m before hard run took toll and weakened out.
Out with rest, pushed up to race on rails 3Ls or so from lead, no excuses in run, close enough turning but just had one speed in straight and held ground.
Faded back from a tricky alley, raced at rear on rails, made ground turning, kept to inside and kept progressing but blocked for a run at business end and wasn't properly tested.
Began well, assumed dream spot 1 out back, had no excuses in mid section, looked a place chance but didn't let down when asked final 200m and dropped out easily. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken back as usual, raced in rear division 6Ls away in running line, checked at 600m, still well back to bend, only passed beaten runners last 300m.
Away slowly, improved to race 2 wide in midfield 4Ls back, fair run in mid section, ridden along turning but failed to find another gear and just whacked away in straight.
Showed speed to work across and race outside leader, even run despite some attention from horse outside, soon under pressure turning and folded tamely.
