Waited with, commenced run leaving Rock, circled field around the bend, ran on well from midfield into straight to assert authority near line.
Settled in midfield, commenced move passing 400 M, ran on steadily in straight but winner too good.
Settled well behind, made significant progress down centre of straight to be nearest at finish.
Slow into stride, ridden to join rear of field, ran on well to be nearest at finish.
Soon took up running and attempted to make all, swamped inside final 50 M.
Began with others, settled about 2Ls off the pace on rails, saved ground turning in, hit front momentarily 100 M out only to be swamped close to home.
Began from poor draw, travelled in last few, saved ground on rails turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began with others, settled in rear of midfield, fought on steadily without threatening.
Sluggish at start, gradually picked up to midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, unable to sustain effort after straightening.
Began with others, held prominent position most of way to straight, soon faded.
Prominent to straight, dropped out. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Raced wide without cover just better than midfield, weakened from 500 M out.
Settled 1 out 1 back after being crossed near the 800m. Shifted in passing the 500m, and chased well down the running. Had the race in its keeping near the 100m.
Parked worse than midfield after being slow to begin, 1 off with cover. Let down nicely after obtaining clear running early in the straight.
Sent forward and led along the fence. Held a good break after the 300m, but was mowed down passing the 100m.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race box seating. Couldn't hold its spot after the 700m, copped a check near the 500m, and maintained a good gallop to fill the frame.
Camped behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Came widest on the home turn and closed off soundly without threatening.
Travelled 3 back 2 wide with cover, had every chance but couldn't capitalize.
Coursed 3 wide and without cover, whilst racing on the speed, eventually crossing and racing outside the leader near the 700m. Was a beaten horse before the furlong.
Settled worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Finished off dourly.
Taken back from a wide gated & raced at the rear along the paint. Commenced to work into the race early in the straight but was unable to obtain clear running over the final 200m.
Slow to begin then ridden along to improve, traveling 3-4 wide with cover with the backmakers. Struggled in the home straight.
Settled at the rear of the field but was wide about 4 deep without cover in the early and middle stages. Got some cover on the final circle but was a spent force early in the straight.
Had no luck posted 4 wide without cover in the early stages settling just behind the leaders, and thereafter taking up a 3 wide position. Never likely.
Settled in 4th position the fence. Closed off with plenty of purpose to grab victory in the shadows of the post.
Handed up & settled in second position, shifting out to race 2 wide passing the 800m. Was in front at the 200m, but was collard close to home. (Blood in trachea)
Travelled behind midfield along the paint. Finished off well under strong riding.
Parked midfield on the rails. Kept to the inside in the straight and finished off satisfactorily.
Crossed and led along the fence passing the 800m. Faded on its effort late.
Slow to begin settling along the fence with the backmakers. Closed off only fairly, however the concluding stages, experienced some traffic.
Positioned towards the rear, 2 wide with cover. Came wide in the straight and was dour in the run to the line.
Taken back from a wide gate settling at the tail of the field, along the paint. Made some steady ground passing tiring runners in the straight.
Travelled in 3rd position, 1 off. Was taken out to race 3 wide without cover after the 750m. Not likely from then on.
Camped behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Plugged away in the home straight.
Crowded at the start, settling just ahead of midfield, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the final stretch.
From the outside barrier was taken across behind runners settling at the rear, 2 wide with cover. Never a factor.
Broke well, raced rail 5th 4L back, switched 4 wide into stretch, sweeping run to lead 100m, comfortable.
Slow break, taken behind runners to fence, 8L last at 400m, strong stretch run to take 2nd late.
Sat 3rd behind leader on rail, pulled 1 off to challenge on turn, reverted to rail in stretch, battled to wire.
Raced 2nd 1 off no cover, driven to lead 220m, all out and headed 100m, weakened final strides, narrowly run out of frame.
Crowded start, tracked 2 deep 4th with cover, bumped 1200m, ridden 400m, one paced in run home.
Slow break, raced midfield on rail, steadied off heels 1400m, hit rail 1250m, niggled, 5L back ridden 600m, closed out without threatening.
Awkward start, taken to rail from widest draw, raced towards rear, 6L down when ridden 400m, sound progress in run to wire.
Speed to lead, ridden 450m, headed 220m, faded in closing stages.
Raced midfield 2 deep with cover, steadied off heels at winning line 1st time, 5L down 400m, not quicken, kept on moderately.
Unable to slot in from wide gate, 2 deep last trio, ridden 600m, 3 deep on turn, one paced in stretch.
Missed break, raced at tail until 600m, modest progress 4 wide on turn, kept on at same tempo.
Camped behind midfield 2 deep with cover, hard-ridden off home turn, found nothing, never a factor.
Fair break, not rushed, settled mid-rear rail, made ground rail turn, mid-track bid, finished strongly to lead last strides.
Broke well, fourth one off, led narrowly mid-straight, headed near line.
Fair break then crowded, taken back to rear one off, inside bid, strong finish, just failed.
Broke well, steadied to mid-rear one off, mid-track bid, kept on well.
Broke well, led and dictated, still in front 200m out, headed, weakened.
Broke well, midfield rail, bid between horses straight, no clear run for a while, kept on one pace.
Taken back and held up for late run, inside bid, checked 150m out, kept on but unable to threaten thereafter.
Broke well, third rail, chased leader one off until no extra late.
Fair break, fifth one off taking time to settle, bumped, hung turn, weakened.
Fair break, not rushed, third last one off, bid between horses but blocked for run 200m out, no progress.
Fair break, midfield two off no cover, nothing to give in straight.
Bumped start, second pestering leader one off, still second entering straight, weakened.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 400M to score.
Hard ridden forward to sit outside the leader, favoured by the slow sectionals, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, suited by the slow tempo, closed off well for 3rd.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 0.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 150M overhauled and flattened.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, held up most straight, just ran on.
At rear, 7Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, just little dash 200M without many threats.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, however soon out of fuel 200M.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, blocked whole straight, never tested.
At back, 6Ls off the leaders along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the slow tempo, however soon weakened 250M.
Broke well, third rail, led 250m out, fought on well to resist all challengers.
Fair break, not rushed, second last rail, bid between horses, finished well, just held.
Broke well, fifth one off, bid one off rail, kept on well but unable to peg back winner.
Fair break, midfield rail, pocketed until last 100m, escaped too late to challenge.
Broke well, up to share lead one off, just went on approaching turn, led early straight, weakened from 150m out.
Broke well from wide gate, no route to rail so back to mid-rear one off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield rail, up to fourth rail approaching straight, not much room, kept on no kick.
Broke well from wide gate, taken back when no route to rail but still caught three wide, third last, wide bid, kept on one pace.
Crowded early, not much early speed, last one off, inside bid, little progress.
Broke well, ridden for early speed, fourth one off when unable to lead, then three wide throughout as lost position, weakened from before turn.
Broke fast to share lead rail, harried on outside and headed before straight, weakened.
Broke well, became difficult to settle when being crossed 1000M, well placed to strike passing 400M, swept to the front 200M, kept on strongly.
Held up near last along the rails, travelled well but had no clear run early straight, finished off strongly and would have been closer.
Always prominent in 3rd, lacked winner's acceleration, kept on evenly final 200M, lost 2nd place near line.
In midfield, shuffled back when checked 1000M, plugged on down the home straight but was never going to win.
Towards the rear 5Ls off the pace, switched outwide 500M, stayed on final 300M.
One out one back, had every chance in straight, one paced final 200M.
Taken back from draw 12, settled last 6Ls off the pace, had no clear run until 200M, made late progress.
Slow to begin, 4Ls back in 8th, ran on one paced under pressure passing 400M, never a threat.
Sped to the lead, took them along at good pace, headed near 200M, no extra.
In mid-division, strode closer to pace down the back straight but unable to find cover, caught 4-wide throughout, weakened 300M out.
Settled in midfield 3-wide, checked 600M out and pushed wider over the turn, effort soon flattened out inside 300M.
Close up in the first half, outpaced from 600M, faded to last nearing 150M.

Began moderately, always well there in 3rd, hit the front shortly after straightening, just held on to the line.
Began well to lead early, ceded advantage for cover before checked and lost ground when pacemaker slowed the tempo passing 1000 M, renewed effort inside final 200 M to just fail to peg back winner.
Settled just better than midfield, commenced move approaching home turn, ran on under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Drawn poorly, towards rear and wide early, made swift progress to take up running coming out of back straight, headed passing 400 M, kept on one pace under pressure.
Began moderately, gradually picked up along rails to 4th before checked and lost ground passing 1000 M, baulked before shifted out for a run over 300 M out, kept on to be nearest at finish.
Settled towards the rear, saved ground on inside turning in, kept on to be nearest at finish.
Settled well behind, ran very wide into straight, kept on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began with others, soon taken back and was checked in the process, racing in rear when badly tightened coming out of back straight, shifted widest for a run down home straight, nearest at finish.
Drawn poorly, soon taken back for inside run and made rapid progress to midfield, forced wide coming out of back straight, badly baulked for a run 200 M out, kept on steadily to be nearest at finish.

Began well, raced wide with leaders before let go on rails to take up running 1000 M out, steadied pace to gain cover passing 800 M, renewed effort turning in but had no more to give inside final 200 M.
Raced wide in midfield, similar into straight, found nothing under pressure.
Always well behind.
Never better than midfield, found nil in straight.
Travelled just better than midfield without cover, dropped out tamely after straightening.
Jumped best and shot forward to settle in third position, 1 off no cover. Lengthened well early in the straight and opened up a commanding break, winning effortlessly.
Led by at least 3 lengths in the middle sates and still had a handy margin on the field turning for home. Stayed on soundly.
Settled at the rear of the field but posted 4 wide without cover for most of the journey. Chased home gamely out deep.
Parked midfield, 1 off with cover. Rattled home fairly in the straight whilst laying in, managed to finish in the frame.
Enjoyed the run of the race in 2nd position along the fence. Had every possible chance, finished off dourly.
Travelled worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Kept on one paced in the run to the line.
Taken back from a wide gate, settling with the backmakers, 2 wide with cover. Came widest in the final stretch but finished off only fairly.
Raced keenly in early stages, travelling behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Battled away in the home straight.
Traveled just off midfield the fence. Kept to the inside in the home straight but only plugged home.
Slow to begin then was posted 3 deep without cover on the circle. Never likely. (Vet reported the horse to be a Roarer.)
Settled towards the rear along the rails with cover. Failed to close off.
Travelled at the tail of the field on the paint. Struggled over the concluding stages.
Camped in 4th position the fence. Had no excuses, giving ground early in the straight.
Speared forward from the outside barrier, showed superior gate speed, landed in 4th position 1off with cover. Peeled out on straightening and showed strong acceleration, won easily.
Settled midfield the fence. Shifted ground when under heavy pressure in the straight, chased home gamely.
Couldn't match the early speed of the race, travelling midfield 2 deep with cover. Finished off soundly.
Closed off well from back in the field, travelling 2-3 wide with cover. Commenced to improve after the 600m.
Made its run 2nd from the rear along the fence. Made some late ground without threatening.
Camped worse than midfield the fence, had cover, worked home gamely.
Traveled in last position on the rails with cover. Ridden along after the 600m, closed off satisfactorily.
Parked behind midfield 2 deep with cover. Finished off one paced despite strong riding.
Stalked the leader 1 off no cover. Was a spent force 100m from home.
Had every chance after box seating. Struggled over the final furlong.
Began awkwardly settling midfield, 2 wide with cover. Gave way over the last 200m.
Assumed the lead approaching the 1000m. Straightened a length in advance but faded quickly approaching the 150m.
Had no luck being posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip, midfield. Never likely.
Settled just behind midfield 3 deep with cover. Was carried out to race 4 deep, no cover after the 600m. Never likely.
Tardy start, urged on to race 6th the rail, progress on turn, switched 4 deep hard-ridden 400m, led 150m, closed out strongly.
Good break, sat 2 deep 2L off lead, ridden to close 500m, 3 deep on turn, led 300m, headed 150m, one pace thereafter.
Sharp break, unable to slot in from wide alley, dropped to midfield on fence, 4L down 400m, strong closer, to 3rd inside 50m.
Awkward start, over-raced early, tracked leader on rail, crowded 350m, switched out for run 300m, effort tapered final 100m.
Slow break, held up last pair on rail, 8L back when let down 400m, responded with strong chase to wire.
Badly checked at start, camped worse than midfield on paint, 7L down 400m, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Ridden from gate, trapped 2 deep with cover midfield, taken wide on home turn, one paced in stretch, faded last 100m.
Shifted into rival at start, taken to tail from wide draw, raced last pair 1 off, ridden 450m, moderate progress in straight.
Speed to lead, pressured 400m, rallied, headed 300m, no extra, dropped away.
Driven from gate, raced 2 deep with cover near rear, 8L down when widest into stretch, no impression.
Ridden at break, raced keenly in 2nd on leader's flanks 1 off no cover, disputed lead off home turn, run faltered 350m, faded out.
Smart break, restrained from wide gate, raced 3 deep no cover near rear, off bridle 650m, never a factor.
Failed to slot in from widest berth, trapped 3 deep no cover chasing pace, driven 600m, unable to hold place, faded tamely from 450m.
Missed break and bumped, driven to midfield, raced 2 wide with cover, struggling 7L down on turn, nothing in stretch, eased when beaten.
Broke well, settled fifth rail, out for mid-track bid, gained steadily until came with a rush to lead 25m out as front-runner weakened.
Broke fast, led and dictated, kicked clear early straight, seemed in control until stride shortened last 100m.
Broke well, settled fourth one off, bid between horses, kept on without being able to threaten.
Fair break, not much early pace, settled tenth rail, inside bid between horses, kept on well.
Fair break, settled mid-rear, wide bid between horses, kept on well late.
Fair break, held up rear group one off after taken off heels, wide bid, kept on well late.
Fair break, taken back from wide draw, bid between horses, kept on.
Broke well, shared early lead one off, then third rail, up to second 300m out, one pace late.
Fair break, sixth one off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, mid-rear two off, bid between horses, modest progress.
Fair break, ridden up to second one off, no extra when asked from early straight.
Fair break, midfield rail, urged, inside bid, no progress.
Fair break, no early speed, last rail, no response straight, vet's report revealed breathing problem.
Slow start, taken back, ran green, found nil when asked.
Shared lead at good pace on middle part of track, hung on to win, just by a very narrow margin.
Midfield on middle part of track, 3Ls off the good pace, made steady ground 300M, just beaten by a head in 2nd.
At back on inside part of track, 5.5Ls behind the good pace, progressed steadily 200M for 3rd.
Among the leaders on middle part of track, pace good, ran on well until 150M flattened.
Slow away, 4Ls off the good pace on inside part of track, made ground 300M, run ended 150M.
Prominent on middle part of track, 1.5Ls off the good pace, lack room 4-2, ran on fairly when clear.
Shared lead at good pace along stand side, hung on until 200M flattened.
Midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace along stand side, held up 400M, ran on ok when clear.
Pushed early on middle part of track, 4Ls off the good pace, no progress.
Shared lead at good pace closed to stand side, soon out of fuel 250M.
Behind midfield, 4Ls off the good pace along the stand side, no progress.
Eased at start, more than 8Ls off the good pace, no progress.
At rear on inside part of track, 6.5Ls off the good pace, no progress.
Pressed forward on inside pace of track, 2Ls off the good pace, soon weakened 300M.
Broke well, settled third rail, mid-track bid to lead mid-straight, kept on strongly when challenged despite hanging left.
Moderate break, mid-rear three off, rapid improvement mid-track to second mid-straight, sustained challenge just held.
Moderate break, third last rail, inside bid, finished well without pace to threaten front two.
Broke well, not rushed, mid-rear three wide, had to wait for gap between horses, finished well.
Taken back from wide draw, last rail, out for wide bid, kept on strongly until looking reluctant late.
Broke fast, second one off, led briefly 300m out, no extra when headed.
Broke well, fourth but caught three wide no cover throughout, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield one off, bid between horses but one pace, vet's exam found substantial blood in trachea.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, bid between runners, short of room and switched inside, no kick.
Broke well, midfield rail, inside bid, short of room, no progress.
Fast away, led and crossed, still led into straight, weakened quickly.
Travelled strongly in 2nd place 3-4Ls behind runaway leader, cruised to the lead near 300M, kicked well clear under light urging, impressive.
Dropped back to last, over 10Ls behind leader in middle stages, made good progress from off the pace passing 350M, went 2nd 100M out but no chance with the runaway winner.
Raced 2-wide in 3rd 6Ls off the runaway leader, produced with every chance turning in but never going the pace to challenge.
Along the fence, settled in 4th 6Ls off the runaway leader, kept on one paced final 400M.
Driven to a clear lead, 4Ls in front making the home turn, weakened and headed near 300M, faded to 5th.
Slow to begin, settled near the tail 8-9Ls back, ran on fairly inside 300M, effort flattened out final 100M.
Placed behind midfield off a good pace, not quickened inside 400m, never a threat.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, turned 3-wide without cover from 700M, not pace to challenge in straight, no impression.
Travelled 3-wide without cover in a rearward position, swung widest for home, gave limited response, eased when no chance final 100M.
Slow to begin, near last 10Ls behind runaway leader, under pressure home turn, soon left behind passing 400M.
Broke well, fourth one off, ridden to lead four wide mid-straight, battled on gamely, just held on.
Bumped hard break, mid-rear three wide but with cover,widest bid, strong finish, just failed.
Fair break, third rail, off rail early straight, finished well until outpaced late.
Fair break, back to rear group one off, short of room early straight, switched inside, finished well.
Fair break, midfield one off, then three wide no cover from halfway, wide bid, kept on gamely until no extra late.
Broke well, midfield one off, bid between runners, kept on.
Jumped well, taken back from wide draw to rear group two off but with cover, wide bid, kept on late past beaten horses.
Broke well, midfield rail, bid between horses, one pace.
Broke well, mid-rear rail, inside bid, modest progress.
Stumbled from gate, mid-rear one off, mid-track bid, little progress.
Fast away, soon led and crossed, harried in lead from 800m out, shaken up early straight, no extra when headed 200m out.
Fair break, taken back from wide gate, last rail, inside bid, unable to quicken.
Sluggish start, recovered to chase leaders, but three wide no cover, duelled for lead from 800m out, no more to give from 200m out.
Hesitant start, ridden up to second one off, then back to third one off, shaken up from 500m out, soon beaten. Vets reported irregular heart rhythm.
Pressed forward from a wide alley to cross to sit behind leader, enjoyed good trial to 400m, fought back underneath 2nd horse final 100m to score upset win.
Began well, a touch wide early before slotting into 1 out 1 back spot, had nice trip to bend, loomed like the winner passing 300m, kept on well but outlasted final 100m.
Out with rest, slotted in off pace in midfield, 5-6Ls back in running line, came wider and closed off well in straight to take place.
Angled into rearward spot from a wide alley, more than 10Ls from top end in 2 wide line, aided by tempo in mid section, closed off soundly in straight making good ground to make frame.
Unable to slot in and posted 3 and 4 wide without cover behind midfield, still 6Ls down turning, kept finding and closed well given workload to be on heels of place getters.
Rolled forward and ended up leading, set reasonable sectionals in mid section, tackled at 300m, stayed on well thereafter just tiring late.
Began fairly, drove through to take ideal slot behind leader, all favours to bend, held up turning and in traffic to 300m, closed steadily once clear but a shade flat final furlong.
Standard getaway, raced in midfield 5ls back on rails, angled wider on turning, made some progress but didn't let down as usual final 200m and just held ground.
Assumed spot in rear division, 6ls or so away in two wide line, aided by decent sectional, made some progress in straight without threatening.
No speed, raced in rear division on rails 8-9ls back, didn't use much in run, shifted wider in straight and closed gradually but lacked a turn of foot to figure.
Slow and taken back from a tricky gate, raced 2 and 3 wide at the rear 12Ls back, same margin back to bend, made only minor ground passed beaten runners.
Fair getaway, positioned behind midfield, 8Ls or so from lead, not asked in mid section, one speed in straight and didn't factor.
Taken back from a wide alley, raced at rear on rails more than 12Ls off lead, well back turning, made no real impression.
Away smartly, took up prominent spot and ended up first without cover, right there to turn, gave in quickly and dropped right out.

Niggled along and with leader early, settled in 3rd about 3Ls off the speed after the first quarter, similar turning for home, fought on doggedly to just get up on line.
Began fairly, travelled just better than midfield and in distant 4th around Rock, made steady headway in straight to hit front momentarily inside 200 M, lost race late.
Attempted to make all, challenged from around home bend, faded inside final 200 M. (Lame.)
Settled towards rear, saved ground turning in, snuck up on rails to be nearest at finish.
Driven along from the widest gate, rushed up to dispute lead from 1200 M bend, drew level upon straightening, faded under pressure inside final 100 M.
Began moderately, settled in midfield or just worse, came under pressure around the bend, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Midfield, checked and lost position on rails 500 M out, saved ground turning in, kept on steadily without threatening.
Very slowly away, trailed the field to Rock, remained well behind into straight, ran past well beaten horses.
Midfield early, gradually settled in last few, became last home bend, ran past well beaten horses in the run home.
Began fairly, settled mostly 3-wide in midfield down far side, similar turning in, kept on before fading inside final 200 M.
Began fairly from a poor draw, soon taken back to last few, never on terms.
Slightly slow out, well back before making short-lived effort in middle quarter, made no impression in home straight.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race close to the fence in third position with cover. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and worked home soundly.
Handed up near the 1000m, shifted out into 1 off and assumed 2nd position. Had every chance but was nailed close to home.
Settled worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Commenced to improve after the 600m, ran on satisfactorily.
Settled at the rear from an outside gate travelling 3-4 deep with cover. Under pressure from the 500m, responded well to figure in the frame.
Travelled 2 wide with cover, midfield. Was taken out 3 wide no cover after the 800m. Was dour in the run home.
Camped midfield the fence. Railed up in the final stretch but whacked away one paced.
Settled 2-3 wide with cover at the tail of the field. Came widest in the straight but peaked on its run well short of the line.
Eventually crossed to the fence after the 1000m and settled in the lead. Was a spent force after the furlong.
Settled in fourth position 1 off the fence. Faded over the final 100m.
Not the best to begin settling with the backmakers, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off.
Camped well back in the field along the paint. Railed up in the straight but despite being ridden vigorously from the 450m, never responded.
Settled back in the event from a wide gate but was posted 3-4 deep without cover for most of the trip. Never likely.
Enjoyed the box seat. Got the inside split turning for home, lengthened well and drew clear for an easy win.
Copped a check shortly after the start settling in last position the fence. Closed off well along the inside.
Sent forward and led on the rail. Was caught near the 50m for 2nd.
Parked 3 back the fence. Peeled out 4 deep early in the straight, made good steady ground over the final stages.
Blundered at the start, camping midfield, 2 deep with cover. Cornered wide however failed to show any dash in the straight.
Vied for the lead travelling 2 wide no cover. Faded over the final 100m.
Sent forward and raced with the leading division, but when caught wide was steadied and eventually settled well back 3-4 wide with some cover on the final bend. Was a spent force turning for home.
Raced on the speed but posted 3 deep without cover on the circle. Never likely.
Raced prominent early before coming back and settling behind the speed but travelled 3-4 wide, had some cover. Was a beaten horse early in the straight.
Led initially, soon settled in leaders' slipstream, over-raced 900m, 1L 3rd and shaken up 300m, inner run to lead 150m, comfortable.
Bumped start, pace to lead 1500m, shifted off rail into home stretch, driven 300m, headed 150m, battled on same pace.
Trapped 3 deep no cover 5th from wide gate, moved 2nd 2 deep no cover at 900m, lost 2nd 200m, gritty run to wire.
Crowded and checked off heels early, midfield 4 deep, 2L back 350m, wide off turn, strong closer, just missed frame.
Raced mid rank 1off with cover, progress 3 wide no cover down back, 1L 4th 400m, wide into stretch, one-paced in run home.
Awkward break and bumped, covered up near rear, advanced 3 deep from 800m, 3L 7th 400m, driven off turn, kept on to wire.
Dropped in at tail on paint, switched 3 deep 600m, steadied off heels and crowded 300m, 5L down 200m, closed out well.
Tardy start, camped behind midfield on rail, taken 1 off at 900m, outpaced 400m, last trio turning in, even progress to wire.
Unable to slot from wide gate, 4 deep with cover last trio, progress on outer 600m, widest into stretch, found little in home run.
Settled midfield on rail, niggled 600m, 3L down at 400m, unable to quicken, tame effort in stretch.
Bumped start, dropped last trio on rail, last at 600m, outpaced in stretch run, never a factor.
Rousted to sit handy 2 deep no cover, got cover 900m, shuffled back on turn, struggled under pressure, faded final 300m.
Fast break, led early then settled second rail, ridden early straight, led 300m out, soon in charge.
Broke well, up to lead but unable to cross, headed 300m out, no answer to winner once headed.
Missed break, slow into stride, second last rail, improved along rail approaching turn, inside bid, finished strongly.
Broke smartly, fifth rail, bid three off, kept on well without being able to threaten winner.
Badly checked start, crowded early, crowded again 800m out, midfield rail, up to fourth mid-straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, midfield one off, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not rushed, third last one off, slightly short of room for bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Awkward start, hindquarters bumped, rider unbalanced, quickly to fourth one off, mid-track bid, one pace late.
Taken back from wide gate, last one off, forced wider 800m out, rider reported reluctant under urging, inside bid, little progress.
Fast break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, unbalanced straight, no progress, lost right hind plate.
Slow start, rear group one off, struck heels and blundered 600m out, wide into straight, one pace.
Fair break, ridden from gate but caught midfield three wide no cover throughout, checked approaching turn, found nil straight.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 6.5Ls off the leader, enjoyed the rail run and benefited by the fast pace, closed off strongly 200M to score.
Eased at start to take rail at behind the field, 5Ls off the leader, favoured by the fast pace and the rail trip, made steady ground 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at fast sectionals, hung on well until 100M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast tempo and the rail trip, just held ground in straight.
Crossed in front easily, sat just off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast sectionals, weakened 200M.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, suited by the fast tempo, however trapped 3 wide throughout, ran on well to the line despite the amount of ground it lost at bends.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, ran on fairly in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, no room 200M, just ran on.
Pressed forward, 2.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, weakened 200M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader, suited by the fast tempo, however trapped 3 wide throughout and lost too much ground, ran on ok.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, lost too much ground and harmed by the fast pace, emptied 250M.
Broke fast, led and eventually crossed, fended off challengers early straight, ran on strongly despite drifting to mid-track.
Moderate start, midfield one off, eager, settled mid-rear one off, wide bid, finished strongly.
Broke well, aimed for lead, headed and second rail, inside bid, kept on but unable to reach winner.
Broke fast, up wide to join leaders, third one off, joined winner early straight, no extra once beaten off.
Broke well, fourth rail, came off rail for mid-track bid, drifted out under pressure, kept on one pace.
Broke fast, fifth one off, steadied to midfield one off, mid-track bid then switched inwards, kept on one pace.
Fair start, taken back to last rail, out for bid between horses, blocked twice, modest progress when clear.
Fair break, not rushed, third last one off, wide bid, kept on, no kick.
Fair break, midfield two off, then three wide no cover, mid-track bid, faded.
Fair break, not rushed, second last rail, inside bid, shifted out when no run available, unable to threaten.
Fair break, not much early speed, midfield three wide, wide bid, bumped 200m out, no progress.
Slow away, lost two lengths, ridden to midfield rail, inside bid, little progress, weakened.
Slightly slow away, travelled 2-wide in mid-division 4Ls back, picked up gradually inside 300M, in top gear passing 100M, got up last stride.
Moved forward quickly, travelled strongly in the slipstream of leader, responded well in straight and took lead near 150M, kept on willingly, headed last stride.
Caught wide no cover early stages, strode forward to 2nd place passing 1200M, had every chance turning for home and looked one of the possible at 200M, battled on under pressure final stages.
Held up in rear group and well off the pace, pushed along nearing 400m, stayed on final 300M, nearest finish.
Settled 2-wide behind midfield, stayed on final 300M but lacked a kick to be seriously involved in the finish.
Began well then dropped back to midfield, held up behind a struggling rival inside 500M but had every chance turning into straight, ran on without threatening to the leaders. (Lame next day.)
Driven forward, crossed to the lead passing 1100M, led at even tempo, headed and unable to quicken inside 150M.
Given a patient ride, settled near last 8Ls off the pace, made some progress inside 300M, no clear run mid-straight, kept on final stages but never seriously threatened.
Never far off in 4th, unable to quicken passing 300M, faded.
Switched off to last, 9Ls off the pace in middle stages, driven along nearing 400M, pulled widest to challenge, made limited progress.
Positioned ahead of midfield, inside bid, not travelled with much fluency after halfway, one paced and no extra final 100M.
Behind mid-division, struggled passing 500M, never able to challenge, dropped away to last inside 250M.

Broke well, settled 2 wide about 3L off the speed, quickened well to challenge inside final 250 M to score late.
Ridden along to soon take up running, obtained rails run about 900 M out, kicked clear under pressure early in straight, caught over 50 M out.
Settled well behind, finished off race well down the centre of the straight.
Settled towards the rear on rails, remained similar into straight, finished off race nicely inside final 250 M.
Settled just better than midfield, commenced moved on rails entering home straight, ran home one-paced.
Settled at the back, ran on past well beaten runners in closing stages.
Soon taken back from a wide draw to rear for rails run, trailed the field to straight, commenced to finish off race about when hampered several times in the run home.
Settled just worse than midfield, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began moderately, travelled in midfield throughout.
Began only fairly, raced keenly in midfield to home bend, similar turning in, found nil under pressure. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Began well from a poor draw settling wide in midfield, took closer order to be prominent without cover around the bend, soon weakened after straightening.
Travelled just off the speed and mainly in 2nd, dropped out tamely shortly after straightening.
Worked his way across from an inside draw and parked as one of the forward trio, 4 off the grandstand side. Assumed the lead near the 300m, and hit the line well.
Stalked the leaders along the outside fence. Chased gamely all the way to the post.
Camped closer to the far side in a handy position tracking the speed. Maintained a sound gallop right to the wire.
Vied for the lead 2 off the stands rail. Battled away over the final stages to finish in the frame.
Dueled for the lead 3 off the grandstand side. Gave ground over the final 100m.
Blundered at the start settling approximately 4th from the rear nearer to the centre of the track. Worked home steadily.
Rated behind midfield 2 off the outside rail. Finished off one paced.
Had every chance after tracking the leaders about 3 off the stands rail. Faded over the final 100m.
Travelled behind midfield 5 off the outside fence. Never likely.
Travelled at the tail of the field, closer to the grandstand side. Made no impression.
Slow to begin, checked soon after the start travelling behind midfield toward the far side. Never likely.
Settled with the backmakers had cover toward the stand side. Was never in the hunt.
Raced back in the field towards the centre of the track. Struggled over the final 200m. To Trial.

Placing: UR
Comment: Rider's foot slipped from his stirrup and consequently he was dislodged shortly after the start.
Parked along with the leading division in about 3rd or the 4th position, the stand side. Drifted in under pressure over the final furlong but had plenty in the tank to win nicely.
Camped towards the grandstand side in a handy position tacking the leaders. Closed off well.
Worked forward and hit the front near the 450m whilst travelling near the middle of the track. Finished off gamely.
Began awkwardly soon recovered to race on the speed about 4 from the stands rail. Gave in cheaply after being squeezed over the last 200m.
Camped midfield the far side just off the speed no cover. Never threatened and faded over the final stages.
Jumped awkwardly settling on the speed. Couldn't find and extra gear at the business end and whacked away one paced over the final stages.
Passed some tiring runners late after making its run from behind midfield 3-4 off the outside rail.
Travelled towards the stands rail with cover. Struggled over the final furlong.
Tracked the leaders closer to the middle of the track. Under pressure near the 200m and gave ground thereafter.
Raced in last position the stands rail. Never likely.
Travelled along the centre of the course on the speed. Was a spent force prior to the furlong.
Good break, buried in midfield 2 deep, 3L 7th off home turn, clear ground at 400m, relentless progress to lead 50m.
Speed from gate, sat handy 5th 2 deep with cover, challenged leader 350m, battled to narrow lead 150m, headed 50m.
Driven start, tracked close 2nd 1 off no cover, led 350m, headed 150m, dug deep, no extra final stages.
Raced 3 deep with cover behind mid rank, advanced 4 wide on turn, 3L down 400m, closed soundly to grab 4th on nod.
Slow start, recovered to camp midfield on rail, 3L back 400m, switched for run 300m, tightened up 200m, kept on to wire.
Missed break, taken behind to rail in last trio, crowded 900m, progress to within 5L off turn, hung but stayed on well in final 200m.
Slotted 3 deep with cover near rear from wide gate, 5L back widest into stretch, closed out willingly centre track.
Speed to lead from wide berth, headed 350m, unable to rally, plugged on to wire.
Found cover at rear from wide gate, over 6L down into stretch, still 5L back at 200m, stayed on, no threat.
Sharp break, restrained to last trio 3 deep with cover, wide into stretch, last at 400m, closed out fairly.
Slow break, driven to chase pace in 4th, ridden 430m, found nothing, faded out closing stages.
Raced 3 deep with cover midfield, driven into stretch, failed to quicken, weakened tamely.
Fair break, soon niggled towards rear, found nothing off final turn, struggled in run to wire.
Awkward start, driven from widest gate to sit handy, trapped 3 deep no cover, driven in 3rd 600m, laboured 400m, dropped away from 300m.
Broke smartly, midfield one off, had to wait for gap, burst through 100m to lead and draw away.
Broke well, not rushed early, mid-rear one off, improved three wide approaching straight, wide bid, ran on well, unable to match winner's kick.
Broke well, led early, bumped, third rail, bid between horses, led briefly 200m out, kept on but outpaced.
Moderate break, ridden up to fourth two off, four wide bid straight, joined leader 250m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, mid-rear two off, improved 5 wide turn, wide bid, kept on well late, lost left front plate.
Broke well, sixth rail, bid between horses, slightly short of room, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not much early pace, second last rail, strongly urged, mid-track bid, strongly driven, kept on.
Broke fast, ridden to lead and eventually cross, harried turn, headed mid-straight, weakened.
Unruly before start, slowly away losing two lengths, rear rail, inside bid, some progress, flattened out late.
Broke fast, ridden up to second one off, challenged leader early straight, hung out, weakened late.
Slow start, mid-rear rail, inside bid, checked when looking for run 150m out, no further progress.
Fair break, ridden to join leaders but caught three wide, weakened quickly straight, substantial blood in trachea.
In front of midfield, 4Ls off the slow pace along the fence, closed off well 300M to score.
Pushed forward, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the soft sectionals, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, blocked 400M, dashed well when clear and got 3rd.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 200M.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Eased to rear, 9.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 300M, run ended 100M.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on well until 200M flattened.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 6Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, lack room 400M, dashed fairly.
Took rail easily and led by 2Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, soon emptied 350M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 250M.
Broke fast, settled third one off, pulling, bid three off rail, led 320m out, fought on very gamely to repel all challengers.
Fair break, not rushed, second last rail, wide bid, ran on strongly, just held, rider dropped rein.
Jumped fast, led and eventually crossed, fought on well to retain lead until 150m out, kept on.
Broke well, led early at modest pace then second one off, up to share lead early straight until 200m out, no extra late.
Fair break, restrained third last, eager, improved along rail approaching turn, still refusing to settle, checked 400m out, short of room for bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fourth last one off, eager, crowded, mid-track bid, gap came, not pace to reach leaders.
Poor start, blundered losing at least two lengths, last rail, widest bid, kept on quite well, but not able to challenge.
Broke well, fourth rail, up to third entering straight, no extra under drive.
Fair break, bumped early, fifth two off, mid-track bid, weakened.
Travelled strongly near the rear, patiently ridden, into clear 300M, came with a powerful run despite hanging in final 200M, got up near line.
Caught wide without cover in the first half, travelled well over the turn, moved up swiftly to challenge leader nearing 200M, led and going strongly inside 100M, caught final few strides.
Slotted into a 2-wide spot in midfield, quickened up well inside 300M, not pace of winner final 150M but kept on well to go 3rd 50M out.
Settled along the fence about 5Ls back in midfield, switched out 350M to challenge, no clear run mid-straight, finished off well final 100M and should have been closer.
Rushed to the lead, took them along at good pace first half, slowed things down home turn, rallied when being challenged mid-straight, faded inside 100M.
From draw 14 crossed to a 3-wide position near the rear, left with no cover from 800M, stayed on final 300M but never a serious threat to leaders.
Driven forward as expected, tracked leader in 2nd, found less than expected inside 350M, was swamped final 100M.
Close up behind leaders, held up early straight, ran on only one paced from 300M, no impression on leaders final 100M.
Dropped to last from wide barrier, difficult to settle in middle stages, hung out under pressure from 350M, made limited progress only.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, one-paced final 400M, never a threat.
Dropped in behind midfield, ran on one paced final 400M, no impression.
Behind midfield, shuffled back to near last over the turn, never threatened.
Tracked leaders, well placed to strike turning in but never going the pace to challenge, run ended 150M from home, dropped away.
Slow to begin, soon taken to the rails and raced near the rear 7-8Ls back, last turning into straight, not quickened.
Fair break, urged from gate but not much early speed, third last one off, out for wide sustained bid to lead 50m out, held on gamely.
Taken back from wide draw, last rail, wove between horses straight, powerful finish, just failed.
Fair break, taken back from wide to second last one off, driven turn, widest bid, finished well.
Broke well, fifth one off, up to lead narrowly one off rail mid-straight, headed and outpaced last 50m.
Broke fast, led and crossed, joined and narrowly headed early straight, fought on until no extra last 50m,
Moderate break, urged early to midfield one off, bid one off rail, kept on, no kick.
Fair break, mid-rear two off, improved three wide turn, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Broke fast, up to lead briefly but unable to cross, back to third three wide no cover throughout, fought on until weakened last 150m.
Fair break, not much early speed, midfield rail, short of room for inside bid, no run available mid-straight, no progress.
Fair break, up to second then fourth rail after slight check, inside bid, weakened late.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, checked off heels entering straight, no clear run, no progress.
Fair break, aimed for lead but caught three wide no cover throughout, weakened.
Landed in an ideal spot 1 out 1 back, always travelling to turn, made run turning and soon had them covered, cruised to line to win with extra in hand.
Standard jump, raced behind midfield 6Ls or so back in two wide position, gradually improved between horses to turn, produced a good finish but was no match for winner.
Showed usual early speed to lead, handed up on circle, right there and angled out for a challenge turning, stuck on evenly for a place.
Out with rest, raced in midfield on rails 4-5Ls back, enjoyed a quiet trip to bend, kept to inside saving ground and made gradual progress to make frame.
Drifted back to settle 3 wide behind midfield, 6-7Ls off top end, tracked into race on bend, made good ground to finish best of rest just missing frame.
Assumed a midfield position 4Ls away in running line, fair run in middle stages, same margin back turning, made a brief bid but was one paced to close.
Tardy into stride, shared rear on rails 8Ls off lead, well back to bend, made some progress in straight once clear but never really threatened.
Taken back from outside alley, raced 8Ls back in two wide line, well back and in traffic early straight, just modest progress when clear.
Out nicely, sat just off pace 3Ls back on rails, angled wider turning, looked a place chance but peaked at 250m and dropped off late.
Reasonable getaway, positioned 3 wide in midfield with cover, 4Ls or so away to bend, swung wider but didn't go on with it and dropped off final 300m.
Showed early speed to challenge for lead, kept pressure on and took over on circle, headed soon after straightening and stopped quickly.
Began well, eased back when caught wide, still planted 3 and 4 wide without cover behind midfield, 6Ls back to bend, folded quickly after a hard run.
Ended up 3 wide at rear, best part of 8Ls from lead, always well back to bend, made no real progress and eased out late (was heard to make respiratory noise).
Pressed forward from a wide gate but forced to travel 3 wide without cover, 3Ls back working to bend, stopped quickly soon after turning and eased out late.

Led or disputed lead throughout, kicked 1L clear briefly shortly after straightening, just prevailed in a 3-way finish.
Began well from a wide draw, soon taken back to race 3-wide in forward of midfield, ran on well inside final 200 to fail by the narrowest of margins.
Disputed lead throughout, fought on doggedly under pressure to lose out in the bobbing of heads.
Never far off, settled one-out-one-back far side, lost position rounding home bend, renewed effort on straightening to do best work late.
Slightly low out, soon picked up on rails to hold 5th about 2L off the speed, steadied passing 600 M, came closer on straightening but ran home one-paced.
Settled in midfield, steadied for one stride 500 M out, similar turning in, tight between runners inside 200 M, finished off race nicely.
Began fairly, settled 3 wide just behind leaders, dropped out tamely inside final 200 M.
Began moderately, settled in last few, never nearer.
Began moderately, raced in rear of midfield on rails despite niggled along, saved ground turning in, baulked for a run early in straight.
Always well back, never seen with a chance.
Raced wide in last few, made no impression in straight.
Drawn widest, began with others, soon drifted back to last few, remained wide and well behind throughout.
Travelled behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Swung the home turn widest and came down towards the centre of the course and ran on strongly.
3 wide early before shifting in near the 1000m, to park 1 off with cover, in a midfield position. Hit the lead close to home but was overhauled in the shadows of the post.
Travelled in last position, 2 deep with cover. Came wide in the final stretch and finished off well.
Made its run from behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Closed off satisfactorily to finish in the frame.
Raced outside the leader in 2nd position. Hit the front near the 200m, but was swamped late.
Had every possible hope after settling 1 out 1 back. Was dour over the final 100m.
Led along the rail. Was overhauled nears the furlong and faded over the latter stages.
Camped 3 back the fence with cover. Worked home one paced.
Posted 3 wide without cover behind midfield for the majority of the race. Never likely.
Stayed at the rear along the fence for most of the trip after beginning awkwardly. Peeled out early in the straight but struggled thereafter.
Enjoyed the run of the race in the box seat. Became unbalanced on a couple of occasions during the event, gave ground in the run home.
Travelled behind midfield on the fence, had cover. Railed up in the straight but failed to close off.
Parked midfield, 2 wide with cover. Lengthened nicely passing the 200m and had the race in its keeping 100m from home.
Posted 3 wide without cover for most of the journey whilst racing on the speed. Was well in front at the furlong, but commenced to shift out over the concluding stages.
Settled well back in the event 1 off with cover. Improved along the rail after the 500m, then came with only 1 wider in the home straight, ran on soundly.
Camped worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Swung the home bend wide and ran on well, had to be restrained near the post when tightened for room.
Ridden along early and landed in a handy position, 3 wide with cover. Kept on evenly in the final stretch, received some crowding near the finish line.
Settled 1 out 1 back. Closed off satisfactorily, had to be checked close to the line.
Raced behind midfield, the fence. Was checked rounding the home turn, finished off fairly, never threatened.
Travelled back in the field, 2 wide with cover. Got to the line one paced.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race behind the speed along the fence, no cover. Worked to the lead approaching the home turn, faded over the final 150m.
Tracked the leaders along the paint. Faded quickly in the home straight. (Bled).
Remained in the 1 off position for most of the trip whilst travelling as joint leader, no cover. Was inclined to lay in during the middle stages, found nothing in the run home. (See incident report).
Stood flat footed at the start, lost considerable ground and tailed the field a long last. Was never in the hunt. (To Trial).
Awkward break, off heels 1200m, sat 3 from rear, progress 3 deep from 800m, 3L back 4 wide into stretch, quickened 200m, swept to lead 50m.
Enjoyed easy lead, quickened 2L clear off turn, wandered slightly 200m, headed 50m, no extra.
Camped 3L 6th on rail, off heels 1000m, taken 1 off fence into stretch, crowded 300m, closed out to take 3rd final 100m.
Awkward start, speed to sit 2nd 2 deep no cover, ridden 400m, maintained same pace to wire.
Clumsy break, crowded, sat behind midfield on paint, 5L off into stretch, steadied off heels 200m, solid closer.
Settled 2 deep behind mid rank, 5L back 400m, wide off home turn, stayed on soundly centre track.
Good break, raced 3rd on rail, steadied off heels 1200m, ridden 400m, unable to quicken, plugged on.
Tracked in 5th 2 deep with cover, ridden 500m, outpaced off turn, kept on moderately to line.
Driven from gate, sat handy 4th 3 deep no cover, effort 400m, found little, struggled in run home.
Settled last pair, attempted progress 3 deep from 800m, unable to pass, bottomed out at 300m, eased when beaten.
Shifted out after start, raced at tail, niggled 600m, hard-driven 500m, no response, never a factor.
Broke well, bumped but soon recovered, settled third rail, inside bid to lead mid-straight, kept on strongly.
Broke well, fourth one off, mid-track bid, kept on strongly, just held.
Taken back from wide gate, second last rail, inside bid, finished strongly.
Sluggish start, lost half length, recovered to fifth rail, wide bid, kept on but unable to reach leaders.
Taken back, held up last one off, wide bid, hung, unable to reach leaders.
Broke well, not rushed, second one off, urged to keep touch with leader turn, kept on but outpaced from mid-straight.
Broke fast, led, crossed and dictated, tried to break clear early straight, headed 250m out, weakened.
Awkward start, bumped and unbalanced, ridden up to midfield one off, crowded and steadied passing post first time, not settling, bumped again 600m out, mid-track bid, no progress.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, wide bid, one pace.
Fair break, back to third last one off, ridden before straight, bid between horses, not much room, no progress.
Pushed forward to lead by 0.5L on the fence, clocked very soft sectionals, made all, but only by a very narrow margin.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the very slow tempo, just beaten by a short head in 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, 3Ls off the leaders, harmed by the very slow pace, held up 4-2, dashed strongly when clear for a very close 3rd.
Pushed early, trapped 3 wide throughout in midfield, moved forward 800M to take advantages of the slow tempo, ran on well to the line, just beaten by narrow margin in 4th.
Eased to obtain the box seat, benefited by the very slow sectionals, just held ground in final stages.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the very slow tempo 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leaders along the rails, harmed by the very slow pace, blocked most straight, dashed strongly.
Very slow away, 6Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the very slow pace, little dash 200M.
Sat outside the leader, enjoyed the very soft sectionals, however weakened quickly 300M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the very slow tempo, no dash.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leaders, raced 3 wide throughout and lost too much ground, harmed by the very slow pace, flattened in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5 Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the very slow tempo, weakened 250M.
Broke fast, led, crossed and dictated, kicked clear entering straight, soon clear, held on well.
Fair break, not rushed, mid-rear one off, improved turn, wide bid, ran on strongly.
Slow start, third last rail, inside bid weaving between horses, finished well.
Broke well, ridden to lead briefly then settle third rail, chased front-running winner one off, kept one pace.
Fair break, steadied to midfield one off, mid-track bid, ridden and not much progress early straight, picked up and stayed on quite well late.
Taken back from wide to settle second last one off, wide bid, kept on without being able to threaten.
Taken back from wide, three lengths last rail, urged approaching turn, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not rushed, mid-rear rail, improved inside approaching turn, bid between horses, short of room, no progress.
Fair break, fifth rail, urged approaching turn, inside bid, no extra from 200m out.
Broke well, not rushed, fourth one off, driven before straight, inside bid, found nil.
Broke well, up to second one off first turn, tried to reach leader early straight, weakened when bid repelled.
Fair break, aimed to join leaders, but caught midfield three wide no cover throughout, weakened abruptly entering straight, tailed off.
Raced keenly towards the rear, checked near 700M and shuffled back to last, had 6Ls to make up passing 400M, picked up strongly inside 200M, surged past odds-on favourite right before line.
Showed good early speed, held back in 3rd entering back straight, had a perfect run down the inside on straightening, led near 150M, kept on willingly, caught last stride.
Dropped back from draw 12, raced in last for the first half, bid 3-wide over the turn, ran on well in straight and got up for 3rd near line.
Settled 3-wide near the rear, left with no cover from 800M, strode closer to leaders 600M out, stayed on well final 300M.
Quickly into stride, up with pace always, kept on well early straight and looked one of the possibles 200M out, faded final stages.
Driven forward, caught wide then dropped in behind leaders, came with a strong looking challenge 200M out but turned one pace near 100M.
Mid-division, had no cover down the back straight, dropped back for cover making the turn, made limited progress final 300M running past beaten runners.
Never better than midfield, kept on same pace final 350M, no impression on leaders.
Dropped back from a wide barrier, settled near last 6Ls off the pace, driven out passing 400M but never going the pace to seriously challenge.
Up with early pace, sat back in 5th 3Ls from leader, not quickened inside 300M, never threatened.

Fractious in barriers, awkwardly away, guided to the fence and improved to midfield, appeared to be travelling well to straight but found little off the bridle, eased final 100M. (Barrier manners unacceptable)
Slightly slow away, rushed to the lead nearing 800M, travelled fairly to straight, soon headed and out of contention.

Began well to share the pace early, gained clear advantage to cross to rails 1500 M out, joined by eventual runner-up upon straightening but soon drew clear inside final 200 to win comfortably.
Began fairly, soon pressed forward to race outside leader, drew level briefly on straightening, found no response to winner's dash closing stages.
Raced keenly in midfield on rails, remained same into straight, quickened well to do best work late.
Disputed lead on rails the first 200 M, settled one-back in 3rd, kept on same pace under pressure to the line.
Began moderately, soon moved up to 4th within 3L of pace, came to challenge on straightening to come within 1L of leaders, but unable to sustain effort passing 300 M mark.
Jumped moderately, gradually picked along rails to 5th about 3L off the lead, similar turning in, ran home one-paced.
Settled mainly in rear of midfield, ran home one-paced.
Always in last few, hung in and a difficult ride in straight.
Settled wide in forward of midfield, found nothing in the run home.
Always towards the rear.
Jumped well, raced wide in midfield, made no impression in straight.
Trailed the field most of way to straight, only ran past well-beaten horses in straight.
Always in last few, never seen with a chance. (Lame next day.)
Began well from a poor draw, soon taken back to last few, very wide turning for home, never seen with a chance.
Travelled just off midfield, 2 wide with cover. Wound up late to snatch victory close to the finish.
Camped 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Hit the lead near the 150m, but was overtaken late.
Blundered at the start, recovered to settle 1 out 1 back. Hit the lead near the 300m, maintained a good gallop down the running.
Had every hope after box seating. Managed to stay on to finish in the frame.
Settled behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Closed off soundly.
Went forward and led along the rails. Faded over the final 50m.
Settled behind midfield, 3 wide no cover. Dour in the home straight.
Blundered at the start settled 3 back the fence with cover. Hung in early part of the straight, checked off heels soon after, battled away over the final stages. (Scoping revealed mucus.)
Travelled worse than midfield along the paint with cover. Plodded to the line.
Settled in last position from a wide gate along the fence with cover. Worked home evenly. lame in the right hind leg on the morning after racing.
Jumped well then settled outside the leader. Faded over the concluding stages. (See Racing Incident.)
Settled with the backmakers 2 wide with cover. Came wide in the home straight but never found any extra.
Camped behind midfield the fence with cover. Failed to close off.
Raced towards the rear, 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the final stretch.
Broke well, box seated easily, benefited by the slow pace when asked for 200M out, drew clear 150M.
Jumped fairly, 6Ls off the leader, gradually improved, came on strongly for 2nd.
Jumped very well, ridden to take the lead by 1L at slow tempo, battled on strongly until 150M when overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Eased back to second last, got bumped near 800M, off the bridle, dropped back to last, 8.5Ls off the leader, ridden hard from 600M, ran on strongly after 300M.
Jumped well, settled 2 wide, 3.5Ls off the leader, suited by the slow pace, no room, tightened up and checked at 400M, came home ok.
Eased back to last, saved ground at the back, briefly baulked turning into home straight, ran on well but without real threats.
Settled at rear on rail, 7Ls off the leader, got checked at home straight, responded well but never able to challenge.
Dropped from the widest draw, settled in three deep with cover, pull hard until 800M, ran on fairly in straight.
Midfield, three back on rail, pulled hard, 3.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, rounding the home turn however couldn't find a clear run until 250M, ran on only fairly.
Midfield, did not settle and head up until 800M when without cover, 3 wide during the trip, gradually improved outside the leading horses. Found nothing when asked, weakened 200M.

Placing: PU
Comment: Outside leader, broken down in the home straight.
Awkward break, trapped 3 wide with cover mid rank, 4L down 400m, stormed centre-track to lead 75m.
Slow break, rolled on to race midfield on rail, effort turning in, switched 1 off 200m, to 2nd at 75m, held in run home.
Missed break, raced rear on rail, progress mid race, 5L back into stretch, stayed on to take 3rd last 50m.
Tardy break, rolled forward to sit 2L 3rd on rail at 700m, bumped going 2nd 400m, chased leader, swamped 100m.
Good break, raced midfield 1 off, keen 800m, taken off heels, lost ground, sound progress in stretch, crowded 200m, ran on again late.
Speed to lead from wide draw, kicked 1L clear into stretch, headed 75m, no extra last 50m.
Dropped in at tail, advanced from 700m on rail, 7L back into stretch, steady progress in run home.
Bumped start, pace to race close 2nd 1 deep no cover, under pressure when bumped 400m, run tapered from 300m.
Awkward break, soon near rear 2 deep with cover, steadied off heels 900m and 700m, 7L back 400m, closed out soundly.
Raced handy 2 deep with cover, over-raced close to heels 900m, hard-ridden 5th 400m, one-paced, beaten when crowded 200m.
Raced 4 wide no cover mid-rank, bumped and unbalanced 900m, one-paced in run to wire.
Travelled handy 3 deep no cover, 3L down and driven 400m, faded final 200m.
Trapped 4 wide with cover from outside gate, bumped 700m, lost ground, struggled in run home.
Fair break to sit mid pack, shifted out and bumped 900m, hampered 700m, dropped to last, never a factor thereafter.
Taken back from wide, slightly hampered, second last one off, out for wide bid, finished strongly under sustained pressure to lead last 50m.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, improved three wide turn, mid-track bid, kept on strongly, just failed.
Broke fast, up wide to lead and cross, headed narrowly approaching turn, led again and clung on until headed near line.
Broke fast, up wide to join leaders but unable to cross. Led early straight, kept on until weakened late.
Taken back to third last rail, off rail entering straight for bid between horses, path blocked early straight, switched inside, kept on well.
Broke well, fourth rail, inside bid fended off by leaders, kept on one pace.
Broke well, up to third one off, ridden to challenge early straight, one pace last 200m.
Taken back, last rail, hampered, out for wide bid, hung and hard to ride, kept on, no kick.
Fair break, fourth last one off, wide bid, limited response.
Moderate break, midfield one off, crowded and steadied after 350m, no clear run until 200m out, kept on when clear.
Fair break, not rushed early, midfield rail, inside bid, short of room 150m out, one pace.
Good break, fifth one off, inside bid, one pace.
Slow away, last early, improved rail to mid-rear, over-racing, bid between horses, drifted to centre of track, no progress.
Moderate break, midfield three wide no cover for most of trip, mid-track bid, weakened.
Took rail easily and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, dominated from 300M without being tested.
Box seat, benefited by the soft sectionals, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, held up 400M, dashed well when clear for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 6Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on ok, hung in 200M.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 200M.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, weakened 200M.
Pushed forward, sat just off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, however soon emptied 250M.
Rolled forward, trapped 3 wide in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow sectionals, weakened 250M.
At back, 8Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, no turn of foot.
At rear, 9.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, emptied 300M.
Eased back, not suited by the slow pace, never competitive.
Very slow away, harmed by the slow tempo, never better than midfield.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, mid-track bid, led 200m out, ran on strongly, drew away.
Fair break, fifth rail, bid between horses, held up briefly early straight, finished well when clear, outpaced by winner.
Fair break, bumped, midfield one off, urged approaching turn, mid-track bid, not much room, kept on well.
Taken back, second last one off, swung out for wide bid, ran on quite well without kick.
Taken back, third last two off, widest bid, ran on without pace to threaten.
Broke well, third rail, out for mid-track bid, crowded 100m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fourth last rail, hard to settle, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Taken back, last rail, bid between horses, slightly short of room, modest progress.
Broke fast, led and crossed, headed 250m out, weakened.
Broke fast, second one off, tried to challenge early straight, weakened.
Fair break, fourth one off, sharp move to challenge leaders approaching turn, weakened.
Fair break, midfield rail, inside bid, found nil.
Caught wide early, strode forward, found cover behind leaders near 1000M, travelled smoothly to straight, quickened up well inside 400M, led 100M out and held off late challenges.

In mid-division 4-5Ls behind leaders, not helped by the slow pace and travelled keenly down back straight, switched out to challenge inside 450M, responded well and did best work final 150M but winner found necessary to hold on.

Settled 3-wide in midfield in early stages, pushed wide near 1200M and dropped further back for cover, did not have the clearest of runs until 100M, finished fastest final stages but was left with too much to do.
Positioned 3-wide ahead of midfield in a slowly run race, left with no cover from 1000M, responded well as they sprinted for home, in joint lead 150M, faded closing stages and was hampered near line.
Dropped back to the rear, settled 8Ls behind leader in a slowly run race, made his move out wide passing 600M, kept on steadily under pressure but not getting to the first three.
Slow to begin, raced towards the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, switched away from the rails nearing home turn, had no clear run until 200M, closed off well but was again steadied near the finish.
Blundered at the start, recovered to race behind midfield along the fence, didn't get the clearest run early straight, stayed on final 200M but not going the pace to seriously challenge.
Restrained to a rearward position, not helped by the slow pace, switched out passing 550M but lacked a finishing kick when urged inside 400M, never threatened.
Tracked leading pair early stages, raced keenly and strode to one out one back entering back straight, under pressure 500M out, faded out of contention mid-straight.
Began well, held up in midfield along the fence, kept on same pace final 400M, no impression on leaders.
Quickly into stride, tracked leaders in a slowly run race, held up on the inside when they sprinted home inside 400M, got out 100M when the race was almost over.
Overcame wide barrier to lead, set very slow fractions, driven to maintain his lead inside 400M, headed 200M and gave way.
Settled in last 9Ls off a very slow pace, not picked up on straightening, never a factor.
Settled in midfield 2-wide, well covered, not quickened as they sprinted home inside 400M, dropped away mid-straight.
Broke well, took time to settle midfield rail, mid-track bid, led 200m out, battled on well.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, bid between horses, switched and short of room, crowded and bumped 50m out, ran on strongly, lost left hind plate.
Broke fast, up wide to second one off, eased back to fifth one off, bid three off, led narrowly 150m out, kept on, no answer late.
Taken back, last rail, inside bid, not much room, bumped 150m out, finished well.
Broke well, third rail, bid one of, kept on one pace.
Fair break, third last rail, inside bid, not much room, kept on.
Fair break, midfield three wide no cover, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Broke fast, led and crossed, headed briefly but retained rail, led again, headed 200m out, weakened.
Fair break, up to third one off, mid-track bid, checked 150m out, no further progress.
Broke well, caught wide in fifth then up to join leader one off, tried to challenge early straight, weakened.
Slow away, taken back second last one off, out for wide bid, found nil.
Fair break, ridden to midfield one off, urged before turn, weakened quickly from mid-straight.

Placing: PU
Comment: Broke down.
Sprung from gates to take up running, controlled terms in front at a decent tempo, dashed clear at 300m and held margin easily to score unchallenged.
Missed start by 3Ls, mustered to race 5-6Ls back on rails, aided by tempo, took inside runs a made good ground in straight but was no match for runaway winner.
Out with rest, took a spot around midfield, 5-6Ls back in midfield, made a ran 4 wide turning, ran on well but couldn't peg back winner final 200m. (Mucopus in trachea.)
Began in line, ended up in midfield 4Ls back on rails, enjoyed a quiet trip to bend, didn't dash but stayed on nicely behind place getters to make frame.
Well enough away, assumed ideal spot 1 out 1 back, even run on the decent speed, came 3 wide a set out after winner at 300m, run ended and dropped off final 100m.
Unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover behind midfield, 6-7Ls back to bend, worked home gradually in straight but didn't make impression after hard run.
No early speed, settled just off midfield, 5Ls or so away on rails, quiet time in mid section, made a brief run but unable to make serious progress late.
Drifted back from outside gate, assumed spot at rear 10Ls or so back, aided by tempo, gave too big a start but did make some minor ground late.
Drifted back after average beginning, raced 7Ls or so away in running line, still same margin back turning, never a serious threat.
Showed pace to take up spot outside leader, did a bit of work on genuine speed, ridden along 1L down turning, folded soon after and dropped out.
Settled in a midfield position, 4Ls back in two wide line, fair run to bend, improved wider at 400m, didn't sustain effort and weakened last 200m.
Had enough early toe to hold leaders back, did a bit of work on decent speed, ridden along turning, didn't have extra gear.
Restrained from an outside gate, ended up at rear on rails, 9Ls or so off speed, aided by tempo, well back turning, made no impression at first run off a long break.
