Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jumped moderately, gradually moved forward to take up running passing winning post the first time setting a steady pace, kicked clear on straightening and never threatened in a slowly-run affair.
Raced keenly in better than midfield early, improved steadily from halfway mark to join 1L 2nd into straight, fought on under pressure without threatening.
Settled well behind, commenced move on outside rounding home bend, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Close up early, settled mainly in 5th about 3L off the speed, kept on same pace under pressure.

Began fairly from the widest gate, gradually moved up to chase outside leader far side, crossed by BULLISH POWER approaching home bend and came under pressure when 5th around the bend, kept on steadily without quickening.
Began well from a low draw, gradually settled in midfield, kept on steadily in straight without threatening.
Soon taken back from the wide draw, trailed the field to 300 M, produced good impression down the centre of straight.
Drawn wide, raced very wide around first bend and without cover in prominent positions down far side, 2nd outside leader rounding home bend, soon weakened after straightening.
Began well, settled towards the rear, made moderate progress down inside of straight.
In last few, made short-lived effort around field on home bend, made no further impression in straight.
Well behind, saved ground turning in, baulked early in straight, ran home okay.
Settled in midfield on rails, dropped out tamely on straightening.
Broke well, in front briefly, settled just off the pace on rails, gradually weakened after straightening.
Raced wide without cover in rear of midfield, made moderate headway under pressure rounding home bend, soon dropped out in straight. (Heart irregularity, blood in trachea.)
Rated midfield, 2 deep with cover. Hit the front near the furlong and fended off challenger over the final 100m.
Settled worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Cornered deep, ranged up and looked the likely winner near the furlong but peaked on its run short of the line.
Parked third last, 1 off with cover. Closed off strongly.
Camped midfield 3 deep with cover after the 750m. Came widest turning for home and finished off fairly to make the frame.
Coursed 3 wide without cover, not far off the speed. Cornered 5 deep, kept on at the same speed in the final stretch.
Positioned about 2 lengths behind the leader along the fence. Ridden along after the 700m to improve, failed to close off.
Jumped fairly and settled behind midfield 2 wide with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Tracked the speed, settling 2 deep with cover. Was a spent force near the 200m.
Dueled for leading duties whilst racing along the fence. Was headed at the furlong and faded soon after.
Settled at the rear. 2 deep with cover. Failed to make ground in the straight and finished down the track.
Worked forward from a wide gate to travel outside the leader. Came under pressure on the home turn and in the run home weakened considerably finishing tailed out. (To trial).
Began awkwardly, settled at the rear of the field along the fence. Struggled in the straight and finished tailed out. (To trial).
Midfield, settled 2 wide, 3.5L off the leader, travelled strongly throughout the race, dashed away 100M.
Jumped fairly, trapped 3 wide throughout the trip and travelled powerfully. Ran on nicely. Winner too good.
Travelled well in box seat, shot clear in the straight and looked like a winner but was swamped after the 100M.
Dropped from the widest draw, settled at the back, 7L off the pace, closed off strongly.
Midfield. Close to the rail. 4.5L off the pace, ran on steady final 200M without real threats.
Jumped very well. Soon shifted across from wide draw setting pace, kicked away in the early straight. However, faded sharply after 200M.
Settled three back on rail. 3.5L off the leader, lost position near 250M, ran on fairly closing stages.
Settled back in the field. 3 wide throughout the trip with cover at the rear. Swung wide rounding home turn ran on only fairly in the straight.
Showed no pace and travelled 4 wide throughout the trip, never looked like a threat at any stage.
Parked 1 out 1 back. Was a beaten horse early in the straight. Faded out after 250M.
Sat at the back and never a factor.
Hard ridden to park outside the leader. Dropped out early in the straight.
Driven early to dispute lead on rail, 1L 2nd when switched 1 off no cover 1000m, led 600m, kicked 2L clear 400m, hung on.
Settled 3L 4th on rail, progress 600m, squeezed up and lost momentum 450m, strong closer, just failed.
Niggled to lay-up mid rank from gate, sat rail 7L back, hampered 700m, shifted off heels turning in, checked 300m, rattled home late.
Crowded start, raced behind midfield on paint, advanced on inner 1000m, steadied off heels 700m, outpaced on turn, stayed on readily last 200m.
Pace to race 3rd 2 deep with cover, driven to 2nd off home turn, weakened and swamped last 50m.
Outpaced at break, raced 4 from rear 2 deep with cover, rapid 4-wide advance from 700m, 4th at 250m, one-paced to wire.
Good break, sat 6th on rail, ridden forward 600m, tightened up 500m, battled on at same pace.
Dropped in from wide gate, crowded 1400m, last trio rail 11L back, niggled to progress 1000m, 7L down 400m, kept on moderately.
Smart break, tucked in midfield 2 deep with cover, 3 deep 1000m, driven 500m, plugged on same pace.
Dwelt gate, crowded and checked 1400m, raced at tail, widest into stretch, made minor late headway.
Urged forward at break, settled 5th 2 deep with cover, ridden 500m, hampered 400m, dropped out of contention.
Travelled in last trio, bumped 1400m, 2nd last turning for home, tame effort in stretch.
Speed early, eased to midfield 2 deep with cover, felt pressure 500m, found nothing in run home.
Rolled forward from wide gate, led 2 deep 1000m, took pole on fence 800m, headed 600m, weakened off turn, faded out from 300m.
Broke well, fourth one off, inside bid to catch leader 100m out, soon in charge.
Broke well, third rail, led two off early straight, kicked clear, caught 100m out, kept on.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, mid-track bid, good progress without being able to threaten.
Fair break, ridden for early position but caught wide, steadied then urged but continued to lose ground, wide bid, ran on strongly late.
Fair break, ridden early but caught three wide no cover midfield throughout, mid-track bid, kept on without being able to threaten.
Broke well, steadied to mid-rear rail, inside bid, short of room, kept on.
Moderate break, mid-rear one off, bid two off, one pace.
Slow away, last rail, improved inside turn, blocked for run 400m out, little progress thereafter.
Fair break, ridden for early position but caught midfield three wide no cover throughout, mid-track bid, weakened, bled from both nostrils.
Fair break, fifth rail, inside bid, no clear run, never tested.
Broke fast, led and crossed, headed early straight, weakened.
Broke well, travelled well in second until passed early straight, weakened quickly, substantial blood in trachea.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, settled 2Ls off the fast pace on the fence, closed off strongly to score comfortably.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader on the rails, benefited by the fast pace, made steady ground 250M for 3rd.
In front of midfield along the fence, 4Ls off the leaders, suited by the fast tempo, ran on well to the line.
Pushed forward to share the lead at fast sectionals in 2 wide, ran on well until 150M flattened.
Rolled forward, 3.5Ls off the fast pace 2-3 wide, just held ground in straight.
Pressed forward steadily, shared the lead on the fence at fast sectionals, hung on well until 250M weakened.
Eased back took rail, checked early, 6.5Ls off the leaders, benefited by the fast tempo, made minor ground 250M.
Midfield, 3 wide throughout, 5.5Ls off the leaders, suited by the fast pace, ran on ok.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, never progressed.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leaders, trapped 4 wide and bumped early, took rail half way, benefited by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Eased back, bumped early, 6.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide throughout, suited by the fast pace, no progress.
At back, 7Ls off the leaders 2 wide, checked early, favoured by the fast tempo, no progress.
Very slow away, never competitive.
Broke fast, led and crossed, coaxed along to retain lead straight, kept on gamely.
Broke well, third one off, up to second early straight, persistent challenge held by winner.
Taken back from wide draw, last rail, out for wide bid, finished fastest of all.
Broke well, midfield one off, mid-track bid, kept on steadily without being able to threaten.
Fair break, ridden early to keep touch in fifth one off, kept on two off until weakened late.
Fair break, not rushed, third last two off, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Broke well, up wide to second two off no cover throughout, bid two off, weakened final 200m.
Broke well, vied for early lead then fourth rail, shaken up before straight, weakened.
Fair break, unable to go early pace, midfield two off no cover, wide bid, no progress.
Fair break, not much early pace, second last one off, last into straight, inside bid, bumped 100m out, no progress.
Fair break, not much early pace, mid-rear rail, urged throughout, inside bid, found little.
Fair break, midfield rail improving well approaching straight, found nil when asked.
Held up in midfield 3-wide, travelled smoothly, unleashed a powerful turn of foot when a gap opened up 250M, edged ahead inside 50M.
Settled in midfield 2-wide, was given a few reminders down the back straight, niggled along making the home turn, finished well when clear inside 300M, got up for 2nd near line.
Overcame a wide barrier to sit one out one back, moved strongly into the lead near 200M, kept on well only to be caught by first two final stages.
Soon led, set even pace, headed near 200M and kept on one paced final stages.
Checked at the start, shuffled back, in 10th place 5Ls off leader turning for home, stayed on fairly and never a threat to leaders.
Dropped back to 2nd last, not hurried in early and middle stages, brought wide to straight, made some progress early straight, one paced final 100M.
Raced 3-wide in the group chasing the pace but had no cover for most of the way, kept on same pace to line.
Never far off but was 4-wide without cover throughout, not quickened inside 300M, faded over the concluding stages.
Held up midfield and had a ground saving trip along the inside, made no progress final 300M.
First attempt over the trip. Tracked leader, came under pressure inside 600M, out of contention 200M from home.
Slow to begin and reluctant to improve position despite being ridden, last turning home and never going the pace to challenge.
Caught wide over the first turn, dropped back to a rearward position in search of cover entering back straight, pushed wide again turning for home, no extra inside 300M.
Settled behind midfield, under pressure halfway turning for home, outpaced inside 400M, never involved.
Not far away in 4th, came under pressure 500M out, soon beaten and eased final 200M.

Began from a poor draw, raced wide in prominent positions down far side, took over rounding home bend, soon drew clear after straightening, won easing down.
Broke well, gradually settled not far off in 4th, 3-wide without cover rounding home bend, fought on under pressure without threatening.
Wide in midfield early, settled towards the rear, finished off race well.
Tardy start, soon picked up to midfield on rails, baulked until 200 M, made modest late impression.
Moderate start, soon moved up on rails to join leaders, settled in 1L 3rd on rails rounding home bend, faded gradually after straightening.
In first few, kept up with fast second quarter in 5th, switched out from within striking distance upon straightening, ran home one-paced.
Failed to muster and soon dropped to tail-end, trailed the field to straight, switched wide turning for home, made modest headway down the centre of the track.
Towards rear, saved ground on rails turning in, kept on well despite tight runs on rails in straight.
Midfield, faded under pressure in straight.
Began fairly, raced wide without cover in forward of midfield, kept on until finding no extra inside final 200 M.
Settled around midfield, similar into straight, soon weakened.
Soon dropped to one from last, saved ground on rails turning in, found nil in straight.
Began fairly, soon picked up speed to gain narrow advantage briefly one off the rails, gradually steadied to 2nd or 3rd just off the speed, dropped out tamely after straightening.
Soon taken back from the widest draw to travel in last few on rails, switched out for a run 300 M out, found nothing under pressure.
Tracked the speed on the grandstand rail. Stayed to the outside and powered through at the furlong to win drawing away.
Raced in a handy position towards the middle of the track. Was in front at the furlong but was overhauled soon after.
Travelled 2-3 off the stands rail in fourth position. Battled away over the final stages.
Raced along the paint, the grandstand side, on the speed. Rolled in after the 500m, plugged away to figure in the frame.
Travelled behind the leader approximately 6-7 from the outside fence. Shifted in near the 300m, to continue into clear running but made only moderate progress.
Led by a narrow margin after the 600m, whilst racing 6-7 off the stands rail. Placed under pressure near the 300m, and commenced to tire inside the final 100m.
Parked near the middle of the track just behind the leaders, no cover. Failed to respond after the furlong and weakened in the run to the line. (Blood in the trachea.)
Settled amongst the leaders 3 from the outside rail. Was running on empty passing the 200m.
Camped on the speed near the centre of the track, no cover. Failed to find any extra when placed under pressure at the business end.
Settled 1 horse off the grandstand side, on the speed without cover. Faded after the 300m.
Became unbalanced soon after the start, settling a long last towards the outside fence. Was never in the hunt.
Positioned with the backmarkers, 5 from the outside rail. Commenced to tire passing the 300m.
Raced about midfield, 5-6 off the stands rail. Gave ground over the last 250m.
Travelled towards the middle of the track, well back, no cover. Struggled over the final furlong.
Pushed forward to take the lead. Travelled strongly when asked for run after 300M, dashed away and scored easily.
Hard ridden in back straight to keep in touch with the field, 5.5Ls off the leader. Obtained a clear run 300M out, finished strongly but winner too good.
Hard ridden to go forward but caught 3 wide without cover throughout the trip. Hung on well but without real threats.
Eased back at start to take rail run, saved ground. Couldn't find a clear running line until 200M, came on well to claim fourth.
Broke well, just off the leading trio but only one pace in the home straight, weakened out in 100M.
Jumped good but eased back to the field, 7.5Ls off the leader. Went wide rounding home turn, ran on steadily.
Pushed forward to park outside leader, when asked for run early in the home straight, found nothing and weakened out.
Sat in front of midfield, kept on only one pace.
Broke well, dropped back to midfield, 4Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide. Bumped approaching the home turn, nothing to show in the straight.
Broke fairly, taken across at back, 10Ls off the leader, never made any real headway.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader, 2 wide. Over-racing and steadied off heels, run ended 300M out.
Broke well, just off the leader with rail run, when asked for run at 300M showed nothing and weakened steadily.
Broke fairly, no early speed. Ridden along throughout the trip and never a factor.
Reared up at start and lost ground, not rushed. 9Ls off the leader. Switched widest on straight and asked for run but nothing to show, finished last.
Good break, soon led on rail, kicked 1L clear off turn, 2L up 200m, won eased down.
Fair break, dropped in 2 deep last trio, 7L back shaken up 400m, steadied 250m, switched to rail, ran on strongly.
Missed break, raced 1 from rear, advanced 3 wide with cover 1100m, widest into stretch, sound deep closer centre track.
Speed to lead early from widest draw, eased to sit handy 2 deep with cover, 4L back on turn, kept on gamely to wire.
Bumped start, early pace, tracked lead on rail, clear 2nd into stretch, chased leader no inroads, swamped 100m, no extra.
Raced midfield 2 deep with cover, niggled 800m, 6L down into straight, steady progress, crowded 150m, kept on without threatening.
Taken to tail, adrift back stretch, 9L last off home turn, swung wide, stayed on moderately centre track.
Crowded start, steadied, rousted 3 deep no cover to 4th 1400m, progress to 2nd 2 deep no cover 1000m, one-paced 3rd 400m, faded out.
Slotted midfield on rail, ridden 500m, soon beaten, laboured in run home.
Settled behind midfield on rail, under pressure 600m, unable to quicken, struggled in run to wire.
Bumped start, rolled on to mid rank 3 deep no cover, ridden 500m, found nothing off turn, soon weakened out.
Prominent from break 2 deep no cover, gained cover in 4th 1000m, niggled 600m, flat out 400m, faded rapidly.
Broke well, last one off, widest of all straight, strong run, led 100m out, drew away.
Well away, raced without cover for the first 400m, then third one off, shaken up 300m out, bid three off, fought on well, outpaced by winner.
Fast break, disputed lead then second rail, bid between horses, kept on well.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, inside bid, avoided tiring leader and switched off rail, finished well.
Slightly slow break, ridden up to fifth rail, bid between horses, every chance, one pace.
Good break, mid-rear one off, no clear run in straight despite switching twice, unable to deliver his best.
Broke well, fourth rail, blocked until switched inside 200m out, one pace when asked.
Fair break, ridden to fifth then sixth one off, mid-track bid, drifted wider, kept on one pace.
Slowly away, pulled hard, rear group one off, mid-track bid, one pace.
Slowly away, recovered but caught midfield three wide, mid-track bid, found little when asked.
Awkward break, bumped, second last rail, bid one off, one pace.
Broke well, chased early speed, then mid-rear one off, bid four wide, weakened.
Moderate break and bumped, third last one off, wide bid, not quicken.
Fair break, ridden to dispute lead, led after 600m, shaken up entering straight, weakened from 200m out.
Eased to settle in box seat, 2Ls off the good pace, closed off strongly to score by a very narrow margin.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at good pace, hung on strongly until 50M overhauled, just beaten by a short head.
Very slow away, 7Ls off the good pace along the fence, made steady ground 250M for 3rd.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in front of midfield, on heels early, 4.5Ls off the good pace, progressed steadily 300M.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in final stages.
Hard ridden forward, 1L off the good pace 2 wide, flattened 200M.
Eased back, 9Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, made steady ground 300M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, ran on ok.
Eased back, took rail, 9Ls off the good pace, ran on fairly in straight.
Prominent, 2.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, out of fuel 200M.
Behind midfield, 7.5Ls off the good pace 3 wide, no turn of foot.
Eased back, 9Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, no progress.
Eased midfield, 6Ls off the good pace 3 wide, emptied 250M.
Eased back, never a factor, tailed out.
Broke well, crowded and steadied early, then recovered to fifth rail, inside bid, strong run to lead 100m out, always holding challenger last 50m.
Broke well, sixth one off, mid-track bid, hung in and hard to ride, led 200m out, just outpaced.
Fair break, midfield one off, steadied off heels 600m out, shaken up turn for mid-track bid, kept on well without being able to threaten.
Fair break, not rushed, third last one off, wide bid, kept on steadily.
Broke well, second one off, hard to settle, led entering straight, headed 200m out, no extra.
Broke smartly, settled third rail, bid three off, kept on, no kick.
Fair break, taken back to second last rail, bid between horses, switched inside, kept on without being able to threaten.
Slow away, taken back to last one off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fourth last rail, bid between horses, one pace.
Broke well, fourth one off, shaken up entering straight, modest progress then weakened from 200m out.
Broke fast, led and crossed, dictating pace, headed early straight, weakened quickly, bled from both nostrils.
Chased the pace, travelled strongly behind leaders turning in but was held up until 100M, unleashed a powerful surge when clear and got up last stride. Impressive.
Raced outside the lead, took over 300M out, kept on well final 200M, caught right before the line but wasn't unlucky as the winner had been badly held up.
Settled 2-wide in the pair chasing the pace, put in a strong challenge inside 300M, ran on but readily held.
Slow to begin, in last pair well off the pace in early stages, switched outwide to make his move nearing 500M, stayed on strongly, nearest finish.
Held up behind midfield, had an uninterrupted run final 400M, ran on well.
Dropped back to last from draw 12, well off the pace in early stages but moved closer over the turn, ran on steadily final 300M but not getting to leaders.
Quickly into stride, led steadily, headed 300M out, weakened over final 150M.
Towards the rear, driven along passing 450M, made limited progress, never troubled leaders.
Raced keenly early stages, settled in 5th making the turn, not quickened under pressure 400M out, no impression on leaders.
In mid-division along the fence but caught flat-footed when the pace increased passing 400M, never threatened.
Pushed along early stages to maintain a position midfield, dropped away passing 250M, eased when no chance.
Towards the rear, under pressure 600M from home, soon outpaced and beaten passing 300M.
Awkward start, taken back to third last one off, wide bid, strong run to lead 150m out and edge away.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear one off, mid-track bid, led 200m out, just outpaced.
Broke well, taken back to rear one off, shaken up entering straight for wide bid, ran on well without quite being able to threaten.
Fair break, not rushed, mid-rear one off, kept on, no kick.
Broke well, midfield but caught three wide no cover throughout, up to threaten leaders 150m out, no extra late.
Fair break, ridden to lead rail, still led 125m out, weakened late.
Moderate start, mid-rear rail, inside bid then switched to three off, kept on one pace.
Broke well, fourth one off, bumped and unbalanced early straight, on heels 100m out, could not be extended.
Fluffed start, back to rear rail, off fence for bid between horses, modest progress under drive.
Broke well, led early then second one off, driven early straight, weakened.
Broke well, third rail, clipped heels early straight, blocked and steadied 200m out, no progress thereafter.
Moderate break, improved to midfield rail, inside bid, modest progress until weakened 200m out.
Missed start, improved to race in midfield on the rails, had a quiet time in mid section, improved turning and swept to the lead passing the 200m, kept on gamely to score.
Settled behind midfield racing two deep, pushed into the clear 3 wide at the 400m, assumed second inside final 200m and just held off fast finish of Real Generous.
Taken back to last nearly 15 lengths off the leader, raced 3 wide at rear, gradually improved cornered on bend widest out, really let down well to finish up best of all and unlucky not to be closer.
Settled 4ls back along the fence, tracked a fast speed throughout, straightened three deep, moved to second at the 200m, looked a place chance but was swamped 50m out.
Positioned a bit closer in midfield 6Ls off lead in two wide line, aided by speed on, rounded the final bend six wide and made steady ground late without threatening.
Positioned in rear division 10Ls back in running line, had a fair run and helped by speed on, gradually improved rounding bend, made good progress but was a little short of a run final 100m.
Restrained from widest gate, settled near to rear on rails 12Ls back, made even ground but forced to switch out at the 300m, was getting going when the race was all but over.
Drifted back from a tricky alley more than 12Ls off lead, always well back but aided by tempo, came wider turning and made some decent progress to be nearest on line.
Restrained from a wide alley, best part of 10Ls back on fence, helped by fast speed, had job to do turning and made some minor ground without ever looking likely.
Showed early speed and went forward to take up running, rolled along at a decent tempo 2Ls clear, collared passing 200m and dropped right off late.
Took early lead and soon allowed to assume trail, sat 2Ls back on solid speed, right there turning but hung badly in straight and gradually dropped out. (See racing incidents.)
No early pace, ended up 7-8Ls back behind midfield on rails, not asked in mid section, showed nothing and struggled in straight.
Slotted into an ideal spot, 4Ls or so back just off pace group, raced two wide with cover to bend, didn't pick up on turning and gradually folded. Jock reported raced flat.
Went forward to race first without cover, 3Ls back on decent tempo, struggling at 400m and dropped off easily.

Broke well, kept up with strong pace in first few on rails, took over from tiring leader 200 M out, won well.

Broke awkwardly losing ground, settled in last few, took closer order along rails rounding home bend, continued to make ground down straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M. (Blood in trachea.)

Contested lead far side, given reminders before eventually taking over 600 M out but soon steadied pace and remained one off the rails outside 2nd, tiring when headed under pressure 200 M out. (Jockey reprimanded.)
Slow to begin, ridden to soon pick up to midfield, maintained speed until baulked nearing home turn, one-paced under pressure in straight.
Soon settled at the back after beginning from the widest draw, saved a lot of ground on rails turning in, kept on same pace in the run home.
Soon shuffled back to last few after beginning from a poor draw, trailed the field into straight, ran home steadily past well-beaten runners.
Settled not very far off, steadied and lost position halfway out, baulked for a run early in straight, ran home one-paced.
Began only fairly, settled in midfield or just worse, went wide into straight, one-paced.
With leaders early, settled just off the speed, soon weakened after straightening.
Raced wide throughout, ridden along in midfield early stages, took closer order against fast sectionals to join leaders 4-wide around the bend, soon weakened in straight.
Led to Rock, dropped out tamely after straightening.
Enjoyed the box seat. Got a rails split early in the straight and fought on gamely to win by a narrow margin.
Settled in last position of the rails. Closed off strongly once obtaining a clear run after the 200m.
Parked midfield, 2 deep with cover. Shifted out into clear running near the furlong and closed off well.
Not the best away then crowded soon after the jump, settling at the rear, 2 deep with cover. Pressured after the 700m to improve, but lost ground near the 600m. Chased gamely.
Camped worse than midfield the fence. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and finished off well despite traffic problems in the straight.
Made its run from back in the field, settled 3 deep with cover. Came widest turning for home and made good late ground.
Sent forward from a wide gate, coursed wide, eventually crossed & led along the fence after the 800m. Faded over the final 100m.
Left racing 3 wide without cover from the 700m, whilst travelling just ahead of midfield. Plodded home.
Rated 3 back the paint. Hampered near the 100m, but had only been whacking away at the same pace.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race 1 out 1 back. Was under pressure turning into the straight, and compounded passing the 150m.
Travelled worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Failed to close off.

Coursed wide and without cover in the early and middle stages, eventually crossed and raced outside the leader near the 700m. Faded early in the straight. (Displayed an irregular heart rhythm and had bled from both nostrils.)
Crossed after the 1200M and led by 2Ls. Enjoyed a soft lead, kicked away around the Home Turn and won comfortably.
Broke well to obtain box seat, sat 2Ls behind the speed, travelled nicely but couldn't catch the winner.
Jumped good , sat three back along the rail, came home nicely to claim 3rd.
Showed good early speed, 2 to 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, one paced.
Sat mid-field along the fence, saved ground, ran on steadily but without real threats.
Slow to begin, Mid-field 4Ls off the pace 2 wide, gradually improved on the turn but kept one pace.
Eased back from the widest gate, 10Ls off the leader, made some progress along the inside run.
Slow to begin, behind mid-field, ridden early on the turn but ran on only fairly in the straight.
Jumped with others. Mid-field. Trapped 3 wide throughout the race with cover, kept on one pace.
Dropped back in the early stages, 8Ls off the pace. Couldn't go with the field when the speed came on. Dropped off sharply.
Very slow to begin, did not travel well and failed to muster speed throughout the race. Tailed out.
Pushed forward to a mid-field position but trapped three wide without cover. Under strongly pressure in the early stages of Home Turn, well beaten.
Ridden from gate, failed to muster speed, midfield 2 deep with cover, shifted 3 wide no cover 800m, to 2nd 600m, winning lead 250m.
Tucked near rear 2 deep with cover, niggled 600m, 6L back on turn, closed out relentlessly centre track to steal 2nd late.
Fair break, slotted midfield 2 deep with cover, driven 3 deep no cover 500m, wide into stretch, strong run into 2nd 75m, lost place on line.
Broke with others, taken to tail on fence, 8L down 400m, unbalanced 300m, tight for room 100m, stayed on well.
Sharp break to lay up from wide gate, led 1200m, pressured 600m, battled but headed 250m, no extra.
Slow break, driven early, settled 1 from rear 2 deep with cover, hard-ridden 600m, widest in stretch, stayed on dourly.
Good break, urged to slot 6th on rail, shaken up 500m, kept on at same pace in run to wire.
Rolled on at break to sit handy 2 deep with cover, outpaced 500m, laboured in run home.
Speed to lead early, headed 1200m, stalked pace 1 off no cover, ridden 600m, held 3rd until swamped 100m.
Smart start, tracked 2L back on rail, driven to maintain place 600m, wide off turn, flattened out 200m, no extra.
Shoved along at break, steadied off heels 1200m, settled behind mid rank on rail, found little in stretch, faded last 200m.
Taken to fence, raced 3rd last, hard drive 500m, unable to muster, never a threat.
Broke well, not much early pace, settled mid-rear rail, bid between horses, strong run to lead 100m out, held on.
Broke well, midfield one off, checked 1000m, mid-track bid, strong finish, just failed.
Broke well, mid-rear one off, wide bid, finished well.
Broke well, fourth one off, mid-track bid, kept on steadily without kick.
Fair break, fifth rail, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back to fourth last rail, bid between horses, bumped and checked 200m out, on heels and eased late, lame next morning.
Broke well, unable to go with leaders, back to rear one off, wide bid, finished well.
Fair break, slightly short of room and back to mid-rear one off, bid between horses, had to be steadied 50m out, kept on well.
Fractious and left five lengths start, last early, up to second last entering straight, bid between horses, ran on well, beaten three lengths in total.
Broke well, led early three wide then second one off, led briefly one off early straight, weakened.
Broke well, led and crossed, headed early straight, weakened.
Broke well, settled third rail, shaken up from 500m out, found nil.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 300 to score.
Eased at start to cross behind the field, 7Ls off the good pace on the fence, lacked room 4-2, made steady ground when clear for 2nd.
Eased back as usual, 7.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 250M for 3rd.
Settled in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace along the rails, made ground 300M, run ended 100M.
Eased at start to cross at rear, 8Ls off the good pace, made some ground 200M.
Hard ridden early, stayed midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just ran on ok.
Box seat, pace good, flattened 200M.
Hard ridden to cross in front, shared the lead at good pace on the fence, hung on until 200M weakened.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, flattened 200M.
Midfield along the fence, 5Ls off the good pace, lack room 300M, no progress when clear.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, soon emptied 250M.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead 2 wide at good sectionals, weakened quickly 300M.
Broke well, third rail, took split between to leaders to lead mid-straight, kept on strongly.
Fair break, up to lead early then second one off, led again early straight until headed by winner, kept on.
Slightly sluggish start, last one off, wide bid, ran on strongly.
Fair break, midfield one of, mid-track bid, kept on steadily.
Broke well, led and eventually crossed, headed 200m out, weakened late.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, bid one of, kept on one pace.
Broke well, fourth one off, bid between horses, one pace.
Fair break, mid-rear ne off, shifted off heels after 500m, wide bid, no impression.
Moderate start, second last early, last into straight, wide bid, no progress.
Began awkwardly, driven forward to share lead along the fence, broke away from the field inside 300M, established a 3Ls lead and maintained advantage to the line.
Held up behind midfield 5Ls off the pace, into clear 300M, ran on well and got up for 2nd near line, no impression on the winner though.
Travelled well in a position behind midfield, stayed on final 300M but not getting to the runaway winner.
Tracked leaders, switched to 3-wide 450M, had every chance but never going the pace to challenge leader, one paced final stages and lost 2 placings near line.
Settled 2-wide in the middle of the field, inclined to hang out making the turn, took time to get going in straight, stayed on final 200M.
In 5th place not far off from the pace, pushed wide over the turn, made limited progress on straightening.
Soon crossed to race along the fence, improved to midfield before turning, ran on fairly final 300M and was never getting there.
Raced handily behind leaders, failed to pick up in straight, faded 150M and was swamped over the final stages.
Dropped back from wide barrier, in last place 6Ls off the pace in middle stages, offered little under pressure, never threatened.
Rushed to the lead, struggled to keep up passing 500M, gradually weakened turning in.
Slow to begin, settled near last about 5Ls off the pace, not quickened when asked inside 300M, no impression.
Towards the rear, caught wide throughout, made no progress on straightening, eased inside 200M when well beaten.

Settled in last few, gained closer order approaching the halfway mark, switched out for a clear run entering home straight, ran on to gain narrow advantage over 100 M out, hung on well to the line.
Began moderately, settled mainly in midfield, commenced move when wide around home bend, quickened to hold every chance in straight, just failed.
Settled in midfield or just worse as usual, given reminders early rounding home bend, carried wide entering home straight, fought on under pressure to be nearest at finish while shifting ground.
Began well from the middle draw, gradually came forward to settle in 4th, remained similar most of way, baulked for run early in straight, ran home one-paced.
Ridden to soon take up running on rails, ceded advantage coming out of stables bend tracking tear-away leader far side, re-gained lead entering home straight but soon headed.
Began fairly, settled on rails in forward of midfield, saved round on inside turning in but gradually faded.
In similar position in 4th or 5th most of way to straight, baulked for a run on rails early in home straight, ran home one-paced.
Remained in last few, ran past well-beaten horses down the centre of home straight.
Slightly sluggish at start, midfield most of way before fading closing stages.
Broke from the widest drawn, rushed up to lead around stables bend kicking as much as 3.5L clear far side, came back to the field in a slow third section, headed into straight and folded up quickly.
Wide towards rear early, made rapid headway out wide down far side to reach 3rd 1200 M out, remained 3-wide without cover around the bend and into straight, soon weakened.
Began restrained from a wide draw, settled well behind, ran home one-paced.
Travelled in forward of midfield or just better to straight, faded gradually under pressure.
Never seen with a chance.
Parked outside the leader. Enjoyed soft run throughout the trip, battled on strongly and won by a neck.
Hard ridden to come across from the outside and took the lead. Eased up the pace and battled with the winner well until the final 50M, just beaten.
Ridden to come across from the outside. one out one back, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on well and got 3rd.
Ridden to take a Midfield position. 3Ls off the leader. Made ground steadily, hampered by the slow pace.
Jumped well to take the rail run, three back, 3Ls off the pace. Hang out 700M. Couldn't find a clear run in the straight, kept its position.
Eased back. 7Ls off the pace. Couldn't obtain a clear run until 200M, kept on only one pace, hampered by the slow pace.
Travelled well in box seat. Only one paced in the straight, run ended 100M.
Began awkwardly. 7Ls off the pace. Trapped 4 wide without cover, swung wide but not able to challenge.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader, trapped three wide with cover. Swung wide rounding Home Turn, dashed fairly, hampered by the slow pace.
Midfield, was bumped 1100M and then trapped 3 wide without cover throughout the trip. Couldn't ran on, hampered by the slow pace.
Eased back. 8.5Ls behind the leader. Swung wide bumped with another runner early in the straight. Found nothing, hampered by the slow pace.
Eased to rear from the wide draw, 9Ls off the leader. Couldn't improve position, not suited by the slow pace.
Sat at the back, never a factor.
Sat behind midfield. Under pressure in the Home Turn, tailed out.
Sat behind Midfield. Trapped 3 wide with cover. Swung wide rounding the Home Turn, ran on strongly and won by a neck.
Crossed the field easily and led softly by a Length. Battled on well until 50m. Just beaten.
Midfield. Three back on the rail, couldn't get a clear run until 250M. Dashed home nicely and got 3rd.
Jumped well. Just behind the leading Trio, 2 wide. Ran on one pace.
Just behind the leader without cover. Looked like a threat at 300M, only one pace.
Broke well obtained a box seat run. Travelled strongly however couldn't get a clear run in the Home straight, not much room near the winning line.
Midfield. Trapped 3 wide throughout the trip. Looked like a threat in the early part of the straight but unable to challenge.
Jumped last and difficult to settle in the early stages. 6Ls behind the pace, made progress along the rail but never competitive.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader. Saved ground, Swung wide, ran on only fairly.
Sat at the rear. Switched widest after the home turn when asked for run, passed tired runners.
Jumped well. Sat in Midfield, 3.5Ls off the pace. Travelled well but nothing in the tank 300M out, couldn't run on.
Behind the midfield and never a factor.
Pushed forward to the front but trapped 3 wide without cover. Under pressure on home turn, weakened out 300M. Tailed out.
Eased back to rear, not rushed. 9Ls off the leader. Switched wide on straightening and asked for run but nothing to show, finished last.
Sharp start, slotted 2 deep with cover 4th, ridden 300m, joined leader 200m, led 100m, drew clear to wire.
Speedy break, led to 1000m, settled 3rd on rail, led 250m, headed 100m, no extra, held on for 2nd.
Bumped start, settled rail back of midfield, under whip 500m, 6L back 400m, relentless drive to take 3rd close home.
Sluggish break, driven to sit behind midfield 2 deep with cover, steadied off heels 900m, 6L off into stretch, stayed on solidly to just miss frame.
Good break, raced midfield on paint, effort into stretch, to 3rd 200m, swamped close home.
Quick to stride, dropped in midfield 2 deep with cover, 4L back bumped on home turn, kept on fairly.
Missed kick, bumped start, raced 2 deep with cover behind mid rank, steadied off heels 600m, unbalanced, hard-ridden 450m, stayed on soundly.
Broke well, forced 3 deep with cover back of mid rank, 6L down off home turn, ran on moderately centre track.
Awkward start, dropped behind from wide alley to race at tail on rail, advanced from 800m, kept on past beaten horses in stretch.
Slow break, sat 2nd last, lacked pace, 11L down entering home stretch, stayed on without threatening.
Broke with others, slotted behind runners to race last pair 2 deep, 12L last turning in, plugged on at one pace.
Driven from gate, led 1000m, headed briefly 600m, kicked clear into stretch, headed 250m, weakened thereafter.
Tardy start, trapped 3 deep no cover mid rank, 5L back bumped on home turn, fell away in stretch.
Tardy start, rolled forward on rail, vied for lead on turn, faded right out from 300m, well beaten.
Broke with others, driven to lay up 4th 2 deep with cover, shaken up home turn, sound run to lead 100m, comfortable.
Awkward break, lost ground, taken forward to midfield 2 deep with cover, angled out 400m, grinding run to take 2nd at line.
Dropped in at tail from wide gate, checked off heels 850m, switched 3 deep on home turn, 8L last at 400m, surged centre track to claim 3rd on wire.
Driven from widest berth to sit 2 deep no cover 2nd, duel for lead in stretch, edged out of frame final strides.
Fair break, niggled early, raced 3rd last 3 deep with cover, progress wide on turn, 6L back entering stretch, closed out soundly.
Fair break, trapped 3 deep no cover midfield, 3L 5th turning in, kept on gamely without threatening.
Raced 2nd last 2 deep with cover, clipped heels 850m, lost ground, tight for room in stretch, unable to stride out late, closest at finish.
Speed to lead at break, kicked on off turn, headed 100m, no extra.
Sharp break, settled 3rd on rail, under pressure 400m, one paced in run home.
Urged on at break, sat midfield 2 deep with cover, 4L 7th turning in, one paced to wire.
Smart break, dropped back to race 3 deep with cover from wide gate, shaken up 400m, unable to quicken, stayed on moderately.
Taken behind from wide gate, last at 1200m, advanced on rail from 1000m, hard-ridden 12th 400m, found nothing.
Missed kick, initially at rear, soon driven on rail to race midfield, outpaced into stretch, made no inroads in closing stages.
Slow to stride, raced forward mid rank on rail, handy but unable to quicken off turn, struggled in run home.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 3 wide, dashed well 400M, dominated from 200M, not fully tested.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls at good pace, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide 2Ls off the good pace, held ground in straight.
Eased at start and crossed behind the field, 8.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, blocked 400M, made ground 200M.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made steady ground 250M.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the good pace along the fence, lack turn of foot, flattened 150M.
At back, 8Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, ran on ok.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace on the rails, lack turn of foot in straight.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, lack room 400M, ran on fairly when clear.
At rear, 9Ls off the good pace along the fence, no progress.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace, checked 800M, raced tight throughout the bends, weakened 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, emptied 400M.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide without cover, dropped off 400M.
Broke well, settled fourth rail, bid four off straight, bumped runner-up 50m out, led 30m out, held on.
Fair break, caught three wide throughout not settling quickly, urged approaching straight, wide bid, bumped 50m out, just held last few strides.
Broke fast, led and crossed, kicked clear entering straight, still led 100m out, headed last 30m.
Fair break, held up second last one off, shaken up turn, wide bid, kept on under strong driving without being able to threaten.
Fair break, settled third last rail, inside bid, kept on steadily without being able to threaten.
Broke well, second rail hard to settle, bid one off, unable to reach leader, weakened late.
Slow away, three lengths last rail, shaken up entering straight, wide bid, modest progress.
Moderate break, soon up to second one off, bid two off, no extra from 300m out, weakened.
Fair break, fourth last one off, bid between horses, no progress.
Tracked leader and always travelled smoothly, moved to the lead 300M out, quickly asserted and lengthened away from the field.
Never far off from the pace, ran on when pressed nearing 400M but not pace to challenge winner.
Well covered in mid-pack, did best work final 200M but no impression on the winner.
Lacked early pace, 4Ls adrift in middle stages, peeled out to center of track inside 400M, stayed on.
Began only fairly, gradually moved to a prominent position just off the pace, briefly led passing 400M, faded and drifted towards stands' rail inside 200M.
Began well, soon led and set good pace, travelled well but came up short when asked inside 400M, weakened 200M out.
Held up 3Ls back along the Stands' rail, kept on same pace under pressure, checked nearing 50M. (Bled.)
Close up, struggled to keep up with leaders passing 500M, steadied near 300M and dropped away.
Pushed along to hold his position behind leaders, offered little as they sprinted home passing halfway, no impression.
Fractious in the barriers and missed the start, gradually made up lost ground to be 2Ls off the pace halfway, soon came under pressure, weakened badly inside 150M.
Slow to begin, soon detached in last, never going the pace to challenge, finished tailed-off.
Broke well, settled midfield rail, wide bid, finished strongly to lead inside final 50m.
Bumped start, soon recovered to fourth rail, bid two off, led narrowly 50m out, headed near line.
Bumped start but not slowed, midfield one off, mid-track bid, every chance, kept on steadily.
Broke well, settled second rail, bid one off, led to 50m out, no extra late.
Broke well, fifth rail, bid between horses, kept on without being able to challenge.
Fair break, eighth one off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear rail, shaken up approaching straight for bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Broke well, up quickly from wide draw to third one off, bid two off, no extra from 200m out.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, inside bid, made quite good ground late.
Moderate break, settled third last rail, shaken up approaching straight, wide bid, little progress.
Broke well, led, tried to kick early straight, headed 350m out, weakened.
Slow away, second last one off, shaken up entering straight for wide bid, no progress.
Taken back to last rail, still last entering straight, aimed for bid between horses, no progress.
Began well enough, angled into ideal spot, 1 out 1 back throughout, improved wider to challenge at 400m, hit lead and kept up effort to defy rivals late.
Settled just behind speed 3 wide with cover, 2-3Ls back on bend, came wider turning and kept closing from 300m, held by winner inside 100m.
Assumed a midfield spot 2 wide 4ls from top end, no excuses in run, angled into clear at 300m, chased steadily to line.
Moderate beginning, took spot behind midfield on rails, 5-6Ls back to bend, gradually improved and weaved clear in straight, closed nicely when clear to make frame.
Out with rest and landed a midfield spot 4Ls or so back on rails, saved ground rounding bend but didn't have a clear run turning, worked home nicely along inside when clear.
Positioned behind midfield, 5-6Ls back racing 3 wide, had cover in mid section, closed gradually in straight to be not far away despite not looking a winning chance.
Drifted back to rear from a wide alley, raced 3 wide at rear, 7-8Ls back with cover to bend, came widest in straight, made decent progress down middle to be nearest on line.
Landed a spot 3 wide in midfield with cover, 4Ls or so back throughout, ridden up turning and just turned in a one paced effort in straight.
Pressed forward as usual to take a prominent spot on speed, worked a bit with pressure from outside horse, hit lead briefly turning but dropped off quickly by 200m.
Positive from gates, took position behind leader on rails, even run on speed, angled out turning, looked a brief place chance but peaked at 200m and became unbalanced in action final 100m.
Away fairly, raced behind midfield 5-6Ls back, even run in mid section, same margin down turning, made no real progress.

Standard getaway, pushed on but posted 3 wide, allowed to slide closer 3 wide without cover 1L away, up challenging rounding bend, niggled turning but hard run took toll and weakened out. (See Racing Incidents.)
No early speed, well back on rails, shared rear 7-8Ls back, showed nothing at business end.
Out with rest, rushed forward from a wide gate, used a bit to lead, challenged and headed turning, weakened right out in straight.

Showed good speed to lead, kicked well clear when asked 350M, won with tremendous ease.
Sat behind leading pair, raced greenly, stayed on final 400M for a never threatening 2nd.
In 5th of 6, kept on same pace throughout, never threatened.
Disputed early lead, tracked leader in middle stages, weakened inside 300M.
In 4th of 6, not quickened under pressure, dropped away inside 200M.
Slow to begin, outpaced in last, detached from the field halfway. (Unacceptable performance.)
Eventually settled outside the leader in second position near the 700m. Hit the front near the 250m and held a margin all the way to the post.
Had every possible chance after box seating. Maintained a good gallop right to the wire.
Raced in a handy position 1 off with cover. Cornered five wide and finished off one paced, stuck on ok.
Camped 2nd from the rear, 1 off with cover. Peeled out rounding the home turn and worked home fairly.
Made its run from last position, 2 deep with cover. Swung the home bend widest and made moderate ground without threatening.
Posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip whilst racing just off the speed. Was a spent force after the 150m.
Travelled behind midfield near the rail on the circle. Plodded away in the final stretch.
Went forward and led along the paint. Was under pressure at the 200m and faded soon after.
Positioned 3 wide with cover, worse than midfield. Failed to find any extra in the run home.
Began very awkwardly, rdr lost right iron for a short distance, consequently settled midfield along the fence. Struggled over the final furlong. (Blood in trachea.)
Travelled midfield 3 deep with cover. Found little when asked for an effort early in the home stretch.
Blundered at the start settling 3rd from the rear, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off.
Sat at the back. 10Ls off the leader. Enjoyed the fast tempo. Swung wide in the Home Straight, Dashed well and won impressively by big margin.
Pushed forward to park outside leader. Travelled well but hampered by the strong pace. Kicked away 300M, weakened 150M. Just held 2nd.
Midfield, 6Ls off the leader. Favored by the fast pace. Ran on well but unable to challenge the winner. Just Missed 2nd.
Hampered at the start then took rail, saved ground. Ridden to keep in touch with the field throughout. Ran on well but without real threats.
Began well and sat behind the front runners. Swung wide rounding the home turn, ran on steadily.
Settled at the back. 11Ls behind the leader. benefited by the strong pace. Made minor ground.
Settled behind Midfield. 7Ls off the leader, benefited by the strong pace. Laid in under pressure in Home Straight, passed tired runners.
Taken across behind the field form widest draw, settled at rear, 13Ls off the leader, ran on steadily without real threats.
Pushed forward to keep up with the front runner. 5Ls behind the fast tempo. Kept on one pace, weakened last furlong.
Midfield. 6Ls behind the pace. Swung wide, found nothing.
Ridden hard to lead at very fast pace. Weakened quickly right after straightening.
Sat at back, never a factor.
Ridden hard to go forward, obtained box seat. Hampered by the fast pace. Under pressure rounding the Home Turn, tailed out.
Began well, settled one out one back. Hampered by the strong pace. Soon under pressure rounding the Home Turn, tailed out.
Fair break, rolled on to sit 5th 2 deep with cover, shaken up 500m, 5L back 3 deep into stretch, determined drive to lead close home.
Bumped start, speed to go forward, trapped 3 deep no cover 3rd, niggled 600m, lost ground 4 wide home turn, strong centre track run, just failed.
Smart break, led 1000m, given easy lead in front, 3L clear entering stretch, all out final 200m, mugged last strides.
Crowded start, short of room, niggled to race midfield on rail, 6L back 400m, travelling but no clear run in stretch.
Shifted out start, pushed to race 4th on rail, driven to brief 2nd 250m, outpaced 200m, closing out dourly, snatched up final strides.
Taken back from gate, 2 deep with cover last trio, progress 800m, 9L back shaken up 500m, relentless closer on rail until short of room close home.
Good break, slotted 2 deep no cover mid rank, taken wide in stretch, stayed on without threatening.
Bumped start, disputed early lead, niggled 2nd 2 deep no cover, driven off final turn, swamped 200m, faded in run home.
Trapped wide from outside draw behind midfield, hard-ridden into straight, steady progress to line.
Taken back at break, raced wide with cover last trio, 10L down 400m, closed out soundly without troubling principals.
Awkward start, lost ground, raced rail near rear, hung head on turn and down stretch, moderate progress in home run.
Tardy break, outpaced and soon last, niggled throughout, never a factor.
Good break, tracked pace-setter, joined leader 600m, outright lead 400m, drew clear near side rail, comfortable.
Bumped early, pace to sit 3rd on stands' rail, niggled 500m, steadied off heels 400m, strong closer to nick 2nd at wire.
Awkward start, speed to lead on stands' side, headed 400m, lost 2nd last strides.
Fair break, raced green and ran around in midfield, bumped rival 200m, stayed on late, just missed frame.
Awkward break, settled handily mid rank far side, hard-ridden 300m, closed out soundly without threatening.
Dwelt slightly, niggled along behind midfield on rail, out-paced 500m, rallied and kept on resolutely.
Away quickly, tacked across from far-side gate to race close 4th, ridden at halfway, one-paced in run home.
Tightened up and bumped after start, ridden near rear, driven to close 600m, stayed on gamely past beaten horses.
Nudged early to settle just off pace, driven and restricted room 600m, beaten when impeded 200m, ran on one pace.
Rolled on from gate to race 1L off lead, under pressure 500m, one-paced when hampered 200m, no extra.
Crowded after start, bumped and unbalanced, pushed along near rear stands' rail, found little in run home.
Fair start, pushed along to race 2L off lead on far side, unable to hold position from 400m, out of reckoning at 200m.
Nudged along at tail, under strong drive 600m, drifted towards far rail, never a factor.
Raced towards rear, struggled from 700m, found nothing for pressure.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 6Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace and the rail-run, progressed steadily 400M to score.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the fast pace along the fence, made steady ground 300M for 3rd.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 2Ls at fast sectionals, well cleared 400M, hung on until 150M overhauled, still ran on for 4th.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M.
In front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to keep up with the field, 9Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, held up 300-100M, ran on ok.
Rolled forward early but trapped wide, then eased back for cover, 7.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Pressed for a midfield spot, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, no progress.
Eased back, 9Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Very slow away, at rear, more than 11Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast tempo, made early move 800M around the field 4-5 wide, no progress in straight.
Eased back, 10Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, no progress.
Eased to rear, suited by the fast tempo, however never competitive.
Rolled forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast pace, faded 400M.
Fair break, mid-rear three off, bid five wide into straight, bumped, led 200m out, held on very well.
Broke well, midfield rail, held up briefly looking for room early straight, inside bid, finished well but held last 50m.
Broke well, up to fifth three wide no cover, mid-track bid, switched in, kept on but unable to reach leaders.
Broke well, unable to go with leaders early, mid-rear one off, bumped early straight, blocked 300m out, kept on quite well when clear.
Taken back from wide to third last one off, wide bid, kept on steadily.
Broke well, fourth rail, bid one off, led briefly 300m out, no extra when headed.
Fair break, not much early pace, last one off, wide bid, kept on one pace.
Taken back from wide to rear rail, looked for mid-track bid, steadied off heels 300m out, switched in, kept on one pace.
Moderate start, not much early pace, mid-rear rail, inside bid, one pace.
Fair break, midfield one off, bid between horses, short of room early straight, one pace, lame in right front next day.
Broke well, second one off, crossed by horse from outside and began to over-race, mid-track bid, weakened from 300m out.
Broke fast led and crossed, headed briefly approaching turn, led again early straight, headed 300m out, weakened.
Broke well aimed for lead but caught third three off, ridden before turn, weakened.
Began awkwardly, had an ideal trip just in behind the pacesetters, driven passing 400M, kept on best of all to wear down the leaders nearing 50M.
Soon led, crossed to race along stands' rail and set a good pace throughout, pressed on 350M, kept on well, headed 50M out but managed to hold on for 2nd.
Never far off the pace, headway passing 500M, loomed behind leader inside 400M, ran on steadily.
Prominent, kept on nicely inside 400M to chase leader, slightly outpaced final 100M but finished well clear of the rest.
Held up midfield, driven along halfway but never going the pace to challenge first four.
Difficult to load, held up in mid-pack towards the stands' side, one paced throughout and no impression on first four.
Showed good early pace, switched towards the stands' side and tracked leader prominently, travelled well enough but found little off the bridle inside 400M, faded away final 150M.
Dropped in behind midfield, outpaced nearing halfway and soon driven along, made limited progress final 300M.
Close up and always staying within 2Ls of the leader, not quickened when driven passing halfway, weakened inside 200M.
Behind midfield, slightly outpaced in middle stages and had to be pushed along to maintain position, never able to challenge.
Close up early, outpaced in middle stages and fell back to midfield, one-paced passing 400M, faded over final 200M.
Checked at the start, soon detached from the main group, well behind passing 400M and never involved. (Jockey reported his horse didn't stretch out at any stage.)
Struggled for pace and soon detached from the main group, not picked up at any stage.
Driven to be in touch with leaders, outpaced nearing 500M, dropped away rapidly final 300M.
Broke well, not rushed, fifth rail, out for bid three off, led200m out, soon in charge.
Broke well, second then third rail, inside bid, kept on well.
Fair break, not rushed, crowded passing post first time, mid-rear rail, bid between horses, finished well.
Broke fast, led and crossed, headed then second rail, led again early straight, fought on quite well when headed 200m out.
Broke well, ridden to lead and eventually cross, headed early straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, ridden early to midfield one off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Taken back from wide gate to mid-rear rail, inside bid, kept on quite well until ran out of room very late.
Crowded start, taken back to third last rail, awkwardly placed early straight when looking for room between horses, one pace thereafter.
Taken back from wide, rear group one off, wide bid straight, one pace.
Fair break, urged early but had to settle for mid-rear one off, bid between horses, modest progress.
Broke well, fourth one off, bid between horses, weakened.
Broke well, midfield rail, bid between horses, found little.
Fair break, dropped to rear, soon detached and not travelling well, driven into straight, crowded late but never a factor.
Fair break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, no response.
Showed early pace to cross and take up running, set terms to suit in front with a decent speed on, defied catching in straight and a had a touch in hand final 100m when holding rivals.
Began with line, ridden with purpose, raced outside leader but hung on bend drifting 3 wide, kept giving in straight but was no match for winner, beat 3rd clearly.
Bounced with first few, allowed to take a sit off pace 3Ls or so back on rails, ideal trip in transit, stuck on evenly but couldn't get closer to first two final furlong.
Away well, slotted into ideal spot 1 out 1 back, 2-3Ls back, came 3 wide with trail turning, didn't dash but battled on soundly to make frame.
Landed a midfield position in running line, 4-5Ls back in run, had easy trip following speed, made some minor progress in straight but peaked at 200m.
Standard jump, raced behind midfield on rails, 7Ls or so away in run, saved ground on bend, made a bit of ground but never really threatened.
Awkwardly away, unable to muster early speed, raced 3 wide behind midfield, 6-7Ls back in mid section, didn't have extra gear in straight and peaked at 200m.
Restrained from a tricky alley, raced behind midfield, 6-7Ls back in two wide line, back with last few with job to do turning, made only minor ground from well back.
No early speed, raced near to rear on rails 8Ls or so back, always well back, passed only tired runners in straight.
Showed usual speed to take a forward spot first behind leader on rails, fair run throughout on speed, angled 2 wide on circle, not much to offer at business end and faded from 300m (blood in trachea)
Tardy into stride, forced to race 3 and 4 wide without cover, 3Ls back on bend, niggled turning and dropped off soon after due to hard run.
Restrained from an outside alley, raced 3 wide at rear, best part of 10Ls back, made no real progress.
Began well enough, tracked leader on rails 2Ls back, all favours to bend, burst through gap turning and gained a 1L margin, held this comfortably in run to line.
Began well, took up a prominent spot 1 out 1 back, always within striking distance to bend, made challenge soon after turning and came into in strongly but unable to wear down margin final 100m.
Drifted back from a wide alley, raced 3 wide at rear 7Ls back, improved approaching bend, displayed best close and made good progress despite hanging as usual, probably costing him 2nd.
Standard beginning, raced in midfield on rails 4-5Ls back, easy time to bend, took inside runs and made some good progress late to make frame.
Showed usual speed, took up lead although shaded by horse on outside on circle, !l clear turning, soon headed but stayed on well to just miss frame.
Even getaway, raced 3 wide with cover just off speed, 3Ls back to bend, made run wider but unable to find extra gear, just kept on at same pace late.
Dropped back to last from outside draw, 7-8Ls away, still last turning, came widest in straight and closed well to be nearest on line.
Fair getaway, positioned in midfield 3 wide with cover 4-5Ls back, forced wider rounding bend, kept to task and closed off ok despite not really threatening.
Fair jump, raced 5Ls back in running line just off midfield, no excuses in run, didn't quicken in straight and just held ground in run to line.
Tardy into stride, taken down to rear from a wide gate, 7Ls or so away, always well back, saved ground along rails and made some minor progress.
Average break, settled back with last few from a tricky draw, 7Ls back in running line, made no impression in straight.
Began with rest, settled midfield racing two wide, no excuses in mid section, didn't let down in straight finding extra trip too much of a task.
Even getaway, went on with it but posted 3 wide without cover, worked hard up with leaders to bend, folded from 300m after hard run.
Showed speed, pressed on to challenge for front shading leader on circle, did share of work to turn, soon capitulated after using too much early.
