Soon took up narrow running after beginning from the middle draw, obtained rails run coming out of back straight, just held off challenges under pressure.
Began fairly from a wide gate, raced among leaders and wide without cover throughout, fought on steadily in straight without pegging back the winner.
Began fairly, settled mainly in 5th about 2.5L off the lead, similar turning in, fought on steadily under pressure without threatening.
Jumped fairly, soon taken backward to be worse than midfield, ran on to do best work late. (Tactic questioned.)
Jumped moderately, settled in 6th in midfield on rails, remained similar into straight, kept on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began well, in front briefly before settling about 2L off the lead in 4th, kept on at the one pace from similar position into straight.
Began moderately, soon picked up to travel in rear of midfield, similar turning in, ran home one-paced.
Began moderately, midfield and wide without cover throughout.
Began fairly, ridden along to chase leader along rails, lost position at halfway mark dropping to 3rd some 2L back, folded up quickly inside final 200 M. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Very slowly away, trailed the field before joining the backmarkers approaching home bend, never seen with a chance.
Began okay from a wide gate, gradually settled in last few, never seen with a chance.
Soon dropped towards the rear after beginning from the widest barrier, never a danger.
Taken back from the outside alley to settle in last position near the rail. Went for runs through the field after the 450m, and showed a blistering turn of foot to claim victory close to the wire.
Eventually crossed and raced in 2nd position near the 1200m, settling 1 off no cover. Was in front for most of the final stretch until collard over the final stages.
Ridden along early to lead on the paint. Was overhauled at the 200m but stayed on well.
Raced in a handy position, 1 off with cover. Kept up a reasonable gallop down the running.
Parked on the fence, midfield. Peeled out rounding the home turn and worked to the line soundly.
Settled 2 deep with cover near the tail of the field. Came 3 wide midrace, made gradual ground near the 600m 4 deep without cover thereafter. Plugged away to the post.
Raced with the backmakers 1 off with cover. Made some late ground out wide.
Despite being ridden along in the early stages failed to muster speed travelling worse than midfield on the rails. Kept on one paced in the run to the line.
Posted 3 deep without cover, midfield. Strode up to the leaders near the 700m, but was a beaten horse turning for home.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race tracking the leader along the fence. Faded quickly after the 150m.
Slow to begin settling towards the rear of the field along the paint with cover. Failed to close off.
Travelled midfield, 2 deep with cover. Shifted out near the 800m to improve its position but was unable to make decent headway after the 500m. found little under pressure thereafter.
Jumped well and led the field. Kicked away in the early of the Home Straight and won by a length.
Eased to take across behind the field form widest draw. However raced keenly and ran to sit one out one back in the middle stages, ran on well.
Pushed forward to obtain a box seat. Travelled well and Ran on until 100M. However the saddle shifted back and couldn't be ridden to the end of the race. Unlucky runner.
Midfield. 4Ls behind the pace. Closed to the line well.
Pushed forward to park outside leader. Ridden rounding the home turn but only kept on one pace.
Slow to begin. Settled behind midfield. Three wide with cover until 600M. Swung widest and ran on but without threats.
Behind midfield. 6Ls behind the pace. Swung wide but found nothing.
Knuckled over at the start. Midfield, three wide without cover. Kept on one pace, weakened last furlong.
Broke well. Three back on the rail. 3Ls off the pace. Bumped to the rail and became badly unbalanced rounding the Home Turn. Unable to recover.
Sat at the rear, never a factor.
Broke well but failed to hold position and gradually dropped back to become 6Ls behind the pace. 700 out was checked rounding the Home Turn, weakened right after the incident. Tailed out.
Showed no early pace. Failed to keep up with the field when the speed came on, weakened right after the turn, tailed out.
Taken across to 2 deep no cover last trio, forward move 600m, 4L back wide into stretch, strong run to lead 100m, won well.
Tardy start, ridden forward, trapped 3 deep no cover 5th, centre track run to challenge for lead 100m, unable to match winner.
Awkward break, held up last, 5L down turning in, widest in run home, chased strongly from deep until faded final strides.
Slow into stride, camped midfield on rail, niggled 900m, keeping on when bumped 150m, stayed on without threatening.
Awkward start, driven to recover, settled behind midfield on rail, progress into stretch, slight bump 150m, kept on gamely.
Sharp break, tracked front pair 2 deep with cover, ridden 3 deep on turn, 2nd 300m, swamped 150m, no extra in run home.
Dropped behind runners from gate, camped 2nd last on rail, wide into stretch, chased at one pace, no threat.
Broke well, driven early to lead, kicked on off home turn, drifted for pressure 200m, headed 150m, weakened out.
Awkward start, raced mid rank 2 deep with cover, peeled out on home turn, ran on at same pace.
Jumped with others, soon outpaced, settled back of mid 2 deep with cover, outpaced in stretch, eased late when beaten.
Fair break, rousted early to slipstream lead on rail, niggled throughout, driven 900m, all out 3rd 400m, lost action 200m, eased thereafter.
Smart break, rolled forward to dispute lead 2 deep no cover, hard-ridden 800m, found nothing in stretch, soon faded.
Smart break, camped 2 deep with cover 5th, forward progress 700m, peeled wide into stretch, relentless run to snatch win on wire.
Smart break, raced 2nd on leader's flank 2 deep no cover, disputed lead 700m, kicked into clear lead 300m, headed last stride.
Tardy start, held up 2 deep with cover 2nd last, hard driven 700m, 7L back into stretch, closed out strongly to make frame.
Fair break, raced midfield on rail, 3L 5th into stretch, head on side and hung in centre track run, closing at wire.
Good break, slotted midfield 2 deep with cover from wide alley, 6th and taken widest in straight, closed out gamely.
Fair break, raced 3 deep no cover behind midfield, kept on soundly in stretch without troubling principals.
Awkward start, trapped last trio on rail, progress on home turn, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Speed to lead at break, soon slotted behind lead on rail, niggled 700m, 3rd into stretch, battled at one pace until faded last 150m.
Fair break, raced 2 deep with cover behind midfield, outpaced in stretch run, never a factor.
Driven early to sit handy 3 deep no cover, unable to hold position 500m, wide into straight, struggled in run home.
Good break, rolled on to lead 1st turn, lead challenged 700m, headed outright 300m, spent force, dropped away.
Fair break, soon niggled in last, lost action entering back straight, soon tailed off.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders on the fence, benefited by the fast pace and the rail-run, closed off strongly 250M to score.
Hard ridden to share the lead 2 wide and clocked fast sectionals, ran on well until 200M overhauled, hung on for 2nd.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, suited by the fast pace, made ground steadily 200M.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M.
Hard ridden to hold the box seat, not suited by the fast pace, ran on well to the line until 100M flattened.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, lack room in straight, made steady ground.
Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, 2Ls off the fast tempo 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders, favoured by the fast tempo but trapped 3-4 wide, made good ground 400M, however run ended 150M.
Pushed to keep up in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the fast pace along the fence, no progress.
Eased at start, 8Ls off the leaders at rear, raced 2-4 wide, suited by the fast tempo, but only ran on fairly.
Hard ridden to take the rail and shared the lead at fast sectionals, emptied 200M.

Placing: DNF
Comment: Ridden forward, broken down 700M.
Broke well, up wide to lead and cross, dictated pace, always clear, unchallenged.
Moderate break, mid-rear rail, bid between horses, finished strongly without being able to challenge.
Broke well but crowded, midfield one off, mid-track bid, kept on without being able to threaten.
Taken back from wide draw, third last, one off, wide bid, finished well.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, wide bid, kept on.
Fair break, joined early battle for lead, then fourth one off, mid-track bid, one pace from 100m out, lost left hind plate.
Taken back from wide draw, last rail, wide bid, kept on steadily.
Broke well, looked for lead then back to midfield rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Broke well, looked for lead then back to third rail, bid between horses, no acceleration from 200m out, substantial blood in trachea.
Fair break, rear group rail, inside bid, every chance, no progress.
Broke well, joined battle for lead then second rail, mid-track bid, weakened.
Dropped back to a rearward position, difficult to settle near 1100M, bid wide passing 500M and first to make his move, stayed on strongly in straight, got up last stride.
Chased leaders 2-wide, responded well when pressed on inside 400M, led nearing 200M, ran on well only to be caught last stride.
Had a smooth trip on the inside 3Ls off the pace, switched away from fence near 400M, came with a threatening run in straight, kept on well to the line.
Settled in 6th ahead of midfield, not going the pace to challenge leaders but kept on under pressure.
Held up behind midfield, travelled well enough and looked to have something to offer on straightening, short of room final 200M and was not able to be properly tested.
Tucked into a 2-wide position behind midfield, travelled well but was held up rounding the home turn, stayed on final 300M despite not getting the clearest of runs. (Jockey questioned.)
Began well, utilized his inside draw and tracked leaders, appeared to have every chance turning in, one paced final 200M.
Soon led, driven 350M, not able to shake off pursuers, swamped inside 200M.
Dropped back from wide barrier, raced as the back marker 10Ls behind leader, patiently ridden to 350M, made little progress only.
Went forward from wide draw, tracked leader to straight, weakened and out of contention nearing 200M.
Switched off to near last, well off the pace in early and middle stages, didn't respond to riding passing 450M.
Began awkwardly, settled near the rear, had a rough trip in middle stages and was badly checked a number of times, not quickened turning in, soon weakened out of contention.
Broke well, third one off, mid-track bid led 150m out, soon in charge, lost left front plate.
Broke fast, led rail, tried to kick clear early straight, no extra when headed.
Fair break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, ran on well without being able to threaten, cut right hock.
Good break fourth rail, urged, bid between horses, kept on steadily.
Fair break, ridden for lead then fifth one off, bid four wide entering straight, kept on one pace.
Moderate break, crowded early, third last one off, wide bid, kept on steadily.
Broke well, led early then second rail, inside bid, one pace from 200m out.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, checked and lost racing room 800m out, mid track bid, not clear run until 100m out, kept on.
Fair break, taken back to second last rail, inside bid, modest progress.
Fair break, midfield rail, bid between horses, one pace.
Taken back from wide draw, outpaced early, last, urged, wide bid, minimal progress.
Fair break, midfield one off, bid between horses, no progress, substantial blood in trachea.
Reasonable break, raced in midfield on rails, 4-5Ls off leaders, took inside runs turning coming down least preferred part of track, accelerated well all the same and kept on well to score.

Moderate break, lacked early pace, raced behind midfield 6Ls or so back in running line, assisted by solid tempo, improved approaching turn, dashed well when gaining split turning but unable to pair back winner late.
Faded back from a wide gate, raced 3 wide behind midfield, had cover in mid section, did a bit with honest pace on, worked home nicely for third.
Standard break, ended up in midfield 5Ls back, even run throughout, gained run when they fanned turning and worked home well to make frame.
Drifted back from a wide gate, raced 7Ls or so away at rear, two wide to rock before commencing a 3 wide run, swung widest and worked home well to be nearest on line.
Restrained from a tricky gate, back last for most part 7Ls or so away, helped by strong speed, came wider in stretch and made some ground from well back despite being awkwardly placed at the 200m.

Fair getaway, raced prominently then left to cart field up racing 2 wide behind pace pair, gradually worked into it on circle, brief place chance from bend but just stuck on at same speed in straight.
Showed early speed to take lead, handed up after 400m, tracked face pace with leaders clear, tracked strongly to bend, not much there when came under pressure and dropped off in stretch.
No early pace, ended up behind midfield on rails, 6Ls or so back, aided by strong speed, saved ground on bend, just battled away on least favored ground.
Posted 3 wide without cover in midfield, did plenty of work in mid section 4Ls back with strong pace on, niggled approaching bend.
Fair to begin, pressed forward when trapped wide to end up outside leader by 1000m, overaced and pressured leader in mid section, did too much work to turn, folded quickly. (See Racing Incidents.)

Out with rest, worked hard to cross from a wide gate and eventually take up running, challenged by horse on outside and set fast sectional in mid section, cane under pressure turning and weakened right out. (See Racing Incidents.)

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Made good use of the low draw to lead from wire to wire, just held off late challenge under pressure.
Broke fairly from rail draw, settled one back on rails to straight, soon came to challenge upon straightening, failed to peg back winner the length of straight.
Broke fairly, settled in midfield on rails, forced to switch out for a run inside 300 M, failed to quicken under pressure.

Began from a wide draw, soon taken back to travel on inside just worse than midfield, saved ground and snuck on rails on straightening, kept on same pace in the run home. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Slow out, remained well behind to straight, saved a lot of ground on rails turning in, ran on steadily down inner of straight without threatening.
Settled in midfield, just worse turning in, kept on same pace in the run home.
Very awkwardly away losing considerable ground, trailed the field before effort out wide rounding home bend, sustained progress down centre of straight to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly, raced keenly outside leader early far side, remained prominent into straight, faded gradually.
Began moderately, travelled in last few, hampered over 250 M out, ran home one-paced. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Began fairly, close up early, gradually shuffled backward to forward of midfield halfway out, made no impression in straight.
Broke well from a wide draw, remained prominent and wide without cover down far side and around the bend, soon weakened after straightening.
Well there to straight, folded up quickly after straightening.
Camped behind midfield the fence. Peeled out after the 500m, worked into the nicely, and in the straight ran on well.

Slow to begin then ridden along early settling worse than midfield the fence. Ended up almost last at the 600m, but saved ground thereafter on the inside & in the home straight closed off well, just going under narrowly.
Traveled with the backmakers, 2 wide with cover. Made a forward move near the 800m, improving to race behind the leaders, 3 deep no cover. Maintained a good gallop down the running.
Travelled at the hindquarters of the leader, 2 deep no cover.
Parked midfield, 1 off with cover. Peeled out to go forward after the 600m, made some late ground.
Dictated terms along the fence at slow fractions. Was inclined to lay out in transit, but had no other excuses.
Box seated. Couldn't capitalize and gave ground inside the final 100m.
Had every hope after travelling 1 out 1 back. Faded late.
Travelled behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Made little headway after attempting to improve after the 500m.
Settled in last position along the rails. Peeled out early in the straight but only plugged home.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race 3 back the fence. Struggled in the final stretch.
Settled near the rear of the field, on the fence early then racing in a 1 off line near the 1000m. Came widest in the straight but failed to close off.
Eased back to rear, 10Ls off the leader, Switched widest rounding the Home Turn, dashed clear last 100M. Benefited by a fast pace.
Broke well and dropped back to behind Midfield. Travelled strongly and battled with the winner but was swamped in last 100M. Benefited by a fast pace.
Settled at the rear, closed to the rail, saved ground, swung wide, followed the winner and ran on well. Benefited by a fast pace.
Midfield 6Ls behind the leader. Lay in early in the straight, ran on well to the line.
Pushed forward then without cover throughout the race. Looked like a place chance but couldn't find any extra after 150M. Hampered by the fast pace.
Pushed forward across the field from the widest draw and led the field. Kicked away on straightening but faded in the last furlong. Hampered by the fast pace.
Behind Midfield. Saved ground on the rail. 7Ls off the leader. Switched wide after straightening, gradually made ground, passed tired runners.
Slow to jump and was checked 1300M out. Settled at the back, moved forward 800M out, three wide without cover. Kept on same pace closing stages after a tough trip.
Three back on the rail. 4Ls behind the leader. Never in a competitive position.
Settled behind the leading runners. Under pressure rounding the Home Turn, couldn't show anything in the straight. Hampered by the fast pace.
Settled in Midfield. Three wide without cover throughout the journey, empty in the tank after a tough race. Tailed out.
Ridden hard to go forward. Settled behind the leader, soon under pressure right before the Home Turn and weakened. Displayed an irregular heart rhythm.
Sharp start, sat 2nd on leader's flank 2 deep no cover, closed up on lead turning in, battling stretch duel, narrow advantage 100m, just held on.
Speed at break to take lead, driven off turn, unable to shake winner, marginally headed 100m, rallied, just failed.
Fast break, dropped back to slot midfield 2 deep with cover from wide alley, 6th and ridden 400m, strong run to take 3rd close home.
Dwelt start, recovered to race 5th on rail, switched out ridden 250m, one-paced in closing stages.
Tardy start, urged on to sit 3rd on rail, hard-ridden 300m, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Fair break, taken back to camp 3 from rear on rail, trapped in pocket 500m, clear run 400m, stayed on moderately.
Quick break, tracked front pair 2 deep with cover, under pressure turning in, one-paced in run to wire.
Reared start and lost ground, rolled forward to 7th on rail, unable to rally turning in, weakened in run home.
Broke with others, lacked early pace, sat behind midfield 2 deep with cover, found little in stretch.
Slow start, raced 1 from rear on rail, checked off heels 700m, last at 600m, passed beaten rival in stretch, never a factor.
Taken behind runners from wide gate, held up last, passed rival on outer 600m, widest into stretch, struggled in run to wire.
Smart break, rolled on to track leader on rail, advanced 1 off 600m, led 400m, kicked 3L clear 300m, kept on for cosy win.
Good break, settled behind midfield 2 deep with cover, forward move 500m, cocked head and hung 300m, closed out soundly to take 2nd.
Held up last of main group, 5L back 3 deep on home turn, widest in stretch, determined deep run, took 3rd on wire.
Fair break, settled near rear on rail, switched out and quickened into stretch, closed out soundly without troubling winner.
Bumped start, settled 5th on rail, to 3rd 2 deep with cover 600m, driven 500m, 2nd at 250m, run tapered in closing stages.
Slow start, raced near rear 2 deep with cover, slotted to rail 1800m, driven 2 deep 500m, wide into stretch, kept on at one pace.
Speed to lead, headed 400m, swamped 250m, weakened out.
Sharp break, raced 4th on rail, pressure and lost position 500m, weakened in run home.
Good break, driven in 4th early 2 deep no cover, urged to 2nd on outer with circuit to go, spent force at 600m, tailed off.

Placing: TNP
Comment: Awkward break, lost action when saddle slipped shortly after start. Took no part.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off well to score just by a short head.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, dashed strongly 250M despite all negative racing situations, just beaten in 2nd.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 150M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Slow away, 4Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed forward and sat outside the leader, enjoyed by the slow sectionals, flattened 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, 1.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, flattened 250M.
Pressed forward, 2Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, trapped 3 wide throughout, weakened 250M.
Eased to rear, 6.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 250M.
Eased to rear, never a factor.
Rolled forward, sat outside the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, faded rapidly 500M.
Steadied start, fourth last rail, inside bid weaving between rivals, led 100m out, comfortably.
Broke well, fourth rail, third into straight, led 200m out, kept on well, outpaced by winner.
Broke well, midfield one off, mid-track bid, blocked for run mid-straight, finished well when clear.
Broke well, steadied back to third last one off, improved three wide approaching turn, wide bid, kept on well.
Fair break, up wide to second then third one off, urged approaching straight, mid-track bid, kept on, no kick.
Broke well, second early one off, steadied to midfield one off, mid-track bid, kept on steadily without kick.
Taken back from wide draw, last one off, bid between horses straight, not clear run from 200m out until very late, might have finished closer if gaps had come.
Fair break, ridden early but unable to go pace of leaders, mid-rear one off, ridden approaching straight, mid-track bid, short of room, kept on without being able to threaten.
Slowly away, second last one off, wide bid, hung in briefly, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fourth three wide no cover for first half of race, then up to lead narrowly one off approaching turn, swamped approaching 200m mark, weakened.
Broke well, led rail, pestered then headed far side, shared lead again 300m out, weakened.
Fair break, ridden for early position but caught midfield three wide now cover, bid several horses wide, steadied off heels 200m out when already weakening.
Tracked leader, driven 450M out, led 250M, drew well clear nearing 100M and maintained its lead to the line.
Settled near the rear in the first half, strode closer to midfield passing halfway, stayed on final 300M to go 2nd near line but no impression on the runaway winner.
Soon led and dictated pace, driven passing 400M but not able to shake off pursuers, headed by winner 250M, faded final stages and lost 2nd near line.
In midfield along the rails, shaken up near 500M, kept on one paced down the inside.
In mid-division, 4-5Ls back in 7th place halfway, into clear 300M, stayed on fairly.
Behind midfield, saved ground along the inside, shuffled back to near last making the home turn, stayed on fairly.
Switched off to last, 8Ls off the pace down the back straight, turned 3-wide 800M and niggled along making the turn, made limited progress over final 300M.
Settled 2-wide towards the rear, not quickened when placed under pressure rounding home turn, never threatened.
Tracked leaders, came under pressure inside 500M, weakened mid-straight.
Never far off the pace but was 3-wide without cover for most of the trip, pushed along 500M out, not quickened, out of contention 200M.
Positioned ahead of midfield and always within 3Ls of leader, not able to keep up nearing 500M, no extra over final 200M. (Lame next day.)
Reserved near the rear, 7Ls off the pace in the first half, gave little response inside 400M, never a factor.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Made all, won unchallenged.
Began fairly, niggled along but soon dropped behind midfield, finished off race well to grab second close to home.
Niggled at early, gradually picked up under pressure to joint 4th halfway out, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began awkwardly losing ground settleing in last few, produced good late impression inside final 200 M.
Midfield most of way, kept on steadily past well beaten horses closing stages.
Took advantage of high draw to race along grandstand rails with leader, lost touch under pressure over 200 M out. Jockey warned for not riding out to the line.
Broke well, travelled in 3rd mainly 2L off the pace, came under pressure inside final 300 M, faded gradually.
Never far off until faded under pressure inside final 200 M.
Never better than midfield.
Towards rear throughout.
In similar position in midfield throughout racing down the centre of the track, one-paced.
Tailed off most of way until running past well-beaten horses inside final 100 M.
Raced along grandstand rails, never better than midfield.
Not far off early, gradually retreated to midfield halfway out, folded up quickly inside final 300 M.
Camped towards the rear after being slow to begin 2-3 deep with cover. Made a sweeping run after the 600m, and ran on strongly.
Posted 3 wide without cover early before travelling 1 off the fence no cover after the 800m. Hit the lead near the 200m, overhauled late.
Began awkwardly then didn't muster settling midfield, 3 wide with cover. Finished off well.
Parked behind midfield, 2-3 wide with cover. Closed off soundly.
Raced in 2nd position, 1 off the fence until shifting closer to the rail near the 700m. Was overhauled after the furlong.
Made its run from last position, racing on the fence with cover. Swung the home turn widest and made up satisfactory ground.
Travelled worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Was one paced in the run to the line.
Sent forward and led along the fence at a solid clip. Opened up a significant break on the field midrace. Faded in the straight. (Heart Irregularity.)
Settled back in the field near the running rail. Never a factor.
Raced wide and without cover until after the 1000m midfield. Travelled 1 off soon after, failed to close off.
Travelled handy on the paint with cover. Gave ground quickly in the final stretch, tailed out. (To trial.)
Raced midfield the fence. Weakened in the run home, tailed out. (To trial.)
Settled behind midfield on the fence with cover. Struggled in the straight, tailed off. (To trial.)
Broke fairly and pushed forward to park outside leader. Travelled well and battled on strongly 300m out. Kicked away in the last furlong.
Eased back to rear. 8Ls off the leader. Ridden along to keep up with the field on the rail. Switched to the middle of the straight and ran on strongly, nearest at finish.
Jumped last and Improved gradually along the fence. Midfield 4Ls behind the leader. Dashed well in centre track run but weakened in the last 50m.
Jumped well and settled behind the pace. Travelled well and looked like a threat. But failed to go with the winner after straightening, kept on one pace.
Slow to begin, failed to lead. Eased back to rear, 6Ls behind the leader. Swung wide and ran on well close to the line.
Soon lead the field. Travelled well when asked for run in 300m out, battled on at one pace.
Pushed to find a spot to slot from the wide draw. Settled midfield 4Ls behind the leader. Failed to run on. Rider suggested longer distance.

Pushed hard to keep behind the speed, soon dropped back to midfield, trapped three wide then was checked right before the Home Turn. Was pushed wider after the incident, couldn't run on in the straight.
Settled at the rear, not rushed. 7Ls behind the leader. Saved ground along the fence. Failed to respond, passed tired runners.
Pushed hard to lead but couldn't do so. Obtained box seat when asked for run in 300M out, couldn't show anything and weakened sharply last furlong.
Broke well and ridden hard to go forward across the field but trapped three wide without cover throughout the trip. Soon niggled on the Home Turn. Weakened and tailed off.
Broke well, trapped three wide with cover. Was checked in near 600M when pulling. Found nothing after the incident, faded out right after straightening.
Dwelt start, rolled on to camp behind midfield on rail, 5L back turning in, switched for powerful centre-track run, got up last strides.
Driven to dispute lead, narrow lead 800m, kicked clear 450m, all out final 100m, headed close home.
Good break, tucked in midfield 2 deep with cover, quickened to close 400m, closed out soundly, narrowly missed 2nd.
Taken back at break, held up 3rd last on rail, strong urging 700m, 7L back on final turn, surging centre track run, held at line.
Fair break, tracked lead 2 deep with cover, shaken up 3 wide into stretch, to 2nd 350m, all out lost place 200m, no extra in closing stages.
Fair break, tracked lead on rail, to 3rd 800m, fair progress in stretch until weakening late.
Good break, ridden to race behind midfield 2 deep with cover, hard-ridden wide into stretch, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Tardy start, urged to sit midfield on rail, ridden into stretch, kept on at same pace.
Quick to stride, soon taken to last on rail from wide draw, progress 600m, stayed on moderately.
Fair break, held up behind midfield on rail, niggled 800m, found little in run to wire.
Taken behind runners from wide gate, raced last pair 2 deep with cover, last at 600m, driven into stretch, plugged on past beaten rivals.
Sharp break, disputed lead 2 deep no cover, close 2nd 800m, lost place under pressure 400m, quickly faded out.
Missed kick, dropped in behind midfield 2 deep with cover, wide off home turn, found nothing and faded out.
Awkward start, trapped 3 deep no cover 3rd, began to weaken 800m, dropped right out in stretch.
Sharp from gate, settled 3rd on rail, 4th at 800m, switched 3 deep on turn, narrow lead 350m, battled to wire, just held on.
Unable to slot in from wide alley, taken back 4 from rear, shaken up 600m, 6L back widest into straight, storming centre track run, just failed.
Fair break, taken forward to sit 2nd on rail, took brief narrow lead 400m, soon headed but battled to line in close duel, lost 2nd at wire.
Slow start, settled behind midfield 2 deep with cover, smooth progress into stretch, shaken up 350m, closed without troubling principals.
Broke well, settled midfield 2 deep with cover, driven wide into stretch, closed out soundly without threatening.
Speed at break to dispute lead, soon dropped in 5th 2 deep with cover, niggled 700m, stayed on one pace.
Taken back from widest gate, raced 3 deep no cover last trio, some progress in run home.
Good break, rolled forward to lead on rail, headed 400m, weakened out in final stretch.
Tardy start, trapped 3 deep no cover behind midfield, wide into stretch, stayed on moderately to wire.
Fair start, raced 6th on rail, ridden 600m, plugged on at same pace.
Smart break, trapped 3 deep, slotted 2 deep 3rd 800m, unable to quicken into stretch, struggled in run home.
Dwelt start, chased along at rear, raced last trio 2 deep with cover, hard-ridden on turn, never a factor.
Missed break, rolled on to sit behind mid rank on rail, found nothing off final turn, eased when well beaten.
Missed kick, settled last trio on rail, unable to quicken, laboured in stretch, well beaten.
Took rail easily and led by 0.5L at good pace, made all without fully tested.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, dashed well 300M for 2nd.
Pushed to sit outside the leader, pace good, closed off strongly for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on well to the line without real threats.
Hard ridden to keep up with the field, 6Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide, dashed well 250M.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace along the fence, made some ground in straight.
Eased to rear, 7Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made steady ground 300M.
Box seat, pace good, soon flattened 300M.
Very awkward away, at rear, 8Ls off the good pace 2 wide, raced flat until 200M, picked up well and made good ground.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, hung out 600M and lost ground, ran on fairly.
Pushed early but not muster, behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no progress.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, never nearer.
Broke well, fourth one off stand rail, ridden 250m out, ran on well to get up on line.
Broke well, second early then led two off, battled on from mid-race, headed final strides.
Fair break, taken back to cross towards stand rail, second last, moved out for bid between horses, ran on strongly, finished best of all.
Broke well, led three off, shifted to mid-track when headed, kept on one pace.
Broke well, settled behind leaders mid-track, ridden from halfway and shifted towards far rail, kept on one pace.
Fair break, settled behind leaders three off stand rail, ridden from 350m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, bumped early and unbalanced, mid-track, midfield, wide bid, moved towards far rail as rivals shifted out, kept on.
Shifted left start, bumping rival, rear group mid-track, ridden but no kick from 400m out.
Broke well, fourth along rail, ridden 400m out, limited response.
Moderate break, bumped early, second last mid-track, driven, found little.
Slightly awkward star, last mid-track, urged, always outpaced.
Led early, sat back in 2nd passing 800M, back to the lead near 300M, continued on well, strongly pressed by 2nd and 3rd late but held on gamely.
Slightly slow away, never far off behind leaders, out into clear 350M, did best work final 200M, just failed.
Raced keenly behind leading pair, chased eventual winner from inside 300M, kept on steadily under a forceful ride, nearest finish.
Positioned 3-wide behind midfield, a shade keen middle stages, stayed on final 300M but not quite getting to the first three.
Dropped back to the rear and crossed to race along the fence, had no clear run early straight, made steady progress final 250M.
Held up behind midfield, 5Ls off the pace turning for home, ran on fairly and no impression on leaders.
Up with early pace, 3-wide, dropped back midfield entering home turn, one paced over final 400M, never threatened.
Vied for early lead, emerged as leader passing 800M, raced 2-wide throughout, lost lead nearing 300M, faded away.
In mid-division 4Ls off the pace, saved ground along the inside, came under pressure 500M out, never going the pace to challenge.
Never better than midfield, kept on same pace when placed under pressure, weakened 150M out.
Held up 3-wide near last, found little turning into straight, soon behind.
Dropped back to the rear from wide barrier, raced greenly in early and middle stages, last turning for home, no extra.
Fair break, fifth one off, bid three off, led 200m out, soon clear, just held on.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, wide bid, finished fast, just failed.
Broke well, up to join leaders early, the caught three wide without cover midfield, kept on steadily mid-track, never quite able to challenge.
Broke smartly, taken back from wide draw to midfield three off, mid-track bid, hung in 200m out and jockey had to stop riding to straighten, briefly on heels approaching finish, kept on.
Broke well, mid-rear one off, looked for room between horses early straight, then shifted out for wide bid, finished well.
Fair break, midfield one off, bid between horses and short of room 200m out, kept on one pace.
Broke fast, led early then third one off, bid three wide then moved towards rail, one pace.
Fair break, midfield rail, bid between horses, no clear run approaching 200m, awkwardly placed near line, never able to challenge.
Taken back from wide draw, rear one off, inside bid, limited progress.
Broke well, fifth rail, inside bid, had to shift out 150m from line, one pace.
Broke well, ridden up wide to lead and just about cross, headed 400m out, no extra.
Awkward break, lost ground sharply, last then second last rail, inside bid, little progress.
Broke well, second rail, inside bid, shared lead 400m out, headed, weakened.
Slow away, shifted out then up along rail to mid-rear, inside bid, short of room 350m out, no way through 100m out, might have finished closer with clear running.
Tracked leader along the inside, quickly moved to the lead near 300M, comfortably held off the renewed challenge from the runner-up final 200M.
Emerged as the leader from 1000M, one off the fence throughout, headed nearing 300M, made a renewed challenge over final 200M but was always held.
Slow to begin, quickly recovered to 5th position, into clear 300M, kept on well enough but not getting to the first two.
Dropped in behind midfield, checked near 900M, stayed on for a non-threatening 4th.
Switched off to last, over 6Ls back in middle stages, headway along the inside passing 600M, made steady progress final 400M but no impression on leaders.
From wide barrier crossed to race along the fence, 4Ls off the pace in midfield, switched out 600M, ran on fairly turning home and inclined to hang in under pressure.
Up with the pace, 3-wide no cover throughout, weakened passing 200M.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, not pace to challenge turning for home, weakened inside 200M.
Held up behind midfield, brought wide approaching home straight, one-paced.
Reserved towards the rear, switched into clear 400M, hung out and found disappointingly little in the finish.
Raced very keenly under restraint, towards the rear and 4-wide no cover making the home turn, couldn't pick up on straightening.
Settled 3-wide in midfield, dropped away 300M out, never a factor.
Held up 3-wide towards the back of the field, came under pressure 500M out, soon behind.
Close enough behind leaders, dropped away rapidly passing 200M.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Settled wide in forward of midfield after beginning from the widest draw, remained similar to straight, responded well under pressure to take charge inside final 100 M.
Settled in midfield or just worse, wide into straight, made steady headway closing stages to snatch 2nd late.
Began fairly, settled in 5th better than midfield, fought on steadily to narrowly miss 2nd.
Soon took up running, kicked 3L clear far side, came back to the field rounding home bend, hung on under pressure until tiring and headed 100 M out, lost 2nd late. (Tactic questioned.)
Niggled at early, settled in 4th, came under pressure on the bend, kept on steadily in straight without quickening.
Settled towards the rear, briefly baulked on straightening, kept on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Quickly sent to prominent position settling in 3rd not very far off, kept on before fading inside final 200 M.
Soon taken across from a wide gate to settle at the back, trailed the field most of way to straight, saved ground turning in, kept on past well-beaten horses.

Vied for lead early after beginning from a wide gate, settled in 2nd behind clear leader far side, came under pressure rounding the bend, drifted under pressure and had to be straightened inside 200 M, soon weakened.
Began fairly, gradually dropped to last few, made no impression.
Settled in midfield on rails, baulked behind runners in straight until passing 100 M, made no impression thereafter.
Always in last few, never seen with a chance.
Rated midfield 1 off with cover. Got a nice trail approaching and rounding the home turn. Overhauled competitors late to grab victory on the post.
Travelled 1 out 1 back. Made a forward move 3 deep no cover passing the 500m was inclined to lay in under pressure early in the straight, nailed on the line.
Raced outside the leader. Stayed on gamely for most of the home straight.
Travelled third from the rear, 2 deep with cover. Peeled out after the 500m, ran on soundly to make the frame.
Parked midfield the fence. Closed off steadily.
Slow to begin, settling back in the field along the paint with cover. Ran on steadily without making significant ground.
Settled in the lead on the rails. Was overhauled near the furlong and faded thereafter
Camped midfield the fence. Whacked away at the same speed in the run to the line.
Travelled at the back on the paint with cover. Kept to the inside in the straight, passed some tiring runners.
Had every chance after box seating. Was a beaten horse early in the home straight.
Travelled at the rear, 2 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Pulled hard for a significant portion of the trip, racing about 3 back the fence. Struggled in the final stretch. (Reported to be lame the following day.)
Jumped slowly, settled midfield 4Ls behind the leader and raced along the rail. Couldn't find a clear running until 120M. Dashed powerfully in the last 100M and got up to win by a nose.

Jumped well but couldn't slot in. Trapped three wide and raced forward to park outside the leader 800M out. When asked for run after straightening, battled on strongly and looked like a winner. Just beaten by a nose.
Began awkwardly, settled Midfield 5Ls off the leader. Raced three wide and without cover throughout. Ran on strongly but unable to challenge the winner. Good effort after a tough trip.
Jumped sharply and pushed forward to lead. Couldn't kick away and battled on but weakened and passed by runners in the last 100M.
Began only fairly. Settled Midfield 5Ls off the leader. When asked for run after straightening, swung wide and ran on well close to the line.
Eased to rear from the wide barrier and slot to the inside. Was checked 900M out and lost ground. Settled 7Ls behind the leader. Switched to the outside 250M out and ran on well close to the line.
Jumped sharply and ridden strongly to go forward. Dropped back to midfield and swung wide rounding the Home Turn. Kept on one pace.
Began fairly and soon pushed forward to obtain a box seat. Ridden rounding the home turn but only kept on one pace.
Pushed forward. Slot in to two wide from the wide draw, settled behind the leading runners. Found nothing and weakened out.
Began fairly, couldn't slot in to a spot. Trapped four wide throughout and niggled on the Home Turn. Faded out after straightening.
Began awkwardly, proved very difficult to settle and was checked in the early stages, three wide throughout, couldn't run on. Never in a favorable position.
Began slowly, not rushed. Sat at the rear, never a factor. Tailed out.
Hard-ridden from gate, camped behind midfield on rail, driven 4L back 400m, switched out 300m, quickened to lead 50m.
Good break, sat 5th on fence, strong stretch run to lead 150m, all out headed last strides.
Jumped well, covered behind mid rank 2 deep, progress 3 deep no cover 800m, 4th turning in, disputed lead 100m, soon headed, no extra.
Dropped in from wide gate, keen 3 deep no cover, settled at tail, niggled 500m, 6L last turning in, strong closer.
Led at break, keen in front, soon taken back to 3rd on rail, to 2nd 400m, led 250m, headed 150m, no extra.
Fair break, settled rail near rear, 2 deep 900m, advanced on turn, wide into stretch, battled on for moderate progress.
Rousted from gate, bustled early, raced 6th 2 deep with cover, under pressure when impeded 400m, one-paced to wire.
Missed break, driven 3 deep to lead passing stands 1st time, on fence niggled 600m, headed 250m, faded thereafter.
Speed to dispute early lead, settled 2nd 2 deep no cover, swung wide under pressure final turn, weakened out in stretch.
Tardy start, covered up 2 deep last trio, 3 deep with cover 900m, bustled 700m, very wide into stretch, found little.
Taken behind at break, last trio on rail, bustled 600m, tight for room on turn, unable to quicken in stretch, never a factor.
Smart break, shifted in passing stands 1st time, raced 2 deep with cover 4th, bustled 800m, found nothing in stretch, eased when beaten.
Bumped & unbalanced start, speed to sit close 2nd 2 deep no cover, quickened to lead 250m, drew clear in run to wire.
Sharp break, driven to lead, dictated tempo until challenged off home turn, headed 250m, battled to hold 2nd.
Fair break, raced midfield 2 deep with cover, 3L 6th turning for home, strong closer, just missed 2nd.
Tardy break, parked midfield on rail, driven 350m, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Driven from gate, sat handy 5th 2 deep with cover, driven to 3rd 300m, run tapered.
Slow start, covered up 2 deep near rear, lacked pace turning in, stayed on soundly for late progress.
Fast break, settled behind leader on rail, unable to quicken turning in, kept on at same pace.
Missed kick, taken to rail at rear, 6L last into home stretch, boxed on gamely for moderate progress.
Shifted & bumped start, taken back to sit last trio on rail, asked for effort 400m, plugged on at same pace.
Slow start from wide gate, trapped 4 deep no cover, unbalanced 900m, rolled on to 3rd in back stretch, weakened out from 350m.
Taken back soon after break, raced near rear 3 deep with cover, bustled 600m, struggled in run home,
Good break, slotted behind midfield 3 deep with cover, close to heels 800m, driven 600m, soon weakened out in run to wire.
Settled outside the leader, enjoyed the very slow sectionals, closed off strongly to score by a very narrow margin.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the very slow pace, just beaten by a short head.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the very slow pace 2 wide, ran on well for the line for 3rd.
Pushed to hold the box seat, favoured by the very slow pace, little dash in straight.
Took rail in front of midfield, 3Ls off the very slow pace, little dash 250M.
Pushed to take rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M flattened.
Awkward away and bumped, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the very slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the very slow pace, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden early but not muster and checked, 4.5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the very slow pace, no progress.
Eased to rear and took rail, 7.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the very slow pace, no turn off foot.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the very slow pace, ran on ok.
At back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the very slow pace, no dash.
Fair break, fourth rail, inside bid, led narrowly 100m out, held on well.
Broke fast, led, then second rail, led again mid-track mid-straight, headed narrowly, kept on, just held.
Taken back to rear from wide draw, improved along rail approaching straight, inside bid, kept on well late.
Broke fast, led after 200m, soon clear, headed 150m out, no extra.
Good break, raced third two deep no cover, bustled 700m, lost place three deep turn, hard ridden 300m, one pace to line.
Moderate break, midfield rail, wide bid, kept on steadily without being able to threaten.
Taken back from wide draw, fourth last rail, bid one-off, kept on one pace.
Fair break, second last one off, last into straight, bid between horses, one pace.
Broke well, ridden for early position from wide gate, midfield one off no cover, wide bid, one pace.
Fair break, hard to settle, third last two off no cover, mid-track bid, found little.
Fair break, crowded and steadied off heels, mid-rear one off, bid between horses, found nil, weakened quickly late.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, put in a strong challenge passing 300M, got up near 50M.
Disputed early lead, sat back in 3rd passing 1000M, ran on well inside 300M, not pace of winner final stages.
Driven to the lead, set steady pace, continued on well in straight, headed near 50M.
Caught wide early, rushed up to join leader 700M, loomed a threat 200M out, kept on steadily but not pace of first two final stages.
Settled 2-wide behind midfield, difficult to settle in middle stages, stayed on over final 300M.
Held up near last, raced keenly down the back straight, stayed on but was never a serious threat to the leaders.
Caught wide early before slotting into a 3-wide position behind midfield, made limited progress final 300M.
Tracked leader along the fence, one paced under pressure passing 300M, weakened 150M out. (Jockey reported his horse didn't handle the ground.)
Raced 3-wide in mid-division, not picked up in straight and never got seriously competitive.
Slightly slow out, guided to a rail position behind midfield, inconvenienced near 150M but was never going the pace to challenge.
Dropped back from draw 12, settled 3-wide near last, not able to quicken when switched widest turning for home.
Lacked pace, didn't travel and dropped out to detach last nearing 400M, well beaten.

Began fairly, ridden to soon take up running 200 M after start setting a fast second section, led remainder of race to win with authority.
Began fairly, settled just better than midfield, saved ground on inside turning in but did not find much room early in straight, switched in 300 M out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Soon taken back from a wide gate and waited with, saved ground on rails turning in, baulked until obtaining a clear run inside final 150 M, finished off race strongly.

Niggled along for pace early, settled 2-back in 5th within striking distance, left flat-footed when pace quickened coming out of back straight, renewed effort from midfield home turn, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.

Niggled along after beginning from a middle gate, in front out wide when ceded advantage to eventual winner 1200 M out, remained racing in 2nd outside leader to straight, kept on but swamped for a placing final strides.
Soon taken back from a wide gate for rails run, gradually improved down inside to reach midfield home bend, baulked until producing late impression inside final 100 M.
Settled 2-wide just off the speed in 3rd or 4th, kept on at the one pace in straight and swamped closing stages.
Began fairly, settled in prominent positions in 4th or 3rd on rails, kept on before fading inside final 200 M.
Always towards the rear, kept on steadily under pressure without quickening.
Gradually taken back to race in last few, went wide into straight, kept on steadily under pressure past well-beaten horses.
Began moderately, settled just worse than midfield, made short-lived effort on rails on top of home bend, made no impression in the run home.
Raced wide without cover in midfield, similar turning in, yielded ground gradually after straightening.
Began moderately, settled in midfield, shuffled backward when pace quickened coming out of back straight, became last upon straightening, made no impression thereafter.
Began from a wide draw, eventually obtained cover in midfield passing the 1200 M mark, shuffled backward around the bend, dropped further back after straightening.
Settled 3 back the fence. Peeled out 6-7 deep early in the straight, closed off strongly and had the race in its keeping 100m out.
Began awkwardly then recovered to travel in 2nd position, 2 deep, no cover. Maintained a good gallop right to the wire.
Raced close to the rail behind midfield. Commenced its run out wide in the straight and made good late ground.
Parked 1 out 1 back. Kept on reasonably in the home stretch to fill the frame.
Posted 3 deep without cover, on the speed. Gave some ground inside the 50m.
Sent forward and led along the paint. Faded approaching the 100m.
Raced very keenly during the early stages whilst travelling in the box seat. Was a spent force early in the home straight.
Positioned worse than midfield after being crowded at the start, 2 deep with cover. Had to be checked off heels a couple of times midrace, closed off soundly.
Camped 3 wide with cover, midfield. Closed off fairly.
Missed the start settling at the rear along the paint with cover. Made up modest ground in the final stretch.
Didn't enjoy the best of trips, travelling at the tail of the field 3deep with cover. Railed up in the straight and just whacked away to the finish.
Raced midfield, 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the run home straight. (Bled.)
Raced midfield, 2 deep with cover. Was off the bridle after the 500m, finishing well back.
Began well, settled behind the leader and claimed the trophy comfortably. Too classy in the field.
Soon set a strong pace and led by 3Ls, kicked away in the Home Straight. Unable to resist winner's surge 100M out.
Began sharply and soon dropped back. 4Ls behind the leader, trapped two wide without cover. Ran on but weakened in the last 100M.
Settled 6Ls behind the leader, trapped two wide with cover. Swung wide and ran on well close to the line.
Eased back to rear and switched to the fence, saved ground. Ran on but without real threats.
Eased back to rear. 7Ls behind the leader. Swung wide and passed a tired runner.
Jumped fairly, 4Ls behind the leader along the fence. Nothing to prove in the Home Straight.
Good break, raced just behind pace on rail, shaken up to challenge into stretch, led 300m, in command thereafter.
Trapped 3 deep with cover midfield, progress on turn to within 3L at 400m, strong centre track run, 2nd 200m, always held.
Taken back at gate, 3 deep with cover near rear, 5L down final turn, determined run to 3rd 150m, repelled closers to hit frame.
Unable to slot in from wide gate, dropped last 2 deep with cover, 6L back 400m, strong closer centre track, just missed frame.
Slow start, raced rail behind midfield, progress on turn, crowded 400m, switched off heels 250m, ran on soundly to line.
Taken behind from wide draw, sat last trio 2 deep with cover, no run 400m, tight between runners 150m, kept on, close to heels last strides.
Driven from gate to sit close up 2 deep with cover, all out 4th at 200m, petered out in run home.
Fast break from wide, trapped 3 deep no cover 3rd, maintained position under pressure until emptying out at 200m.
Fair break, slotted 2 deep with cover midfield, under pressure into stretch, closed out evenly.
Tardy start, 2 deep with cover near rear, close to heels 900m, unable to quicken off turn, plugged on, never a factor.
Sharp break from wide gate, led to 900m, settled 2nd 2 deep no cover, ridden 500m, one-paced off turn, weakened final 200m.
Awkward start, worked hard on rail to lead 900m, headed 300m, dropped out tamely.
Smart to stride, trapped 3 deep with cover 6th, under whip 500m, found nothing, dropped right away final 200m.
Lost ground with awkward start, raced last trio on rail, progress on paint 800m, weakened and eased final 300m.
Tardy start, settled midfield rail, close to heels 600m, smooth progress on turn, led on paint 150m, on top in run to wire.
Bumped at break, slotted behind midfield 3 deep with cover, 4L down 400m, strong closer, took 2nd last strides.
Taken behind from wide to sit last, 7L back turning in, driving centre track charge to claim 3rd final strides.
Taken back from wide draw, last trio 3 deep with cover, widest into stretch, closed to 3rd 200m, edged out of frame late.
Fair break from wide gate, raced 3 deep with cover midfield, quickened to brief 2nd 200m, run out of frame.
Sharp break, tracked leader on rail, pulled out to lead 350m, shifted under pressure 200m, headed 150m, no extra.
Missed break, raced rail near rear, rolled forward a fraction 700m, stayed on gamely without threatening.
Bumped start, raced 5th 2 deep with cover, under pressure on turn, battled to 4th 300m, crowded lost impetus 100m, no extra.
Slow start, covered up last trio, close to heels 1000m, hampered 700m, bustled on turn, 6L down 400m, stayed on moderately.
Quick to stride, trapped 3 deep chasing pace, niggled 600m, hard-ridden 4th 400m, plugged on at one pace.
Raced 2 deep with cover behind midfield, steadied off heels 700m, unable to quicken, never a factor.
Slow break, ridden to lie mid rank 2 deep with cover, struggled in stretch, eased late when beaten.
Awkward start, advanced to 2nd 2 deep no cover, bustled 600m, unable to hold place on home turn, soon weakened out.
Speed to lead shortly after start, set pace until headed 350m, faded in run home.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, progressed steadily to score only by a narrow margin.
Slow away, 7Ls off the good pace on the rails, made ground steadily 250M, just missed by a short head in 2nd.
Eased back, 8.5Ls behind the good pace on the fence, progressed steadily 250M for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, made ground 400M, run ended 100M.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls at good pace, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled, ran on ok.
Pressed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
At back, 7.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, made steady ground 300M, run ended 100M.
Struggling to keep up with the field at rear, 9.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, made some ground 150M.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, ran on until 150M flattened.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 4Ls off the good pace along the fence, just held ground in straight.
Eased to rear, 8.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just ran on ok.
Midfield, 5.5Ls behind the good pace, trapped 3 wide, ran on fairly.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, emptied 250M.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, soon weakened 300M.
Broke fast, second one off, challenged leader home turn, long battle throughout straight, asserted superiority last 100m.
Broke fast, led and crossed, long battle with winner throughout straight, fought very gamely, just worn down late.
Broke fast, settled third rail, chased leaders two off, kept on well but no impression on first two.
Broke well, fourth one off, bid four off rail, kept on steadily, unable to threaten.
Fair break, hard to settle, soon up to fifth rail, inside bid, kept on without being able to make ground on leaders.
Fair break, midfield rail, bid two off, kept on without being able to threaten.
Taken back from wide gate, second last one off, out for mid-track bid between horses, short of room 150m out, kept on quite well late.
Reared start, slowly away, mid-rear one off, wide bid, kept on one pace, sustained minor cut.
Broke well, sixth two off unable to reach rail, wide no cover throughout, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Awkward start, two lengths last early, inside bid straight, modest progress.
Began slowly, third last rail, bid two off, driven early straight, minimal progress.
Fair break, caught midfield three wide, urged but no progress, saddle slipped 600m out.
Fair break, midfield one off, moved wider for mid-track bid, no progress.
Fair break, mid-rear two off, wide bid, no progress.
Tracked leader, swiftly took over turning in, quickened to a 4Ls lead, kept on strongly, never challenged.
Settled 3-wide towards the rear in a slowly run race, stayed on well and got up for 2nd near line but the winner is a class above.
Broke well, dropped back to a position behind midfield 4Ls off the pace, ran on well over final 350M but never a threat to the runaway winner.
Held up midfield and tracked the eventual winner, went 2nd 300M out but not pace to challenge winner, faded late and lost 2 placings near the line.
Switched off to last 7Ls off the pace in a slowly run affair, taken widest turning in, stayed on fairly.
Within striking distance, had a smooth journey, kept giving final 400M but never going the pace to challenge.
Held up 3-wide in midfield, had an uninterrupted run from 400M, ran on fairly, turned one pace final 100M.
Dropped back to near last, made limited progress inside 400M.
Always prominent, not able to quicken under pressure 450M, weakened away 250M.
Crossed to the lead near 1600M and led uncontested at a slow tempo, inclined to hang out making the home turn, outpaced inside 400M and beaten.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, couldn't pick up under pressure, no extra final 200M.
Slow to begin, towards the rear always, not quickened on straightening, no impression.
In 5th / 6th 3Ls off the pace, 3-wide no cover throughout, under pressure 500M, dropped away rapidly passing 300M, tailed out. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Taken back from wide gate, crowded early, second last one off, improved two off approaching turn, mid-track bid, led 200m out, soon in charge.
Broke well, up four wide to third one off, led 250m out, headed, kept on.
Fair break, urged up to sixth three wide, bid between horses, kept on well.
Taken back from wide draw, last rail, improved wide approaching straight, kept on well without being able to threaten.
Broke well, up to second, then fourth one off, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Moderate start, urged early to brief lead then midfield rail, bid two off, kept on one pace.
Broke well, midfield one off urged, lost places approaching straight, switched wide, stayed on without being able to threaten.
Broke fast, led early over-racing, steadied to fifth rail, inside bid, short of room and shifted out 400m, kept on one pace.
Fair break, settled midfield rail, inside bid, kept on but no impression.
Fair break, not rushed early, rear group one off, wide bid, modest progress.
Fair break, not much early pace, mid-rear three off, bid between horses, little progress.
Moderate break, caught midfield wide without cover, allowed to stride up to lead, three lengths clear entering straight, headed 250m out, weakened.
Hampered start, rear group rail, unbalanced and checked off heels 1300m out, last into straight, wide bid, minimal progress.
Ridden from gate to move up wide and lead, headed and second rail from 1000m out, ridden for inside bid, weakened.
Settled behind midfield as usual, raced 3 wide 6-7Ls back, improved wide out approaching turn, let down strongly and kept finding final 200m to hold off rivals.
Raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 5-6Ls off even speed, improved 4 wide straightening, out dashed by principal but fought on well final furlong to hold 2nd.
Drifted back as expected from a wide gate, raced 3 wide at rear, 8Ls or so off lead with field to beat on bend, swung widest into straight and made plenty of ground to be not far off 2nd on line.

Out nicely, assumed ideal spot 1 out 1 back, all favours in run, loomed 3 wide rounding bend and was a place chance to 200m before peaking on rail, bumped and finished 5th but placed 4th after protest.
Began in line, sat 3Ls or so back on rails, quiet time in mid section, made a decent run back to inside from 300m but ran about late and lost 4th on protest.
Standard break, tracked up 3 wide behind the speed 3-4Ls back, worked wide but had cover to bend, stuck on ok in straight however run ended inside 200m.
Landed a midfield spot 3-4Ls back in running line, even run to turn, made some progress from 400m but didn't go on with it final furlong.
Standard getaway, raced in rear division on rails 6-7Ls back, saved ground rounding bend, made minor ground along inside.
Settled just behind midfield, 2 wide 5Ls or so back, had fair run to bend, lacked extra gear in straight and just whacked away at same speed.
Rolled forward to race outside leader, kept speed even in mid section, 1/2L down turning, in mix to 200m before dropping off sharply thereafter.
Drifted back from a wide alley, raced on rails 8Ls away, near last turning and only passed tired runners in straight.
Began nicely, assumed prominent spot first on leaders back, no excuses with fair speed, right their turning, offered nothing in straight.
Showed good speed from outside alley to cross in front, overraced and unable to take a sit, had company to turn and was  clear at 400m, stopped quickly when challenged and dropped out.
Pressed forward from a wide gate but unable to slot in, posted 3 wide without cover working just off leaders throughout, soon under pressure turning and dropped right off to be beaten a fair way.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Rushed forward and tracked pace along the inside, driven 350M to chase leader, did best work final 150M, got up near line.
Hard driven to find the lead, took them along at even pace, kicked 2Ls clear near 200M, kept on well and was only headed near the finish.
Settled 2-wide in the group chasing the pace, tight for room early straight, kept on evenly to go 3rd 50M but never troubled first two.
Towards the rear, pushed along 500M, finished off reasonably well when taken to outside of straight but not getting to the first two.
Driven to race just off the pace, 3-wide without cover, not pace to challenge winner, weakened inside 100M.
In mid-division, a shade keen down the back straight, kept on one paced final 200M, never a serious threat.
Well covered in midfield, not quickened when driven out 300M.
Raced keenly outside the lead, outpaced passing 300M, weakened.
Awkwardly away, settled towards the rear, had nothing to offer turning in, soon out of contention.
Caught 4-wide without cover first 400M, outpaced making the turn for home, found nothing in the straight.
Lacked pace, near the rear throughout, detached from the main group nearing 400M, never a factor.
Taken back to last, weakened rapidly passing 350M.
Speared forward and took up the running on the rails passing the 800m. Kept on well to claim a solid win.
Camped close to midfield, 1 off with cover. Ran on well.
Settled after the 800m, in second position, 1off without cover. Maintained an even gallop down the running.
Made its run from back in the field 3 deep with cover. Swung wide in the straight and closed off well to finish in the frame.
Had no excuses after tracking the leader. Whacked away at the same speed over the concluding stages.
Tracked the speed 3deep had cover on the circle. Failed to make any impression.
Parked behind midfield the fence. Plugged away down the inside in the straight.
Travelled midfield, 3 wide with cover. Finished off one paced.
Began awkwardly settling in a handy position, 2 wide with cover. Struggled in the run to the line. (Reported to be lame the following day.)
Not the best away then drifted back in order to obtain cover, settling worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Failed to make any appreciable ground in the home straight.
Raced at the rear towards the rail with cover. Failed to close off.
Ridden along in the early and middle stages but was ultimately posted 3 deep without cover just off the speed. Capitulated in the final stretch.
Began well and settled three back along the rail. 3Ls behind the leader, dashed on well and won comfortably.
Began sharply but interfered by riderless horse in the early stages. Travelled well behind leader, battled on gamely in the Home straight.
Broke fairly, soon dropped back and settled Midfield 6Ls off the leader. Swung out and ran on well close to the line.
Ridden to take the lead but caught wide until 1100M out. Led well in the front but couldn't provide more in the last furlong. Weakened and just hung on for fourth.
Hampered on jumping and soon dropped back to rear. 7Ls off the leader with cover, dashed on well but without threats.
Broke fairly, settled mid-back 5Ls off the leader with cover, swung wide and ran on only fairly.
Began well then parked outside the leader. Under pressure rounding the Home Turn, kept on one pace.
Taken across from the wide barrier. Travelled along the rail, settled at the back 8Ls off the leader. Made no impression in the Home Straight.
Broke fairly, settled handy but travelled wide throughout, weakened after straightening.
Taken across from the wide barrier. Couldn't keep up speed and settled at the rear, never a factor. Tailed out.
Early stages severely checked by riderless horse. Niggled along throughout the race and soon under strong pressure rounding the Home Turn. Tailed out.

Placing: UR
Comment: Awkward jump, dislodged rider.
Good break, raced midfield on rail, shifted 2 deep 600m, driven 400m, picked up last 200m, led final strides.
Bustled from gate to sit midfield 2 deep with cover, advanced 3 deep on turn, led 250m, drew 3L clear, headed last strides.
Fair break, travelled near rear 2 deep with cover, ridden to advance wide on turn, solid centre track run to 3rd inside 50m.
Slow start, taken behind runners to camp last, driven forward 400m, widest in stretch, strong closer.
Camped behind mid rank on rail, switched out into stretch, 5L back 200m, closed out soundly until crowded last strides.
Fair break, sat midfield on rail, advanced 3 deep on final turn, running on soundly when crowded 150m, one-paced to wire.
Awkward break, raced 3rd 2 deep no cover, to 2nd 700m, driven to brief lead 300m, soon emptied, battled on without threat.
Speed to lead, soon taken back, settled midfield on rail, bumped and unbalanced 600m, tight for room 200m, kept on one pace.
Bumped start, driven to lead 1st turn, eased to slipstream leader, ridden 500m, outpaced into stretch, plugged on to wire.
Speed at break from wide gate, led 1200m, headed 300m, weakened out in run home.
Awkward break, bumped start, raced last pair 2 deep with cover, clipped heels on turn, unable to rally, never a factor.
Tardy start, raced 3rd last on rail, last at 400m, struggled in run home.
Bumped start, on rail midfield until taken back 1 off with cover 1000m, 5L back 400m, surged home centre track, led last stride.
Fast break to lead from wide gate, enjoyed soft lead, kicked 1L clear 250m, headed last stride.
Decent break, sat 1 off with cover midfield, ridden 4 wide on final turn, strong run last 220m, no match for winner.
Fair start, covered 1 off behind midfield until advanced wide no cover 900m, upsides leader 700m, one-paced in run home.
Sharp break, tracked leader on rail, unable to quicken off turn, kept on without threatening.
Tardy start, settled last 1 off with cover, advanced in stretch, crowded for room 250m and 200m, ran on late for modest progress.
Missed break, taken to rail, raced last trio, shaken up 400m, plugged on without threatening.
Smart break, rolled on to 2nd 1 off no cover, lost place 700m, worked 3 deep on turn to challenge, emptied 200m, faded.
Ridden from gate, sat mid rank on paint, bustled 700m, under pressure turning in, beaten when shifted off heels 200m,
Taken to 3 deep no cover last trio from wide gate, off heels 950m, advanced wide no cover, all out 300m, struggled in run home.

Placing: TNP
Comment: Reared in gate, refused to race until exiting without jockey.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, demonstrated its usual strong finishing efforts 300M, scored its 2nd goal without too much pressure.
Eased back, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Pushed forward to sit outside the leader, pace good, led 400M, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls behind the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace along the fence, made steady ground 250M.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on ok until 150M flattened.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls behind the good pace 2 wide, made some ground 200M.
Hard ridden to obtain box seat, pace good, weakened 200M.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, flattened 250M.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace, no progress.
Slow away, took rail at back, 6Ls off the good pace, no progress.
Slow away but soon pressed forward to take the rail and to lead by 0.5Ls at good pace, emptied 400M.
Broke well, lacked early speed, midfield rail, improved along rail approaching straight, bid one off, led 100m out, comfortably.
Broke well, fifth rail, improved mid-track to lead 250m out, headed 100m out, kept on.
Fair break, taken back from wide to rear rail, inside bid, slightly short of room mid-straight, finished well.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, looked for inside run 300m out, switched to mid-track, finished well.
Broke fast, in three horse battle for lead, led 800m out and crossed, kicked early straight, headed 250m out, no extra.
Broke fast, battled for early lead then third rail, bid four wide straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break but caught midfield three wide no cover, back to mid-rear, wide bid straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, ridden early but not pace to go with leaders, midfield one off, slightly short of room for bid two off, kept on one pace.
Fair break, ridden early but could not go early pace, third last two off, bid between horses, little progress.
Broke well, aimed for lead but had to settle for fourth one off, bid between horses, weakened.
Taken back from wide gate, last one off, niggled throughout, bid between horses, no progress.
Broke fast, led early but not pace to cross and caught three wide on second, became unbalanced when unable to reach rail, began to lose ground home turn, weakened rapidly.
Went forward to sit outside leader, advantaged by slow sections, threw down the gauntlet on turning, produced good turn of foot to take lead and hold margin strongly to the line.
Out nicely, assumed ideal spot on leaders back, had all favours with slow speed, took inside runs and dashed well, snared 2nd place narrowly.
Slotted into ideal spot 1 out 1 back, helped by slow tempo, loomed on straightening but couldn't peg back margin when they dashed hard final furlong.
Out with then, raced 3-4ls back on rails, didn't settle with slow tempo, angled out on turning and closed as well as possible given race developed into a sprint home.
Taken back from a wide gate and raced nearer to rear as usual, tempo against in mid section, came 3 wide from rock, made nice progress down middle to be nearest on line.
Assumed a midfield role 4-5ls back in two wide line, fair run despite slow speed, peeled wider and made some steady ground without looking likely.
Showed early speed and was left in front with no real challengers, set slow pace in middle stages, overhauled soon after turning and was one paced in straight.
No early speed and drifted back to last on rails, slow tempo against in mid section, well back and kept to rails turning, closed nicely final 200m.
Settled just off midfield 6ls back in running line, harmed by slow tempo throughout and difficult to settle, well back to bend, just held ground
Went forward from a wide gate but unable to slot in, trapped 3 wide without cover in midfield 4-5ls back, aided by steady tempo, ridden along turning, folded final furlong.
Settled behind midfield on rails 5-6ls back, unsuited by slow tempo, still rearward turning, made no real impression.
Settled towards rear, saddle shifted at 600m and was unable to take part thereafter.
