Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Soon led, 3Ls clear going into final 400M, kept on under minimum urge and maintained his advantage all the way to the line.
Tracked leader, kept on under pressure over final 400M but never going the pace to challenge the winner.
Settled 4th of 6, 4Ls off leader in early and middle stages, stayed on but no impression on the winner.
Travelled 4Ls off the lead, one paced inside 400M, weakened final 150M.
Began awkwardly, settled 5th of 6, struggled to keep up halfway, soon behind.
Raced at the back, outpaced halfway, dropped off rapidly inside 300M.
Raced midfield 3 off the outside fence. Responded well when shaken up and hit the line nicely.
Camped ahead of midfield racing about 4 from the grandstand side no cover. Hit the lead near the 100m, but was mowed down inside the last 50m.
Vied for leading duties near the middle of the course. Was in front at the furlong but was overhauled late, still managed to stay on under vigorous riding.
Had every chance racing 1 off the stands rail travelling behind the speed. Battled way to finish in the frame.
Parked along the outside rail in a prominent position. Maintained a reasonable gallop to the line.
Jumped awkwardly settling 2 off the grandstand side with cover. Closed off evenly.
Blew the start settling well back close to the middle of the track. Made some progress without threatening.
Tracked the leaders near the middle of the track. Kept on one paced in the run to the post.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race while traveling in the leading division well off the grandstand side. Faded over the concluding stages. Vet reported horse to be a roarer.
Crowded soon after the start settling well back towards the stands rail. Ridden along midrace to stay in touch, began to make some ground over the last furlong. (see incident report).
Travelled with the backmakers nearer to the center of the track with cover. Failed to close off.
Gave in quickly passing the 400m after racing on the speed towards the center of the straight. Struggled in the run to the wire.
Made no impression after racing midfield near the middle of the track. Was under heavy pressure passing the 300m, but no response.
Began awkwardly then travelled midfield, no cover towards the center of the course. Commenced to tire over the final 250m.
Began only fairly and settled Midfield, 4Ls behind leader along the rail. Ridden after straightening, dashed well and showed a great momentum to score in the last 50M.
Eased to the back. Settled 8Ls behind the leader. Swung wide and dashed strongly close to the line. Just beaten by a short margin.
Pushed forward to park outside leader. Travelled well and battled on strongly but couldn't find any extra after 100M. Hung on for third.
Midfield. Trapped 2 wide throughout the trip. Looked like a threat in the early part of the straight but unable to challenge after 100M. (Lost its left front plate.)
Broke well obtained a box seat run. Niggled rounding the Home Turn, stuck on well but kept on one pace. Couldn't threaten any placegetter.
Soon took the lead, battled on gamely until 200M, faded.
Settled 8Ls behind the leader, three wide with cover. Swung widest and made some ground but never looked likely.
Leaned on the gate and began awkwardly. Settled behind midfield 7Ls off the leader. Peeled to the outside after straightening, ran on only fairly.
Began fairly and niggled along the fence. Settled behind midfield 7Ls off the leader. Ridden hard rounding the Home Turn but nothing to show after straightening.
Began well, soon dropped back to become 7Ls off the leader, three wide with cover. Kept on one pace and weakened after last furlong.
Slow to begin and taken across from wide barrier. Sat at the rear, never in a competitive position.
Sat last, 10Ls behind the leader, never a factor.
Pushed forward, settled one out one back, niggled along rounding the Home Turn, weakened after straightening. Tailed out.
Pushed forward, settled behind the speed, travelled three wide without cover throughout and weakened sharply after straightening. Tailed out.
Camped behind midfield on rail, off heels 1000m, crowded & checked 300m, quickened through gap 200m, led 150m, comfortably.
Broke to sit wide with cover behind midfield, zipped to lead 1400m, 2nd on rail 1200m, driven to lead 250m, headed 150m, no extra.
Dropped in last pair on rail, progress on home turn, 7th at 400m, switched out in stretch, ran on to 3rd close home.
Good break, set steady tempo, headed 1400m, regained lead 1200m, headed 250m, kept on without threat.
Taken behind runners, last pair 1 off with cover, advanced wide 1000m, outpaced 600m, driven 5L back 400m, solid closer.
Prominent at break, settled midfield 1 off with cover, rousted outpaced 700m, switched wide in stretch, stayed on soundly.
Broke with others, trailed leader on paint, lost place from 1400m, 4 deep on turn, brief effort, weakened from 300m.
Tardy break, rolled on to 2nd 1 off no cover, 5th with cover 1200m, advanced to 4th soon after, driven 600m, run tapered in stretch.
Travelled 3 deep no cover midfield, wide move 1400m to outside leader, disputed lead into stretch, weakened from 300m.
Broke well, raced last trio 1 off, bustled 800m, last at 600m, all out turning in, well back when eased 350m.
Smart start, bustled early to lay handy 3 wide no cover, quickened to lead 300m, repelled challenge in duel to wire.
Good break, led early 3 deep, slotted 3rd 1 off no cover 800m, led 400m, headed 300m, rallied 200m, no extra last 50m.
Tardy start, camped 1 off at tail, 8L down turning in, widest into stretch, swept centre track to 3rd last stride.
Broke with others, trapped 3 wide behind midfield, progress on turn, 4L back 400m, ran on to 3rd 100m, shifted & edged out last stride.
Fast start, taken back to midfield 1 off with cover, off heels 700m, hard-ridden to 3rd 250m, closed out same pace.
Decent break, raced 3 deep with cover mid rank, niggled 1 off 600m, to within 3L final turn, ran on one pace, checked last strides.
Buffeted at start, settled rail near back, progress on turn, not clear run 300m, off heels 200m, closed out soundly.
Dwelt slightly, rolled to 4th on rail, switched 1 off final turn, bumped 350m, kept on one pace.
Fair break, raced off the bridle behind midfield, closing out at moderately when tight for room through final 250m.
Missed kick, taken behind to rail last pair, switched wide 350m, modest progress in run to wire.
Bustled to dispute lead on rail, settled 2nd 900m, niggled 600m, switched out to challenge 430m, soon swamped, no extra.
Missed break, rolled on to midfield on paint, run obstructed in stretch, unable to stride out to wire.
Veered left & driven from gate, trapped wide until led 900m, 1.5L clear 500m, headed 400m, weakened thereafter.
Awkward break, raced 1 off near rear, under pressure 600m, found nothing off home turn.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L, clocked advantageous slow sectionals, just hung on to win.
Hard ridden forward, sat outside leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on strongly, just beaten by narrow margin in 2nd.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, dashed impressively 250M despite not suited by the slow pace, finished a remarkable 3rd.
Pushed forward, settled 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed by the slow tempo, closed off well to the line but not good enough to challenge the winner.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 400M, dashed well when clear.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 300M.
Pushed to obtain box seat, favoured by the slow sectionals, lack room 400M, just held ground when clear.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 400M, however run ended 150M.
Eased to rear, 8.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 200M despite all negative racing situations.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on ok.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow tempo, blocked most straight, just ran on.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased to rear, 8.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Fair break, third last one off, improved wide approaching turn, mid-track bid, led 250m out, drifted out but kept on well to line.
Broke well, second one off following very slow pace, bid one off, kept on strongly, just failed.
Hopped start, rear one off behind very slow pace, improved wide approaching straight, wide bid, finished well.
Broke well, restrained to midfield three wide, improved wide approaching straight, joined leaders two off, just beaten for speed late.
Slow start, rear rail, inside bid, finished fastest of all.
Fair break, soon up to third rail, looked for inside bid, then switched out, unable to quicken briefly, finished well late.
Sluggish start, rear early then improved to mid-rear rail, short of room for mid-track bid, switched wide, finished well.
Broke well, fourth rail then moved to one off, back to mid-rear as field clustered, mid-track bid, crowded and checked 50m, no progress.
Broke well, led at very slow pace, headed 400m out, weakened, minor cut on left hock.
Fair break, restrained midfield, pulling, back to rear entering straight as field quickened, no progress when asked for effort.
Chased leader, turned 3-wide passing 600M, accelerated to the lead near 200M, ran on well under pressure and kept pursuers at bay.
Settled near the rear, peeled out into clear running from 500M, finished fastest of all and got up for 2nd near the line.
Held up in midfield along the inside rail, travelled well into straight, responded well and loomed a threat 200M but no extra pace to challenge winner over the final stages, lost 2nd near line.
Caught 3-wide in mid-division, raced without cover over the turn, kept on steadily final 200M.
Tracked leader and had his chance turning in, kept on evenly final 400M but never going the pace to challenge winner.
From wide draw shifted across behind runners, settled in the rear pair along the inside, no clear run early straight and to make his run out wide, made some progress final 300M.
Settled towards the rear, kept to the rails throughout, stayed on final 350M without threatening the leaders.
Travelled 2-wide behind midfield, gave limited response on straightening, kept on one paced.
Raced keenly in the lead, opened up 2Ls advantage in early stages, given a breather on the home turn, kept on well early straight, headed near 200M, weakened rapidly.
In last pair, taken wide passing 500M, never going the pace to challenge.
Held up 2-wide in mid-division, not quickened when asked, weakened out of it passing 150M.
Travelled 3-wide behind midfield throughout was unable to quicken turning into straight, tired 200M.
Broke smartly, settled third rail, looking for room between horses early straight, burst through when gap came to lead 100m out.
Fair break, midfield one off, urged, found split between horses mid-straight, challenged strongly, just outpaced late.
Broke well, up wide to second one off, challenged leader early straight, kept on well without quite enough pace to assert.
Fair break, settled third last rail, inside bid, held up briefly early straight, finished well, just outpaced late.
Awkward start quickly up to lead and dictate modest pace, quickened early straight, headed 100m out, kept on without being able to fight back.
Fair break, up to fourth then fifth one off, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Good break, midfield one off, bid five wide early straight, kept on without pace to challenge.
Fair break, settled third last one off, bid between horses, kept on without being able to threaten.
Fair break, settled rear one off, wide bid, modest progress.
Sluggish start, ridden early, mid-rear two off, urged, short of room 1400m, looking for room between horses straight, no progress under pressure.
Fair break, crowded 1400m, mid-rear two off no cover, then quickly up to fourth one off, mid-track bid, weakened.
Fair break, not pace to lead, midfield rail, bid one off, no progress.
Taken back from wide draw, but caught wide no cover, up to midfield still wide, mid-track bid, no progress.
Slow away, second last rail, checked 1400m, looking for room for mid-track bid, no progress when asked.
Began well, took prominent spot on leaders back, had reasonable run with even speed, came off heels turning and lengthened nicely to score another handy win.
Restrained from widest gate, behind midfield but tracked up 3 wide with cover, 5-6Ls back, made 5 wide bid turning and kept closing to snare 2nd late.
Displayed customary speed to take up running, set an even tempo in front, had plenty to offer turning and made them chase, tackled inside 200m, stuck to task and lost 2nd late.
Out in line, unable to slot in and was trapped 3 wide without cover, did work but was still right there turning, run ended at 100m after trip took toll.
Showed early toe to take spot outside leader, raced 2 wide on pace throughout, loomed to tackle leader turning in but no extra final 200m.
Out in line, assumed box seat 1 out 1 back, all favours in mid section, restricted room early in straight but appeared 1 paced at business end just holding ground.
No early speed, settled at rear on rails, 6-7Ls back throughout, bumped when coming wider on bend, made some gradual progress down middle.
Fair getaway, raced 4Ls away in midfield on rails, had quiet time and saved ground on rails, only 1 gear in straight and never got nearer.
Planted 3 wide in midfield when unable to get in, had cover throughout 3-4Ls away, came wider turning but peaked at 300m and battled thereafter.
Drifted back from tricky gate, raced behind midfield on rails 6Ls off lead, still well back to turn, didn't make much impression in home stretch.
Settled midfield of just worse, 4-5Ls back in running line, niggled along turning but failed to find usual finish. (Jockey reported reluctant to stretch out.)
Taken back from a wide gate, raced back with last few 6Ls or so away, bumped turn when asked for effort, never looked likely and struggled in straight.
Pressed forward from a wide gate to race outside leader, kept leader honest throughout and threw down challenge at 400m, was headed by 2nd horse at 200m but fought back strongly to score.
Began well, took ideal spot 1 out 1 back, all favours 2Ls back throughout, set out after leaders at 400m and gained advantage but unable to contain eventual winner who fought back late.
Fast into stride, took a sit on leaders back, fair run using little to bend, right there at 400m but lacked dash to go with principals, kept on honestly for 3rd.
No early pace, ended up behind midfield on rails, enjoyed a quiet trip 5Ls away, saved ground rounding turn and set out after lead group at 400m, did well to make inroads and take 4th.
Raced in rearward division 8Ls of so away from lead, angled off rails rounding bend, closed best of rest making good ground to be nearest at finish.
Tardy into stride, dropped down to rear, best part of 12Ls back, made run widest turn and made many lengths in straight to be closest on line.
Even break, raced just behind pace on rails 3-4Ls back, no excuses to bend, one paced when clear and dropped off final 200m.
Slow into stride, settled at rear on rails 10Ls or more off lead, still plenty to do on bend, took inside runs and made some late ground without threatening.
Pressed forward from outside gate and used a bit to lead, kept speed genuine in middle stages, headed at 400m and kept giving but work and additional trip took toll final furlong.
Assumed a midfield position, raced 4-5Ls back in running line, hung approaching bend and didn't put in thereafter with jockey easing final furlong.
Settled just off midfield 6-7Ls back in running line, fair run mid section, one paced when pressure applied and made no serious progress.
Drifted back from a tricky alley, 10Ls or so away at rear, still well back to bend, lacked usual turn of foot and only passed tired ones late.
No early pace, settled in rear division, 8Ls away middle stages, came 3 wide turning, no real impression.
Unable to slot in and settled in midfield 3 wide without cover, 4-5Ls back, struggling before turn, dropped right out.

Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Sat handily behind front pair and travelled well to straight, picked up nicely and sailed past leaders 150M to score by 3Ls.
Settled nicely in midfield about 5Ls off the pace, pushed along 500M, stayed on to claim 2nd near line but was a never a threat to the winner.
In 4th just behind leading pair, ran on steadily but not pace to challenge winner, lost 2nd near line.
Travelled 2-wide behind midfield, ran on for 4th but no threat to runaway winner.
Raced outside the lead, plodded on final 200M, swamped near line.
In midfield 3-4Ls off the pace, kept on same pace to the line, never threatened.
Towards the rear 7-8Ls behind leaders, made limited progress on straightening, never a danger.
Soon crossed to the lead setting a fair pace up front, came under pressure 500M, run ended near 200M, weakened.
Towards the rear 2-wide, pulled widest in straight, not picked up.
Switched off to last, found disappointingly little when asked inside 400M.
Difficult to settle, caught wide no cover down the back straight, struggled over the turn, soon weakened away.
Settled 2-wide near last, under pressure 600M, soon outpaced and beaten.
Eventually worked forward and assumed the lead along the paint near the 800m. Made every post a winner thereafter.
Parked just behind the speed, 1 off no cover. Maintained a good gallop right to the post.
Slow to begin then settled at the tail of the field along the paint. Railed up in the home straight, shifted out to continue its run after the 100m, closed off well.
Led early before handing up near the 800m, then had a nice run in the race tacking the leader on the fence. Didn't enjoy the clearest of runs over the final furlong.
Taken back from the outside gate, camped at the rear of the field, 2 deep with cover. Finished off soundly, was inclined to lay in over the concluding stages.
Travelled 3 wide without cover until the circle, slotted in at that point, to race behind the speed, 2 deep with cover. Finished off fairly, was crowded near the line.
Left racing wide and without cover after the 600m, whilst travelling back in the field. Plugged away over the final stages, got tightened close to the wire.
Settled with the backmakers 2 wide with cover. Had plenty of excuses in the straight after encountering a lot of traffic and being checked near the line.
Ridden along early but didn't muster, travelling worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Finished off dourly down the outside.
Parked midfield along the fence. Was one paced in the run home, did cop a check near the 100m.
Raced behind midfield the fence. Whacked away at the same speed in the final stretch.
Travelled midfield, 1 off with cover. Was a beaten horse early in the straight and gave ground inside the 100m.
Hard ridden to come across from the outside barrier and took the lead, led comfortably and scored.
Began well and settled 2Ls behind the leader, trapped three wide with no cover, dashed well in the Home Straight but came too late, just lost by a head.
Ridden to go forward, tracked well behind the leader, looked like a winner after straightening but couldn't provide more in the last furlong and just hung on for third.
Began well and settled 3Ls behind the leader, looked a threat but was momentarily held up right after straightening and raced tight in the concluding stages.
Pushed to obtain Midfield position, trapped three wide with cover, niggled rounding the Home Bend, peeled wide and ran on gradually.
Taken across from the wide barrier, settled at rear, trapped three wide, improved gradually, swung wide and dashed on well.
Taken across from the wide barrier, raced along the rail, saved ground and peeled widest right after the Home Bend and dashed on well.
Midfield, 4Ls behind the leader, ran on only one pace.
Eased back, 5Ls behind the leader, swung wide but no further improvement.
Settled three back along the rail, 3Ls behind the leader. Became unbalanced near 600M. Made no impression after the incident.
Behind Midfield 5Ls behind the leader, made no progress and well beaten in the Home Straight.
Jumped last and gradually improved to park outside leader. Weakened after straightening.
Broke well, camped 5th 1 off, smooth advance on bridle into stretch, quickened to lead 175m, driven out to repel rival.
Reared start, trapped 3 wide with cover mid rank, quickened to narrow 2nd 175m, just failed in tight duel.
Tardy break, covered 1 off behind midfield, back stretch progress, 5L down 400m, closed out well for clear 3rd.
Smart break, tracked leader on rail, bustled 4th into stretch, kept on soundly without threatening.
Good start, raced 2nd 1 off no cover, disputed lead 500m, led 250m, emptied 175m, swamped in run home.
Dropped behind, raced at tail, 7L back shaken up final turn, stayed on moderately to wire.
Speed to tack over & lead, challenged 500m, held position until headed 250m, plugged on one pace.
Well away, settled midfield on rail, driven 500m, stayed on at same speed.
Taken behind runners to last pair 1 off, driven forward 500m, widest into stretch, battled on at one pace.
Slow start, raced near rear on rail, niggled back stretch, driven on turn, never a factor.
Driven at gate to sit behind midfield 1 off with cover, hard-ridden 500m, found nothing in stretch.
Sharp break, raced handy 3 deep no cover, ridden 3rd 500m, faded on turn, soon beaten.
Speed to lead at break, dictated tight to rail, quickened 300m, kept on gamely, never headed.
Good break, tracked leader on rail, chased to go 2nd 200m, ran on soundly, closest at wire.
Fast start, slotted 5th 1off with cover from outer gate, wide final turn, strong closer centre track, just missed 2nd.
Missed break, raced 7th 1 off with cover, 6L back switched wide in stretch, ran on well.
Slow to stride, raced last 1 off with cover, 9L down 400m, widest in stretch, closed soundly without threatening.
Fair break, rousted to race 6th on rail, maintained position in one-paced run home.
Tardy break, sat last pair on paint, unbalanced 600m, stayed on in stretch.
Outpaced at break, driven 3 deep no cover near rear, plugged on moderately to wire.
Fair break, soon outpaced, bustled behind midfield on rail, found little in final stretch.
Good break, rousted to lay up on leader's flank, unable to match kick 300m, emptied 250m, faded in run home.
Speedy start, slotted 4th 1off no cover, ridden 500m, lost position turning in, soon weakened, eased when beaten.
Tardy start, raced last trio 2 deep with cover, driven 600m, struggled in run home.
Pushed to take rail and shared the lead at slow sectionals, dominated from 300M.
Pushed to occupy box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
Hard ridden early but not muster, settled in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 250M for 3rd.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, held up 4-2, dashed strongly when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 300M.
Eased at start to take rail behind the field, 5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, flattened 200M.
Eased to rear, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Pushed forward early but trapped wide, then eased back, 5Ls off the leaders, still 3 wide throughout, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on ok despite all negative racing situations.
Failed to muster, at rear but on the fence, 8Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, no progress.
Hard ridden to share the lead 2 wide at slow tempo, soon weakened 300M.
Hard ridden to share the lead, trapped 3 wide throughout, dropped off quickly 400M.
Awkward start, up quickly to settle second one off, led early straight, kept on well to hold off rivals.
Broke well, then checked, reined back to settle fifth then fourth rail, blocked early straight, out late, strong run, just failed.
Fair break, not rushed early, second last rail, blocked mid-straight for bid between horses, shifted out approaching 200m, finished fastest of all.
Fair break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, kept on without being able to challenge.
Broke well, aimed for lead but caught three wide without cover throughout, kept on mid-track until no extra late.
Fair break, not much early speed, fourth last rail, inside bid, slightly short of room mid-straight, kept on one pace.
Broke fast, ridden to lead rail, headed early straight, no extra.
Moderate start, third last one off, wide bid, no impression.
Fair break, not rushed early, settled rear rail, aimed for bid between horses, minimal progress.
Broke well, ridden to fourth rail, under pressure before straight, weakened.
Guided to the fence soon after the start, travelled smoothly in midfield, short of room mid-straight but quickened up well once a gap opened up, hit lead inside 100M, held on.
Settled 3-wide in mid-division, had no cover throughout, travelled strongly into contention passing 600M, stayed on in fine style, just held at the finish.
Never far off the pace, saved ground along the inside, was given every chance turning for home, kept on steadily.
Held up behind midfield, raced a shade keen halfway, switched to 3-wide before making the home turn, driven out 400M, stayed on well down the outside of track, nearest finish.
Raced keenly early stages, moved up to race outside the lead passing 1200M, all out inside 300M, led briefly mid-straight, caught by pursuers final 100M.
Held up in midfield 2-wide, had to be nudged along 600M out, ran on over final 300M but not going the pace to seriously challenge.
Led early stages, sat back behind leader near 1200M, kept on one paced, no threat to leaders inside 200M.
Caught wide early stages, settled in 4th within 3Ls of leader, driven inside 400M but not quickened, no extra final 100M.
Moved to the lead easily and set very steady pace, unable to shake off pursuers inside 300M, run ended 150M and weakened rapidly.
Held up last in the first half, pulled widest to challenge turning in but found disappointingly little off the bridle.
Towards the rear, about 8Ls off leader, never got competitive and faded away 200M out.
Held up near last, driven along to maintain his position over the home turn, soon left behind passing 350M.

Began moderately, niggled along on rails to gradually pick up to 5th about 3L off the pace, moved closer around the bend, obtained a clear run over 300 M out, ran on steadily to gain upper hand close to home.
Given reminders early, held midfield while niggled along to straight, fought on while hanging in and a difficult ride throughout final 300M.
Settled behind midfield, finished off race strongly inside final 200 M.
Ridden along from a wide gate, settled for 2nd outside leader, hit the front from tiring pacesetter upon straightening, unable to sustain effort and headed inside 100 M.
Settled just better than midfield, fought on steadily in straight, did best work late.
Began fairly from a wide gate, soon settled towards the rear, made headway to wide in midfield coming out of back straight, remained wide turning in, kept on steadily without quickening.
Raced wide without cover in prominent position, came under pressure on straightening, ran home one-paced.
Rear early, gradually picked up to midfield along rails, one-paced from similar position into straight.
Began awkwardly losing ground, settled towards the rear, wide into straight, inconvenienced on straightening, ran home one-paced.
Began from the widest draw, ridden to take up running and cross for rails run, led the field to 400 M, folded up quickly.
Towards rear throughout, baulked for a run early in straight, one-paced.
Soon dropped to the rear, never seen with a chance.
Midfield early but soon improved to a prominent position, dropped out tamely after straightening. (Blood in trachea.)
Never on terms.
Posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip while racing behind the speed. Hit the lead after the 100m and drew clear in the run to the post.
Parked in a handy position, 2 wide with cover. Peeled out after being held up early in the straight and got to the line nicely.
Made its run from behind midfield the fence. Ran into traffic problems in the straight, closed off well after obtaining a clear run near the 200m.
Led early before handing up and taking a trailing position on the rails near the 800m. Had no excuses.
Eventually worked its way to the lead and crossed to the fence near the 800m. Faded over the last 100m.
Settled in second position 1 off no cover. Came up one paced over the final stages.
Raced midfield, 1 off with cover. Closed off evenly.
Settled 3 back the fence. Had every chance, was one paced in the run to the line.
Began awkwardly travelling midfield 3 deep with cover. Commenced to tire after the furlong.
Rider had difficulty with saddle shifting back in the early stages. Horse was ridden to go forward but was posted 4 wide without cover on the circle, midfield. (See Racing Incident.)
Travelled back in the field, 2 wide with cover. Never made an impression in the home straight.
Slow to begin settling in last position, 3 deep with cover. Came wide in the final stretch and was never likely.
Travelled behind midfield, 1 off no cover. Failed to close off.
Settled at the rear along the paint, had cover. Struggled in the home straight. (Bled.)
Eased back, settled behind midfield, 6Ls behind the leader, swung wide and took time to gather momentum early in the Home Straight, dashed sharply in the last furlong and hit the line strongly.
Broke well, in the early stages raced ungenerously, gradually dropped to be 4Ls behind the leader, dashed well in the last 300M, battled on gamely, beaten in the last 30M.
Broke sharply, settled third without cover, ran on well after straightening, battled on strongly and got third.
Jumped only fairly, 4Ls behind the leader, peeled wide and looked like a winner in the last 250M but couldn't provide more in the last 150M, failed to challenge.
Jumped fairly, trapped wide and without cover, kept on only one pace in the Home Straight, got a distant fifth.
Slow to begin, 9ls behind the leader, no rushed, swung wide after straightening, passed tired runners.
Broke well, settled 3Ls behind the leader, one pace after straightening and weakened after 250M.
Failed to muster speed in the early stages, settled 7Ls behind along the rail and made no progress after straightening.
Gradually came across from the wide barrier and took the lead, led on its own by 3Ls, faded sharply in 250M.
Jumped fairly, taken across from the wide barrier, 7Ls behind the leader, never in a competitive position. Tailed out.
Fast start, bustled early to race inside leader on rail, led 400m, soon kicked clear, closed out strongly.
Tardy start, rolled to fore of midfield on rail, progress to 2nd 350m, chased winner, always held.
Pace from wide gate, trapped 4 deep midfield, shaken up 3L back 400m, to 3rd 250m, closed out well.
Fair break, sat behind midfield 1 off with cover, advanced to 4th 200m, kept on one pace thereafter.
Tardy start, raced 1off close behind pace, tight for room 400m, kept on gamely without threatening.
Slow start, raced 3 deep behind midfield, hard-ridden into stretch, stayed on late centre track.
Outpaced at break, rousted last pair on rail, progress 600m, ridden into contention 400m, run tapered.
Good break, covered up mid rank 3 deep, hemmed in 400m to 250m, one-paced when gap came.
Missed break, raced at tail, shaken up 400m, stayed on past beaten rivals.
Smart break, driven early, raced 3rd 3 deep no cover, every chance turning in, struggled in run to wire.
Slow start from wide gate, raced last trio 3 deep with cover, short-lived headway in stretch until weakening late.
Fair break, rousted, soon outpaced near rear 1off with cover, unable to quicken off turn, never a factor.
Rousted from gate, trapped 4 wide no cover handy, 5th & ridden 430m, emptied out 350m, well beaten.
Fast break to lead 1 off, headed 400m, faded right out in run home.
Fair break, camped behind midfield 1 off, switched out into stretch, quickened 300m, surged to lead 50m, in command.
Missed break, raced rail near rear, 5L down crowded for room 400m, daylight 300m, closed to nick 2nd last stride.
Good break, sat close 2nd 2 deep, led 430m, kicked 2L clear 300m, emptied & headed 50m, lost 2nd last stride.
Smart break, travelled 3 wide with cover midfield, quickened to 2nd 200m, 3rd 150m, faded out of frame last strides.
Broke well, raced midfield on paint, hard-ridden 400m, battled on to line.
Bumped start, speed to lead on rail, headed 430m, kept on at same gallop.
Taken behind from wide gate, towards rear 3 deep with cover, wide into stretch, ran on without threatening.
Raced at tail from wide gate, bustled 800m, widest into stretch, stayed on gamely for pressure.
Bumped start, speed to lay up early, settled 4th with cover, under pressure 350m, plugged on same pace.
Quick start, eased to mid rank 1 off with cover, crowded for room 400m, clear run at 300m, found little thereafter.
Broke with others, sat back of midfield on rail, outpaced final turn, moderate progress when run checked close home.
Moderate break, driven on from wide gate, 3 deep no cover 3rd 800m, ridden into stretch, faded out final 300m.
Broke with others, travelled 3 deep with cover behind front rank, found nothing off final turn.
Outpaced early, raced last pair, hard-driven 600m, last turning in, found nothing, eased when beaten.
Eased to sit in midfield, 6Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 400M to score.
Traveled in front of midfield with natural speed, 4.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made steady ground 400M for 2nd.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace on the rails, raced flat until 200M, made good ground to the line for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on well to the line.
Midfield, 7.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, made ground 300M.
Very slow away, behind midfield, 7.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, held up 400M, made steady ground when clear.
Eased back, 9Ls behind the good pace 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased at start, more than 11Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, didn't switch on until 200M, dashed well to the line.
Hard ridden to take rail and shared the lead at good pace, ran on until 200M flattened.
Eased to rear, more than 10Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, made steady ground 300M.
Midfield, 6Ls behind the good pace 2 wide, made some ground 300M.
At rear, 10Ls off the good pace along the fence, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden to share the lead 2 wide at good pace, soon weakened 400M.
Pushed to hold box seat, pace good, soon dropped off 400M.
Broke well, not rushed early, settled midfield rail, mid-track bid, led last 50m.
Fair break, crowded shortly after, settled second last rail, bid between horses, finished strongly to take second place late.
Broke well, up three wide to narrow lead early then third one off, bid three off, led again narrowly mid-straight, kept on until no extra late.
Broke well, settled third then fourth rail, inside run to join leaders mid-straight, outpaced last 100m.
Fair break, mid-rear two off, bid between horses, kept on quite well.
Fair break, up to lead from wide gate and eventually cross, headed 350m out, battled on but no extra.
Fair break, checked and blundered 1200m out, rear group one off, wide bid, modest progress, found to have superficial leg wounds after race.
Started slowly, mid-rear rail, inside bid, making ground slowly until steadied when no run 100m out, not fully tested as a result.
Bumped start, taken back to last one off, widest bid, modest progress.
Fair break, back to rear group but caught two wide, checked 1200m out, mid-track bid, one pace.
Broke well but caught two wide without cover from 1200m, mid-track bid, steadied off heels 200m, one pace.
Bumped start, midfield one off, looking for gaps early straight, shifted out for clear run, hampered briefly 250m out, found nil when asked.
Broke well, ridden early, midfield one off, bumped and unbalanced approaching straight, weakened.
Broke fast, led early then second rail, third into straight, weakened.
Travelled smoothly in mid-division, switched out to clear 250M, did best work late, got up near line.
Raced keenly in midfield, 3-wide no cover from 1000M, swiftly moved up to the lead inside 200M, kept on well, caught near line.
Always close up and obtained cover behind leaders, came with a strong looking challenge near 300M, had every chance but couldn't hold off first 2 final stages.
Dropped back to last 6-7Ls off the pace, driven along 500M, brought wide, stayed on but not getting to the top 3.
Held up behind midfield, saved ground near the inside, peeled out nearing the top of straight, made limited progress.
Tracked leader early, moved up to race outside the lead 800M, briefly led turning in, not pace of leaders final 200M.
Travelled in 3rd never far off the pace, gave limited response inside 400M, never a threat to leaders.
Caught wide, strode to the lead after opening 400M, headed 300M, weakened.
Dropped back to race on the outside of the rear pair, outpaced as the race got serious nearing 400M, never near to challenge.
Close up early stages, shuffled back to midfield nearing the turn, dropped away 300M.

Placing: PU
Comment: Settled towards the rear before breaking down badly at the top of the stretch.
Taken back to rear one off, shaken up approaching straight, widest bid, finished strongly to lead inside last 50m, impressive.
Broke well, settled third then fourth rail, bid one off to lead 250m out and draw two lengths clear, weakened and headed inside last 50m.
Fair break, not rushed early, settled third last rail, mid-track bid, slightly short of room mid-straight, kept on well without being able to threaten.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, urged turn, mid-track bid, shifted out under driving, kept on without being able to threaten.
Slow start, taken back to rear rail, bid between horses, pushed wide by rival, kept on steadily.
Fair break, not much early pace, mid-rear rail, bid one off, kept on one pace.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, unsettled, mid-track bid, steadied off heels 200m out, kept on one pace.
Broke well, not rushed early, fifth one off, mid-track bid, one pace.
Broke well, looking for lead but caught three wide no cover throughout, ridden and weakened from early straight.
Fair break, midfield one off, bid between horses, no progress under pressure.
Broke fact, led and crossed, dictated, headed early straight, weakened.
Broke well, second then third one off, pulling slightly, bid three wide, weakened.
Away ok, took a midfield spot just off pace, 3-4Ls back racing 2 wide throughout, peeled to centre on turning in, responded to hard riding to sweep passed rivals final 100m for a strong win.
Away with rest, ended up 5Ls back in midfield on rails, crept closer saving ground turning, made a strong bid at 200m, overhauled by winner late.
Broke well, took prime position on leaders back, all favours to bend, into mix from 300m, stayed on well but unable to find extra last 100m.
Showed plenty of early speed to cross from a wide gate racing outside leader, fair run with even sections, applied test to leader at 400m and took over, peaked 100m.
Angled into a spot behind midfield, raced 6-7Ls back in 2 wide line, plenty to do turning, closed best of rest to be nearest on line.
Drifted back from a tricky alley, raced behind midfield, 3 wide 6-7Ls away with cover, still near last turning, bumped in straight and kept on ok despite this to make minor progress.
Jumped with them, taken back to race behind midfield, shade keen in a 3 wide position with cover on circle, 5ls or so away turning, switched out but only battled when clear.
Even break, went forward but posted 3 wide throughout, had cover in midfield on circle 4Ls back, clear from 300m but was one paced concluding stages.
Standard jump, allowed to drift back, raced 4 wide at rear 6ls back, keen in mid section and still well back to bend, bumped at 200m, stayed on ok in circumstances.
No early speed, settled at rear on rails, 7Ls or so off lead, always well back, took inside runs turning and passed a few tired runners late.
Even start, trapped 4 wide and pressed on to race 3 wide without cover 3Ls back, did work until turning, soon struggling and faded after tough trip.
Away in line, pressed on but caught 4 wide, unable to slot in and travelled very wide with cover throughout, struggling turning and unable to raise another effort after hard run.
Began nicely and took a trail in ideal spot 1 out 1 back, travelled well throughout, peeled out turning but offered little and weakened disappointingly (see racing incidents).
Showed plenty of speed to lead from wide gate, set even tempo to suit, challenged at 400m, kept on to 200m when run ended.

Settled in last few, commenced move turning in, ran on quite well down the centre of the straight to assert authority closing stages.
Settled in last few, finished off race nicely inside final 200 M, did best work late.
Began awkwardly losing ground, settled at the back, went wide for a run entering straight, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.

Began fairly, settled in remote 4th while maintaining a reasonable pace down far side, became close up with leading trio dropped back to the field on straightening, fought on steadily without threatening.
Settled in rear of midfield, similar turning into straight when not much room early on, kept on steadily down inner to be nearest at finish.
Ridden for pace early, chased fast-paced leaders in 3rd down far side, shared pace momentarily on straightening when pacesetters folded up on straightening, swamped inside final 200 M.
Began moderately, settled in midfield on rails, shifted out for a run entering home, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Jockey lost balance briefly jumping out, settled on rails in forward of midfield far side, closer up turning for home, faded gradually close to home.
Raced wide in midfield without cover to straight, ran home one-paced.
Always in last few, saved ground turning for home, found nothing.

Driven from a wide draw to soon take up running, narrowly headed coming out stables bend but maintained fast pace to hold rails run against 2-wide leader, kept on early in straight before tiring badly inside final 200 M.
Travelled mainly in midfield, faded on straightening.
Never seen with a chance.
Soon came to vie for lead, gained slender advantage coming out of stables bend maintaining a fast second section, dropped away quickly after home turn. (Lame next day and Jockey warned.)
Travelled nicely 1 out 1 back. Took some time to wind up in the straight, snatching victory in the shadows of the post.
Posted 3 deep without cover on the circle whilst parked just behind the speed. Looked the winner at the 100m, but was nailed on the wire
Was hampered near the 800m, then coursed 4 wide without cover ahead of midfield. Maintained a good gallop all the way down the running.
Led the fence. Was well clear of runners near the 300m but faded late, managed to hold a spot in the frame.
Settled behind midfield the fence. Closed off satisfactorily through the field in the straight.
Parked midfield, 1 off with cover. Kept on one paced in the home straight.
Raced with the backmakers, 2 wide with cover. Finished off evenly.
Ridden along vigorously to go forward but didn't muster and drifted back to settle worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Plugged away in the run to the line.
Parked in second position, 1 off no cover. Commenced to tire early in the home straight.
Slow to begin settling at the rear along the fence. Kept to the inside in the home straight but failed to close off.
Tracked the leading division in a handy position along the paint. Was a beaten horse after the 500m.
Travelled at the tail of the field, 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the final stretch.
Eased back, settled behind the leader 5Ls along the rail, peeled wide in the Home Straight and dashed strongly in the last 250M, won comfortably.
Began well and slotted into a good seat, tracked behind front runners, ran on well but was checked near the 100M, could run closer if no incident.
Began well. In the early stages raced keenly and led the field with a fast pace, kicked away after straightening but weakened after the 150M.
Taken across behind runners from the wide barrier, settled 6Ls behind the leader, raced 3 wide with cover, gradually improved, rounding the Home Bend swung wide and ran on well.
Jumped only fairly and tracked well 2Ls behind front runners, dashed a little after straightening and kept on one pace after 250M, was checked near the 100M.
Began well and pushed forward but failed to come across from the wide draw, trapped 4 wide and without cover throughout, ran on but without real threats.
Jumped only fairly and pushed forward, trapped 3 wide and without cover throughout, kept on one pace after straightening.
Eased back, taken across behind runners from the wide barrier, sat at the rear, trapped 3 wide, swung wide and passed tired runners.
Began well but soon dropped back to midfield, niggled along throughout, weakened after straightening.
Jumped fairly and failed to muster speed, sat at the rear, never a factor.
Shortly after the start was checked and became unbalanced, niggled along the rail, failed to follow the field, never looked likely.
Began sharply, ridden to go forward and parked outside the leader, faded sharply after straightening.
Smart break, raced handy on rail, progress final turn, swept down paint to lead 180m, in command at wire.
Fast break for early lead, headed 1400m, led into backstretch, 2L clear 500m, headed 180m, no extra.
Rousted from gate, bustled behind midfield 1 off, ridden 8L back turning in, switched rail 300m, strong run to wire.
Awkward start & lost ground, taken forward, raced 3 deep no cover midfield, wide into stretch, closed out soundly.
Reared start, bustled midfield 1 off, outpaced final turn, stayed on dourly without threatening.
Missed kick a touch, driven to lead 1400m, soon settled 2nd, lost place 250m, faded final 100m.
Tardy break, raced mid rank on rail, ridden 400m, one paced in run home.
Missed break, raced 3rd last, wide progress 700m, 7th 400m, plugged on tamely.
Moderate break, taken back to 2nd last, over 11L back final turn, stayed on centre track.
Good break wide gate, trapped 3 deep, advanced 1000m to dispute 2nd 1 off no cover, driven 500m, soon weakened in stretch.
Disputed lead at break, raced fore of mid rank 2 deep with cover, 5th & driven 500m, found nothing.
Fair break, raced 2 deep near rear, driven 2 wide 800m, struggled in run home.
Ridden from gate, pushed along detached last, plugged on moderately in stretch, never a factor.
Bustled early, niggled behind midfield, driven in backstretch, found nothing.
Missed break, rolled on to sit handy 2 wide no cover, 4L 3rd 400m, quickened 200m, swept to lead 100m, comfortable at wire.
Moderate break, driven early, sat 3 deep midfield, off heels lost place 700m, 7L 8th & bumped 400m, swept to 2nd last stride.
Fair break, trapped wide, rolled to lead 800m, 3L clear 400m, all out 200m, headed 100m, lost 2nd at line.
Good start, disputed lead until 3rd 1 off at 800m, lost position on turn, rallied in stretch, kept on without threat.
Fair start, settled mid rank 1 off with cover, picked up off home turn, lacked pace final 200m.
Broke well, trapped 4 deep from wide gate, 3 deep no cover 6th 600m, to 4th 400m, one paced thereafter.
Broke with others, raced wide, advanced to 2nd 800m 1 off no cover, lost place 250m, struggled in run home.
Tardy start, raced on paint near rear, ridden on turn, widest into stretch, kept on same pace.
Taken back from wide draw, raced at tail 3 wide, modest advance on turn, plugged on past beaten rivals.
Broke well, camped rail midfield, off heels lost ground 800m, found nothing in final stretch.
Led at break, shuffled to midfield on rail, close enough 400m, unable to quicken into stretch, weakened out.
Missed break, bustled along 2nd last 2 deep, to tail 600m, never a factor.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout but indeed raced on faster part of track, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, scored comfortably 150M.
Settled 1.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout but indeed raced on faster part of track, favoured by the slow tempo, ran on well for 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, ran 3rd.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, however raced on slower part of track, flattened 200M.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, lack turn of foot.
Bumped start, pushed to keep up with the field, 5.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed fairly.
Hard ridden to take a more prominent spot, checked early, 2Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace and raced on slower part of track, flattened 200M.
Midfield along the fence, 4Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, no dash.
Failed to muster at rear, 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, no turn of foot.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, 3 wide throughout but indeed raced on faster part of track, not suited by the slow pace, no progress.
Pushed forward, sat outside the leader, benefited by the slow tempo, however raced on slower part of track, soon weakened 300M.
Taken back from wide gate, third last one off, improved wide approaching straight, widest bid, finished fast to lead 50m out, drew clear.
Fair break, midfield one off, urged, improved wide approaching straight, mid-track bid, finished well, outpaced by winner.
Broke well, third three off early, then led and eventually crossed, kicked clear early straight, kept on well until collared last 50m, no extra.
Broke well, not rushed early, fourth one off, bid three wide entering straight, kept on but no kick.
Broke well, shared early lead then third one off, improved to second entering straight, challenged leader, no extra once beaten off.
Fair break, not much early pace, fourth last rail, urged, bid one off entering straight, kept on along rail without being able to threaten.
Slow start, last one off, still last into straight, looking for room between horses for mid-track bid, some late progress.
Slow away, second last rail, inside bid, not clear run until mid-straight, kept on but not pace to challenge.
Slow away, third last rail, ridden along to fifth last rail, some progress inside without being able to threaten.
Broke well, second rail, third into straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, urged but short of early pace, midfield rail, inside bid, weakened.
Fair break, not much early speed, fifth last one off, mid-track bid, no progress.
Settled 3-wide in midfield, ran on strongly over final 300M, led inside 100M, kept on to hold off fast finishing 2nd.
Given a waiting ride, 7Ls to make up passing 400M, finished off very strongly, nearest finish.
Positioned 3-wide in the group chasing leaders, no cover for the entire trip, responded well inside 300M, led mid-straight, headed inside 100M.
Always handy, 2-wide in the group chasing the pace, kept on steadily in straight but not able to close in on leaders.
Blundered at the start, towards the rear of the main group, 5Ls off leader passing 400M, stayed on well.
Outpaced early stages, 8Ls off the pace in last, pulled widest to challenge turning in, finished off well.
Began very awkwardly, rushed along to take up a 3-wide spot in midfield, kept on one paced over final 300M.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, picked up only fairly turning into straight, no impression on leaders. (Lame next day.)
Always prominent outside the lead, kept on one paced, out of contention nearing 100M.
Held up in mid-division, had to be pushed along to maintain its position near 600M, never able to challenge.
Urged along to lead, set steady pace, headed near 200M, weakened rapidly final stages.
Tracked leaders in a steadily run race but found disappointingly little turning into straight, dropped away inside 200M.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Led or disputed lead, fought on doggedly under pressure.
Travelled about 3L off the speed early stages, soon came to challenge inside final 400 M, held every chance but unable to sustain effort close to home.
Began well, soon taken across to grandstand side, settled just off the speed in 3rd or 4th, kept on nicely for a placing.
Began moderately losing ground, travelled just worse than midfield early on, attempting to improve when checked 400 M out, obtained run near stands side passing 300 M, finished off race well.
Jumped moderately, gradually picked up to settle just off the speed, kept on steadily without quickening.
Began fairly, always thereabouts, hit front passing 600 m and held slender advantage until overhauled inside final 200 M.
Tardy start, travelled in last few, took closer order inside 400 M, sustained progress throughout final stages to be nearest at finish.
Close up early stages, lost position halfway out, kept on at the one pace to finish.
Never far off, came under pressure inside final 350 M, ran home one-paced.
Last early, ran past well-beaten horses mid-race, remained in last few across the line.
Shared pace while racing on its own down the centre of the track, yielded ground gradually after coming onto course proper, dropped out closing stages.
Behind midfield early, beaten from halfway out.
Hard ridden, but never on terms.
Prominent briefly, soon dropped out.
Began awkwardly, lost ground and travelled worse than midfield the fence. Went for runs through the field in the straight and ran on smartly.
Rated in 5th position 1 off the fence with cover. Peeled out passing the 500m and kept on well despite laying in and shifting ground near the 100m.
Settled 1 off early near midfield with cover. Got close to heels passing the 800m, shifted out and raced 3 wide without cover on the circle. Was carted wider after the 500m, kept grinding away.
Went forward and persisted to take up the lead after the 900m travelling on the rails. Was still there at the furlong but tired late.
Made its run from last position, travelled 2 deep with cover. Found the line strongly.
Camped worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Made some ground in the home straight.
Raced in third position, 2 wide with cover. Failed to show any dash and faded after the 200m.
Settled back in the field, 3 deep with cover. Came wide in the straight and ran on fairly.

Vied for front running duties before handing up and taking a sit after the 900m. Settled in second position tracking the leader, peeled out 1 off near the 600m, copped a check at the 100m & was a spent force thereafter.
Contested the lead early before settling in about 4th position along the fence with cover. Was a beaten horse after the 200m.
Taken back from the outside barrier and settled 3 wide without cover in the early and middle stages behind midfield. Got cover on the circle, finished off one paced.
Parked midfield the fence. Had every chance but came up flat over the final furlong.
Parked with the backmakers 1 off the fence after being slow to begin. Made no impression in the final stretch.
Put its head down at the start and lost a considerable amount of ground settling towards the rear along the paint. Struggled in the run home. (To trial.)
Driven forward, parked outside the leader, asked for run 300M, stuck on well and just hung on to score. Benefited by the slow pace.
Midfield, tracked well box seated, 3Ls behind the leader, made ground on the inside and closed to the line well. Benefited by the slow pace.
Began well, dropped back from the wide barrier, sat at the rear, 6Ls behind the leader, swung wide and ran on strongly.
Began sharply, trapped 3 wide without cover, looked likely but couldn't find any extra after 200M, kept on one pace.
Pushed forward and led the field, finished off the race at one pace.
Tracked well behind midfield, 3Ls off the leader, made ground in the centre of the track without real threats. Hampered by the slow pace.
Taken back from the wide barrier, settled 5Ls behind the bunched up field, raced 3 wide with cover, swung wide after straightening and ran on steady.
Positively ridden, 3 wide with cover in the handy-mid, swung wide and kept on one pace but weakened in the last 100M.
Shortly after the start was checked, improved gradually along the rail, couldn't find a clear run until 250M and finished off one paced.
Eased back, 5Ls behind the leader with rail run, gradually improved, kept on one pace after straightening.
Midfield, raced 4 wide without cover, swung wide, kept on one pace after straightening, faded after 250M, well beaten.
Settled handy-mid, niggled along rounding the Home Bend, faded sharply after 300M, well beaten.
Pace from widest gate, trapped wide no cover handy, niggled 1200m, vied for lead from final turn, led 100m, held on.
Raced handy on paint, switched 1 off 1100m, led 3 wide 450m, tight stretch duel, headed 100m, rallied, just failed.
Slotted 2 off near rear, niggled last pair 800m, hampered 700m, advanced wide on turn, strong run to 3rd last strides.
Taken behind runners, camped rail near rear, taken 1 off 1400m, hard-ridden 4L back 450m, stayed on well.
Bumped start, slotted 3 deep with cover back of midfield, wide progress 800m, to 3rd 250m, run tapered.
Slow start, bustled early, trapped 3 deep midfield, led 1200m, headed 450m, hung out in straight, plugged on.
Led at break, niggled & headed 1200m, to 3rd on fence 1000m, ran home one-paced.
Broke with others, sat mid rank 1 off, outpaced & lost position 800m, stayed on moderately.
Outpaced early strides, raced 1 off with cover behind midfield, outpaced 800m, last pair 400m, stayed on past beaten rivals.
Good break, keen early, raced 2nd 1 off no cover, every chance 400m, emptied 300m, weakened out.
Started well, settled fore of midfield on rail, switched out on turn, struggled in run to wire.
Slow start, sat rail behind midfield, ridden 600m, limited response, never a factor.
Raced last pair 1 off with cover, progress to midfield 4 wide 900m, all out 6 wide final turn, faded thereafter.
Broke with others, raced last pair, ridden at tail 600m, well beaten.
Lost ground start, trapped 4 wide back of midfield, taken stands' side off final turn, closed strongly to lead last strides.
Sharp break, sat 2nd 1 off no cover, wore down leader in stretch, led 200m, headed last strides.
Good start, rolled to lead from wide berth, quickened 400m, headed 200m, battled on, always held.
Crowded start, driven early, bustled on fence behind midfield, 5L back switched out final turn, closed to snatch 4th at wire.
Good start, trapped 4 deep midfield from wide gate, progress on turn, 3rd 350m, ran on same pace.
Crowded start, raced back of midfield 1 off, off heels 800m, switched wide home turn, closed out soundly.
Missed kick & driven, sat last trio on rail, laboured on final turn, stayed on under hard drive, closest at wire.
Fast break, rousted to lay up early, bustled 3rd on rail, driven 500m, lost place 350m, plugged on one pace.
Smart break, sat 4th on fence, off heels 850m, lost ground, driven 450m, unable to quicken, faded in run home.
Fair break, rousted early, niggled 1 off last trio, hampered 800m, outpaced on turn, boxed on moderately.
Tardy break, driven fore of mid rank 1off with cover, ridden 500m, faded in stretch.
Taken back at break, raced 3 wide at tail, effort on turn, kept on past beaten rivals.
Speed at gate, trapped 3 deep fore of midfield, found nothing turning in, soon beaten.
Raced midfield 3 wide, shuffled back on turn, weakened out from 400m, never a factor.
Led by 1.5Ls at good pace, traveled well on best part of track and scored.
Hard ridden to sit just behind the leading group, 3Ls off the good pace, made steady ground 200M for 2nd.
Prominent, 1.5Ls off the good pace, soon under pressure 500M, but hung on well for 3rd.
Awkward away, pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace, ran on well.
Slow away, 6.5Ls off the good pace, progressed steadily 400M, lack room 100M and not tested.
Pushed early but failed to muster, 4Ls off the good pace, soon struggled whilst facing kick back, just held ground.
Prominent, 1.5Ls off the good pace, soon flattened 250M.
Awkward away, midfield, 5.5Ls off the good pace, ran on ok.
Midfield, 5Ls behind the good pace, ran on fairly.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace, ran on ok.
Slow away, more than 9Ls off the good pace, ran on fairly.
Bumped start, 6.5Ls off the good pace, no progress.
At back, 6Ls off the good pace, raced on slower part of track, no progress.
Very slow away, raced on slower part of track, never competitive at rear.
Fair break, not rushed early, settled second last rail, urged approaching turn, out for wide bid, finished strongly to lead 250m out, soon in charge.
Taken back and steadied, three lengths last early, closed up approaching turn, widest bid, finished well but always held by winner.
Fair break, third last one off, improved two off to midfield approaching straight, wide bid, joined leaders mid-straight, outpaced late.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear rail, improved inside approaching straight, bid one off then shifed wide, kept on well late.
Broke fast, second one off, led narrowly and briefly 300m out, no extra when headed by wide runners.
Broke well, fifth one off, bid three wide approaching straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, led rail and dictated, driven early straight, weakened.
Fair break, urged early, mid-rear one off, bid between horses mid-track, one pace.
Slightly slow break, ridden to fourth rail, inside bid, weakened.
Fair break, up to fourth three wide, mid-track bid, found nil.
Travelled strongly in midfield, switched wide nearing home straight in search of better ground, ran on well towards the stands' side, led inside 200M, kept going.
Settled in mid-pack 5-6Ls off the pace, responded well turning in, got up for 2nd 50M out but was readily held by the winner. (Jockey dropped whip 200M.)
Held up in midfield on the inside, made good headway passing 500M, led 350M-200M, kept on to the line.
Tracked leader, hung about a bit when put under pressure early straight but kept on finding, not pace of first two final 150M.
Never far off the pace, 3Ls behind leader turning into straight, ran on fairly under pressure, faded final 100M.
In mid-division, had an uninterrupted run final 400M but never looked like getting to the leaders.
Held up behind midfield, drifted towards stands' side approaching top of the straight, kept on only fairly and not going the pace to seriously challenge.
Emerged as leader from 1200M, set even pace, headed near 350M, weakened and no extra final stages.
Towards the tail of the field, pulled wide 500M, kept on same pace along stands' rail.
Dropped back, settled near last 8Ls off the pace, found disappointingly little in the finish and may not have handled the track conditions.
About 3Ls of the lead, driven 450M, found little, dropped away 250M.
Up with early pace, sat behind leader 1100M, not picked up when asked, weaken away 250M.
Switched off to last, well off the pace in middle stages, taken to stand's side turning in, not picked up. (Jockey reported his horse didn't handle the track conditions.)
Close up behind leader, under pressure 500M out, dropped away rapidly. (Irregular Heart Rhythm.)
Fair break, mid-rear rail, moved wide approaching turn, finished strongly down stand rail to lead last strides.
Broke well, third one off, mid-track bid, led 300m out, ran on gamely, just caught.
Broke fast, led narrowly one off but never crossed, kept to mid-track straight, headed 300m out, kept on gamely but no match for wide challengers.
Fair break, sixth two off, wide bid, ran on well without being able to threaten.
Slightly slow away, settled fifth then sixth one off, urged, mid-track bid between horses, kept on one pace, lost left front plate.
Fair break, not much early pace, urged turn, fairly wide bid, kept on steadily without being able to threaten.
Slowly away, taken back from wide draw to rear one off, hung out slightly rounding turn, wide bid, modest progress.
Fair break, third rail then fourth, mid-track bid, kept on but no chance with wide challengers.
Fair break, ninth two off from wide draw, wide bid, kept on steadily without being able to threaten.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, looking for wide run early straight, short of room 300m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not rushed early, second last one off, wide bid but between horses, steadied when no run 100m out, limited progress.
Fair break, not rushed early, midfield rail, inside bid, no progress.
Fair break, back from wide draw to third last one off, aimed wide, found little.
Fair break, ridden up along rail to lead, hung slightly and headed far side, shaken up for inside bid, found nil.
Pressed forward to race on speed, faced breeze 3 wide without cover 1-2Ls back, travelled strongly turning, angled down stands side and kicked strongly, defied rivals final 200m to score an easy win.
Even getaway, positioned nicely just behind lead pair, a few spots off rail, travelled well in mid section, set out after leader on turning, stuck on nicely but unable to wear down margin last 200m.
Ended up racing behind midfield in 2 wide line 6-7Ls back, overaced in mid section, gradually eased out and made good progress down stands side to take 3rd.
Away in line, assumed a midfield role along inside 4-5Ls back, fair run to turn, made steady headway without looking a winning hope in straight, lost a place late.
Showed usual speed to take up running, set an even tempo to bend, kicked 2Ls clear but raced on less preferable ground, stayed on evenly given circumstances.

Slow into stride, ended up in rear division 8Ls or more back, raced 2 wide and proved difficult to settle in mid section, made ground closer to inside in straight picking up many positions final furlong.
Fair getaway, raced behind midfield on rails, 6Ls or so back in mid section, saved ground turning and made in roads along least preferred section of track, peaked at 200m.
Pressed forward as usual to race two wide outside leader, even run with standard tempo, ridden along turning a looked a brief place chance but unable to maintain position final 300m.
Fractious in gates, no early speed and settled back with last few 3 wide with cover, 9-10Ls back throughout, swung widest with job to do turning, only picked up minor ground.
Began with purpose, took a trail on leaders back, fair run to bend, didn't let down as usual and weakened cheaply in straight. Blood in trachea and found to be lame next day.
Settled 3 wide behind midfield 6-7Ls back, had cover throughout, swung wider turning, made no serious progress.
No early speed, dropped down to rails at rear, at tail nearly 10Ls back, switched wider rounding bend, only passed tired runners.
Assumed a spot in midfield 5Ls or so away in 2 wide line, reasonable trip to bend, niggled turning and soon struggling, dropped right off (mucopus in trachea).
Out with rest, landed a midfield position, 3 wide with cover, even run to turn, folded soon after straightening.
