Began fairly, soon took up running, crossed to rails coming out of back straight, steadied pace in second section around the bend, hung on under pressure to just stave off late challenges.
Well there 2-wide in 3rd, soon came to challenge under pressure, fought on nicely to just fail to peg back winner.
Began awkwardly, soon dropped to the rear, pulled his way forward around the bend when pace slackened, not far off entering straight, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Ridden along early, settled just off the speed on rails, carried backward around the bend, soon renewed effort on straightening, finished off race well.
Began moderately, settled in 4th on rails within 3L of speed, came off rails over 500 M out and carried 4 wide into straight, kept on steadily without quickening.
Towards rear of the small field, came as close as just 2L off the lead when pace slackened around the bend, soon yielded ground after straightening.
In middle of small field far side, carried wide around the bend, widest turning in, never recovered.
Camped in a handy position travelling 4th, 2 deep with cover. Wound up late to snatch victory in the shadows of the post.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race in 2nd position, 1 off no cover. Fought strongly over the last 50m but was nailed on the line.
Raced keenly in the early stages and opened up a lead of a couple of lengths margin by the 800m. was overhauled over about the last 50m.
Settled worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Peeled out early in the straight and finished off soundly to make the frame.
Made its run 2nd from the rear after travelling 1 off with cover. Got a nice cart into the race rounding the home turn made good ground in the straight.
Began well then took up a trailing position off the speed, along the fence with cover. Faded over the last 100m.
Ridden along early but couldn't go the early speed, travelling 3 deep with cover, midfield. Only plodded to the finishing line.
Crowded at the start settling behind midfield the fence with cover. Kept on at the same speed in the home straight.
Parked just behind midfield, 2 deep with cover, proved difficult to settle early. Whacked away at the same pace in the run to the line.
Settled midfield the fence with cover. Struggled in the final stretch.
From the outside barrier was taken across behind runners shortly after the start settling in last position along the fence. Made no impression in the home straight.
Pulled early, travelling midfield, 1 off with cover. Failed to run on.
Raced just off the speed but coursed 3 wide without cover. Never likely.
Posted 4 wide without cover travelling midfield. Finished tailed out. (Vet reported blood in trachea and irregular heart rhythm.)
Began and settled positively, 3Ls behind the leader, gradually improved, dashed well in the centre of the track, took control in the final 50M.
Midfield, settled 6Ls behind the leader, peeled wide after straightening, sprinted home strongly in the last 250M but couldn't find any extra in the last 100M.
Pushed forward, tracked well box seated, ran on gradually after straightening but never able to match with the first two runners, hung on for third.

Eased back, was bumped and became unbalanced in the early stages, settled 6Ls behind the leader along the rail, gradually improved, dashed on well after finding a clear run in the last furlong, just missed third.
Midfield, was checked in the early stages and dropped to the rear, 7Ls behind the leader, finished off the race well in the centre of the track.
Broke well, settled handy with cover, weakened after straightening.
Taken across from the wide barrier, settled 7Ls behind at the rear, raced 3 wide with cover, swung widest and ran on fairly.
Slow to begin, raced greenly and was checked several times in the early stages. Settled 6Ls behind the leader, swung wide, ran on only fairly.
Pushed forward and parked outside the leader, obtained the lead rounding the Home Bend, kept on one pace and faded in the last furlong.
Settled at the rear, never looked competitive at any stage.
Pushed forward and led the field, dropped 2Ls behind the leader rounding the Home Bend, kept on one pace after straightening and weakened in the last furlong.
Ridden forward but failed to come across from the outside gate, settled 4 deep in midfield, under pressure rounding the Home Bend and soon weakened.
Eased back and settled 9Ls behind the leader, raced greenly and niggled along rounding the Home Bend, couldn't improve at any stage.
Slow to begin. Clearly last throughout despite ridden along, well beaten.
Speed from gate, settled 3rd on rail, taken 1 off no cover 800m, shaken up to join leader 200m, led all out 100m, held on narrowly.
Sharp start, bustled to lead early, soon 4L clear of field, 1/2L clear 400m, tested 200m, headed 100m, rallied, just failed.
Fair break, niggled early, settled 4th on paint, handily positioned when outpaced 400m, kept on well, closest at wire.
Dropped in at break, bustled 1 off with cover 5th, hard-ridden 400m, stayed on soundly, just missed frame.
Fast break, raced clear 2nd 4L off lead, closed up into stretch, all out lost place 300m, battled until faded late.
Taken to rail at tail from wide gate, driven into stretch, outpaced & never a threat in run home.
Fair break, trapped 3 wide near rear, advanced 1400m, 2nd 1 off 1200m, worked hard in stretch to lead 100m, all out at wire.
Speed at start, raced 2nd on fence, 3rd 1200m, tapped for toe 450m, strong finish regained 2nd late.
Tardy start, raced mid rank 3 deep, progress 600m, driven 3L back 400m, stayed on, took 3rd last strides.
Ridden to lead from wide gate, hard-ridden 400m, resolute under pressure, headed 100m, no extra last strides.
Good break, sat fore of midfield on paint, shuffled back on turn, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Taken to last from wide berth, wide progress 800m, 6L back into stretch, ran on well to line.
Slow start, sat rail behind mid rank, taken 1 off 1400m, initially outpaced into home stretch, stayed on late.
Sharp break to 3rd 1 off no cover, shuffled back 1200m, kept on one-paced in stretch.
Raced 1 off with cover midfield, advanced 1200m, 3rd 400m, emptied soon after, weakened out.
Settled 3 wide near tail, advanced 800m, hard-ridden 600m, one-paced final turn, plugged on tamely.
Fair break, rousted early, raced midfield on paint, found little for pressure, soon beaten in home run.
Missed break, raced last trio 1 off, over-raced 1000m, driven 350m, found little, never a factor.
Broke well to sit handy, taken off heels 1st turn, dropped midfield 1200m, driven final turn, struggled in run home.
Moderate start, sat rail near rear, hard-ridden last at 600m, beaten early in stretch.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M to score.
Eased to rear, 7Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow tempo, got 2nd.
At back, 6.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide, hampered on straightening, harmed by the slow pace, raced flat until 200M, dashed strongly for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the slow pace along the fence, held up 4-2, little dash when clear.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground.
Checked start, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 4-2, kept finishing off well to the line.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Pushed forward, shared the lead 2 wide at slow sectionals, out of fuel 200M.
Pushed to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, blocked most straight, just ran on.
Hard ridden forward, sat 1L off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the slow temp, emptied 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the slow pace 3 wide, soon flattened 300M.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
Shared lead along the rails, suited by the slow tempo, weakened 250M.
At back on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, never progressed.
Broke well, ridden early to second one off, led narrowly 350m out, outstayed second for game win.
Fair break, ridden early to third, then fourth one off, mid-track challenge to lead early straight, just outstayed last 100m.
Fair break, not much early pace, rear rail, bid one off, finished strongly.
Fair break, midfield rail, back to mid-rear rail far side, inside bid, almost reached leaders mid-straight, one pace from 200m out.
Slowly away, second last one off, wide bid, ran on well without being able to challenge.
Moderate start, improved easily to midfield one off, mid-track bid, challenged briefly for lead, kept on one pace.
Moderate start, third last two off, wide bid, modest progress.
Moderate start, mid-rear one off, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield one off, back to mid rear then improved again to midfield approaching turn, mid-track bid, no progress from mid-straight.
Taken back from wide draw, two lengths last rail, second last into straight, bid between horses, one pace.
Fair break, ridden from gate but caught three wide no cover, seven wide into straight, found little when asked.
Broke well, ridden up from wide gate to lead and eventually cross, headed 350m out, weakened.
Fair break, showed speed to lead early then fourth rail, found nil straight, weakened.
Broke fast, led, then third rail, began to lose ground before straight, tailed off, found to have irregular heartbeat post-race.
Tracked leader, pressed the lead from 800M, took over nearing home straight, kept on steadily final 400M and outstayed the rest.
Last of 6, 6Ls off leader in a slowly run race, waited with till 400M, closed in on leader 150M out but couldn't sustain effort final stages and foiled in his Triple Crown bid.
Settled 5th of 6, picked up gradually passing 450M, loomed a threat 200M out but turned one pace final 150M.
Settled 2-wide in the pair chasing leaders, kept on same pace final 400m and never a serious threat to first 3.
Led very slowly, was taken on passing 800M, not able to quicken turning in, weakened inside 200M.
Tracked leaders in a slowly run race, struggled for pace passing 600M, dropped out 300M from home.
Fair break, not much early pace, tenth rail, improved rapidly inside after accident to rival, mid-track bid, finished fast to lead 50m out.
Broke fast, crowded early but soon led, kicked clear early straight, headed last 50m.
Fair break, slightly outpaced early, then u to fifth rail, bid three off, kept on steadily without quite being able to challenge.
Fair break, ridden early but caught midfield two off, checked off heels of broken down horse 600m out, inside bid, kept on well.
Fair break, midfield two off, mid-track bid, stayed on one pace.
Broke well, third one off, bid three off, kept on one pace.
Fair break, crowded early, taken back to second last one off, bid between horses, some late progress.
Broke well, shared lead rail, headed early straight, fought back briefly then one pace.
Fair break, sixth two off, badly hampered when horse broke down 650m out, bid between horses but chance had gone.
Fair break, taken back from wide gate, last rail, inside bid, modest progress.
Moderate start, midfield rail, inside bid, no impression.
Taken back from wide draw, second last one off, badly checked by injured horse 600m out. No chance thereafter.

Placing: UR
Comment: Broke well, up to fourth one off, broke down badly 650m out, rider unseated.

Placing: UR
Comment: Fair break, mid-rear one off, collided with injured horse 600m out, unseated rider.
Slotted into ideal spot 1 out 1 back, travelled well throughout, let down nicely at 300m and kept going thereafter to score a comfortable win.
Drifted back from a tricky alley, 7Ls or so back in 2 wide line, plenty to do turning, made significant progress in straight to grab 2nd late in proceedings.
Found a midfield position 4Ls back in 2 wide line, ideal run throughout, edged closer turning, looked a serous threat at 300m, lost 2nd final 50m.
Well enough away, pressed on to take up the running, kept tempo even with pressure from outside horse leaving bend, headed inside 200m but kept on evenly to make frame.
Pressed forward early to take spot outside leader, first without cover 1L back, moved up to challenge at 500m, kept on to 100m before run ended.
Angled in just off midfield in two wide line, 5-6Ls back throughout, made run wider in straight but lacked extra gear last furlong and couldn't get closer.
Allowed to find a spot with cover 5-6Ls back on rails, easy time throughout and saved ground with inside runs turning, made minor progress to 200m.
Away with rest, raced 3Ls or so back on rails, no excuses in middle stages but forced to angle around a tiring running turning, closed off only fairly in straight.
Showed good speed as usual to take up running, took a trail soon after, all favours to bend, niggled turning and gave little in straight.
No early pace, shared rear racing 2 wide, best part of 8Ls back, still at tail turning, only got passed beaten runners.
Moderate beginning, shared rear on rails, 8Ls off top end, no asked in mid section, little to offer final 400m.
Drifted back to race behind midfield 7Ls away on rails, easy time throughout, ridden along turning and was disappointing with limited response in straight.
Pressed on from a wide gate to race outside leader, suited thereafter with even pace, pushed clear at 300m and kept going under rider to score comfortably.
Assumed a spot in midfield 4Ls away racing 2 wide, enjoyed a nice trail throughout, put into mix at 300m with a strong run, unable to reduce margin on winner final 200m.
No early speed, ended up last 10Ls back, at rear and set a big task with field to beat turning, switched widest and produced big closing sectional to take place late.
Pressed forward but unable to slot in, raced 3 wide without cover 2Ls off speed, did some work to bend, looked a place chance but lost out late and did receive some interference in final stages.
Ended up 3 wide in midfield 5Ls or so away, enjoyed cover to turn before improving near 400m, looked a place chance until final 100m.
Found an ideal spot 1 out 1 back, had no excuses 2-3Ls back to bend, didn't have enough to threaten but stayed on evenly behind heels of placegetters.
Even getaway, unable to get closer than 3 wide but had cover 3-4Ls back, fair run with even speed on, came wider turning, just had one speed in straight and held ground to line.
Pressed forward to take up running, set reasonable speed in front, tackled soon after turning in, stuck on ok before dropping off at 200m.
Angled into a rearward spot from outside alley, 7-8Ls back in two wide line to bend, made steady progress without clearest running in stretch to be nearest at finish.
Broke well and had nice run on back of speed first behind leader, right there to turn, kept to inside but proved one paced final 300m lacking usual finish.
Taken down to rails from a wide gate, raced behind midfield 6Ls or so back, easy time to turn, just kept on behind them in stretch.
No speed and settled back with last few, 8Ls or so away on rails, well back to bend, closed steadily before striking trouble inside 100m and almost fell, rider lost irons thereafter.
Settled at rear 3 wide with cover, 8Ls or so back, set task turning, never really got warm and was disappointing.
Only fair to begin, ended up 4Ls back in midfield on rails, soft run throughout, very one paced when pressure applied.

Jumped moderately, took up running 800 M out, hung on well under pressure.
Began well from the middle draw, led the field early, ceded advantage to eventual winner 800 M out, renewed effort on straightening, just failed to peg back winner closing stages.
From the widest draw, soon taken well back, trailed the field to 400 M, switched widest for a run after straightening, ran on strongly down the centre of the track.
Began fairly, settled mainly in 3rd on rails not far off the lead, baulked for a run inside final 200 M and not able to be tested.
Broke well from a wide draw, raced prominently and 3-wide without cover in 4th, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began in midfield, settled mainly in forward of midfield, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
In last few far side, took closer order around the bend, wide into straight, fought on steadily but never nearer.
Raced keenly in rear of midfield, steadied and lost position at the Rock, fought on steadily, kept on steadily without quickening.
Always in last few, kept on one paced.
Raced wide without cover in midfield most of way, made no show in straight.
Began fairly, settled in midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, faded gradually.
Went straight to the lead along the fence and made almost every post a winner thereafter to record a sound win
Had every possible hope after box seating. Maintained a nice effort in the run home.
Settled behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Kept up a good gallop right down the running.
Crowded at the start settling 3 back the fence. Finished off soundly to fill the frame.
Made its run from behind midfield after settling 1 off with cover. Made nice ground in the straight.
Settled midfield, 1off with cover. Straighten in the middle of the track and closed off steadily. (See incident report.)
Taken across behind runners at the start settling at the rear close to the rail. Ran on well in the final stretch.
Parked 3 back 1 off with cover. Had every hope but failed to deliver tiring over the latter stages.
Travelled at the back of the field 1 off with cover. Worked home steadily in the home straight.
Settled 1 out 1 back. Struggled in the straight. (Blood in the trachea.)
Ridden along in the early and middle stages to stay in touch eventually settling with the backmakers along the fence. Failed to close off.
Eventually worked forward and crossed to race upsides the leader. Punctured after the final furlong.
Pushed forward, trapped 3 wide in the early stages, parked 2 deep outside the leader before the Home Turn, battled on strongly and kicked away in the last 50M.
Began well and pushed forward but failed to come across, tracked 3 wide, crossed to the fence in the back straight and led, battled on gamely but beaten in the last 50M.
Eased back, settled 7Ls behind the leader on fence, took inside and dashed on strongly after straightening.
Eased back, taken across behind runners from the wide barrier, sat at the rear, trapped 3 wide, swung wide and ran on well.
Jumped well, tracked leader, niggled along rounding the Home Bend, kept on one pace under pressure.
Midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader and ran on fairly.
Jumped fairly, soon settled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence, peeled wide after straightening and ran on fairly.
Broke sharply, tracked a length behind the leader in a good spot, looked likely but faded in the last furlong.
Midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader, rounding the Home Turn under strong pressure, kept on one pace after straightening.
Midfield, three back inside, never looked competitive at any stage.
Eased back, taken across behind runners from the wide barrier, sat at the rear, trapped 3 wide, swung wide and soon weakened, tailed out.
Sat at the rear, never a factor, beaten by big margins.
Disputed lead at break, taken back handy on fence, switched out final turn, quickened, led 150m, cosy win.
Broke well, dropped in 1 off near rear, niggled along, hard driven 5L down 350m, strong run to grab 2nd late.
Hard-driven early, wide no cover behind midfield, advanced to 2nd 800m, led all out 350m, headed 150m, no extra.
Bumped start, settled back of midfield on paint, ridden 4L down 400m, ran on, just missed frame.
Fast start, sat handy 1 off with cover, driven wide home turn, stayed on without threatening.
Broke with others, taken behind to tail on fence, bustled 800m, 7L last wide into stretch, sound run home centre track.
Smart break, led from turn, pressed on outer 500m, hard-ridden when headed 350m, battled one pace to wire.
Bustled from gate, sat rail fore of midfield, driven to 4th 200m, run tapered.
Bumped start, failed to muster speed, raced 1 off with cover midfield, niggled 800m, outpaced in final stretch.
Good break, settled back near rear on rail, ridden 500m, struggled in home stretch.
Speedy break, led to first turn, settled close behind leader 1 off, niggled 600m, faded in run to wire.
Broke well, soon in last pair 1 off, driven forward 4 wide 600m, emptied home turn, no extra.
Fair break, settled rail behind midfield, shaken up 400m, switched out home turn, quickened 2L down 250m, led 50m
Tardy start, raced rail near rear, switched off 500m, driven 3L down 350m, ran on well, took 2nd close home.
Ridden forward at break, sat handy 1 off with cover, driven wide final turn, closed out strongly.
Good start, tracked leader on rail, switched out ridden home turn, led 200m, all out headed 50m, no extra.
Missed break, last pair on paint, niggled 900m, last into stretch, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Taken back from wide gate, last pair 1 off, widest final turn, chance at 200m, run tapered.
Fair break, trapped 3 deep no cover behind midfield, wide progress 1000m, driven 500m, kept on one pace.
Fair start, raced 5th 1 off, advanced 3 deep to 2nd no cover 800m, led all out 250m, soon headed & faded.
Broke with others, tight for room early, covered 1 off behind mid rank, 3 wide 600m, minor progress until faded final 150m
Speed to lead at break, shaken up 400m, headed 250m, faded thereafter.
Rousted at break, raced keen wide no cover 2nd, lost place 700m, faded rapidly 500m, soon beaten.

Placing: UR
Comment: Reared abruptly at the start, rider dislodged.
Pushed forward, shared the lead 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, ran on strongly to win.
Pushed early, 2.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 200M for 2nd.
Settled in box seat, enjoyed the soft sectionals and the rail trip, closed of well for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, dashed well 200M despite all negative racing situations.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, raced keenly, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M.
Eased to rear for cover, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders on the rails, not suited by the slow pace, dashed fairly.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to take the rail and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, however soon weakened 250M.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Checked start, at rear, 6.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Slowly away, rear rail, improved three wide approaching straight, wide bid, led 100m out, soon in charge.
Broke well, not much early pace, mid-rear rail, bid one off, joined leaders 120m out, just outpaced late.
Bumped start, crowded, mid-rear two off, improved wide turn, steadied off heels entering straight, mid-track bid, ran on well until no extra late.
Slow start, second last rail, looking for run between horses entering straight, shifted out but still slightly short of room, finished well.
Broke fast from wide, led and crossed, kicked early straight, headed 100m out, one pace late.
Broke well, not much early pace, midfield one off, improved turn, steadied and shifted when blocked early straight, kept on one pace.
Bumped start, became unbalanced when rival shifted in early, recovered to share lead, then second rail, third into straight, bid one off, kept on one pace.
Broke well, bumped early and lacked pace to go with leaders, not much room for inside bid, one pace.
Broke well, bumped early, third then second one off, mid-track bid, weakened.
Broke well aimed for lead from wide gate but caught wide no cover throughout, fourth three off, weakened straight.
Fair break, not much early pace, mid-rear one off, aimed for bid between horses, found nil.
Never far off from leader, quickened well to take lead inside 150M and found the necessary to hold off the persistent challenge of the 2nd.
Settled in midfield 4Ls off the lead, ran on over final 300M, pushed winner all the way to the line but was always held.
Began awkwardly, held up behind midfield, driven 450M, made steady progress and got up for 3rd near line.
Switched off to a rearward position, 8Ls from leader passing 400M, finished off strongly final 300M and made up late ground from off the pace.
Towards the rear, kept to inside on straightening, ran on well but not getting to first 2.
Quickly into stride and was allowed an uncontested lead, headed 150M out, no extra closing stages.
Held up behind midfield, tight for room nearing 200M, ran on but difficult to be ridden near the line when shifting in.
Settled near last, pulled wide turning into straight, stayed on fairly.
Held up in midfield along the inside, kept on one paced, no impression on leaders.
Close up behind leader, had every chance turning in but not able to quicken, faded inside 100M.
From wide draw guided to a midfield position early, caught wide and strode forward to chase leader down the back straight, one paced inside 300M, weakened rapidly final stages.
Out the back, caught wide till 600M, outpaced nearing home straight, never a factor.

Ridden to close-up 2nd position on rails, hit the front when narrow leader retreated 300 M out, just held on under pressure.

Soon taken across for rails run behind midfield, travelling nicely on rails in midfield before forced to steady home bend, saved ground turning in, sustained progress down inside of straight to fail narrowly.
Settled in midfield, shifted out for a clear run entering straight, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
In last few, took closer order around the bend on rails, obtained clear passage inside final 250 M, finished off race nicely.
Never far off in 4th on rails, held same into straight, kept on same pace without quickening while hanging about.
Slow into stride, travelled well behind, saved ground turning in, fought on steadily down inner of straight to be nearest at finish.
Driven to lead, held narrow running outside second, unable to sustain effort under pressure inside final 300 M.
Trailed the field to straight, ran on past beaten horses in the run home.
Settled in forward of midfield on rails, came under pressure on straightening, faded gradually.
Began well from the widest gate, pressed on to gain prominent 3rd and wide without cover, remained same into straight but soon faded under pressure. (Tactic questioned.)
Began from a wide draw, settled wide in forward of midfield, moved closer around the bend, soon weakened under pressure after straightening.
Raced keenly in forward of midfield, steadied off heels coming out of back straight, dropped out tamely in straight.
Never better than midfield, weakened out of contention into straight.
Began fairly, settled in rear of midfield far side, wide into straight, never recovered. (Blood in trachea.)
Rated close to midfield the fence, had cover. Was held up briefly near the 300m and was switched out soon after. Grabbed victory close to the wire.
Travelled in 5th position, 2 wide with cover. Hit the lead near the 100m but was overhauled 30m from the post.
Settled approximately 3 back the paint with cover. Finished off soundly.
Camped midfield, 1 off with cover. Peeled out rounding the home turn and made fair progress in the run home.
Never likely after being posted 3 deep without cover behind the speed. Battled away gamely in the straight.
Made its run from the rear after settling 1 off with cover. Worked home steadily down the outside.
Dictated terms and led clearly near the 800m on the rails. Was a spent force 250m from home.
Settled in last position along the fence with cover. Finished off one paced.
Settled handy 2 wide with cover. Peeled out and to race 3 deep with cover and improve passing the 600m. peaked on its run approaching the 100m.
Travelled back in the field, 3 deep with cover. Never a factor and only plodded to the line.
Taken back from the start and raced worse than midfield the fence. Failed to close off.
Settled worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race in the race in 2nd position, 1 off no cover. Faded easily passing the 200m.
Had every possible chance after tracking the leader along the paint. Gave ground quickly after the furlong.
Boxed seat, kicked away along the rail and scored well.
Dropped back and soon shifted to the rail from the wide barrier, settled 7Ls behind the leader, obtained a clear run in the last 300M and dashed on strongly.
Eased back to second last, 9Ls behind the leader, trapped three wide with cover, rounding the Home Bend, peeled widest and ran on well.
Began well, settled one out one back, looked likely in the early of the Home Straight but kept on one pace only.
Pushed to obtain Handy-Mid position on the rail, peeled to centre of the track and finished only fairly.
Began well, pushed forward and took the lead, weakened in the last furlong.
Jumped fairly, failed to muster speed in the early stages, 4Ls behind the leader, kept on one pace to the finishing line.
Dropped back, settled 8Ls behind the leader, trapped three wide with cover, swung wide and ran on fairly.
Midfield, hung out and trapped three wide without cover rounding the Home Turn, kept on one pace after straightening and faded in the last 250M.
Eased back, settled 7Ls behind the leader, got its head up on a number of occasions rounding the Home Turn, nothing to prove after straightening.
Midfield, niggled along throughout, trapped three wide with cover, kept on one pace after straightening.
Settled three back along the rail, 3Ls behind the leader, never a factor.
Began awkwardly and raced at the rear throughout, never in a competitive position.
Jumped well and parked outside leader, soon faded after straightening and finished tailed out.
Good break, covered up behind midfield, switched off rail 700m, 6L back driven final turn, relentless run, led last strides.
Bustled from gate, raced 6th 3 wide no cover, 4th & shaken up 400m, battling stretch progress, took 2nd last strides.
Good break, wide early, settled 3rd 1 off no cover, to 2nd 1000m, hard-ridden to lead 300m, headed last strides.
Outpaced start, raced 1 off near rear, 3 deep off heels 700m, 7L back wide into stretch, strong run, just missed frame.
Taken back from wide gate, raced at tail, crowded 700m, 2nd last & switched out 400m, closed out strongly.
Bumped start, covered up midfield 1 off, bustled 600m, wide into stretch, one-paced in run home.
Smart break, raced handy 1 off with cover, advanced 3 deep 600m, driven to lead 400m, headed 300m, weakened out.
Slow break, ridden early, raced 3 wide no cover behind mid rank, hard-ridden 500m, 5L down 400m, kept on moderately.
Driven at break, settled midfield on paint, under pressure 450m, plugged on same pace.
Led from gate, headed 1400m, tracked leader on rail, one-paced into stretch, kept on until faded final 200m.
Ridden forward from wide gate, led 1400m, driven final turn, headed 400m, faded thereafter.
Missed break & rousted, last trio on rail, ridden 450m, off heels 350m, struggled in run home.
Tardy start, raced last trio 1 off, niggled 800m, off heels 700m, wide off turn, never a factor.
Bumped start, speed to lay up early, settled 5th on rail, switched out final turn, found nothing, dropped right out.
Broke with others, camped rail mid rank, switched 1 off for progress 600m, steadied & shifted in 300m, led 150m, held on.
Fair break, unable to slot in, travelled 3 wide no cover 3rd, led under hard drive 250m, headed 150m, battled to wire.
Missed kick, ridden to midfield 3 wide, off heels 1000m, 6L back wide into stretch, strong closer, just failed.
Fair break, raced 5th 1 off with cover, driven 600m, to 4th 350m, kept on gamely at same pace.
Good start, settled fence back of midfield, driven 500m, outpaced final turn, stayed on without threatening.
Good break, tracked leader on fence, niggled 800m, outpaced on turn, running on when short of room 300m, closed out well.
Smart start, trapped 3 wide fore of midfield, 4 wide into stretch, stayed on soundly to wire.
Tardy break, raced 1 off near tail, driven into stretch, staying on evenly when checked 100m, not recover.
Good break, raced keen 2nd 2 deep no cover, led 600m, headed 250m, faded final 100m.
Slow start, raced 1 off behind midfield, niggled 600m, one-paced in run home.
Taken behind from wide gate, sat 3 deep near rear, wide on final turn, 7L down 400m, stayed on moderately.
Tardy break, raced at tail, 9L last turning for home, modest late headway.
Missed break, steadied off heels early, raced rail near rear, ridden 600m, struggled in run to wire.
Fast break, driven to lead, headed 600m, all out 400m, weakening when stumbled 250m, eased.
Took rail easily and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, kicked away 250M to score.
Settled in midfield, 4Ls off the leader on the rails, dashed well 300M for 2nd despite not suited by the slow pace.
Box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, held ground for 3rd.
Rolled forward, 3Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the slow pace on the fence, just held ground in straight.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 300M.
In front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3 wide, soon weakened 300M.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Bumped start, 5Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, no turn of foot.
Hard ridden early to keep up with the field, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, ran on ok.
At back, 6Ls off the leader, trapped 4 wide throughout, harmed by the slow tempo, no dash.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader, raced 3-5 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Missed start badly, harmed by the slow pace, never a factor.
Broke well, up wide to join leaders, settled second rail, challenged one off entering straight, led 300m out, soon asserted.
Broke well from wide, up two off to midfield, improved wide approaching straight, mid-track bid, ran on well without being able to threaten winner.
Broke well, taken back to second last one off, bid between horses mid-track, ran on well.
Broke well, led rail, dictated, shifted off rail and headed 300m out, one pace after.
Broke well, , third three wide no cover, mid-track bid, kept on.
Broke well but caught mid-rear two off, bid between horses, kept on under pressure.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, inside bid, kept on steadily under drive without pace to threaten.
Fair break, not much early speed, mid-rear one off, improved wide approaching straight, wide bid, shifted in, one pace.
Fair break, not much early speed, third last one off, wide bid, modest progress.
Fair break, bumped early, midfield then mid-rear one off, bid between horses, on heels straight, not fully tested.
Broke well, third then fifth one off, ridden before straight, inside bid, one pace.
Moderate start, mid-rear rail, inside bid, found little when asked.
Moderate start, last rail, improved inside marginally entering straight, no further progress.
Broke well, fourth rail, ridden turn, weakened.
Settled last, switched wide passing 500M, 5Ls off leader going into straight, finished strongly from the back of the field and was well on top by the finish.
Travelled well in midfield, peeled out to challenge 400M, ran on well and took lead near 150M but not able to hold off the fast finishing winner in closing stages.
Moved up to track leading pair 1200M, 3-wide turning for home, kept on well for 3rd but no match with first 2 final 200M.
Went forward early, not able to cross and was being steadied in an attempt to find cover, caught wide near the tail of the field, ran on well enough final 300M. (Jockey questioned re his riding.)
Tracked leader but found less than expected when the race got serious inside 300M, no threat final 150M.
Along the fence 4Ls back, driven out 350M, lacked a turn of foot, stayed on same pace final 200M.
Held up near the rear, no room 450-350M, rallied to chase leaders final 300M but couldn't get near.
Chased leaders, one paced inside 400M, no threat to leaders.
Outside leader and raced freely through the early part of the race, took over 400M-200M, weakened from mid-straight.
Slow to begin, towards the rear always, no progress inside 400M and left behind by main rivals passing 250M.
Settled 3-wide in midfield, had little left turning for home, soon out of contention.
Led at a modest pace, found little under pressure 400M, dropped out rapidly.
Close up with pace early, shuffled back to midfield in middle stages, bridle and hood slipped forward near 600M, eased down.
Broke well, fourth one off, bid four wide early straight, ran on strongly to lead 200m out, soon in charge.
Broke well, steadied off heels early, midfield rail, check far side when improving, bid between horses, short of room and steadied, ran on well without being able to challenge winner.
Broke well, led and crossed, kicked early straight, headed 150m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, up wide to third two off no cover early, then one off, bid two wide, kept on without reaching leader.
Taken back from wide draw, third last two off, widest bid, kept on well late.
Fair break, up four wide to midfield then back to mid-rear, wide bid, shifted out, kept on until no extra late.
Fair break, fourth last one off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, steadied early to midfield one off pulling slightly, mid-track bid, one pace under pressure, substantial blood in trachea.
Broke well, second early then fifth rail, bid two off, kept on one pace.
Taken back from wide draw, second last one of, mid track bid, one pace.
Dwelt start losing several lengths, last rail, closed up turn, inside bid, no extra from 200m out.
Missed break, losing a length, rear group rail, bid between horses, one pace.
Broke well, second one off, third into straight, weakened.
Moderate start, up between horses to sixth one off, lost ground approaching straight, drifted wide, weakened.
Drifted back from a tricky alley, raced 3 wide at rear 6Ls away, switched widest turning and closed hard down centre, overhauled rivals strongly final 100m.
Pressed forward from a wide alley but trapped 3 wide without cover, did some work outside runners 1L away to bend, chimed in at 250m, led until final strides when overhauled.
Positive from outset, positioned outside leader shading inside horse for first part, took over on circle, led them turning in, kept fighting and went down narrowly in 3 way go.
Standard jump, pressed up into ideal spot 1 out 1 back, had all favors throughout, took inside runs at 300m, kept on evenly to make frame without worrying first trio.
Worked forward from a wide alley, did it tough 4 wide without cover in mid-section, not far away approaching turn, kept to task well given trip to be not far away in finish.
Began with rest, settled just off midfield 4Ls back racing 2 wide, even trip to bend, worked home well despite a tricky passage and did well to get as close as he did without clear running.
No early pace and dropped down to rear, 6Ls or so away at tail of bunched field, had job to do turning, took inside runs and passed a few in straight without looking likely.
Showed speed to hold front, kept inside running despite pressure from outside horse, shaded on circle and crossed before bend, having niggled at 300 M but was one paced remainder of straight.
Positioned 3 wide in midfield 3Ls or so back, had cover but overaced in mid-section, didn't let down when they sprinted and just plugged away late.
Out fairly, unable to slot in and raced 4 wide with cover 4Ls back in midfield, ridden along turning, lacked a finish and battled in run home.
Ordinary jump, raced back with last few on rails, 5Ls back on rails, same position back turning, no extra gear in straight.
Tardy into stride, raced 5Ls away two wide at rear, not helped by spot but came wider turning, lacked a close and battled final 300m.
Standard jump, made ground along rails to race 3Ls back in midfield, no real excuses in run, came under pressure at top of straight and weakened tamely.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began from the widest gate, settled well behind and waited with, ran on well down the centre of the track inside final 250 M to snatch victory near the line.
Niggled along early settling in midfield, went wide into straight, ran on steadily to hit the front over 100 M out only to be caught close to finish. (Jockey questioned.)
Settled in rear of midfield on rails, commenced move over 400 M out, kept on steadily without quickening.
Soon moved across for inside run travelling in rear of midfield to straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began moderately, settled in last few, saved ground turning in, did not find much room early in straight, steadied for a stride 100 M out, never recovered.

Began awkwardly, in midfield early, took closer order around stables bend improving to 3-wide position without cover in 2L 3rd far side, became 4th to obtain cover halfway out, kept on until fading closing stages.
Settled in forward of midfield, saved ground turning in, did not find much room early in straight, made no impression closing stages.
Jumped awkwardly, settled at the back, ran past well-beaten horses closing stages.
Began fairly from a wide gate, settled in prominent 2nd outside leader, kept on before fading inside final 200 M.
Began moderately, soon dropped to last few, ran home one-paced.
Began fairly from a wide-ish draw, soon took up running setting a steady pace to straight, gradually weakened.
Began fairly, never far off on rails, joined leaders on rails briefly over 100 M out, soon weakened.
Settled in 2nd position I off no cover. Assumed the lead after the 600m and made every post a winner thereafter. Drew a margin in the run to the post.
Settled third from the rear, 1 off with cover. Peeled out and commenced to improve 3 deep with cover after the 700m. Came widest in the straight and closed off strongly.
Settled in last position. Began a forward move passing the 800m, 3 deep with cover. Worked into a midfield position rounding the home turn and finished off soundly.
Ridden along at barrier rise but never really mustered, settling around midfield 3 deep, no cover. Kept on gamely to stay in the frame.
Crowded at the start but recovered to park 1 out 1 back. Had every chance but was dour in the final stretch.
Enjoyed all the favors stalking the leader along the paint. Had no excuses, maintained the same speed in the run to the line.
Sent forward and led on the rails. Was headed after the 600m and was a spent force thereafter.
Taken back from the outside alley and travelled behind midfield the fence. Whacked away at the same pace in the home straight.
Camped midfield, 2 wide with cover. Failed to make any impression over the final 400m.
Positioned worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Was never a factor.
Rated midfield on the fence. Had a tendency to lay in after the 700m, but was never in the hunt, struggled in the run to the wire.
Settled back in the event from a wide gate, travelled with the backmakers. Was off the bridle at the 600m and struggled in the straight.
Settled handy, responded well when asked for run after straightening, just won by a nose.
Began sharply, crossed from the wide barrier to take the lead, battled on strongly after straightening, just beaten by a nose.
Hard ridden to park outside the leader, battled on gamely in the straight, just beaten by a neck.
Half missed to cross from the wide barrier, settled 6Ls behind the leader on fence, dashed on strongly after finding a clear run in the last furlong.
Midfield, settled 6Ls behind the leader, ran on well after straightening, closed to the line well.
Jumped sharply, travelled well box seated but was held up in the entire Home Straight, not tested.
Jumped fairly, ridden early but couldn't slot into inside, travelled three wide without cover, lay out rounding the Home Turn, finished off the race at one pace.
Slow to begin, failed to muster speed in the early stages, soon dropped back to last, peeled to widest, made some ground.
Soon dropped back to rear, raced greenly throughout, made no progress after straightening.
Ridden early to get midfield position on fence, under pressure 600M out, unable to make any ground in the straight.
Midfield, travelled three wide with cover, soon weakened.
Settled at the rear, travelled three wide throughout, never a factor.
Good break to lead early on rail, shaken up 400m, kicked clear into stretch, all out closing stages, just held on.
Smart start, handy 1 off with cover, driven final turn, 2nd at 200m, determined closer, just failed.
Bumped start, early pace, dropped 1 off midfield, over-raced 1000m, crowded 300m, quickened 200m, closing when hung in late.
Bumped & crowded early, sat rail midfield, driven 350m, kept on soundly to wire.
Fair break, raced 1 off behind midfield, off heels 1100m, switched 3 wide 700m, 6L down 400m, stayed on without threat.
Slow break, raced rail last pair, niggled 700m, outpaced 8L back 450m, closed out well in stretch.
Squeezed out at break, sat rail 4th, driven on turn to 2nd 300m, one-paced thereafter.
Shifted right at break, raced 1 off towards rear, bustled 600m, widest into stretch, stayed on same pace.
Rolled to 2nd 1 off no cover, niggled 600m, outpaced turning in, struggled in run home.
Sluggish start, raced at tail, driven final turn, found little, modest progress past beaten horses.
Fast break, sat 3 wide with cover midfield, bustled 600m, wide into stretch, faded out.
Bumped start, trapped 3 wide no cover 3rd, ridden 600m, soon weakened, eased when beaten.
Speed to lead at break, 3L clear 600m, extended advantage into stretch, shaken up 300m, all out final 100m, held on.
Good break, raced 3rd 1 off no cover, niggled 600m, 5L down final turn, 2nd final 50m, closing at wire.
Rousted from gate, settled 2nd on fence, ridden in pursuit 300m, closed without threatening, lost place 50m out.
Awkward break, bustled rail near rear, 10L back 400m, rattled home.
Quick start, taken back, trapped wide 4th, unable to quicken in run home, kept on at same pace.
Fast break, shifted out & outpaced, railed behind midfield, progress on turn, stayed on soundly.
Smart start, raced 5th on fence, hard-ridden into stretch, kept on one pace.
Dropped near rear from wide gate, sat 1 off near rear, wide in stretch, kept on moderately.
Tardy start, taken behind runners, last pair 1 off, over-raced 650m, driven 400m, never a factor.
Missed start, sat rail at tail, ridden 450m, wide into stretch, struggled in run to wire.
Outpaced at break, progress to mid rank 2 deep with cover, 6th & driven final turn, faded in run home.
Slow start, ridden forward to midfield 3 deep with cover, outpaced 600m, wide into straight, soon beaten.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, suited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Very slow away, 7Ls off the leaders on the rails, favoured by the fast pace, held up 300M, made good ground when clear.
Eased at start to cross at rear, 7Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 250M for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, lack room 300M, made ground when clear.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to take rail and shared the lead, clocked fast sectionals under pressure, hung on strongly until 100M flattened.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 5.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, favoured by the fast pace, lack room 300M, no progress when clear.
Hard ridden to obtain box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, out of fuel 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the fast pace, soon emptied 300M.
Hard ridden forward to cross, shared lead 2 wide at fast sectionals, weakened 250M.
Fast away, up wide to settle one off, led entering straight, held on well.
Broke well, fifth one off, urged turn, mid-track bid, finished well, just failed.
Slightly awkward start, mid-rear one off, wide bid, finished well.
Broke well, not rushed early, third last rail, bid between horses four off, finished strongly.
Broke well, fourth rail, bid one off, kept on, just outpaced late.
Fair break, settled rear rail, looking for run second widest straight, finished strongly.
Fair break, steadied to mid-rear two off, wide bid, some progress until run flattened out last 200m.
Broke well, steadied to settle midfield rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, caught three wide midfield, mid-track bid, one pace.
Broke well, up wide to third two off, bid three off, weakened.
Broke well, led, steadied pace tried to accelerate but headed entering straight, weakened.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, last into straight, weakened, irregular heart rhythm post-race.
Given a waiting ride, near last going into straight, steered into clear 250M, closed off strongly, edged past 2nd last stride.
Held up behind midfield, travelled well through the race, moved into contention 250M, led 100M out but just couldn't fend off the winner's late thrust.
Settled midfield, 4Ls back in 7th, ran on in fine style to press leader all the way to the line.
Always prominent, took over early straight, produced with every chance, not pace of first 3 final 100M.
Never far off from leaders, driven nearing 400M, responded well and loomed a threat mid-straight but turned one pace final stages.
Tracked leaders in a steadily run race, held up for clear running rounding the home turn, kept on evenly inside 300M, disappointed or running near 100M.
Held up near last, saved ground on the inside, held up early straight, stayed on final 250M but not pace to seriously challenge.
Settled ahead of midfield, 3Ls back in 6th along the fence, switched out to challenge turning in, ran on same pace and no threat to leaders.
Reserved in last, 8Ls off the steady pace, shaken up 500M, swung wide into straight, failed to quicken.
Led from 1200M, set moderate pace, pressed by rival 600M out, swamped nearing 200M, weakened rapidly.
Caught 3-wide no cover in midfield, strode forward mid-race to join leader, had little left passing 400M, weakened rapidly final 200M.
Settled near the rear, 3-wide turning for home, didn't respond to riding, eased 200M out. (Bled 2nd time.)

Well there, took the lead from tiring pacesetter inside 300 M, never threatened.
Began moderately, gradually picked up to forward of midfield on rails, finished off race nicely to gain distant 2nd close to home.
Hard ridden early, gradually picked up to 2L 3rd, kept on same pace without threatening.
Began well from a wide draw, soon taken back to race wide without cover behind midfield, remained same into straight, kept on one pace without quickening.
Failed to muster at start, remained well behind to straight, saved ground turning in, ran on past well-beaten horses.
Midfield throughout, ran home one-paced.
Jumped awkwardly, soon dropped to rear, trailed the field into straight, ran on past well-beaten horses.
Never better than midfield.
Jumped moderately, ridden to soon take up running, dropped away quickly final 300 M.
Prominently briefly, gradually dropped behind midfield, made no impression in straight.
Never better than midfield. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Began well, gradually dropped to 3L 4th despite niggling along, soon weakened in straight.
Speared forward and crossed to lead along the paint in the early stages. Made every post a winner thereafter.
Blundered at the star then was hunted along early & travelled second in the run, 1 off no cover. Kept on well in the run home.
Settled 1 out in fifth position, 2 deep with cover. Finished off soundly.
Parked midfield the fence had cover. Closed off satisfactorily to fill the frame.
Camped close to midfield, 2 wide with cover. Battled away making some late ground without threatening.
Settled at the back of the field from a wide gate travelling 3 deep with cover. Came widest in the straight and closed off dourly making reasonable ground.
Began well then was steadied after travelling a short distance in an attempt to find cover. Was unable to shift in and thereafter was posted 3 deep, no cover. Never likely.
Travelled with the backmakers, 2 wide with cover. Stayed on at the same speed in the run to the wire.
Settled worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race tracking the speed along the paint. Was a beaten horse early in the final stretch.
Settled 3 deep with cover, midfield. Struggled in the home stretch.
Raced towards the rear of the field on the rails with cover. Made no impression in the straight.
Box seat run, responded well when asked for run after straightening, kicked away in the last 100M.
Settled three back on fence, peeled to centre of the track, looked very likely but unable to produce more in the last 100M.
Soon dropped back to rear, travelled three wide with cover throughout, settled 8Ls behind the leader, peeled to the widest and dashed on nicely.
Handy position but travelled three wide without cover throughout, kept on one pace after a tough trip.
Jumped fairly, raced behind midfield, unable to find a clear run until 300M out, ran on fairly.
Began smartly, crossed from the wide barrier to take the lead, weakened and passed by runners after 150M.
Slow to begin, soon ridden aggressively to settle 5Ls behind the leader on fence, peeled to centre of the track, ran on only fairly.
Soon dropped back to rear, travelled three wide with cover throughout, settled 7Ls behind the leader, swung wide but unable to show any dash.
Settled handy, nothing to show when asked for run after straightening, weakened gradually.
Settled at the back, never a factor.
Began well, parked outside leader, under strong pressure in the early of the straight, faded out sharply.
Travelled at the rear throughout, never in a competitive position.
Travelled three wide with cover throughout, weakened after straightening.
Broke well but couldn't cross to lead, travelled four wide without cover throughout, dropped out sharply after straightening, tailed out.
Missed break, raced rail near rear, smooth progress 600m, switched 2 off 400m, quickened to lead 150m, drew clear.
Fair break, sat handy 1 off with cover, 4 wide final turn, driven to brief lead 200m, headed & one-paced final stages.
Smart start, prominent to 1st turn, tracked pace on rail, penned in 300m, rail split 200m, ran on to snatch 3rd at wire.
Good break, raced 5th 1 off, back stretch progress 3 deep, led 800m, headed 600m, led again 300m, headed 200m, one-paced thereafter.
Slow start, niggled 1 from rear, ridden 600m, 7L 12th 400m, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Fast start, led to 1st turn, settled 2nd 1 off no cover, overraced 1200m, niggled 3rd 600m, outpaced 400m, stayed on one pace.
Rousted from gate, sat rail midfield, niggled 800m, ridden final turn, kept on same pace.
Speed at break, taken back to 1 off near rear, rail run on turn, switched out 400m, battled on same speed.
Driven at break, trapped 3 wide with cover midfield, wide on turn, plugged on moderately.
Bustled at break, raced midfield 1 off, driven 700m, outpaced lost ground turn, kept on at modest pace.
Tardy start, sat behind midfield 3 deep with cover, niggled 700m, ridden wide on turn, struggled in run home.
Smart break, rolled to lead 1400m, headed 800m, regained lead 400m, all out headed 300m, faded out.
Fair break, taken back, trapped 4 wide no cover near rear, found nothing in stretch, eased when beaten.
Reared start, soon well adrift at tail, never a factor, tailed off.
Taken back at break, camped 1 off near rear, switched out final turn, ridden 6L back 400m, surged centre track, led last stride.
Bustled at break, soon led, kicked clear 400m, all out final 100m, headed on wire.
Fair break, rousted, trapped 4 wide fore of midfield, to 2nd 350m, closed out well but lost place last strides.
Bustled from wide gate, soon raced at tail 1 off, 8L back wide into stretch, closed out soundly without threatening.
Good break, prominent 5 wide early strides, taken back near rear 3 deep, progress on turn, 3rd at 200m, stayed on same pace.
Slow start, dropped in last pair on fence, 7L down driven into stretch, stayed on well.
Fair start, sat 3 deep with cover midfield, wide into stretch, ran on one paced.
Speed to lead at break, settled 3 wide no cover 3rd, outpaced 400m, kept on moderately.
Smart to stride, settled fore of midfield on rail, unable to quicken in home stretch, weakened out, eased late when beaten.
Missed break, sat fence near rear, niggled 450m, unable to quicken, never a factor.
Good break, soon outpaced, bustled midfield 1 off, faded on final turn, struggled in run home.
Mustered speed to sit on leader's flank 1 off no cover, 2nd & driven 400m, emptied 250m, faded out.
Settled in box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly to win.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated its usual strong finishing efforts 250M.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 300M.
Took rail easily and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M overhauled, ran on ok.
Eased to rear, 9Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 250M, badly held up 100M.
Rolled forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow sectionals, flattened 200M.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, out of fuel 300M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, flattened 250M.
Eased back, harmed by the slow pace, never a factor.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, soon weakened 400M.
Hard ridden throughout but never traveled well, tailed out 400M.
Slowly away, lost two lengths, crossed to stand rail, last, improved under urging from halfway, wove through shifting to mid-track, strong finish to lead last 50m, soon in charge.
Broke well, rear group mid-track, urged halfway, mid-track bid, led 80 m out until outpaced late.
Broke well, close fifth five off stands rail, driven from 400m, led 200m until last 80 m, outpaced late.
Blundered start, recovered quickly to lead two off stands rail, headed just after halfway, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield stands rail, ridden to join leaders 400m out, kept on one pace.
Broke well, mid-track, widest of leading group, weakened under pressure from 200m out.
Fair break, up to lead two off stands rail 350m out, headed and weakened last 200m.
Broke well, third three off stands rail, under pressure and gradually lost ground from halfway.
Moderate break, mid-rear, mid-track, widest bid, no impression from halfway.
Broke well, crowded after 400m, midfield one off, found little under driving.
Slow start, third last two off, urged halfway, found nil.
Sped to the lead and led at good pace, 1.5Ls clear going into final 400M, kept on strongly to the line and always held his rivals at bay.
Held up midfield, moved into contention nearing 400M, finished off well but winner found plenty of extra.
Bumped at the start, gradually moved forward to be 2Ls behind the pace in middle stages, all out final 300M to chase leader but found less than expected.
Lacked early speed, moved closer to pace mid-race, stayed on.
Reserved behind midfield, angled out to challenge inside 400M but had no significant late response.
Tracked leader, kept on steadily final 300M but not pace to seriously challenge.
Always in touch within 2Ls of leader, one paced over final 400M, faded late stages. (Found to be distressed after race.)
About 3Ls off the pace in midfield, hung out early and middle stages, unbalanced and lost ground near 400M, not quickened.
Tracked leader along the stands' rail, found little when asked inside 400M, flattened out 200M..
Settled at the back, made very little progress final 400M and could make no impression over the inadequate trip.
Never far off the pace, weakened passing 250M.
Towards the rear, never going the pace to challenge.
Outpaced in last, never got competitive in this first run after a long break.
Broke well, fourth rail, up to third approaching turn, bid four off, ran on well to lead and assert last 80m.
Broke well but caught three wide no cover, steadied to midfield but still wide, improved wide to join leaders entering straight, led 200m out, just outpaced late.
Fair break, not much early speed, settled midfield rail, bid between horses, finished well without being able to challenge, blood in right nostril though not in trachea.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, widest bid, ran on strongly late.
Broke well, shared lead early then went on, two lengths clear entering straight, headed 200m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, responded late to driving but too late to threaten.
Fair break, rear group rail, pulling slightly, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fractious before start, fair break, midfield one off but troubled trip, steadied off heels 800m then again 200m, blood in mouth from laceration.
Fair break, taken back from wide to rear rail, wide bid, only modest progress.
Fair break, midfield one off, over-racing from 850m out, checked off heels and hampered, inside bid, one pace.
Broke well second rail, bid one off, one pace.
Fair break, fourth last one off, aimed between horses, no progress.
Broke well, up wide to third one off, lost ground entering straight, weakened.
Moderate break, mid-rear three wide no cover throughout, mid-track bid, weakened, twisted left front plate, lame after race.
Drifted back from wide gate, raced 3 wide behind midfield, 6-7Ls back with cover, pace against to bend, dashed strongly down middle to hit lead at 200m and hold rivals for a nice win.
Standard jump, mustered to settle 3Ls or so back on rails, nice trail with steady tempo, weaved between horses and closed soundly to snare 2nd late.
Positioned closer than usual in 1 out 1 back spot, had all favours with steady tempo, right there turning and in mix for length on straight just losing 2nd late.
Assumed a midfield role from a low gate, raced 4Ls or so back in running line, slow tempo suited to bend, switched out and kept closing nicely to make frame.
Went forward as usual, had ideal run on leaders back, travelled well to bend with steady tempo, stuck on evenly along inside without a lot of room to finish on heels of placegetters.
Showed early pace to take up running, controlled affairs at a leisurely tempo, no excuses to bend, kicked but headed at 250m, weakened out late.
Shade tardy to begin, raced just behind midfield on rails 5Ls back, soft run but not helped by tempo, kept on fairly to be not far away in finish.
Ordinary break, settled next to last 2 wide 8Ls back, pace against in mid section and didn't settle, still well back to bend, came to outside and made some late progress without threatening.
Positioned behind midfield from a tricky alley, 5-6Ls back in running line, same margin back turning and made run between horses but just kept on behind them.
No early speed and settled near to rear on rails from widest gate, 7-8Ls back throughout and unsuited by tempo, kept to inside in straight but only beat tired runners home.
Pressed on from a tricky alley but planted 3 wide without cover, pace suited but forced to work to bend, soon under pressure and dropped out tamely.
Pressed forward to race at leaders girth, had easy time with slow tempo, right there at 400m but soon struggling and folded cheaply.
Drifted back as usual from a tricky alley, at rear racing 3 wide 8ls away, unsuited by tempo, well back turning and made no real progress.
Out with rest, settled a bit closer 3 wide in midfield 5Ls or so back, had cover to bend, diuidnt find much when asked turning and was disappointing in finish.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Towards rear when hampered at 1000 M bend, remained well behind to straight, saved ground turning in, responded well inside final 200 M to assert authority final stages.
Never far off, fought on steadily in straight to be nearest at finish.
Began well from a wide draw, soon took up running out wide down far side, obtained rails run coming onto home bend, kicked 2L clear upon straightening, unable to sustain effort and swamped 50 M out.
Settled in midfield, came under pressure rounding home bend, produced good late impression.
Began from the widest gate, soon worked to prominent positions but remained wide without cover far side, one back in 2nd turning in, kept on until overhauled final 100 M.
Raced behind midfield, baulked briefly entering straight, produced some late impression.
Began moderately, trailed the field to straight, found no room in straight until after 100 M, finished off nicely.
Began fairly, soon dropped to midfield on rails, briefly baulked 200 M out, ran home one-paced.
Failed to muster early, remained well behind, only ran past well-beaten horses closing stages.
Raced wide behind midfield, similar turning in, ran home one-paced. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Began fairly, raced keenly on heels of leader rounding 1000 M bend, settled in 5th some 2 to 3L back down far side, saved ground turning for home, gradually faded.
Broke well to lead early, settled just off the speed on rails, dropped away quickly from home bend. (Bled.)

Crowded at the star settling midfield, 2 wide with cover. Made a gradual forward mover after the 700m, racing 3 wide without cover until the home turn. Closed off well & had the race in its keeping 100m from home.
Travelled in second position, 1 off no cover. Maintained a good gallop right down the running.

Raced 3 wide without cover early before shifting in to race 1 off with cover near the 1100m settling in 4th position. Lost a little ground when crowded at the 500m, took inside runs soon after straightening and finished off well.

Parked close to midfield the paint. Peeled off the rail after the 700m, and started to roll forward 3 wide with cover passing the 600m. Got a nice trail into the race, making steady ground to fill the frame.
Sent forward and led on the rails. Kicked well clear early in the straight but faded over the final 100m.
Slow to begin travelling worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Made fair ground late.
Settled third from the rear, 1 off with cover. Came widest in the home straight and made steady ground without ever threatening.
Camped in 5th position along the paint with cover. Kept on at the same speed over the final furlong.
Slow to begin then was taken across behind runners and travelled in last position, 2 deep with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Settled 2nd from the rear, along the paint with cover. Failed to close off.
Had every possible hope after box seating. Struggled in the final stretch.
Travelled behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Failed to make any impression in the run home.
Midfield, settled 4Ls off the leader, peeled to centre of the track, dashed on well and won comfortably.
Midfield, trapped behind the winner throughout, looked well after straightening but run ended in the last 150M.
Handy position but travelled three wide without cover until 800M, parked outside the leader these after, kicked away after straightening but run ended in the last 100M, just hung on for third.
Slow to begin, settled 7Ls behind lead at the rear, swung widest, dashed on well and just missed third.
Failed to muster speed in the early stages, gradually improved to stay four back on fence, niggled along throughout, peeled to centre of the track, ran on nicely.
Slow to begin, settled 9Ls behind the leader on fence, stayed inside after straightening and made some ground.
Eased back, 10Ls off the leader, ran on only fairly and passed tired runners.
Midfield, three back on fence, kept on one pace after straightening, was badly crowded for room near 200M and eased down afterwards.
Box seat run in the early stages, dropped 4Ls behind the leader near 800M when pace steadied, was badly checked near 200M and eased down afterwards.
Pushed forward, settled a length behind leaders, peeled to three wide rounding the Home Turn but nothing to produce after straightening.
Soon crossed from the wide barrier and led, steadied near 1000M and got covered by a runner near 800M, weakened after straightening, was badly checked near 200M and eased down afterwards.
Pushed forward, parked outside leader, took the lead near 800M but weakened after straightening, was badly checked near 200M and eased down afterwards.
Speed to lead from wide gate, 2L clear 500m, shaken up 300m, kept on soundly for comfortable win.
Good break, taken 1 off behind midfield, progress on turn, to 2nd 150m, always held.
Dropped in from wide gate, camped 1 off near rear, rail run on turn, 6L down 400m, solid run to grab 3rd on line.
Bumped start, bustled early, rolled to handy 5th on fence, to 3rd 500m, driven final turn, stayed on soundly.
Smart break, tracked in 2nd, ridden into stretch, lost place 150m, faded in run to wire.
Missed break, settled at tail, 8L last turning in, staying on when switched out 100m, closed out without threatening.
Disputed lead from gate, dropped in handy 1 off with cover, ridden in 4th 500m, wide into stretch, one-paced until faded final 100m.
Slow start, hampered early strides, travelled rail near rear, ridden & outpaced 600m, plugged on same speed to wire.
Speedy break, soon back to midfield 1 off with cover, driven in 7th 400m, found nothing.
Sluggish start, raced rail last pair, switched 1 off 800m, modest advance 600m, soon beaten.
Bustled from wide gate, raced 3 deep 3rd, lost place 500m, weakened thereafter.
Tardy start, trapped 3 deep with cover midfield, niggled 800m, faded out on turn.
Missed break, camped at tail, advanced 3 wide 700m, shaken up 5L back 400m, stormed home centre track, led last strides.
Bustled early strides, sat rail midfield, strong run to lead 100m, headed 50m, no extra.
Tardy break, bustled early 3 wide midfield, rolled 2nd 1off 1200m, led 1000m, driven 800m, all out headed 100m.
Raced rail near rear, driven on turn, 5L back 400m, stayed on well without threatening.
Good break, settled midfield 1 off with cover, 3 wide on turn, driven into stretch, stayed on same speed.
Rousted from gate, handy early, settled midfield on fence, slid back to 1 off 700m, strong stretch drive, stayed on evenly.
Fair start, 3 deep behind midfield early, rapid progress to 3rd 800m, every chance when driven 350m, one-paced to line.
Taken back last trio, 1 off in back stretch, wide progress 800m, hard-ridden home turn, same speed to wire.
Led at break, tracked lead on rail 1600m, shuffled back switched 1off 800m, off heels 400m, one-paced in run home.
Smart break, handy 3 deep no cover, led 1600m, taken to rail, headed 1000m, bustled 4th 400m, faded in stretch.
Settled 1 off behind midfield, bustled 700m, last 600m, struggled in final stages.
Sat 2nd from gate, raced handy 1 off with cover, shaken up 2nd 300m, found nothing, weakened tamely.
Pushed to take the rail and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, made all without much threats.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead 2 wide, clocked soft sectionals, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
Settled in box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, held ground for 3rd.
Very slow away, hard ridden to obtain a midfield spot on the fence, 3.5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash.
Pushed early, 3.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 250M despite all negative racing situations.
At back, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 200M.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden forward, sat just off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, however soon flattened 200M.
Eased at start to take cover at rear, 6Ls off the leaders, raced 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, emptied 200M.
Hard ridden early to keep up at rear, 6Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Broke smartly from wide, up to fourth one off, bid three off to lead 200m out, drew length clear, held on well under driving.
Slowly away, mid-rear one off, bid weaving between horses, finished strongly, just held.
Fair break, not rushed early, third last one off, bumped and unbalanced turning for home, slightly hampered, wide bid, finished fast.
Broke well, steadied to midfield one off, urged approaching straight, mid-track bid, kept on well without quite enough pace to challenge.
Moderate start, improved to third rail, inside bid, almost joined leaders 200m out, no extra late.
Fair break, up fast from wide to second one off, bid between horses, kept on steadily without quite pace to challenge.
Broke well, led and dictated, tried to kick entering straight, headed 250m out, no extra.
Fair break, not rushed early, mid-rear rail, ridden approaching straight for wide bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break but caught three wide no cover throughout, wide bid, no impression.
Fair break, midfield rail, shaken up approaching straight, bid between horses, one pace.
Fair break, taken back to second last rail, mid-track bid, slightly short of room, no progress.
Fair break, taken back from wide gate to rear one off, urged turn, wide bid, found nil.
Broke well, tracked leader, took over inside 300M, kicked clear mid-straight and was never challenged.
From draw 12 crossed to a 3-wide position in midfield, shifted out to obtain clear running 250M, closed off well despite hanging in final 200M, got up for 2nd near line.
Slightly slow away, held up in midfield along the inside, went 2nd 200M and chased runaway leader, one paced final stages.
Slow to begin, no early speed and detached from the field in early stages, moved closer home turn, finished fastest, nearest line.
Settled in 5th, never far off the strong pace, kept on steadily in straight.
Settled 2-wide towards the tail of the field, waited with till 350M, switched wide to challenge, stayed on.
Held up near last, 3-wide making the turn and inclined to hang out, made limited progress inside final 200M. (Jockey questioned.)
Rushed forward, track leader and had every chance inside 300M, weakened mid-straight. (Mucopus.)
Slightly slow out, held up towards the rear, not picked up inside 300M, never a factor.
Soon led and took them along at a good pace, headed near 300M, no extra final 200M.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, nudged along passing 500M, never going the pace to challenge.
Went forward from wide barrier, unable to cross and was 3-wide without cover for most of the trip, came under serious pressure 500M, dropped out rapidly 300M.
