Began moderately, soon moved forward along rails to take up running passing 1000 M, kept on well always holding runners-up at bay throughout final 300 M.
Never far off in 5th far side, took closer order around home bend, fought on from 3rd into straight but never threatening.
Broke well to lead early, gradually ceded advantage to travel in 2nd outside leader, came under pressure after straightening, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M.
Slow out, travelled in last few on rails, kept on at the one pace in the run home.
Jumped moderately, remained well back, wide into straight, kept on past well-beaten horses.
Niggled along in midfield, saved ground turning in, faded gradually in straight.
Never better than midfield.
Soon taken back from the widest gate, remained well behind most of way, never a factor.
Close up and remained very wide without cover down far side, shuffled backward around the bend, faded gradually in straight.
Began fairly, niggled along to join leaders far side, remained similar to approaching home turn, dropped out tamely.
Camped handy to the speed 2 off the stands rail. Shifted into clear running near the 150m, and had the race in its keeping 50m from the winning post.
Stalked the speed 2-3 from the outside fence. Switched in near the 400m to improve, hit the lead near the 150m, but was caught near the 50m.
Speared forward and dictated the running for most of the race. Fought on gamely over the concluding stages.
Settled in 3rd position in the middle of the track. Managed to hold its ground when placed under pressure at the business end.
Shared some of the leading duties, racing on the grandstand rail. Maintained a reasonable gallop in the run to the line.
Slow to begin then was crowded at the start settling midfield. Kept on one paced in the run to the wire.
Settled towards the rear of the field the stands rail. Failed to close off passing only beaten runners.
Tracked the speed without cover, about 3-4 off the outside paint. Tired quickly passing the last 200m.
Raced along the center of the track, no cover, and midfield. Was stopping 200m from the post.
Positioned along the grandstand rail, midfield with cover. Was a beaten horse a long way from home.
Slow to begin settling at the tail of the field closer to the middle of the course. Only plodded to the line.
Travelled worse than midfield approximately 4 off the stands side. Failed to find any extra when placed under pressure, giving ground in the run to the line.
Settled near the middle of the course midfield no cover. Struggled over the latter stages.
Settled towards the rear with cover. Tired noticeably after the final furlong, finishing tailed out. (To trial.)
Settled three back on fence, found a clear run near 350M, dashed on strongly and scored.
Box seated, travelled well throughout on fence, looked a serious threat after straightening but unable to get a clear run until the last furlong, beaten by a short head. Unlucky runner.
Parked outside the leader. Enjoyed the slow sectional time, asked for run near 300M, stayed on well, beaten by half a length. Benefited by the slow pace.
Handy position. Looked likely but finished off at one pace after straightening.
Began fast, crossed from the wide barrier and led the field. Enjoyed the slow sectional times in front but weakened in the last 100M.
Midfield on fence, settled 6Ls behind leader, ran on fairly. Hampered by the slow pace.
Three wide without cover throughout. Kept on one pace after straightening, weakened gradually in the last 300M.
At the rear, three wide with cover, swung widest and ran on okay. Hampered by the slow pace.
Began smartly, soon dropped back to Midfield, never looked competitive at any stage.
Midfield, settled 5Ls behind leader, unable to make any ground in the straight.
Settled at the back on fence, never ran on.
Eased back, settled 6Ls behind leader, three wide with cover, never ran on after straightening.
Eased back, settled 7Ls behind leader, three wide with cover, soon weakened near 300M.
Settled at the rear throughout, soon faded after straightening. Beaten by big margins.
Disputed lead from break, keen, taken back midfield 1 off with cover, driven 430m, switched out 300m, battled to lead last strides.
Sharp start, trapped 3 deep from wide gate, slotted 2 deep on turn, urged into lead 200m, headed at wire.
Fast break, soon led 1 off, kicked on 400m, headed 200m, rallied briefly, no extra final stages.
Dropped in last pair 1 off, advanced 3 wide on turn, heavily bumped rival 400m, closed out strongly to wire.
Taken behind at break, sat rail last pair, 5L last switched wide home turn, solid stands' side run faltered close home.
Speed at break, raced close 2nd on rail, shaken up 400m, lost place 300m, one-paced closing stages.
Slow to begin, bustled early, settled fence behind midfield, moderate headway in stretch, no threat.
Fair start, raced 3 deep no cover midfield, niggled 600m, driven in 4th 430m, run tapered.
Good break, settled midfield on rail, niggled 600m, driven final turn, one-paced in stretch until fading out final 250m.
Bumped start, keen early, raced 1 off behind midfield, driven 400m, found little in run home.
Fair break, trapped 4 deep no cover midfield, heavily bumped & lost ground 400m, eased thereafter.
Shifted start, rolled on to sit handy rail, shaken up to go 2nd 400m, driven to lead 250m, kept on soundly to wire.
Fair start, bustled early midfield 1 off, to fence 1000m, switched out ridden 400m, ran on to 2nd 50m.
Missed break, outpaced early, last trio rail, rolled forward 1000m, progress on turn, stayed on, took 3rd close home.
Bumped start, lost ground, hard-driven led 1200m on rail, driven final turn, headed 250m, weakened thereafter.
Good break wide, taken back, raced 3 wide near rear, ridden widest into stretch, stayed on without threat.
Jumped to early lead, headed 1200m, settled 2nd 1 off no cover, niggled & unable to hold position 800m, kept on one pace.
Slow to begin, sat 1 off near rear, niggled outpaced 800m, stayed on same speed centre track.
Good start, covered 1 off fore of midfield, bustled & outpaced final turn, switched out 400m, kept on moderately.
Taken back from wide gate, trapped 2 deep last pair, last at 800m, minor headway in stretch.
Good break, trapped 4 wide no cover handy, progress 2nd 3 wide 700m, lost place 400m, faded out.
Rousted early strides, raced at tail, rail progress 800m, hard-ridden on turn, struggled in run home.
Sharp break, keen early from wide gate, sat 3 wide no cover 5th, unable to hold place 700m, outpaced in stretch, faded final 200m.
Even break, 4 deep midfield, contact & unbalanced 1200m, bumped 600m, hung wide into stretch, found nothing.
Fair break, sat midfield 3 wide, bumped 1200m, ridden thereafter, shifted into collision 600m, tailed off in stretch.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, dashed well 250M right on the stand side and scored.
Pushed to keep up in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, closed off strongly 300M for 2nd.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Hard ridden forward, sat 0.5L off the leader 2 wide, used up too much fuel in fast early sectionals, led 400M, hung on well until 150M flattened.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast pace, ran on ok to the line.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, favoured by the fast tempo, progressed steadily in straight, lack room 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3-4 wide, ran on ok.
Hard ridden to keep up behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace and the rail trip, ran on ok.
Awkward away, pushed to keep up in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast pace, no turn of foot.
Checked start, soon obtained midfield sport on the fence, 3Ls off the leader, suited by the fast tempo, no progress.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, suited by the fast pace, never improved.
Pushed early but not muster, 6.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, no progress.
Hard ridden to cross and led by 0.5L at fast sectionals, soon emptied 300M.
Pushed early but not muster, on heels, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast pace, faded 400M and tailed out.
Broke well, hard ridden from wide draw to reach fourth two off no cover, ridden again approaching turn, ran on very gamely to lead last 50m.
Slow start, ridden early but not much early pce, midfield rail, inside bid, finished well.
Broke well, second one off, joined leader approaching turn, led early straight, no extra late.
Slow start, mid-rear rail, out for mid-track bid, kept on well but outpaced late.
Broke well, settled fifth one off, ridden approaching straight, bid three off, kept on one pace.
Taken back from wide draw, mid-rear rail, then one off, inside bid, kept on well under driving but not pace to challenge.
Broke well, led until headed early straight, one pace after.
Broke well, third rail, fourth into straight, bid one off, one pace.
Awkward start, midfield one off, mid-track bid, one pace, substantial blood in trachea.
Fair break, mid-rear two off, wide bid, little progress.
Fair break, mid-rear two off, ridden approaching straight, wide bid, no impression.
Broke well, ridden but no early pace, second last rail, last into straight, minimal progress.
Fair break, third last two off, wide bid, found nil.
Taken back from wide draw, last one off, mid-track bid, found nil.
Broke well, shared lead on the inside, responded well 350M, kicked 3Ls clear mid-straight, never in danger from that point.
Chased leaders, stayed on well to go 2nd 150M but not able to close in on the runaway winner.
Placed 2-wide in the group chasing the pace, kept on steadily final 300M but not a serious threat to winner.
Lacked early speed, dropped back to last 7Ls off the pace, niggled along 700M, pulled wide to challenge in straight, closed off strongly. (Jockey questioned.)
Driven forward, shared lead on the outside, kept on one paced turning into straight, weakened over final 100M.
Held up midfield, proved difficult to settle when steadied 1000M, kept on same pace final 300M. (Bled.)
Caught 3-wide no cover in the group chasing the pace, ran on same pace turning into straight, never a threat to leaders.
Towards the rear, made limited progress final 300M, never threatened.
Settled towards the rear, not travelling and had to be niggled along middle stages, not pace to challenge.
Held up near last, pulled widest to challenge passing 400M, made no progress.
Lacked early speed, settled midfield, had cover throughout but found disappointingly little when driven near 400M, eased mid-straight. (Jockey said the surface may not have suited.)
Began awkwardly, dropped back to a 3-wide position towards the rear, pushed along near 400M but not quickened, soon behind.
Broke fast, led and dictated, kicked clear early straight, kept lead to the line.
Awkward break, shifted out, midfield rail, out for mid-track bid, good late progress without quite pace to challenge.
Broke well, third rail, bid one off, kept on without being able to challenge.
Broke well, midfield one off, urged approaching straight, mid-track bid, kept on steadily, not quite pace to challenge.
Fair break, taken to rear rail, improved rail to mid-rear, out for wide bid, kept on.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, crowded near 850m, outside bid, steady progress without being able to threaten.
Broke well, fifth rail, ridden approaching straight, bid two off, kept on one pace.
Broke well, third early then fourth one off, mid-track bid, third 200m out, no extra late.
Fair break, not much early pace, mid-rear two off, widest bid, limited progress.
Taken back from wide gate, second last rail, out for mid-track bid, modest progress.
Crowded start, crowded again 1200m when ridden to improve, third last one off, wide into straight, switched for mid-track bid, kept on but no impression.
Broke well, not pace to lead, second one off, third into straight, weakened.
Fair break, taken back from wide to rear rail, soon detached and urged, inside bid, found nil.
Crowded start, never travelled well, second last one off, aimed for mid-track bid, found nil, tailed off.
Pressed forward from a tricky gate to race outside leader, fair run with pressure from outside horse, went to front turning but headed at 200m, fought back strongly to score.
Standard break, positioned just off midfield 5Ls or so away, raced 2 wide to bend, came wide and dashed strongly to hit front at 200m, tired late and inside horse fought back to beat him.
Bounced out, allowed to take a trail, raced on leaders back throughout, tracked up turning but outdashed by principals, battled on ok for placing.
Ended up back with last few 7Ls or so away in two wide line, still well back to bend, came wide to better going and made good late progress to make frame.
No early speed, sat 3 wide behind midfield with cover 7Ls or so off top end, came widest turning in search of better ground, made steady progress down.
Drifted back from a tricky alley, 9Ls or so away at rear, well back with field to beat turning, came to outside and closed off well to be nearest on line. (see racing incidents).
Pushed forward from outside gate but trapped 3 wide without cover, did it tough up challenging on speed to turn, loomed at 400m but run ended at 250m and faded.
Showed some early speed and angled into 1 out 1 back spot, had all favors to bend, steadied at 300m but didn't come on when clear.
Average getaway but soon mustered to dig through and obtain lead, shaded with pressure from outside horses turning, soon under pressure and faded.
Out in line, assumed a midfield position, used little racing 3Ls or so off lead, shifted wider turning, one paced to close and weakened out final furlong.
Unable to slot in and ended up just off midfield 3 wide with cover, 5-6Ls back in run, eased wider turning but just whacked away in finish.
Away evenly, settled 3-4Ls back on rails, easy time in mid-section, no acceleration final 400m and only passed tired horses.
Ordinary break, taken down to rail to race 6-7Ls back, difficult to settle in run, same margin back turning, took inside runs but didn't find anything in run to line.
Standard break, pressed on to take a closer order but no better than 3 wide throughout, had cover 4Ls back to turn, didn't find when pressed at 400m and dropped right out. (See Racing Incidents.)
Good early speed to hold prominent spot behind leader, had even run on the speed with decent tempo, put into race at 300m and dashed strongly, drew away to score easily.
Ended up 3 wide behind midfield 6Ls back, aided by solid tempo, came 4 wide leaving bend and produced a solid last 400m to take 2nd.
Taken back to race in rearward spot, raced 7Ls back in running line, improved on turn but had job to do swinging widest turning, closed well late for a placing.
Out in line, trapped 3 wide and pressed on, posted without cover from 1200m 1L back, loomed with a challenge at 400m and looked a place chance to furlong but hard run took toll.
Showed speed to roll forward and take up running, kept a decent tempo throughout with attention from outside horse, headed at 250m and couldn't find extra dropping off late.
Began well, pushed up into nice spot 1 out 1 back, did a little on decent speed, still there turning but lacked dash final 300m and just whacked away late.
Even break, raced on rails 4Ls or so back, quiet time throughout appreciating speed, not much acceleration in straight just kept on at same pace.
Slowly away and soon at rear, best part of 8ls back on rails, tracked up turning and closed off ok late although never looked likely.
Showed speed from a wide gate to look for close up spot, 3 wide without cover until found leaders girth at 1200m, did work on fast speed, struggling turning when workload took toll and faded.
Pressed on to take a spot near front, assumed 1 out 1 back trail by 1200m, always right there doing a bit on decent pace, found little when pressure applied and dropped out in straight.
Average break, raced behind midfield 5-6Ls back in running line, same margin back turning, no extra and beaten a long way. (Lame next day.)
Unable to slot in and ended up 3 wide in midfield, 3-4Ls back with cover, produced for effort turning but that was short lived and dropped right out
Settled on rails just off midfield, 5Ls back in run, struggling approaching bend, found nothing.
Lacked any pace and was soon at rear, raced 3 wide 8Ls or so back, never looked a factor and was beaten a long way.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began well, never far off on rails, hit the front over 100 M out, won well.
Began well, trailed the pacesetter throughout, ran home one-paced.
Niggled along in first few, similar turning in, ran home one-paced.
Began awkwardly from a wide gate losing ground, travelled in rear on rails, saved ground turning in, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Ridden early, settled mainly in midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Soon took up running after some urge, raced keenly in front coming out of back straight, faded under pressure inside final 150 M.
Began from the widest gate, soon taken back to last few, remained in rear to straight, ran on past beaten runners.
Jumped moderately, towards rear to straight, ran home one-paced.
Soon taken back to trail the field, remained in last into straight, ran on past well-beaten horses.
Began well, niggled along early, settled in 5th in forward of midfield, faded gradually in straight.
Broke well, settled in midfield, ran home one-paced.
Began well from a wide gate, settled wide in midfield without cover, lost position from around home bend.
Enjoyed the run of the race on the leaders back along the paint. Got the inside split early in the straight and finished off well.
Led along the fence. Rolled off rounding the home turn, straightened up a length in front and fought on gamely.
Began awkwardly but soon made ground to travel 3 back the fence. Finished off well.
Travelled midfield the fence. Maintained a fair gallop to make the frame.
Taken back from the outside alley and settled 3rd from the rear, 2 deep with cover. Made its run widest in the home straight and closed off soundly.
Allowed to settle worse than midfield from a wide gate, 1 off with cover. Kept on evenly in the home straight,
Camped 1 out 1back. Had every possible hope, but faded over the concluding stages.
Speared forward and travelled outside the leader, 1 off no cover. As a spent force passing the final furlong.
Travelled back in the field, along the fence with cover. Railed up in the straight but failed to close off.
Not the best to begin and despite being ridden along and drifted back to settle midfield 2 wide with cover. Hung out after the 500m and was never a factor thereafter.
Began awkwardly settling well back from the bulk of the runners 1 off the fence, with some cover. Never really travelled throughout and struggled in the run home. (To trial)
Travelled a couple of lengths from the main body of the field on the rails. Was never likely finishing well back.
Desperate to get a rail run from the outside barrier before the Home Bend, kicked clear after straightening, weakened in the last 100M but still able to score.
Settled three back 4Ls behind the leader on fence, stayed inside after straightening and dashed on nicely.
Driven forward and led on fence early, crossed by eventual winner near 600M, stayed on well but no further kick in the concluding stages.
Shortly after the start was crowded for room, soon niggled and ended up in fourth position with cover, peeled wide but unable to threaten any placegetter.
Slow to muster speed early, stayed three wide throughout, swung wide but unable to show any dash.
Positively ridden, settled two wide without cover, under pressure near 450M out and weakened in the last furlong.
Slow early, 7Ls behind the leader, detached from the field before straightening, never in a competitive position, finished off the race one paced.
Slow to muster speed and was checked near 850M, 9Ls behind the leader, detached from the field before straightening, unable to finish off the race.

Was badly checked near 850M and hung out badly rounding the Home Bend, detached from the field before straightening, soon lost the momentum to finish off the race. Tailed out. (Bled from both nostrils.)
Sharp start, driven to early lead, dictated steady pace, kicked clear on home turn, never in danger.
Good break, settled handy 1 off no cover, closed to leader's flanks 1100m, driven 500m, clear 2nd 300m, unable to close.
Smart break, trapped 3 wide midfield, ridden to 2nd 500m, outpaced lost place 300m, battled but not quicken.
: Pace early, slipstreamed leader on rail, keen 1100m, shaken up 4th 400m, kept on one-paced in stretch.
Sluggish start, bustled early behind midfield 1 off, niggled 600m, outpaced 5th & driven 400m, kept on same speed.
Fair break, sat rail midfield, short of room 1000m, shuffled to last trio, driven 500m, one-paced in run home.
Missed break, taken to rail, settled near rear, to tail 1000m, minor progress 3-wide final turn, plugged on same pace.
Moderate start, settled last trio1 off, rousted 300m, found little.
Tardy start, raced at tail, 3-wide advance to midfield 1000m, outpaced & faded 500m, last turning in, no extra.
Fast break wide, rolled to close 2nd 1 off no cover, pressed leader final turn, kicked to lead 300m, just held on.
Broke well, camped rail midfield, shaken up 3L back 400m, switched centre track 300m, flashed home, just missed.
Sharp break, tracked leader on rail, niggled 500m, every chance final turn, kept on soundly to secure 3rd close home.
Speed to take early lead on rail, under pressure home turn, headed 300m, all out 150m, lost 2nd final 50m.
Smart start, covered handy 1off, ridden in 3rd 400m, unable to hold position 300m, kept on same speed.
Fair break, bustled to 1 off fore of midfield, driven 600m, wide into stretch, stayed on without threat.
Tardy start, pushed along early to midfield 1 off, ridden 600m, stayed on for moderate late headway.
Steadied off heels & outpaced at break, settled rail behind midfield, driven final turn, battled on same pace.
Slow start, crowded early strides, raced 1 off towards rear, driven 600m, one paced in stretch, never a factor.
Fair break, rolled to midfield 3 wide, driven wide home turn, one-paced in run to wire.
Raced last pair, bustled 1000m, niggled in back stretch, found nothing for pressure, struggled in run home.
Dropped in at tail from wide gate, niggled 13L back 900m, still last turning in, no progress, well beaten.
Pushed early but failed to cross in front, eased midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, made early move 900M, drifted away 250M to score comfortably.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made steady ground 300M for 2nd.
Eased back, 6Ls off the good pace 2 wide, held up 300M, progressed steadily when clear for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, trapped 2-3 wide, held ground in straight.
Eased to rear for cover, 8Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on ok in straight.
Pushed early, 4.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, held up and on heels 400M, ran on fairly when clear.
Pushed to take rail and led by 0.5L at good pace, out of fuel 250M.
Hard ridden to sit outside leader, pace good, soon weakened 300M.
Midfield along the fence, 3.5Ls off the good pace, found nothing in straight.
Eased back, 2-3 wide, never a factor.
Pushed to sit 2Ls off the good pace 2 wide, emptied 250M.
Box seat, faded 400M.
Steadied start, second last one off, jockey alert to slowing pace and improved wide approaching turn, wide bid, led 150m out, held on well.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, improved wide turn, wide bid, finished well, just failed, lost left front plate.
Taken back from wide gate, last rail, improved turn, mid-track bid between horses, finished well without being able to challenge.
Broke well, midfield rail, urged turn, bid two off, kept on steadily under drive.
Fair break, third rail, shaken up approaching straight, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, ridden for position but caught midfield three wide no cover, improved turn, mid-track bid, joined leaders 200m out, no extra late.
Slowly away, improved quickly to second two off, then back to fifth one off, urged turn, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Broke well, led early two off, then second one off, led briefly to off early straight, headed, one pace.
Steadied start, third last rail, back to last entering straight, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Broke well, ridden to midfield one off, shuffled back to fourth last entering straight, mid-track bid, one pace.
Broke well, ridden to lead and eventually cross, joined and headed entering straight, bumped and unbalanced 150m out, weakened.
Fair break, not rushed, mid-rear rail, inside bid the went for split between horses one off, gap closed, crowded and badly checked 150m out, eased when no chance after.
Settled in 9th and not hurried in early stages, moved out to 3-wide 600M, made steady headway, found extra when challenged by the runner-up inside final 100M.
Given a waiting ride as usual, 10Ls off the pace in the first half, made headway from 600M, swung widest for home, finished off well and came extremely close to land his 4th win but was just denied.
Crossed to the lead passing 1400M, took them along at good pace, kept on nicely up the straight and looked to hold an unassailable lead inside 150M, caught by first two near line.
Settled midfield, travelled well enough to the straight, proved difficult to ride when hanging badly under pressure final 300M but still managed to finish 4th close up.
Held up in mid-division, kept to inside throughout, ran on steadily but no extra pace inside 200M to challenge the leaders.
Taken back from wide barrier, over 10Ls away in last, crept closer hoe turn and moved to challenge 250M out, stayed on under mainly hands and heels riding.
Held up near last, made some progress but not a serious threat to leaders.
In touch, 3-4Ls back in 4th, had every chance turning in but effort flattened out 150M.
7Ls off the pace, travelled well behind midfield but didn't find a lot off the bridle, no threat to leaders.
Close up in 3rd but not able to quicken going into final 300M, no extra late stages.
Settled midfield, moved closer to leader passing 600M, kept on same pace under pressure, out of contention mid-straight.
Tracked leader in a strongly run race, under pressure 500M out, dropped out rapidly final 200M.

Settled in last few on rails, took closer order home bend, switched out for a run after straightening, quickened well inside 350 M to take charge 100 M out.
Began fairly, settled well behind, saved ground turning in, baulked early in straight, ran on well inside final 300 M to be nearest at finish.

Began fairly from a wide draw, settled wide in forward of midfield early, took closer order over 1200 M out, 3-wide without cover, given reminders around bend, disputed lead into straight, unable to sustain effort over 100 M out.
Jumped moderately, settled in rear of midfield on rails, saved ground turning for home, made modest progress without threatening.
Soon took up running attempting to make all, joined by eventual placegetter into straight, fought on until finding no extra inside final 150 M.
Towards rear, produced good late impression inside final 200 M. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Jumped moderately, soon ridden to a prominent position briefly before shuffling back to midfield, remained similar to straight, ran home one-paced.
Began awkwardly losing ground, gradually improved out wide in midfield down far side to be outside leader over 1200 M out, faded under pressure soon after straightening.
Began well from a wide gate, gradually settled in better than midfield positions in 6th or 5th two off the rails, folded up quickly after straightening.
Towards rear throughout, came under pressure around the bend, found nothing.
Jumped fairly, prominent to straight, gradually weakened.
Broke well from the widest gate, soon taken back to race at the back, only ran past two well-beaten horses.
Began fairly, settled 3-wide with cover in midfield, gradually weakened.
Broke well from a low draw, settled just off the pace on rails, dropped out under pressure soon after straightening.
Made its run from midfield, after racing 2 deep with cover. Kicked well clear after the 250M and drew away for a solid win.
Began awkwardly, parking back in the event, 1 off with cover. Finished off nicely.
Ridden along early but only managed to hold a position worse than midfield on the rails. Ran on well.
Made gradual ground in the final stretch after settling behind midfield, 3 wide with cover.
Taken back from a wide gate settling at the rear of the field, 1 off with cover. Made good ground in the home straight.
Settled 3 back, 1 off with cover. Worked to a slender lead near the 300m, but was well out of contention near the 100m.
Coursed 3 wide without cover, midfield. Never likely.
Hustled along early, ultimately settling in 2nd position, 2 wide without cover. Was gassed approaching the furlong.
Settled midfield the fence. Faded in the home straight.
Did plenty of work early to eventually cross and lead along the paint after the 900m. Was a spent force passing the 250m.
Settled with the backmakers from a wide gate, 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Travelled in last position along the fence with cover. Failed to close off.
Travelled 3 back the fence. Raced keenly in the middle stages and was found wanting in the final stretch.
Pushed along early and vied for the lead before box seating near the 900m. Gave ground quickly after the 300m. (Vet reported heart irregularity & blood in trachea.)
Midfield, settled 6Ls behind the leader, switched to 3 wide and followed the front runner near 600M, stormed home and hung on for win.
Eased back, settled 8Ls behind the leader, swung wide and finished off the race strongly, just missed by half a length.
Travelled 2 wide behind the pacemaker throughout, stayed on gamely but no further kick in the concluding stages.
Midfield, three back on rail, ran on okay but unable to challenge.
Rolled forward, parked outside the leader, looked likely after straightening but weakened in the last 100M.
Dropped back from the wide gate, 10Ls behind the field on fence, stayed inside and ran on okay. (Rider dropped the whip near 150M.)
Mid-Back on fence, raced ungenerously in the early stages, peeled wide and made some ground.
Mid-Back, settled 7Ls behind the leader, peeled wide and made some ground.
Pushed to obtain box seat, peeled to centre of the track after straightening, finished one paced and weakened in the last 150M.
Midfield in 6th position two wide, under pressure 450M out and finished off one paced, made no impression after straightening.
Not rushed early, settled 4 back on fence, made no improvement after straightening.
Pushed forward and led the field, weakened in the last 250M.
Dropped back, settled 9Ls behind the leader, three wide with cover, peeled to widest, never ran on. (Questioned Disappointing Performance.)
Positively ridden, settled three wide without cover, under pressure near 450M out and weakened in the last furlong.
Good break, bustled early strides, handy 4th on rail, to 3rd 1100m, switched out 400m, relentless progress to lead late.
Smart start, sat 3rd 1 off, to 2nd 1 off no cover 1400m, shaken up final turn, led 250m, all out close home, headed last strides.
Led at break, headed 1600m, taken back to 3rd 1400m, 4th 1 off at 1300m, driven on turn, battled home gamely to just clinch 3rd.
Fair start, sat midfield on paint, closer order in backstretch, switched out & driven 430m, stayed on, narrowly missed frame.
Crowded break, camped last pair 1 off, rolled forward backstretch, advanced wide on turn, solid run home, just missed frame.
Tardy start, settled rail behind midfield, shaken up turning in, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Sharp start, trapped wide initially, rolled to lead 1600m, driven 400m, headed 250m, faded in run to wire.
Slow break, raced keen midfield 1 off, stumbled lost ground 1000m, driven near rear 430m, 6L 11th at 200m, stayed on for late progress.
Restrained from wide gate, sat rail last trio, driven for progress final turn, ran on one pace.
Broke well, raced midfield 1 off, dropped back 900m, driven wide final turn, laboured in run home.
Fair break, trapped 3 wide behind midfield, backstretch progress, 6th & driven 600m, found little & weakened in stretch.
Good break, settled back 5th, outpaced 700m, shuffled back, hard-ridden on turn, found nothing in stretch, well beaten.
Slow start, steadied off heels early strides, sat 1 off near rear, off heels 1000m, ridden 600m, wide home turn, struggled in run home.
Missed break, niggled early strides, raced 1 off at tail, forced wider 1000m, driven 800m, outpaced, never a factor.
Speed from gate, stalked leader 1 off no cover, shaken up to lead 300m, quickened clear for easy win.
Taken behind from wide gate, sat rail near rear, off heels 750m, switched out 5L back 430m, strong run to take 2nd late.
Missed break, raced rail midfield, off heels 900m, switched out 400m, effort 300m, ran on soundly, stole 3rd at wire.
Fast start, rousted to lead on rail, driven final turn, headed 300m, battled on one pace, mugged for 3rd on line.
Smart break, sat handy 1 off with cover, off heels shifted 3 wide 900m, ridden to 3rd 400m, faltered final 100m.
Tardy start, sat 1 off behind midfield, switched out home turn, strong drive, kept on at same pace.
Sharp break, rousted to lay up, settled handy on rail, niggled 800m, driven final turn, one paced in run home.
Good start, raced fore of midfield 1 off, switched 2 deep 600m, driven final turn, kept on at same speed.
Taken back from wide draw, raced rail at tail, hampered 750m, decent stretch progress until route blocked late.
Raced 3 deep behind midfield, wide final turn, driven 400m, weakened last 200m.
Slow start, last pair 1 off, checked off heels 750m, outpaced turning in, kept on moderately.
Fair start, very keen midfield 1 off, over-raced 3 wide 800m, ridden 5th at 400m, found little, faded out.
Good break, bustled fore of midfield 1 off, switched 3 deep 600m, outpaced 400m, struggled in run home.
Fair break, soon dropped 3 wide last trio, bumped 750m, widest final turn, last at 400m, found nothing.
Pushed to take rail steadily and led by 1L at good pace, kicked away 400M, hung on strongly to win.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 3 wide, made steady ground in straight for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 4 wide throughout, progressed steadily 250M.
Settled in box seat, pace good, flattened 200M.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the good pace on the rails, lack room 400M, made steady ground when clear.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on fairly in straight.
Bumped start, 4Ls off the good pace 3 wide, no progress.
At rear, 8Ls off the good pace along the fence, ran on fairly.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, made ground briefly 400M, flattened 200M.
At rear, 8Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, ran on fairly.
Bumped start, eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace on the fence, no progress.
Pressed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, out of fuel 400M.
Awkward away, hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 3 wide, soon weakened 400M.
Broke fast,led and crossed to stand rail, soon clear, never challenged, easily.
Fair break, not much early speed, mid-rear two off stand rail, mid-track bid, kept on well but no chance with winner, jockey lost left rein late.
Broke well, up to second then fourth six off stand rail, kept on without being able to threaten winner until no extra late.
Slightly missed start, not much early speed, second last rail, bid between horses, kept on well without ever being able to threaten winner.
Moderate break, quite good speed to reach second two off, under pressure from mid-race, one pace late.
Broke well, fifth one off, ridden from halfway, kept on one pace.
Broke well but outpaced early, mid-rear rail, not much room from halfway, one pace.
Fair break, second early one off, outpaced from halfway.
Fair break, midfield one off, shifted to mid-track, never pace to threaten.
Fair break, outpaced early, mid-rear two off, no progress when asked.
Slowly away, long last and outpaced throughout, never able to reach rest of field.
Settled towards the rear, guided into clear inside 400M, made good headway to edge out leader close home.
Always prominent outside leader, took over near 300M, ran on strongly to the line, caught last few strides.
Pushed along to hold a 3-wide position in midfield, left with no cover making the turn, kept on evenly final 400M but not pace to challenge first two.
Held up near last, pulled wide to challenge passing 450M, stayed on well without being able to get to the first two.
Well covered in mid-division, kept on evenly over final 400M and narrowly missed out on 3rd in a blanket finish.
Began well, never far off the pace, had every chance turning in, kept on to 100 M then faded.
Went forward, shared lead on the inside, ran on one paced passing 400M, weakened final 200M.
Tracked leaders in 3rd, checked near 800M, responded to pressure early straight but got tired passing 150M.
Never better than midfield, saved ground on the inside but couldn't step up a gear when placed under pressure in straight.
Chased leaders, difficult to settle middle stages, found disappointingly little inside 400M, out of contention mid-straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Slowly away, raced at the back 7Ls off the pace, made no progress final 400M, never a factor.
Raced keenly when held up near the rear, 3-wide turning for home, soon dropped away.
Fair break, ridden from wide draw to second one off, led early straight, soon clear, easily.
Fair break, mid-rear two off, checked and bumped 900m, bid between horses, ran on well.
Broke well, taken back to fourth last one off, out for mid-track bid, finished well with pace to threaten winner.
Modrate reak, short of room early, bumped and unbalanced 900m, midfield two off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not much early pace, second last one off, bid between horses, steadied when no run 100m out, never able to threaten.
Fair beak, ridden for early position but caught midfield three wide no cover, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Taken back from wide gate, last one off, steadied off heels 1300m, wide bid, kept on steadily without pace to threaten.
Moderate break, midfield one off then up to third rail, bid two off, weakened late.
Moderate break, bumped early, midfield one off, struck heels and blundered 900m, bid between horses, no extra from 300m out, lame left fore day after race.
Moderate break, steadied of heels, last early, ridden to third last rail, out for mid-track bid, one pace.
Broke well, not much early speed, midfield rail, lay out turn, little progress.
Broke well, not much early speed, mid-rear one off, bid two off, no progress.
Broke well, led rail, headed early straight, weakened.
Fair break, fourth one off, bid two off, weakened quickly from 300m, abrasions on right hind.
Began nicely, took a trail and ended up with ideal run in 1 out 1 back spot, all favours to bend, loomed for a challenge at 300m and dug in to take control final 50m.
Pressed forward from a tricky alley to race outside leader, relaxed well in run and sat 1/2L away to bend, drew to lead at 400m, fought well and just lost out in duel over final 200m.
Even getaway, pressed on but caught 3 wide just behind them, 3Ls away to bend, didn't dash but kept on soundly to hold a placing.
Bounced out well and travelled further forward than usual racing on leaders back, had every chance to bend, lacked a dash but stayed on evenly to make frame.
Fair getaway, posted 3 wide without 2Ls back, made a bit of ground at 400m and looked a place chance but workload too toll and dropped off late.
Angled back and toward rail from a tricky gate, raced with last few 5-6Ls away, made headway between horses turning, came on evenly but peaked on run at 100m.
Posted 4 wide without cover from an awkward draw, 4Ls off lead doing share of work throughout, same margin down turning, stayed on evenly given task.
Standard break, raced in running line 4-5Ls back amongst horses, gradually crept closer turning, made only modest progress in straight.
Unable to drop in and raced 3 and 4 wide with cover, 5Ls away in mid-section, pushed wider turning, came on reasonably in straight holding ground after tough trip.
Showed good pace to take up running from outside gate, set standard tempo to suit to bend, kept on briefly but additional trip took toll and stopped quickly final 200m.
Tardy into stride, settled at rear 6Ls away in 2 wide line, always well back to bend, made minimal headway in stretch.
Drifted back from a wide gate, raced 3 wide at rear 6Ls or so away, came wider turning, only passed beaten runners.
Settled just off midfield near to fence, 4-5Ls off speed, saved ground throughout, same margin back turning, made no impression in straight.
Landed a spot 3Ls back on rails, overaced in mid-section, struggling turning, dropped right out in straight.

Broke well to dispute lead, gained slender advantage passing 400 M, hung on well to the line.
Began fairly from the 1 draw, soon picked up to close-up 2nd just inside narrow leader, kept on same pace without quickening closing stages.
Bumped at the start, soon dropped to the rear of field about 4L off the pace along grandstand rails, switched in for a run over 400 M out, produced good late impression closing stages.
Began fairly, settled just off the speed within 2L of pace, kept on steadily without quickening.
Began fairly, settled just off the speed along grandstand rails, shifted in for a run about 400 M out, kept on steadily under pressure without quickening.
Began quickly, settled just off the speed early, yielded ground gradually passing the 600 M mark.
Began fairly from a low draw, soon dropped behind midfield racing down the centre of the track, faded out of contention inside final 200 M.
Began fairly, settled just off the pace within 2L of the lead, came under pressure inside final 400 M, soon faded.
Jumped well to share the pace early, narrowly headed by eventual winner passing 400 M, folded up from over 300 M out.
Raced ungenerously early and soon dropped to the rear, weakened badly inside final 300 M.
Soon outpaced, tailed-off throughout.
Parked worse than midfield, on the fence with cover. Peeled out after the 500m and ran on strongly.
Made its run 2nd from the rear on the fence, had cover. Motored home strongly.
Parked behind midfield 1 off with cover. Closed off nicely.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race tracking the leader on the rails. Looked likely at the 150m but was overhauled late.
Settled midfield 1 off fence with cover. Ran on soundly over the last 100m.
Had every possible chance after racing handy, 2 wide with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Sent forward a led at a good clip along the paint. Faded inside the 100m.
Restrained to last position, racing 3 deep with cover. Passed some trig runners in the final stretch.
Worked forward and eventually crossed to settle in 2nd position, 1 off no cover. Gave ground inside the 100m.
Began awkwardly and raced at the tail of the field 2 deep with cover. Failed to make any ground in the home straight.
Raced back in the event 4 wide without cover on the circle. Never a factor.
Settled ahead of midfield, along the paint with cover. Was a spent force at the furlong.
Coursed 3 wide without cover, worse than midfield. Never likely.
Raced with the backmakers, 3 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Began smartly, crossed to the stands side and shared the lead. Battled on strongly and just hung on to win.
Rolled forward and shared the lead along the stands rail. Hung in throughout the race, battled on gamely and just beaten by a short head.
Midfield, settled 4Ls off lead on stand side, ran on well when clear near 400M.
Travelled handy 2Ls off lead on stands side, failed to find any extra when under pressure, only kept on one pace.
Positioned 2Ls off close to the stands rail, under pressure near 500M and ran on ok.
Travelled midfield 4Ls off lead stands side, under pressure near 500M, shifted to the centre of the track and ran on only fairly.
Travelled handy 2Ls off lead stands side, under pressure near 400M, only kept on one pace and weakened out last 100M.
Camped handy 2Ls off the stand rail, under pressure near 450M, made no progress and well beaten in the last furlong.
Lacked early speed, raced in the middle of the track, kept on one pace and never looked dangerous.
Lacked early speed and detached from the field, under pressure near 600M and passed tired runners.
Began awkwardly, settled at the rear in the middle of the track, niggled along throughout the race, never closed off.
Camped handy 3Ls off the leader, under pressure near 500M and weakened sharply.
Began fairly. Travelled 4Ls behind the leader in the middle of the track, under pressure near 500M and well beaten last 300M.
Began slowly and was checked shortly after the start. Raced greenly and was reluctant to stretch out throughout the race. Tailed out. (Lame).
Taken back at break, raced rail near rear, shaken up 4L back 450m, switched out 400m, swept to lead 60m, comfortable.
Driven at break to lay handy 1 off with cover, 5-wide final turn, urged to lead 250m, all out headed 60m.
Good start, trapped 4 wide no cover midfield, ran on centre track to 3rd at 200m, kept on under pressure.
Fair break, sat midfield 1 off with cover, switched out turn, bumped 400m, stayed on soundly in stretch, held when off heels close home.
Fair start, settled 1 off towards rear, switched wide final turn, resolute progress without threatening.
Awkward start, bustled at tail on rail, progress when shifted off heels 380m, stayed on moderately.
Fair break, trapped 3 wide with cover fore of midfield, crowded on turn, impeded 400m, one-paced in run home.
Slow start, dropped in from wide gate, raced last pair 1 off with cover, driven 400m, unable to muster in stretch.
Driven from gate, tracked lead on rail, ridden 500m, switched 1 off to lead 350m, headed 250m, weakened out.
Fast break to lead, shaken up & headed 350m, no extra, faded thereafter.
Outpaced & bustled early, settled midfield on rail, hard-ridden final turn, struggled in stretch.
Fair break, bustled early strides, raced front rank 3 wide no cover, niggled on turn, ridden 430m, found nothing in run home.
Trapped wide at break, taken back 3 wide with cover behind midfield, last & hard-ridden final turn, unbalanced 200m, never a factor.
Sharp start to dispute lead, raced on leader's flank 1 off no cover, bustled 500m, emptied turning in, tailed off.
Smart break, settled third 1 off no cover, shaken up 430m, strong stretch drive to lead at 50m.
Fast to stride, bustled to early lead, extended 2L clear 600m, driven for home 400m, collared 50m, no extra.
Slow break, taken to tail from wide gate, rail progress to midfield on turn, driven 400m, ran on to 3rd 100m, closest at wire.
Awkward break, bumped first strides, driven to midfield on rail, hard-ridden turning in, switched out 400m, to 4th 300m, kept on gamely.
Good start, raced 2nd on rail, shaken up final turn, one-paced in run to wire.
Slow start, bumped early strides, covered up midfield 1 off, awkward close to heels 850m, 8L back shifted onto rival 400m, closed out soundly.
Slow start, raced 1 off with cover near rear, outpaced on turn, stayed on moderately.
Fair start, raced keen early, settled midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 2 deep final turn, one-paced in run home.
Taken behind runners from wide draw, 1 off last pair, to tail 800m, 3 wide final turn, modest progress centre track.
Fair beak, driven from gate, raced midfield 3 wide no cover, driven 600m, outpaced on turn, plugged on to little effect.
Sluggish start, bustled early, trapped 3 wide no cover near rear, outpaced in last pair 400m, never a factor.
Tardy start, rousted early, rail progress to lie 4th 700m, driven final turn, faded in stretch, eased when beaten.
Fair start, travelled 3 wide with cover, bumped & unbalanced 400m, weakened in run home.
Speedy break, unable to slot, taken back 4 wide no cover midfield, widest final turn, found nothing.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3.5Ls behind the slow pace but on the fence, dashed well 300M to score quite comfortably.
Pushed to obtain box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, lack turn of foot but held ground and ran on to the line for 2nd.
Eased early but trapped very wide in midfield, pressed forward to share the lead 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, led briefly 300M, overhauled 200M, ran on for 3rd.
Eased early, failed to get cover in midfield, rolled forward to share the lead on the rails at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 250M flattened.
At back, 6.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
At back, 6Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 250M.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, however soon emptied 400M.
Settled in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, no progress.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 200M.
At rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, checked 400M, no dash when clear.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 5Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, no progress.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, soon weakened 300M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, trapped 3-4 wide, dashed well 400M, however faded rapidly 200M.
Speed to lead at break, settled back handy on rail 1200m, led 250m, scooted clear.
Fair break, slotted 1 off with cover midfield, switched out shaken up 350m, stormed centre track, to 2nd 100m, well held by winner.
Taken back at break, raced rail behind midfield, shaken up 300m, closed to snatch 3rd last stride.
Fast start, disputed lead 1000m, settled 2nd 1off no cover, driven to lead 270m, immediately headed, kept on same pace, lost 3rd on wire.
Good start, raced fore of midfield 1 off, niggled 450m, crowded 400m, edged out 350m, stayed on soundly.
Taken back from wide gate, soon at tail 1 off with cover, advanced wide 800m, bustled 500m, ran on solidly to wire.
Tardy start, bustled to fore of midfield 3 wide with cover, steadied 900m, effort 400m, plugged on same pace.
Fair break, raced handy 3 wide with cover, shaken up in 3rd 400m, found little when asked 300m, one-paced thereafter.
Tardy break, settled 1 off near rear, bustled 450m, kept on same pace.
Quick break, led 1200m, to rail 1000m, kicked on 400m, headed 270m, no extra, faded out.
Decent break, trapped wide, soon dropped in 3 deep behind midfield, niggled 600m, struggled in stretch run.
Sluggish break, mustered to race midfield on rail, niggled 800m, driven 500m, struggled in run home.
Tardy & rousted at break, advanced 4 wide no cover to race handy, ridden into stretch, found nothing, weakened out.
Missed break, raced rail last pair, last & niggled at 800m, found nothing, well beaten.
Never far off in 4th, travelled strongly and accelerated to the lead inside 250M, continued on well to the line and was always maintaining his advantage.
Chased leader, had every chance turning in, not pace of winner inside 250M but kept on well enough to hold 2nd.
In midfield along the inside, kept on steadily final 400M but not going the pace to challenge first two.
From wide barrier slotted into a 3-wide spot in midfield, held up early straight, switched wide and closed off willingly, nearest finish.
Held up 3-wide near the rear, difficult to settle and shifted to 4-wide without cover 800M, steady progress from 500M, briefly went 3rd 100M out, faded late and lost 2 placings.
Tracked leaders in 3rd, found disappointingly little inside 350M, out of contention 200M.
Towards the rear and not helped by the slackening pace in middle stages, pulled wide to challenge passing 400M, stayed on only fairly.
Settled 2-wide behind midfield, not helped by the slackening pace over the turn, no clear run early straight but made only limited progress when clear.
Held up in last pair, turned 3-wide 700M and moved closer to pace, hung in over final 400M and proved very difficult to ride, no threat to leaders passing 200M.
Raced freely down the back straight, not able to cross, hung out making the turn and left with no cover, found little in the drive home, weakened 200M out.
Driven forward and crossed to the lead near 900M, slowed things down over the turn, headed near 250M, weakened away.
Towards the rear 6Ls off the pace, kept on same pace early straight, got tired passing 150M.
Raced keenly early stages when racing without cover, settled in midpack making the turn, not pace of others passing 300M, soon behind.
Always at the back, not picked up inside 400M, eased mid-straight.
Fair break, bustled initially, niggled 3 deep at tail, 5L back & driven 400m, stayed on centre track, surged to lead 50m.
Slow start, 4 deep with cover near tail, shaken up 400m, bumped 300m, stayed on strongly centre track, snatched 2nd on wire.
Fast break to lead from wide gate, to rail 900m, ridden for effort 300m, headed 50m, kept on soundly.
Taken behind to rail near rear from wide draw, switched out ridden final turn, stayed on well, just missed frame.
Tardy start, bustled early strides, settled midfield 1 off, ridden 450m, stayed on at one pace.
Good start, raced 2nd 3 wide no cover, ridden final turn, battled on gamely to wire.
Sharp break, sat handy on rail driven to 3rd 200m, one-paced and swamped 100m, no extra.
Rousted wide early strides, taken back to race 5 wide no cover near rear, bustled final turn, kept on centre track.
Early speed to sit handy 1 off no cover, shaken up 400m, boxed on same pace until weakened out final 200m.
Taken back from wide gate to rail, rolled on to camp midfield, laboured in stretch run.
Fair break, bustled 3 deep midfield, driven 600m, bumped & unbalanced 300m, no extra thereafter.
Rousted at break, trapped 4 wide no cover midfield, outpaced final turn, never a factor.
Fair break, bustled to lay up early, raced 3 wide no cover 5th, driven 400m, found little, weakened in run home.
Slow start, settled 1 off near rear, driven 430m, found nothing, struggled in stretch, eased when beaten.
Drifted back widest gate, raced at rear nearly 10Ls away, still well back turning, came to middle and unleashed a powerful dash to gather in field and overpower leader final 100m. Strong performance.
Jumped well, pressed forward to take up running, had run to suit setting even speed, cruising turning and kicked clear, kept up gallop but overhauled final 100m, well clear of 3rd.
Went forward to position in first 4, races 2 and 3 wide just behind speed, 2Ls down turning, kept on well but no match for first two. Good debut.
Lacked early speed, back with last few 8Ls or so away racing 2 wide, crept closer between horses turning, didn't have clear run in straight and made good progress in circumstances.
Posted 4 wide without cover in midfield from a tricky gate, 5-6Ls back in mid-section working hard to bend, battled on ok in straight given workload run, just missed frame.
Tucked in behind midfield 6Ls away in running line, even trip to bend, switched wide and made some progress but peaked final 100m.
Landed a midfield spot 4Ls back in running line, shuffled back on bend, came wider turning and made brief headway but peaked final 200m.
Pressed forward from a wide alley but unable to slot in, faced breeze 3 wide without cover, 1L down turning, run ended at 200m when workload took toll.
Even break, settled just off speed on rails 3Ls away, quiet run to bend, in traffic turning, clear final 250m but was just one paced thereafter.
Began well, ideally positioned behind leader, difficult to settle but not asked in run to bend, didn't find when asked and was one paced in home stretch.
Moderate break, raced in rearward division 8Ls back on rails, still well back on rails turning, didn't really get a clear crack at all in straight and wasn't able to be tested.
Showed speed to go up and join leader, raced at leaders girth throughout. There to bend, dropped off when condition gave out soon after straightening.
Out with rest, positioned 3 wide with cover in midfield, 5Ls back, improved on bend, soon under pressure and dropped out final 300m.
Standard beginning, raced behind midfield on rails 6Ls back, saved ground taking inside runs on bend, gave in cheaply soon after turning and eased down. (See Racing Incidents.)
Assumed usual role at rear soon after start, best part of 8ls back, plenty to do turning, wound up strongly final 300m to finish over top of rivals final furlong.
Even break, positioned just off midfield, 5-6Ls back in running line, made progress between horses t4urning, closed well final 200m to miss by a narrow margin.
Settled in rear division 3 wide with cover, 7Ls or so off lead, swung wider turning, made good ground in straight to take 3rd.
Pressed forward to take up spot near lead, assumed a 1 out 1 back role, all favours to bend, took over at 300m but couldn't hold off placegetters inside final furlong.
Took a prominent spot on leaders back, all chance in mid-section, took inside runs and looked a place chance when challenging at 300m, peaked inside final furlong.
Unable to get closer than 3 wide in midfield, 5Ls or so back with cover, angled wider rounding bend, made steady headway to be nearest on line.
Pressed on when a little wide to sit outside leader, not far away thereafter, levelled up on turning, kept to task but dropped off final 200m.
Even break, raced 3-4Ls back in 2 wide line, had fair run throughout, stayed on to 200m before run ended.
Taken back to rear from a tricky alley, 8Ls or so away at rear, set task with field to beat turning, passed a few tired ones late.
Posted 3 wide from widest alley, 3Ls off leaders doing it tough without cover, close enough turning but run ended at 300m and dropped off.
Pressed forward to take up running, allowed to set terms to suit in middle stages, headed turning and had no extra gear, battled away dropping off final 200m.
Began awkwardly and missed start, mustered to be 3-4Ls back on rails, but keen in mid section, folded when asked for effort in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Ended up near rear 7Ls or so away on rails, quiet trip to bend, lacked usual finish and was beaten a long way at finish.
No early pace and cast 3 and 4 wide without cover behind midfield, always working to bend, dropped right out after hard run.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Settled in midfield, quickened well into straight, gained upper hand inside final 50 M.
Settled towards the rear, finished off race well, did best work late.
Broke well, soon ridden forward to dispute lead, gained slender advantage over halfway out, led until finding no extra inside final 50 M.
Began fairly, always thereabouts, ran home one-paced.
Began from a wide draw, soon came across to settle in midfield, kept on steadily in straight.
In forward of midfield on rails, lost position around the bend, ran home one-paced.
Soon took up running, ceded lead to eventual 3rd over halfway out, maintained prominent position on rails into straight, soon swamped.
Well back when hampered and lost position on stables bend, remained tailed-off most of way to straight, ran past well-beaten horses.
In rear of midfield when hampered and lost position passing winning post the first time, remained in last few thereafter, kept on one-paced in the run home.
In rear when hampered early, remained in last few throughout.
Ridden along, settled one back in 3rd on rails, in similar position but became 2L 4th around the bend, dropped away quickly passing 400 M. (Heart irregularity)

Placing: PU
Comment: Midfield when faltered passing winning post the first time, soon pulled up. (Mucus.)
Pushed forward and positioned handy behind the lead in 2 wide, came home well and just won by a short head, benefited by the slow sectionals.

Began well but interfered by another runner before first turn, obtained a box seat run, stayed inside after straightening, dashed on nicely, just beaten by a short head, benefited by the slow sectionals.
Dropped back early, rolled forward 900M out, under pressure near 450M and ran on well.
Rolled forward to cross from wide barrier and shared the lead at a slow pace, stayed on well but unable to challenge, benefited by the slow sectionals.
Began smartly but checked before first turn, dropped back to 4 back 5Ls behind the leader on fence, made some ground late, hampered by the slow sectionals.
Began fast but interfered by another runner before first turn, positioned 3 back 4Ls behind the leader on fence, kept on one pace to finish, hampered by the slow sectionals.
Began slowly, niggled early and ended up in midfield before first turn, under pressure near 450M and finished one paced, hampered by the slow sectionals.
Rolled forward and led with slow sectionals but found nothing after straightening.
Eased back, settled 6Ls behind the leader, peeled wide and finished off one paced, hampered by the slow sectionals.
Eased back, positioned 7Ls behind the leader along the rail, under pressure near 500M and weakened last furlong, hampered by the slow sectionals. (Lame.)
Reared start and made heavy contact with another runner early, raced at the rear throughout.
Always at the rear, never looked likely.
Box seated, travelled nicely throughout on fence, switched to outside of leader after straightening, looked comfortable and scored well.
Began well, soon dropped back to midfield 2 wide, swung wide and dashed on well.
Began slowly, positioned 3 back on fence, stayed inside after straightening and dashed on well.
Driven forward and led, kicked well after straightening but weakened last 100M.
Dropped back, trapped 3 wide throughout the race, peeled wide to challenge and made some ground.
Positioned handy 2 wide but unable to quicken in straight, kept on one pace.
Began slowly, settled 4 back on fence, switched to center of the track, made some late headway.
Rolled forward but couldn't find any good spot to slot in, trapped 3 wide behind the leader, soon weakened after straightening.
Sat at the rear, never a factor, passed beaten horses.
Began smartly but trapped 3 wide throughout the race despite ridden along in the early stages, under pressure 500M out and weakened after straightening.
Always at the back, never in a competitive position.
Driven forward, parked outside the leader, faded sharply after straightening, tailed out. (Displayed an irregular heart rhythm and lame.)
Dropped in at break, covered up 1 off towards rear, advanced wide 4L back final turn, surged center track, led close home.
Good start, raced handy on rail, rolled to 3rd 600m, switched 3 wide final turn, led 250m, headed last strides.
Dwelt slightly, recovered to rail in midfield, progress on turn, driven to 2nd 200m, all out final stages.
Slow break, raced last pair 1 off with cover, driven wide 6L back home turn, closed out soundly center track.
Tardy start, railed near rear, driven & outpaced 400m, switched out home turn, stayed on soundly.
Speedy break, settled handy 1 off with cover, driven 400m, kept on to 4th 150m, emptied close home.
Sharp start, sat 2nd 1 off early, to 3rd 900m, lost place driven 4 wide final turn, plugged on same pace.
Taken behind at break, camped rail at tail, ridden 400m, switched out 250m, one-paced, never a threat.
Fair break, bustled early 3 wide midfield, progress to lead 900m, rail 700m, headed 250m, no extra.
Broke well, sat midfield 1 off with cover, driven to advance 3 wide 500m, emptied 250m, plugged on to wire.
Fast break to lead early on rail, to 2nd 900m, switched 1 off 700m, driven home turn, found little, faded in stretch.
Smart start, bustled early, tracked leader on fence, switched out final turn, closed out to grab lead last stride.
Good break, taken to early lead, advantage challenged 500m, headed 300m, rallied to lead 200m, mugged on wire.
Well away, settled midfield 1 off, shaken up final turn, strong stretch drive, nicked third final strides.
Missed break, bustled to rail fore of midfield, ridden 500m, kept on soundly for pressure.
Fast break, raced 2nd 1 off no cover, shaken up to dispute lead 500m, narrow lead 300m, headed 200m, faded final 100m.
Taken back at break, settled 1 off near rear, back stretch progress, switched out driven final turn, stayed on for solid late progress.
Prominent early, sat 4th 1 off with cover, driven 400m, every chance turning in, one paced in run home.
Snagged back at start, settled rail at rear, wide advance home turn, battled on for moderate progress.
Broke well, niggled early stages, settled back 1 off near rear, driven 400m, outpaced final turn, kept on for modest progress.
Fair break, outpaced early, raced rail at rear, rolled to midfield 1100m, hard driven 500m, unable to quicken, never a threat.
Sluggish break, crowded early strides, raced 3 wide no cover midfield, driven on turn, found nothing in stretch.
Raced wide near rear, driven 500m, last turning for home, tailed off and eased in run to wire.
Pushed forward, steadily took rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on well to win.
Midfield along the fence, 2.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M for 2nd.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 200M.
Hard ridden to take box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, had every chance in top straight, however just held ground.
Settled 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, attempted to made early move 600M 3 wide, however just held ground in straight.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, lack room 400M, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 2-3 wide, sat just off the leader, favoured by the slow tempo, soon flattened 400M.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, 7.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on fairly.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Fair break, niggled early strides, camped rail near rear, ridden along 7L back 500m, switched out in stretch, driven to lead 120m, comfortable.
Slow start, crowded initial strides, raced at tail on rail, 8L down 400m, switched out 300m, surged home, closing at wire.
Tardy start, trapped 3 wide midfield, driven wide final turn, ran on soundly to wire.
Broke with others, settled rail fore of midfield, shaken up 400m, maintained solid gallop home.
Decent break, sat midfield 1 off with cover, driven 5L back final turn, made up ground in stretch.
Fair start, rousted to 2nd 1 off no cover, driven 300m to dispute lead 250m, emptied 200m, battled on to wire.
Outpaced early strides, bustled last pair 1 off, raced keen down back, shaken up 300m, progress until short of running room final 100m.
Fast break to lead, set pace on rail, driven 300m, all out when headed 120m, emptied & faded.
Broke with others, dropped in 3 deep with cover behind midfield, driven wide home turn, plugged on same speed.
Fair break, unable to slot in, rolled on to 3rd 3 wide no cover, ridden 400m, kept on moderately.
Fast start, dropped in midfield on rail, ridden 400m, one paced in stretch.
Good break, niggled to hold midfield position 1 off with cover, one paced turning in, struggled in run home.
Up with early pace, strode to the lead passing 800M, kept responding under pressure in straight and always found enough to hold off rivals.
Lacked his usual early speed, 3-wide move from 800M to a more prominent position, swung wide into straight, kept on well final 300M and got up for 2nd near line.
Always prominent, travelled well in the slipstream of the leader, kept on evenly inside 300M and put in a renewed challenge final 100M, nearest finish.
Failed to muster despite ridden, settled towards the back 4-5Ls off the pace, ran on steadily, nearest finish.
Rushed to the lead from wide barrier, caught 3-wide entering back straight then held back to race in 3rd, kept on steadily to 100M, faded final stages.
Broke well, restrained to sit behind leading trio, kept on inside 300M but not pace to seriously challenge.
Towards the rear, shifted wide nearing 400M, stayed on from off the pace but not a serious threat to leaders.
Never far off the pace, travelled well enough along the inside but found less than expected when driven in straight, effort flattened out final stages.
Dropped back to last, 6Ls off the pace in early and middle stages, ran on steadily final 300M over a trip slightly short.
Settled midfield, moved out to a striking position 500M, kept on same pace, faded final stages.
On the outside of the rear pair, caught one paced when the race got serious nearing 400M, pulled widest in straight, found little.
Guided to race in midfield along the fence, over-raced middle stages, failed to quicken turning into straight.
