Joint leader far side, gained half a length advantage around the bend, fought on under pressure to defy runner-up's challenge throughout the straight.
Soon came to dispute lead early, held 2nd just half a length back around the bend, failed to quicken under pressure.
Soon settled at the back after beginning from a wide gate, trailed the field to straight, saved ground turning in, made good progress.
Slightly slow out, soon picked up along rails to just worse than midfield, gradually taking closer order home bend, not much room after straightening, fought on steadily inside final 200 M.
Settled in last few, well behind and widest into straight, ran on steadily down the centre of the track to be nearest at finish.
Travelled mostly one back in 3rd on rails, folded up quickly inside final 200 M. (Bled.)
Settled towards the rear, commenced move approaching home straight, inconvenienced 300 M out, kept on steadily to the line.
Wide and close up early, gradually shifting back to about 2L off the pace, similar turning for home, soon weakened under pressure.
Began from a wide draw, settled wide in midfield far side, similar turning in, weakened under pressure.
Jumped one of the best then showed good gate speed to cross and lead along the paint after the 900m. Made every post a winner thereafter to record a sound win.
Was always kept up to the mark while travelling in 4th position on the fence with cover. Fought on gamely in the run to the post.
Parked midfield, 2 wide with cover. Cornered 5 deep and finished off with some purpose.
Did plenty of work from barrier rise and travelled in 3rd position, 1 off no cover. Kept up its workload in the home straight to hold a place in the frame.
Made its run from the rear of the field after travelling 2 deep with cover. Finished off soundly.
Settled in about 5th position, 1 off with cover. Maintained a reasonable gallop down the running.
Camped worse than midfield, on the paint with cover. Kept on at the same speed over the latter stages.
Raced a little keenly in the middle stages whilst positioned on the fence, midfield with cover. Failed to close off. (Scoped after the race and found to have blood in the trachea.)
Settled in last position on the rails with cover. Kept towards the inside in the home straight but just whacked away.
Parked midfield, 3 deep with cover. Only plodded to the finishing line.
Travelled with the backmalers 3 deep with cover. Came widest in the final stretch but was never a factor.
Posted 3 wide without cover on the circle whilst racing behind the speed. Never likely and tailed out. (Pulled up lame in the rightfore. To trial.)
Midfield, 7Ls off the leader on fence, switched to centre of the track , stormed home and scored.

Began sharply, positioned handy 3rd 4Ls off the solid pace, rolled forward and parked outside the leader near 650M when the pace steadied, looked like a winner over the concluding stages but hung in badly and beaten by a short head.
Handy 5th on rail, was blocked soon after straightening, made good headway when clear near 300M to claim a close 3rd.
Midfield, 6Ls off the pace, urged along near 500M, looked likely but hampered by the 2nd placegetter and could not be fully tested over the last 100M.
Midfield, 7Ls off the pace, niggled along near 800M, peeled wide and finished off only fairly.
Rear on fence, 9Ls off the leader, switched to centre of the track and ran on only fairly.
Lacked early speed, Mid-back, three wide with cover, swung wide and ran on fairly.
Slow to begin, failed to muster, 9Ls off the pace, three wide with cover, swung widest and made limited ground.
Handy but sat 3 wide without cover throughout, ran on one-paced after straightening and weakened after 250M.
Eased back to rear on fence, 8Ls off the pace, peeled to centre of the track, dashed little and passed tired runners.
Began sharply, 2Ls off the leader, restrained before rounding the Home Turn, under pressure near 500M and dropped off after 300M.
Always at the back, never looked dangerous. Tailed out.
Began last, rushed to take the lead alone with a solid pace, eased the pace down before rounding the Home Turn, weakened badly after straightening. Tailed out.
Began awkwardly, midfield three wide with cover, urged along near 800M, eased mid-straight. Tailed out.
Good break, settled fence midfield, smooth rail progress home turn, switched centre track 4.5L back 400m, strong run to lead 50m, comfortable at wire.
Awkward start, bustled to camp 2nd 1 off no cover, driven 500m, all out for narrow lead 200m, headed 50m, no extra.
Good break from wide, sat handy 1 off with cover, 4th at 500m, driven final turn, kept on dourly to edge 3rd at wire.
Fast break, driven to lead, shaken up 350m, headed 200m, dug in but faded in closing stages.
Lacked pace at break, raced last pair 1 off, to tail 1000m, progress on turn, hard-ridden 8L back 500m, stayed on strongly to wire.
Tardy start, recovered to fore of midfield on rail, 5th when switched out & shaken up 400m, one-paced in run home.
Broke well, trapped 3 wide midfield, hard-ridden wide into stretch, kept on for modest progress.
Sharp start, slotted behind leader on rail, ridden 500m, unable to quicken, plugged on same pace.
Decent break, taken to race near rear, advanced 3 wide back stretch, shaken up final turn, found little, never a factor.
Slow start, raced rail near rear, driven 500m, some progress until weakening final 200m.
Good break, restrained for cover 1 off in midfield, driven 500m, struggled in run home.
Fair break, niggled early to 1 off behind midfield, dropped last trio back stretch, ridden & outpaced 500m, found nothing for pressure.
Awkward break, bustled initially, trapped 3 wide fore of midfield, to 4th 800m, faded on turn, tailed off in stretch.
Driven early, failed to muster, raced at tail, minor advance 3 wide back stretch, dropped to rear 700m, soon tailed off.
Sharp start, steadily taken back to settle 1 off behind midfield, smooth stretch progress, quickened to lead 200m, drew clear to wire.
Good break, settled handy 1 off with cover, switched out driven 400m, ran on to 2nd 150m, no match for winner.
Smart break, soon outpaced & bustled, niggled rail near rear early stages, shaken up 350m, stayed on into 3rd with 50m remaining.
Bumped & lost ground start, 3 deep near rear, driven widest 6L back home turn, ran on soundly centre-track.
Sharp break, bustled early strides, sat close 2nd 3 deep no cover, driven 400m, battled to lead 250m, headed 200m, no extra.
Sluggish start, raced 2 deep near rear, switched wide & driven turning in, kept on same pace.
Steadied at break, covered up behind midfield 3 deep, driven 5 wide final turn, ran on one pace.
Fast start, raced handy on rail, 3rd turning for home, kept on under pressure until faded final 200m.
Speed at break to lead, raced 1 off in front, shaken up 400m, headed all out 250m, weakened in run to wire.
Awkward break, rolled on to 3rd 3 deep no cover, lost place 800m, driven 600m, plugged on to little effect.
Fair break, taken to tail from widest gate, to rail 900m, ridden 600m, unable to quicken turning in, modest late headway.
Fair break, unable to slot from wide gate, 4 deep fore of midfield, lost place on turn, bumped 450m, driven wide 430m, found nothing.
Tardy start, rousted early to travel midfield on rail, ridden 500m, weakened markedly from 350m, well beaten.
Dwelt in starting gate, lost many lengths, always tailed off.
Eased to sit in midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader along the fence, favoured by the fast pace and the rail-trip, made steady ground 300M to score.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, ran on well for 3rd.
Box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, led 400M, hung on strongly until 150M overhauled.
Pushed early but not muster, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, 7.5Ls off the leader, suited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield on the fence, 5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast tempo, made ground 300M.
Always under pressure to keep up behind midfield, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Pushed forward, took rail, led by 2Ls at fast sectionals, used up too much fuel, hung on until 250M weakened.
Pressed forward, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the fast tempo, trapped 3 wide throughout, emptied 300M.
Eased back, 9.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, suited by the fast pace, ran on ok.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 8.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace, no progress.
Eased back, raced 3-4 wide throughout, never a factor.
Midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader, favoured by the fast tempo, but trapped 3-4 wide throughout, dropped off 400M.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast pace, weakened quickly 400M.
Fair break, fifth one off, up to fourth approaching turn, bid three wide, led 200m out, soon in charge.
Broke well, ridden for early position but caught midfield three wide no cover, up to second one off, long battle for lead with eventual third in straight, outpaced by winner from 200m out.
Broke well, second one off, led approaching turn, battled on well rail until no extra late, substantial blood in trachea.
Taken back from wide draw to last one off, improved two off approaching turn, widest bid, finished well without quite enough pace to threaten.
Broke well, midfield one off, improved two off approaching straight, mid-track bid, kept on steadily without being able to threaten.
Broke well, not rushed early but caught midfield three wide no cover from 1000m, improved wide approaching straight, mid-track bid, kept on steadily.
Broke well, third rail, back to fifth and became unsettled 700m, bid three off, one pace late.
Fair break, not rushed early, mid-rear three wide with cover, shaken up approaching straight, mid-track bid, keeping on when checked 100m out, no chance after.
Steadied start, scond last one off, bid between horses straight, some headway until awkwardly placed near heels 100m out, no further progress.
Fractious, slowly away, ridden up along rail to midfield, shuffled back approaching straight, bid between horses, one pace.
Slow start, heavy bump, mid-rear rail, checked off heels 800m out, bid one off, no progress, lame right fore next day.
Broke fast, led and crossed, headed approaching turn, third into straight, weakened.
Fair break, not much early speed, fourth last one off, wide bid, one pace.
Moderate start, taken back to rear group rail, hampered 800m out and back to last, out for mid-track bid, no progress.
Vigorously driven out the gate, took a while to get there but travelled nicely once crossed to the fence, kept on strongly up the home straight and was never in any danger of being caught.
Chased leader, had his chance inside 350M, tried hard but couldn't get near to the winner, kept on well enough over final 200M and pulled clear of the remainder.
Never far off, travelled satisfactorily, kept on same pace final 300M and held on for a non-threatening 3rd.
Slightly slow away, held up 2nd last about 6Ls back, made some progress off the pace but never a threat to first two.
Always prominent, 3-wide turning for home, driven out near 450M, kept on same pace, faded final stages.
Held up in midfield, stayed on only fairly over final 400M, never a serious threat.
Checked on jumping, dropped back to a position near rear, not able to quicken inside 400M, no impression,
Not far off leaders, wasn't travelling well mid-race, found nothing when pressed inside 300M, eased final 100M. (Unacceptable performance.)
Pushed along to stay in touch with the field, under serious pressure over the turn, soon dropped away.
Slowly away, lacked speed, soon detached from the field, never in contention.
Fair break, bumped, not rushed, fourth last one off, wide bid, finished strongly to lead last 25m.
Fair break, steadied to midfield rail,inside bid, led 200m out, headed late.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, checked off heels 850m out, mid-track bid, ran on well, outpaced late.
Fair break, ridden to mid-rear rail, inside bid, not much room, ran on well when clear but unable to reach first three.
Broke well but caught wide early, taken back to mid-rear but still two off, mid-track bid, made quite good ground until run flattened out mid straight.
Fair break, fifth one off, bid between horses, short of room then no run 150m out, lost left hind plate, cuts to hind heel.
Broke well, up to second one off, challenged leade early straight, soon beaten off and one pace.
Broke well, up three wide to sixth, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Brokewell, led and crossed, tried to kick clear early straight, headed 200m out, no extra.
Taken back from wide draw to rear one off, mid-track bid, modest progress.
Broke well, up wide to third one off, mid-track bid, no extra from 300m out.
Broke well, settled fourth rail, bid one off, outpaced from 200m out.
Crowded start, last then second last rail, aimed for bid between horses, minimal progress.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, wide bid, found nil, trainer reported breathing problems.
Began well, took up prominent spot on leaders back, nice run too turn, dashed strongly and took charge at 300m, kept on well to score another easy win.
Showed usual speed to be the first trialing breakaway leader, did some work on solid speed, 4Ls down turning but soon overhauled leader with eventual winner, safely held late.
Tardy into stride, mustered but still raced in rear division 8-9Ls back, lost spot approaching bend, got going when brought wider final 300m doing best work final furlong.
Slowly away, in rearward division on rails nearly 10Ls back, saved ground along inside turning, made good progress to make frame.
Away well, not as forward as usual, raced on rails midfield in mid-section and proved difficult to settle, kept on at same speed in straight.
Trapped 3 wide behind midfield from an awkward draw,8-9Ls back to bend, came wider bend and made some even progress in straight.
Even getaway, raced 2 and 3 wide in midfield in 5th position, there to turn, weakened out final 300m.
Showed usual speed to take up running, ran along at a good clip, raced well clear on bend, 4Ls clear at 400m but compounded quickly final 200m.
Taken back from a wide alley, towards rear more that 12Ls off lead, well back to turn, passed a few tired ones late.
Even getaway, settled in two wide line around midfield, fair run to bend, offered little in run to line.
Failed to muster and planted on a limb 4 wide without cover just worse than midfield, worked hard throughout, beaten a long way out.
Assumed a midfield role 5Ls back, always travelling in 5th position to turn, let down nicely and found plenty when asked, went on to score another cozy win.
Took an ideal spot behind pace trio on rails, 4Ls or so back, improved rounding bend, led briefly at 200m but winners finish proved too strong.
Tardy getaway, in rear division on rails 8Ls or so back, saved ground turning and took runs between horses, rattled home late for 3rd.
Out in line, drifted back to race 7Ls away 2 wide with cover, slapped along approaching bend, came wider turning, made plenty of ground final 300m to make frame.
Standard break, ended up in midfield on rails 6Ls back, quite time in mid-section, saved ground and crept closer on bend, work to line well to be nearest at finish.
Settled just behind midfield 2 wide 6Ls or so back, suited by tempo, made a run at 300m and looked a brief place chance but peaked final furling.
Slow into stride, back with last few 10Ls away on rails, helped by even tempo, came wider turn, made some minor progress.
Posted 3 wide without cover in midfield, did work in middle stages, pushed wider turning, kept on to 200m before flattened.
Rolled forward to take up lead, set even tempo in mid-section, kicked on until 250m but soon overhauled and faded.
Restrained from widest alley, raced 3 wide at rear nearly 10Ls back, always well off top end, passed only tired runners late.
Nice getaway, raced first behind leader on even speed, went clear as part of pace trio, niggled along turning, didn't see out extra journey and faded.
Pressed on from a wide gate to race outside leader, did a bit on decent speed, not much response when pressured turning, eased by jockey late who reported uncomfortable action.
Took a nice spot behind page group, 4Ls back racing two wide, there to turn, came wider but offered little, dropped right off late.

Placing: UR
Comment: Lost rider soon after jumping.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Broke well, close up early, gradually settled in 6th on rails about 3L off the lead, in similar forward of midfield position turning in, quickened to hit front inside final 100 M.
Settled in midfield, soon came to challenge upon straightening, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Slow out, given reminders early, picked up along rails to midfield entering back straight, switched out for a run turning for home, finished off race well.
Began well to lead early, ceded advantage 800 M out to settle one back on rails, hit the front again briefly 200 M, soon swamped.
Missed the break, remained well behind to straight, saved ground turning in, finished off race well.
Soon dropped to last, trailed the field to straight, ran on past well-beaten horses.
Raced wide in prominent position, similar around the bend and into straight, soon weakened under pressure.
Began from a poor draw, travelled wide just worse than midfield, carried wider and lost position entering home straight, never recovered.
Settled in prominent 5th, faded steadily under pressure.
Ridden along, disputed lead from over 800 M out, gained one length advantage briefly 500 M out, soon headed over 200 M out.
Always in last few.
Began from a wide draw, worked to lead passing 800 M, headed 500 M out, folded up quickly in straight.
Showed good gate speed and plenty of courage after being challenged for the lead in the early & middle stages. Drew clear for a solid win.
Ridden along early, then camped midfield 1 off the rails with cover. Cornered 5 deep and closed off strongly.
Raced prominently stalking the leaders on the rails. Maintained a good gallop right to the line.
Made its run 2nd from the rear after travelling 1 off with cover. Closed off well to make the frame.
Managed to slot in after the600m and travel 1 out 1 back. Kept on one paced after having every chance.
Speared forward and dueled for the lead, travelling 1 off. Faded over the concluding stages.
Settled 4th from the rear 1 off with cover. Made steady progress in the final stretch.
Travelled midfield the fence, had cover. Whacked away at the same speed down the running.
Coursed 3-4 deep without cover, behind the speed. Never likely.
Settled along the paint with the backmakers. Failed to close off.
Not the best away then raced a little keenly 3 back, 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Settled in last position 3 wide with cover. Failed to pass another runner during in the trip
Dropped to rear from wide barrier, settled 9Ls off the pace on fence, switched to centre of the track, dashed home very well and scored. Benefitted by the fast sectionals.
Eased back, settled 7Ls off the fast pace, peeled out and stormed home, just beaten by a short head. Benefitted by the fast sectionals.
Began slowly, settled 5Ls off the pace on fence, dashed on strongly, just beaten by a head.
Driven to cross and led the field alone at good pace, kicked 2Ls away after straightening, flattened last 100M.
Settled behind the leader on fence, looked likely after straightening, stayed on well, no further kick last 100M. Hampered by the fast pace.
Midfield, settled 5Ls behind the pace, under pressure 600M out, kept on one-paced, flattened last furlong.
Handy, 3 back on fence, under pressure near 500M, peeled to centre of the track, finished one-paced. Hampered by the fast sectionals.
Dropped to the last from wide barrier, settled 11Ls off the leader in a strung out field, benefited by the fast sectionals. Swung widest, ran on only fairly.
Began slowly. Settled behind the pace, benefited by the fast sectionals, under pressure rounding the Home Bend, swung wide, unable to show any dash after straightening.
Rolled forward, 1L behind the leader, flattened after straightening. Hampered by the fast sectionals.
Handy Mid, settled 5Ls behind the leader, under pressure near 500M, dropped sharply after straightening, eased mid-straight, tailed out.
Beaten in the early stages, not able to stretch out at any stage, tailed out.
Missed break, settled rail behind midfield, smooth progress on turn, driven 350m, strong charge to snatch victory.
Speed to lead, headed 1000m, sat close 2nd on rail no cover, led 400m, kicked clear 300m, headed on wire.
Slow start, camped 1 off near tail, shaken up 350m, widest into stretch, rattled home to take 3rd late.
Fair break, raced rail midfield, advanced to 4th 800m, driven final turn, to 2nd 250m, one-paced in run home.
Prominent at break, settled back to midfield 1 off with cover, shifted wide into rival on home turn, ran on soundly without threatening.
Fair break, bustled early strides, raced 1 off behind midfield, niggled 600m, shaken up 300m, stayed on moderately.
Broke with others, outpaced shuffled back early strides, raced last trio 1 off, niggled 500m, driven in stretch, kept on one pace.
Sharp start, taken back to midfield 3 wide with cover, bustled to hold place 800m, hard-ridden 300m, plugged on same pace.
Broke well, trapped wide no cover midfield, every chance when driven 300m, found little.
Good break, bustled to lead 1000m, set pace 1 off no cover, headed 400m, emptied 300m, faded in run home.
Taken behind from wide gate, raced detached at tail, driven home turn, never a factor.
Fair break, driven initially to roll forward, raced 3rd 3 wide no cover, lost place final turn, faded & lost action in stretch.
Good break, rolled to early lead, nudged along 400m, driven clear 300m, always in command.
Smart start, raced handy 2nd 1 off no cover, driven in pursuit 300m, kept on gamely.
Tardy start, rousted initially to camp fore of midfield on rail, switched out & driven home turn, advanced to 3rd 200m, closing at wire.
Prominent early strides, dropped in midfield 1 off, driven 600m, outpaced 8th top of stretch, kept on for late headway.
Dropped in at start, settled 1 off at tail, advanced 3 wide 800m, 4L back widest final turn, ran on well centre track.
Taken behind at break, sat rail last pair, off heels to tail 900m, 5L down home turn, sound closer to wire.
Awkward break, raced rail behind midfield, driven 300m, stayed on soundly.
Brief lead early strides, covered 1 off behind front rank, driven final turn, struggled in run home.
Slow start, raced 1 off with cover near rear, hard-ridden 400m, plugged on tamely.
Bustled early stages, trapped 3 wide no cover behind midfield, wide advance 800m, ridden 600m, wide final turn, faded final 250m.
Fast break, restrained to sit 3rd on rail, hard-ridden final turn, all out 250m, faded thereafter.
Good break, taken back 3 wide midfield, unable to find cover, advanced back stretch, hard-ridden 500m, soon weakened.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at fast sectionals, hung on well to score only by a short head.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in front of midfield, 2Ls off the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M, just missed by a narrow margin.
Eased back, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 250M for 3rd.
Eased at start to take rail behind the field, 5.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace and the rail trip, made steady ground 200M.
Pressed forward, box seat, harmed by the fast pace, ran on strongly until 150M flattened.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, no progress in straight.
Eased to sit behind the leading group, 2.Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3 wide, ran on ok.
Pushed briefly, soon eased back, 3Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, no progress.
Hard ridden to keep up at rear, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made late ground 100M.
Pushed early but not muster, 3.5Ls off the leader along the fence, favoured by the fast tempo, no progress.
Prominent, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast pace, soon weakened 300M.
Behind midfield, stayed 3-4 wide throughout, 4Ls off the leader, bumped and unbalanced 600M, ran on ok despite all negative racing situations.
Slightly slow into stride, second last one-off, improved approaching turn, wove between horses for bid one off, finished fast to lead last 25m.
Broke well, settled second one off, chased leader mid-track throughout straight, just getting on top when nailed by winner late.
Broke well, up along rail to lead, two lengths clear early straight, still one length in front 50 metres out, headed and weakened very late.
Broke well, crowded and taken back to mid-rear rail, out for mid-track bid, finished well but not quite pace to threaten.
Broke well, fifth rail, steadied off heels, improved inside to fourth entering straight, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Broke well, settled third rail, bid two off, kept on one pace, lame right fore.
Fair break, taken back from wide draw to third last one off, urged but second last into straight, wide bid, moderate late progress.
Fair break, midfield rail, urged but lost ground approaching straight, inside bid, no progress.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, hampered turn, mid-track bid, one pace.
Fair break, ridden but unable to go early pace, last rail, urged throughout, inside bid, little progress.
Broke well, ridden from wide to seek lead but caught wide and back to midfield three wide, gradually lost ground from turn.
Fair break, rider briefly lost iron, aimed for lead but caught three wide no cover throughout, weakened straight.
Settled towards the rear, 8Ls off the pace rounding the home turn, pulled widest to challenge, stayed on powerfully to get up a few strides from the line.
Slow to begin, held up behind midfield, driven along passing 500M, closed off well final 300M and was just picked off before the line.
Settled well along the rails, 6Ls off the pace in middle stages, made his move passing 550M, kept responding to pressure but not pace of first 2 final 100M.
Settled near last, travelled strongly, held up nearing the top of the straight, ran on steadily final 300M, came close to win but not pace of first 3 late stages.
Made early running then chased leader from 1400M, took lead again 250M, had every chance but faded in closing stages.
Dropped back to last, 9Ls behind leader in middle stages, ran on well down the inside final 300M.
3Ls back in 4th, bustled along passing 550M, kept on steadily to the line but not finding extra to seriously challenge.
Travelled 2-wide in mid-division, moved forward passing 600M to bid 3-wide into the straight, had every chance, weakened inside 100M.
Settled midfield, urged along turning for home, not quickened.
Set a good pace in front, headed 250M, no extra final 200M.
Caught 3-wide no cover in midfield, came under serious pressure 500M, soon out of contention.
Pushed forward, tracked leader to 600M then dropped out rapidly, tailed out. (Unacceptable Performance.)

Raced wide with cover just worse than midfield, quickened well to taken charge close to home.
Began well, shared early pace, gained 1L advantage 1200 M out before joined again briefly approaching home bend, led until overhauled close to home.
Close up early, settled in midfield, ran home one-paced.
Jumped from the widest gate, raced wide in midfield, hampered approaching home bend, kept on before making some late impression close to home.
Amongst leaders early, remained on rails but settled one-back on heels of leader 1200 M out, ran home one-paced.
Broke well, settled just off the pace before moving forward to 2nd approaching home bend, ran home one-paced without threatening.
Began fairly, settled in midfield, hampered and dropped to rear approaching home bend, made moderate progress past well-beaten horses in straight.
Began fairly, gradually dropped to last, trailed the field into straight, ran on past well-beaten horses.
Slowly away, soon picked up to midfield, hampered and lost position approaching home bend, never better than midfield thereafter, faded in straight.
Hard ridden in better than midfield position on rails early, remained similar to straight saving ground turning in, faded gradually.
Prominent to 300 M, weakened under pressure.
Began from a wide gate, refused to settle and raced prominently and wide without cover, folded up quickly in straight.
Never seen with a chance.
Always well behind.
Enjoyed a nice run in the event, box seating. Took control of the race after the 150m and drew a margin on the line.
Showed good gate speed to cross and assume the lead along the fence after the 800m. Maintained a good gallop right to the finish.
Parked in 2nd position outside the leader no cover. Kept on soundly in the run to the wire.
Camped midfield, 2 wide with cover. Made some late ground to fill the frame.
Settled worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Straightened 4-5 deep and battled away in the run to the line.
Ridden along early but failed to go the early speed of the race and travelled behind midfield, 3 deep with cover. Whacked away over the last 200m.
Coursed 3 deep without cover whilst racing on the speed. Faded early in the final stretch.
Showed no early dash and settled around midfield, 3 wide with cover. Was never a factor in the home straight, weakening after the 350m.
Travelled with the rear division along the fence, had cover. Didn't produce any dash when asked for an effort and made no progress in the run home.

Didn't enjoy the best of runs early whilst travelling keenly, settled midfield the fence with cover. Kept to the inside in the home straight but failed to fire. Vet reported blood in trachea after race.

Raced greenly and was checked early, settling ahead of midfield. Was posted 3-4 deep on the circle without cover at times and was never a factor. Vet reported mucopus in trachea after race. (To trial.)
Settled at the rear of the field, 4 wide with cover. Never appeared comfortable in the home straight and failed to finish off.
Settled about midfield but was posted very deep, 5 wide without cover. Never likely.
Went back from a wide gate and settled 5 deep with cover towards the rear. Struggled in the straight. (Pulled up lame in the right fore.)
Midfield, 4Ls behind the leader, dashed home very well and scored.
Began fairly, settled 6Ls off the leader on fence, made good headway when clear near furlong to claim a close 2nd but too late. (Questioned for running and riding, see incident report.)
Mid-back on the fence, settled 5Ls behind the leader, made ground on center of track, looked very likely but run-ended 100M.
Midfield, 4 wide without cover throughout, made ground but not good enough to match with place-getters.
Handy but 3 wide without cover throughout, stayed on one-pace after straightening.
Eased back, settled 3 wide with cover, swung widest and made limited ground.
Eased back to cross from wide gate, settled 7Ls behind the pace, peeled wide, ran on only fairly.
Began fairly, driven hard until 1100M to cross and led on its own, kicked away after straightening, however weakened last furlong.
Mid-back, settled 3 wide with cover, swung wide, ran on only fairly.
Rolled forward, stalked behind the pace without cover, weakened gradually after straightening.
Driven hard forward, got cover 1100M, under pressure 500M, one-paced, flattened last furlong.
Eased back to cross from wide gate, never a factor.
Rolled forward, settled 3 back on the fence, soon faded after straightening.
Midfield, settled 3 wide with cover, under pressure 800 M, soon flattened after straightening.
Hard-ridden at break, settled near rear 1 off with cover, switched out shaken up 5L back home turn, surged centre track to lead 50m.
Tardy start, bustled to midfield on rail, switched out 400m, between horses to lead all out 50m, immediately headed.
Fair break, pace to lay handy early, settled 1 off with cover 5th, shaken up 430m, led 200m, flat out when headed 50m.
Good break, camped 4th on rail, driven to 3rd final turn, kept on soundly, edged out of frame late.
Fast start, rolled on from wide berth to dispute lead 1 off no cover 1000m, led 400m, all out headed 200m, no extra.
Sluggish break, raced 1 off with cover midfield, switched wide home turn, ran on soundly, not pace to threaten.
Sluggish start, taken across 1 off last trio, driven 6L back final turn, kept on one pace for fair progress, hung in closing stages.
Rousted at break, trapped 3 wide behind midfield, outpaced on turn, driven widest into stretch, plugged on same speed.
Taken behind to rail at break, settled last trio, bustled 600m, one paced for pressure in stretch run, eased 100m when beaten.
Broke well, raced 3 wide no cover fore of midfield, weakened 600m, struggled in stretch run.
Speed to lead early strides, settled 3rd 1 off with cover driven final turn, found nothing & faded, eased late when beaten.
Missed break, recovered to lead on rail 1200m, clear lead turning in, headed 400m, weakened thereafter.
Slow start, pushed along 1000m, dropped to tail and driven 800m, soon tailed off.
Baulked & lost ground start, recovered to 1 off behind midfield, shifted out final turn, strong run to lead 200m, in command at wire.
Good break, bumped & taken back 1 off midfield, switched out into stretch, stayed on to go 2nd final 50m.
Dropped back from wide gate, sat last trio 1 off, over-raced 600m, driven 400m, centre track run, grabbed 3rd late.
Taken back at break, last trio on rail, niggled 500m, stayed on soundly in stretch.
Speed to dispute early lead, sat handy 1 off no cover, driven to 3rd turning in, closed on lead 300m, faltered under pressure, one paced to line.
Fair break, sat 3 wide midfield, every chance driven 400m, one paced in run home.
Broke with others, bustled early, settled 1 off fore of midfield, lost ground on home turn, kept on for modest progress.
Smart start, raced 2nd, driven 400m, led 300m, headed 250m, faded in run home.
Speedy start, taken back to 4 wide near rear, niggled 500m, impeded & lost ground final turn, stayed on soundly.
Veered & bumped start, raced rail midfield, squeezed up 500m, outpaced into stretch, stayed on moderately.
Fast break, 3rd on rail until hung & lost place on turn, effort 350m, one paced, faded final stages.
Sharp break, trapped 4 wide midfield, advanced 600m, all out 400m, struggled in run home.
Rousted start to lead 1200m, drew clear 800m, headed 300m, weakened out thereafter.
Taken behind at break, sat 3 wide near rear, stumbled badly final turn, eased thereafter.
Settled behind the leaders, enjoyed by the slow sectionals, led 400M with plenty in the tank, being challenged 300M, but managed to hang on to score by a neck.
Eased at start to obtain cover at rear, 8.5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, made early move around the field 3-5 wide, dashed strongly 400M, just beaten by a neck in 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 6Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 300M for 3rd.
Midfield, 6Ls off the leaders along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 400M, little dash when clear.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 250M.
Very slow away, 7.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, blocked 4-2, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 3.5Ls behind the slow pace 3 wide, emptied 350M.
Settled in front of midfield, 4Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, badly held up and carried back 4-2, not tested.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash, flattened 300M.
Missed start badly, never a factor.
Pushed to share the lead 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, weakened quickly 400M.
Hard ridden to take rail, shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, however soon dropped off 350M.
Fair break, urged early to midfield one off, three wide bid entering straight, led 250m out, drew clear comfortably.
Broke well, mid-rear one off, mid-track bid, ran on well but no match for winner.
Broke well,fifth rail, bid between horses and slightly short of room mid-straight, ran on well when clear.
Broke well, up wide to fourth three off, then found slot one off, four wide bid entering straight, ran on but outpaced late.
Broke well, up to midfield but caught three wide, mid-track bid, kept on steadily but without kick.
Broke well, settled third rail, bid one off to join leaders 250m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not much early speed, back to mid-rear rail, bid between horses, kept on steadily without pace to threaten.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, widest bid, modest progress.
Fair break, back to mid-rear one off, last into straight, bid between horses, modest progress.
Broke well, second one off, led early straight until weakened from 300m out.
Crowded start and blundered, third last early the improved along rail to mid-rear, inside bid, no progress.
Taken back from wide gate to last rail, marginal improvement approaching straight for bid one off, found nil when asked.
Broke fast, led and dictated, headed early straight, weakened quickly.
Travelled strongly under restraint in early and middle stages, never far off the pace, responded well and took over nearing 200M, kept the persistent runner-up at bay under confident riding.
Positively ridden, guided over to the rails 1000M out and chased leader, dueled with the eventual winner from 350M, rallied final 200M but was readily held.
Broke well, settled into midpack passing 1000M, moved into clear nearing 300M, made steady late gains, nearest finish.
Settled near the rear 5Ls off the pace, found clear running nearing 300M, stayed on for 4th without troubling the leaders.
Not hurried in early stages, caught 3-wide in a position behind midfield, made steady progress to 150M but no further impression towards the finish.
Never far off in 4th, kept up with leaders to 200M then faded.
Dropped back and settled on the outside of the last pair, had over 6Ls to make up passing 400M, made limited progress.
Quickly moved clear, set modest pace and led uncontested throughout, run ended mid-straight, weakened rapidly final stages.
Slow to begin, out the back 7Ls off the pace, made limited progress inside 400M, never a threat to leaders.
Crossed to race behind leader just before the home turn, not able to quicken passing 400M, soon out of contention.
In midfield, unable to slot in, caught wide without cover making the turn, kept on same pace early straight, run ended nearing 200M.
Held up behind midfield, tucked along the inside, not quickened when pressed on inside 400M.
Restrained after the start, over-raced early stages, 3-wide turning for home, found nothing under pressure and quickly out of contention.
Held up towards the rear, saved ground on the inside throughout but soon weakened turning into straight. Never threatened.
Fair break, not rushed early, mid-rear one off, improved approaching straight, had to wait briefly for run, then powerful kick between horses, soon in charge.
Fair break, not rushed early, second last one off, bid between horses, ran on well but outpaced by winner.
Fair break, mid-rear three wide, wide bid, ran on well without pace to threaten winner.
Fair break, midfield two off, checked off heels turn, bumped entering straight, bid between horses, kept on steadily.
Moderate start, not rushed early, back to last one off, widest bid, ran on well but without pace to threaten.
Broke well, up wide seeking lead but caught three wide no cover throughout, bid three off, kept on one pace.
Broke well, midfield rail, bid two off, no extra from mid-straight.
Fair break, quickly up along rail to lead, headed 200m out, weakened.
Slowly away, last early, then fourth last rail, inside bid, one pace.
Broke well, up to lead then second one off, challenged leader early straight, weakened from 200m out.
Missed break, rear group early but improved quickly along rail to fourth, inside bid, no extra from mid-straight.
Broke well, up fast from wide draw to seek lead but caught three wide no cover throughout, weakened quickly straight.
Broke well, joined four way battle for lead but caught three wide, awkwardly placed on heels 900m out, weakened quickly straight, tailed off.
Pressed forward however unable to slot in and travelled 3 wide albeit with cover, made bid turning, kept to task to outlast rivals in what was a tough effort with weight.
Drifted back from a tricky gate, positioned 7Ls back on rails at rear, difficult to settle in mid-section, not clearest passage until 200m, finish off well to not miss by much.
Began well, pressed on and did some work to eventually take over by turn, not given much peace in front, kept to task well in straight losing advantage final 100m.
Out with them, unable to slot in and posted 3 and 4 wide without cover, improved to be midfield and wide rounding bend, kept on gamely given workload to just miss a place late.
Began ok, taken back from an outside alley, raced behind midfield 6Ls back, angled wider and improved on bend, stayed on well behind them to be closest at finish.
Jumped ok, enjoyed a nice run 1 out 1 back, 2Ls back to turn, not a great deal of room in straight but stayed on well for a reasonable debut.
Assumed a midfield role in running line 4Ls away, fair run throughout, improved wider turning to make a bid, peaked final 100M.
Drifted back from a tricky alley to race 2 and 3 wide at rear 6Ls or so back, came widest turning, made good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Showed enough speed to hold spot behind leader, 3Ls back on rails by bend, took inside runs but didn't see out extra journey late.
Tardy into stride, raced on rails in midfield 4ls back, quite time to turn, in traffic turning but didn't find extra gear and just stayed on behind them.
Pushed on in search of prominent spot, trapped 3 wide without cover and worked on bend, up there challenging at 400m, faded final 200m when hard run took toll.
Restrained from a wide alley, settled 5-6Ls back on rails, weaved between horses improving turning, not clearest passage but just offered one speed all the same.
Showed speed to take up running, handed up top spot on bend, two wide to challenge turning, folded at 200m.
Settled 3 wide at rear from an awkward draw, under pressure a long way out and never factored.
Landed a spot in running line behind midfield 9Ls or so back, suited by strong tempo, improved between horses in straight, knuckled down final 200m to dive through and snare a narrow victory on line.
Settled 3 wide behind midfield 10Ls back, helped by sold tempo, improved rounding bend, produced a strong burst to hit front but narrowly edged out late.
Crossed to take a prominent spot 1 out 1 back but some distance off runaway leader, fair run to bend, kept to task strongly in straight running on to be not far away in 3rd.
Went forward to be first horse trailing runaway leader, carted field up 4Ls back to bend, hit lead at 200m, peaked inside 100m but held on to make frame.
Restrained from a wide gate, raced 3 wide at rear 12Ls off leader, aided by solid tempo, came widest turning, made plenty of ground to be not far away late.
Unable to get closer than 4 wide, racing without cover in midfield, did plenty of work to bend, 6-7Ls back straightening, peaked at 200m when hard run took toll.
Assumed a midfield role, 6Ls or so back in two wide line, fair run in mid-section, loomed like a place prospect at 400m, effort tapered off final furlong.
Showed early speed to take spot on leaders back, did a bit of work with decent speed on, kept to inside turning, lacked turn of foot of last time and just stayed on at same speed final 200m.
Restrained to rear from a tricky alley, nearly 12Ls back in running line, aided by tempo but still well back to bend, switched out and made some ground without threatening.
Rolled forward as usual to take up running, set a decent tempo 3-4Ls clear, still held a break turning, soon came back to them near 250m and dropped off.
Posted 3 wide without cover in fifth position, left working on a decent speed, niggled along approaching bend, folded after a tough trip.
Ended up 3 wide in midfield, 7Ls back, had cover but did a bit with speed on, lacked usual finish and offered little in straight. (See racing incidents, lame next day.)
Raced in midfield on rails 7Ls or so away, had easy time to bend, gave little and dropped away quickly from 300m.
Ended up 8-9Ls back on rails, checked at 1400m, fair trip thereafter, offered no fight in straight.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began awkwardly, niggled at to pick up one-back position on rails, gained narrow advantage inside final 200 M, won well.
Settled just worse than midfield in 9th, in similar position and wide into straight, ran on well to be nearest at finish.
Slowly away, soon joined rear of field on rails, commenced run and taken off the rails turning in, produced good late impression inside final 250 M, did best work late.
Jumped moderately, soon recovered to prominent position in 2L 4th, remained same into straight, kept on steadily without quickening.
Soon took up running and attempted to make all, led until narrowly headed passing 200 M, swamped for a placing close to home.
Broke well from a wide gate, soon taken back to race in midfield, kept on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly settling in midfield, kept on well.
Settled in last few, produced good late impression to be nearest at finish.
Began moderately settling in last few, wide into straight, ran home one-paced.
Began moderately, niggled at early settling in forward of midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, made moderate impression early in straight, faded closing stages.
Jumped moderately, settled just outside leader, faded under pressure inside final 300 M.
Began awkwardly losing ground, quickly ridden to better than midfield, kept on before fading under pressure inside final 200 M.
Began fairly from the widest gate, soon taken back to race behind midfield, made no impression in straight.
Soon taken backward after beginning from a wide gate, remained well behind throughout.
Parked 3 deep midfield had cover. Fought gamely all the way down the running to repel late challenge.

Settled in last position, 1 of with cover. Commenced a sweeping move around the field after the 600m and looked the likely winner close to home, but commenced to hang in under pressure & just went under.

Hampered at the start then was ridden along settling 3 back 1 off with cover. Shifted out 3 deep and was left racing wide and without cover after the 1300m, settling off the speed. Held on soundly despite the wide run.
Raced in about 5th position 1 off the fence with cover. Had no luck in the home straight and was full of running.
Hampered at the start, settling midfield the fence. Plugged away in the final stretch.
Camped in second position outside the leader. Had no excuses.
Enjoyed every possible hope leading in a slowly run race. Couldn't find another gear in the home straight.
Raced in 2nd last position, 1 off with cover. Was under pressure after the 600m, never responded & was weak in the run home.
Made its run third from the rear, 2 deep with cover. Battled away in the straight, gave ground when crowded after the 100m.
Didn't enjoy the best of the runs along the paint tracking the leader. Was inclined hang out after the 700m. never found any extra in the run home.
Began well, soon eased to Midfield, 4Ls off the pace, trapped 3 wide, improved gradually rounding Home Bend and dashed strongly to claim the trophy.
Began well, eased to Midfield, trapped 3 wide improved gradually rounding Home Bend when the pace slacked, kicked away after straightening, just beaten by a short head.
Jumped fast, prominent, however stayed on one pace after straightening and claimed a distant third.
Shaken up after fair start, made some uses to take rail and lead, steadied the pace rounding Home Bend, over headed near 300M, finished off only fairly.
Lacked early speed, 6Ls off pace, trapped 3 wide, swung widest and made limited ground. (Questioned for running and riding, see incident report.)
Jumped fairly, made some uses to cross and stalked behind the leader, soon weakened after straightening.
Slow to muster, 6Ls at rear. Never competitive.
Broke well, settled midfield 1 off with cover, raced keen 1100m, switched out final turn, swept to lead 175m, won comfortably.
Outpaced initially, 3 wide with cover behind midfield, ridden 500m, wide final turn 8L back, rattled home, grabbed 2nd final stride.
Smart start, slotted back behind midfield 1 off with cover, 7L back 400m, good progress to make frame.
Taken behind from wide gate, sat last pair 1 off with cover, driven 9L back 450m, closed out strongly, just missed frame.
Fast break, slipstreamed leader on rail, 2nd & shaken up 400m, closed on lead 200m, run tapered closing stages, lost 2nd final strides.
Tardy start, covered up near rear, ridden for effort 500m, 9L down turning in, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Taken back from wide gate, camped rail at tail, driven 500m, switched widest 10L back home turn, headway centre track, closest at wire.
Smart break, raced handy wide no cover, hard-driven 3rd 400m, outpaced, battled on same speed.
Slow start, bustled on fence, camped behind mid rank, switched out & driven home turn, plugged on one pace.
Fast break to lead on rail, kicked 2L clear home turn, driven 300m, all out headed 175m, no extra.
Dwelt slightly, bustled early, travelled handy with cover, every chance when hard-ridden final turn, found little, weakened in stretch.
Awkward start, trapped 3 wide with cover midfield, niggled 600m, wide on turn, weakened early in stretch.
Tardy start, hampered early stages, switched to rail, rolled to midfield, bustled 700m, driven 500m, soon beaten, faded out.
Broke well widest gate, trapped 3 deep, rolled on to stalk leader 1 off no cover, niggled 600m, driven into stretch, found nothing, faded.
Sharp break, speed to lead 850m, travelled strongly in front, driven 200m, quickened clear, never in danger.
Good start, tight for room 900m, stalked in mid rank, switched off rail 400m, quickened in pursuit 200m, to 2nd 100m.
Fair break, raced midfield, shaken up for progress 400m, to 2nd 200m, run tapered in final 150m.
Settled back of midfield, shaken up 600m, switched out 400m, closed out soundly under firm drive.
Tight for room at break, settled handy sixth, one-paced under pressure 400m, maintained run to wire.
Good break, travelled strongly behind front rank, to 2nd & driven 400m, emptied 200m, run tapered.
Driven to early lead, headed 850m, raced handy, shaken up under pressure 400m, outpaced, faded in run to wire.
Raced stands' side in midfield, driven for effort 400m, lacked pace, kept on same speed.
Speed to race in front rank on rail, hard ridden 400m, wilted in closing stages.
Raced far-side back of midfield, niggled throughout, driven 600m, plugged on moderately.
Fast start, tracked leader, bustled 500m, ridden under pressure 400m, found nothing, soon weakened.
Niggled along in last pair, ridden 400m, unable to raise pace, never a factor.
Raced far side of group towards rear, pushed out 500m, found nothing for urging, soon beaten.
Squeezed out soon after start, bustled at tail, adrift when given reminders 400m, no response, eased final 200m.
Eased to rear, 5.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, dashed impressively 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, scored with some in hand.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 3Ls off the slow pace, trapped 4 wide, made early move 600M, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Settled just behind the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Slow away, hard ridden to obtain a midfield spot, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, blocked most straight, dashed strongly when clear.
Eased back, 4Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, blocked most straight, dashed strongly when clear.
Pushed forward to share the lead 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on until 200M flattened.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased to rear, 5.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, flattened 250M.
Settled box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, no room 400M, weakened 200M.
Slow away, hard ridden to share the lead on the fence, clocked advantageous slow sectionals, soon weakened 250M.
Very slow away, hard ridden to midfield, 3Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, faded 400M.

Placing: UR
Comment: Eased to rear, clipped heels, blundered and dislodged rider 800M.
Began well, closed to 5th quickly, unbalanced 400m, lengthened stride at 200m, raced past leader at 100m to win easily.
Jumped best, held in 2nd along rails to 400m, took lead and kicked away 300m, no extra when swamped by winner 100m.
Shifted in start, raced in 8th to course proper, shifted to centre of track at 400m and ran on strongly, getting 3rd near line.
Fair start, driven up to take 3rd behind leader, was 2nd at 400m, kept on steadily only to be denied 3rd just before line.
Slow to jump, steadied soon after and dropped to last. Finished strongly along rails final 400m to just miss the frame.
Awkward start and dropped back to 9th. Shifted out 300m for room and made good ground before check at 50m.
Jumped with field but no early speed. Was 6th at halfway one off rails, found no extra and one-paced to the line.
Began well, raced in 4th behind early leader, started to weaken at halfway mark, found nothing close home.
Bumped and unbalanced at start, raced along rails towards the rear. Found nothing when asked final 400m.
Jumped nicely, pushed to lead from 800m to 400m, found nothing under pressure and finished tailed off.
Broke well, restrained to a position ahead of midfield, going strongly inside 400M, took lead near 150M, kept on well to the line.
Travelled well in the wake of the leaders, came through to lead inside 300M, had every chance only to find the winner too strong final stages.
Held up midfield, into clear 350M, pushed long and stayed on steadily, just failed to catch the 2nd.
Held up towards the rear, 3-wide turning for home, pulled out 400M to chase leaders, ran on and was nearest at the finish.
Settled 3-wide ahead of midfield, had an uninterrupted run passing 400M, turned one pace mid-straight and no threat to leaders thereafter.
Settled midfield, saved ground along the inside but was held up to 300M, stayed on steadily.
Reserved near the rear, had to pull wide to challenge passing 400M, made some late progress but never a serious threat.
Slow to begin, towards the rear, raced keenly middle stages, made limited progress passing 300M, held up for clear running near line.
Unable to cross, caught 4-wide without cover for much of the way, kept on same pace in straight. (Jockey questioned.)
Slow to begin, raced near the rear, taken to 4-wide nearing 600M, swung widest for home, kept on same pace.
One of the early leaders, sat in 4th making the turn, found little under pressure inside 400M, out of contention mid straight.
Dropped back to last from wide barrier, lacked speed and never going the pace to challenge.
Urged to take the lead, set steady pace, headed near 300M, weakened.
Caught wide down the back straight, moved forward to dispute lead, dropped away passing 300M.
Taken in from wide draw to be one-off 7th before turn, 4-wide into straight, lengthened nicely to win going away.
Jumped well but restrained in 2nd place to straight, fought on gamely but unable to hold off winner. Lame right fore.
Taken forward soon after start. Clear leader down the side and into straight, battled gamely but lost 2nd close home.
Taken forward from wide draw to be one-off in 4th before the turn, looked chance at 400m but only one-paced to line.
Taken back from wide draw and was last into the turn. Wide into straight, held for a run 250m, finished strongly when clear.
Held wide soon after start and 2nd-last into turn. Came wide into straight and made up good ground closing stages.
Jumped with field and held 6th along the fence to the straight, stayed along rails but found little under pressure.
Jumped nicely from gate seven and held 4th behind good early pace to the straight. Found little when asked.
Crowded out shorter after start, dropped to 8th back stretch and around turn, did not respond to hard riding.
Raced wide without cover to the turn, came wide into straight and looked a chance but found nothing. Lost hind plate.
Last out of gate, ridden up to 11th and on bridle at 900m but never comfortable. Lay in under pressure in straight.
Jumped with field but no early speed and settled 12th. Checked at 800m, came widest into straight. Never a threat.
Began well but was difficult to settle at 900m when 8th. Shaken up before turn but found nothing. Tired close home.
Began best but couldn't go pace of early leaders and settled 3rd. Held that position to straight when tired quickly.

Crossed from wide out to track pace pair in 1 out 1 back position, had ideal trip in race, loomed turning and had leader in sights at 300m, took over and fought off effort from 2nd to score a solid win.
Well enough away, took a spot trailing leader, 2Ls back throughout, came 2 wide and took over soon after turning, challenged strongly from 300m, didn't lie down when headed and stuck on bravely.
Out in line, positioned in midfield 5Ls back in running line, tracked eventual winner to turn, made a bid at 300m but couldn't match first two final 150m.
Assumed a spot tracking leader, on rails 3Ls away, had a quiet run to bend, stuck on soundly to make frame without looking a threat.
Showed speed from wide out to take up running, rolled along 2Ls clear, kept an even speed to turn, soon headed but fought on ok before dropping a few spots final 100m.
Positioned 3 wide around midfield, 6Ls or so back with cover, ok trail into race, made steady progress finishing off ok to be nearest on line.
Standard break, settled behind midfield on rails7-8Ls back, well back on turn, weaved passage clear and did best work late although never likely.
Restrained from a wide gate, near enough to 12Ls back at rear, gradually made ground wider from 500m, closed well in straight making good ground from impossible spot to be closest at finish.
Posted 3 wide without cover in midfield 4Ls or so back, did work on bend, struggling turning, weakened out final furlong.
Allowed to adopt a midfield position, 5Ls or so back on rails, had an easy trip to bend, failed to run on (jockey reported very fractious pre race).
No early speed, ended up in unfamiliar position near to rear, nearly 10Ls away in running line, niggled turning and just battled on in straight.
Taken back to race 3 wide at rear, best part of 10Ls away, always well back and had plenty to do turning, made no real progress in straight.
Ordinary break, soon at rear nearly 12Ls back on rails, still last and struggling turning, showed nothing is straight and was disappointing.
Ended up in running line just off midfield 6Ls or so back, fair run to bend, offered nothing in straight.

Used low draw to lead early, ceded advantage to MEGABUCKS 800 M out but retained rails run, came 2-wide to challenge entering straight and gained upper hand 200 M out, just held on.
Began fairly settling in rear of midfield on rails, forced to steady rounding home bend, finished off race well inside final 200 M, missed narrowly.
Began well, with leaders early, shuffled backward to forward of midfield after minor interference on 1200 M bend, renewed effort on straightening, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly, soon picked up to 4th on rails within 3Ls of pace, remained similar throughout, kept on same pace without quickening.
Began from the widest gate, went forward to take up running and rails run passing 800 M, led until dropped out under pressure inside final 200 M.
Began from a wide gate, settled behind midfield, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began from a wide gate, settled at the back, saved ground turning in, finished off race nicely inside final 200 M.
Disputed lead early, soon taken back to settle one off the rails in 2L 3rd, lost position turning in, kept on same pace without quickening.
Began well, settled 3-wide in forward of midfield most of way to straight, found nothing under pressure.
Began fairly, soon dropped to last few, remained well behind when wide into straight, kept on at the same pace.
Slow into stride, remained in last few despite ridden along early, saved ground turning in, made no impression in straight.
Raced wide in rear of midfield, soon faded in straight.
Speared forward from the outside alley, crossed and led along the paint after the 800m. Made every post a winner thereafter recording a sound win.
Parked in 2nd position outside the leader, no cover. Ranged up at the furlong and fought gamely but was out gunned over the final stages.
Raced on the speed but was trapped 3 wide without cover for most of the trip. Loomed up near the 200m but faded over the final stages.
Couldn't go the early speed of the race, camped midfield. Was inclined to race a little keenly near the 600m, closed of moderately to make the frame.
Jumped well then was steadied and parked behind midfield 2 deep with cover. Got a nice cart into the race and finished off fairly.
Crowded at the start & raced in last position along the fence. Kept to the inside turning for home but only plodded to the wire.
Slow to begin & travelled at the rear of the field, 2-3 deep with cover. Was one paced in the home straight.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race tracking the early speed on the rails. Failed to find any extra in the run home.
Ridden along early but only managed to take up a position ahead of midfield. Settled 4 wide early no cover, got a trailing position after the 500m, but was a spent force early in the straight.

Not the best away then had no luck and was trapped at least 4 deep on the circle, travelling towards the rear. Was running on empty over the final 100m. Post-race examination showed a substantial amount of mucopus in the trachea.
Never likely after being posted back in the field 4-5 wide without cover for most of the trip.
Rolled forward to lead, travelled strongly and scored.
Positively ridden to take box seat, had every possible chance after straightening however beaten by a neck.
Midfield, 5Ls off pace, 2 wide with cover, ran on to claim third, no threat to winner.
Jumped smart, prominent, peeled wide and just ran on okay.
Dropped back from wide gate, 9Ls behind the leader on fence, detached and held up round the Home Bend until 250M, closed off well when clear.
Began sharply, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide with cover, peeled wide and made limited ground, one-paced.
Lacked early speed, third last on the fence, 8Ls off the leader, detached round the Home Bend, peeled wide and made limited ground.
At rear, 9Ls off pace, never ran on.
Travelled 3 wide throughout, 7Ls off pace, detached round the Home Bend, never a factor.
Slow to muster despite being hard ridden early, 8Ls off pace, trapped wide throughout, detached round the Home Bend, never ran on.
Hard ridden to cross, parked outside the leader, soon weakened after straightening, tailed out.
Jumped slow, 3 back on the fence, 5Ls off the leader, soon flattened after straightening, tailed out.
Pace to lead at break, moved to rail at first turn, upped tempo 500m, kicked clear in stretch, all out close home, never headed, held on.
Lacked early speed, raced fence near rear, niggled backstretch, driven 6L back 450m, switched out, took time to wind up, powerful closer, just failed.
Speedy start, slipstreamed leader in 3rd, ridden 500m, to 2nd 400m, chased gamely, no inroads, lost 2nd late.
Bustled early strides, sat 3L 5th on fence, shaken up 400m, pulled out to challenge final turn, to 3rd 300m, one-paced in run to wire.
Ridden from gate, railed smoothly in 7th, shaken up 500m, progress to 4th 300m, kept on gamely without threatening.
Driven at break, settled 4th 1 off with cover, ridden 500m, 4-wide into stretch, kept on same speed.
Slow start, raced 1 off with cover last pair, off heels 900m, hard-ridden into stretch, boxed on at even pace.
Taken to tail from wide gate, settled last pair on rail, driven home turn, kept on at moderate speed.
Fair break, raced midfield 1 off with cover, niggled backstretch, hard-ridden wide home turn, failed to quicken, plugged on tamely.
Decent break, settled 1 off with cover behind mid rank, niggled backstretch, hard-ridden 400m, emptied final turn & faded.
Broke with others, off heels 1500m, over-raced 1 off with cover near rear, driven 3-wide 450m, struggled in run home.
Rousted from wide gate, raced close 2nd 1 off no cover, niggled 600m, lost place 400m, all out rounding home turn, faded quickly.
Led from gate, set easy fractions, kicked on home turn, opened 2L lead, all out last 50m, just held on.
Speed at break, camped close 3rd on rail, switched 1 off to challenge 300m, flat-footed initially, picked up for rattling late finish, just failed.
Dwelt at break, raced last trio on rail, 5L last at 400m, switched out final turn, quickened to 3rd at 150m, not reach front pair.
Sharp start, slotted handy 4th 1 off with cover, shaken up 3-wide into stretch, kept on at one pace.
Bustled at break to slot midfield 1 off with cover, niggled backstretch, driven 350m, closed out soundly.
Tardy start & driven, settled last trio 1 off with cover, niggled at 800m, hard-ridden 350m, switched inside 150m, stayed on evenly.
Ridden early to race mid rank on rail, driven on home turn, boxed on gamely at same speed.
Fast start, restrained to close 2nd 1 off no cover, pressed leader final turn, weakened out final 250m.
Quick break, trapped 3 deep no cover midfield, driven wide into stretch, plugged on moderately.
Slow start, raced 3 deep with cover last trio, shaken up 300m, unable to quicken, never a factor.
Hard ridden to cross in front, settled just behind the leaders, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace, ran a creditable 2nd.
Pushed to take rail and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on well until 150M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Pushed to cross in front, just off the leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, however hung out 350M, flattened 150M.
Midfield along the fence, 5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 100M.
Hard ridden early, 4Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground.
Behind midfield, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased at start to cross at rear, 8Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 9Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout and lost too much ground, harmed by the slow pace, emptied 300M.
Never a factor.
Jumped with field, settled 3 back, 1 off, came wide into straight, finished strongly to win close to the line.
Jumped nicely, took position behind leader close to rail, checked 550m and taken out, shifted in close home, kept on.
Bumped and unbalanced start, no early pace but picked up round the turn, swung wide and finished strongly.
Pushed forward from good draw to hold rail and take lead before turn, still ahead at 200m but swamped close to line.
Slow to start, no early pace and held at rear one off fence. Remained there to straight. Ran on nicely. Lost right front plate.
Began nicely and raced close to pace. 3rd at turn but denied run at 400m and checked 150m. Not fully tested.
Jumped best and crossed over from wide draw to be 2nd at turn, 1 off fence. Kept on in straight but no extra.
Last from the gates and kept wide after that. Widest into straight but unable to close. Jockey said not ready at start.
Began with field, eased and taken across runners to fence. Last round turn and into straight. Found little when asked.
Jumped well but unable to get in and raced wide without cover. Looked a chance at 400m but tired final 200m.
Slow to jump but quickly taken to just behind midfield at the turn. Found nothing in straight and plodded to line.
Set early pace, tracked leader entering back straight, ridden to challenge 300M out, led 150M and kept on strongly for a decisive success.
Taken back to the rear about 6Ls from leader, came home strongly once a gap opened up nearing 200M, got up for 2nd near the finish.
Driven early to find the lead, set even pace, fought on gamely inside 300M trying to fend off the eventual winner, headed 150M out, faded late and lost 2nd just before the line.
Shuffled back to a rearward position passing 900M, ran on steadily inside 300M without troubling the winner, narrowly missed out on 3rd place.
Slow to begin, assumed a rearward position along the fence, met troubling in running turning for home and didn't have much room until 100M, did well to finish 5th.
Settled in midfield on rail, kept on one paced final 300M and was never a serious threat to leaders.
Held up near the rear 5Ls off the pace, swung 3-wide for home and pulled widest to challenge, made limited progress.
Not far off the pace but was trapped wide for much of the race, never going the pace to challenge over final 300M, weakened final stages.
Slowly away, raced a shade keen and was trapped a little wider than ideal, lacked the pace to put in an effective challenge in the straight, no threat inside 200M.
Held up 2-wide in mid-division, pushed along 450M, checked near 200M and had difficulty obtaining clear run thereafter.
Pushed along to track leader but had little left turning for home, weakened rapidly over final 200M.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
