Began from a poor draw, ridden along to take up running and obtain rails run 1000 M out, held on under pressure to the line.
Began fairly, ridden along to hold one back position on rails far side, remained similar turning in, fought on steadily without quickening.
Began fairly, gradually settled behind midfield, ran on steadily under pressure to be nearest at finish.

Slow to muster, gradually picked up under pressure to be just worse than midfield on rails within 3Ls of speed, baulked for a run early in straight, fought on steadily inside final 300 M despite a tight passage.
Settled just better than midfield mainly in 5th, ran home one paced under pressure.
Began from the widest gate, settled in rear of field, fought on steadily down the centre of the track.
Soon dropped to last few, saved ground on rails turning in, not much room in straight and checked over 100 M out, kept on to the line.
Ridden early, settled just outside leader, weakened out of contention inside final 300 M.
Settled in rear of midfield, wide into straight, found nothing. (Bled.)
Never far off until weakening into straight.
Tailed-off throughout.
Led along the paint at a slow clip. Challenged near the 200m, but fought back to claim the prize.
Raced in second position, 2 wide, no cover. Loomed up near the furlong and battled away gamely right to the Winning Post.
Travelled 3 back on the fence with cover. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and finished off soundly.
A little tardy to begin managed to box seat thereafter. Stayed on reasonably to hold a place in the frame.
Parked 1 out 1 back. Had every hope but weakened over the concluding stages.
Camped in last position, 1 off with cover. Came widest in the straight but only plodded to the line.
Taken back in the early stages and settled at the rear of the field along the paint with cover. Closed off one paced in the home straight.
Posted 3 wide without cover for the most of the trip settling close to midfield. Never likely.
Began awkwardly travelling behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Made some use to take boxed seat, clear run 300M, driven passed the runner-up comfortably and scored.
Driven forward and lead, kicked 2Ls clear near 200M however weakened 100M, just hung on for 2nd.
Pushed forward, parked outside the leader near 800M, kicked away by the front runner rounding the Home Bend, stayed on gamely, just hung on for 3rd.
Lacked early speed, at rear on fence, 7Ls off the pace, stayed inside and dashed on well, just missed third.
Eased back to 3 back on fence, 6Ls off the pace, stayed inside and made limited ground.
Rolled forward, settled 2Ls off the pace with cover, had every possible chance after straightening, faded near 200M.
Mid-back, 6Ls behind the leader, trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, one-paced.
At rear, 7Ls off the leader, niggled along throughout, swung widest, no progress.
Handy 5th, 5Ls off the pace, 1 off the fence, driven 450M, never ran on.
Began awkwardly, checked early, failed to muster, 5Ls off the pace, soon weakened after straightening.
Prominent at break, stalked 4th on rail, 3rd turning for home, shaken up & surged to lead 350m, maintained advantage to wire.
Bustled early behind midfield, rail progress back stretch, 6th & driven 430m, not clear run 380m, quickened to 2nd above 200m, always held.
Missed break, bustled early, raced last pair on rail, 10L last 800m, progress on turn, 6L down 400m, determined stretch run to claim 3rd.
Tardy break, sat 1 off behind midfield, 6L 10th at 400m, ran on for late progress, just missed frame.
Sharp break, soon bustled 1 off in midfield, niggled near rear 3-wide 600m, 6L back & widest home turn, closed out readily.
Snagged back & rousted at tail early strides, advanced to camp rail near rear, switched out home turn, progress checked at 300m, boxed on to wire.
Fast start, slotted handy 1off with cover, shuffled back 800m, switched out 430m, stayed on one pace.
Tardy break, driven wide to lead 1 off no cover 1200m, restrained to 3rd with cover 900m, effort 4-wide 430m, run tapered in stretch.
Fast break to dispute lead, settled 5th 1 off with cover, shaken up 4-wide home turn, hard-ridden 400m, one-paced thereafter.
Speedy break, taken back to midfield 3-wide no cover, niggled 450m, wide into stretch, tapped for toe, weakened in run.
Outpaced at start, trapped wide with cover near rear, at tail turning for home, found little for pressure, passed beaten horses late.
Rousted at break to lead 1400m, to 2nd 1200m, narrow lead 600m, driven into stretch, all-out headed 350m, faded.
Ridden forward from wide gate, rolled to lead 900m 1 off no cover, headed 600m, rousted final turn, soon weakened out.
Outpaced & bustled at break, niggled along last pair, driven final turn, struggled in run home, never a factor.
Sharp break, duelled to lead early, set pace on rail, shaken up when challenged 400m, driven out to hold rival in run to wire.
Good start, raced 1 off no cover in 2nd, challenged lead 400m, closed to within a neck, dug deep but always held, no extra last 50m.
Good break, taken back, raced last trio 1 off with cover, driven wide 5L back final turn, ran on to grab 3rd at line.
Moderate start, raced 3 deep midfield, rolled to 4th 600m, niggled 500m, shaken up to go 3rd final turn, kept up sound gallop, lost 3rd final stride.
Outpaced at start, bustled to 1 off behind midfield, 4-wide home turn, hard-driven for progress without threatening.
Sharp start, dropped in 3L back 1 off with cover, driven into stretch, kept on evenly.
Missed break, rousted initially, raced rail last trio, steadied off heels 900m, shaken up 450m, stayed on, closest at finish.
Snagged back at break, raced at tail, ridden widest final turn, stayed on for modest gains, never a threat.
Raced rail midfield, over-raced back stretch, switched 1 off 600m, ridden 400m, short of room 350m, one-paced to wire.
Fast break, settled fence in midfield, driven 400m, tight for room 300m, one-paced progress until faded last 100m.
Fast start, driven to dispute early lead, raced 1 back on fence, ridden under pressure 400m, faded out in straight.
Hard ridden forward to overcome the wide draw, took rail 700M and led at fast sectionals, drifted away in straight to win impressively.
Pushed early but not able to cross in front, settled 4.5Ls off the fast pace 3 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Pushed forward, box seat, harmed by the fast pace, hung on well for 3rd.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield along the fence, 4.5Ls off the fast pace, held up 4-2, made some ground when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made steady ground 200M.
Hard ridden throughout but not muster, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, suited by the fast tempo, ran on ok.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 8.5Ls off the leader on the fence, favoured by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden to battle for the lead, used up too much fuel to clock the fast sectionals, soon emptied 350M.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, more than 10Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Eased at start, more than 10Ls off the leader, suited by the fast pace but raced 3-5 wide, no progress.
Eased back, favoured by the fast tempo, never a factor.
Pushed forward, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, faded 500M.
Pushed to lead after good start and had enough speed to cross to rail before turn. Kept on strongly to win easily.
Pushed forward but not enough speed and raced wide throughout. Kept on gamely in the straight for second.
Unbalanced start but made up ground quickly to hold third along the rails. Looked chance at 400m but one-paced.
Dropped in for cover soon after start but taken wide at 800 and left without cover. Ran on steadily in straight.
Taken back from wide draw. Poked forward at the turn along the rails but only one-paced over final 200m.
Slightly worse than midfield, taken out before turn, found little room early in straight, slight progress closing stages.
Jumped with field, held rail position to home straight, had no room before the 200m but found little when clear.
Stared well from good draw but not enough speed and raced 2-wide in fifth for most of the trip. Tired final 200m.
Taken back from wide draw and was last till the turn. Made forward move at the 400m but found little and plodded to line.
Awkward start, ridden up but unable to get in and held wide towards the rear throughout. Bled from both nostrils.
Always prominent, showed good acceleration turning in, kicked clear inside 200M, well in command.
Dropped back to a rearward position 5Ls off the pace, urged along 500M out, swung wide into straight, ran on well to be nearest at the finish.
Never far off in 4th, driven to chase leaders 350M, lacked winner's acceleration but kept on evenly to the line.
Pushed early, shared lead on the inside, could not match winner's acceleration inside 300M, kept on steadily to the line and only lost 3rd near the finish.
Not hurried, dropped back to the rear 6Ls off the pace, made steady headway over final 300M.
Taken back to 2nd last, waited with until 400M, made limited progress.
Dwelt at the start, recovered to race in mid-division, picked up only fairly turning in, one paced final 200M.
In midfield and travelled 3-wide without cover for much of the way, kept on same pace turning into straight, never threatened.
Held up behind midfield, drifted to outside of track turning into straight, ran on same pace.
3Ls off leaders, came under pressure halfway round the home turn, soon outpaced.
Behind mid-division early, hung out badly turning for home, found little for pressure. (Jockey questioned.)
Went forward from wide barrier, disputed lead on the outside, weakened and dropped away passing 400M.
Jumped with field but kept 3-wide near the rear to turn. Swung wide into straight and finished strongly to get up on the line.
A little slow to move but soon 3-wide in midfield. Kept position to straight and finished strongly to be denied in final stride.
Driven up quickly after the start to hold fifth, one-off the fence. Made steady ground to finish third in blanket finish.
Crowded start and tailed field to home straight. Swung widest at the 400m and finished strongly, just missing a place.
No early speed and taken back. Was second last round the turn, swung wide into straight and made good ground.
Taken quickly to the front from wide draw and set solid pace. Still the leader at 100m but swamped close home.
Began well and moved to hold midfield position along rail to 400m. Kept on one-paced final stages. Never a threat.
Tardy start, moved forward but unable get better position than 3-wide to straight. Found little under pressure final 200m.
Checked soon after start, taken back to hold rail near the rear. Made some ground before being checked at the 200m.
Squeezed out at start. Taken forward but wide round the turn, moved in 400m but no room till 200m. Kept on.
Jumped well from inside draw and held 5th along rail to the straight. Found no extra under pressure and tired close home.
Pushed forward from wide draw to pester leader and help set solid pace though wide without cover. Tired quickly.
Taken forward, 3rd into straight and looked chance. Gave ground at 200m. Had irregular heart beat and blood in trachea.
Went forward to race outside the leader, kept pressure on leader throughout taking a narrow advantage on bend, applied acid test final 250m and stuck to task well to score narrowly.
Ended up racing 2 and 3 wide around midfield, had cover to bend, switched to middle and let down strongly, just failed to peg back leader.
Showed good sped to take up running, worried a bit throughout by outside horse, fought back when shaded turning, stayed on well final 300m to hold placing.
Took up ideal spot 1 out 1 back trailing leaders, no excuses to bend, loomed as a serious threat at 250m but just lost a place late in bunched finish.
No early speed and soon settled a clear last 7Ls off lead, saved ground on rails and made good progress to bend, came through hard along inside.
Away fairly, kicked through to end up first behind leaders on rails, even trip to bend, kept on evenly behind them without seeing much room final furlong to finish on heels of placegetters.
Forced to go back from a tricky draw, raced 3 wide behind midfield, 5ls off lead, switched out wider turning in and closed respectably down centre to be nearest on line.
Tucked in behind them in midfield 3-4Ls back in two wide line, fair run to bend, left a bit flat when they dashed but came on ok late without looking likely.
Away fairly, raced 3 wide with cover behind speed, 2Ls back to bend, no clear early straight but unable to go with them and dropped off final 300m.
Out in line, pressed on but posted 4 wide without cover just off speed, worked too hard in run, rounded turn widest, struggled final 300m.
Went forward but unable to slot in, raced 3 wide without cover outside leaders, did share of work challenging at top end, under pressure turning, folded tamely in straight.

Began moderately, settled just off the pace in 2L 4th on rails, hit the front hugging inside rails turning in, hung on well under pressure.
Settled in 5th in midfield, commenced run entering straight, ran on to be nearest at finish but never threatening.
Broke well, raced awkwardly at times behind midfield far side, went wide into straight, finished off race nicely for a place.
Settled in rear, went widest into straight, made significant progress down the centre of the track, nearest at finish.
Settled in rear of midfield on rails, saved ground turning for home, ran on to challenge for 2nd 200 M out but unable to sustain effort.
Began from the widest gate, settled well behind, saved ground on rails turning in, did not find much room and forced to switch 200 M out, one-paced in the run home.
Began from a wide-ish gate, improved out wide around stables bend to join leader far side, took up running outside 2nd 800 M out before sharing pace rounding home bend, soon faded.
Settled outside leader, became 1L 3rd far side, similar into straight, soon faded.
Broke well, led or disputed lead on rails, faded from 200 M.
Settled near the rear of the field 1 off with cover. Enjoyed a good trail into the race after the 600m shifting out to improve. Had plenty of momentum in the straight & was able to capitalize.
Made its run from last position after settling 1 off with cover. Swung the home turn wide and closed off well.
Settled on the paint, 3 back. Shifted away from the rail after the 500m, got a nice cart into the race soon after. Shifted out into clear running near the 300m & found the line soundly.
Settled in 4th position, 1 off with cover. Flushed out near the 600m and ridden along to improve 3 deep no cover. Swamped late.
Pressured by rider early and managed to camp 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Made a forward move near the 600m, shifted out and pushed along 4 wide no cover. Was a spent force late.
Couldn't capitalize after box seating. Was one paced early in the straight and faded over the final stages.
Had every possible chance racing outside the leader, no cover. Headed soon after straightening and gave in quickly passing the 200m.
Settled worse than midfield, the fence. Peeled off and attempted to improve after the 600m but failed to go on with it.
Led along the paint. Never settled whilst dictating terms and was running on empty over the final furlong.
Crossed comfortably and led, benefited by the very slow sectionals, kicked away after straightening and scored.
Began well, eased to midfield, 4Ls off pace 2 wide with cover, despite hampered by the very slow tempo, dashed strongly and claimed 2nd.
Rolled forward to take box seat, benefited by the very slow section, ran on okay for 3rd.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, raced ungenerously throughout, peeled wide after straightening, one-paced only.
Began well but was crowded for room before first bend, 4 back on the fence, not suited by the very slow section, little dash.
Began well, 3Ls off pace on the fence, hampered by the very slow tempo, one paced.
Jumped fairly, settled 5Ls off pace 2 wide with cover, hampered by the very slow sectionals, no dash.
Pushed forward, parked outside the leader, suited by the very slow tempo, flattened 300M.
At rear, 7Ls off pace on the fence, hampered by the very slow sectionals, never competitive.
At rear, 7Ls off pace 2 wide with cover, hampered by the very slow tempo, swung widest, no dash.
Good break, camped 1 off with cover midfield, progress into home turn, determined centre-track run to lead close home.
Snagged back to race rail last pair, niggled 700m, switched out shaken up 400m, motored home, just failed.
Bustled early stages, raced midfield 1 off, driven 3 deep 500m, 4L back & wide into stretch, strong run to grab 3rd late.
Pace from wide gate, slotted midfield 1 off with cover, progress 3-wide final turn, to 2nd 300m, led 100m, run out of it late.
Raced 1 off near rear, 6L back switched widest into home stretch, closed out soundly to wire.
Good break, dropped in to sit 1 off in last pair, niggled at tail 600m, wide final turn, stayed on for solid progress.
Led at break, set good tempo in front, kicked 2L clear 400m, all out 200m, headed 100m, weakened out.
Tardy start, railed behind midfield, shoved along 600m, tight for room final turn, switched out, boxed on at even pace.
Bustled initially to lay up 1-back 1 off, niggled back stretch, driven in 2nd 500m, all out lost place 300m, plugged on tamely.
Fair break, sat 6th on rail, niggled back-stretch, steadied on home turn, driven 300m, found nothing, eased when beaten.
Smart break, rousted initially to claim rail 1-back, scrubbed to 2nd 450m, soon emptied & faded out.
Pace at break, trapped wide throughout, rolled to 2nd 700m, soon outpaced & retreated, found nothing for pressure.
Fair break, taken back, bustled last trio 1 off, 9L back 400m, driven & wide into home stretch, relentless charge to lead last strides.
Fair speed, crowded 900m, settled rail 5th, unbalanced far turn, niggled 500m, 6L back final turn, strong drive to lead 100m, headed close home.
Snagged back at break, raced at tail 1 off with cover, 10L back 400m, widest into stretch, determined run to wire.
Good break, niggled 1 off with cover 4th, driven into stretch, stayed on soundly, missed frame.
Good break, unable to slot, taken back behind midfield on rail, progress until ran up horses 200m, tight for room 150m, rallied to wire.
Sharp start, slotted midfield 1 off, gained ground out of back stretch, wide final turn, ran on at even pace.
Slow start, bustled on rail last trio, driven 300m, stayed on for fair progress.
Good break, tracked leader 3rd on rail, switched out final turn, battled to 2nd at 200m, run tapered.
Sharp break, set fast pace on rail, kicked 2L clear 400m, emptied & swamped 100m.
Fast start, driven to dispute early lead, settled close 2nd 1 off no cover, niggled in pursuit 400m, all out 200m, faded rapidly thereafter.
Hard ridden forward to take rail, shared the lead at good sectionals, kicked on well to win.
Eased for the box seat, closed the race off strongly for 2nd.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, raced keenly, made steady ground 300M.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, progressed steadily 200M.
Slow away, ridden along at back, 4.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made steady ground 200M.
Settled in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace along the fence, just held ground in straight.
Midfield, 3Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, ran on ok.
Slow away, trapped 3 wide throughout at back, 4.5Ls off the good pace, ran on ok despite negative racing situations.
Hard ridden forward, sat just off the good pace 2 wide, soon weakened 300M, checked 200M.
Slow away, hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide no cover throughout in the lead, emptied 250M.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, never closer.
Began well and soon found rail three back. Remained scraping paint to the straight and finished strongly to get up in time.
Taken forward soon after start but unable to get in from wide draw. Left flat-footed at the 400m but came again to just miss out.
Good start and soon in the box seat behind leader. Moved out at the 500m to make challenge and kept on to the line.
Unbalanced 600. Was two-wide, four-back along back stretch, moved out at turn and kept on steadily over the final 200m.
Not enough speed to go forward and stayed four-back along fence. Blocked at 150m but objection against winner denied.
Crowded start and soon at rear, one off the fence. Last into straight but ran past tired horses closing stages.
Charged to the front from a wide draw and had uncontested lead to straight. Still ahead at the 200m but weakened quickly.
Crowded start and raced wide at the rear. Three-wide into straight but found little when asked. Lost right hind plate.
Unbalanced 600 and thereafter raced wide without cover. Swung widest into straight but found nothing and soon tailed off.
Ridden to go forward but not enough speed and taken across behind runners 1000m. Tired quickly in straight and tailed off.
Settled behind midfield and travelled strongly for most of the contest, quickened through a gap mid-straight and forged to clear near 100M, won with something in hand.
Reserved near the rear, 6Ls off the pace in middle stages, driven inside 500M, made steady progress from 300M out, nearest finish.
Held up in mid-division, ridden to chase leaders passing 500M, stayed on to claim 3rd but outpaced by first two over final 150M.
Pushed early to take up a prominent position, briefly looked a threat passing 250M but turned one pace final stages.
From wide barrier crossed to race behind leader, moved up to challenge nearing 400M, briefly led mid-straight, no extra final stages.
Not far off in 5th, made a brief effort turning in, outpaced final 200M.
Enjoyed an uncontested lead from 1300M but found little for pressure passing 300M, weakened over final 200M.
Held up in midfield 3-wide, shuffled back when hampered by a beaten horse near 500M, found very little off the bridle.
Out the back, pushed along inside 600M but failed to pick up. Never a factor.
Held up in the outside of last trio, didn't travel and came under pressure home turn, soon beaten.
In mid-division along the fence, nudged along passing 500M but not able to go with leaders, dropped out 200M.
Caught 3-wide without cover throughout, looked uneasy making the turn for home, dropped out rapidly nearing 400M, heavily eased.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Soon taken back from the widest gate and waited with, commenced move upon straightening, finished off race strongly to snatch victory inside final 50 M.
Lost ground at start, moved closer up coming out of back straight racing in 4th about 2L off the speed, quickened to hit front 300 M out but died on its run close to home.
Soon taken back from a wide gate for rails run, saved a lot of ground turning in, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Slow into stride, gradually picked up under reminders along rails to rear of midfield, remained in similar position into straight, kept on steadily without threatening.
Settled mainly in 5th within 3L of pace, similar turning for home, one-paced under pressure without quickening.
Settled just worse than midfield, towards the rear entering straight, kept on well.
Began moderately niggling along early, settled in midfield on rails, kept on until fading inside final 200 M.
Travelled wide in midfield, commenced move approaching home turn, kept on until weakening inside final 200 M.
Broke well to lead, made running to 300 M, weakened noticeably under pressure.
Settled well behind, never seen with a chance.
Settled just worse than midfield, weakened under pressure around the bend.
Began fairly and ridden along, failed to keep up with fast early pace and dropped to midfield, switched out wide turning in, soon weakened under pressure.
Began from a wide gate, continued to race wide without cover in a prominent position, folded up quickly on straightening. (Bled.)

Placing: PU
Comment: Close up early settling just behind leader on rails, dropped out under pressure from approaching home turn. (Bled, heart irregularity and lame next day.)
Settled in 3rd position early, 1 off no cover. Was given a bit of reign near the 800m, and improved to travel in 2nd position. Challenged at the furlong and ground out a determined win.
Sent forward, crossed and led along the fence after the 900m. was collard late after competing for most of the straight.
Had every chance after box seating. Had plenty of time to overhaul the leaders after obtaining clear running early in the straight but couldn't go on with it.
Settled midfield, 1 off with cover. Peeled out near the 500m, to improve & ranged up near the 300m and looked likely. Failed to find an extra gear.
Raced handy to the speed but was posted 3-4 wide without cover. Never likely weakening over the concluding stages.
Worked home steadily after making its run from last position. Kept to the inside in the home straight after settling close to the rail early.
Travelled behind midfield 2 deep with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Parked 3 back the paint. Commenced to tire after the furlong.
Raced back in the field, 3 deep with cover. Didn't run on.
Settled in 2nd last position, 2 deep with cover. Made no impression in the run home.
Coursed at least 3-4 wide with some cover. Was running on empty turning for home.
Slow to begin then travelled behind midfield the fence. Failed to close off.
Rolled forward, shared the lead along the stand rail, kicked clear 400M and scored.
Travelled handy, 2Ls off along the stand rail, improved gradually, closed to the line well, beaten by a length.
Camped handy, 3Ls off the stand side, driven 350M, made minor ground, just claimed 3rd.
Rolled forward, crossed to the stand side and shared the lead, kicked away by the winner 450M, one-paced, just missed 3rd.
Settled midfield, settled 4Ls off the stand side, under pressure 400M, one paced, claimed a distant 5th.
Settled midfield, settled 3Ls off the stand side, looked likely 450M however soon weakened 300M.
Rolled forward, shared the lead in the middle of the track, kicked away by the winner 450M, failed to find any extra, weakened in the last furlong.
Began fairly, lacked early speed, 6Ls off the stand side, driven 400M, made minor ground.
Eased back, 6Ls off the stand side, little dash and passed tired runners.
Began awkwardly, travelled 4Ls off in the middle of the track, blocked near 500M however made no progress when clear.
Began awkwardly, travelled behind midfield, settled 5Ls off in the middle of the track, under pressure 500M, soon flattened.
Camped handy, 1L off in the middle of the track, under pressure near 450M, soon dropped off and well beaten in the last furlong.
Lacked early speed, 6Ls off along the stand rail, never a factor.
Began slowly, lacked early speed, at rear, 8Ls off the leader, no progress.
Fair break, bustled early 3-wide with cover 6th, advanced between horses final turn, to 2nd 350m, shifted out during determined run, led late.
Fast break, disputed lead, nudged to front on rail 700m, driven 1L clear 400m, shifted under pressure in stretch, headed final strides.
Good break, bustled early, settled 3rd 1 off with cover, ridden 3-wide & shuffled to 4th home turn, switched inside 150m, took 3rd late.
Sharp start, railed handy 4th, shaken up to go 2nd 400m, kept on gamely at even pace, lost 3rd inside final 100m.
Bustled near rear, shifted out & bumped rival 700m, wide & driven on home turn, honest progress without threatening.
Missed break markedly, ridden at tail, progress on turn, stayed on for moderate gains in stretch.
Smart break, travelled 3-wide no cover 5th, bustled 600m, widest home turn, weakened in stretch.
Tardy start, bustled early on rail behind midfield, unable to quicken final turn, plugged on modestly to wire.
Sharp start, disputed lead under drive 1 off no cover, relented 700m & sat 2nd, hard-ridden 500m, soon lost place & faded in stretch.
Crowded & lost ground start, bustled early last pair, shifted out 800m, niggled on turn, driven 400m, no response, eased late.
Fair break, raced wide near rear, bumped & unbalanced 700m, driven 500m, found nothing.
Awkward start, rolled to midfield 1 off with cover, ridden 500m, under strong pressure turning in, struggled & eased when beaten.
Sharp start, tracked leader on rail, shaken up in 2nd 400m, switched 1 off for relentless stretch run, led comfortably 50m out.
Fast break to lead, drew 3L clear back stretch, driven for home 400m, no extra when headed 50m from wire.
Speed early, settled back midfield 1 off, bustled 600m, 5th & driven final turn, advanced to 3rd 300m, kept on soundly.
Missed break, raced at tail, ridden 700m, switched widest 8L back final turn, strong closer centre-track, just missed frame.
Crowded & taken back at break, camped on rail rear pair, shaken up 7L back 400m, closed out soundly.
Driven from gate, not pace to lie up, berthed 3-wide with cover midfield, advanced wide 600m, to 4th turning in, plugged on one pace.
Snagged back to sit 3-wide with cover behind midfield, driven wide 600m, lacked pace to threaten, kept on for moderate progress.
Rousted from widest gate, trapped 3-wide no cover 4th, urged on 400m, kept on evenly until weakened out final 200m.
Driven at break, outpaced & raced toward rear 1 off with cover, one-paced in stretch, never a factor.
Tardy start, raced rail behind midfield, checked & shuffled to last on final turn, modest headway in stretch.
Wide & prominent 1st turn, vied for 2nd 1 off no cover, niggled 3rd 450m, bottomed out 300m, eased in run home.
Fair break, bustled forward early, raced rail fore of midfield, niggled & shuffled back 700m, struggled thereafter.
Decent start, tight for room 1st turn, sat fore of midfield 1 off with cover, niggled under pressure 500m, emptied turning in, eased.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the slow pace 2-3 wide, dashed well 300M to score.
Rolled forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, ran on well for 2nd.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1L at slow sectionals, overhauled 300M, just ran on for 3rd.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, held up 400M, dashed well when clear.
Settled in midfield along the fence, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in final furlong.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Pushed to occupy box seat, raced keenly, lack room 400M, never picked up.
Eased at start, always at rear, 7Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 400M, ran on ok.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, lack room 400M, no progress.
Hard ridden forward, enjoyed the slow tempo outside the leader, however faded quickly 350M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, flattened 250M.
Speared to the front on settling, crossed field toward outer rail. Kicked clear at the 200m and won with something in hand.
Soon in third and held that position till course proper. Hard ridden final stages to get second but no threat to winner.
Held along outer rail in 6th position to 400m, moved in to get clear run, pushed out to get third close to the line.
Jumped well but unable to match leader. Clear second at the 400 but found little at 200m and just denied third place.
Jumped with field but not enough speed and taken to outside rail. Shifted in at the 400m and made ground to line.
Slow to move and last early, pushed up along rails to get within striking range. Hung in and plodded final 200m.
Beaten for speed and soon near rear. Made little impact thereafter. Jockey reported was never on the bridle and disappointing.
Showed some early speed to hold down fourth spot to the course proper. Gave ground gradually after that.
Slow to move, and dropped to last by the 800m. Found little under hard riding and passed only one tired horse.
Jumped nicely and raced on his own in the middle of the track. Under pressure from the 400m and weakened quickly.
Settled 2-wide behind midfield, clear run down the center of track from 400M, closed off well and edged past leader 50M from home.
Not far off in 4th, loomed behind leader turning in, accelerated to lead near 250M, kept on well but couldn't match strides with winner final stages.
Began awkwardly, driven to take lead from 1200M, set even pace, headed 250M, rallied well to be 3rd not beaten far.
Urged to take early lead, tracked leader from 1200M, kept on same pace in straight and not able to trouble leaders.
Pushed along early to maintain a position behind midfield, saved ground on the inside, driven to chase leaders 400M, kept grinding away but couldn't get near to leaders.
Taken back to the rear, 3 wide and 6Ls off the pace making the home turn, made steady progress over final 300M.
Prominent early, taken back to midfield middle stages, stayed on but not pace to seriously challenge.
Awkwardly away, reserved near the rear along the 2-path, made limited progress early straight, one paced final stages.
Settled midfield but was wide without cover for most of the contest, kept on same pace final 400M, never a danger.
Chased the pace, pushed to 3-wide making the home turn, found little under pressure turning in, weakened 200M.
Lacked early speed, urged along to stay with the field, never going the pace to challenge, eased final 150M.
Held up 3-wide towards the back, appeared to be travelling well but found disappointingly little when driven nearing 400M, eased final stages. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Jumped with field, held four back along rails to straight, got run between horses and finishing strongly, pulling clear.
Pushed to take lead, crossed field to rail, kicked ahead top of straight but run ended 100m and caught near finishing line.
Taken forward from wide draw to be two back, one off before the turn. Came wide into straight and kept on solidly.
Ridden positively from outside draw, taken across field to get sit behind leader, hard ridden final stages but little progress.
Jumped with field and held good position three back one-off to turn. Taken out at 400m but found little under pressure.
Slow and then crowded start. Taken across behind runners before turn, switched out again in straight. One-paced.
No early speed and held three-wide at the rear. Moved four-wide swinging into the straight but one-paced thereafter.
Used early to get third, two wide at the 800m. Still a clear third at the 400m but was soon running on empty.
Began well and soon held good position three-back along the fence. Found little 400m when asked and plodded to line.
No early speed and held back along rails. Unable to get clear run till 400m, made some ground closing stages.
Slow to jump and held at rear along rails. Improved slightly round turn but found little in straight and tired 200m.
Jumped with field but proved difficult to settle. Swung wide into the straight and made some ground initially before tiring.
Taken back soon after the start but kept wide. Was three wide at the turn and wider into the straight. Found nothing.
Pushed forward to be fifth at the turn, started to weaken round the bend and tailed off. Unacceptable performance.
Broke well, took up ideal position behind leader, shifted 1 off on circle, joined in approaching 300m and went clear, held a margin to score with some ease.
Slotted into nice spot 1 out 1 back 2Ls off speed, fair run although pushed 3 wide from 500m, went with eventual winner but was safely held final 200m.
Taken back from a tricky gate, 8-9Ls back in running line, didn't settle but steadily crept closer on bend, made up good ground in straight doing best work late to take a placing.
Taken down to rear from a wide all, raced nearly 10Ls back on rails and was difficult to settle, took inside run turning, closed off ok along inside to make frame.
Went forward and ended up outside leader in unfamiliar role, raced keenly applying pressure to leader, headed passing 300m but stuck on ok and just lost spot in frame late.
Landed a midfield role on rails, 5Ls back, not exerted in middle stages, made run between runners and made some progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Ended up 3 wide without cover just off midfield, 7Ls or so away in run, improved approaching bend, made some progress in straight despite hard run, never really looked likely.
Took a spot not far off pace, 4-5Ls back in running line, no excuses to bend, switched out to make a run but no extra last 300m and just kept on at same speed.
Slow away, drove up into midfield spot 5-6Ls away in two wide line, fair run in midsection, nothing extra at business end producing a one paced finish.
Taken back from a wide gate, raced at rear 10Ls or so back, set task with plenty to pass turning, made some minor ground late.
Showed good speed to take up running, set an even tempo with pressure from outside horse, lost advantage at 400m, compounded tamely.
Ended up 3 wide behind midfield around 8Ls or so back, checked at 1200m, still gave a big start turning, disappointing effort in straight making no real progress.
Allowed to drop back from a wide gate, drove through on rails to be 7Ls or so back just behind midfield, cheap trip to bend, offered little in straight.
Ended up 3-4Ls back on rails, fair run to turn but soon struggling, dropped out easily and beaten a long way.

Began fairly settling just better than midfield, soon came to challenge upon straightening, fought on determinedly to gain upper hand close to home.

Began fairly, settled in midfield on rails, shifted two wide to avoid heels halfway out, came under pressure around the bend and went widest into straight, made good progress down the centre of the track.
Settled in rear, commenced moved rounding home bend, did not find much room early in straight, finished off race well to snatch 3rd on the line.
Began moderately, raced wide in forward of midfield early, made steady headway out wide down far side to take up running at the Rock, led until headed into straight, kept on but lost placing late.
Settled mainly one-out-one-back in 3rd, came to hit the front upon straightening, unable to sustain effort and headed inside the 200 M mark.

Settled just better than midfield on rails, shuffled backward on rails behind MR SPEEDY twice at 900 and 500 M out, saved ground on rails turning in, kept on steadily under pressure in straight without quickening.
Slightly slow out settling wide in last few, ran on steadily down the centre of the straight, did best work late.
Broke well, settled one back on rails and mainly in 4th far side, carried backward around the bend before switching off the rails entering straight, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Jumped very awkwardly losing ground, settled wide in mid-division, commenced run 3-wide around the bend to reach 1L 3rd into straight, unable to sustain effort.
Gradually took up running after beginning from the widest gate, crossed for rails run stables bend, held narrow lead to halfway mark, faded out of contention from 1L 3rd into straight.
Always well behind and never seen with a chance.
Towards rear throughout.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Took control of the race after hitting the lead passing the furlong.
Sent forward and led along the fence. Kept up a good gallop right to the post.
Parked behind midfield the fence. Stayed toward the inside in the straight and ran on well.
Ran usual honest race from back in the field, travelling on the fence. Closed off soundly down the outside.
Given every chance after box seating. Was overhauled late.
Raced in 2nd position, 1 off no cover. Was a beaten horse early in the final stretch.
Taken back from a wide gate and raced at the rear 1 off with cover. Kept to the inside in the straight but only battled away after being briefly held up on the home turn.
Settled 3 back the fence. Peeled out turning for home but only plodded to the line.
Travelled behind midfield 2 deep with cover. Weakened noticeably in the home straight. Reported the following day to be lame. (To trial)
Posted 3 wide without cover for the duration of the trip in around midfield. Never likely and gave ground quickly in the home straight. (To trial.)
Dropped behind runners, settled 4Ls off the pace, swung wide, dash strongly to lead 100M and won by a neck.
Jumped well, positively ridden to take box seat, battled on gamely after straightening however not able to match with the winner.
Pushed forward, 3Ls off the pace on the fence, stayed inside run after straightening, dashed on well.
Driven hard to cross and led, had every possible in the straight however run-ended 100M.
Pushed forward, settled 1L behind the leader without cover, driven 350M, one paced.
Rolled forward, positioned handy 3Ls off the pace 2 wide, but unable to quicken in straight, kept on one pace.
Slow to muster, settled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide, driven 350M, made limited ground.
Jumped awkwardly, sat at the rear, 5Ls off the pace on the rail however ran on only fairly.
Eased back, trapped 3 wide with cover, 4 wide rounding the Home Bend, never a factor.
Lacked early speed, dropped back to rear 700M, swung widest after straightening, never in a competitive position.
Rolled forward, settled 2Ls behind the leader however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, soon weakened after straightening.
Lacked early speed to cross, travelled 3 wide with cover throughout, never better than midfield, soon flattened after straightening.
Speed to lead from gate, settled 1 back on fence 900m, niggled in 4th 600m, shaken up 300m, driven to lead inside final 100m.
Snagged back to tail from widest gate, anchored on rail, pulled out 6L back final turn, rattled home centre track to claim 2nd last stride.
Good speed, trapped 3 deep in front rank, slotted 1 off no cover 900m, driven final turn, vied for lead 100m, all out, lost 2nd close home.
Taken behind at break to last pair 1 off with cover, close to heels 500m, switched wide into stretch 5L back, strong run, just missed frame.
Lacked early pace, raced rail near rear, shaken up 500m, driven top of stretch, solid late closer along fence.
Rousted from gate, railed behind midfield, niggled backstretch, progress until switched off heels 250m, checked in run 75m, not fully extended.
Fast break, initially in 2nd 1 off, led 900m, shaken up in front at 300m, headed 100m, faded out.
Blundered start, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, niggled 600m, switched out final turn, stayed on at even pace.
Crowded early strides, bustled forward to midfield 1 off with cover, niggled 600m, hard-driven but one-paced in stretch run.
Sharp start, unable to slot & posted wide no cover throughout, 3rd & niggled 500m, weakened in run home.
Tardy start, bustled to midfield 4 wide, advanced 600m, driven to 5th 400m, never nearer & run tapered out.
Good break, raced midfield 3 deep with cover, ridden 400m, unable to quicken, plugged on tamely.
Bumped start, speed to camp 4th on rail, switched 3-wide final turn, driven to lead 100m, narrowly held rival to wire.
Shifted & bumped start, pace to sit 1 back on fence, ridden in pursuit 300m, to 2nd when bumped 200m, battled soundly, just held.
Fair start, settled midfield on rail, bustled 5L back 500m, tight & bumped 300m, strong run to grab 3rd late.
Crowded start, raced rail near rear, 5L back when shaken up final turn, ran on for late gains.
Speed to lead from gate, set pace on rail, driven 300m, all out headed 150m, boxed on to wire.
Shifted at start, rolled 1 off to 2nd at 1000m, ridden 350m, crowded & hampered 200m, lost ground, ran on one pace.
Awkward start, raced midfield 1 off with cover, bustled 500m, wide & tapped for toe into stretch, stayed on for minor late headway.
Good break, dropped in behind midfield 1 off with cover, niggled 600m, wide into stretch, stayed on well without threatening.
Good break, snagged back to race 1 from tail on rail, niggled 600m, stayed on late to be closest at wire.
Smart start, raced 1 off with cover midfield, rolled to 4th 900m, lost action on turn, bumped 300m, unbalanced & weakened in stretch.
Dwelt start, crossed behind runners, niggled early stages at tail, ridden 500m, found nothing in run home.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, closed off strongly and drifted away 200M to score.
Eased at start, checked early, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Settled in front of midfield, 2Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, held ground for 3rd.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 5Ls off the leaders, benefited by the fast pace, made ground 200M.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, made steady ground 200M.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders, benefited by the fast pace and the rail run, however ran on fairly.
Hard ridden to take rail and lead, under pressure throughout, harmed by the fast pace, emptied 250M.
Very slow away, 4Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, suited by the fast tempo, never a factor.
Pushed early but not muster, sat 3Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, flattened 400M.
Trapped 4 wide throughout, never better than midfield.
Pushed forward, shard lead 2 wide at fast sectionals, soon weakened 300M.
Pushed forward, sat behind the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, faded rapidly 600M.
Pushed hard early to take clear lead, kicked away at the top of the straight and kept on strongly to the line.
Taken across behind runners to be one off at the turn, swung wide into straight, ran on strongly to just miss out.
Taken across behind runners and was last into turn, made ground around bend, ran on strongly along rail to grab 3rd.
A little slow into stride but moved up quickly to hold 6th around turn. Ran on strongly final 400m to get 4th on line.
Taken forward but wide to 800m, moved to clear second round turn, made challenge at 400m but one-paced.
Pushed forward from outside draw but unable to get in and thereafter raced wide without cover. Kept on one-paced in straight.
Began well and held position three-back, one-off to straight. Shifted in abruptly 200m, struck heels and unbalanced.
Began fairly and raced wide at the rear to the turn. Swung widest into the straight but found nothing and plodded to line.
Began awkwardly and soon at rear along fence. Made up some ground around turn but found little when asked final 400m.
A little slow to move but soon pushed forward to be fifth into turn. Wide into straight, found little and tired final 200m.
Pushed forward from inside draw to hold good position. Raced awkwardly at the 600m and gave ground from 400m.
Travelled strongly in the slipstream of leader, showed good turn of foot to lead 200M, kept up the momentum final stages.
Restrained in midfield along the 3-path, driven inside 450M, stayed on well to go 2nd 50M from the finish.
Held up in mid-division, lacked winner's acceleration inside 300M, kept on steadily final 200M.
Settled behind midfield, picked up reasonably well passing 300M but never looked like getting to the winner.
Taken back to near last, 5Ls off the pace turning for home, switched wide for a clear run 350M, stayed on.
Pressed leader, inclined to hang out rounding the turn, lacked pace to seriously challenge inside 300M, tired final stages.
Not hurried in early stages, settled near last 6Ls behind leaders, kept to inside throughout, made mild progress over final 300M but failed to threaten leaders.
Emerged to lead nearing 1000M, took them along steadily, headed by winner 200M out, faded final stages.
Tracked leaders, came under pressure 600M out, kept on same pace, never looked likely.
Last away, urged forward, travelled 3-wide without cover just off the pace, dropped away nearing 200M.
Dropped back to last 7Ls off the pace, swung wide into home straight, failed to pick up.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, outpaced when the race got serious nearing 300M, eased mid-straight.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began well, settled just off the speed on rails, two back in 5th rounding bend, shifted off rails to challenge entering straight, ran on to gain upper hand closing stages.
Niggled at early setting in forward of midfield on rails, fought on doggedly to just fail to get up on line.
Began fairly racing wide in positions better than midfield, went wide entering straight, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began moderately settling in rear of midfield, did not find much room early in straight, produced good late impression inside final 200 M.
Jumped well from the middle draw, led or disputed lead to straight breaking 1L clear early on, but unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M.
Settled well behind, remained same into straight, baulked for a run until 150 M out, responded well to do best work late.
Raced wide in last few, widest runner turning in, ran on steadily down centre of the straight.
Soon taken well back from the widest gate, remained in rear to straight saving ground turning in, ran on steadily without threatening.
Began awkwardly, soon taken back to cross for rails run, then improving to just worse than midfield, saved ground turning in, failed to quicken under pressure.
Led on rails early, ceded advantage around the bend, gradually faded in straight.
Began fairly, settled just worse than midfield out wide, ran home one-paced.
Began moderately from a wide gate, raced greenly in prominent position out wide far side and when disputing lead around the bend, dropped away quickly inside final 300 M.
Not far off to straight, soon weakened.
Midfield early gradually settling in last few, never a factor.
Made its run third from the rear, 2-3 deep with cover. Swung the home turn widest and let down strongly in the straight to win with plenty in hand.
Enjoyed a nice run in transit, box seating. Hit the front near the 250m but was collard passing the furlong.
Steadied from a wide gate and was allowed to travel in last position, 2 deep with cover, although was inclined to pull hard in the early stages. Rounded the home turn wide and ran on well.

Taken back from the outside alley & raced at the rear of the field along the pain however travelled keenly in the early stages. Chased gamely in the straight after obtaining comfortable racing room passing the 250m.
Settled worse than midfield 3 deep with cover. Carried 4 wide no cover after the 600m, maintained a fair gallop all the way to the line.
Raced midfield 1 off with cover, was carted 3 deep no cover after the 300m. Kept whacking away at the same speed in the final stretch.
Parked 3 back the fence. Kept to the inside turning for home and only labored down the running.
Sent forward and led along the paint. Faded approaching the 200m.
Settled just behind midfield the fence. Only plodded to the finishing line.
Settled in 2nd position outside the leader, no cover. Came under pressure early in the straight and was a spent force at the furlong.
Had every possible hope after travelling 1 out 1 back. Was a beaten horse early in the run home.
Posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip settling slightly ahead of midfield. Never likely. (Bled.)
Jumped well, settled 1L behind the leader, improved gradually near course proper, kicked away 100M to claim the trophy.
Jumped well, settled 2Ls behind the leader in the middle of the track, had every possible in the straight however run-ended 100M.
Began awkwardly, dropped to the last 3Ls off the pace in the middle of the track, under pressure 500M, dashed on well and claimed 3rd.
Began fairly, settled 2Ls off the pace along the rail, under pressure near course proper, ran on okay but without real threats.
Began fairly, 2Ls behind the leader however unable to quicken, kept on one pace.
Jumped well, shared the lead along the stand side, driven 450M, weakened 300M.
Jumped smartly, shared the lead along the rail, under pressure near course proper, weakened 300M. (Questioned for disappointing performance, see incident report.)
Speed at break to race handy far-side of group, smooth headway 400m, shaken up 350m, quickened smartly 200m, drew clear for easy win.
Sharp start, sat 2nd on leader's flank, shaken up 400m, led 350m, headed 200m, kept on well to wire.
Tardy start, bustled at the tail from the go, hard-ridden 350m, responded with determined late headway to make frame.
Broke well, bustled to race handy 4th, niggled 500m, caught flat-footed 400m, kept on soundly at one pace.
Fair start, travelled far-side behind mid rank, niggled 600m, shaken up & driven 450m, ran on soundly without threat.
Dwelt start, raced in rear, ridden 450m, ran on for minor gains in closing stages.
Fair break, bustled to position fore of midfield, niggled to hold spot, driven 500m, unable to quicken & plugged on tamely.
Fast break to lead, edged to stands' rail, ridden for home 400m, all out headed 350m, weakened thereafter.
Broke well, raced within 2L of lead, well-positioned when shaken up 400m, found nothing, faded out.
Lacked pace at start, bustled on rail towards rear, driven 500m, found little, never a factor.
Out-speeded early strides, bustled on rail behind midfield, hard-ridden & outpaced 400m, struggled in run home.
Smart start, raced handy 1 back on rail, switched out 400m, strong run to lead 100m.
Fast break to dispute lead, raced rail, edged to lead 1000m, shaken up to 1L lead 400m, challenged 150m, headed 100m, no extra.
Taken behind, camped tail on rail, 5L back switched out final turn, run blocked 350m, driven 300m, quickened to 3rd 200m, closed to wire.
Bumped start, restrained 1 off near rear, bustled but dropped to tail 700m, driven wide 430m, stayed on centre track to take 4th late.
Heavy bump at start, raced midfield 3-wide with cover, progress to 5th final turn, driven 400m, kept on evenly to wire.
Bumped start, switched to rail behind midfield, steady advance on turn, driven 350m, ran on at one pace.
Over-raced 3-wide, slotted behind front rank 2-deep with cover 1000m, niggled 800m, shuffled back final turn, off heels 300m, plugged on tamely.
Slow start, raced near rear 3-wide, driven for modest advance 800m, hard-ridden wide final turn, never a factor.
Fair break, trapped 4-wide no cover, bustled forward 1000m to join font pair 3 deep, niggled 1L back 500m, driven 430m, swamped & faded 200m.
Sharp start, disputed lead 1 off no cover, settled close 2nd 1000m, hard-ridden 430m, laboured & weakened out final 200m.
Good break, niggled to lie handy, pressured & shuffled back 1000m, hard-ridden in rear 430m, found nothing, well beaten.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L, made all.
Very slow away, pushed to obtain a midfield spot, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, made steady ground 300M for 2nd.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, just held ground for 3rd.
Pushed early but not muster, 6Ls off the leader along the fence, progressed steadily.
Trapped 3 wide throughout in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader, ran on well to the line.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, progressed steadily 250M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, made good ground 350M, however run ended 150M.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, held up 4-2, made some ground when clear.
Awkward away, hard ridden to keep up at rear, 7.5Ls off the leader on the fence, ran on fairly.
Settled 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, weakened quickly 300M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, flattened 300M.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide no cover throughout, soon emptied 400M.
Jumped well, pushed forward to hold rail, improved round turn, 2nd into straight, ran on strongly to win drawing away.
Jumped quickly but had to be used to get clear lead into turn, well clear entering the straight but caught 100m out. Kept on.
No early speed and last into turn, Made up some ground before straight and finishing strongly along the inside.
Jumped well but no early speed and held four back, one off to the turn. Taken wide top of straight and ran on strongly.
Slow to move, taken back across runners, urged from 600m and made ground to the line under hard riding with whip.
Kept near rear close to rails, improved steadily round turn, taken wide top of straight and kept on one-paced to line.
Rear but wide along back stretch, still wide at turn and widest into the straight. Ran past tired horses.
Began nicely and soon 3rd but wide at the 900m Continued to race wide without cover and was one-paced final 400m.
Jumped with field but soon fell back to be second last at 500m. Came very wide into straight and found little when asked.
Raced in midfield 3-wide, one-off to the turn. Swung wide at the 500m to challenge but found nothing and plodded.
Used early to go forward from inside draw. Held clear second from the 900m to the 400m before weakening.
Taken forward, pushed wide from 900M and kept wide thereafter. Tired quickly final 200m.
Tracked leaders 2-wide, cruised to join leader 300M, quickened to a clear lead when pressed, never looked in danger.
Dropped back to the rear, 6Ls off leader making the home turn, switched to clear 350M, stayed on to be nearest at the finish.
Held up midfield, ran on steadily but not getting to the winner.
Settled in midfield 2-wide, made mild progress over final 300M but never troubled the winner.
Shared lead on the inside, driven out 300M, headed inside 300M, faded final stages and was swamped near the line.
Tracked leaders in the inside, kept on same pace final 300M and not able to land a serious blow.
Held up at the rear, switched wide passing 500M, stayed on without threat.
Near the rear, urged along 500M out but found little.
Settled behind midfield, turned 3-wide 600M, run ended 200M out, dropped away.
Began well, unable to find cover on jumping from wide barrier, strode forward to join leader reluctantly, weakened rapidly nearing 300M. (Jockey questioned.)
Jumped well but restrained to get cover behind leader in 3rd place. Pulled out at 400m to challenge, won going away.
Held in midfield 4-back, two-off to the turn, came off bridle at 400m and made ground between horses to finish strongly.
Pushed forward from wide draw and made to work to get narrow lead. Pulled clear at the 400m but swamped 100m.
Nicely positioned in fourth, one-off, to the turn. Looked a chance top of the straight but laboured under big weight.
Pushed forward from inside draw but unable to get lead. Was 2nd into straight and 3rd at 200m before tiring close home.
Slow, taken across behind runners and made up ground along rails. No run from 500m to 250m. Made ground when clear.
Taken forward but wide to the turn. Was fifth into turn but soon under pressure and found little when asked final 400m.
Jumped nicely and held midfield near fence to straight. Made up some ground initially but run ended 200m and tired.
Crowded at start and checked at 1000m. Made up ground around turn to look at chance at the 400m but found little final 200m.
Not much early speed and near last to the straight. Made up some ground initially but became one-paced.
Began well enough but no speed and held 2-off near the rear for most of the journey. Never dangerous.
Taken back soon after the start and then taken in at the 900m. Last into home straight and ran past tired horses.
Raced wide and at the rear for most of the trip. Taken in at the 400m but found nothing under pressure.
Raced in midfield but wide early, started to slip back from the turn, wide into straight and tired quickly.
No speed and settled in rear, best part of 8ls back, appreciated speed on, obtained dream run through field from 500m, hit lead at 200m and fought hard to score a strong win.
Took ideal spot 1 out 1 back tracking decent speed in middle stages, travelled well turning and joined in strongly at 200m, failed by a narrow margin.
Settled 3 wide at rear 8ls off speed, had cover in mid-section and decent tempo worked in favour, came widest turning a produced a big finish making many lengths to snare 3rd.
Landed a nice spot 2-3ls off pace pair on rails, same margin down turning, shifted 2 wide in search of clear running, kept making ground steadily in run to line.
Pressed on when posted 3 wide without cover, ended up outside leader by midpoint, kept working and joined leader at 300m, stayed on bravely given run to be not far away on line.
Positioned midfield on rails, 4-5ls back enjoying a soft run throughout, running emerged turning in but just ground away at same speed final 200m.
Took up a spot 6ls back 3 wide just behind midfield, had cover to 500m before making a wide bid, stayed on steadily in run to finish without looking likely.
No early speed and positioned towards rear 7ls back, overaced in run, not much room when attempting to make run and steadied 150m, couldn't make impression thereafter.
Unable to slot in and posted 3 wide, had cover to midpoint, bumped at 700m, urged along turning but found it hard to get into it, steadied at 200m and didn't threaten from that point.
Snagged back from a wide alley, dug up to race 6ls away on rails. Quiet time in mid-section, closed off fairly in straight without looking threatening.
Pressed forward again to take up running, didn't have things own way as was the case last time, held a half-length break on bend, soon niggled and responded to 200m before run ended and faded out.
Assumed a position in midfield, 5-6ls back in running line, still back in pack turning and steadied at 400m, showed little when clear.
Ended up back at rear from a wide gate, 10ls away on rails, took inside runs and still with plenty to do turning, passed on tired runner.
Slotted into a nice spot behind leader, fair run to bend, under pressure and rolled about soon after turning, dropped right of it.

Began well, settled mainly in 6th and within 3Ls of speed, switched wide into straight, fought on well to gain upper hand final strides.
Settled mainly in 7th and within 3Ls of speed alongside winner, baulked for a run early in straight, fought on well inside final 300 M for a narrow defeat.
Began well settling in midfield on rails, baulked for a run until 300 M, ran on steadily without threatening.
Settled in midfield, baulked for a run until after 150 M out, made good late impression.
Jumped fairly, settled just off the pace on rails, remained similar turning in, ran on steadily down inside of straight.
Settled in last few, ran on steadily down centre of straight to be nearest at finish.
Jumped moderately, soon recovered to a prominent position, quickened to hit front briefly over 300 M out and soon faded.
Travelled 3-wide without cover in 1L 3rd, slightly worse rounding home bend, kept on before weakening inside final 200 M.
Began from the widest gate, soon taken back to rear of field, kept on steadily without quickening in straight.
Slowly away, soon recovered to just worse than midfield, switched out for a run entering straight, kept on steadily without quickening.
Hard ridden along rails to take up running, became 2nd around the bend, re-gained lead briefly entering straight, folded up quickly inside final 200 M.
Broke well, soon taken well back, widest into straight, no further impression.
Never on terms.
Vied for lead early, disputing lead before driven to the front 800 M out, tiring when headed into straight.
Enjoyed a nice trail into the race, settling 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Hit the front half way down the running, and was never headed.
Made its run fourth from the rear, 2 wide with cover. Peeled out early in the run home and ranged up before peaking on its run 100m from the wire.
Camped midfield, 1 off with cover. Had little options early in the home straight, finished off well once into the clear after the 200m.

Ridden positive in the early stages, but was going to be caught wide and settled behind midfield approaching the first turn. Received some cover on the circle when racing about 3 deep. Rounded the home bend wide and ran on fairly.
Taken back and settled in last position, close to the running rail, had cover. Closed off strongly.
Steadied soon after the jump and shifted in quickly to race on the rails, midfield. Ran into some traffic problems in the home straight, closed off soundly after the 200m.
Had every conceivable chance after taking up a trailing position behind the leader passing the 800m, along the paint. Only plodded to the line.
Began very awkwardly coursing 3 deep without cover after the 700m, just ahead of midfield. Commenced to tire near the 100m.
Raced handy early however copped a check near the 850m & settled worse than midfield 3 deep with cover. Rounded the home turn widest and whacked away at the same speed in the run to the line.
Jumped well, but was steadied and taken back to travel with the backmakers, 2-3 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Raced with the leading division, 3 deep no cover approaching the circle. Managed to settle 1 out 1 back after being crossed near the 700m. Was a beaten horse early in the final stretch.
Settled well back in the field, along the fence with cover. Failed to make any impression in the home straight.
Speared forward and vied for front running duties whilst racing on the paint. Was a spent force before the furlong.

Showed good early pace to be on the speed but was caught 4 wide no cover nearing the 900m. Pressed on and crossed approaching the 800m to race as joint leader, 1 off. Faded passing the 200m after having a tough run.
Jumped fairly, rolled forward to settle midfield 2 wide with cover, quickened up impressively to draw clear 250M.
Pushed forward, 6Ls off the pace 2 wide with cover, dashed on well in the middle of the track to get 2nd.
Rolled forward to take box seat, ran on steady to claim 3rd.
Rolled forward, settled 3Ls off the pace, 2 wide with cover, had every possible chance after straightening however just missed 3rd.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader on fence, one-paced home.
Raced Midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace on fence, couldn't find a clear run after straightening, made minor ground 200M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader on fence, swung wide rounding the Home Turn, however ran on only fairly.
Eased back, settled 6Ls off the pace, trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, gradually improved rounding the Home Turn, however unable to continue to finish after straightening.
Dropped to rear, 8Ls off the pace, swung widest, never looked chance.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader on fence, blocked after straightening, clear run 100M, made minor ground.
Began fairly, pushed forward to park outside the lead, driven 400M, found nothing, faded 300M.
Driven hard to cross and led, faded 300M.
Fast start, settled 5th 1 off with cover, niggled 500m, shaken up 3L back 400m, determined drive to lead 100m, in command at wire.
Awkward break, taken behind rail at tail, 8L last & driven wide off final turn, strong run to nick 2nd close home.
Fast start, rousted to lead, shaken up 400m, driven 2L clear 300m, all out when headed 100m, no extra.
Raced behind midfield 3 deep with cover, niggled 600m, wide final turn, shaken up 400m, responded with sound stretch run, just missed frame.
Snagged back from wide gate, raced last pair 3 deep, progress blocked 400m & steadied off heels, closed out well.
Missed break, bustled to settle near rear, ridden for progress home turn, stayed on soundly, drifted closing stages, never a threat.
Fair break, settled midfield 1 off with cover, bumped & unbalanced between horses final turn, ran on soundly at one pace.
Lacked pace & rousted early strides, trapped 4-wide no cover near rear, wide into stretch, driven 350m, boxed on at one pace.
Smart break, raced rail midfield, niggled 800m, ridden 400m, switched out for effort but plugged on only moderately.
Slow start, raced 1 off near rear, ridden into stretch, outpaced & last at 200m, kept on past beaten rivals.
Driven from gate to sit 2L 3rd 1 off with cover, shaken up 400m, outpaced & struggled in run home.
Rousted from gate, trapped 3 deep midfield, hampered 500m, bumped final turn, unbalanced & faded thereafter.
Sharp break, raced 4th on rail, ridden final turn, found little, weakened tamely in stretch.
Good break, rolled to close 2nd 1 off no cover 900m, driven 400m, emptied out 250m, fading markedly when checked off heels 150m.
Smart break, posted handy 5-wide until led 900m, shaken up 400m, lengthened gamely, all out & just held on at wire.
Broke well, disputed early lead, settled 3rd 1 off no cover, shaken up to 2nd 200m, closed to wire but just failed.
Fair break, settled rail behind midfield, switched out home turn, driven 430m, relentless advance to grab 3rd final 50m.
Bustled from gate, rolled to midfield 1 off, driven 400m, quickened in pursuit, to 4th 100m, closest at wire.
Smart start, raced 4th on rail, hard-ridden 350m, every chance but faded last 100m.
Decent start, camped midfield rail, ridden & switched out 400m, gained good ground late without threatening.
Slow from gate, travelled last pair on rail, ridden at tail 7L back 430m, stayed on for decent gains, closest at wire.
Slow break, bumped start, wide advance to midfield, shaken up off final turn, one-paced for pressure in run home.
Dropped in to race last trio 1 off, wide final turn, run briefly checked 400m, hard-ridden 350m, plugged on at even tempo.
Rousted to early lead, to 2nd 900m & settled 1 off, driven 400m, swamped 200m, weakened out.
Bumped at break, advanced wide no cover to lay handy, 5-wide on turn, driven 400m, faded tamely in stretch run.
Fair break, ridden forward, over-raced 900m, 3 wide & over-raced 650m, pressed front rank on final turn, struggled in run to wire.
Awkward start, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, asked for effort 400m, found nothing, laboured stretch run.
Bumped rival at break, dropped in at tail, advanced wide 600m, driven 400m, run quickly tapered, eased late when beaten.
Eased back for cover, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well along the fence in straight and scored in its debut.
Pushed to take rail and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 250M for 3rd.
Settled in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 300M.
Eased to rear, 8.5Ls off the leader, trapped 4-5 wide, dashed strongly 400M despite not suited by the slow pace, run ended 100M.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Slow away, midfield on the fence, 4Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, checked 200M, little dash when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no dash.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, on heels 400M, no turn of foot when clear.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the slow pace 3 wide, emptied 400M.
Hard ridden forward, benefited by the slow sectionals, soon weakened 300M.
Eased back, not suited by the slow tempo, never competitive.
Hard ridden forward, enjoyed the slow pace, dropped off 400M.
Got leg over stall before start. Held two-off in midfield early, improved turn, third into straight and finished strongly.
Taken forward but unable to get in. Second into straight, took lead at 200m but tied up close home and swamped.
A little slow into stride, pulled out 800m. made ground around bend. Wide into straight with best work at the finish.
Held in midfield along rails, taken out going into the turn, fourth into straight and kept on steadily without threatening.
Held good position two-back, two-off into straight, not much room over final 300m and rider stropped riding close to the line.
Taken forward soon after start and found box seat behind leader. Was fifth into the straight but only one-paced.
Awkward start and last along back stretch and around bend, taken wide into straight and was doing best at the finish.
No early speed and held at rear along rails. Taken out turn, was wide into straight but found little under pressure.
Slow into stride and held at rear but wide. Took closer order around bend and fourth into straight but soon weakened.
Not suited by tempo and got further back than intended. Caught flat-footed at the turn and slipped back. Found nothing.
Pushed to lead and was clear around the bend. Came under pressure at the top of the straight and weakened.
Driven forward to take up a handy position behind leaders, made smooth headway to lead 250M, kept on well enough to hold off late challenge from the 2nd and 3rd.
In 5th place never far off from the pace, ridden to chase winner from 300M, nearest finish.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, finished the final 400M fastest, nearest finish.
Lost ground at the start, recovered to a midfield position, kept up with leaders to 150M, one paced final stages.
Held up behind midfield, stayed on mildly and no threat to first three.
Pressed leader, briefly led near 300M, run ended and weakened final 150M.
Taken back to near last, switched wide nearing 400M, not going the pace to challenge leaders.
Behind midfield early, hampered near 850M and lost position, flat footed nearing 400M, soon out of contention.
Tracked leaders, looked to be a strong chance turning in but weakened rapidly inside 200M.
Caught wide without cover in midfield, came under pressure 500M out, not quickened.
Dropped back to the rear from wide barrier, found little turning into straight, soundly beaten.
Soon led, headed inside 350M, faded away.
Restrained on jumping, shuffled back to last making the home turn, ridden and reluctant to race passing 400M. (Jockey reported his horse didn't travel at any stage.)
No early speed and settled near rear. Came wide into straight before changing gears and finished strongly to win close home.
Taken forward but unable to get in and raced wide without cover thereafter. Took lead at 200m but swamped near line.
Pushed forward from inside draw and held rail behind leader. Was second into straight and kept on steadily without threatening.
Raced in midfield but wide to turn, moved up around bend and fourth into straight, Was doing best work final 200m.
Bumped and lost ground at the start. Was near last around bend but ran on strongly in the straight.
Taken forward from a middle draw and soon found box seat behind leader. Kept on steadily along rails but unable to get closer.
Eased to midfield but wide back stretch, Taken wider into the straight. Made late ground down centre of track.
Slow into stride and then checked at 850m. Taken to rail and ran past beaten horses over the final 200m.
Jumped well and held fourth before turned. Started to weaken round bend and plodded home. Substantial blood in trachea.
Jumped best but eased and then checked at 850m. Did not stretch out when asked. Substantial blood in trachea.
Soon at rear but wide. Dropped to last around turn and found nothing in straight under hard riding. Never competitive.
Slow into stride, cross field behind runners to rail. Stayed there without ever looking dangerous.
Taken across behind runners from wide draw and soon last. Made up some ground around bend, but tired and dropped back.
Pushed to lead from middle draw, crossed to rail around the bend but shortened stride on entering straight and weakened.
Even getaway, sat 3Ls back just off pace, ideal track into race turning, made a bid at 300m and came right away with it final furlong for a strong win.
Faded back from a tricky gate, raced at rear 9Ls or so back in running line, speed on helped but still a long way back turning, closed off very well final 300m passing all but the dominant winner.
Landed a position in midfield 5Ls away racing two wide, quiet time in middle stages, made a run turning and kept coming final 300m to land a place in shadows of post.
Began well, pressed on to sit outside leader, applied pressure throughout shading leader, took over at 400m, fought on to 200m when headed and only lost place final strides.
Slow into stride, more than 9Ls back at rear on rails, aided by speed, still well back turning, made some decent ground in straight to finish on heels of place getters.
Out in line, took up ideal spot 1 out 1 back, did a bit of work on speed, presented rounding bend and looked a place hope, no extra final 200m.
Restrained from a wide gate, more than 10Ls back at rear, set a task but helped by speed, last turning, made some good progress in straight to be nearest on line.
No early speed, ended up behind midfield on rails 8Ls or so back, not asked in mid-section, just battled away at same speed in straight.
Fair to jump, made way into spot behind leader, did a touch or work with decent sections, close enough turning, soon under pressure and weakened final 300m.
Angled in behind midfield 6Ls or so back, in two wide line in middle stages, ridden along turning and produced a one paced response in straight.
Went forward however posted 3 wide without cover, worked too hard in with decent speed on, 3Ls back on bend, faded soon after straightening when hard run took toll.
Taken back from outside alley, raced 3 wide behind midfield 8Ls back, came wider on bend, struggled in run to line making no impression.
Tardy into stride, landed a spot on rails 5-6Ls back in midfidl, not asked but under pressure before turn, folded tamely.
Pressed on to take up running, set decent speed when given no peace by outside horse, punctured at 400m and dropped right out.
