Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jumped well, settled just 2-back off the speed on rails switching to 2-wide far side, commenced move home turn, quickened under pressure to grab victory late.
Broke well from a middle draw to assume a prominent position, improved around home bend to gain slender advantage into straight, but unable to sustain effort and caught close to home.
Began from the widest gate, soon moved up to take up running on rails by stables bend setting a steady pace, held lead until joined into straight, fought on well and late.
Settled in midfield on rails, commenced move approaching home turn, ran on steadily without threatening. (Tactic questioned.)
Began awkwardly, soon improved to the front and crossed to rails before settling one-back in 3rd, similar turning in when briefly baulked on inside, failed to quicken under pressure in the run home.
Soon taken back to race in rear, saved ground turning in, kept on steadily without quickening.
Jumped from a poor draw settling at the tail end of the field, remained well back into straight, made some late progress.
Remained in last few to straight, saved ground turning for home, kept on without quickening.
Raced in midfield and refused to settle in first half of race, faded under pressure in straight.
Slightly slow out, soon recovered to race keenly in forward of midfield, weakened under pressure in straight.
Raced keenly and wide and just worse than midfield, faded into straight.

Placing: DNF
Comment: Settled just worse than midfield, saved ground on rails turning in, broke down shortly after straightening.
Maintained the fence and dueled for front running duties throughout for most of the trip. Skipped half a length clear early in the straight and kept finding enough to secure victory.
Vied for leading duties whilst racing 1 off, no cover. Fought on gamely for most of the home straight.
Ridden vigorously from barrier rise, shifted in to race on the fence in the early stages stalking the leader. Had some traffic problems until the furlong, finished off soundly thereafter.
Made its run from the rear after travelling 2-3 deep with cover. Closed off strongly.
Travelled 3 back the paint. Stayed to the inside in the final stretch and worked home fairly but peaked on its effort 100m out.
Settled in last position 2-3 off with cover. Commenced to improve along the rail after the 450m, and in the straight finished off soundly.
Slow to begin settling close to midfield, 1 off with cover. Kept on one paced in the run to the line.
Travelled midfield, 3 deep with cover. Straightened up widest but only plugged away in the home stretch.
Posted 3 deep without cover for most of the trip, whist racing on the speed. Never likely.
Trapped a little wide early, but managed to park 1 out 1 back after the 600m. Got racing keenly near the 500m, swung the home turn widest & faded in the final stretch.
Settled with the backmakers, 3 deep with cover. Made no impression in the home straight.
Jumped well then was allowed to drift back to race towards the rear, 3 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Jumped fairly, pushed to track 1.5Ls behind the leader inside, dash strongly to lead 100M and scored well.
Ridden forward, shared the lead on fence, batted on gamely after straightening, however couldn't match with the winner and weakened 100M.
Began smartly, camped handy 2 wide, had every possible chance in the straight however run-ended 100M.
Jumped well, settled 3 back on fence, stayed inside after straightening, only made minor ground.
Jumped fairly, settled worse than midfield on fence, stayed inside and ran on well.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader, peeled wide but unable to quicken in straight.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout with cover, swung widest after straightening however ran on only fairly.
Jumped only fairly, settled 2Ls off the pace however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, flattened 200M.
Jumped moderately, raced 3Ls off the pace 2 wide, no progress.
Hard ridden forward to park outside the leader, soon weakened after straightening.
Jumped slowly and dropped to rear, 8Ls off the pace, trapped 3 wide throughout with cover, never looked likely.
Sat at the rear, never a factor.
Fast start to lead early, settled rail 2nd 1200m, 2L back 400m & shaken up to close, battled to lead 100m, comfortable at line.
Smart start, urged to lead 1200m, drew 2.5L clear down back, pressed & driven 300m, duelled gamely, headed 100m, no extra.
Smart break, held up midfield on rail, over-raced on tight hold, unleashed 300m, quickened to 3rd 200m, closed without threatening.
Good start, raced midfield 1 off with cover, bustled 500m, driven wide final turn, ran on soundly.
Awkward break, bustled to rail midfield, switched out & ridden final turn, stayed on for late gains.
Sharp start, restrained on rail to sit 3rd, to 4th 800m, hard-ridden 300m, brief gains but one-paced through final 250m.
Fast break, camped 4th 1 off, edged to 3rd 800m, driven 400m, shifted out on turn, one-paced to wire.
Slow start, taken behind, raced near rear 1 off, niggled 600m, driven wide home turn, plugged on moderately.
Awkward start, bustled initially, raced near rear on rail, over-raced 1200m, niggled 600m, hard-ridden 400m, outpaced in run home.
Lurched out of gate, raced at tail, driven for minor progress 500m, boxed on tamely.
Fair start, bustled initially to sit near rear 3 deep no cover, scrubbed in backstretch, to tail 500m, passed beaten rival, never a factor.
Tardy start, rolled to midfield 1 off with cover, driven & outpaced 3-wide 400m, found nothing & weakened out.
Sharp start, urged to lead on rail, headed 1200m, 2nd & switched 1 off no cover 1000m, shaken up to lead 400m, repelled challengers to wire.
Bumped start, speed to race handy on rail, smooth progress into final turn, driven 250m, soon 2nd & pressed winner to wire, always held.
Reared start, raced near rear, 3-wide advance from 700m, driven in 3rd 500m, 2nd at 300m, run tapered.
Crowded & blundered early strides, raced last pair on rail, switched 3 deep & niggled 600m, widest into stretch, solid progress to wire.
Slow start, camped last pair 1 off, switched 3 wide 800m & swept forward, 6th & driven 500m, stayed on without threatening.
Good break, prominent early, settled 1 off with cover fore of midfield, close to heels 800m, driven home turn, boxed on evenly.
Decent break, settled rail midfield, driven 500m, kept on at one pace.
Smart start, close 2nd early stages, settled 3rd 1 off with cover, shuffled back 500m, outpaced & plugged on to line.
Moderate break, settled rail behind midfield, dropped to tail 500m, stayed on for modest gains.
Shifted & bumped start, raced 1 off with cover midfield, off heels 800m & switched 3-wide, found little for pressure, one-paced.
Tardy start, raced 1 off behind midfield, dropped to last pair 700m, hard-ridden 500m, found little.
Good break, trapped 3-wide handy, rolled to lead 1200m, headed 400m, weakened thereafter.
Pushed forward, 4Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast tempo and the rail trip, closed off well to score.
Very slow away, more than 10Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, dashed well 250M for 2nd.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, made ground 250M for 3rd.
Behind midfield, 8Ls off the leader along the rails, benefited by the fast tempo, made some ground in straight.
Pushed to take box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, ran on until 100M flattened.
Eased back, more than 10Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, suited by the fast pace, made steady ground 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, just ran on ok.
Midfield along the fence, 6Ls off the leader, suited by the fast pace, just held ground.
Pushed forward, 4Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, flattened 200M.
Took rail quickly, led by 2Ls at fast sectionals, out of fuel 200M.
Slow away, 8.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, however no progress.
Eased back to rear for cover, more than 10Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, no progress.
Pushed forward from wide draw to sit 2nd, one off, into back stretch. Took lead at the 200m and held off late challenge.
No early speed and settled near rear. Took closer order round final bend and finished strongly to miss by a head.
Taken back across runners after start to be last at 800m. Made ground at bend, no run at 200m, ran on well when clear.
Stuck to rails 3-back soon after start. Remained there around bend and into straight. Doing best work at finish.
Pushed to lead from inside draw but then took sit along rails. Was close 3rd into straight but swamped final 50m.
Jumped well but held 3-wide along back stretch. Swung wide into straight and only one-paced final 200m.
Taken forward but unable to get in and held wide in midfield without cover. Doing best work at the finish.
Taken back across runners to get close to rail. Made ground around bend and kept on to be closest at the finish.
Taken back across runners and was last into back stretch. Kept on one-paced in straight without looking dangerous.
Pushed from wide draw to take the lead after 200m. Still ahead at the 200m but tired quickly final stages.
Taken forward early but proved difficult to settle 1100m. Held 4th round bend but gave ground from 250m.
Soon at rear but three-wide. Moved closer to the fence along back stretch but struggled into straight and soon tailed off.
Held up midfield along the fence, made stealthy headway turning for home, shaken up to lead nearing 100M, kept on well.
Taken back to last 9Ls off leader, switched wide passing 400M, finished off strongly, nearest finish.
Slow to begin, patiently ridden at the rear, saved ground on the inside, made steady progress final 350M.
Driven forward, crossed to the lead near 1200M, pushed along 400M, faded and lost lead 100M out.
Held up behind midfield along the 2-path, waited with until 300M, closed off well.
Taken back, outside of the rear pair, made his move passing 600M, ran on but not reached first three.
Held a rail position tracking leaders, nudged along 450M, same pace final 250M.
Up with early pace, found cover behind leaders from 1000M, driven 450M, found less than expected, no threat to leaders final 150M.
Settled behind mid-division, driven near 400M, stayed on without threat to leaders.
Held up in midfield along the 2-path, checked and lost momentum near 400M, took time to re-group but was denied clear run final 100M.
Caught wide first 500M, used a bit to go forward, pressed leader from 1100M, weakened passing 600M, eased mid-straight. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Towards the rear, made an early move 600M out but run ended nearing 200M, dropped away.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Never far off on rails, hit the front briefly over 300 M out, fought on nicely to re-gain advantage final strides.
Hampered at start, ridden and soon picked up to midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, quickened well inside final 300 M to hold every chance, just pipped.
Settled just better than midfield, badly baulked for a run early in straight, obtained a clear run 200 M out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly settling towards the rear, ran on well down the centre of the straight, did best work late.
Hampered at start, soon picked up to rear of midfield, switched wide into straight, tightened briefly 300 M out, produced some late impression under pressure.
Settled just worse than midfield travelling 3-wide, hanging and a difficult ride for the jockey early in straight, kept on well in the run home.
Slowly away, settled at the back, wide turn, finished off race nicely down the centre of the straight.
Soon taken back to last few, saved ground turning in, not much room early in straight, ran home one-paced.
Travelled mainly in 3L 4th just better than midfield, kept on same pace early in straight before fading inside final 200 M.
Ridden early settling in forward of midfield on rails, found nothing in straight.
Settled at the back, switched out into straight, ran past well-beaten horses.
Began from the widest draw, hard ridden from the start settling just outside leader, weakened under pressure in straight.
Raced wide without cover in midfield, similar turning in, made no impression in the run home.
Began from a wide draw, soon took up running and crossed to rails, led to 250 M, dropped out tamely. (Lame next day.)
Bounced out of the machines and raced on the speed, 3 off the stands rail. Showed a good turn of foot & had the race in its keeping near the 300m.
Not the best away then was crossed early and took up a trailing position just off the leaders 2-3 from the grandstand rail. Chased home gamely.
Jumped smartly and settled on the speed 4 off the grandstand rail. Maintained a reasonable gallop to the post.
Began awkwardly then didn't show any early pace, settling fourth from the rear near the middle of the course. Made good steady progress over the final 350m.
Sent forward and led in the early stages about 2 from the stands rail. Was joined in front near the 600m, didn't find any extra and only battled away giving ground over the final 100m.
Parked 2-3 off the outside rail, racing in a handy position. Was a beaten horse approaching the 200m.
Showed plenty of early dash and led after the 700m. faded over the final furlong.
Settled midfield along the center of the course. Stayed on at the same speed in the run to the wire.
Settled back in the field along the grandstand side. Kept on one paced in the run to the line.
Positioned with the backmakers, stands rail. Failed to close off.
Camped midfield, 3-4 from the outside fence. Failed to make any impression at the business end of the race.
Tailed the field for most of the race whilst traveling towards the stands rail. Struggled a long way from way from home.
Began very awkwardly, reared & lost considerable ground becoming detached. Never in the hunt. (To trial).
Tracked the speed approximately 3-4 off the outer rail. Was struck behind by another runner near 300m, become badly unbalanced and was eased down over the concluding stages.
Eased back, 4Ls off the pace on the fence, despite hampered by the slow tempo, dashed home well when clear 250M and hung on to score by a short head.
Began awkwardly, 6Ls off the pace on the fence, swung wide, despite hampered by the slow tempo, dashed on strongly, beaten by a short head.
Camped handy, 3Ls off the pace 2 wide with cover, benefited by the slow tempo, driven 350M, one paced, just claimed 3rd.
Crossed comfortably and led, benefited by the slow tempo, however kept on one pace only.
Dropped to rear, 7Ls off the pace on the fence, despite hampered by the slow tempo, dashed on well when clear 200M.
Midfield, settled 4L behind the leader 2 wide with cover, hampered by the slow tempo, driven 350M, one paced.
Rolled forward to take box seat, suited by the slow tempo, however unable to quicken in straight, kept on one pace, weakened 100M.
Camped handy, settled 3Ls behind the leader however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, soon weakened after straightening.
Eased back, settled 5Ls behind the leader, trapped 2-3 wide with cover, hampered by the slow tempo, no dash.
Rolled forward, settled 1L behind the leader without cover, benefited by the slow tempo, however soon flattened after straightening.
Crowded start, camped at tail, 6L back switched widest home turn, surging run to lead 200m, drew clear.
Taken back to last pair 1 off with cover, wide final turn, strong drive centre track to grab 2nd last strides.
Fair start, bustled 1 off fore of midfield, switched out & driven 430m, swept to brief lead above 200m, soon headed, kept on gamely.
Missed break, driven to sit midfield on rail, tight for running room 400m, checked off heels 200m, ran on late, not fully tested.
Tardy start, raced rail near rear, switched out & back in at 400m, restricted run 300m, shaken up & stayed on without threat.
Fair start, bustled early, raced midfield 3 deep with cover, switched wider final turn, stayed on evenly.
Good break, settled 2L back on rail, bumped when challenging lead at 400m, every chance 300m, one-paced.
Fast start, bustled to lay up, niggled 1 off handy, shaken up to lead 350m, all out & swamped 200m.
Smart start, taken back to 1 off behind midfield, driven home turn, stayed on past beaten rivals.
Dropped in to race midfield 1 off with cover, shaken up 3L back 400m, one-paced for pressure, faded final 200m.
Fast break, niggled & outpaced, soon behind midfield wide with cover, driven 450m, found nothing, never a factor.
Urged from widest gate to take clear lead 1200m, headed 350m, weakened out.
Smart start, bustled 3-wide to lay up, shuffled back 700m, driven 400m, struggled in run home.
Good break, trapped 4 wide handy, rolled to close 2nd 800m, ridden final turn, bumped & unbalanced 400m, faded thereafter.
Good break, tracked leader on rail, shaken up to 2nd 300m, strong run to lead 50m.
Tardy break, at tail early, progress from 1000m, to midfield 600m, quickened between horses 200m, closed out soundly to 2nd last strides.
Quick break to lead, briefly headed 700m, clear advantage final turn, kicked on 300m, headed 50m.
Bumped start, off heels & to tail 1000m, progress 650m, shaken up 6L back 400m, quickened at 300m, ran on to be closest at finish.
Decent break but crowded & dropped to rail near rear, bustled along, tight for room 700m, stayed on for solid stretch progress.
Fast start, bustled initially, settled 5th 1 off with cover, shaken up 430m, kept on at same pace.
Fair break, trapped wide no cover midfield, shaken up wide final turn, kept on at even gallop.
Driven from wide gate to sit wide no cover 3rd, ridden home turn, boxed on gamely until faded final 200m.
Bumped start, raced midfield 1 off with cover, driven 450m, shifted under pressure 300m, weakened in run home.
Fast start, raced 2nd, disputed lead 700m, driven & outpaced 350m, faded in run home.
Broke with others, raced midfield on rail, driven 400m, tame effort.
Bumped start, raced last trio, to tail 650m, switched wide home turn, plugged on modestly.
Fractious in gate, awkward start, 3 wide midfield until shifted & steadied off heels 750m, last pair turning in, never a factor.
Broke with others, raced midfield until lost ground 800m, struggling in last trio 400m, never a factor.
Eased to rear, 9Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M, dominated 200M.
Eased back, 8.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 4-2, dashed strongly when clear for 2nd.
Slow away, hard ridden forward but not muster, 3Ls off the leader on the rails, held up 400M, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 3 wide, led 400M, ran on well until 100M emptied.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, held up 400M, dashed well 200M.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, flattened 300M.
Eased to rear for cover, 9.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran flat until 200M, little dash.
Very slow away, 4.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 6Ls off the leader, checked 600M, not suited by the slow pace, lack room 300M, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, but soon out of fuel 400M.
Settled in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, weakened 250M.
Settled in front, enjoyed the slow tempo, however faded quickly 400M.
Eased back, never competitive, tailed out.
Taken across behind runners at start. Taken out turn to improve position, finished strongly to win drawing away.
Taken forward soon after start to sit outside leader. Gained narrow lead at the 200m but no match for winner.
Slightly worse than midfield early, improved along rails, taken out entering straight and finished strongly.
Taken forward soon after start to hold 4th with cover until straight. Improved position 400m to 200m before run ended.
Taken forward from inside gate to hold narrow lead into turn. Headed at the 200m but kept on well to the line.
Well placed two-back along fence early, closed in on leading group at the turn, kept on steadily under hard riding.
Pushed forward from wide draw but held three-wide without cover. Kept on in straight but lost ground from 200m.
Behind early leaders but wide into turn, improved top of straight but unbalanced at 200m and one-paced after that.
Sat down in stall before start but jumped well and raced in midfield to turn. Made effort 400m but soon one-paced.
No early pace and soon at rear but one-off. Taken out top of straight to make challenge but found nothing.
Flat-footed at start losing many lengths. Tailed field into straight and ran past beaten horses final stages.
Jumped well but soon in midfield. Was 8th into the straight but found nothing when asked and quickly tired.
Jumped awkwardly, unbalancing jockey. Ridden to make up lost ground along rail but soon ran out of steam.
Fractious before start but jumped with field. Slightly worse than midfield but wide to turn before slipping back.
Held up in midfield along the fence, found clear passage along inside passing 400M, responded well under pressure, got up just before the line.
Showed good early speed, emerged to a clear lead from 900M, kept finding when strongly challenged by rivals, drifted out under pressure final stages, lost out in a close finish.
Settled midfield, turned 3-wide rounding home turn, ran on well final 300M, nearest finish.
Tracked the pace, moved up to race alongside leader 350M, kept on under pressure, not beaten far.
Held up behind mid-division, barged through 350M, stayed on well, nearest finish.
Close up in 4th place, kept on final 400M but not pace to trouble leaders.
Held up midfield, gave limited response under light urging, never a threat to leaders. (Jockey questioned re his riding in the straight.)
Settled 3-wide behind midfield, pushed along 450M, kept on same pace.
Held up near the rear, switched away from fence 500M, finished the race off only fairly.
Up with early pace, pushed to a 3-wide spot nearing the home turn, found less than expected when put to pressure, checked 150M and faded.
In 5th place never far off from leaders, ran on same pace passing 400M, weakened final stages.
Slow to begin, 7-8Ls back in last, had little to offer passing 400M, never a factor.
Dropped back to near last, swung widest turning in, found little off the bridle.
Restrained early. Taken out 800m to improve position, held for run 400m to 300m before pushing through for easy win.
Lost considerable ground start but caught up at 800m. Improved round turn, checked at 200m but kept on strongly.
Held midfield spot early, shuffled back turn to be 11th into straight. Struck on nose 150m but finished strongly.
Unable to match early leader and held distant 2nd to straight. Looked a chance 200m out but then one-paced.
Midfield but one-off to 800m. Swung wide round turn and 6th into straight. Kept on to be closest at the finish.
Jockey unable to control tempo and held big early lead. Was still in front at the 200m but weakened under pressure.
Jumped well and soon in midfield along rails. Improved position round final turn and kept on steadily to the line.
Got fired up soon after start and severely checked 1400m dropping to near rear. Found nothing under hard riding.
Fourth early but slipped back slightly round turn. Looked chance entering straight but checked 300m and hung in.
Midfield early along rails, slipped back to near last entering straight. Kept on one-paced under hard riding.
Taken forward to be 3rd, one-off at the 800m. Closed in to 2nd top of straight but found little when asked and tired.
Failed to muster speed early, rolled forward but without cover at the 950m to be 4th into the straight before tiring.
Midfield and wide early before slipping back through field round final turn. No response when asked for effort.
Landed premium spot on leaders back, enjoyed nice run throughout despite decent speed, ideal run appeared turning and took over inside 200m, held off rivals well.
Positioned behind midfield 7-8Ls away in running line, aided by solid speed on, improved from 400m, did best work late closing to snare 2nd on line.
Took a position behind midfield 7Ls or so back on rails, saved ground on bend, in traffic and checked at 200m, chased hard when clear to take an unlucky 3rd.
Settled just in front of midfield 4Ls away in running line, ideal run tracking pace, looked a place chance at 300m but just held ground over concluding stages.

Taken down to rear from widest alley, raced on rails nearly 10ls back, made good ground along rails from 500m, never really saw daylight and not able to be tested, could have been a factor had a clearer run presented.
Went back as usual, settled nearly 10Ls away at rear racing two wide, well back turning, ran on well as he often does making many lengths to be nearest on line.
Pressed on in search of lead, did some work when unable to cross and kept pressure on leader, still shading inside horse at 400m, workload took toll and faded inside 200m.
Ridden a touch closer 4-5Ls back in midfield on rails, no excuses in run, in amongst horses early in straight and kept on ok before losing room final 100m and unable to get closer as a result.
Went forward to take up running, used up in dual with outside horse, still shaded at 400m, couldn't keep up effort inside 200m and dropped away late.
Raced 3 wide behind midfield, 6-7Ls back, had cover on circle, made some progress to 200m point when run ended.
Taken back from a tricky alley, raced 3 wide at rear 9Ls back, still well back to turn and came widest, closed off ok but just beat tiring horses.
Landed a midfield spot, enjoyed an easy time 5-6Ls back racing two wide, found nothing when run presented and lacked usual finish folding tamely in straight.
Posted 3 wide without cover in midfield, 5Ls away, always working to bend, soon struggling after hard run and dropped out.
Away well and landed a nice spot in 1 out 1 back spot, fair run despite decent speed, dropped away soon after turning in.

Broke well from the one draw, settled off the lead on rails in 4th or 3rd about 2L back, baulked in straight until produced for a run 200 M out, quickened well to win readily.
Began well, gradually settled 2-wide in 4th within 3L of pace, commenced move turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began moderately from the middle draw, soon took up running, led the field until overhauled over 150 M out.
Slightly slow out, trailed the strung-out field to straight, ran on down the centre of the track, nearest at finish.
Began fairly settling in midfield on rails, came under pressure turning for home, one-paced.
Remained wide after beginning from the widest gate, moved forward around stables bend to race 2-wide in 1L 2nd, similar into straight but faded gradually.
Towards the rear, failed to quicken under pressure in straight.
Mainly in midfield, found nothing under pressure in straight.
Never seen with in chance.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race 1 out 1 back after the 700m. Loomed up after the 200m had taken control of the race 100m from home.
Missed the start and settled last. Ridden along after the 600m and finished off strongly through the field in the straight.
Positioned midfield, 2 wide with cover. Ran on with some purpose.
Parked in 5th position, 1 off with cover. Ranged up after the furlong but peaked on its effort well short of the post.
Sent forward and crossed to lead on the paint near the 800m. Shared the lead after the 600m, kept up a sound gallop to the post.
Settled back in the field on the rails. Made reasonable ground in the home stretch.
Travelled worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Made some ground in the straight without threatening.
Eventually worked across and shared front running duties near the 700m, 2 deep, no cover. Faded after the 350m.
Was under pressure early in the race to maintain its position, behind midfield along the paint. Never got into the race and was beaten a long way from home.
Had every chance after box seating. Was under pressure turning for home and failed to respond.
Travelled with the backmakers, 2 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Settled midfield the fence. Gave ground early in the straight and struggled for the remainder of the event.
Hard ridden to led, driven 250M, battled on gamely and won by a neck.
Tracked the pace but trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, moved up closer to the leader 350M, had every possible chance to score however beaten by a neck.
Eased back, 5Ls off the pace 2 wide, dashed strongly, nearest finish.
Jumped awkwardly, hard ridden to park outside the leader, couldn't found any extra, just held ground in the straight.
Jumped fairly, pushed to take the box seat, kept on one pace.
Dropped to rear from a wide draw, 8Ls off the pace, switched to widest after straightening, made some ground.
Raced midfield, settled 4.5Ls off the pace 3 wide with cover, no progress.
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls off the pace 2 wide, no dash, weakened out over last furlong.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace on the fence, niggled along rounding the Home Turn, found nil and beaten over final furlong.
Eased back, 6.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, failed to make any impression in the straight.
Eased back, 6Ls off the pace, trapped 4 wide throughout with cover, struggled to run home.
Jumped smartly however failed to muster, trapped 4 wide throughout no cover, soon flattened after straightening, tailed out.
Smart break, settled midfield 1 off with cover 4L back, switched out for strong stretch drive, duelled for lead final 100m, on top at wire.
Fair break, trapped wide no cover midfield, progress 800m to press lead 4 wide final turn, nosed to lead for a stride close home, just beaten.
Good break, rousted to lay up 3 wide, progress to 2nd 1 off no cover 900m, led 350m, kicked for home, all out headed final 50m.
Taken behind at break, raced at tail of main group, 4L back widest final turn, solid closer centre track, failed to make frame.
Good start, raced rail 5th, vied for 3rd & switched 1 off final turn, every chance but one paced in run.
Tardy start, crept to midfield on rail, shuffled back 800m, stayed on soundly for home stretch gains.
Taken back at break to rail near rear, switched 1 off approaching final turn, hung out 200m, boxed on at one pace.
Smart break, snagged back to last trio, minor progress 4 wide 800m, driven into stretch, plugged on evenly.
Decent break, settled handy 1 off with cover, niggled 3rd 600m, driven home turn, weakened out in run.
Awkward break, slotted behind midfield 1 off, wide progress 800m, driven 5 deep home turn, struggled & faded out.
Lacked early pace & trapped wide no cover, dropped in 1 off near rear, switched 3 wide 800m, hard-ridden 400m, found nothing, eased when beaten.
Worked hard from gate, wide progress to lead 1200m, niggled & headed 350m, faded quickly for pressure.
Fast break, led early on rail, niggled & headed 1200m, 2L 5th when driven 800m, faded thereafter.
Slow start, hard-ridden early stages, soon at tail, driven & detached back stretch, soon tailed off.
Fast start, led on rail to 900m, sat close 2nd, regained lead 450m, kicked 4L clear in stretch for easy win.
Decent break, travelled smoothly on rail midfield, switched 1 off 600m, tight for room into stretch, quickened 200m, to 2nd 100m, well held.
Sharp break, rousted early, settled 3 wide no cover 3rd, driven & outpaced final turn, galloped evenly to wire.
Taken behind to tail 3 wide with cover, 6L back & forced wide final turn, closed out strongly, just missed frame.
Fair break, slotted midfield 1 off with cover, 3 wide into turn, driven & kept on at one pace.
Tardy break, recovered to lead 900m 1 off no cover, ridden & headed 450m, boxed on in 2nd until swamped 100m.
Taken back to last trio 1 off with cover, shifted out & shaken up 350m, bumped rival 300m, boxed on at same tempo.
Missed break, bustled early on rail, raced near tail, driven & switched out 200m, ran on at one pace.
Tardy start, bustled early, raced near rear 3 deep with cover, niggled 700m, wide into stretch, bumped 300m, plugged on tamely.
Awkward break, near rear early, rolled 3 wide to sit 6th no cover, 4 wide & driven into stretch, struggled in run to wire.
Fast start, rousted early to sit rail 2L back, driven 600m, found nothing & soon beaten.
Pace to race handy 1 off with cover, 4th & driven 450m, unable to quicken, fading out when shifted & eased 150m.
Pushed forward to cross, settled just off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed by the slow sectionals, kicked away 100M to score.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on well until 150M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Prominent, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, raced keenly, checked 700M, off the bridle 600M, raced flat until 200M to close off well for 3rd.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground.
Very slow away, 5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the slow tempo, bumped badly 700M, trapped 3 wide, ran on well until 100M flattened.
Settled in box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals, out of fuel 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no turn of foot.
Very slow away, at rear, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, hung out badly, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Lack early speed, 5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, tailed out.
Slow into stride, made ground back stretch along rails, found runs between horses in straight to win close home.
Punched forward from inside draw to hold box seat, moved up to 2nd entering straight and kept on to the line.
Pushed forward from wide draw, taken across horses to lead at the 800m, headed 200m but kept on well.
Taken back across runners at the start, was last around turn, widest into straight but finished strongly.
Hard ridden but couldn't muster speed and settled one-off behind midfield. Kept on to be nearest at finish.
Slow into stride, took off 800m to be 4th into straight, kept on until run ended at 200m and weakened.
Taken forward from inside draw but was kept one-off to turn, went wider entering straight but found little.
Taken forward after start to hold rail position three-back. Taken out entering straight to challenge but one-paced.
No early speed and held towards rear along fence. Caught flat-footed 400m before running past tired horses.
Taken forward to hold good position in midfield. Put under pressure 400m but failed to quicken and one-paced.
Jumped smartly to hold 3rd early and 4th into turn. Looked chance at the 400m but run ended 200m and weakened.
Taken to the front from inside draw but gave up lead at 800m. Was 2nd into straight but gave ground after that.
Slow into stride and soon at rear along rails. Improved slightly on straightening but no room to move forward from 150m.
Taken back soon after start, but held one-off to the turn. Improved position 400m but soon tired and weakened.
Dropped back to the rear, 10Ls off the pace in middle stages, switched wide 500M, picked up strongly, led 50M out and won going away.
Settled in 5th, travelled strongly and nicely positioned going into final 400M, took lead mid-straight, kept on but not pace of winner final stages.
Reserved behind midfield, saved ground along the fence, weaved through rivals to challenge inside 200M, stuck on well for 3rd.
Slow to begin, recovered to race in midfield, into clear 350M and ran on well.
Driven early, crossed to the lead 1300M and led at even pace, headed inside 300M, weakened.
Held up in midfield along the 2-path, came wide with his challenge 450M, briefly threatened mid-straight, outpaced final 150M.
Taken across behind leaders, Settled behind midfield along the 2-path, swung wide to make his challenge near 400M but made no real progress.
Sent forward chasing leaders, moved up to challenge 400M, had every hope, run ended 200M and weakened rapidly.
Slow to begin, held up near the rear, had plenty to do passing 400M but didn't enjoy the clearest passages in straight, never near leaders.
Broke well, restrained to sit in a position better than midfield, came under pressure halfway, soon beaten turning in.
Chased the pace, came under pressure 500M from home, stayed on same pace before dropping out 150M.
Lacked his usual early speed, raced in midfield 6Ls back, could not pick up inside 400M and was never going to trouble the leaders.
Settled in last 10Ls off the pace, detached from the field 600M and not responded to riding.
Worked to the front from widest barrier, tracked leader, dropped away rapidly inside 300M.

Never far off, ideally placed to strike turning in, responded well inside 300M, came through late and fended off the runner-up near the finish.
Up with early pace, tracked leaders turning for home, quickened up to lead near 150M, ran a bold race and was just being worn down near the finish.
Placed ahead of midfield, had every chance final 300M, stayed on evenly without getting to the first two.
In mid-division, saved ground on the inside, rallied and stayed on but no real threat to leaders.
Hard driven to share lead along the fence, could not sustain effort passing 200M, weakened.
Slow to begin, pushed along early to hold a midfield position, stayed on mildly final 300M and never a serious threat.
Shared lead on the outside, run ended mid-straight and weakened out of contention.
Dropped back to near last, made limited progress over final 300M, never a threat to leaders.
Settled in midfield 3-wide, had little to offer final 300M, eased towards the finish.
Towards the rear, failed to pick up turning for home, no impression.
Outpaced from the start, detached from the field 600M out, never a factor.
Sent forward but unable to cross, caught 3-wide without cover throughout, gave ground passing 400M.
Speared forward and made every post a winner. Cornered 2 lengths in front & kept up a good gallop right down the running.
Always maintained the 1 off line whilst travelling in 5th position, with cover. Had every hope.
Parked outside the leader in second position. Hung in under pressure in the straight, faded over the latter stages.
Bustled along early and enjoyed a nice run in the event stalking the leader. Maintained a reasonable gallop all the way down the running.
Slow to begin settling behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Worked home steadily.
Had cover on the circle, 3 deep, midfield. Maintained the same speed in the final stretch.
Travelled with the backmakers, on the rails. Made steady progress without threatening in the final stretch.
Raced towards the rear, along the paint with cover. Failed to close off.
Taken back from a wide gate and raced in last position along the paint. Kept whacking away at the same speed.
Travelled worse than midfield, 3 deep with cover. Came widest in the straight but only plugged away to the line.
Settled just off midfield, the fence had cover. Never found any extra in the home stretch.
Raced on the speed but was posted 3 deep without cover for the trip never likely.
Rolled forward to obtain the box seat, benefited by the soft sectionals, driven after turning in, won by a neck.
Raced midfield, 3.5Ls off the pace on the fence, finished off the race well when clear 250M, just missed by a neck.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader, peeled wide rounding the Home Turn, dashed on well to get 3rd.
Jumped slowly, dropped to the rear, 5.5Ls off the pace on the fence, stayed inside, closed to the line well.
Began awkwardly, trapped 3 wide without cover and moved forward to race alongside the leader 800M, under pressure 500M, kept on one pace only.
Eased back, 7Ls off the pace, ran on only fairly.
Raced midfield, 3Ls off the pace 2 wide with cover, made no impression after straightening.
Pushed forward to track behind the leader without cover throughout, weakened 250M.
Rolled forward to lead, flattened 250M.
Jumped slowly, struggled to hold its spot early, never looked competitive. (Questioned rider, see incident report.)
Broke with others, raced rail 5th, switched out final turn, not immediate gains, strong closer final 100m, swept to lead final strides.
Led from gate, taken to rail 1250m, shaken up final turn, battled to hold lead until headed final strides.
Smart break, bustled early to race handy on rail, settled 3rd 1 back, solid stretch run to maintain position.
Snagged back at break, raced near tail, advancing when off heels 800m, ran on well in stretch until close to heels late, just missed frame.
Taken behind at break to rail behind midfield, travelled smoothly until driven 300m, fair progress, off heels 100m, closed to wire.
Taken back at break, soon at tail, progress 7L back into final turn, ran on strongly until tight for room & not fully tested final 100m.
Sharp start, slotted 2nd 1 off no cover, driven final turn, all out when swamped 100m out.
Awkward break, camped 1 off near rear, switched 3 deep 900m, driven 600m, at tail turning in, kept on for modest gains.
Fair break, settled mid rank 1 off early, off heels & shuffled back 900m, plugged on at one pace in stretch.
Good start to press lead, settled 4th 1 off, over-raced into back stretch, under pressure 500m, found little & faded.
Pace to race handy early, slotted midfield 1 off, driven into final turn, soon beaten & weakened out.
Smart break but niggled early & trapped 3 wide no cover midfield, ridden under pressure 600m, struggled in run home.
Fast start, settled handy 3rd 1 off no cover, advanced to 2nd 600m, quickened to lead 250m, dominant at wire.
Fast start, settled fore of midfield 1 off with cover, off heels 800m, advanced on turn, quickened to 2nd 200m, kept on soundly thereafter.
Fast break, rousted to early lead, headed 900m, settled 2nd until shuffled 3rd & niggled 600m, battled on gamely to wire.
Broke well, camped 7th on rail, keen into 1st turn, switched 1 off 600m, 4L back widest into stretch, progress & driven 250m, run tapered late.
Broke with others, driven to 4th on rail, shuffled back 600m, driven on turn, one paced in run home.
Decent break, keen early fore of midfield, raced 3 deep no cover, driven into stretch, one-paced in run home.
Awkward start, raced last pair, niggled 600m, hard-ridden for modest stretch gains.
Fair break, whipped around field to lead 900m, 2L clear 600m, driven off final turn, unable to quicken, faded out.
Broke with others, bustled 1000m 1 off behind midfield, ridden 600m, shifted in on home turn, outpaced & struggled in run home.
Reared & lost ground start, raced at tail, bustled to close final turn, kept on at one-pace past beaten rivals.
Trapped wide at start & raced keen early, slotted 1 off near rear, driven wide final turn, never a factor.
Fair break, soon niggled near rear on rail, unbalanced & hit rail final turn, found nothing in stretch.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made steady ground 250M for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the fast pace along the fence, held up until straightening, just held ground when clear.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast pace, flattened 200M.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 6Ls off the leader at rear, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, ran on ok despite covering enormous ground at bends.
Rolled forward, 2.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, not suited by the fast pace, out of fuel 300M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, checked 500M, ran on ok.
Pushed forward, box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, weakened 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, never progress.
Pushed forward, led by 1.5Ls at fast sectionals, soon emptied 300M.
Hard ridden early, never kept up with the fast pace, trapped 4-5 wide throughout, faded 600M.
Taken across behind horses from wide draw, suited by fast pace and made ground along rails around turn, flew home.
Ridden hard to lead, was challenged around turn but kicked clear entering straight. Still clear 200m but run down final 100m.
Behind midfield but not far from leader, took closer order at turn, taken out 400m and kept on steadily to the line.
Taken forward from inside draw to hold box seat, 2nd into straight but unable improve under hard riding. One-paced.
Tightened early, travelled nicely back stretch and made ground. Taken out 400m but unable to get closer.
Taken back across horses after start, clear last to the straight, ran on steadily without looking a threat.
Pushed forward but kept wide and eased, continued to race wide and never threatened. Jockey blamed pre-start antics.
Taken forward from wide draw and kept 3-wide. Lost ground around final turn and faded from the 400m.
Ridden up early and kept wide entering turn. Taken out at the 400m but soon tired. Finished distressed.
Broke well form draw 1, shared lead at a steady tempo, kept on well final 300M and fended off the persistent 2nd.
Never far off from leaders, moved into contention 400M out, chased winner from 300M but was always held.
Settled behind midfield, stayed on well over final 300M, nearest finish.
Up with early pace, dropped to 5th passing 800M and urged along to maintain his position, did best work final 150M when clear run presented, nearest finish.
Always prominent outside leader, ran on same pace passing 300M, lost 3rd final stages.
Taken back from wide draw, settled 2-wide at the back, had 8Ls to make up passing 400M, finished fastest down outside, late impression.
Held up midfield along the fence, stayed on mildly.
Towards the rear, driven 300M out, limited progress.
Towards the rear along the 2-path, 7Ls from the pace passing 400M, found less than expected.
Never better than midfield, one paced passing 300M, faded final 150M.
Up with pace, unable to slot in and was 3-wide throughout, weakened turning for home. (Jockey advised not to cover unnecessary ground.)
Out the back, didn't travel at any stage, soon beaten.
No early pace. Behind midfield and one-off to straight, switched in 400m, changed course 200m, flew home.
Crowded start and well back early. Swung wide entering straight and ran home strongly down the centre of the track.
Made to work from inside draw to hold third along rails. Was 2nd at the 200m and going well before caught on line.
Midfield but wide early, kept wide round turn and into straight, started to lengthen at 200m and ran on well.
A little worse than midfield early, improved position along rails, kept on steadily to be closest at the finish.
Speared to the front on settling and had clear lead into turn. Led into straight but soon tired and knocked up.
Slow into stride but quickly made up ground to be 6th into turn, kept on steadily but checked 100m.
Unbalanced start but pushed forward to be 4th but three-wide into turn. Still there at the 400m but found little.
Hard ridden from wide draw to be 2nd early, then eased back to 4th to get cover. Taken wide 400m but soon tired.
Taken forward but wide early. Continued to race without cover turn, was 2nd into straight before tiring and slipping back.
Taken across behind runners at start but soon lost touch and tailed field to the straight. Never competitive.
Checked start, hard ridden but reluctant to move forward, awkward around turn and soon lost touch with field.
Landed a sot just off midfield, 5Ls or so away in running line, travelled strongly in run, produced a strong dash in straight to overhaul them and go on and score with some ease.

Jumped well and took hold to take a nice position in midfield 4-5Ls back, all favours with enough speed on in front, came with a well-timed run turning in but couldn't match acceleration of winner final 200m.
Positioned towards rear as usual, 7Ls or more away on rails, aided by strong tempo, well back turning, weaved between horses producing a strong finish in straight to nearly take 2nd.
Took a trail off pace 3-4Ls back on rails, enjoyed a quite trip to bend, gained inside run in straight and stuck on creditably to make frame.
Settled in a rearward position,6-7Ls back trailing eventual winner in running line, made run widest turning and kept closing strongly to just miss frame.
Taken back to last from widest gate, raced nearly 8Ls off speed but suited by solid tempo, took shortcuts turning and made strong progress along rails to final 200m to be nearest on line.
Drifted back to rear from a wide gate, 7Ls or more away at rear, came 3 wide on circle, made even pro9gress in run to line without ever threatening.
Landed a spot on rails just off midfield, 5Ls from top end, quiet time to bend, there to 200m but didn't finish off thereafter.
Broke well, took nice spot on leaders back, fair run despite strong speed on, still in mix to 200m but couldn't sustain effort and dropped out late.
Showed usual pace to take up running, pressured with attention from outside horse, niggled when shaded turning, peaked at 200m and weakened.
Rolled forward in search of front, travelled strongly as usual keeping pace genuine, shaded leader on bend, stopped quickly final 200m. (Blood in trachea.)
Displayed early speed, took up ideal spot 1 out 1 back, did some work with pace on, didn't let down when produced turning in and dropped out quickly. (Blood in trachea.)

Tracked leader on rails, soon led after straightening, drew clear to win readily.
Began well, gradually taken back to race in 5th mainly 3Ls off the pace, remained similar turning in, fought on steadily inside final 200 M to be nearest at finish.
Ridden positively from a wide gate to obtain midfield position in 6th just one off the rails, remained similar turning in, ran on steadily under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Towards the rear, saved ground on rails turning in, produced good late progress inside final 200 M.
Settled in rear of midfield on rails, ridden to keep up with quickened pace around the bend, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began moderately settling behind midfield, remained similar into straight, made steady late headway inside final 200 M.
Gradually moved forward to settle in 2L 4th, commenced move rounding home bend but could only keep on steadily at the same pace.
Jumped awkwardly, soon took up running and attempted to make all, headed under pressure 200 M out, folded up quickly.
Settled in last few, last into straight, ran past well-beaten horses under pressure in the run home.
Gradually improved from a wide gate to travel 2-wide in 1L 2nd, lost position turning in and soon weakened.
Settled well behind, never seen with a chance.
Tightened at start, remained well back before effort going up the Rock to be wide in rear of midfield around the bend, soon weakened in straight.
Made its run from last position after settling on the rails. Worked out into the middle of the track in the home stretch and quickened nicely to nab victory close to the wire.
Rated just off midfield the fence. Got a saloon passage in the home stretch & looked the likely winner near the 100m before being nailed close to the post.
Parked midfield, 2 deep with cover. Swung the home turn with only one wider and closed off soundly.

Ridden with purpose early but got a little keen near the 1000m after landing leaders back. Lost slight ground near the 500m when tightened for room, ridden along thereafter but only plugged away in the straight.
Led along the paint however never got much peace in the run. Had a 2 length margin at the furlong but faded over the latter stages and was just edged out of the frame.

Pulled hard when obtaining cover near the 1000m, behind the leaders. Shifted out soon after & sent forward, did plenty of work to cross & race as joint leader near the 600m, 1 off no cover. Battled away gamely despite the hard trip.
Prominent early, eventually travelling 3 back, 2 wide with cover after the 700m. Commenced to tire over the final 100m.
Couldn't match the early speed and drifted back to race worse than midfield 3 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Pressured early from the outside alley and covered plenty of ground throughout the early & middle stages. Settled 3-4 wide without cover after the 700m. Was gassed approaching the furlong.
Ridden forward but travelled keenly with the leading division. Was crossed after the 600m & coursed 1 out 1 back. Was a spent force early in the final stretch & gave ground quickly after the 150m.
Steadied soon after the start from a wide gate and taken back to settle at the rear of the field, 2 deep with cover. Struggled a long way from home.
Pushed along early but was trapped wide for most of the trip, although had some cover on the circle, whilst travelling behind midfield. Never a factor.
Jumped well, tracked behind the leader without cover, driven 350M, ran on well to score by a length.
Jumped well to take box seat, ran on well to get 2nd.
Settled worse than midfield, 4Ls behind the leader, dashed on well to claim 3rd.
Began slowly, soon ridden to occupy a handy spot, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, ridden rounding the Home Turn, stayed on gamely.
Jumped smartly and led by 1L, kept on one pace.
Jumped fairly, settled 3Ls behind the leader, interfered 700M and raced greenly throughout the race, ran on only fairly.
Camped handy, 3Ls off the pace 2 wide with cover, driven 350M, weakened over the last furlong.
Began slowly, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never ran on.
Dropped back from a wide gate, 5.5Ls off the pace, swung wide but made no impression in the straight.
Began fairly, 7Ls off the pace on the fence, never a factor.
Good break, challenged for early lead, squeezed out 1000m, raced handy 5th 1 off with cover, switched out final turn, sprinted clear 200m.
Fast break, raced 1 back on rail, inside run off home turn, quickened to 2nd 200m, no threat to winner.
Taken to tail at break, advanced 2 wide to 2nd last 800m, 6L back switched out final turn, ran on through field to nick 3rd at wire.
Tardy start, raced 3rd last, bustled 800m, ridden 500m, 5L back turning in, strong stretch run to narrowly miss frame.
Smart break, settled, midfield 1 off with cover, widest home turn, stayed on for late gains.
Sharp break to dispute lead on rail, led 800m, shaken up 300m, headed 200m, weakened thereafter.
Driven from gate, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, shifted in on home turn, stayed on for pressure, close to heels final 100m.
Fair break, trapped 3 deep no cover midfield, progress 800m, ridden 500m, boxed on one pace.
Rousted to dispute lead 1000m, settled close 2nd 1 off no cover, one-paced off final turn, weakened in run home.
Tardy start, niggled initially on rail behind midfield, minor progress into final turn, found nothing & faded out.
Raced last pair, to tail 800m, plugged on tamely in stretch.
Fast start to lead early, settled close 3rd 3 wide no cover, faded out in stretch.
Led at break, headed 1300m & sat 2nd on fence, closed on leader final turn, led 300m & kicked on to wire.
Good break, settled midfield on rail, shaken up 300m, quickened to 2nd 100m but unable to peg winner.
Bustled early strides, slotted midfield 1 off with cover, driven final turn, ran on soundly to grab 3rd late.
Pace to race handy early, settled 4th on rail, niggled 500m, driven 300m, one-paced 2nd at 200m but run tapered to wire.
Awkward at break, sat rail behind midfield, ridden 300m, ran on for decent gains.
Taken behind at break from wide gate, camped last pair 1 off with cover, 6L back switched widest home turn, closed out strongly.
Keen early stages, raced near rear 1 off with cover, driven 400m, stayed on evenly to wire.
Restrained to race at tail on rail, niggled 500m, ridden into home stretch, kept on same speed.
Snagged back & settled last trio on rail, off heels 1000m, hard-ridden 300m, unable to raise game.
Fair start, camped 1 off behind midfield, switched wide home turn, crowded 250m, plugged on same pace.
Smart break, raced 3rd 1 off no cover, niggled but every chance home turn, drifted in stretch & weakened right out.
Awkward break, rolled wide to lead 1300m, 3L clear back stretch, headed 300m, emptied out & eased when beaten.
Eased at start, trailing at rear until 800M to make an early and quick move, settled 2 wide in the lead 600M, benefited by the slow tempo, kicked away 250M to score.
Hard ridden to obtain a midfield spot, 4Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace, secured 2nd.
Hard ridden early along the fence but checked, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well for 3rd.
Eased back to rear for cover in 2 wide, made early and quick move 900M around the field, took rail and lead 600M, favoured by the slow sectionals, however flattened 200M.
Pushed early but checked, 5.5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, little dash when clear.
Eased back, 4Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, tried to move forward 700M, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, raced keenly as usual, ran on until 200M flattened.
Pushed forward to take rail, settled 2.5Ls in midfield, not suited by the slow pace, no kick, out of fuel 200M.
Pushed forward to take rail and lead, suited by the slow tempo, box seat 700M, weakened 250M.
Rolled forward, 1.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, emptied 400M.
Soon in fourth, one off with cover. Pushed forward at the 500m, took lead 150m, held off late challenge.
Behind midfield but along rails early, took closer order around turn, taken out straight and finished strongly.
Pushed to lead from good draw and set slow sectionals, was still ahead at 200m but unable hold off sweepers.
Taken back soon after start, taken out at 1300m, disappointed for run 400m, taken out and ran on well.
Difficult to settle soon after start and behind midfield to turn, switched out straight and kept on steadily.
Jumped smartly and soon fifth along rails. Held that position around turn and into straight but only one-paced.
Taken forward from inside draw and soon held box seat behind leader. Was second into straight but found little when asked.
No early speed and soon last along rail. Checked at 1000m and dropped back further. Ran past tired horses.
Pushed forward to hold rail from inside draw but over-raced and difficult to settle. Tired after entering straight.
No early speed and from wide draw was held three-wide for most of trip. Tired after entering straight and slipped back.
Travelled strongly in mid-division, responded well turning in, hit lead near 100M and was well on top at the line.
Settled in 4th position, 4-5Ls behind runaway leader, steady headway from 350M, looked a major threat mid-straight but was outpaced by the winner final 150M.
Taken back from wide barrier, settled near last 8-9Ls off the good pace, driven 400M out, did best work final 200M and got up for 3rd just before the line.
In 2nd place 3Ls behind runaway leader, headway passing 400M, briefly led mid-straight, headed inside 100M.
5Ls behind runway leader but held a prominent spot in the main group, kept up with the principals early straight, but flattened out nearing 100M.
Held up towards the rear, swung 3-wide for home, ran on steadily down outside.
Dropped back to the rear over 10Ls behind runaway leader, made steady progress final 300M without troubling the principals.
Held up near the rear, urged along inside 500M, outpaced by leaders final 200M.
Restrained at the back, over 8Ls to make up passing 400M but failed to make real progress.
Sped to a clear lead, weakened passing 400M, eased towards the line.
Held up behind mid-division but had little to offer when urged inside 300M.
Caught 3-wide without cover in midfield, faded early straight.

Made all, kept on well, pushed out.
Jumped fairly, always well there, unable to quicken to threaten.
Niggled along, always thereabouts, came under pressure 300 M out, kept on same pace without quickening.
Began awkwardly, settled just off the speed in 2L 6th, kept on same pace without quickening closing stages.
Well there, faded closing stages.
Began moderately, settled just off the pace in 2L 5th, one-paced under pressure.
Began moderately, always well behind, jockey said horse not stretching out.
Lacked any pace, soon dropped to tail end.
Showed good gate speed, found the fence after the 1000m and led. Made every post a winner thereafter and had the race in it keeping at the furlong, impressive debut.
Rated midfield, 4 deep, had cover. Swung the home bend widest and ran on soundly.
Camped 4th from the rear, 2-3 wide with cover. Came wide turning for home & closed off with plenty of determination.
Tracked the leader along the fence. Shifted out to race 1 off no cover after the 800m, settling in second position, kept on evenly in the straight.
Wide going into the first turn but managed to gain cover on the circle, 2-3 deep, slightly ahead of midfield. Kept battling away in the home straight.
Parked midfield, 2 deep with cover. Kept whacking away at the same pace all the way down the running.
Settled behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Kept on at the same speed in the run to the winning post.
Had every hope after settling 3 back the paint. Was a beaten horse at the furlong.
Raced just behind the speed, looked likely to settle 1 off but was carried out after the 700m, to race 3 deep no cover. Was under pressure early in the straight but failed to respond.
Crowded at the start settling towards the rear along the paint. Was dour in the home stretch.
Taken across behind runners shortly after the start and travelled at the rear of the field 2-3 wide with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Travelled in a rearward position 2-3 wide with cover. Made no impression when placed under pressure.
Slow to begin, slotting onto the running rail, midfield with cover. Shifted off near the 600m, racing in the 1 off line, struggled in the home stretch.
Posted for most of the trip, 4 deep without cover, while travelling behind the speed. Never likely.
Positively ridden early, prominent spot, responded well when asked for 450M.
Hard ridden early however failed to muster, dropped back to midfield 5Ls off the leader, trapped three wide without cover throughout, stormed home to get 2nd.
Settled worse than midfield, 6Ls behind the leader, trapped 3 wide with cover, peeled widest, dashed on well to claim 3rd.
Held the rail in the lead, demonstrate a good early speed, responded well when asked 350M, fought on gamely however run-ended in the last 100M.
Slow to begin, 6Ls off pace on the fence, switched to centre of the track, ran on ok, despite the horse laid in final furlong and proved difficult to ride.
Rolled forward, trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, finished off the race at one pace.
Hard ridden to take a cross and led but trapped 2 wide, weakened in the last furlong.
Midfield, 5Ls off pace, 2 wide with cover, no dash.
Midfield, trapped 3 wide with cover, closed off the race only fairly.
Slow to begin, soon ridden to take a midfield spot on the fence, stayed inside, ran on only fairly.
Dropped back from wide gate, settled 8Ls off pace, nothing to prove in the straight. (Questioned for disappointing performance, see incidents report.)
Failed to muster despite hard ridden along, 8Ls behind the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, unable to finish.
Midfield, 3Ls off pace 2 wide, under pressure 600M, weakened out badly. (Questioned for disappointing performance, see incidents report.)
At rear, 8Ls off pace, never ran on.
Speed at break, tracked pace 1 off with cover, shaken up turning in, dashed to lead 275m out, kicked on for determined win.
Bumped & unbalanced early strides, trapped 3 wide with cover fore of midfield, to 2nd 270m, pursued winner but always held.
Bustled early strides to sit midfield on rail, switched out 350m, quickened to 3rd 200m, closed out well.
Dropped in near rear 1 off with cover, switched out & driven 350m, closed out soundly.
Taken behind to rail at tail, 7L back & switched wide final turn, strong deep-closing run to wire.
Held up last pair 1 off with cover, 6L back when wide into stretch, sound inroads under strong stretch drive.
Contact & unbalanced at break, taken to race last trio on rail, switched out final turn, stayed on at same speed.
Slow start, recovered but trapped 3 deep with cover midfield, driven 4 wide home turn, plugged on one pace.
Good break, sat 1 back on rail, locked in at top of straight, pulled out 250m, found little, one-paced to wire.
Tardy start, raced 1 off with cover midfield, shaken up 350m, checked in run & shuffled back 300m, boxed on moderately.
Awkward start, keen early, sat rail behind midfield, ridden into stretch, outpaced, plugged on late past beaten rivals.
Fast start, trapped 3 wide close 3rd, driven but outpaced 400m, faded in run home.
Sharp start to dispute lead from wide gate, settled 1 off 2nd 1000m, pressed lead into stretch, swamped 200m, faded & hung to wire.
Speed at break to dispute lead, led outright 1000m, shaken up under siege 400m, headed 275m, weakened out & off heels late.
Held up at rear on rail, 7L back & shaken up into stretch, switched centre track 300m, stormed home to lead close home.
Speed to lead at break, raced 1 off, headed 500m, chased in 2nd, driven to front 150m, all out when headed final strides.
Fast start, edged to lead on rail 500m, shaken up 400m, headed 150m, rallied briefly but all out through final 100m.
Fast break, driven early from wide draw to sit 3rd 1 off with cover, driven 450m, stayed on evenly to just miss frame.
Fair break, over-raced backstretch, switched out & bumped final turn, head high & hung in stretch, made solid inroads to wire.
Good break, sat 1 off with cover, niggled in 6th 600m, driven & bumped on home turn, stayed on gamely without threatening.
Bustled at break, raced last pair wide with cover, niggled 600m, 8L back & taken wide home turn, closed out for solid gains.
Slow break, trapped wide no cover throughout, ridden 600m, boxed on late, closest at finish.
Fractious in stalls, bustled from gate to race midfield 3 wide with cover, shuffled back 900m, ridden 800m, stayed on for modest gains.
Good start, unable to slot & trapped wide with cover midfield, driven 600m, bumped final turn, hung under pressure, kept on one pace.
Tardy start, bustled early to track pace in 5th on rail, driven home turn, plugged on at one pace.
Missed kick, niggled early, sat 1 off near rear, shaken up 400m, unable to quicken, struggled in run home.
Fair break, trapped handy 4-wide no cover, to 3 deep 5th on top turn, bumped rival on home turn, found nothing & faded tamely.
Driven early strides, raced toward rear on rail, ridden 600m, outpaced & soon weakened in stretch.
Pushed forward, trapped 3 wide throughout but benefited, by the slow tempo, ran on strongly 300M to score.
Settled just behind the leaders 2 wide, dashed well 300M, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Hard ridden to hold the rail, shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M overhauled, just ran on for 3rd.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow temp, little dash 200M.
Eased to rear, 6Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
At back, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Hard ridden early, 3Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in final stages.
Hard ridden forward to cross, shared lead 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, soon out of fuel 300M.
Pushed early but not muster, 4.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 300M, held up and checked 200M, ran on fairly afterwards.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, however soon emptied 400M.
Pushed early but not muster, 4.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on ok.
Eased to rear, 7Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Out nicely and soon in box seat behind leading pair. Switched out entering straight and ran home strongly.
Hard ridden with whip from wide draw to lead clearly before turn. Well clear into straight but unable hold off winner. Kept on.
Not enough speed from inside draw and held one-wide towards the rear. Taken out at the 400m and finished off well.
No early speed but held rails. Took the turn awkwardly but did not leave rail. Kept on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Hard ridden from inside draw to hold rails before settling in 5th. Taken wide turning for home but only one-paced to line.
Pushed forward from wide draw but unable to get lead and eased off. 2nd into straight but found little under pressure.
Jumped well but unable to get in and kept wide without cover from 900m. Taken wider into straight but unable close gap.
Jumped with field but no early speed and slotted behind midfield. Wide for most of the trip and one-paced in straight.
Taken forward from good draw but soon in midfield with cover. Looked chance at 400m but found little when asked.
Tried to go forward but held out by inside horses and slipped back. Under pressure at 800m but did not respond.
Fractious in gate, snagged back after start to get rail but unable to improve position. Found nothing in straight.
Sent forward, travelled strongly behind leader making the turn, found clear run 350M, responded strongly to take lead near 150M, kept on well to maintain the advantage.
Placed in midfield along the 2-path, crept into contention passing 600M, accelerated to the lead 250M, was tackled by the winner and eventually outbattled over final 200M.
Settled near last, switched wide 450M, 6Ls to make up on leaders, finished fastest, nearest finish.
Held up behind mid-division, ran on nicely final 300M, good effort having been off the track for 9 months.
Chased the pace in early stages, within 3Ls of leader making the turn, stayed on evenly final 300M and narrowly missed out on 3rd.
Restrained in midfield, caught 3-wide early but able to slot in before the turn, responded well to riding early straight but could not sustain the effort final 100M.
Always prominent, alongside leader 450M, led briefly but was readily outpaced final 200M.
Dropped back to the rear as expected, switched widest turning for home, made limited progress from off the pace.
Never far off from the pace, held up to 300M but did not find much once a clear run presented, never able to challenge.
Guided to a 2-wide position towards the rear in early stages, did not travel well and had to be niggled along 600M out, kept on same pace in straight.
Never better than midfield, one paced throughout and not making any real progress in straight.
Blew the start, raced at the back about 10Ls off the leader, not quickened when placed under pressure passing 500M.
Up with early pace, emerged to lead from 1000M, run ended 300M out and weakened rapidly.
Tracked leaders 3-wide, left with no cover from 900M, dropped away rapidly passing 350M, eased.
Jumped well but taken out to be one-wide at midfield. Improved round turn and exploded in straight for easy win.
Awkward start but soon regained balance and tagged winner. Made bid at 400m but unable to narrow the gap.
Checked early but soon in good position three-back from leader. Taken to centre-field 400m and kept on well to the line.
Slow into stride but able to hold rail. Improved position round turn before being blocked for run. Ran on well when clear.
Snagged back after start, dropped further back at 800m, was last into the straight before running on steadily.
Pushed forward from wide draw but caught three-wide after that. Was 4th entering straight and kept on steadily to the line.
Pushed forward soon after the start, crossed to rail at 800m and led field into straight. Headed 200m out and tired.
Taken forward from wide draw but unable get in and eased to behind midfield. Widest into straight but found little when asked.
Tried to make full use of inside draw but unable match pace and eased to 4th at 800m. Still there at 300m before tiring.
No early pace and kept towards rear but two-wide. Taken out at turn to make challenge but found nothing under hard riding.
Taken across behind runners soon after start. Improved position round turn but tired after passing 300m.
Kept wide soon after the start and then went wider entering straight. Failed to respond to hard riding from the 400m.
Pushed forward from wide draw to challenge for early lead. Was 2nd round turn and into straight before slipping back.
Hard ridden from the start to be 3rd before the turn. Dropped to 4th at the 400m before weakening and dropping back.
Waited with, did not find much room early in straight, burst through to take charge passing 200 M for an impressive victory.
Blundered at start, soon taken back towards the rear, shifted out wide for a run entering straight, ran on well down the cetnre of the track but winner too strong.
Began well from a wide gate, settled just behind midfield 3-wide, commenced move entering straight, fought on steadily to hold slight chance over 200 M out, soon overhauled.
Began from a wide gate, soon taken back to race in rear, widest turning in, finished off race well down the centre of the track. (Jockey warned for his riding around the bend and early in straight.)
Jumped fairly, close up early, gradually shifted backward to forward of midfield, did not find much room on straightening, finished off race nicely but without threatening.
Settled in midfield, shifted wide into straight, ran home at the same pace.
Sluggish start, trailed the field to straight, saved ground turning for home, made up some late ground under pressure.
Began moderately, soon picked up along rails to 2L 4th, remained similar turning in, forced to switch in for a run 200 M out, one-paced.
Ridden positively after jump, soon took up running and obtained rails run holding narrow advantage to 300 M, folded up quickly.
Began fairly, soon came to join leaders out wide, similar turning in, dropped out tamely inside final 200 M.
Ridden early, settled just better than midfield 3-wide, found no cover around home bend, weakened 250 M out.
Well there to straight, weakened under pressure.
Moderate start, gradually settled in midfield on rails, denied a run early in straight until inside 300 M, badly checked 150 M out and never recovered.
Raced wide in midfield and refused to settle, gained closer order turning in, dropped away quickly on straightening. (Blood in trachea.)
Tracked leaders, came through a tight passage 300M out, kept on well and wrestled the lead inside 100M.
Held up midfield on the outside, travelled smoothly into contention inside 400M, led 250M but unable to hold off winner in closing stages.
Settled 2-wide behind midfield, had every chance in straight, took time to gather, did best work final 200M, nearest finish.
Not far off from leaders, held up to 300M but when once a clear run presented couldn't get closer to leaders.
Towards the rear early stages, caught very wide and strode forward near 1000M to join leaders, briefly led early straight, faded final 100M.
Held up behind midfield along the fence, ran on without threat to first three.
Dropped back to last 7Ls behind leader, taken wide passing 450M, had plenty to do before staying on well, without ever looking like reaching the leaders.
Held up 3-wide in mid-division, chased leaders from 400M but kept on same pace and found no extra to seriously challenge.
Slowly away, held up near last, driven from 450M, stayed on although never a threat to the principals.
Held up near the rear, stayed on only fairly and never looked like getting to the leaders.
Placed 2-wide in the group chasing the pace, kept on same pace final 300M, never able to challenge.
Crossed to the lead nearing 1000M, pressed by rivals turning for home, run ended 300M and weakened.
Towards the rear 3-wide, hung out making the turn, outpaced passing 450M, soon left behind.
Sent forward, pressed the pace from 1000M, weakened rapidly passing 300M.
