Broke well, settled one-out-one-back, strolled to lead over 300 M out, won unextended.
Began fairly, settled one-back on rails, baulked for a run early in straight, fought on steadily to reach 2nd inside 200 M, found winner too good but hung on well for the placing.
Ridden along just better than midfield in 6th on rails, saved ground turning for home, baulked and forced to switch out for a run 200 M out, produced good late impression closing stages.
Settled in rear of midfield, obtained a run inside final 300 M, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Raced wide in forward of midfield, fought on steadily in straight without threatening.
Shared pace to 300 M, faded gradually.
Jumped moderately, steadied and lost position early stages, raced behind midfield on rails, made steady headway down inside in straight, nearest at finish.
Soon taken back to race in rear, remained in last few, wide into straight, kept on steadily past beaten horses.
Began fairly, shared lead to straight, dropped out tamely. (Roarer.)
Settled at the back from a wide gate, trailed the field into straight, only ran past well-beaten horses.
Soon taken back from the widest gate racing wide and freely around the bend, made no show in straight.
Began well, with leaders and 3-wide without cover to straight, dropped out.
Managed to work its way forward to race outside the leader in 2nd position, 2 deep no cover. Hit the lead near the 400m, and managed to outstay other runners after being placed under heavy pressure.
Crowded at the start and made its run from last position after settling 2-3 deep with cover. Closed off strongly.
Never likely after being posted 3 deep without cover for most of the trip. Settled 3 pairs back, battled on gamely.
Raced behind midfield, 2-3 deep with cover. Swung the home bend widest a ran on well to fill the frame.
Had every possible hope travelling 1 out 1back. Stayed on soundly.
Checked at the start, settling just off midfield 3 deep with cover. Made good steady ground in the final stretch.
Camped midfield the fence, had cover. Kept whacking away evenly.
Slow to begin & settled towards the rear on the rails. Made some ground in the final stretch without threatening.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race, leaders back. Had every chance but was a beaten horse after the 400m.
Jumped well from a wide gate and settled 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Made no impression in the straight.
Settled worse than midfield the paint. Failed to quicken in the home stretch and only plodded to the line.
Sent forward and led along the fence. Faded approaching the 250m.
Settled in 2nd last position, close to the running rail. Failed to close off and was stopping a long way from home.
Travelled midfield, 1 off with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Rolled forward, shared the lead in the stand side, kicked clear 300M and scored by a half length.
Camped handy, settled 2Ls off in the middle of the track, driven 350M, dashed on strongly to claim 2nd.
Jumped well, settled 1L behind the leader in the middle of the track, fought on gamely over the final stages, however couldn't show any extra, hung on for third.
Rolled forward, crossed to the stand side and shared the lead, under pressure 400M, one paced, claimed a distant 4th.
Camped handy, settled 3Ls off the stand side, looked likely 450M however run-ended over the last furlong.
Began awkwardly, 5Ls off the stand side, made up some ground over the final stages.
Began fairly, 5Ls off the leader in the middle of the track, made minor ground.
Jumped slowly, 2Ls off the pace along the rail, under pressure near course proper, one-paced home, weakened 100M. (Questioned for performance, see incident report.)
Began awkwardly, travelled 7Ls off in the middle of the track, ran on only fairly.
Failed to muster speed despite hard ridden along early, 5.5Ls behind the leader, unable to quicken over the final stages.
Rolled forward, shared the lead along the rail, driven 600M, weakened 100M.
Raced Midfield, niggled along throughout the trip, soon flattened near course proper.
Camped handy, 5L off in the middle of the track, under pressure near 450M, soon dropped off and well beaten over the last furlong.
Always at rear, 6Ls off the leader, never a factor, tailed out.
Speed to lead on rail 1100m, shaken up in front 300m, ran on gamely for win.
Tardy start, driven to sit midfield 3 wide, steadied off heels 900m & shuffled back, driven wide home turn, closed out strongly centre track.
Missed break, recovered to midfield on rail, driven 4L back 400m, relentless rail run, closing but held at wire.
Smart start, covered 1 off midfield, bumped 900m, sound progress to wire, just missed frame.
Dropped behind from wide gate, rolled 3-deep to midfield, shifted in & bumped 900m, driven wide 430m, ran on gamely.
Slow start, to rail near rear, close to heels 800m, switched out & driven 400m, closed out for minor gains.
Driven break to contest lead, settled rail 3rd, shifted out & bumped rival final turn, boxed on to 2nd 350m, swamped final 100m.
Sharp break, soon outpaced & niggled midfield, progress to 5th on rail 700m, ridden into stretch, one-paced to wire.
Bustled early to race handy fore of midfield, driven to brief 3rd, under pressure when shifted & collided rival 150m, no extra.
Shifted & bumped at break, taken behind runners, steadied off heels 900m, raced wide near rear, plugged on for pressure.
Good start, raced 4th 1 off with cover, bumped home turn, weakening out when heavy contact & unbalanced 150m.
Taken behind at break, raced last pair 1 off, hard-ridden into stretch, never a factor.
Bumped start, soon at tail on rail, driven turning in, found nothing in run home.
Sharp start, bustled from wide gate to press lead in 2nd 1 off no cover, emptied turning in, faded right out.
Fair break to camp midfield on rail, shaken up 430m, rail run to lead final 100m, hung out in closing stages, just held on at wire.
Held up last trio 1 off with cover, switched wide 5L back final turn, determined run centre track, just failed.
Tardy & driven early, settled midfield 1 off, progress 3-wide on turn, driven to lead 200m, headed 100m, rallied but just failed.
Taken back from wide gate, raced 3 deep behind midfield, 4L back & ridden into final turn, strong run, missed frame in blanket finish.
Slow start, steadied off heels soon after, raced last pair on rail, 6L back & switched wide home turn, closed all the way to wire.
Bustled to dispute early lead, trapped wide no cover 3rd, driven 3-wide to contest lead 1000m, boxed on until no extra final 100m.
Decent break, settled 6th on rail, switched out & ridden into stretch, plugged on at same speed.
Outpaced at break, bustled on rail near rear, kept on evenly to wire.
Moderate break, raced 1off behind midfield, switched out & driven final turn, plugged on one pace.
Taken back at break, raced last pair 1 off, niggled at tail 700m, 7L down & widest into stretch, one-paced.
Fast start to lead, challenged 1000m, reasserted 700m, kicked clear into stretch, swamped 200m, faded.
Quick break, raced 4th on rail, switched out & driven final turn, unable to quicken, tapered out.
Bustled to contest early lead, sat 1 off no cover 2nd, slotted 3rd on rail 700m, weakened out from final turn.
Awkward break, rousted to sit 5th 1 off, weakened approaching home turn, tailed out.
Pushed early but failed to cross, soon eased back for cover, 6Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed strongly 300M to win by a narrow margin.
Pushed forward, sat just off the leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, led 400M, hung on well until last few strides, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Always at rear, 7.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated very strong finishing efforts 200M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M.
Hard ridden forward, just behind the leaders 2 wide, made early move 600M, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on well in the lead until 100M flattened.
Eased at start, 7.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Very slow away, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 300M.
Settled in front of midfield, 3Ls off the slow tempo on the fence, never progressed.
Trapped wide early, pushed forward to cross and led by 1L at slow sectionals, soon emptied 400M.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, trapped 3 wide, moved forward 800M, flattened 250M.
Very slow away, pushed to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
Jumped straight to front and soon 2L clear. Crossed towards outer rail, kicked clear 400m, hands and heels to the line.
Crowded start but quickly made up ground to be 4th, 2L behind leader. Was 2nd at 400m and kept on well to the post.
Quickly into stride, held 2nd to course proper 2L from winner, kept on well without threatening first two.
Hard ridden early to stay with field 4L back. Was still 3L back at the 400m before picking up and running home nicely.
Slow into stride and soon last 7L from leader. Made good ground 600m to 400m before running into restricted space.
No early speed and left out on wrong side of track. Moved closer to outer rail at the 400m but only one-paced final 200m.
No early speed but held rail 6L back. Dropped to last entering course proper before running on steadily to the line.
Got off OK but soon in midfield. Got within 3L of winner at the 400m but found little space and slipped back.
Pushed forward after start to be 2L from leader at the 800m. Hard ridden 400m but found nothing and one-paced.
No early speed and held out on wrong side of track to 400m, closed to within 3L of leader before tiring from 300m.
Unable to make use of good draw and soon near rear of field. Hard ridden from 400m but nothing in the tank.
Jumped smartly and soon in 2nd spot outside leader. Dropped to 5th at the 400m before tiring and slipping back.
Jumped OK but threw head around at the 800m and difficult to ride. Weakened soon after entering course proper.
One of the fastest away but soon racing on his own along inner rail. Found nothing under pressure and tailed off.
Held up near the rear, finished off strongly passing 400M, charged forward over final 150M to take the lead near the line.
Pressed leader, drew alongside 250M, responded well to lead near 100M, headed near finish.
Settled behind leaders, switched to challenge 350M out, ran on well and just missed out on 2nd place.
Led steadily, rallied inside 200M but unable to hold off challenges both side, faded final 100M.
Outpaced early stages, 6Ls back in last going into final 400M, stayed on well making good impression.
In midfield, chased leaders 400M out, no threat over final 200M but nevertheless a reasonable debut effort.
Badly crowded for room at the start, settled behind mid-division, made limited progress inside 400M, never a threat to leaders.
Settled just off the pace along the Stands' rail, outpaced final 300M.
Slow to begin, settled towards the rear, never a serious threat, ran past beaten runners only.
Behind midfield, not quickened when asked inside 400M, no impression.
In midfield, niggled along halfway, had no clear run until 250M, eased towards the line.
4Ls off the pace in midfield, one paced throughout, eased final 150M.
Up with early pace, outpaced by leaders halfway, weakened rapidly 200M.
Not far off in the first half, shifted out abruptly 600M out, lost ground and never recovered. (Jockey reported his saddle shifted.)
Bounded from the gates and soon 3rd, 2L from leader. Made ground round turn, hit front at 200m and pulled clear.
Awkward start and failed to settle till 1000m. Was 5L back entering straight before running home strongly.
Made good use of inside draw and soon in box seat in 4th place. Taken out 300m and kept on steadily to line.
Shuffled back after start to be 8th on rails by turn. Got close to heels 600m, but kept on well when clear.
Jumped OK and soon on his own in midfield, one-off. Taken out 400m and made ground to 200m, before one-paced.
Pushed forward soon after start but unable get in and taken to the front. Clear leader from 800m to 300m before tiring.
No early speed and taken back but 3-wide to turn. Taken further out at 400m but found little under pressure.
Taken back across runners soon after start to hold rail 9L from leader. Held rail to post without threatening.
Pushed to take lead but gave up position 800m to hold 2nd. Looked chance at 400m before weakening. Bled both nostrils.
Taken forward after start but held wide without cover. Was 3-wide round the turn. Found little under pressure.
Jumped nicely and quickly moved to rail 3L from leader. Taken out turn and made ground initially before tiring.
Difficult to settle and raced at the rear and wide for the most part. Found nothing when asked. Slight wound left fore.
Taken back across runners after start and soon 8L back and 2-wide at rear. Found nothing when asked.
Crowded at 1000m and soon towards rear. No response under hard riding and became tailed off. Had heart irregularity.
Showed early speed and pressed on to take up running, controlled afafirs from top end, kept them chasing from 400m and pulled out plenty to score with some in hand.
Even break, drove up to obtain a midfield spot on rails, 4Ls back, enjoyed an easy run to bend, gained inside runs at 300m, closed well despite running out of ground badly at 100m.
Angled into a spot behind midfield 5-6Ls back on rails, not asked in mid-section, kept progressing from turning in and worked into clear at 200m, closed race off nicely.
Dropped into ideal spot 1 out 1 back, enjoyed ideal trip to bend, made run out after leader and looked a place chance, peaked at 100m.
Away just fairly, drove up to sit 3Ls off pace, kept improving to be behind leader on turn, run presented but lacked dash final 250m and battled late (sore morning after).
Unable to slot in and raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 6Ls back to bend, came on steadily in straight to be closest at finish.
Out with rest, took a trail in midfield 4Ls back in running line, enjoyed easy journey to bend, peeled out and made a bid at 400n, flattened final 200m and didn't go on with it.
Taken back from a wide alley, settled at tail on rails 10ls back at rear, well back to bend, switched out wide in straight and made some ground without looking likely.
Snagged back and positioned 2 and 3 wide in rear division, 8Ls off lead, always well back to bend, made some minor progress widest in straight to be nearest on line.
Raced back with last few 8-9Ls back on rails, bit keen in middle stages, well back turning, no serious progress.
Bounced out to lead early, took and trail and came out to sit at leaders girth, right there to turn, struggling at 300m and steadily weakened out.
Moderately away, tucked into a 2 wide spot, just behind midfield, fair run 6Ls or so back, gained opportunity at 300m but was one paced to close.
Unable to slot in and raced 3 wide without cover in midfield, worked hard throughout, struggling same margin down to turn, folded soon after straightening.
Average jump, taken back to rear, best part of 10Ls away, angled wider turning in, made a brief bid but couldn't make any real headway.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Settled mainly in 5th just better than midfield, commenced run entering straight, ran on to hit front over100 M out, just held on to the line. (Blood in trachea.)
Settled behind midfield, saved ground turning in, ran home well to just fail to get up on line.
Broke well, settled in midfield, switched wide into home straight, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Began well, tracked pace-setter before taking lead at the Rock, held just over 1L advantage into straight, but unable to sustain effort and swamped inside final 100 M.
Settled well back, commenced move around the bend, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Never far off in 4th on rails, came to challenge in straight but badly squeezed 200 M out, made some late recovery inside final 100 M.
Settled 2-wide in 3rd within 3L of lead most of way, came under pressure turning in, kept on one-paced when squeezed 200 M out, made no further impression.
Settled worse than midfield, went widest into straight, kept on steadily down the centre of track.
Niggled along early, raced 3-wide prominently before taking up running turning into home straight the first time, led to 600 M, weakened under pressure 200 M out.
Always well behind, saved ground turning in, never seen with a chance.
Always in last few, saved ground turning for home, snuck up on rails early in straight to come within 2L of leader, folded up quickly inside final 200 M.
Settled in forward of midfield in muddling pace, swung wide into straight, soon faded.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race in fourth position on the fence, had cover. Peeled out on the home turn and had the race in its keeping 100m out.

Handed up the lead near the 800m, settling in second position on the rails. Got a nice cart into the race passing the 600m after being crossed by the leader. Was in front at the 200m but was unable to sustain its effort.
Settled mainly 1 out 1 back during the early to middle stages. Maintained a good gallop right to the wire.
Raced keenly whilst positioned midfield, 1 off with cover. Finished off soundly to make the frame.
Parked midfield the fence with cover. Kept on fairly in the final stretch.
Made its run from the rear after settling along the paint. Made some late ground without threatening.
Slow to begin then raced keenly in the middle stages whilst travelling 2 wide with cover, behind midfield. Made only slight ground over the final 150m.
Began awkwardly and settled with the backmakers along the paint. Worked home steadily after copping a check near the 200m.
Travelled towards the rear of the field, 2 deep with cover. Whacked away at the same speed in the run to the line.
Never likely after settling midfield 3 deep without cover after the 700m. Was running on empty over the concluding stages.
Began awkwardly then was taken back to settle in last position, 2 deep with cover. Made no impression in the home stretch.
Took up leading duties near the 800m, settling 1 off no cover. Skipped a length clear after the 600m, and dictated terms along the fence. Faded over the final furlong.
Jumped smartly, made all, scored comfortably by 2.5Ls.
Rolled forward to obtain box seat, ran on gradually to claim 2nd, winner too strong.
Began very awkwardly and lost considerable amount of ground, 8Ls behind the leader, swung wide and dashed on strongly to get 3rd.
Jumped only fairly, settled three back on the fence, stayed inside, ran on ok but without real threats, just missed 3rd. (Lost left front plate.)
Lacked pace early, 5.5Ls off the pace on the fence, make some ground when clear over the last furlong.
Camped handy 2 wide, had every possible chance after straightening, however failed to make any impression, kept on one pace.
Lacked any pace early, 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on fairly.
Jumped only fairly, settled midfield, 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, checked 600M, laid in early in the straight, ran on only fairly.
Rolled forward, parked outside the leader, flattened 250M.
Lacked early pace, travelled 4 wide throughout and 5Ls behind the leader, soon weakened after straightening.
Camped handy but travelled three wide without cover throughout, weakened badly soon after straightening.
Midfield, dropped badly rounding the Home Bend, tailed out. (Substantial amount of blood in the horse's trachea.)
Decent break from widest gate, trapped 3 wide behind midfield, 5L back widest final turn, swept late to lead at line.
Camped near rear on rail, 4L back & driven on straightening for home, surged to lead 50m, headed last stride.
Moderate break, raced 1 off behind midfield, driven 300m, stayed on determinedly through field to grab 3rd last strides.
Good break, tracked 1off 1 back in 3rd, ridden 200m, closed out same speed.
Rousted to sit 1 back on rail, driven to challenge 200m, unable to quicken, one-paced to wire.
Fast start, driven to dispute lead 1 off, narrow outright lead 600m, kicked on 350m, headed and swamped 100m.
Tardy start, rousted to fore of midfield 1 off with cover, driven final turn, ran on evenly.
Driven start, handy when off heels and lost ground 800m, recovered to rail 5th, switched out final turn, tight for room 250m, one-paced.
Sharp break, vied for lead on rail, settled close 2nd 600m, made challenge into stretch, faded out from 200m.
Raced 3 deep toward rear, to 1 off 600m, driven final turn, found little, never a factor.
Fair start, trapped fore of midfield wide no cover throughout, struggled in stretch run.
Missed break and bustled, remained a detached last throughout.
Sharpest at break, settled fore of midfield on rail, smooth progress final turn, led 220m, shot clear for commanding win.
Awkward break, camped last trio on rail, 6L back switched out home turn, ran on to grab 2nd on nod.
Driven to lead 1st turn 1off, to rail & pressed 800m, shaken up 400m, headed 220m, no extra, boxed on to wire.
Broke with others, snagged back to tail 1 off, wide advance 600m, 5L back widest final turn, solid closer, just missed frame.
Tardy start, raced behind midfield on rail, driven 300m, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Pace to dispute early lead on rail, settled 1 back 1000m, switched out and driven 400m, one-paced in run.
Smart start, midfield 1 off with cover, driven 300m, stayed on same speed to wire.
Driven early 3 deep midfield, rolled wide to vie for lead 1 off 800m, hard-ridden to challenge 300m, all out and weakened in run home.
Good break, trapped 3 wide with cover midfield, driven wide final turn, one-paced 150m when rider inadvertently struck rival and eased.
Awkward break, settled behind midfield 1 off with cover, tight for room in stretch, struck on head by rival's whip, unbalanced and eased.
Fair break, raced last trio 1 off, at tail when disappointed between horses and checked off heels 250m, unbalanced and eased.
Broke with others, handy 1 off with cover, firm drive 500m, faded in stretch.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, dashed well 300M to win by a narrow margin.
Settled in box seat, closed off strongly 300M, just beaten by a nose in 2nd.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, bumped 400M, just held ground for 3rd.
Hard ridden to cross in front, shared the lead 2 wide at good pace, dominated 300M, hung on until 100M flattened.
Bumped start, hard ridden to take rail and shared the lead at good pace, soon flattened 300M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace along the fence, just held ground in straight.
At back, 6Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on ok.
Bumped start, 6Ls off the good pace on the fence, ran on ok.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the good pace 2 wide, soon out of fuel 500M.
Pushed early but failed to cross, eased to midfield, still trapped 4 wide and lost significant amount of ground at bends, emptied in straight.
Slow away, trapped 3 wide throughout at rear, never closer.
Eased back, trapped 3 wide throughout, never a factor.
Taken back to get rail, improved back stretch and turn, still 6L back at 400m before finishing strongly.
Pushed to lead from wide draw, settled 2nd back stretch, closed in 400m, led 150m. Swamped by winner.
Made use of good draw to hold rails but 7L from leader. Closed in gradually to be closest at finish.
Jumped well to hold sixth, one-off and 6L from leader. Made ground steadily without threatening.
No early pace and soon at rear. Was 8L back at 400m but finished strongly final 200m.
Began OK and dropped into midfield, one-off. Wide into straight and kept on steadily to the line.
Slow into stride and then crowded out. Was 8L back and wide into straight but kept on one-paced.
Jumped well and soon 3rd, one-off. Caught flat-footed 600m but still 3rd before tiring 200m.
Set fast first section and clear leader. Took breather 800m, kicked 500m but running on empty at 200m.
Pushed through from inside draw to hold 3rd early, then 4th. Held rails after that but only one-paced.
Behind midfield soon after start. Closed slightly around turn but found nothing in straight.
Taken back across runners, last at 800m 10L from lead. Closed in slightly 800m but never likely.
Always prominent behind leaders, swiftly accelerated to lead 200M out, kept on well to hold off pursuers.
Travelled strongly just in behind pacesetters, came home well and was nearest at the finish.
Settled 2-wide in midfield, travelled well enough, held up early straight, clear 200M, stayed on to take modest 3rd.
Caught 3-wide without cover early stages, strode forward passing 1000M to join leader, kept on evenly final 300M.
Slotted into a 2-wide position behind midfield, took time to gather, switched out for clear run 150M, made steady late progress.
Dropped back to last, not helped by slow pace in middle stages, turned 3-wide 600M out, stayed on mildly.
Took them along slowly in early stages before being pressed by rival entering the back straight, headed inside 200M, weakened to 7th.
Held up towards the rear, overraced when pace slackened in middle stages, shifted out from rails for clear run early straight, ran on without threat.
Settled midfield along the fence, kept on same pace final 300M, never a serious threat.
Slow to begin, ended up in last pair 7Ls off leader, switched to outside nearing 400M, found less than expected.
Slow to begin, travelled 3-wide near the rear, never going the pace to challenge from 400M, eased.
In mid-division, caught 3-wide without cover from halfway, outpaced final 300M.

Made all, held 2L advantage at the 200 M before dying on its run close to home, just held on by the narrowest of margins.
Began well, settled in midfield, held up for a run until 200 M, finished off race well, just denied.
Travelled in last few, came to challenge down the centre of the track on straightening, did best work late.
Never far off near rails, switched out for a run turning in, quickened to look a good chance inside final 200 M but overhauled close to home.
Settled just better than midfield, kept on same pace without quickening.
Began fairly, gradually improved along rails to be close-up in 3rd, one-paced in straight.
Ridden along in rear of midfield, came under pressure on straightening, steadied 200 M out, finished off race nicely.
Drawn wide, remained wide in midfield to straight, ran home one-paced.
Raced wide behind midfield, ran home one-paced.
Travelled wide without cover in prominent 4th or 5th, found nothing under pressure inside final 250 M.
Well back, ran past well beaten horses in straight.
Drawn poorly, very sluggish at start, remained well behind to straight, kept on one pace.
Tardy start, ridden along to reach rear of midfield approaching home bend, inconvenienced and soon drifted backward, remained in last few thereafter.
Raced outside leader most of way to 300 M, folded up quickly.
Rated midfield, 2 deep with cover. Worked home strongly to have the race in its keeping 50m out.
Raced 3 back, 1 off with cover. Hit the front near the 100m but was nailed close to home.
Settled in second position, 1 off no cover. Assumed the lead approaching the 350, but its run ended 50m out.
Raced handy, 3 wide with cover on the circle. Stayed on well.
Camped behind midfield, 2-3 deep with cover. Made slight ground in the final stretch.
Parked midfield on the rails, had cover. Was a beaten horse 200m from the wire.
Raced 2 deep with cover, worse than midfield. Kept whacking away in the home straight.
Settled with the backmarkers, after having been steadied to avoid heels near the 1300m, trravelled 2-3 off with cover. Plodded home down the outside.
Had every chance after box seating. Commenced to tire near the furlong.
Blundered when crowded at the start, settling 2nd last along the fence. Passed a couple of tiring runners in the home straight.
Raced on the speed but posted 3 deep without cover. Faded in the run home.
Sent forward and led along the paint. Commenced to give ground quickly after the 250m.
Travelled worse than midfield the fence, had cover. Struggled in the home stretch.
Settled in last position close to the rail. Failed to pass another runner and finished well down the track.
Hampered at the start, settled 8Ls behind the leader on fence, switched to middle of the track, stormed home and scored.
Settled worse than midfield, 6Ls behind the leader 1 off, peeled wide, dashed on well to claim 2nd.
Rolled forward to occupy a handy spot, 2Ls off the pace 1 off, ridden rounding the Home Turn, stayed on gamely to get 3rd.
Camped handy, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, had every possible chance in the straight, however run-ended 150M, just missed 3rd.
Hampered at the start, settled 6Ls off the pace on the fence, stayed inside after straightening, ran on ok.
Failed to show early speed, dropped back to midfield, kept on one-pace.
Travelled midfield, 5Ls off the pace 1 off, switched to 3 wide 600M, one paced in the straight, weakened over the final stages.
Ridden forward to park outside the leader, kicked away after straightening, however weakened 150M. (Questioned for riding in the middle stages, see incident report.)
Taken back from a wide gate, settled 10Ls behind the leader on the fence, little dash.
Eased back, 6Ls behind the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, never ran on.
Eased back from a wide draw, 8Ls off the pace on the fence, never a factor.
Jumped well to take box seat, one-paced after straightening, flattened 250M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the pace on the fence, no progress after straightening, weakened over the last furlong.
Rolled forward and led on the fence, weakened badly after straightening, tailed out. (Unacceptable performance.)
Snagged back at break, raced 1 off near rear, keen & close to heels 900m, shifted & heavy contact 650m, shaken up 400m, ran on to lead at wire.
Bumped start, speed to settle 3rd 1 off with cover, to 2nd 850m, led turning in, kicked on 300m, headed last stride.
Smart start, snagged back to midfield 1 off, off heels & bumped 700m, shaken up 350m, closed soundly under strong drive.
Bumped start, settled fore of midfield 1 off with cover, driven on turn, to 2nd 300m, closed out at one pace.
Taken behind at break, camped rail at tail, checked 700m, switched out on turn 6L back, disappointed for run 350m, strong closer.
Raced last pair 1 off, impeded & stumbled 650m, driven 400m, kept on for minor gains.
Sharp start, raced handy 3 wide no cover, progress to brief 2nd 400m, run tapered.
Speed from gate, camped handy on rail, shuffled back on turn, switched out into stretch, stayed on evenly.
Driven at break, led 1200m, settled 1 back on rail 1100m, off heels 700m, steadied & disappointed for running 400m, shifted out & one-paced to wire.
Slow break, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, checked 700m, plugged on past beaten rivals.
Missed kick, recovered to rail midfield, steadied off heels & lost ground 700m, struggled in run home.
Fair start, raced 3 wide behind midfield, bumped & unbalanced 650m, found nothing in stretch run.
Good start, trapped 3 wide with cover midfield, bumped 700m, driven final turn, weakened out.
Sharp start, rousted to lay up, led & taken to rail 1100m, emptied turning in, faded in run home.
Speed to lead, snagged back & headed 1000m, settled 4th 1 off with cover, driven 430m, led 250m, in command at wire.
Bustled at break, settled fore of midfield on rail, switched out & quickened 400m, to 2nd 150m, closed well but always held.
Niggled from gate, settled last trio 1 off with cover, hard-ridden 8L back final turn, strong closer to grab 3rd on nod.
Fair break, raced midfield 1 off, switched out final turn, ran on gamely to 3rd 50m, lost place last stride.
Fair break, raced 5th 1 off with cover, shaken up & progress final turn, kept on at even speed.
Fast break, raced close up no cover, driven final turn, boxed on one pace.
Smart start, raced handy 1 back on rail, outpaced turning in, battled on same speed.
Fair start, travelled 3 deep behind midfield, driven 400m, stayed on evenly.
Taken behind at start, raced 3 deep last trio, driven 450m, widest into stretch, stayed on for modest gains.
Broke well, trapped 4 wide handy, driven to lead 1000m, settled on fence, kicked on 400m, headed 250m, weakened out.
Tardy break, raced 1 off near rear, reminders 900m, ridden 500m, produced little in straight.
Held up from gate, raced last trio on rail, driven 400m, tame effort, never a factor.
Missed break, recovered to midfield on rail, driven turning in, weakened out.
Fair start, raced midfield 3 deep, wide into stretch, beaten when crowded & steadied 300m, faded tamely.
Settled in prominent spot, favoured by the slow sectionals, closed off strongly to score.
Positive early, box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on strongly for 2nd.
Eased at start, took rail in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Parked just outside the leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, closed off strongly until 150M flattened.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, raced keenly, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 300M, run ended 100M.
Midfield early but trapped very wide, eased back to cross, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 250M.
Eased at start, took cover at rear, 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, held up 400M, dashed strongly when clear.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the leader on the rails, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, no turn of foot.
Pushed to lead on the fence, clocked advantageous slow sectionals, however weakened quickly 400M.
Eased at start, took rail at rear, 9Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
Eased to sit in midfield, not suited by the slow pace, never closer.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the slow tempo 2 wide, dropped off 400M.
Jumped well but soon caught 3 wide without cover, kept wide round turn but kept on strongly to win close home.
No early speed and 3.5L and 1 wide at 800m, improved slightly round turn, taken wide at 400m, ran on strongly.
Taken forward to sit 1 wide in 4th, made ground turn, taken out to challenge 400m, hit front 200m, but no extra.
No early speed and soon last 6L from leader, shifted out turn, was wide into straight but ran on strongly.
Near rear early along rail, taken out and improved position round turn, 3 wide into straight but kept on well.
Shaken up start and soon midfield along rail. Switched out 400m to make challenge but unable get closer.
Bustled up after the start to take lead by the 800m. Joined at the front 400m and found little under pressure.
Taken forward from inside draw to be 3rd along rail. Closed in around turn but challenge was short lived and tired.
Began awkwardly but pushed forward to sit outside leader at 800m and around turn, joint leader at 400m before tiring.
Taken back from wide draw. In last pair 7L from leader at 800m, last into straight and found nothing.
Gradually dropped back to the rear, 6Ls off the pace nearing the entrance of straight, closed off strongly when clear near 300M, got up last stride.
Held up 2-wide in midfield, put in a strong challenge final 200M, lost out in a 3-way photo.
Tracked leaders 2-wide, moved up alongside 250M, had a narrow lead inside 50M, caught by first two last stride.
Pressed the pace, responded well when asked, fought hard to maintain the lead 300-50M, faded final strides.
Dropped back from wide barrier, 7Ls back near the rear in middle stages, finished off well final 350M, nearest finish.
Held up in mid-division, saved ground along the inside, responded well early straight and loomed a threat at 300M, outpaced by leaders final stages.
Held up behind midfield, closed off steadily over final 300M.
Towards the rear in 11th place, had clear run from 400M but never the going the pace to challenge. (Blood in trachea.)
Never far off but raced 3-wide without cover for much of the way, one paced and weakened 200M.
Settled 3-wide in mid-division, found disappointingly little, eased final stages.
Dropped back and soon taken across to the fence, improved to a spot behind midfield going to the turn, found little when asked inside 400M.
Towards the rear, taken wide 450M, not quickened and never near leaders.
Tracked leader on the inside, soon beaten turning in, eased early.
Sent to the lead, led to 300M, weakened to last.
Caught wide after start and taken back 7L from leader. Suited by fast pace, made ground round turn, and finished strongly.
Slow to jump and steadied shortly after. Improved along rail to be midfield into turn, switched out 400m, joined leader 200m, kept on steadily.
Crowded start, with last trio 9L back into turn, switched out 400m and ran on well to the wire. Had substantial blood in trachea.
Taken back after start, was 9L and 2 wide entering final turn, shaken up 400m and made good ground to the wire.
Bustled forward from the start to sit clear 2nd back straight. Closed in turn, took lead 400m, joined by runner-up 200m, weakened.
Got fired up soon after start and threw up head several times before settling 5th, 4L from lead. Closed in around turn to looked a chance before tiring.
Taken back from wide draw and soon last 9L from leader. Still with last trio entering straight but kept on well to be closest at finish.
Taken forward from wide draw to hold 3rd before turn, shifted in 900m, threw out challenge 400m but run ended 200m.
No early speed and despite good draw was soon 9L from leader. Improved along rail round turn to get within 4L of lead, then one-paced.
Unable to keep up with early pace and soon in last trio, dropped to last entering straight, ran past tired horses.
Taken to the front from wide draw but refused to settle. Passed entering straight and slipped back gradually.
Made use of inside draw to sit 4th along rail. Was 5th into straight but found little under hard riding and dropped back.
Caught wide without cover for most of journey. Made ground around turn but soon struggling. Run was unacceptable.
Just behind midfield early and round turn before dropping back from 400m. Collapsed after race & retired.

Positioned ideally first horse behind leader on rails, enjoyed a soft run to turn with even tempo, came around them and sprinted strongly to gain an advantage, held 2nd comfortably over the concluding stages.
Landed a midfield position, raced 2 wide 4-5Ls back, fair run to bend, run presented and quickly issued a challenge, kept winner up to task although safely held final 100m.
Went back from a tricky alley, raced 3 wide at rear 6Ls or more away, even tempo not really to suit, in traffic until 250m, dashed home well when clear.
Settled just off midfield on rails, 5Ls off speed, used little in run and saved ground turning, found a clear passage after 300m and closed off well to make frame.
Positioned nicely in 1 out 1 back spot, all favours in run with steady tempo, closer enough turning and looked a place hope before weakening inside 200m.
Pressed forward to race outside the leader, aided by even tempo to bend, right there turning but couldn't offer any extra final 200m and dropped off.
Lacked early pace and raced 3 wide at rear 7Ls or so back, set a task when coming wider on bend, did close off evenly making good ground in straight.
Even break, settled off pace 4Ls back in running line, shifted 3 wide at 700m and made brief bid coming wider again turning in, made no impact in straight (see racing incidents).
Awkwardly away, assumed a role just behind midfield, 5-6Ls back in running line, made a run at 400m but unable to make much progress over concluding stages.
Tardy into stride, mustered to race 4Ls back on rails, enjoyed an easy trip to bend, soon niggled and lacked a pick-up, drifted out of calculations final 300m.
Ended up near to rear from a wide alley, raced 7-8Ls back at tail, made no serious progress and just battled away in home stretch.
Showed customary speed to take up running from wide gate, used a bit to be there but then controlled speed to suit, headed at 400m and soon gave in quickly, dropped right off late.
Settled next to last 7-8Ls back on rails, always at rear and only beat home a tired runner.
Drifted back to race 3 and 4 wide at rear, did share of work without cover, still 7-8Ls back turning, offered little from that point.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Given reminders early to take up running, soon joined and narrowly headed by DASHING ACE coming out of far side, re-gained advantage when the other horse weakened over 300 M out, never threatened.
Began fairly niggling along and given reminders on rails behind midfield, similar turning in, fought on steadily to claim 2nd late.
Jumped well settling in midfield, switched wide for a run turning into straight, fought on steadily to narrowly miss 2nd.
Began moderately travelling in last few, commenced move upon straightening, baulked early in straight but fought on nicely to be nearest at finish. (Questioned.)
Began fairly from a poor draw, ridden to dispute lead far side, set fast middle section holding narrow advantage around home bend, weakened under pressure out of contention inside final 300 M.
Niggling along in last few, remained similar turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Soon taken back to just worse than midfield, commenced move 3-wide around the bend, fought on steadily in straight past well-beaten runners.
Well behind, ran past well-beaten horses in closing stages.
Rear early, gradually picked up to race just better than midfield, yielded ground from around home bend, did nothing in straight.
Jumped moderately, ridden to gradually gain 1.5L 3rd briefly approaching home bend, weakened upon straightening.
Broke well, ridden along to hold prominent position out wide far side, faded out of contention into straight.
Prominent to straight, weakened under pressure inside final 300 M.
Camped in about 5th position, 3 deep no cover on the circle. Cruised to the front on straightening and lengthened nicely to record a convincing win.
Slow to begin, settling midfield, 2 deep with cover. Worked home nicely.
Made its run from back in the field, settling 3 deep with cover. Finished off well.
Parked behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Ran on soundly to finish in the frame.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled in last position, 2-3 wide with cover. Rattled home well.
Box seated approaching the 700m, then didn't negotiate the first turn properly and made contact with the rail. Retained its position, but never posed a serious threat.
Raced keenly in the early stages, eventually taking up a position 2 deep with cover, midfield. Whacked away at the same speed in the run to the line.
Settled worse than midfield on the rail, had cover. Made steady progress in the home straight without ever threatening.
Handy early, then was steadied to avoid heels at the 700m and lost some ground, settling midfield the fence, with cover. Failed to close off.
Speared forward and crossed to lead along the paint approaching the first turn. Faded easily passing the 200m.
Settled towards the tail of the field, 3 wide with cover. Struggled in the home stretch.
Travelled in 2nd position, 1 off no cover. Punctured early in the straight & was well beaten at the furlong.
Ridden hard to cross, made all, hung on for win.
Positively ridden to share the lead, had every possible chance after straightening however beaten by half length.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the pace 2 wide, switched to 3 wide 500M, closed to the line well.
Began fairly, detached in the early stages, 10Ls off the leader, ridden throughout the race, stayed inside and dashed on strongly however couldn't find a clear run over the last furlong.
Camped handy, trapped 3 wide with cover throughout, kept on one pace.
Rolled forward to take box seat, one paced in the straight, interfered over the final stages.
Began slowly, settled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on only fairly.
Eased back, 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide, peeled widest however ran on only fairly.
Began very awkwardly and lost considerable amount of ground, 6Ls behind the leader, never ran on.
Began fairly, 5Ls behind the leader, peeled wide however unable to quicken in the straight.
Jumped well however slow to muster early, 8Ls behind the leader, under pressure strongly 600M, never in a competitive position.
Began fairly, 9Ls behind the leader on the fence, never a factor.
Taken quickly to the front to set good pace, kicked clear entering final turn and never in danger after that, winning easily.
Eased back from wide draw, settled midfield 5L from lead, shuffled back into turn but picked up 400m and ran on steadily.
Pushed forward to hold 4th along rail to 1000m, took closer order back stretch, 2nd into straight but then one-paced.
Ridden to hold rail but not enough speed, dropped behind midfield. Shaken up 800m, 4th into straight, kept on one-paced.
Taken back after start, close to heels 1200m, hard ridden but little impact back straight and turn, doing best work final 200m.
Bungled start and soon last along rail. Remained at rear 9L from leader to 400m, before running past tired horses.
Hard ridden to go forward from wide draw, travelled well to 800m when bumped, hard ridden 600m failed to respond. Lame left fore.
Squeezed out start and soon in last pair along rail. Crowded 1200m, improved back stretch, shuffled back turn, one-paced 400m.
Taken forward from wide draw and soon in 3rd 2L back. Shifted in 1400m and lost position, hard ridden back stretch but made no headway. Weakened.
Worked early to get to midfield, checked 1400m, made ground back stretch and around turn, but no extra from 400m.
Ridden forward from wide draw but no early speed and drifted back. Held wide back stretch and turn, faded from 400m.
Shifted out start and hit another horse, dropped to midfield 8L adrift back stretch, shaken up turn but found nothing, weakened.
Slipped back after start and soon in last pair but wide. Dropped to last around turn and found nothing in straight.
Hard ridden from wide draw to get 3rd and then in box seat. Came off bridle 700m, drifted out turn, faded. Run unacceptable.
Broke well, settled midfield along rail. Suited by fast pace, closed in turn, taken out 300m and finished strongly.
Jumped with field but no speed and settled 8th 6L from lead. Suited by fast pace, closed in turn, taken wide at 200m and ran on well.
Jumped OK but caught wide, taken forward 800m but still wide without cover, kept working hard to the wire.
Pushed hard after start to hold rail, then eased to hold 2nd. Closed in gradually to share lead at 200m before run ended.
Checked soon after start and was 7L adrift by 800m. Made ground steadily from turn to be closest at the finish.
Hard ridden from start to go forward but caught wide. Restricted for room 600m, got clear entering straight, found little under pressure.
Jumped well but no early speed and soon in last pair but wide. Held position to straight before running past tired horses.
Set fast early pace and clear leader back stretch and around turn. Joined at the 200m before tiring. Substantial blood in trachea.
Failed to muster speed and soon at rear but wide. Crossed over to rail 800m but taken out straight. Found nothing under pressure.
Unable to use good inside draw and soon behind midfield along rail 5.5L from leader. Kept on one-paced without looking dangerous.
Taken back from wide draw and soon in last pair along rail. Never looked comfortable and never nearer.
Jumped nicely and soon in 5th along rail 3L from leader. Held position to 300m before weakening.
Pushed to hold the rail in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the slow pace, closed off strongly and drifted away 200M to score.
Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well in straight for 2nd.
Eased back, 4Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 250M for 3rd.
Hard ridden in majority of the race, outpaced early, improved along the back straight, 3Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, ran on well to the line.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 7Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M.
Eased at start to get cover at rear, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden to cross in front and took box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on until 200M flattened.
Settled in prominent spot 2 wide, enjoyed the slow tempo, hung out at home bends, ran on until 150M flattened.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to share the lead 2 wide at slow sectionals, ran on until 250M emptied.
Very slow away, took rail in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, no progress.
At back, 5.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, no dash.
Blundered start, pushed forward to take rail and shared the lead at slow sectionals, out of fuel 250M.
Never competitive at rear.
Jumped well and stalked early leaders to 800m, suited by pace, improved round turn, ran on strongly from 400m.
No early speed but found rail 4L from lead. Still 6th into straight before closing in strongly to the wire.
Couldn't go early pace and 4.5L from lead back stretch. Got head up 300m, bumped another runner, but closed off nicely.
Bungled start and last to 800m, improved along rail to be 8th around turn, finished strongly.
Hard ridden from wide draw to lead, harassed by another from 800m, still ahead 200m before weakening.
Shifted out start but recovered to hold 4th along rail. Hugged rail to 400m, switched out to challenge but one paced.
Hard ridden to hold rail before easing off to 3rd at 800m. Took closer order turn but soon running on empty.
No early speed and soon in last pair along rail. Improved slightly back stretch but found little from 400m.
Taken back from wide draw, with last pair but wide back stretch, switched out 400m, found nothing under pressure.
Pushed forward from wide draw to annoy early leader back stretch and final turn, tired from 400m and slipped back.
No early speed and caught wide without cover. Shaken up approaching final turn but little response.
Handy early but wide, hung out 700m and slipped back, was last around turn and soon lost touch.
Travelled strongly behind midfield, switched out to clear 250M, produced a powerful finish to take the lead inside 50M.
Chased leaders, kept on well under pressure turning in, briefly led near 50M but couldn't hold off fast finishing winner.
Held up behind midfield 2-wide, ran on well final 200M.
Sped to an uncontested lead, driven and hard pressed 250M, headed near 50M, faded final stages.
Towards the rear, 7Ls to make up passing 400M, took time to gather, did best work final 200M.
Blundered at the start, travelled 3-wide in midfield and no cover from 900M, stayed on final 300M, no threat to leaders final 100M.
Settled in 4th 3-4Ls back from the pace, kept on same pace in straight, no threat to leaders final 150M.
Placed near last, failed to pick up and ran past beaten runners only.
Held back in last 8Ls off the pace, not pace to challenge, never a factor.
Tracked leader, kept on until no extra and faded inside 150M.
Held up midfield, not going the pace to challenge, weakened inside 200M.
Dropped back to the rear, hung out making the turn for home, found nothing in straight, soon behind.

Began moderately, gradually recovered to track leader racing keenly at times, switched out for a run approaching home turn, fought on to get up passing 100 M.
Settled in last few, gained closer when pace slackened around the bend, baulked early in straight and switched out for a run inside 300 M, finished off race well.
Began nicely from a wide draw disputing lead around the bend, hit the front under pressure passing 300 M only to be headed 100 M out.
Jumped moderately, settled in midfield, snuck up on rails approaching home turn when pace slackened, kept on same pace in the run home.
Broke well from the one draw to lead, made narrow running to straight, swamped under pressure inside final 200 M.
Began fairly, soon taken back to just worse than midfield, travelled freely and wide around the bend when pace slackened, failed to quicken under pressure in straight.
Always well behind, widest runner turning in, made no impression in straight.
Began from the widest draw, travelled wide without cover throughout, midfield before shuffled backward around the bend, no further impression.
Slowly away, settled in rear on rails, saved ground turning in, found nothing in straight.
Jumped fairly, prominent early stages, raced ungenerously when 4th rounding home bend and lost position, faded in straight.
Parked in 2nd position, 1 off no cover. Took some time to fully wind up in the straight but got going over the concluding stages and grabbed victory near the line.
Sent forward crossed early and led on the fence. Was nabbed close to the winning post.
Bumped on a couple of occasions approaching the 800m, eventually settling on the rails, 3 back with cover. Kept up a good gallop right to the post.
Settled towards the rear from a wide alley, travelling 1 off with cover. Made good ground in the final stretch.
Had every chance after box seating. Held up close to the line when unable to secure clear running.
Hampered at the start, settling with the backmakers along the paint, had cover. Made steady progress down the running.
Raced close to midfield, 2 wide with cover. Loomed up near the furlong but ended its run well short of the finish.

Camped behind midfield the fence, with cover after losing slight ground near the first turn. Hard ridden from the 600m, worked home soundly but was unable to obtain clear running over the latter stages.
Posted 3 deep without cover on the speed, never a factor. Gave ground soon after straightening and only plodded to the line.
Was buffeted approaching the 800m, eventually settling 1 out 1 back. Briefly held up early in the straight, but didn't go on with it when into clear running and went to the line very one paced.
Settled from a wide gate in last position, 2 deep with cover. Failed to close off and finished well back.
Travelled 3 deep, midfield with cover. Was a beaten horse early in the straight and struggled thereafter.
Rolled forward, prominent, benefited by the very slow sectionals, battled on strongly over the last furlong, hung on for win by a neck.
Raced midfield, 6Ls off the pace 2 wide, despite hampered by the very slow tempo, dashed on strongly, just beaten by a neck.
Began very awkwardly, soon ridden to settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, dashed on well despite not suited by the very slow tempo.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace 2wide, hampered by the very slow pace, kept on one pace after straightening.
Raced Midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace on the fence, hampered by the very slow pace, couldn't find a clear run until 150M, made some late ground.
Eased back, travelled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on ok despite hampered by the very slow tempo.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader, swung widest, despite hampered by the very slow tempo, ran on ok.
Dropped back to rear, settled 10Ls behind the leader, hampered by the very slow sectionals, ran on only fairly.
Jumped awkwardly, settled 7Ls off the pace, hampered by the very slow tempo, swung wide, one paced home.
Jumped well to take box seat, suited by the very slow tempo, however couldn't find a clear run soon after straightening, kept on one pace.
Rolled forward and shared the lead, benefited by the slow tempo, however flattened 250M.
Settled worse than midfield, 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, hampered by the very slow tempo, peeled wide, no dash.
Jumped smartly, crossed from a wide gate to lead, suited by the very slow tempo, weakened 250M.
Eased back from wide gate, travelled 10Ls behind the leader on the fence, hampered by the very slow tempo, however never ran on.
Ridden out from gate to lead after 150m. Set decent pace to straight, felt for at 300m and kicked away for easy win.
Settled midfield but 3-wide, 3L from lead. Still wide but closed in turn, ran on well from 400m to be nearest at finish.
Caught wide behind midfield early, shuffled back turn, wide into straight but ran home well.
Taken forward soon after start to sit on leader's quarters to the straight. Hard ridden from 400m but unable close in.
First to jump, then 2nd after 150m and third by the turn. Still within range 300m but one-paced after that.
Jumped well to get second but unable hold place and slipped to 5th, 2L back and 2-wide. Still there 200m before weakening.
Beaten for speed and held wide without cover for most of the journey. Made some late ground.
Bumped after start but made ground to hold 7th, 4.5L from lead. Hugged rail round turn but found nothing from 400m.
Slow to jump and then bumped. Recovered to sit midfield, hung out turn, found nothing in straight and faded.
Shifted out start, settled behind midfield but wide, taken wider entering straight but then one-paced.
No early speed and soon in last pair, raced close to heels around turn and again 200m, weakened.
Difficult to settle after start and soon last. Got head up again entering turn and lost touch with field from 400m.
Slow to jump and then crowded out. In last pair to and around turn before drifting further back entering straight.
Bumped and unbalanced start but soon 4th but wide. Raced without cover after that and tired quickly from 300m.
Taken forward to 4th, 2L back and 1-off. Stalked leaders to straight, kicked ahead 200m and kept on steadily.
Slow into stride. Behind midfield 4L back round turn. Switched out 400m and ran home strongly.
Jumped nicely and soon in box seat behind leaders. Closed in steadily around turn, looked chance 300m but then one paced.
Taken quickly to the front from wide draw to set steady pace. Kept on well to 300m when found nothing under hard riding.
Taken forward soon after start but kept wide from 900m. Closed in on leaders to 300m after which one-paced to line.
Pushed forward but then settled 1L back and 1-off behind leader around turn and into straight. Kept on one-paced.
Soon in midfield sandwiched between two horses. Hard ridden from 400m but failed to make ground.
No early speed and soon 1-off toward rear. Made ground round turn, switched wide straight but no extra when asked.
Shifted out soon after start but soon handy though wide. Closed in on leading pack 400m but found little under pressure.
Taken back from wide draw and soon in last pair, 1-off. Got closer around turn, shaken up 400m but found nothing.
Jumped with field but kept wide and soon slipped back. Taken out 400m but unable to mount challenge and tired.
Fractious in gate and missed start. Made up lost ground to sit 5th around turn but did not respond from 400m and dropped back.
No early speed and slipped back to last pair at 800m. Shuffled back to last round turn and no response in straight.
Checked start. Ridden hard to hold rail but behind midfield to 800m. Was gone before entering straight.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at good pace, made all without much threats.
Settled in midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace along the fence, blocked 400, progressed steadily when clear, got 2nd.
Pressed forward, 2.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground for 3rd.
Slow away, took rail behind midfield, 6Ls off the good pace, held up 4-2, made good ground when clear, checked 100M.
Eased back, 8Ls off the good pace 3 wide, made steady ground 250M.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, pace good, flattened 250M.
Settled just off the leader 2 wide, pace good, out of fuel 200M.
Slow away, pushed to obtain a midfield spot, 4Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no progress in straight.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 7.5Ls off the good pace, ran on fairly in final stages.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no turn of foot in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace 3 wide, soon weakened 300M.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, bumped 400M, no progress.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the good pace, trapped 4 wide no cover throughout, emptied 300M.
Eased to rear, trapped 3-4 wide, never competitive.
Taken back from wide draw. Last back stretch and entering straight, took run between horses, bumped 300m, ran on strongly.
Held rail in midfield soon after start, close to heels entering turn, came off fence 500m, close to heels 400m, ran on strongly when clear.
Midfield 4L behind leader and 2-wide. Kicked entering straight to lead at 200m, battled on well to the line.
Bumped start and taken back to sit outside eventual winner at rear. Pulled out to make run 400m, got head in front momentarily before run ended.
No early speed and towards rear 6L back. Closed in turn, switched out 400m, bumped 300m, kept on steadily.
Fractious before start but jumped OK. Behind midfield back stretch and turn, shaken up and closed in 200m but no extra.
Pushed up early and soon 2nd before easing to 5th, 3L back. Taken out 400m, looked chance before run ended 200m.
Taken forward from inside draw to lead round first turn before settling 3rd, 1.5L back at 1200m. Remained on rail to straight, one-paced.
Pushed forward from start to hold 4th but wide without cover. Covered extra ground round both turns, tired from 400m.
Ridden up to 4th early, moved to 2nd but wide along back stretch. Got close to heels at 400m before tiring.
Hard ridden from inside draw to hold 3rd early, before settling 6th, 3L from lead. Steadied 250m and weakened.
Hard ridden from start to hold 2nd round first turn. Took over lead back stretch and set good pace to straight before tiring.
Settled midfield, picked up strongly passing 350M, accelerated to the lead mid-straight, kept on resolutely to the line and won it comfortably with blinkers applied first time.
Held up midfield along the 2-path, travelled well enough, driven near 300M, ran on to challenge winner final 200M but was readily held.
Pressed leader, lacked winner's acceleration but stayed on well to go 3rd 100M from the line.
Tracked leader along the inside, kept on steadily down the fence over final 400M, good effort against much higher rated opposition.
Towards the rear, stayed on without threatening to go 5th near the line.
Tracked leaders, driven inside 450M, kept on same pace final 300M.
Led steadily, headed 200M, weakened and no extra final stages.
Towards the rear, lacked pace to seriously challenge, stayed on same pace to the line.
On the outside of the rear pair, taken wide to challenge near 400M, made limited progress on leaders.
On the inside of the rear pair, outpaced nearing 300M, soon behind.
Got away OK, held in midfield one-off to turn. Shaken up 400m, took lead 200m, kept on well to the line.
A little slow and soon 6L from lead. Took closer order turn, wide into straight, ran on strongly to just miss.
Jumped well to hold 5th along rail, closed in around turn, held for run early in straight, kept on well when clear.
Pushed along from wide draw and managed to slot in nicely before turn, switched to middle of track and ran on nicely.
Slow and crowded out shortly after start to be 5.5L back at 800m. Improved turn, held up 400m, ran on well when clear.
Jumped well, 2nd early, eased to 4th one-off. Third into straight, almost level 200m before run ended. Blood in trachea.
Not much early pace and held in midfied early. Close in to within 2L of leader at 200m before tiring.
Caught wide soon after start and raced without cover for most of trip. Shaken up 400m but found little and weakened.
No early pace and toward rear 4.5L from lead. Stuck to rail round turn but found nothing when put under pressure 400m.
Taken back from wide draw and soon in last pair but wide. Put under pressure turn but made little headway. One paced.
Didn't jump all that well but mustered speed quickly to lead before 800m. Led field into straight but gave up from 300m.
Taken back from wide draw and last early, Made ground round turn but tired soon after entering straight and slipped back.
Taken forward from wide draw to be 3rd but kept wide and without cover. Kept on till 200m before tiring.
First to move but dropped to 2nd before turn. Got level with leader 400m but ran out of steam and weakened quickly.
Pressed on from a wide gate, crossed to sit outside leader, ideal run on speed, eyeballed leader turning and went 1L clear, dug in strongly last 200m to hold on.
Lacked early speed, raced 5-6Ls back on rails, not used to bend, took inside runs saving ground, finished strongly along rails to just miss out.
Drifted back to settle a touch worse than midfield , 5-6Ls lengths back, not helped by standard tempo, came wide and unwound with a strong dash charging late to go down in a 3 way go.
Even getaway, sat just off pace 3Ls back, was difficult to settle and ended up in two wide line, produced for effort at 300m and closed off strongly just missing a place narrowly.
Taken back from a tricky gate, settled at rear 6-7Ls back, still well back turning and in traffic, made run through horses and held up at 200m, charged late when clear and unlucky not to be closer.
Landed nice spot 4Ls away on rails, quiet time in mid-section, weaved passage clear at 250m and kept closing before being short of room late.
Took an ideal trail behind leader, enjoyed at easy time with even sections throughout, right there turning but just kept on behind them in straight to be not far away but never looked likely.
Landed a midfield role, 4Ls or so back in 2 wide line, enjoyed a quite trip to bend, came wider and made some moderate headway without threatening.
Went forward from wide gate, used a little to obtain a 1 out 1 back spot, all favours thereafter, right there turning but didn't find a great deal and folded final 200m.
Unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover. Worked throughout, struggling turning and dropped off in straight.
Ended up well back from a wide alley, raced at rear 6 to 7Ls back, shared rear to bend and made no serious progress in straight.
Showed early speed to take up running, set standard sections in front, worried by outside horse on bend, soon headed and dropped off.
Standard jump and unable to muster, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield 4-5Ls back, niggled turning and didn't show much pickup in straight.
No pace, ended up 3 wide at rear, best part of 7Ls back, still last and came wider turning, no real progress.
Began with purposed, soon lead from wide gate, controlled affairs in front, dashed away soon after turning in and put a space on rivals showing no signs of stopping to score easily.
Took ideal trail on leaders back, fair run throughout, right there turning but unable to match dash of winner, stayed on bravely beating rest by a fair way.
Moderate jump, mustered to race in midfield on rails, not asked to turn, kept on steadily along fence no match for first two.
Pressed on to race outside leader, kind trip to turn, unable to dash when they sprinted, battled away fairly to make frame.
Ended up 4-5Ls back on rails just off midfield, quiet trip to bend, didn't have much room until 200m however passed a few when n clear.
Ended up near to rear from outside gate, 6-7Ls back in two wide line, gave away a fair start turning but managed to make some progress to finish best of rest.
Restrained to race at tail, 6-7Ls back on rails, always at rear to turn, ,made some good progress along inside in straight to be nearest at finish.
Landed an ideal spot 1 out 1 back, sat behind pace pair to turn, switched out but didn't offer a dash and just maintained same speed in run to line.
Pressed forward but unable to slot in, raced 3 wide without cover in middle stages, 2Ls down turning but workload took toll and faded out.
Sat behind midfield 5-6Ls back in running line, same margin back to turn, came wider but didn't finish off passing only tired runners late.
No early pace, raced 3 wide in midfield 5Ls back, did have cover to bend, struggled in home straight and weakened out.
Restrained form a tricky gate raced 3 wide at rear 6Ls ort so back, swung very wide into straight, never really got into it.
Trapped 4 wide in midfield from outside improved on bend but always working without cover, folded in straight when run took toll.
