Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began from a wide gate, held prominent positions when wide down far side, gradually crossed to gain slender advantage coming out of back straight, stuck on under pressure.
Broke well in lead early settling just off the pace in 3rd on rails, switched out to challenge inside final 300 M, ran on to just fail to get up on line.
Ridden early settling in 5th within 3L of pace on rails, shifted out for a run entering straight, tightened 250 M out, finished off race well.
Ridden for speed early and soon gained narrow lead, just headed onto home bend, fought on under pressure upon straightening only to be swamped for a placing close to home.
Began moderately, improved gradually under intermittent reminders to reach midfield approaching home bend, saved ground on rails turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Not far off in 6th far side, similar turning in, ran home one-paced.
Settled in midfield, steadied over 800 M out and failed to settle far side, behind midfield into straight, ran home one-paced.
Trailed the field to straight, saved ground turning in, went past only well-beaten runners.
Settled in rear, saved ground turning in, ran home one-paced.
Settled well back in 10th, saved ground turning for home, ran home one-paced.
Settled in 4th within 3L of pace, dropped away quickly inside final 200 M. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Drawn poorly, soon dropped to last few, never a danger.
Effectively raced 1 out 1 back. Responded well to hard riding and had the race in its keeping 150m from home.
Camped 3 back the fence with cover. Closed off well.
Enjoyed the run of the race in the box seat. Had every chance, kept on soundly in the run to the finish.
Parked in midfield, 2 wide with cover. Peeled out rounding the home turn and started to work home before ending its run well short of the line.
Settled outside the leader, second position, no cover. Was in front at the furlong but faded passing the 100m.
Began awkwardly & travelled on the fence. Made some ground in the home straight before peaking on its run 100m from the winning post.
Settled with the backmakers on the rails. Closed off fairly but was unable to secure clear running close to the wire.
Was prominent early then drifted back in an attempt to find cover. Unable to take up a trailing position and was posted 3 deep behind midfield for most of the trip. Not a factor.
Failed to muster early, settling worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Travelled 1 off towards the rear of the field, had cover. Failed to close off.
Settled in last position on the rails. Struggled in the home straight.
Ridden aggressively early, crossed and led along the paint near the 1200m. Compounded in the final stretch.
Settled worse than midfield, 6.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, dashed home strongly over the last furlong and scored by half length.
Rolled forward to 3rd, settled 4Ls behind the leader, closed in steadily rounding the Home Turn, looked likely in the straight however winner too strong.
Rolled forward to 4th, 4.5Ls off the pace on the fence, switched to centre of the track, stayed on gamely to get 3rd.
Ridden hard to lead by 2.5Ls, kicked 3Ls away after straightening, however weakened over the last furlong, just hung on for 4th.
Broke slowly, eased back from a wide draw, settled 7.5Ls behind the leader on the fence, ran on ok, just missed 4th.
Eased back, 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, made some ground in the straight.
Failed to muster early, travelled 3 wide throughout without cover, 7.5Ls off the pace, kept on one pace.
Raced midfield, 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, struggled 600M, one paced to conclude.
Dropped back to rear from a wide draw, settled 10Ls behind the leader, swung widest, ran on only fairly.
Jumped fairly, eased back, trapped 3 wide throughout with cover, 9Ls behind the leader, never a factor.
Began moderately, settled 6.5Ls off the pace on the fence, stayed inside, never ran on.
Rolled forward, settled 2.5Ls behind the leader, flattened after straightening, tailed out.
Ridden to hold ground after start before settling 2nd, 1L from lead. Shaken up 400m and under whip 200m to get up close to the line.
Taken quickly to the front to set steady pace round turn. Tried to kick away 400m and still clear leader 200m before being run down.
Slow to jump but ridden hard to quickly make up ground. Settled 3rd 1.5L from leader, hard ridden from 400m to be closest at finish.
No early speed and held 3-wide towards rear. Had little room 1000m and dropped to 9th before turn. Came wide into straight and ran on steadily.
Got off OK and soon in midfield 3-back the fence. Held that position to straight, switched out to challenge but only one-paced to line. Lost left hind plate.
Slow to muster and behind midfield to turn about 4.5L from leader. Took inside path after hitting straight and kept on one-paced.
Steadied shortly after start, stayed at rear along fence 6L from lead, kept on steadily in straight to be closest at the finish.
Began awkwardly but ridden up to make ground. Caught wide around turn and into straight, then one-paced.
Taken back across horses to be in last pair but one-off back stretch. Got head up 600m and dropped to last around turn, ran past tired horses.
Taken forward soon after start but caught four-wide after which raced without cover. Fourth into straight before tiring.
No early pace and in last pair along rails. Dropped to last entering straight and gradually slipped further back. Bled from both nostrils.
Jumped OK and taken forward to hold 5th along rails. Lost position around turn and faded quickly after entering straight.
Ridden out from the start but wide round first turn before cutting 1200m. Set good pace back stretch and around turn, kicked clear 400m and then never in danger.
Took lead from start and into stable bend before easing off to hold 3rd, 2L from leader. Closed in briefly 400m out but unable to make ground on winner. Held on well closing stages.
Soon in midfield 3L from leader along fence. Closed in slightly around turn, kept on steadily in straight without looking like catching first two.
Tightened start and dropped back. Cut in towards rail but in last pair around turn. Made ground along fence in straight to be closest at the finish.
Caught wide when taken forward and then hard ridden from 800m to keep in touch. Wide into straight but kept on under hard riding to the post.
Jumped OK but checked round first turn, shifted out entering back stretch and checked again 800m. Blundered around final turn, bumped and unbalanced 250m. Kept on one-paced.
A little slow to move, taken back from wide draw before slotting closer to fence back stretch. Made up some ground around turn to be closest at 400m before turning one-paced.
Hard ridden from start but unable to muster speed and caught wide 3.5L from lead. Kept wide around turn and into straight, became unbalanced 250m when only one-paced.
Ridden forward from inside draw but over-raced stable bend. Still in contention turn and into straight before tiring and slipping back.
Hard ridden from start but unable to muster speed and dropped to rear 5.5L from leader. Remained at rear, wide into straight, found nothing when asked.
Soon in last pair, one-off. Dropped to last entering turn, taken wide entering straight, checked 250m and one-paced after that.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit outside leader stable bend. Cut in to rail back stretch and held 2nd to turn when shifted out and dropped to 3rd. Faded quickly in straight.
Eased at start to take rail behind the field, settled 3.5Ls off the leaders, benefited by the fast pace and the rail-run, made steady ground 300M to score by a short head.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Pushed early but not muster, eased back for cover, 5Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, made steady ground 250M for 3rd.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, just held ground in straight.
Pushed forward to share the lead on the fence, clocked fast sectionals, ran on until 150M flattened.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, ran on fairly in straight.
Eased to sit 2Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the fast pace, weakened 200M.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, however no progress.
Pushed forward, shared the lead 2 wide and clocked fast sectionals, soon emptied 300M.
Never a factor at rear.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, harmed by the fast pace, dropped off quickly 500M.
Trapped 3 wide throughout in midfield, faded badly 600M, tailed out.
Jumped well and soon in box seat behind leader. Moved up to 2nd around turn, ran on strongly to take lead 100m before pulling away.
No early speed but held rail 3L from leader. Put under pressure 600m, making ground steadily along rail to be closest at the finish.
Jumped well and taken forward to sit 4th but wide along back stretch. Put under pressure 400m to hit 2nd at 200m before run ended.
Moved quickly from inside draw to lead back stretch and around turn. Tried to kick away 400m but caught 150m after which one-paced.
Badly crowded out start but ridden hard to make up lost ground to sit 2nd at 800m. Dropped back to 3rd around turn, one-paced in straight.
Taken back from start to get rail position 4.5L from lead. Made ground around turn to get within 3.5L of leader but then one-paced.
Taken forward from start but over-raced and caught wide. Found cover around turn but found little under pressure in straight.
Taken back from wide draw but held wide initially, before getting closer to rail entering turn. Shaken up 400m but only plodded to line.
Checked soon after start and dropped back 7L from leader. Made up some ground before turn but limited response final 400m.
Taken forward from wide draw but held 3-wide in midfield, started to give ground from 600m and one-paced in straight.
Badly crowded out start and then over-raced. Checked 1000m and shifted out. Wide into straight and quickly gave ground.
Soon at rear from wide draw and began losing touch with field from 800m. Hard ridden turn but found nothing and tailed off.
Held up behind midfield along the 2-path, travelled strongly into contention, picked up well when switched wide 400M, got up last few strides.
Never far off the pace, picked up well inside 300M, got to the front inside 50M, caught last few strides.
Chased leader, responded well turning in, briefly led passing 150M, caught by first two final stages.
Taken back, settled near last 6Ls off the pace, finished fastest down the outside, nearest line.
Travelled 3-wide in mid-division, made some headway early straight, kept on final 200M but not a serious threat to leaders.
Reserved near last, hung in over final 300M and difficult to be ridden, ran well under the circumstances to finish 2Ls behind winner.
Had uncontested lead from 900M, headed near 150M, weakened. (Bled.)
Close enough to leaders but was wide without cover throughout, one paced turning in, no threat to leaders passing 200M.
Tracked leader, had every hope in straight, run ended 200M and faded.
Soon taken across behind runners, trailed in last 7-8Ls off the pace, found little when asked, ran past beaten runners only.
Behind mid-division, came under pressure passing 500M, soon outpaced.
Began awkwardly, held up in midfield along the fence, outpaced early straight, weakened and no extra over final 200M.

Began fairly, settled about 2L off the speed on grandstand rails early, shifted in for a run approaching 500 M, responded well to take command over 100 M out, readily.
Never far off, held narrow advantage from 400 M, but unable to sustain effort and swamped inside final 100 M.
Settled just off the speed, came to challenge inside final 400 M, hung out under pressure closing stages.
Began well, gradually taken back to travel just off the pace with cover, one-paced under pressure in the run home.
Settled in last few early in the centre of the track, fought on steadily without threatening.
Niggled along, gradually dropped to rear of midfield, kept on well past beaten horses inside final 200 M.
Began awkwardly, travelled in last few before taking closer order approaching course proper, one-paced under pressure in the run home.
Dwelt at start, soon dropped to last few, hampered 200 M out, one-paced.
Held slender lead early, just headed onto course proper, weakened inside final 300 M.
Broke well, close up on grandstand rails early, yielded ground from approaching course proper.
Broke well, with leaders, hung out badly inside final 400 M, dropped away quickly.
Began well, amongst leaders early, gave ground from approaching course proper.
Began fairly, gradually settled in last few, never a factor.
Jostled at start, soon tailed off.
Parked slightly ahead of midfield on the rails, had cover. Angled out into clear running approaching the 300m and dug deep to get up in the last couple of strides.
Box seated. Fought on gamely all the way down the running only to be nabbed in the shadows of the winning post.
Camped 3 deep, midfield with cover. Corned 5 deep, ranged up at the 150m and looked likely before ending its run well short of the line.
Pushed along in the early stages, eventually crossing near the 1000m, to race in 2nd position outside the leader, 1 off no cover. Battled away over the final stages to fill the frame.
Jumped well then drifted back, settled behind midfield, 3 deep with cover. Swung the final turn deep and made reasonable ground in the run to the post.
Made its run from last position after travelling 2 deep with cover. Came widest in the home straight and made some headway without threatening.
Ridden along early but failed to go the early speed of the race and settled worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Settled back in the field from a wide gate, racing 2 deep with cover. Peeled out in the straight but only whacked away.
Sent forward and lead along the paint. Was overhauled approaching the furlong and gave ground thereafter.
Posted 3 wide without cover on the circle, travelling just behind the speed. Never likely.
Effectively raced 1 out 1 back. Had every possible hope but failed to deliver, was a beaten horse early in the straight.
Raced behind midfield the fence had cover. Kept to the inside in the final stretch but struggled in the run to the wire.
Settled with the backmakers, 1 off with cover. Was eased down and retired in the home straight. (Bled.)
Raced midfield, settled 4Ls behind the leader 1 off, peeled wide rounding the Home Turn, moved up strongly early straight, drawn clear over the last furlong.
Eased back early, gradually improved to settle 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, dashed on well to claim 2nd.
Camped handy 1 off, under pressure 450M, one paced thereafter, picked up well again over the last furlong, closed to the line well to get 3rd.
Rolled forward and shared the lead 1 off, fought on gamely in the straight, just missed 3rd.
Rolled forward and shared the lead on the fence, headed near the last furlong.
Eased back, settled 5Ls behind the leader, ran on only fairly.
Camped handy, stalked behind the leaders on the fence, one paced to conclude.
Jumped well, soon dropped back to last from a wide gate, 6Ls behind the leader 1 off, however never ran on. (Questioned for riding, see incidents report)
Rolled forward, stalked behind the leader 2 wide, weakened after straightening.
Dropped back to rear from a wide gate, travelled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, never in a competitive position.
No early pace and about 6Ls from lead. Made ground along fence around turn, switched to middle of track 400m and finished strongly.
Taken quickly to the front but joined by another and set hectic pace to straight. Kicked clear 400m and still going strong 200m. Caught near line.
Unable muster and soon 8Ls from lead. Closed in gradually around turn, taken to middle track but didn't kick until passing 300m. Closest at finish.
Caught wide from outside draw and behind midfield to turn. Made strong forward move 400m to 200m before run ended. One paced.
Ridden early to hold rail position 3Ls from lead. Closed in along fence turn, but then bottled up all the way to the line, tiring slightly final 50m.
Taken back from wide draw and soon last. Made some headway final 400m to be closest at the finish.
Ridden up from wide draw to share lead until final straight. Caught flat-footed 400m when joint-leader kicked but kept on till 200m before tiring.
Crowded start but urged to make up ground. Was 5th into home straight but found little under pressure.
Taken forward but caught wide and thereafter raced mostly without cover. Had short run early in straight before dropping back.
Jumped with field but no early speed and settled 4Ls from leader but wide. Found nothing when asked 300m and plodded to line.
Hard ridden from wide draw to get box seat behind leading pair to straight. Checked 300m and faded quickly.
No early speed and soon 8Ls from leader. Dropped to last before final turn and never a factor after.
Got head up and proved hard to settle early. Saved ground along fence to straight, took inside path, bumped runner-up 150m and just got there.
Jumped awkwardly but held rail. Improved along rail to be 4th at turn. Blocked 400m, checked 300m but ran on strongly. Bumped winner 150m and run down on line.
Made use of inside draw to sit outside leader back stretch and around turn, got to within neck of leader 200m but unable hold out first two.
Jumped awkwardly to fall 3Ls behind leader into turn. Accelerated strongly from 400m to lead at 200m before running on empty.
Taken forward from wide gate to get the lead and then set slow pace. Was first into home straight but shifted out 300m and gave ground.
Towards rear and 3 deep shortly after start 4.5Ls from leader. Made up ground around turn and into straight before becoming one-paced 200m.
Jumped well and taken forward but held 3 wide because of slow pace. Was closest at 200m before tiring and slipping back.
Slow to jump and then steadied behind horses. Made up ground along rails to straight but found nothing when popped the question.
Jumped out well and soon 2.5Ls from leader in a one-off position. Improved turn but didn't respond under pressure 400m. Blood in trachea.
Taken back from wide draw last to turn. Made forward move top of straight but soon ran out of steam.
Unable to muster and soon towards rear 4Ls from leader. Taken to middle of track 400m but found nothing when asked.
Taken back from wide draw and soon in last pair but one-off. Dropped to last turning for home and never a factor after that.
Sat down in stall before start, but jumped OK. Raced in midfield to turn before getting head on his side and laying in. Had mucous in trachea.
Taken forward but deep soon after start. Started to slip back final turn. Was 7th into straight and weakened quickly.
Settled in box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, momentarily lack room 400M, closed off strongly to score.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 6Ls off the leaders, lack room 400M, dashed strongly when clear for 2nd.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly for 3rd despite all negative racing situations.
Hard ridden early to hold the rail in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, little dash when clear.
At back, 6.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, blocked 4-2, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed forward, benefited by the slow tempo, however trapped 3 wide, flattened 100M.
Pushed to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden early, 4.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, held up 4-2, little dash when clear.
Hard ridden early, 6.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M.
Took rail easily and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M flattened.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, emptied 150M.
Hard ridden to share lead 2 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on until 200M weakened.
Eased to rear, harmed by the slow pace, never competitive.
Prominent, suited by the slow tempo, faded quickly 400M.
Jumped well but 3-wide early, slipped closer to rail passing 800m, taken out 300m and given light tap with whip, powered home under hands and heels riding.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit 2L, one-off behind leader. Shaken up 300m and battled strongly under whip to the line.
Taken back across runners from wide draw to sit 8L from leader. Made ground round turn, got head up 300m but kept on well.
Scooted to the front and set fast pace, over-raced 1000m but led clearly into straight. Caught 200m out and kept on one paced.
Just behind pace but one-off early, improved position round the turn to get within 3L of leader. Kept on one-paced to the line.
Ridden along early to hold position along rail 4L from leader. Closed to within 3L at 200m then one-paced.
Began awkwardly and dropped back 5L from leader. Held rail position back stretch and around turn, crowded out 300m and plodded to the line.
Awkward start and then held wide but with cover to turn. Put under pressure 300m but found little.
Crowded out start and dropped to rear 6L from leader. Pulled out 500m to make run but wandered in straight.
No early speed and dropped back but wide from outside draw. Got head up and lost position turn, found little under pressure in straight.
No early speed and unable make use of inside draw. Held 3-wide for most of the trip before tiring in straight.
Taken back soon after start and in last pair round turn. Taken out straight but found nothing when asked.
Crowded out start and dropped to last 10L from leader. Never likely after that.
No early speed and towards rear but along rail 7L from leader. No response when shaken up 300m and tired.
Up with early pace, stayed within striking distance when the pace quickened nearing the bend, ran on between horses over final 200M to share the spoils.
Crossed to the lead before home turn, set good pace, kept finding when pressed by pursuers from 300M, rallied final stages to salvage a dead heat.
Tracked leaders, produced with a strong looking challenge 300M out but his effort peaked near 100M, always held final stages.
Held up behind mid-division, soon into clear turning in, did not pick up immediately but stayed on well enough to the line.
Sped to an early lead, restrained behind leader passing 800M, kept on evenly to the line.
Up with pace, had every chance in straight before weakening nearing 100M.
Near the rear, stayed on mildly and hung in over final 200M.
Settled midfield, caught 3-wide no cover from 800M, kept on same pace, never a threat to leaders.
Towards the rear, failed to quicken when placed under pressure, never in contention. (Jockey reported his horse did not travel at any stage.)
Dropped back to last, switched widest of all approaching the entrance of straight but not able to quicken. (Blood in trachea.)
Held up midfield along the 2-path, found little off the bridle, well beaten and eased inside 150M.
Began awkwardly, recovered to race in mid-division, hampered 850M and lost position, outpaced passing 300M and folded tamely.
No early speed. Held 3-wide at rear, covered extra ground turn, swung wide into straight but accelerated smoothly to lead 150m, given reminder 50m when idling.
Taken back from wide draw to get rail, got head up 1000m, improved position turn, blocked for run 400m but kept on well when clear.
Prominent early 3L back, one-off.Got shuffled back around turn, blocked for run 350m, shifted out and finished strongly.
Crowded out start but soon in midfield along rail. Threw out strong challenge in straight to get alongside leader at 150m, then one-paced.
Not helped by slow pace and kept wide back stretch. Covered extra ground turn but ran on steadily to the line.
Bolted to the front on settling and then slowed the field with slow sectionals. Clear leader till 250m when started to shorten stride.
Held wide from outside draw and slow pace against. Checked 1000m after which over-raced. One-paced in straight. Lost right hind plate.
Taken forward early to sit 1L back, one-off along back stretch and into turn. Found little when asked 300m, one-paced. Lost left hind plate.
No early pace and slipped back gradually to be in last pair by final turn. Limited response when put under pressure in straight.
Soon enjoying the run of the race 1L back along rail. Kept on steadily till 200m after which was running on empty.
Moved forward from inside draw but unable to slot in because of slow pace and held wide. Started to lose ground passing the 300m.
Made use of inside draw to kick up along rail behind early pace. Slipped back around turn before coming under pressure 300m.
Jumped best but not pushed and help wide. Struck by cast plate 1400m after which raced without cover. Tired in straight and slipped back.
Crowded out start and soon last. Caught one horse at the 400m before slipping back again.
Broke well, took early lead then settled for a trail, gained an inside run turning in and dashed to lead, kept on well to see off fast finishing rivals.
Positioned 3 wide around midfield, 5ls away from lead, enjoyed cover throughout, came wider turning and set out after leader, couldn't wear down margin.
Taken back from a wide gate, raced at rear 3 wide more than 8Ls from top end, gradually improved on circle, came widest turning and made many lengths from well back to just miss 2nd.
Tracked pace 3ls away on rails, came 2 wide on circle, poised to strike turning but in traffic until 200m, made good ground when clear.
Dropped into ideal spot 1 out 1 back early, moved 3 wide without cover on circle, kept improving to close in on frontrunners and led briefly passing 400m, there until 100m.
Tardy into stride, 6ls or so back in running line, improved 3 wide from 500m, made some ground in straight without looking likely.
Ended up 3 wide behind midfield from a tricky gate, had cover 6ls back, switched wider turning, made some progress but lacked usual big finish and just held ground final 200m.
Taken back from a wide alley, raced 8ls back on rails, not asked in mid-section, held up to 250m, made good progress along inside when clear.
Went forward as usual and ended up outside the leader first without cover, worked a touch to bend, didn't find as usual and gradually dropped out in straight (lame next day).
Standard getaway, raced midfield on rails 4-5ls back, easy time to bend, didn't close off.
Ended up at rear from outside gate, best part of 10ls back on rails, still well back to bend, made minor progress passing a few tired ones late.
Unable to get closer than 4 wide throughout, was 3ls back working without cover on circle, 2ls back turning in when hard run took toll and folded final 300m.
Took a spot in midfield, 5ls or so away in midfield, fair run to turn, didn't see out journey and gradually faded.
Standard jump but rushed forward to take up running, kept tempo fair throughout, challenged and compounded soon after straightening. (Muco.)

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Broke well to lead from the middle draw, obtained rails run at the Rock, maintained similar 1L margin thereafter and under strong pressure to hold position in the run home.
Raced wide without cover in midfield, took off from approaching 600 M to gain 1.5L 3rd 3-wide around the bend, gained 2nd spot narrowly on straightening, hung on under pressure.
Began well from a low draw, settled for one-back position on rails and never far off, saved ground turning for home but narrowly headed for 2nd over 200 M out, one-paced in the run home.
Settled wide in midfield, similar turning in, made steady progress under hard driving while hanging away from whip and just missed a placing.
Began awkwardly losing ground, soon recovered to rear of midfield before steadied at Rock, behind midfield into straight, ran home nicely.
Travelled in 2L 4th before steadied at 600 M losing ground, in 5th within 3L of lead turning in, ran home one-paced.
Close up early but soon shuffled back to forward of midfield, carried further back to rear of midfield on rails passing 600 M, saved ground on the turn, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Settled wide towards rear after beginning from the widest gate, remained similar to straight, made modest progress under pressure.
Jumped from a wide gate, settled at the back, wide into straight, made steady headway under pressure, never nearer.
Began fairly in mid-division, gradually picked up to a prominent position far side, ridden along outside leader around the bend, soon weakened after straightening.
Jumped moderately, travelled in last few racing keenly far side, saved ground turning in, found nothing in straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Jumped moderately, carried backward leaving Rock, made no impression thereafter.
Rated midfield, 2 deep with cover. Responded to hard riding after the 500m and responded well. Finished over the top of its rivals in the latter stages.

Midfield early then was allowed to slide forward and eventually worked its way to second after the 900m, raced outside the leader, no cover. Was pressured by other runners after the 600m, stayed on gamely.
Parked in 3rd position on the fence had cover. Peeled out early in the home straight and was placed under pressure, fought on gamely.
Camped in last position, 2 deep with cover. Made good steady progress all the way down the running.
Travelled in 3rd last position, 1 off with cover. Swung the home turn widest and made some late ground without threatening.
Settled on the rails midfield early, shifted into a 1 off line with cover after the 1300m. Raced 3 wide passing the 700m, got cover again on the circle, only plodded to the line.

Didn't enjoy the best of runs, travelling very keenly for the majority of the race, whilst on the fence, just behind midfield. Shifted out and commenced a forward move after the 800m, 3 deep no cover. Was a spent force final 200m.
Sent forward and crossed near the 1600m and led along the fence. Was under plenty of pressure after the 500m, folded soon after entering the home straight.
Travelled with the backmakers on the rails, had cover. Failed to close off.
Settled in 2nd last position with cover along the fence. Struggled in the home straight.

Led early before handing up and taking a trailing position along the paint, near the 1600m travelling second, with cover. Raced keenly at times, was a beaten horse passing the 550m, weakening noticeable in the run home.
Ridden forward to take the lead, enjoyed the slow sectionals, fought on gamely in the straight, hung on for win by a narrow margin.
Eased back, settled 4Ls off the pace 2 wide, made early move 800M, benefited by the slow pace, battled on gamely after straitening, just beaten by a narrow margin for 2nd.
Camped handy, suited by the slow sectionals, peeled wide, closed to the line well to get 3rd.
Hard ridden early to obtain a prominent spot, settled 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, under pressure 600M, closed to the line well.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls off the pace on the fence, despite hampered by the slow pace, dashed on ok.
Rolled forward, settled 1L behind the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, looked threat in the straight, however weakened in the last few strides.
Rolled forward to take box seat, suited by the slow pace, however couldn't ran on after straightening, weakened over the last furlong.
Raced midfield, travelled 5Ls of the pace 2 wide, disadvantaged by the slow tempo, ran on only fairly after straightening.
Dropped behind from a wide gate, settled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow sectionals, failed to make ground.
Niggled along early to muster speed, settled 8Ls off the pace on the fence, hampered by the slow sectionals, failed to make impression in the straight.
Eased back, settled 7Ls behind the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, never ran on.
Began slowly, then taken across from a wide barrier, settled 7Ls behind the leader, never a factor.
Soon on rail 2.5Ls from leader. Closed in gradually around turn to be 3rd into straight. Close to heels 400m, came off fence and ran home strongly.
Taken back from wide draw and soon on rail, 4Ls from leader. Stuck to rail around turn and into straight. Kept on well to the line.
Eased back from wide draw and soon last. Swung wide into straight, found passage between horses 300m to throw out challenge which ended 100m.
Ridden up early but then eased to hold 4th spot along rail. Came off fence 400m to make run but found little and plodded to the line.
Jumped awkwardly and then got head on side 1000m. Cut back inside 400m to make run but found little under pressure.
Jumped with field but no early speed and held behind midfield 2-off around turn. Swung wide into straight and doing best work at the finish.
Bumped start but bustled along to take early lead. Unable to sustain pace and dropped to 3rd. Weakened final 100m. Had blood in mouth.
Taken forward soon after start but held 3-wide thereafter. Kept on steadily in straight though restricted for room final stages.
Taken forward after start to pressure early leader and kept wide without cover until 600m. Hit front momentarily in straight before weakening.
Hard ridden to hold rail position, took lead after 100m but pressured thereafter until well into the straight. Weakened quickly final stages.
Checked shortly after start but recovered to behind midfield. Checked again 600m and dropped towards rear. Never a factor after that.
No early speed and soon in last pair but wide. Dropped to last turning for home and gradually lost touch with rest of the field.
Taken forward from inside draw and soon in box seat behind leader. Stayed on rail, found clear passage in straight and ran home strongly.
Ridden up from start and managed to slot in one-off, one-back. Peeled off 500m to make run but proved difficult to ride. Kept on to line.
Went back from start to settle 5-6Ls from leader. Tightened 500m when looking for run, came wide and finished strongly.
Jumped with field, held rail position in midfield 3Ls from leader to straight. Stayed on rail behind eventual winner and had no where to go.
Hard ridden to lead early before settling on quarters of eventual leader. Closed in around turn to look a chance 400m before tiring final 200m.
Kicked up from inside draw to take the lead after 100m. Set decent sectionals and still in front 300m before tiring.
Jumped OK but held one-off in midfield for most of the trip. Closed in slightly around turn but one-paced in straight.
No early speed and soon in last pair 7Ls from leader. Cut in towards rail entering turn, made some ground to 400m, then one-paced.
Stumbled at start, hard ridden but failed to muster and settled towards rear. Improved position steadily but found no extra from 300m.
No speed and soon last 7Ls from leader. Caught flat footed 800m, switched in towards rail 400m and ran past tired horses.
Caught wide but with cover behind midfield soon after start. Covered extra ground around turn, got head on side in straight and faded.
Taken forward after start but caught wide without cover. Ridden up around turn to get 3rd but soon tired and slipped back gradually.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace and the rail-run, progressed steadily 250M to score.
Took rail easily and led by 1L at fast sectionals, hung on strongly until 50M overhauled, ran on well in 2nd.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 5.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, held up 4-2, made good ground when clear.
Pressed forward, box seat, not suited by the fast pace, held ground in straight.
Pushed early, sat 2.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Very slow away, 4.5Ls off the leader on the fence, suited by the fast pace, blocked 300M, checked 200M, made some late ground.
Rolled forward, 1.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide no cover throughout, harmed by the fast pace, weakened 300M.
At rear, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden early but failed to keep up, 3Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, flattened 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast tempo, out of fuel 250M.
Hard ridden early, never muster, trapped 3 wide behind midfield, emptied 400M.
Bumped start but recovered quickly to sit 2nd on quarters of leader. Shaken up 400m, took lead 200m and kept on strongly to the line.
No early speed and soon 3rd last. Lost position back stretch, last into turn. Weaved passage through horses in straight, doing best work at the finish.
Ridden early, took cover 1100m, got shuffled back turn. Found passage between horses in straight and ran on well. Jockey cited for lack of judgement.
Ridden up from wide draw but able to slot in one-off before turn. Kept on steadily in straight but tightened final 50m.
First to jump but eased to hold 2nd on rail. Dropped to 3rd around turn, had clear rail passage in straight but only one paced.
Ridden hard from outside draw to take narrow lead on settling. Pressured by eventual winner around turn and into straight. Weakened.
Ridden up from wide draw but able to cut into fence by 1000m. Shifted out 500m, under whip from 400m, got head on side 150m and faded.
Crowded out start and behind midfield to the turn. Bumped 500m, swung wide into straight but found little under pressure.
Caught wide soon after start 5Ls from leader but with cover. Covered extra ground around turn and limited response in straight.
Checked shortly after start and thereafter raced without cover. Ridden up around turn to be 3rd into straight before weakening.
Caught wide behind midfield early, improved position but wide before turn, widest into straight but soon running on empty.
Bungled start and soon last 6-7Ls from leader. Made some headway around turn, but soon tired.
Sent forward tracking leaders, ran on well to take lead inside 150M, kept on momentum final stages.
Chased the pace along inside, stayed on final 300M but well held by winner.
Vied for lead outside, had every hope, outpaced by winner final 150M.
Slow to begin, ended up with last few 6Ls off the pace, made steady headway turning in, did best work late, nearest finish.
Held up midfield, taken outside near 300M, stayed on well final 200M, nearest finish.
Vied for lead inside, took slender lead early straight, weakened final 150M.
Badly unbalanced at the start, got closer to midfield making the turn, stayed on fairly final 300M.
Began well enough but soon outpaced and shuffled back to the rear, made limited progress when taken outside final 300M. (Lame next day.)
With last few 6Ls off leaders, kept on same pace in straight, never a serious threat.
Taken back from wide barrier, caught 4-wide without cover, not quickened on straightening.
Driven forward, unable to cross and raced 3-wide without cover, dropped out quickly 200M.
Close up behind leaders first half, outpaced turning for home, soon beaten.

Began moderately, soon recovered to midfield on rails, baulked for a run early in straight, obtained a clear passage 200 M out, hit the front passing 100 M, pushed out.
Broke fairly, settled just off the speed one-out-one-back in 4th, hit the front under pressure briefly before overhauled inside final 100 M.
Began fairly from a wide-ish draw, gradually taken back to trail the field, commenced move over 300 M out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Raced keenly and wide in midfield far side, remained in midfield into straight, kept on one pace under pressure.
Broke well to vie for lead early settling outside leader, yielded ground steadily after straightening.
Began from a poor draw, soon settled well behind on rails, produced good late impression inside final 200 M.
Broke well, gained narrow advantage after first 200 M racing keenly at times approaching home bend, maintained lead early in straight until headed under pressure passing 200 M.
Began fairly but slow into stride, gradually recovered to close-up 3rd on rails approaching home bend, soon came under pressure upon straightening, found nothing.
Jumped awkwardly, remained in last few throughout, dropped out in straight.
Sent forward and led along the paint. Kicked clear near the 300m to record a sound win.
Made its run from behind midfield after travelling on the fence, had cover. Closed off strongly along the inside.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Battled away gamely in the straight.
Ridden along early and box seated. Maintained a fair effort to remain in the frame.
Settled handy in the run, on the rails with cover. Made some progress without ever threatening the principals.
Missed the start, settling 2nd last, 1 off with cover. Made good ground in the home straight.
Worked forward to race outside the leader. 1 off no cover. Commenced to fade after the furlong. (Blood in trachea)
Settled approximately 3 back, 2 wide with cover. Peeled out near the 600m, and race 3 wide no cover, only plodded to the line.
Travelled midfield, 2 deep with cover. Failed to quicken in the home straight.
Crowded at the start then didn't muster, settling worse than midfield, 2-3 deep with cover. Was never in the hunt.
Posted 3-4 wide on the circle, no cover, just ahead of midfield. Never likely.
Settled a long last, 2-3 off the fence. Failed to pass another runner and finished well back.
Ridden positively to obtain box seat, benefited by the track pattern that favoring front runners, ran on strongly and scored by a neck.
Camped handy on the fence, benefited by the track pattern that favoring front runners, closed to the line well to get 2nd, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Eased back, travelled 7Ls off the pace on the fence, despite harmed by the track pattern that favoring front runners, dashed on well to get 3rd, just beaten by a neck.
Rolled forward to take the lead, benefited by the track pattern that favoring front runners, stayed on well to get 4th.
Eased back, travelled 9Ls off the pace on the fence, despite harmed by the track pattern that favoring front runners, ran on nicely.
Fractious in the gate then very slow to begin, settled 5Ls off the pace on the fence, harmed by the slow away, kept on one pace to conclude.
Raced Midfield, settled 5Ls off the pace 2 wide, harmed by the track pattern that favoring front runners, passed tired runners in the straight.
Eased back, settled 9Ls behind the leader on the fence, disadvantaged by the track pattern that favoring front runners, passed tired runners in the straight.
Raced handy midfield, not suited by the track pattern that favoring front runners, under heavy pressure 500M, eased down over the last furlong.
Rolled forward, benefited by the track pattern that favoring front runners, however under pressure rounding the Home Turn, eased down thereafter. (Questioned for performance, see incidents report.)
Eased back, settled worse than midfield, disadvantaged by the track pattern that favoring front runners, never ran on.
Dropped back to rear from wide gate, travelled 11Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the track pattern that favoring front runners, never ran on, tailed out.
Jumped smartly, crossed from a wide gate to park outside the leader, benefited by the track pattern that favoring front runners, however weakened badly soon after straightening, tailed off.
Came out on the bridle and kept on strongly to establish half-length lead back stretch. Kicked clear entering straight and kept on strongly to the line.
Driven up to join leading pack before settling on fence in 4th, 1.5Ls from leader. Improved to clear 2nd at 200m but unable get closer.
No early speed and last early. Improved position around turn but still 6Ls from leader entering straight. Kept on along fence to be closest at finish.
Hard ridden to hold fence but unable match speed of leading pack and settled 5th. Kept on well final 400m to be nearest at finish. Had blood in trachea.
Slow to move and then crowded. Beaten for early speed and settled 5.5Ls from leader in midfield. Put under pressure 400m but only one-paced.
No early seed and soon behind midfield 6-7Ls from leader. Unable to improve around turn and one-paced final 400m under sloppy conditions.
Ridden up but wide early though still 5Ls from leader back stretch. Swung wide into straight but soon tired in the testing conditions and drifted back.
Ridden up from wide draw but unable to slot in and held wide behind midfield to turn. Found nothing in straight and weakened.
Bumped start but ridden up to contest lead. Unable get clear and settled on quarters of leader. Gave ground soon after entering straight.
Driven forward from wide draw to get 2nd but wide initially. Lost position around turn and soon struggling in sloppy conditions.
Stumbled at start and in last pair early. Dropped to last entering turn and never a factor after that.
Pushed early but unable to get forward position and settled towards rear. Slipped back gradually and tailed off in straight.
Hard ridden from inside draw to take lead at stable bend. Relished the sloppy conditions, kicked away from field top of straight and bolted in.
Ridden forward to hold narrow lead after 100m but kept wide and slipped to second. No match for winner in straight but came again near line to hold 2nd spot.
Taken forward early and cut in towards rail after 100m. Stayed 1.5Ls from leader, closed to within 1-length at 400m but then one-paced.
No early speed and soon in last pair one-off the fence. Took inside track top of straight and ran on steadily to be closest a the finish.
Driven up from wide draw and able to slot in to fence 2.5Ls from leader. Kept on steadily early in straight but once-paced final 200m.
Hampered shortly after start but made ground along fence to be midfield 4Ls from leader into final turn. Shaken up 400m but one-paced.
Hampered after start but made up ground to sit midfield, one-off the fence, Switched out 400m but found nothing when asked,
Jumped awkwardly and then restricted for pace. Raced close to heels 500m and switched out but found little and slipped back.
Unable to go early pace and put under pressure from 800m to hold position. Last around turn and only ran past tired horses. Jockey said resented kickback.
Taken forward from wide draw to hold 4th early, checked 1300m and dropped to 5th. Wide around turn and tired after entering straight.
Rider severely unbalanced after start. Ridden to make up lost ground but checked 1300m and never a factor after that.
Taken forward from outside draw but held 3-deep back stretch. Started to lose ground soon after entering straight.
Taken back across runners after start and soon last. Improved position before turn but tired quickly from 400m.
Jumped with field but unable slot in and kept wide to the straight, Weakened baly final 300m.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, closed off strongly to win.
Prominent, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, lack room 400M, held ground when clear.
Eased back for cover, 7Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide, suited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Hard ridden to take rail and shared the lead at fast sectionals, hung on strongly until 150M overhauled, ran on ok.
Settled in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, held up 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Pressed forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide without cover, harmed by the fast tempo, ran on ok.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leaders on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, lack room 400M, just held ground when clear.
Hard ridden forward, shared lead 2 wide at fast sectionals, ran on until 200M emptied.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 3 wide, ran on fairly in straight.
Slow away, 6Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide, made no ground.
Slow away, 4.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, suited by the fast tempo, no progress.
Eased at start to get cover behind the field, 6Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, no progress.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 4-5 wide throughout, no progress.
Never competitive at rear.
Got out well and ridden out to hold rail, settled in 3rd 1.5Ls from leader, shown whip 400m, caught leader 200m and pulled clear.
Hard ridden from start to take narrow lead stable bend. Set steady sections to turn, tried to kick clear 400m, caught 200m out, kept on.
Ridden up early to hold fence 3Ls from lead. Hugged rail back stretch and final turn. Kept on steadily in straight without threatening first two.
Steadied after start and then nudged along to hold rail position. Stayed along fence, making ground all the way to the line.
Taken back across horses from wide draw to get fence 4-5Ls from leader. Found little room 500m, shifted out 200m then one-paced.
Jumped nicely and soon in good spot one back, one-off to back stretch. Put under pressure 500m but unable to improve and one-paced.
Looked uncomfortable in sloppy conditions and soon last. Tailed field into straight along fence before running past tired horses final 200m.
Caught wide in midfield shortly after the start and covered plenty of extra ground. Made forward move early in straight but soon tired.
No early speed and kept one-off towards rear along back stretch. Was wide into straight and found little under pressure.
Pushed forward from wide draw and caught off the track with no cover. Continued to race wide around turn and weakened quickly in straight.
Taken back from wide draw and soon in last pair along the fence, Improved position around the turn but found nothing when put under pressure 400m.
Used early to get forward position and held 3rd until entering straight when gave ground quickly.
Ridden aggressively to go forward but never travelled and slipped back towards rear. Hard ridden again 800m but soon tired.
Pushed to go forward early but caught wide without cover and dropped back to worse than midfield. Tired quickly in straight and became tailed off.
Vied for lead outside, responded in tenacious style when driven out 300M, fought hard to hold off challengers both sides over concluding stages.
Chased leading pair, took time to get going turning in, made decent progress final 200M, but could not get past the battling winner.
Driven forward, vied for the lead inside, kept on well when put to pressure inside 300M, faded late stages and lost 2nd near line.
Sent forward chasing the pace, kept up with the leaders in straight but could not find the extra needed, awkwardly placed and not ridden out near the finish.
Settled midfield along the fence, responded only fairly to finish a well beaten 5th.
Towards the rear, hampered near 700M, not able to quicken on this wet slow surface, never threatened.
Not far off from the pace but was left racing 3-wide without cover from 700M, one paced turning in, weakened 200M from home.
Settled in last, could make no real progress in straight and ran past well beaten runners only.
Held up 2-wide in mid-division, unable to quicken, never involved.
Failed to muster, dropped back to a 3-wide position towards the rear, soon beaten turning home.
Bustled along after the start, badly unbalanced and lost ground 700M, weakened passing 300M, never a factor.
Caught 3-wide in midfield, failed to pick up at all when placed under pressure, eased towards finish.
No early speed and behind midfield 5Ls from leader midway. Switched to middle of track 400m, picked up momentum, took lead 100m and moved away.
Jumped fairly but quickly mustered speed along fence to hold 2nd, half length from leader. Took lead 300m but caught 100m out. Kept on well.
Jumped well along outside rail 2Ls from lead. Kept on steadily to look a chance 300m but no extra and one-paced to line.
Began well and raced behind leading pack to course proper. Looked a chance 400m but only one-paced to the line.
Unbalanced at start and dropped to near last 7Ls from leader. Made good ground along outside fence but crowded out 300m. One-paced.
Jumped best and soon in front but away from outside fence. Led field to course proper, but found little under pressure from 300m and dropped back.
Slow to move and raced down the middle of the track to the course proper. Kept on steadily under pressure but flattened close home.
A little slow to move but switched towards outer rail and made up ground to within 2Ls of leader before running on empty.
No early speed and raced on his own down the centre of the track to course proper. Ran past tired horses.
Behind midfield soon after start but switched toward outer rail and made up some ground. Checked 300m and one-paced after that.
Mustered early to get close to leading pack. Looked uncomfortable under pressure from 400m and drifted back.
Tardy at the start but ridden up to get 3rd, 2L from leader. Was soon under pressure and dropped back quickly. Performance ruled unacceptable.
Jumped OK and quickly moved to outside rail in midfield 3Ls from leader. Found nothing when put under pressure 400m.
Ridden hard from start to chase early leader for first 200m before gradually slipping back through the field.
Broke well, took a trail and eased into 1 out 1 back spot throughout, poised to strike rounding bend, soon rounded up rivals in straight and ran away for an easy win.
Away well, took up running, took trail in back straight, right there turning and joined in strongly with eventual winner, no match for winner but well clear of 3rd.
Well back in running line more than 12Ls from top end, aided by pace but track conditions against, made a long sustained run and closed off creditably for 3rd.
Sat not far off pace group, 4Ls or so back in running line, even trip throughput, stayed on ok in circumstances before run ended at 200m.
Ended up behind midfield 10Ls back in running line, track pattern against and had job to do turning, closed well and looked a place chance but run ended at 200m.
Awkwardly away, mustered and worked forward wide to race outside leader, keep speed honest throughout, took over turning and there to 300m but quickly gave in and faded.
Behind midfield 8-9Ls back in running line, track pattern against, ridden along turning however never really featured.
Landed a midfield role, 8Ls or so away, even trip but struggling turning and never looked a threat despite hanging.
In rear division, more than 12Ls off pace on rails, track pattern hardly helped, rearward throughout passing only the weakening runners.
Away well as usual, pressed on and took up running in back straight, shaded by outside horse throughout and kept pace genuine, headed turning and stopped quickly.
Drifted back to rear from a wide gate, 15Ls off them at tail with track playing against, passed tired ones. Forgive run.
Landed a spot 4-5Ls back on rails, fair trail and not asked to turn, weakened badly from 400m to be beaten a long way. Forgive on surface.
Taken back from a wide gate, raced 2 and 3 wide at rear nearly 15Ls back, never sighted and beaten a long way. Forgive on surface.
Trapped 3 wide towards rear, 12Ls or so back, struggling a long way out and finished tailed off (heart irregularity).
Angled into a spot in midfield on rails, used nothing to bend, in traffic to 200m, accelerated nicely when running presented, kept a margin with a touch in hand despite fast finishing rivals.
Even early pace, lost spot when checked after 300m, raced 5-6Ls back on rails, badly held up to 200m, motored late when clear. Unlucky.
Ended up 3 wide in midfield from a tricky gate, had cover 4-5Ls back, made a strong bid turning in and hit lead at 200m, unable to outlast rivals late.
Took a role in midfield racing 2 wide, 4Ls back, easy time to bend, made gradual progress when clear to make frame but lacked usual strong finish.
Took up running and set an even tempo in front, held a 1L lead turning, stuck on until 200m before run ended, lost spot in frame late.
Settled towards rear, 6Ls back in running line, fair run despite standard tempo, tracked into raced nicely and looked a chance but peaked at 200m and didn't get closer thereafter.
Had an ideal run behind leader on rails, used nothing to bend, had chance from 300m when in clear but just kept same speed in run to the line.
Settled at rear on rails 6-7Ls back, easy run to bend, came wider and made some progress without threatening (lame next day).
Raced at rear 3 wide with cover, 4-5Ls back, came wider on circle to be up challenging at 400m, run ended by 300m and dropped off.
Landed an ideal spot 1 out 1 back, all favours in run with even tempo, checked at 300m, never really got into it from that point and faded when asked for effort.
Trapped 3 wide without cover from a wide alley, worked up outside leaders 1L back, niggled turning, faded when workload took toll.
Went forward to race outside leader, sat on even speed throughout, there to 200m however stopped quickly soon after.

Began fairly, ridden to gradually settle 2-wide in 1.5L 3rd before improving to 2nd around Rock, ran on alongside eventual runner-up in straight to gain upper hand in the shadows of the post.

Broke well from a high draw and quickly ridden to cross to rails to lead, ceded advantage to assume one back position in 3rd after turning into back straight, gained slender advantage over 100 M out only to be pipped at post.
Very slowly away, trailed the field far side, commenced move rounding home bend, saved ground on rails turning in, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly from the widest gate, ridden to take up running about 900 M out, held lead to about 100 M out when died on its run.
Began fairly, tightened and shuffled back to last few early, saved ground turning for home, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly, close up early before carried backward to midfield on rails halfway out, saved ground turning in, improving under pressure when hampered 150 M out, fought on to finish.
Began moderately from a wide gate, soon settled one from last, trailed the field into straight, finished off race nicely under pressure.
Raced wide just better than midfield, lost ground turning in, made no impression in straight.
Broke well, niggled at early before settling in midfield, took closer order passing the Rock, found nothing in straight.
Never better than midfield travelling ungenerously at times far side, made no impression in straight.
Began fairly settling in midfield on rails, shifted 2-wide to avoid heels at Rock, remained similar turning in, ran home one-paced.
Rolled forward to take the lead, fought on gamely in the straight, just hung on for win by half a length.
Slow away and blundered soon after the start, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, swung wide, dashed on strongly to get 2nd.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace on the fence, closed to the line nicely to claim 3rd.
Pushed forward to obtain box seat, ran on ok when clear 200M to get 4th.
Not rushed early, settled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence at rear, ran on well.
Dropped behind the runners, settled 8Ls off the pace on the fence at rear, stayed inside, dashed on ok.
Rolled forward to share the lead, battled on gamely, however weakened over the last furlong.
Eased back to settle 4Ls behind the leader on the fence, under pressure near 600M, peeled wide, however hung in after straightening, never likely.
Ridden hard early, however failed to cross, travelled 3 wide throughout the race, flattened after straightening.
Ridden hard early to settle about 4-5 position 2 wide, dropped off gradually rounding the Home Turn.
Eased back, travelled 7Ls behind the leader 2 wide, never a factor.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls off the pace 2 wide, peeled widest, flattened early in the straight.
Rolled forward to take the lead, benefited by the very slow sectionals, kicked 2Ls clear after straightening and scored comfortably.
Rolled forward to obtain box seat, benefited by the very slow sectionals, stayed on well to get 2nd.
Eased back, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite hampered by the very slow tempo, dashed on well to claim 3rd. (Lost Right Hind Plate)
Failed to muster early, travelled 4Ls off the pace 2 wide, despite harmed by the very slow tempo, ran on ok.
Raced Midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, one paced home.
Eased back, travelled 6Ls behind the leader 2 wide, disadvantaged by the very slow sectionals, dashed little.
Pushed forward to park outside the leader, benefited by the very slow pace, however under pressure 600M, soon dropped off after straightening. (Lame Left Fore)
Very slow early, travelled 7Ls behind the pace on the fence, hampered by the very slow tempo, never ran on.
Camped handy 2 wide, advantaged by the very slow pace, however under pressure 500M, soon dropped off after straightening.
Always at rear, never a factor.
Raced midfield, travelled 3Ls off the pace 3 wide throughout, never likely.
Travelled 3 wide without cover throughout the race, soon dropped off after straightening.
Jumped well and soon settled one-back, one-off behind leading pair. Shaken up 300m, led 200m and kept on strongly.
Jumped with field but held away from fence 3Ls from leaders. Taken out turn, picked up momentum 300m, doing best work at finish.
Taken forward from wide draw and joint leader by first bend. Kicked away 400m but caught 200m. Kept on well to the line.
Hard ridden to hold rail but 3Ls from leaders. Gradually improved along rail to be closest at the finish.
No early pace and dropped behind midfield around first bend, one-off the fence. Taken out straight and kept on steadily.
No early speed and kept one-off about 5Ls from lead. Unbalanced turn, recovered, kept on till 200m, no extra.
Slow to move and soon 7Ls from leaders on the rail. Made up ground final turn and kept on one-paced in straight.
Taken back from wide draw and last around first bend and back stretch. Improved position final turn but one-paced in straight.
Hard ridden to lead early but settled 3rd first bend. In box seat to straight, looked chance 300m but paddled final 200m.
Held in midfield 3-4Ls from leaders along rail. Improved position around turn and into straight then one-paced. Found to be roarer.
Taken back from wide draw and soon in last pair 6-7Ls from leaders. Made forward move 400m but soon tired and faded.
Hard ridden to lead around first bend but then harassed by runner on his outside and didn't settle. Faded quickly in straight.
Drifted back after start 5Ls from lead, moved up quickly 600m, entered straight full of running and kept on strongly.
Settled behind midfield but close to heels 900m to 600m. Held in pocket to straight, swung wide, dug in deeply final 300m to just fail.
Began awkwardly but recovered to get box seat. Got a split between horses 300m and looked a chance before being running flat 50m.
Pinged out of gate to lead field to first bend, settled in 2nd but no clear running until 200m. Kept on steadily to the line.
Ridden to hold 2nd early, then third but one-off. Kicked forward 400m to take temporary lead before being swamped. Kept on.
Slow to muster speed and settled 4Ls from leader along rail. Put under pressure 400m but checked 150m when disappointed for run. Boxed on.
Taken back from wide draw to hold rail 7Ls from leader. Taken out top of the straight and ran on steadily to be closest at te finish.
No early speed but held rail 5Ls fback. Shuffled back turn, improved early in straight but ran out of room and not ridden out.
Pushed forward from inside draw to be 2nd early before slipping back to 5th back stretch. Kept on in straight without looking dangerous.
Struck heels and blundered shortly after start, dropping back to rear where remained to straight. Ran past tired horses.
Hard ridden from outside draw and over-used to get lead back stretch, Led into straight before tiring and slipping back.
Taken out shortly after start and thereafter raced wide without cover. Got to within 3Ls of leader at 400m before fading.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 250M to win.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M for 2nd.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leaders along the rails, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace, got 3rd.
Pressed forward to share the lead 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 100M flattened.
Prominent, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the slow pace, ran on well to the line, checked 50M.
Box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight.
Pushed forward to take rail and share the lead at good pace, hung on until 100M flattened.
Prominent early, but shuffled backwards in middle stages, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Slow away, 6.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, dashed fairly.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, emptied 400M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, soon weakened 400M.
Shuffled back soon after start to be in last pair along rail. Improved around turn, switched out 400m and flew home to win in last stride.
Ridden up early to hold good spot. Travelled easily back stretch, taken out 300m, looked winner 50m but caught final stride.
Ridden to hold forward position, was 3rd along back stretch and final turn, shaken up 400m to lead 200m before being swamped.
Taken forward and soon in good position along rail. Made ground steadily to be closest at the finish.
Hard ridden from wide draw to get 4th but wide along back stretch. Under pressure final 400m but unable get closer.
Jumped OK but no early speed and slipped back 5-6Ls from lead. Came off fence 400m and kept on steadily.
Settled last soon after start many lengths from lead. Last into straight and doing best work final 200m.
No luck from outside draw and caught 3-wide around first turn and back stretch. Popped the question 400m but found little.
Hard ridden from wide draw to open big lead and set fast sectionals. Tried to kick clear 400m but had nothing in the tank and tired.
No early speed and caught wide without cover. Hard ridden 800-600m but made no leeway. One-paced straight.
Unable to muster and soon many lengths from leader. Dropped to last pair around turn and plodded in straight.
Taken forward but wide from gate 12 to hold 2nd early. Shuffled back turn and running on empty from 300m.
Held up 2-wide in midfield, picked up really well passing 300M and produced a powerful finish to lead close home.
Tracked leader in a steadily run race, swiftly took over 250M, kept on well under a strong ride and looked likely to win, caught by a fast finisher near the line.
Dropped back, travelled well in a rearward position, took time to get going turning in, strong late run final 150M.
Outside of last pair, 6Ls off the pace in middle stages, taken wide to challenge nearing 400M, stayed on well for 4th.
Settled in midfield along the inside, kept on steadily over final 300M for a non-threatening 5th.
Switched off to last, patiently ridden, driven 300M, closed off reasonably well but no threat to leaders.
Never far off leaders in a steadily run race, well placed to strike turning for home but could not close in on leaders, kept on same pace final 200M.
Soon in front, set steady pace and appeared to be travelling well in middle stages, found less than expected when put to pressure, weakened rapidly final 100M.
Close up behind leaders, saved ground along the fence, had every chance passing 300M, no extra and outpaced inside 150M.
Settled 2-wide towards the rear, driven 350M but failed to pick up.
Caught racing 3-wide in midfield, outpaced nearing 400M, soon behind.
Up with early pace, unable to cross and was left racing 3-wide without cover from 1400M, gave ground 400M, tailed off. (Unacceptable Performance.)
