Settled in forward of midfield, crept closer around the bend, 2L back in 5th turning in, quickened well to take command 200 M out, won comfortably.
Vied for lead early, crossed to rails after first 200 M, joined around the bend, overhauled by winner passing 200 M.
Settled well behind, saved ground turning in, obtained a clear passage 300 M out, finished off race well.
Began fairly from the one gate, settled just off the pace in 4th on rails, baulked for a run early in straight, kept on same pace without quickening inside final 200 M.
Jumped well, settled 2-wide just off the speed in 3rd, in similar position turning in, kept on before fading under pressure inside final 200 M.
Settled behind midfield, crept closer around the bend, kept on same pace from midfield into straight.
Began awkwardly and then bumped, settled in last few on rails, saved ground turning for home, about 4L back when bumped heavily inside 200 M, no further impression.
Began moderately, ridden along in midfield on rails, similar turning for home, under pressure when badly squeezed and lost position 200 M out, never recovered.
Began fairly settling worse than midfield, baulked for a run approaching home turn and hampered 350 M out, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Began fairly from a wide gate, soon taken back to race in rear, trailed the field into straight, hampered twice at 400 M and 300 M, no further impression.
Began fairly from the widest draw, ridden along in midfield out wide far side, improved to join leaders 3-wide around the bend disputing lead into straight, tired badly inside final 300 M.
Began fairly, settled 3-wide in forward of midfield, soon faded in straight.
Raced wide in midfield, shuffled backward towards the rear home bend, widest runner turning for home, never recovered.
Began in midfield, carried backward around the bend, wide in to home straight where unbalanced, no further impression.
Camped with the backmakers on the paint with cover. Came widest after the 350m and motored home.
Parked midfield, 1 off with cover. Had some traffic problems early in the straight, switched in and dug deep to improve. Looked likely 50m from home but was nabbed in the run to the wire.
Raced in a handy position, 3 back, 1 off with cover. Stayed on well.
Put up on the speed, eventually settling in third position, 1 off no cover. Hit the lead early in the straight but was collard over the final stages.
Travelled behind midfield 2 wide with cover. Closed off well before ending its run about 100m short of the line.
Made its run from 2nd last position, after settling 2 deep with cover. Finished off soundly.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race, midfield the fence. Peeled out after the 500m, kept on one paced in the home stretch.
Travelled behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Failed to show any dash in the final stretch.
Led early then handed up near the 800m & box seated thereafter. Gave in quickly after the furlong.
Raced in last position close to the rail. Made steady progress in the home straight.
Settled ahead of midfield 3 deep, no cover. Hung out for the majority of the trip and was never likely. (To trial).
Raced 3 back after settling on the rails with cover. Had every possible chance but was a beaten horse early in the home straight.
Eventually crossed and led along the fence approaching the 800m. Faded in the home straight.
Settled close to midfield, 3 wide with cover on the circle. Failed to make any impression in the home straight.
Dropped back to rear, settled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, swung widest, stormed home strongly to score by a length.
Eased back, settled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, swung widest, dashed on well to get 2nd.

Jumped slowly, soon niggled to settle 4.5Ls behind the leader on the rail, switched to center after straightening however checked near 350M, switched back to the rail, ran on well to get 3rd, unlucky.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls off the pace 2 wide, peeled wide, ran on nicely to get 4th.
Camped handy 2 wide, tracked into raced nicely, looked a threat until 150m, weakened thereafter.
Rolled forward to lead, kicked 2Ls clear 300M, however weakened 100M.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls off the pace 3 wide with cover throughout, kept on one pace to conclude.
Dropped back to the last, settled 10Ls behind the leader 2 wide, swung widest, ran on only fairly.
Taken across behind from a wide gate, travelled 6Ls off the pace on the fence, peeled wide, ran on fairly.
Rolled forward to obtain box seat, weakened over the last furlong.
Raced midfield, settled 3Ls behind the leader on the fence, never likely.
Race midfield, travelled 4Ls off the pace 2 wide, held up soon after straightening, badly checked 350M, dropped off thereafter.
Positively ridden to park outside the leader, flattened after straightening. (sustained speedy cuts to the left hind leg)
Rolled forward, however trapped 3 wide without cover throughout and hanging out after straightening, eased down in the straight. (Questioned for disappointed performance, see incidents report)
Crowded start, ridden up to midfield. Took closer order back stretch but lost position turn. Hard ridden 400m and shaken up 100m to hold off challenge.
Difficult to settle after start, raced close to heels into first turn. Found run between horses 400m, hit lead 200m but hung in closing to just fail.
Jumped OK, suited by pace and able to move close to rail back stretch. Taken out into final but was full of running and kept on well to the line.
Ridden to take up forward position and then took sit behind leader to the straight. Came off the fence 500m to make challenge and kept on gamely.
Jumped well but didn't settle until back stretch when 3-back and one-off. Swung wide into straight but no finishing kick and kept on one-paced.
Got off nicely and soon on fence 2-back from leader. Hugged fence around final turn to be 4th in straight. Kept on steadily.
Raced behind midfield, mostly on his own, until approaching final turn when swung wide and improved position. Looked chance 400m but no extra.
Taken forward soon after start to set steady place first 800m before slowing down back stretch. Tried to kick 400m but found little.
Ridden forward to hold down 3rd spot early before taking closer order home turn. Looked chance 300m but soon tired.
Taken back and about 8-9Ls from lead back stretch, Taken out 400m but found little under pressure and one-paced.
Got back after start and lost touch with field. Closed in on the pack entering home turn but then found nothing. Jockey said track too firm.
Showed no zip from starting gate and soon trailing the field. Did not travel at any stage and finished well back.
Jumped well and soon one-back, one-off behind leading pair. Caught flat-footed when leader kicked 400m, but soon picked up momentum to win drawing clear.
Ridden up from the start to seek rail and then set decent pace. Kicked clear 400m and still in front 200m but winner too strong.
Jumped well to hold rail 1.5Ls from leader. Took inside run around home turn to be 2nd into straight. Kept on steadily.
Didn't settle first 200m but made use of inside draw to hug rail. Improved position around turn and kept on steadily.
Taken back from wide draw and soon 6Ls from lead. Came off bridle 600m, was last into straight but kept on steadily to be closest at finish.
Jumped OK but soon in restricted room and dropped to 9th. Swung wide into straight, held for a run 150m but kept on well.
Checked soon after start and last along back stretch. Made up ground home turn, bumped 200m but kept on one-paced.
Slow into stride, trailed field along fence to final turn. Found little when put under pressure 400m and bumped and unbalanced 150m.
Badly unbalanced start and then raced keenly. Ridden up to 5th around turn and into straight but wanted to lay in. Not much room final 150m.
Forced to race wide from outside draw and then taken wider around home turn. Hard ridden 400m but found nothing.
Slow to muster, was close to heels 1100m then ridden to take on leader before turn. Running on empty from 400m.
Jumped OK and soon midfield one-off the fence. Raced tightly 800m, taken out 400m but found nothing when asked.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly to score.
Pushed forward to share the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, dominated 300M until 100M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Eased to rear, 8.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated it usual strong finishing efforts 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, raced keenly, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, lack room 400M, just held ground when clear.
Hard ridden to take the rail and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, soon weakened 300M.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the slow pace 3 wide, made early move 600M, soon out of fuel 300M.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders on the rails, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground.
Eased at start to take cover at rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
At back, 7.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, held up 400M, dashed fairly when clear.
Slow away, midfield along the fence, 4.5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, blocked most straight, not tested.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leaders 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Pushed forward, settled just behind the leaders 2 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, however soon emptied 200M.
Jumped well but restrained at rear. Was 2nd last into straight and still 2Ls back 200m before unleashing powerful burst for soft win.
Got off well and soon on rail, 3-back from leader. Switched out 600m to make run, hit front 250m but unable hold off winner.
Ridden up from outside draw and soon in box seat behind leader. Hard ridden 400m to take temporary lead and kept on well when headed.
Jumped with field and soon stalking leading pair one-off the fence. Improved position around turn and was 2nd at 200m, but no extra. Bumped near line.
Taken back from wide draw 7Ls from leader. Took closer order around turn then swung wide into straight. One-paced final. Had blood in trachea.
Tardy at start, checked 1500m and then steadied 1200m. Made up some ground around turn and early straight before one-paced.
Jumped OK but checked soon after. Travelled wide just behind midfield back and came off bridle when put under pressure. One-paced in straight.
Taken back from outside draw and trailed field until straight. Switched wide 400m and ran home steadily.
Jumped well and soon clear leader. Joined by another entering home straight and soon tired.
Ridden up to midfield, one-off the fence, and held position around turn, but found little in straight under hard riding and slipped back.
Raced just behind midfield but wide to turn. Swung wider into home straight but soon flattened.
Jumped well and soon in box seat 2Ls from leader. Closed to within a length entering straight before running on empty.
Broke well, restrained to race in midfield, quickened up smartly passing 350M, led inside 200M, went nicely clear and eased towards the finish.
Held up at the rear, moved closer passing halfway, stayed on strongly final 400 to chase winner, nearest finish.
Slow to begin, ended up at the rear 7Ls off the slow pace that may not have been suited, picked up well inside 400M making steady progress along the fence, got up for 3rd just before the line.
Went forward and led uncontested from 1500M, pressed by rival passing 1000M, gave all in straight, headed inside 200M, weakened to 4th.
Dropped back to the rear, raced 3-wide for much of the way, finished off reasonably well to take 5th near the line. Creditable effort.
Settled midfield early, shuffled back to near last turning for home, stayed on mildly, no threat final 150M.
Quickly crossed to the rail, tracked leader from 1500M, shifted out to challenge 600M but could only keep on same pace under pressure.
Towards the rear, caught racing 3-wide without cover for much of the way, moved closer to pace from 1100M, found little in straight.
Settled 2-wide in 3rd, had no cover until passing 900M, failed to quicken when the race got serious, never able to challenge.
Held up behind midfield, difficult to settle, not quickened inside 400M, never threatened.
Held up midfield, not suited by the pace, strode forward to press leader passing 1000M, all out inside 400M, soon outpaced and weakened.
Raced in midfield 3-back one off along back stretch and turn. Shaken up 400m, picking up momentum to lead 200m and held off late challenge.
Taken back to near last from wide draw before improving position along rails. Switched out 500m and ran home strongly between horses to just fail.
Jumped OK and then picked up speed to sit one-off in midfield. Bumped and taken wide around turn, ran home well to be closest at finish.
Slow to move but recovered to sit midfield alongside eventual winner. Over-raced from 800m and then checked but doing best work final 200m.
Fractious before start and slow. Pushed to go forward but line blocked and settled towards rear. Taken out turn and ran home steadily.
Slow to move and shuffled back to behind midfield. Switched out 500m to make challenge and looked chance 200m before turning one-paced.
Taken back from wide draw and trailed field until well into the home straight before running past tired horses.
Ridden up to put pressure on the leader. Challenged for lead entering straight, hit front 200m before being flattened.
Taken back after the start to sit 11th, one-off along back stretch. Dropped to second-last 400m before making late ground.
Hard ridden to take lead before joined by another turning for home. Was a spent force entering straight and dropped back gradually.
Ridden up to get forward position but kept wide and over-raced from 1100m to 800m, dropping to 7th. Boxed on early in straight before tiring final 200m.
Taken back across horses from widest draw before improving along rail to 12th. Kept on steadily until 200m before tiring.
Jumped well and soon in good position 2-back, one-off. Took closer order entering straight but run ended 200m.
Jumped well from inside position to be 5th early. Took closer order entering turn and 3rd into straight before tiring and drifting back.
Went forward but unable to slot in, posted 3 wide outside leaders without cover, steady tempo helped and crept into picture turning, kept finding final 300m to score a solid win.
Went forward from a wide alley to camp outside the leader, travelled well to turn, went to front but unable to hold off winner late, solid after long layoff.
Took up a prime position 1 out 1 back, had everything go right to bend, tracked into race well but lacked extra to contest finish with top pair.
Moderate beginning, took a spot closer than usual, just off midfield on rails, 5ls back throughout, saved ground on rails, worked home steadily to make frame.
Slotted in nicely behind leader on rails, all favours throughout, angled clear at top of straight, closed to 200m but just held same position thereafter.
Taken back from a wide alley, raced 7ls back at rear, came 3 wide on bend and switched widest in straight, closed evenly to be nearest on line.
Pressed on from a wide gate to take up running, even run in front once there, tackled soon after straightening, didn't find a lot at business end and drifted out on contention final 200m.
Tardy into stride, settled in rearward position 6ls off pace, stuck to fence and saved ground turning, closed race off steadily to be closest at finish.
Assumed a nice spot 3ls back on rails, overaced a bit in mid-section, right there on turn, didn't let down when clear and just battled away.
Ended up 3 wide in midfield, had cover in midfield 5ls off speed, tracked into race 4 wide turning, didn't let down with usual zest and struggled late.
Allowed to drift back from a wide alley, settled in rearward spot 2 wide 6ls off speed, well back turning, never really got into it when they dashed home.
Standard break, raced just off midfield in running line, 5ls from lead, difficult to settle to bend, didn't have dash when clear final 250m and just held ground in run home.
Snagged back from a wide alley, raced 3 wide at rear, overaced with slow tempo, made no serious progress.
Landed a midfield spot, raced 2 wide in mid-section 4ls or so back, overaced badly and not comfortable in action on bend, eased down in straight.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Never far off in 4th and then 5th around home bend, shaken up turning in, fought on under pressure to just get up on line.
Began well, niggled along to soon take up running, obtained rails run approaching 800 M, kept on to hold place under pressure only to be pipped at post.
Began well, settled one back on rails, forced to switch in for a run 200 M out, fought on under pressure to fail narrowly.
Broke well, settled just off the pace and 2-wide without cover far side and around the bend, came to challenge upon straightening but unable to sustain effort inside 100 M.
Broke fairly, raced wide without cover in midfield, took closer order coming out of back straight, ran home one-paced.
Jumped from a wide gate, soon dropped to rear, trailed the field most of way far side, took closer order around the bend, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began from the widest gate, settled wide in midfield, ran home steadily without quickening.
Midfield throughout, briefly baulked early in straight, finished off race nicely.
Settled well behind, met minor interference and lost ground approaching home bend, widest runner in rear turning in, made up late ground, never nearer.
Broke well, settled in midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, ran home one-paced.
Sluggish start, settled behind midfield on rails, hampered approaching home bend, no further impression.
Sluggish at start, soon dropped to last few, no further impression.
Parked midfield, 1 off with cover. Wound up nicely in the straight and fought on gamely in the run to the wire.
Effectively settled 1 out 1 back. Enjoyed a nice run in the race but was out dueled in the run to the wire.
Camped with the backmakers 2 deep with cover. Came widest in the home straight and ran on soundly.
Made its run from the rear after settling 3rd last on the paint with cover. Swung deep on the home turn & finished off fairly to make the frame.
Travelled worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Peeled out rounding the home turn and made steady progress in the run home without threatening.
Had every hope travelling midfield the fence. Was running on empty after the 150m.
Led early then handed up in the straight on the first occasion near the 1500m settling in 2nd position, 2 deep no cover. Was a spent force passing the 100m.
Checked at the start and on the first turn, settling worse than midfield the fence. Failed to close off.
Posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip midfield. Pushed forward midrace and settled closer to the speed but continued to course wide & was never likely.
Worked forward and crossed to lead on the fence in the early stages. Gave in quickly after the final furlong.
Eventually settled in the box seat. Had every possible chance but came up empty at the business end of the race.
Settled at the tail of the on the paint with cover. Failed to respond to riders urgings and struggled in the final stretch.
Raced midfield, settled 6Ls off the pace on the fence, under pressure 500M, switched to centre after straightening, picked up well over the last furlong and scored nicely.
Camped handy, settled 4Ls off the pace 2 wide, tracked into race nicely, peeled wide turning for home, dashed on well to claim 2nd.
Hard ridden to hold the box seat, stayed on well after straightening, caught 150M to get 3rd without any threats.
Rolled forward to lead, found cover 600M, one paced to the line.
Rolled forward however trapped 3 wide without cover until 900M, took rail and lead 600M, weakened 150M.
Failed to muster despite ridden along early, settled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence, under pressure 600M, made minor ground in the straight.
Eased back, travelled 8Ls off the pace 2 wide, kept on the same pace in the straight.
Rolled forward to share the lead, covered 800M, however unable to prove extra in the straight, weakened over the last furlong.
Began awkwardly, eased back to settle 11Ls off the pace 2 wide, under pressure 700M, no dashed.
Eased back from a wide barrier, settled 10Ls off the pace 2 wide, failed to make any impression after straightening.
Failed to muster speed despite hard ridden along early, 7Ls behind the leader, under pressure 600M, never recovered, tailed out.
Taken across from a wide gate to sit at rear, 10Ls off the leader, never closed off, tailed out.
Bustled from gate, slotted 4th 1 off with cover, progress 3 wide into final turn, ran on to lead 50m, won cosily.
Speed to lead at break, set tempo, kicked on final turn, all out when headed 50m.
Tardy break, raced 2 deep behind midfield, 7L back switched out & driven home turn, closed soundly to make frame.
Taken back at start, 1 off near rear, shaken up and widest 8L back final turn, strong closer centre track.
Good break, restrained early to rail 5th, off heels & switched out home turn, solid gains to wire.
Dropped in at rear, sat rail last pair, driven 300m, stayed on without threatening.
Squeezed up at break, raced rail near rear, tight for room home turn, off heels 200m, hampered 100m, not fully extended.
Pace at break, sat 2nd 1off no cover, ridden under pressure 500m, boxed on until swamped 100m.
Raced last pair 1 off, advanced 4 wide 800m, driven 500m, all out when brief contact & lost momentum 200m.
Awkward break, keen & restrained early, trapped 3 wide near rear, wide final turn, found nothing in run home.
Smart start, raced 1 back 3rd on rail, driven & outpaced 500m, weakened out in stretch.
Bumped at break, raced midfield 1 off with cover, hard-ridden turning for home & soon faded.
Sharp start to lead on rail, keen & restrained to 2nd 1000m, eased 1 off 900m, driven to lead 250m, quickened to easy win.
Shifted & bumped start, prominent early, settled midfield 1 off, shaken up 500m, switched out 300m, ran on strongly, always held.
Tardy start, keen early, sat 1 off near rear, off heels 1000m, bustled 500m, 7L back 400m, picked up in stretch, inroads to wire.
Vied for early lead, settled handy 1 off with cover, driven 500m, outpaced turning in, stayed on gamely to wire.
Niggled early stages to sit 1 off behind midfield, shaken up home turn, stayed on evenly for pressure.
Bumped start, speed to sit handy on fence, hard-ridden 3rd 300m, kept on but swamped closing stages.
Began awkwardly, raced at tail, 8L back turning in, driven 300m, progress checked 150m, ran on soundly without threatening.
Fair break, trapped 3 wide behind midfield, advanced 800m, outpaced 600m, widest into stretch, kept on for modest gains.
Decent break, raced rail behind midfield, niggled 800m, driven 500m, plugged on tamely.
Good break, 5 wide no cover 1st turn, led 1000m, driven final turn, headed 250m, emptied & faded.
Tardy start, raced near rear on rail, hard-ridden 300m, never a factor.
Pace at break, raced 3 wide no cover midfield, advanced backstretch, lost ground home turn, faded in run home.
Eased at start to cross at rear, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 250M and scored.
Eased back for cover, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly to the line despite not suited by the slow pace and being held up 200M.
Pushed to take rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, only little dash in straight.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, very one paced, just held ground in straight.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Bumped start, took rail behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M.
Eased to rear to take rail, 9Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 150M.
Trapped 3-4 wide in midfield throughout, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on ok.
Just off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, weakened 150M.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3-4 wide throughout and lost significant amount of ground, ran on ok until 100M flattened.
Settled in box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, ran on fairly in straight, checked 50M.
Jumped with field but restrained between horses 7Ls from leader. Remained one-off to straight, switched out 300m and picked up quickly to win close to line.
Jumped well and 2nd early before slipping back to 4th 3Ls from leader. Took closer order into turn, switched out 200m, took lead 150m but swamped on line.
Ridden up between horses before easing off to hold 3rd along back stretch and final turn. Lost position at 200m but came again final stages.
Hard ridden to hold rail and joint leader to first turn before dropping to 2nd 2Ls back. Kept on steadily in straight but swamped close home.
Began OK and switched to rail 5Ls from leader. Got shuffled back before turn but kept on well until lost running 200m out. One-paced.
Began OK and held in midfield one-off the fence. Swung wide into straight and made up some ground before becoming one-paced from 200m.
Hard ridden from widest draw to share lead first 200m before moving 2L clear at 1000m. Led into straight, still ahead 200m before tiring.
Jumped well but no early speed and trapped 3-wide at rear/ Rolled forward from 800m and got to 3rd at 300m before tiring.
Ridden from start but unable to muster and taken back across horses to be in last pair. Shaken up turn and shown whip 300m but found nothing.
No early speed and dropped to midfield along the rail. Made forward move top of straight but found nothing and faded.
Got off nicely but held wide around first bend. Crowded out around final turn and started to weaken entering straight.
Ridden from start but no speed and soon in last pair. Was last before final turn, under whip 400m but no response.
Sent forward as expected, travelled well in the lead, kicked nicely clear early straight, maintained momentum to the line, never in danger.
Held up midfield along the inside, ran on reasonably well final 300M but never looked like reeling in the winner.
Slightly slow away, turned 3-wide 500M and soon bustled along, kept on steadily over final 300M.
Up with early pace, held back slightly to race in 4th turning for home, stayed on but lacked pace to seriously challenge.
Held up towards the rear, made steady progress final 200M and was gaining on the principals nearing the finish.
Began awkwardly, raced in midfield about 6Ls off the pace, stayed on mildly.
Chased leading pair but couldn't find extra to challenge inside 300M, weakened final 100M.
Dropped back to near last, had plenty to do turning in, headway inside 300M but was held up over final 150M, not properly tested.
Caught racing wide without cover in midfield, ran on one-paced final 300M over this unproven trip.
Driven forward to race outside leader, drifted out rounding the turn, weakened and no extra final 200M.
Restrained from a wide gate to settle well back, 10Ls down turning for home, made no real progress.
Raced in midfield along the 3-path, under serious pressure turning for home, soon beaten, eased mid-straight. (Jockey said his horse never travelled at any stage.)

Jumped fairly, always well there, hit the front under pressure passing 300 M, ducked in away from whip 150 M out, hung on well to score.
Began well, settled just off the pace on heels of leaders, came to challenge under pressure inside final 200 M, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Always thereabouts, came under pressure over 400 M out, kept on before fading inside final 150 M.
Settled in rear, shaken up passing 400 M, raced greenly under pressure down the centre of the track, did best work late.
Close up, held narrow lead coming onto course proper, headed passing 300 M and faded under pressure.
In rear early, settled just better than midfield, one-paced under pressure in the run home.
Began moderately, settled in last few, found nothing under pressure.
Prominent early stages, came under pressure halfway out, found nothing.
Began fairly, soon dropped to last few, found nothing under pressure.
Jumped well to hold slender lead early travelling down the centre of the track, headed passing 600 M and folded up quickly.
Jumped moderately, travelled not far off down the centre of the track early, dropped away quickly halfway out.
Prominent early, never on terms.
Sluggish at start, always in last few racing down the centre of the track.
Broke well to lead briefly settling just off the pace on grandstand rails, dropped out of contention from approaching course proper.
Closed off strongly from last position after being held up early in the home straight. Found runs towards the inside of the filed & hit the line well.
Ridden patiently making its run from back in the field after settling 2-3 deep with cover. Cornered widest and hit the front near the 150m but was out gunned in the run to the post.
Eventually settled 3 back in 5th position on the fence. Ran on soundly in the straight.
Dueled for the lead early before box seating. Enjoyed a nice run in the race, kept on gamely in the run to the wire.
Raced at the tail of the field, on the rails with cover. Shifted out early in the straight and closed off soundly down the outside of the field.
Camped midfield, 1 off with cover. Made up some ground early in the straight before peaking on its run well short of the post.
Began awkwardly then failed to muster speed settling behind midfield the fence. Kept whacking away at the same pace in the final stretch.
Never likely after being left 3 wide and without cover on the circle. Travelled in a midfield position thereafter and kept on one paced in the straight.
Caught 3 wide without cover in the early stages whilst racing prominently. Improved & settled outside the leader 1 off no cover after the 800m & led soon after. Was overhauled at the furlong.
Taken back from a wide barrier and settled 4th from the rear, 3 deep with cover. Failed to make any impression in the home stretch.
Raced in a handy position just off the speed, 2 deep with cover. Commenced to tire quickly after the 150m.
Initially settled in 2nd position outside the leader 1 off no cover. Obtained a trailing position on the circle, but faded quickly after the furlong.
Ridden along from barrier rise & did enough work to cross and led on the paint in the early stages. Punctured early in the home straight.
Bumped at the start, settling worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Failed to finish off.
Camped handy early, moved forward 1100M to park outside the leader and took advantages of the slow tempo, battled on strongly, just hung on for a narrow win. (lost left front plate)
Eased back to rear, travelled 5.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite harmed by the slow pace, swung widest, dashed on strongly for a very close 2nd.
Settled worse than midfield on the fence, disadvantaged by the slow tempo, held up 2-1, however ran on well to get 3rd.
Slowly start, soon recovered to settle 2Ls behind the leader on the fence, benefited by the slow sectionals, kept on one pace to conclude.
Rolled forward to take the lead, enjoyed the soft sectionals, however weakened 100M.
Camped handy 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, however under pressure 600M, one paced home.
Very slow early, settled 5Ls off the pace on the fence, hampered by the slow tempo, never recovered.
Eased back, 4Ls off the pace 2 wide, never ran on, eased down 100M, tailed off. (substantial amount of mucopus)
Speed to lead at break, taken to rail, quickened clear 250m, never headed, easy.
Awkward break, sat midfield stands' rail, shaken up 450m, quickened to 2nd 150m, closed soundly, no match for winner.
Awkward start, raced mid rank stands' side, over-raced 450m, flat-footed & driven 350m, ran on strongly to claim 3rd late.
Good break, raced close up centre track, hard-ridden 2nd & shifted to stands 250m, faded final 150m.
Smart start, raced fore of midfield, bustled 600m, drifted across rival 450m, driven 400m, shifted in 200m, stayed on one pace.
Raced near rear, driven 500m, battled on without threatening.
Decent break, raced handy, bustled 600m, boxed on one pace to wire.
Broke well, soon settled back, impeded 450m, driven 400m, plugged on evenly.
Shifted & bumped start, raced at tail, bustled early, kept on moderately past beaten rivals.
Tardy break, soon advanced to sit handy, ridden 400m, weakened out tamely.
Sluggish start, crowded early, soon recovered to race 2nd, niggled 500m, fading when squeezed & hampered 200m, no extra.
Fair break, raced handy, never comfortable & niggled 600m, driven 400m, faded & well beaten.
Ridden from gate to dispute lead, settled 1 back on rail, switched 1 off 430m, quickened to lead 250m, strong to wire.
Speed at break, restrained to 6th 1 off with cover, switched out & driven 400m, led 300m, headed 250m, boxed on to wire.
Slow start, settled at tail, advanced 5-wide final turn, 3L down & shaken up 400m, solid gains, hung left in run, snatched share of 2nd at line.
Smart start, midfield 1 off with cover, shaken up home turn, sound progress until off heels 150m, strong closer, just missed frame.
Fair break, bustled early, railed behind midfield, driven final turn, ran on for sound gains to wire.
Restrained early, sat 3 deep with cover behind midfield, ridden wide into stretch, stayed on well without threatening.
Good break, slotted handy 1 off with cover, progress 3 wide home turn, narrow lead 350m, headed 300m, faded late.
Fast start to dispute lead, settled 5th on fence, over-raced 800m to 500m, switched out final turn, one-paced to wire.
Fast break, restrained early, sat 3 deep no cover midfield, driven wide home turn, every chance 350m, weakened in run.
Awkward break, bustled early, settled rail last trio, at tail turning for home, boxed on past beaten rivals.
Sharp start, mid rank on rail, off heels 800m, driven 400m, outpaced & plugged on to wire.
Missed break, raced last trio 1 off, driven 400m, plodded on, eased late.
Bustled from wide gate, slotted 2nd 1 off no cover, led into stretch, headed 350m, soon emptied, eased final 150m.
Driven at break to lead 1100m, to rail 1000m, driven & headed final turn, faded markedly.
Box seat, traveled nicely under good pace, momentarily held up 400m, closed off strongly when clear and scored.
Hard ridden forward, settled just off the good pace 2 wide, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 6Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made steady ground in straight.
Pushed forward, took rail, led by 1L at good pace, flattened 250M.
Eased at start, 9Ls off the good pace 2 wide, raced flat until 200M, made some ground.
Hard ridden forward but failed to cross, trapped 3 wide 2.5Ls off the good pace, ran on well until 150M flattened.
At back, 7.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, ran on ok.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, out of fuel 200M.
At back but on the fence, 7.5Ls off the good pace, no turn of foot.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, flattened 250m.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, soon emptied 400M.
Very slow away, never competitive.
Hard ridden throughout at rear, never a factor.
Ridden forward from wide draw before cutting in to the rail 800m. Put under pressure 500m and ran on well to win.
No early speed and shuffled back to last before turn. Swung widest into straight and ran home strongly.
Hard ridden from start but failed to muster. Raced close to heels 1000m, put under pressure 400m and ran on strongly.
Raced keenly between horses to share early lead before settling in 3rd. Came under whip 300m and tended to lay in but kept on.
Ridden to find forward position but unable to cut in and kept wide. Covered extra ground around turn and kept on steadily to the line.
Hard ridden from wide draw to grab narrow lead going into the turn. Harassed by inside runner but still in front 200m before being swamped.
Stumbled at start and soon behind a wall of horses in midfield. Unable to get a clear run in straight and not ridden out.
Jumped OK but no early speed and held in midfield but wide. Shaken up 400m and kept on steadily to be closest at finish.
Taken forward to dispute lead, cut in towards the fence 800m and continued to eyeball leader until 200m before weakening.
Raced in midfield close to rail about 4Ls from leader. Improved position around turn before turning one-paced in straight.
Unable to make use of inside draw and soon behind midfield along rail. Put under pressure 500m but found nothing.
Taken back from wide draw and soon in last pair along rail. Showed the stick early in straight but no response.
Never far off form the pace, moved into contention near 400M and going well, put in a strong finishing challenge, led inside 200M and clear, won comfortably.
Began well, proved difficult to settle when under restraint, left racing 3-wide without cover, ran on well in straight but was outpaced by the winner over final 200M.
Held up in midfield along the fence, had to shift out for clear passage turning in, ran on well for 3rd without threatening to trouble the winner.
Held up 3-wide in midfield, kept on reasonably well when driven inside 400M.
Reserved near the rear, saved ground along the inside, shifted out to clear 350M, stayed on mildly.
Held up midfield, lost ground near 700M, and shuffled back to the rear, made steady progress final 300M. (Jockey questioned.)
Soon led and set steady pace, driven out 350M, headed and no extra inside 200M. (Reported to be distressed after race)
Held up in last under heavy restraint, swung 3-wide for home, stayed on fairly down outside of track.
Tracked leading pair, nudged along nearing 400M but failed to quicken, no threat from 200M.
Towards the rear, shuffled back to near last rounding the bend, made limited progress final 300M.
Settled behind mid-division, kept on one paced final 300M, never a threat to leaders.
Positioned 2-wide in midfield, found little off the bridle, never threatened.
Taken back to the rear, 3-wide turning for home but barely picked up at all once put under pressure.
Placed outside the lead but not able to quicken passing 350M, dropped away and eased towards the finish.
No early speed and dropped to last but wide. Still last 400m before swooping around field inside runner up. Given reminders 50m to just win.
Taken back after start and dropped to second last entering final turn. Swung wide into straight and ran home strongly to just miss.
Ridden forward from wide draw and raced mostly without cover. Closed in around turn, took lead 200m but unable hold off first two.
No early speed and kept wide behind wall of horses to and around the turn. Did not get clear run until 250m, doing best work at finish.
Hard ridden from the start to dispute early lead before getting ahead 800m. Tried to kick clear 400m but collared 200m and weakened.
Taken back from wide draw to rail and made up lost ground. Shaken up 400m and closed in gradually before breaking leg just before line.
Ridden up from outside drew and held three-wide but with cover. Still in contention 300m before weakening.
Was fired up soon after start and eased to find cover before turn. Hard ridden 400m but limited response and plodded to line.
Fractious in starting gates and lost ground start. Got head on side around turn and under whip from 500m but did not respond.
Hard ridden from inside draw to dispute early lead before slipping back to 2nd at 800m. Started to weaken entering straight.
Bumped start but recovered and quickly made up ground to be 4th at turn. Faded from 300m. Run unacceptable. Blood in trachea.
Bumped start but raced in pack until straight when unbalanced and faded. Run unacceptable.
Pressed on from a wide gate, worked hard to eventually cross, set tempo to suit, kicked on turning and stayed on well enough to hold off fast closing rival.
Drifted back from an outside alley, raced 3 wide 7ls back towards rear, same margin back turning, made a wide run and closed off strongly in straight to just miss.
Settled just off midfield, 3 wide with cover, 5-6ls back to bend, closed with usual purpose making good ground to take 3rd.
Planted wide when unable to slot in in midfield, 5ls back when inconvenienced and shifted 4 wide without cover on bend, kept on steadily to make frame.
No pace as usual, took up spot at rear, 7-8ls back, still had plenty to do turning, weaved a passage clear between horses and closed best to be nearest on line.
Lobbed good position 1 out 1 back, had an ideal run to bend, moved into 2nd chasing leader, tired final 200m and missed frame.
Began well, pressed forward but unable to slot in, posted 3 wide without cover, kept working to bend, unable to threaten but stayed on ok given workload.
Not much early speed, sat just off midfield on rails, 6Ls back on rails, saved ground on bend, unable to finish off and just held ground in straight. (lame right fore)
Angled back to race behind midfield on rails,7ls or so from lead, quiet time to bed, in traffic turning but no extra when clear. (bled)
Ended up in midfield, racing 2 wide, 5ls or so back, same margin back turning, no extra in straight and dropped off.
Showed enough speed to hold spot behind leader, fair run throughout, struggling soon after turning, dropped right off in straight.
Out with them, landed ideal spot on leaders back, close enough on bend but under pressure, folded quickly to be beaten a long way.
Missed start as has often been case, ended up in midfield 6ls or so back in running line, had everything to suit, closed soundly but again found 1 better, promoted to 1st after protest.
Landed a spot on rails, 4-5ls back, soft run with speed on, closed off rapidly from 350m, cut back to rails before stopped in tracks final 100m. Promoted to 2nd after protest against winner.

Took up running, set solid tempo with pressure from horses outside, kicked well clear turning, drifted around badly final 150m causing interference to those behind, demoted to 3rd after protest. (bled)
Took an ideal spot 1 out 1 back, not a soft run with speed on, 3ls back turning, kept on evenly in straight to make frame.
No early pace and situated with last few 9ls or so back on rails, helped by fast tempo, weaved into clear at 300m and closed soundly to just miss frame.
Taken back from a wide alley, raced behind midfield 7ls or so back, tempo to suit, closed off well between horse to be not far off place getters.
Settled back with last few, 8ls or so away in running line, aided by decent tempo, made progress turning in and closed off soundly in straight to be nearest on line. (see racing incidents)
Ended up racing 3 wide with cover in midfield, 4-5ls back on bend, hung and lost position turning, didn't really close off with any purpose and jockey reported hanging in straight.
Taken back from wide gate, Settled at rear 10ls back, plenty to do turning, passed a few in straight.
Settled 3 wide behind midfield, 6-7ls back, came wider turning, never really threatened.
Took an ideal slot behind the leader, had a fair run despite decent speed on, niggled turning and showed very little final 300m.
Unable to slot in and settled 3 wide just of speed for a wide gate, 3ls back to bend, unable to go on with it in straight and dropped out.
Raced prominently outside leader throughout, received some attention from outside horse, gave in quickly soon after straightening.
Ended up racing 3 wide without cover from tricky gate, up pressing for spot on circle, in 2nd turning but capitulated badly in straight.

Began fairly from a wide gate, settled just worse than midfield, widest runner turning in, ran on strongly down the centre of the track to snatch victory final strides.
Jumped moderately, soon ridden to vie for lead holding slender advantage most of way to straight, kept on under pressure while drifting about, only to be caught in the shadows of the post.
Jumped fairly, settled within 3L of pace in 5th on rails, made modest progress under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Broke fairly from the widest gate, soon taken back to rear of field near rails, commenced move around the bend, made up good ground from towards rear into straight, did best work late.
Broke well, settled just off the speed in 4th, kept on one pace without quickening.
Raced wide behind midfield, lost position 600 M out, towards rear into straight, finished off race well.
Jumped well from a low draw, disputed lead most of way to straight, kept on under pressure before fading inside 200 M.
Given reminders in midfield early, settling in forward of midfield, wide into straight, ran home steadily under pressure.
Broke well, settled in midfield, one-paced under pressure in straight.
Began well from a poor draw, raced prominently without cover throughout far side and around the bend, folded up quickly after straightening.
Began awkwardly losing ground, settled in last few, well behind turning in, no further impression.
Began moderately, never seen with a chance.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race after box seating. Drifted out under pressure passing the 100m. Survived protest.
Parked behind midfield on the rails. Closed off well despite being hampered after the 100m. Protested unsuccessfully.
Slotted in approaching the 1000m to travel midfield, 1 of with cover. Made steady ground in the run to the wire.
Taken back from the outside alley and settled in last position, 1 off with cover. Finished off soundly to make the frame.
Settled 3 back the paint, had cover. Kept to the inside in the home stretch and finished off evenly.
Worked forward and eventually crossed to lead on the fence passing the 800m. Faded late.
Effectively raced 1 out 1 back in fourth position, with cover. Finished off steadily but was crowded for room inside the final 50m.
Settled towards the tail of the field, 2-3 wide with cover. One paced in the home straight. (Bled)
Camped behind midfield the fence, had cover. Kept plugging away along the inside in the run home.
Posted 3 wide no cover with the backmakers. Battled away towards the outside in the home straight.
Hampered at then start then travelled worse than midfield after being checked near the 1000m, 2 deep no cover. Failed to close off.
Went forward and travelled in 2nd position shifting out to race 1off no cover after the 800m. Gave in quickly after the final furlong.
Eased at start, travelled 5Ls off the pace 2 wide, under pressure 450M and switched to 3 wide, dashed on strongly and scored comfortably.
Taken back, settled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, hard ridden forward 800M, kicked away after straightening, overhauled 50M, good effort.
Raced midfield, travelled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, under pressure 600M, switched to widest after straightening, made steady ground to get a distant 3rd.
Pushed forward to obtain the box seat, dropped to midfield when the pace quicken 1600M, blocked 5-4, severely checked rounding the Home Turn, ran on well thereafter. (Questioned for riding)
Eased back, 5Ls off the pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, under pressure 600M, looked likely until 200M flattened.
Hard ridden early along the fence, settled 6Ls off the leader, never in a competitive position, ran past tired horses after straightening.
Hard ridden forward, found the fence and led near the winning post on the first lap, tried to kick away 600M, out of fuel 250M.
Eased back, settled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence, switched 2 wide back straight, peeled wide after straightening but unable to finish off.
Hard ridden forward to lead, obtained the box seat near the winning post on the first lap, under pressure 600M, flattened badly thereafter, tailed out.
Rolled forward to park outside leader, under pressure 600M, weakened badly thereafter, tailed out.
Fair start, sat midfield 1 off, steadied 900m, advanced 3 wide 450m, led 250m, battled gamely to maintain advantage in run home.
Taken behind at start, settled last trio 1 off, progress 600m, closed out strongly in stretch.
Dropped in at break, railed in last trio, switched out for progress final turn, hard-driven to 3rd 250m, run flattened final 50m.
Fast break, led early, headed 1200m, taken back to slot handy on fence, niggled 600m, driven 300m & kept on without threatening.
Tardy start, trapped 3 wide no cover midfield, advanced wide to 3rd in back stretch, pressed lead 300m, outpaced, boxed on evenly.
Bustled initially, settled rail midfield, steadied 800m, niggled 600m, driven turn & shifted across rival 250m, boxed on one pace.
Snagged back to tail at break, driven 4 wide for progress 450m, solid inroads until run tapered final 150m.
Missed break, railed behind midfield, steadied & shuffled to tail final turn, crowded & progress impeded 250m, not fully tested.
Ridden at break, sat 4th on rail, advanced to 2nd 1 deep 1000m, shuffled back 4th & niggled 800m, struggled in stretch run.
Good break, slotted 1 back 1 off, led 1200m, headed 800m, close 2nd & ridden 300m, found nothing, faded.
Crowded start, bustled to settle midfield 1 off, switched out home turn & driven, found little, faded.
Sharp start, shifted into rival early strides, over-raced 1 back on rail, switched 3 deep & led 1 off 800m, driven 350m but emptied out.
Fast to stride, dropped behind midfield on rail, progress on inner final turn, shaken up 300m, quickened to narrow lead 125m, held on.
Broke with others, sat 4th on rail, in pocket into home turn, switched wide into stretch, advanced to 2nd 100m, rallied late, just failed.
Broke in line, snagged back from wide gate, sat 1 off, ridden 300m, closed out strongly to press front pair at wire.
Good break, raced 3rd 1 off no cover, smooth advance to lead 250m, headed 125m as run tapered.
Broke with others, raced last pair on rail, shaken up 300m, stayed on evenly for modest gains.
Speed to lead early on rail, to 2nd 900m, driven final turn, unable to raise game, plugged on one pace.
Good break, dropped near rear, bustled along 1 off with cover, driven wide home turn, plugged on tamely.
Fast break, trapped handy 3 wide initially, rolled to lead 900m, drew 3L clear 600m, emptied 250m, faded out.
Smart start, raced 1off with cover 5th, driven wide into stretch, weakened in run home.
Bumped start, 3Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 200M to score.
Hard ridden to hold the rail and shared the lead at slow sectionals, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Pushed to keep up in front of midfield, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, closed the race off well for 3rd.
Very slow away, 4.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, favoured by the slow tempo, however no progress.
Hard ridden to share the lead, trapped 3 wide, flattened 200M.
Eased at start to take cover towards rear, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 4 wide throughout and lost significant amount of ground, ran on until 200M flattened.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, flattened in straight.
Hard ridden to share the lead 2 wide at slow tempo, out of fuel 250M.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, trapped 3 wide, soon weakened 400M.
Eased back, never a factor.
Restrained at start and held at rear one-off the fence. Tight for room 800 but found passage between horses 400m and finished strongly.
Restrained after jumping well and held one-off in midfield. Overraced at 800m but ran home strongly between horses final 400m.
Ridden from wide draw to go forward and then whizzed around horses to take lead 800m. 2nd into straight and kept on gamely final 400m.
Made use of inside draw to hold box seat behind leaders. Hugged rail around turn and still in range 200m but no extra close home.
Jumped well and held behind the pace to turn. Swung wide into straight but kept on steadily before turning one-pace 200m.
Ridden up from outside draw and held 3-wide for most of the trip and without cover from 600m. Shown whip 300m but no extra.
Bumped start and taken back across runners. Had severe check 800m and dropped to last. Made up good ground in straight.
Hard ridden to share lead from 1000m to 800m. Dropped to 3rd around final turn and tired from 300m.
Jumped best, crossed to rail before 1000m and then led or shared lead to 200m before weakening.
No early speed and soon last. Made up some ground around turn but struggled in straight. Never competitive.
Jumped nicely from inside gate and raced along fence in midfield before shifting out 800m. Cut back in 400m but tired badly final 200m.
In 4th never far off the pace, moved sweetly into contention 350M, chased leader strongly, bumped by that rival 50M out, ran on again to be nearest at the finish. (Finished 2nd, placed 1st.)
Prominently ridden, responded well turning in, led 200M out, drifted into a rival nearing 50M, held on just. (Finished 1st, placed 2nd.)
Driven to the lead, took them along at slow pace, all out inside 300M but couldn't match the first two for finishing speed inside 200M.
Held up behind midfield, probably not helped by the slow pace, driven near 300M, made steady progress and kept battling away to post.
Taken back to the rear from wide barrier, hampered by the slow pace, shifted out 3-wide and strode forward 700M, stayed on well before hampered near 50M.
Tracked leaders in a slowly run race, had every chance turning in but lacked pace to seriously challenge. (Muco.)
Settled 2-wide behind midfield, niggled along halfway round the bend, stayed on mildly.
Held up near the rear about 8Ls off leader, not helped by slow pace, switched 3-wide and strode closer to leaders passing 500M, made some progress in straight but was never a serious threat.
Reserved near the rear, behind a wall of horses turning in, held up to 200M, ran on one-paced.
Slow to begin, held up at the tail of the field 8-9Ls off the pace, made limited progress turning in, weakened final 100M.
Settled in midfield, appeared to be travelling well but found little when the pace quickened inside 400M.
Raced in mid-division along the 2-path, came under serious pressure passing 500M, soon beaten.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Waited with, saved ground turning in, snuck up on rails early in straight, switched out for an impressive late run inside final 150 M, won unextended.
Settled just better than midfield, switched out for a run passing 400 M, ran on steadily under pressure but found winner too good.
Soon taken back to last of field after beginning from a poor draw, remained same into straight, finished off race well between runners down inside, did best work late.
Ridden along to keep up with early pace joining leader into straight, hit the front over 200 M out but unable to sustain effort nearing finish.
Broke well, travelled in 3rd on rails to straight, failed to quicken under pressure.
Ridden along to hold lead far side, obtained rails run coming onto home bend, headed under pressure 300 M out, folded up quickly inside final 150 M.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, soon recovered to midfield on rails, baulked for a run until after 150 M, kept on well to the line.
Prominent early gradually settling in midfield, inconvenienced for a run 350 M out, kept on steadily without quickening.
Began fairly settling within 3L of pace in 6th on rails, saved ground turning in, failed to quicken under pressure.
Jumped fairly, soon taken to rear of field, remained well back into straight, widest runner turning in, ran on past well-beaten horses.
Settled in 5th within 3L of pace to straight, yielded ground soon after straightening.
Began fairly, soon dropped to last few, never a danger.
Slow into stride, picked up gradually to rear of midfield on rails approaching home bend, found nothing under pressure in straight.
Broke well from the widest gate, with leaders out wide far side, hung out badly around the bend, dropped out into straight.
Parked worse than midfield the fence. Briefly held up early in the straight, shifted into the clear after the 300m and had the race in its keeping 100m from home.
Raced one position behind midfield on the rails. Ranged up at the furlong and looked the likely danger but was overhauled near the 100m.
Stalked the leader along the fence, had cover. Got a nose in front at the 150m, stayed on gamely.
Travelled behind the speed, 3 deep with cover. Loomed up at the 200m but failed to sustain its run.
Slow to begin settling in last position 1 off with cover. Came widest in the straight and ran on soundly.
Slow to begin travelling in 2nd last position, 1 off with cover. Ran on well.
Had every hope after racing 1 out 1 back. Weakened over the concluding stages.
Sent forward and lead along the paint. Faded after the 150m.
Settled close to midfield 3 wide with cover. Failed to make any impression in the run home.
Camped midfield, 2 deep with cover. Gave in quickly over the latter stages.
Ridden along at the start and failed to muster settling with the backmakers, close to the rail. Struggled in the home straight.
Couldn't go the early speed of the race, settling back in the field, 1 off with cover. Never likely.
Vied for leading duties, 1 off with cover. Did some work in the run and was running on empty at the 250m.
Posted 3 deep on the speed no cover. Was a beaten horse early in the straight.
Ridden forward to take the lead, enjoyed the slow sectionals, battled on gamely in the straight, hung on for win by a nose.
Rolled forward, travelled 1L behind the leader 2 wide without cover, benefited by the slow pace, fought on well in the straight, just beaten by a narrow margin for 2nd.
Eased to sit midfield, 4.5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, despite harmed by the slow sectionals, dashed on well to be nearest at finish.
Box seat, travelled 3Ls behind the leader, benefited by the slow pace, stayed on well to get 4th.
Raced midfield, settled 6Ls behind the leader on the fence, despite hampered by the slow pace, ran on nicely.
Camped handy, settled 3Ls behind the leader 2 wide, although benefited by the slow tempo, under pressure 500M, kept on one pace only.
Slow to begin, settled 8Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, never looked likely.
Settled worse than midfield, 7Ls of the pace 2 wide, disadvantaged by the slow tempo, never in a competitive position.
Raced midfield, settled 5Ls behind the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow sectionals, weakened 150M.
Dropped behind from the wide gate, settled 8Ls behind the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow sectionals, failed to make ground.
Settled at rear, never a factor.
Good start, sat rail fore of midfield, smooth progress in stretch to move 2nd at 200m, driven to lead 50m.
Fast break, raced 1 off with cover 4th, closed soundly to take 2nd final strides, always held.
Rousted at break to lead 1st turn, hard-ridden in front 350m, headed 50m, lost 2nd final strides.
Fair break, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, driven wide 430m, solid closer to take 4th late.
Fast start, slotted 1 off with cover midfield, switched 5 wide in to stretch, stayed on evenly for late gains.
Tardy start, bustled early last trio on rail, advanced on paint 1100m, hard-ridden 400m, stayed on for decent progress.
Taken to tail from wide gate, advanced 1100m, shuffled to last final turn, stayed on soundly without threatening.
Fast from gate, raced 1 off with cover midfield, switched out & driven final turn, plugged on to wire.
Smart break, sat 1 back on rail, 3rd & every chance when driven final turn, brief 2nd, tapered out.
Good break, snagged back to race near rear 1 off with cover, to tail 1100m, wide progress 500m, widest into stretch, one-paced to wire.
Missed break, driven early to settle midfield on rail, outpaced 430m, tame stretch run.
Sluggish from gate, raced 1 off near rear, advanced 3 wide 600m, forced wider final turn, found nothing in run home.
Sharp start to lead early strides, settled 2nd 1 off no cover, driven 500m, emptied & faded early in stretch.
Fast break to lead from wide gate, across to rail 1200m, kicked on 400m, kept on gamely to score.
Sharp start, settled 3rd on rail, ridden 500m, clear 2nd 400m, made inroads on winner without threatening.
Settled rail behind midfield, shuffled back 600m, 10L back 400m, strong rail run to grab 3rd 50m out.
Fast start, settled handy 1 off with cover, niggled 500m, driven to 3rd 350m, edged out of frame late.
Sharp break, sat 5th on rail, driven to 4th 400m, boxed on at same speed.
Fair break, trapped 3 deep with cover midfield, shaken up final turn, ran on soundly to wire.
Taken behind at break, raced on inner last trio, 11L back & switched out final turn, solid closer centre track.
Sharp start, settled back midfield 2 wide with cover, driven into stretch, unable to quicken & no threat.
Fair start, sat midfield 1 off with cover, hard-ridden 430m, plugged on same speed.
Tardy start, recovered to sit midfield on rail, driven final turn, found little in run home.
Slow start, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, ridden final turn, checked 250m, plugged on tamely.
Fair break, taken back to last trio, settled 1 off with cover, driven wide into stretch, found nothing.
Dropped in at tail from wide gate, hard-ridden top of stretch, never a factor.
Fair start, rousted to sit 2nd 1 off with cover, emptied top of home stretch, faded out.
Hard ridden forward, trapped 3 wide throughout without cover, harmed by the fast pace, still closed off strongly to win.
Hard ridden early, soon eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, made steady ground 400M for 2nd.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders, suited by the fast pace, but trapped 3-4 wide, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Hard ridden to obtain a midfield spot, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made some ground 300M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders on the rails, favoured by the fast tempo, just held ground in straight.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, no progress.
At rear, 8.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, harmed by the fast pace, weakened 250M.
Pushed forward to take rail, shared the lead at fast sectionals, emptied 250M.
Hard ridden throughout but never muster, not competitive at rear.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders, suited by the fast pace, but trapped 3-4 wide, out of fuel 400M.
Hard ridden forward, not suited by the fast tempo, trapped 3 wide, weakened badly 400M.
Hard ridden forward, just off the fast pace 2 wide, faded quickly 350M.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead 2 wide at fast sectionals, dropped off rapidly 400M.
Ridden to find cover, cut to fence 800m four-back, one-off. Taken out 300m, ran strongly between horses to get up on line.
Ridden up to hit front after 100m, challenged by another to 800m when kicked clear. Still there 50m but caught last few strides.
Ridden patiently to hold fence three-back to turn. Found gap 300m and kept on steadily to be closest at finish.
Ridden forward from good draw to hold box seat on rails. Taken out 400m and kept on well to the finish.
Taken back to be in last pair but one off. Ran home steadily between horses final 400m to be closest at finish.
Jumped in front but restrained and dropped back to one-back, one-off. Didn't settle, lost position 800m. One-paced final 400m.
Ridden from start but failed to muster. Held in midfield to 800m, shuffled back turn, one-paced in straight.
Hard ridden from outside draw to go forward, closed to within half length of leader 800m, 3rd on entering straight, faded.
Crowded at start and raced one-off behind midfield to straight. Shown whip 400m but found nothing.
Ridden up but not enough speed and held wide, after which raced without cover. Tired final 400m. Declared a roarer.
Raced in midfield to 800m, lost position around turn and only one-paced in straight despite being hard ridden.
Crowded start but raced with pack to 800m before slipping back. Found nothing in straight and tired final 200.
Lost ground at start and taken back across horses to rail. Made forward move at 400m but soon tired and dropped back.
Held up midfield, raced keenly in middle stages but responded well once asked in straight, led inside 200M and continued on well to the line.
Well covered in mid-division, switched to chase winner from 300M, ran on well final 200M and was closing in on the winner.
Reserved in a 3-wide position behind midfield, put in some good work final 300M got up for 3rd near line.
Settle in 3rd 2-3Ls behind leading pair, looked a threat inside 300M, ran on but could not match winner's speed final 200M, weakened late.
Not hurried, dropped back to a 2-wide position behind midfield, made steady progress turning in but had no clear run 200M-100M, ran on again when clear.
Held up near the rear, saved ground along the fence, stayed on steadily from off the pace but was never a serious threat to the leaders.
Taken back from wide barrier, 2nd last and 7Ls off leaders in middle stages, switched widest passing 500M, stayed on fairly and no further progress final 150M.
Shared early lead on the outside, was given a breather turning for home, fought on to near 100M, no extra final stages.
Began well, held up 3-wide without cover in the group chasing the pace, failed to quicken under pressure, weakened passing 200M. (Jockey questioned.)
In 5th, 3Ls off leaders in the chasing group, gave limited response turning in, no factor final 200M.
Shared early lead, took over halfway, headed 250M and weakened.
Lacked pace, in last place and struggled to keep up with the field over the turn, ran past well beaten runners only.
Unable to slot in and was caught racing 4-wide without cover in midfield, not quickened and got tired mid-straight.
Never better than midfield, raced keenly on his debut, folded tamely final 300M.
Taken forward and soon in box seat behind leader. Held in box 400m-300m before getting run along rail. Ran home strongly.
Taken forward from wide draw to sit one-back, one-off to the straight. Kept on strongly final 400m only to be denied close to the line.
Taken quickly to the front and then set slow sectionals. Kept on well in straight but drifted wide 300, allowing winner to come through. Boxed on.
Ridden forward but raced keenly and difficult to settle. Found cover before turn, threw out challenge 300m but run ended 100m from line.
No early speed and raced wide to the turn before getting into the one-off position. Swung wide into straight but kept on steadily.
Held in midfield early but made progress around turn. Kept on steadily in straight without looking dangerous.
Jumped nicely and soon in two-back, one off position. Made forward move from top of straight but only one-paced final 200m.
No early speed and trapped three-wide without cover back stretch and turn. Kept on well in straight.
Taken back from wide draw and soon in last pair but one-off. Kept on steadily final 400m without looking a threat.
Crowded start and soon towards rear 7Ls from leader. Made some progress early in straight then one-paced.
Jumped OK and held rail position in midfield. Swung very wide entering straight but only one-paced final 400m.
Taken back from wide draw and last initially before moving forward along rail 800m. Taken out 400m but found little. One-paced.
Ridden forward to hold rail before eased to sit three-back. Raced close to heels before turn, but found little in striaght.
Taken back from wide draw, dropped back to last before turn, and lost touch with rest of field over final 400m.

Taken back to race behind midfield on rails, 7ls off top end, gradually improved on circle, gained split at 400m and set out after leaders, dashed too well spacing rivals final 200m winning comfortably.
Took up a nice spot on leaders back, enjoyed a nice run to bend, challenged and took over at 350m, no match for winner but stuck on well late.
Positioned on rails in midfield 5ls back, enjoyed an easy trip and gained inside runs turning, kept on nicely in straight despite shifting ground to take 3rd.
Settled behind midfield, 7ls or so away in running line, aided by tempo, switched out and closed hard down the middle of track to make frame.
Raced 2 and 3 wide just off midfield, 5-6ls back, shuffled wider on bend, kept on gradually to 200m but unable to get closer.
Restrained from a wide alley, shared rear 8ls or so away on rails, plenty to do turning, closed off evenly making ground to be nearest on line.
Landed a midfield spot, 5ls back in 2 wide line, same margin down to bend, angled way into clear at 300m, made no real progress when clear.
Ended up in a nice spot 3ls back on rails, no excuses 3-4ls back to bend, didn't offer much when run presented at 400m and just kept on at one speed in straight.
Used up from a wide alley to eventually take up running, set decent tempo in front, headed at 350m and dropped off thereafter when run ended.
Awkwardly away, shared rear 8ls or so back, aided by even tempo, still last turning, passed a few tired ones late.
Came out with them, posted 3 wide around midfield with cover, 4ls back on bend, switched wider turning but no change in gear final 300m and dropped out final furlong.
Out with them, pressed on to take a spot 1 out 1 back, right there 2ls back to bend, struggled to respond after bump at 350m and dropped off soon after.
Began well, didn't have speed to cross and forced to race 3 wide without cover, 3-3ls back, niggled on turning, faile to find and dropped right out.
Showed speed, used a bit to sit outside leader, up there until turn but quickly compounded to be beaten a long way.
