No early speed, raced 5ls or so back on rails, enjoyed an easy trip, gained inside split turning and closed race off too well despite shifting late.
Assumed a spot just in front of midfield on rails, had all favours in run, angled wider turning in and closed off well despite a slight bump to just miss.
Reserved at the tail of the field, had to switch out for clear run turning in, closed off well when clear 200M.
Ended up racing behind midfield, 6ls or so back in running line, closed race off evenly towards inside to make frame.
Took up a position in midfield, 4ls or so back, not asked in mid-section, switched out and just battled on at same speed without looking likely.
No early pace, settled amongst last few, tempo suited, well back turning, took inside runs and closed off well to be nearest on line.
Ended up back with last few, 8ls or so away, aided by tempo but still a long way back turning, passed a few in run home.
Showed speed to cross and lead, set decent tempo early, there until 200m but offered little thereafter.
Failed to muster, settled near to rear 9ls or so away, tempo helped but asked for a 3 wide effort from 600m, swung wide, passed only tired ones.
Caught wide from a tricky alley, pressed on to race outside leader, workload too toll approaching turn, dropped out.
Crossed to be prominent before assuming 1 out 1 back role, began to weaken approaching turn, folded tamely thereafter.
Took a nice spot behind leader, even run despite early speed, struggly turning and didn't see out journey.
Not the best away settling last close to the fence with cover. Sought runs through the field near the 200 and really motored home to snatch victory in the last stride.
Settled fifth, one of the fence, with cover. Looked to have the race in its keeping 100m out but was nailed close to home.
Raced midfield. 1 off with cover. Kept finding something all the way down the running. (Blood in trachea)
Parked midfield the fence, had cover. Made good ground along the inside in the final stretch.
Camped 3rd last, 2 deep with cover. Came with one wider in the home straight and made some late ground.
Eventually worked its way to cross and lead along the fence passing the 600m. faded quickly after the furlong.
Taken back from the outside gate and settled with the backmakers, 3 deep got some cover on the circle. Shifted out to be widest in the home straight, finished off one paced.
Forced to do plenty of work to cross and race outside the leader near the 600m. was a spent force in the homes stretch.
Slow to begin settling back in the field, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off.
Settled along the paint, back in the field with cover. Hampered after the 600m, and was never in the hunt.
Settled 3 back the fence. Had to be severely checked near the 500m, clipped heels & blundered. Never recovered.
Handed up & box seated passing the 600m. Was badly hampered when the pace steadied and never really got it the race thereafter.
Ridden forward to obtain box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, stayed inside, dashed well and won comfortably.
Pushed forward to take the lead, benefited by the slow pace, overhauled over the last furlong, hung on for 2nd.
Eased back, travelled 6Ls off the pace on the fence, despite hampered by the slow tempo, dashed on well to get 3rd.
Camped handy, settled 3Ls off the pace on the fence, benefited by the slow pace, one paced to conclude.
Ridden to park outside the leader, benefited by the slow pace, had every possible chance after straightening, however weakened 50M.
Raced midfield, settled 4.5Ls off the pace on the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, stayed inside, dashed little.
Eased to sit midfield, travelled 5Ls behind the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, peeled wide, ran on only fairly.
Failed to muster, settled 4Ls behind the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, kept on one pace.
Failed to muster, travelled 6Ls off the pace 2 wide, switched to 3 wide 800M without cover, harmed by the slow tempo, never ran on.
Ridden hard to settle 1 out 1 back from a wide gate, under pressure 500M, dropped off gradually thereafter.
Taken back from wide gate, settled 7.5Ls behind the leader, never ran on.
Awkward started then clipped heels and blundered, always at rear, never a factor.
Good break, sat handy 4th 1 off with cover, switched 4 wide final turn, shaken up 300m, quickened to lead 200m, in command at wire.
Tardy break & bustled, tightened early, raced midfield on rail, switched wide home turn & driven to 2nd 150m, kept on soundly.
Bustled early strides, raced rail behind mid rank, ridden 500m, switched out & solid stretch run to grab 3rd close home.
Awkward break, raced rail toward rear, 7L back into final turn, ridden 300m, sound gains, just missed frame.
Fast start, raced 2nd 1 off no cover, driven home turn, led 300m, swamped 200m, run tapered.
Decent start but trapped wide, snagged back to race 1 off near rear, outpaced 500m, 8L back & driven wide home turn, decent gains in run home.
Sharp break, settled 1 back 3rd on fence, niggled 600m, driven into stretch, boxed on moderately.
Good start, slight stumble early strides, trapped 3 wide no cover midfield, ridden for minor advance 700m, one-paced in stretch.
Awkward break, pace to lead on rail, hard-ridden under pressure final turn, headed 300m, faded thereafter.
Reared at break, bustled early stages, sat midfield 1 off with cover, niggled 600m, struggled in run home.
Fair break, raced behind midfield 1 off with cover, found nothing at business end.
Taken to tail from wide gate, soon outpaced in last, reminders 800m, never a factor, tailed off.
Tardy start, settled rail toward rear, switched out 7L back home turn & shaken up, powered to lead 100m, easily.
Shifted left at break, speed to take lead on rail 700m, kicked on final turn, all out when headed 100m, just held on for 2nd.
Fast start, settled back 5th, driven 400m, ran on to 3rd 100m, just missed 2nd.
Good break, bustled along 1 off in midfield, wide into stretch, ran on for solid gains without threatening.
Smart break, raced rail midfield, hard-ridden into stretch, ran on evenly to wire.
Awkward break, pace to lay up early, settled handy 4th on rail, driven 300m, one-paced in stretch.
Fast break, led 1off, headed 700m, driven in 2nd final turn, swamped & no extra final 200m.
Decent break, sat 1 off behind mid rank, ridden 400m, boxed on one pace.
Sluggish start, raced near rear 1 off with cover, 3 wide final turn, found little.
Slow start, raced at tail, outpaced in stretch, passed beaten rivals close home.
Tardy start, bustled last pair on rail, one-paced and never a factor.
Fast start, trapped wide, disputed lead, 3 deep no cover 3rd at 700m, driven 400m, weakened out in stretch.
Settled in midfield, 3Ls off the leader on the rails, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace, scored comfortably.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 250M for 2nd.
Slow away, pushed to obtain a midfield spot, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M for 3rd.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden forward to cross, sat 1L off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow sectionals, ran on until 150M flattened.
Eased back, raced keenly, 6.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, raced flat until 100M showed little dash.
Took rail easily and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on until 200M, out of fuel.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Enjoyed the perfect trip in box seat, however soon emptied 250M.
Trapped 3 wide without cover outside the leaders throughout, faded 400M.
Trapped 3 wide throughout at rear, never competitive.
Tightened early, settled three-back the fence. Hugged fence to 400m, taken out and ran on strongly between horses to win close home.
No early speed and raced between horse to first turn. Settled one-off, four back to straight, swung wide and finished strongly.
First to jump before taking box seat into first turn. Shaken up 400m, got to lead 200m but unable hold off first two.
Pushed forward early but got head up 1400m and checked 1300m. Lost ground 1000m, but rallied strongly, doing best work at finish.
Jumped well and went forward between horses before settling 4th. Caught flat-footed 400m but picking up momentum and ran on steadily.
Taken back across horses from wide draw and soon clear last. Was last into straight before making good ground final 300m.
No early speed but got to rail by first turn and settled behind midfield. Found little under pressure 400m. Had blood in trachea.
Ridden up to take lead before first turn and then raced fiercely. Kicked clear 400m but overhauled 200m and tired quickly.
Ridden up from wide draw but caught without cover and over raced. Got cover 700m, but only one-paced from 400m.
No early speed and soon in last pair but one off. Kept on steadily back stretch, taken out 400m to make run but found nothing.
Jumped OK but wobbled off first turn and caught wide, Ridden up to sit outside leader 700m, but started to give ground from 500m.
Settled one-off behind midfield but 7-8Ls from leader. Shaken up entering straight but found nothing and dropped out.
Held up behind midfield, well suited to the pace, switched to clear 300M and put in a powerful finish, got up near line for a back to back victory.
Reserved in midfield along the fence, moved sweetly into contention nearing 400M, ran on strongly to lead near 50M, caught by winner final few strides.
Driven forward and took them along at even pace, kept on well turning in and was only headed inside 50M.
Set early pace, chased leader from 1000M, kept on evenly final 350M but couldn't match the finishing speed of first two.
Fast away, restrained but never far off from the leaders, kept on steadily down the inside passing 350M, had every chance before meeting interference final 100M.
Nudged along early, chased leader in 3rd, all out inside 300M but gave limited response, outpaced final 200M.
Restrained after the start but unable to slot in, kept 3-wide for much of the way, came widest into straight, stayed on fairly from off the pace.
Held up 2-wide behind midfield, made limited progress final 300M, never factored.
Taken back and guided to a rail position, reluctant to stretch out and had to be niggled along down the back straight, had little to offer when placed under pressure 500M out.
Dropped back to last, made no real progress final 350M, never threatened.
Dropped back on jumping from 11, held up near the rear along the 2-path, not able to quicken when placed under pressure 300M.
Held up 2-wide in midfield, inclined to hang out turning for home, found disappointingly little when placed under pressure, weakened badly final 200M. (Blood in trachea.)
